40001001	Ɗum woni inɗe maamiraaɓe Iisa Almasiihu, jippotooɗo he Daawda e Ibrahim :
40001002	Ibrahim rimi Isiyaaku. Isiyaaku rimi Yakuuba. Yakuuba rimi Yahuuda he rimdaaɓe muuɗum.
40001003	Yahuuda he deekum Tamar ndimi Fares he Jara. Fares rimi Hesruuna. Hesruuna rimi Aram.
40001004	Aram rimi Aminadaabu. Aminadaabu rimi Naason. Naason rimi Salmon.
40001005	Salmon he deekum Rahab ndimi Bo'es. Bo'es he deekum Ruut ndimi Obed. Obed rimi Yesa.
40001006	Yesa rimi laamiiɗo Daawda. Daawda he dee-Uriya mo o teetunoo Uriya ndimi Suleymaanu.
40001007	Suleymaanu rimi Robo'am. Robo'am rimi Abiya. Abiya rimi Asa.
40001008	Asa rimi Yusufat. Yusufat rimi Yoram. Yoram rimi Ujiya.
40001009	Ujiya rimi Yotam. Yotam rimi Akas. Akas rimi Hejekiya.
40001010	Hejekiya rimi Manasa. Manasa rimi Amon. Amon rimi Yusiya.
40001011	Nder jamaanu mo Isra'el honaa faa Yahudankooɓe njaaraa leydi Baabiila, Yusiya rimi Yekuniya he rimdaaɓe muuɗum.
40001012	Nder jonnde maɓɓe nder Baabiila, Yekuniya rimi Salaatiyel. Salaatiyel rimi Jorobaabiila.
40001013	Jorobaabiila rimi Abihuda. Abihuda rimi Eliyakim. Eliyakim rimi Ajoro.
40001014	Ajoro rimi Sadok. Sadok rimi Akim. Akim rimi Eliyuda.
40001015	Eliyuda rimi Eliyajaaru. Eliyajaaru rimi Maatan. Maatan rimi Yakuuba.
40001016	Yakuuba rimi Yusufu, jom ɓaade Mariyaama. Mariyaama woni inna Iisa bi'eteeɗo Almasiihu.
40001017	Hakkune Ibrahim he Daawda walaana jamanuuji sappo he nay. Hakkune jamaanu Daawda warde jamaanu mo Isra'el honaa faa Yahudankooɓe njaaraa leydi Baabiila walaana jamanuuji sappo he nay. Hakkune jamaanu mo Isra'el honaa faa Yahudankooɓe njaaraa leydi Baabiila warde jamaanu Almasiihu walaana jamanuuji sappo he nay.
40001018	No Iisa Almasiihu wardi duuniyaaru nii : Mariyaama inna Iisa no nannganaaɗo Yusufu non. Amma fadde makko ɓaŋeede, tawi o saawi nder baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
40001019	Yusufu mo o nannganaa oon no dartiiɗo, o hiɗaa semtinde mo yeeso himɓe fuu. Nden o anniyi faasitaade kaɓɓal ngaal nder cuccukka.
40001020	Amma wakkati o wonnoo omo miiloo ɗum ndeen, sey maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani mo nder koyɗol, wi'i mo : —Yusufu, taan Daawda, taa hulu ɓaŋude Mariyaama, ngam ɓinngel ngel reedu mum o saawi ngeel he Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ngel ƴuwi.
40001021	O riman ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndiraa mo Iisa. Kanko hisinta himɓe makko he hakkeeji mum'en.
40001022	Ɗum fuu, ɗum waɗi ngam humnude haala ka Alla lilunoo annabiijo gom wi'a himɓe :
40001023	Surbaajo mo anndaa gorko saawan, nden rima ɓiɗɗo gorko. O innditiree Imanuwel. Maana innde ndee woni : « Alla no wondi he meeɗen ».
40001024	Wakkati Yusufu finunoo, o waɗi ko maleykaajo Joomiraawo oon wi'unoo mo ɗum. O ɓaŋi Mariyaama,
40001025	dey o hawtaay he makko naako o rimi ɓiɗɗo gorko oon. Yusufu inndiri mo Iisa.
40002001	Iisa rimaama Baytilaama, leydi Yahudiya nder jamaanu laamiiɗo Hirudus. Wakkati mum jom'en anndal gom ƴuwi lettugal, ngari Ursaliima,
40002002	mbi'i : —Toy laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe dimaaɗo joonin oon woni ? Min ngi'ii hoodere makko wanngi har lettugal, min ngari sujidande mo.
40002003	Wakkati laamiiɗo Hirudus nanunoo habaru oon, ɗum wemmbii mo, kanko he himɓe Ursaliima fuu.
40002004	Sey o noddi mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe Tawreeta. Ɓe fuu, o ƴami ɓe toy Almasiihu oon foti rimeede.
40002005	Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Baytilaama nder leydi Yahudiya, ngam non annabiijo gom winndunoo wi'i :
40002006	Aan, Baytilaama, nder leydi Yahudiya, hakiika caka gure Yahudiya mawɗe ɗeen, a hanaa wuro pamaro. Ngam ardotooɗo gom no ƴuwan nder maaɗa, garoowo dura Isra'ilankooɓe, himɓe am.
40002007	Sey Hirudus noddi jom'en anndal ɓeen nder cuccukka, ƴami ɓe wakkati mo hoodere ndeen wanngi. Ɓe kaalani mo.
40002008	Nden o lili ɓe Baytilaama. O wi'i ɓe : —Njehee, heɓa kakkinkinen dimeeki cukalel ngel. Nde nii on ngi'ii ngel, ngaron kumpitoɗon kam ngam miin duu mi yaha, mi sujidana ngel.
40002009	Wakkati ɓe nanunoo ko laamiiɗo oon haalannoo ɓe ɗum, ɓe ndilli. Hoodere nde ɓe ngi'unoo har lettugal ndeen, ardii ɓe faa nde yottii dey-dey to cukalel ngel woni, sey nde darii.
40002010	Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo hoodere ndeen darinoo, ɓe nani belɗum sanne sanne.
40002011	Ɓe naati nder ɓaade ndeen, sey ɓe ngi'i cukalel ngel he innum Mariyaama. Ɓe turii faa he leydi, ɓe cujidani ngel. Ɓe piirti gineeji maɓɓe, ɓe kokki ngel kaŋŋe, iri uurdi mbelni gom he ɗakke uurɗe gom.
40002012	Nden ɓe kootiri laawol feerewol gom ngam Alla holli ɓe nder koyɗol to ɓe coƴƴoo ɓe kaalanowa Hirudus.
40002013	Gaɗa dilludu jom'en anndal ɓeen, maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani Yusufu nder koyɗol, wi'i mo : —Umma, hooƴu cukalel ngel he innum, ndoggon, njehon Misira. Njooɗowoɗon toon sey wakkati mbi'oymaami ngarton, ngam Hirudus no tefan warde cukalel ngel.
40002014	Yusufu ummii nder jemma oon, hooƴi cukalel ngel he inniigel, ɓe pa'i Misira.
40002015	O jooɗii toon naako Hirudus maayi. Ɗum waɗi duu ngam humnude haala Alla ka annabiijo makko gom yottini wakkati o wi'unoo : Mi noddi Ɓiyam wurtoo nder Misira.
40002016	Wakkati Hirudus faamunoo ko jom'en anndal ɓeen njammbake ɗum, o tikki sanne. O tilsini cukaloy ngoroy ngonkoy nder Baytilaama he takkol mum fuu mbaree, illa keccoy faa warde he ngaɗukoy duuɓi ɗiɗi. O waɗi ɗum dey-dey he wakkati mo jom'en anndal ɓeen kokki mo.
40002017	Nyannde mum, haala ka annabi Yeremiya haalunoo kaan humnaa wakkati o wi'unoo :
40002018	Daaɗe nanaama nder Rama, bojji he cimayeeli mawɗi : Rahiila no woya cukaloy muuɗum ngam koy keddaaki, o jaɓaay duu sawrineede.
40002019	Gaɗa maayde Hirudus, maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani Yusufu nder koyɗol toon nder leydi Misira,
40002020	wi'i mo : —Umma, hooƴu cukalel ngel he innum, coƴƴoɗon nder leydi Isra'el, ngam hiɗunooɓe mbara ngel ɓeen maayii.
40002021	Yusufu ummii, hooƴi cukalel ngel he innum, ngam soƴƴaade Isra'el.
40002022	Amma wakkati o nanunoo ko Arkala'us mellaa laamiiɗo leydi Yahudiya nokku bammum Hirudus, sey o huli yottaade toon. Nden, nder koyɗol kaden, o hollitaa yahde leydi Galili.
40002023	O hoɗowi toon nder wuro wi'eteengo Nasaratu, ngam humnude haala ka annabiiɓe mbi'unoo : O wi'etee Nasaratuujo.
40003001	Duuɓi he duuɓi gaɗa mum, Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma wanngi nder ladde yeeruure leydi Yahudiya, omo wi'a himɓe :
40003002	—Tuubee, ngam Laamu Alla ɓadake.
40003003	Kanko woni mo annabi Esaaya sappinoo, wakkati wi'unoo : —Daane no huuɓa nder ladde yeeruure no wi'a : Ciryanee Joomiraawo laabi ɗi o tokkata, moƴƴinee laabi makko !
40003004	Omo ɓornii koltal canyiraangal leeɓi ngolooba. Omo tunndi tunndorgol nguru. Ɓaɓɓatti he njuumri ngoni nyaamdu makko.
40003005	Himɓe no ƴuwa huɓeere Ursaliima, he leydi Yahudiya he takkol maayo Urdun fuu, no ngara to makko.
40003006	Iɓe njardoo yeeso Alla e yeeso himɓe fuu dow hakkeeji maɓɓe, Yahaaya no waɗana ɓe batisma nder maayo Urdun.
40003007	Wakkati o hi'unoo Fariisa'en he Sadduki'en heewɓe no ngara faa ngaɗanee batisma, o wi'i ɓe : —Ɓiɓɓe bolle ! Moy wi'ii ndogganon tikkere Alla waroore ?
40003008	Ngaɗee ko hollata on tuubii.
40003009	Nde on mbi'i nder ɓerɗe mooɗon on jippotooɓe he Ibrahim, miin mi wi'an on : Alla no waawi waylii kaaƴe ɗee, ɗe laatoo taaniraaɓe Ibrahim.
40003010	Joonin, jammbere aagaama ngam soppude ɗaɗi leɗɗe. Ndenne, lekki fuu ki rimataa ɓiɓɓe lobbe, no soppetee, faɗɗee nder hiite.
40003011	Miin, ndiyam ngaɗirananmi on batisma ngam hollude ko on tuubii. Amma garoowo gaɗa am oon, no ɓuri kam baawɗe. Mi fotaay baa ɓortude paɗe makko. Kanko, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo e hiite o waɗiranta on batisma.
40003012	Omo jogii ƴarorde makko ngam ƴaraade alkamaari makko faa laaɓa. O hawra gabbe makko, o loowa nder ƴeelu. Nden o wula nyaane ndeen nder hiite nge nyifataa abada.
40003013	Nder wakkati mum, Iisa wari ƴuwi Galili, o wari dow maayo Urdun to Yahaaya, ngam o waɗanee batisma.
40003014	Amma Yahaaya hosi salaade, nden wi'i mo : —Aan haani waɗande kam batisma. Amma noy ngarirtaa to am, miin, faa mi waɗane batisma ?
40003015	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Accu ɗum laatoroo non joonin, ngam non kaanuɗen humnirde ko dartii fuu. Nden, Yahaaya jaɓi
40003016	waɗani Iisa batisma. Wakkati Iisa ummii dari nder ndiyam ɗam, kammu omti. O hi'i Ruuhu Alla no jippoo nder nanndi wuugaanu, no wara dow makko.
40003017	Wakkati mum da, daane gom ƴuwi dow, wi'i : —Oo woni Ɓiyam korsuɗo, mo nananmi belɗum mum.
40004001	Nder wakkati mum, Ruuhu Alla ɗowi Iisa nder ladde yeeruure, ngam Ibiliisa sii'oo mo.
40004002	Jemma he nyalooma faa ɗum waɗi balɗe lasooji ɗiɗi, Iisa no suumi, o rafaa.
40004003	Nden, Cii'otooɗo oon ɓadii mo, wi'i : —Se goonga fuu a Ɓii-Alla, tilsin kaaƴe ɗee laatoo nyaamdu.
40004004	Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Dewtere Alla wi'i : Hanaa nyaamdu tan neɗɗo wuurdata, amma haala fuu ƴuwka to Alla.
40004005	Gaɗa mum, Ibiliisa yaari Iisa nder Ursaliima huɓeere seniine, darni mo dow hoore Juulirde mawne.
40004006	Nden wi'i mo : —Se goonga fuu a Ɓii-Alla, jikku dow leydi, ngam Dewtere Alla wi'i : Alla tilsinan maleykaaɓe mum taɓɓite to koyngal maaɗa fii he hayre.
40004007	Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Dewtere Alla wi'i kaden : A sii'ataako Alla Joomiraawo maa.
40004008	Gaɗa mum Ibiliisa yaari Iisa dow waamnde toowne sanne gom, holli mo laamuuji duuniyaaru fuu he no ɗi ngoodiri darja.
40004009	Nden wi'i mo kaden : —Mi hokkete ɗi, ɗi fuu, nde nii a hofake, a sujidanii kam.
40004010	Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Woɗɗam Ibiliisa ! Ngam Dewtere Alla wi'ii : Alla Joomiraawo maa tan kaanɗaa sujidande. Kanko tan kaanɗaa rewude.
40004011	Nden Ibiliisa dilli acci mo. Maleykaaɓe gom ngari to makko, no ngollana mo.
40004012	Wakkati Iisa nanunoo ko Yahaaya uddaama, o fa'i Galili.
40004013	O eggi Nasaratu, o hoɗowi Kafarnahum takkol peta Galili, ci'e gonɗe nder leykoy Jabulon he Naftali.
40004014	Ɗum waɗi ngam humnude haala ka annabi Esaaya haalunoo wakkati o wi'unoo :
40004015	Onon leykoy Jabulon he Naftali ngonkoy takkol peta Galili, ngonkoy gaɗa maayo Urdun, tawaakoy nder leydi Galili, leydi ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe :
40004016	Wonɓe nder nimre, hi'uɓe jeyngol manngol. Wonɓe nder ɗowdi maayde, jeyngol wanngani ɓe.
40004017	Nder wakkati oo non, Iisa fuɗɗi waajaade no wi'a : —Tuubee, ngam Laamu Alla ɓadake.
40004018	Wakkati Iisa gosotonoo daane peta Galili, o hi'i worɓe ɗiɗo nanngooɓe liƴƴi gom, Simon inndirteeɗo Piyer he rimdaaɗo mum Andiire. Iɓe paɗɗa taaruuji maɓɓe.
40004019	Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Ngaree, tokkee kam. Mi waɗan on nanngooɓe himɓe.
40004020	Wakkati mum da ɓe mboppi taaruuji maɓɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
40004021	O yehi yeeso, o hi'i kaden rimdaaɓe ɗiɗo gom Yakuuba he Yahaaya he baabiiɓe Jebede, iɓe nder laana, iɓe moƴƴina taaruuji maɓɓe. O noddi ɓe, kamɓe duu.
40004022	Wakkati mum da ɓe mboppi laana kaan, ɓe acci baabiiɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
40004023	Iisa tinni no fiiloo nder leydi Galili, omo waajoo nder baajorɗi maɓɓe. Omo filloo filla Habaru lobbo, filla Laamu Alla. Omo nyawta iri nyawuuji he iri laruuji fuu.
40004024	Nden habaru makko sankitii nder leydi Siriya fuu. Himɓe no ngadda nyawɓe mum'en, wonduɓe he nyawuuji feere-fereeji to makko. Woɓɓe no ngondi he ginnaaji, woɓɓe no ngondi he paɗɗe, woɓɓe duu no bonnguuɓe. O nyawti ɓe, ɓe fuu.
40004025	Jama'aare mawne tokki mo. No woodi ƴuwɓe Galili, ƴuwɓe leydi Gure-sappo, Ursaliima, Yahudiya, he ƴuwɓe gaɗa maayo Urdun.
40005001	Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo jama'aare warde ndeen, o ƴeenyi dow waamnde, o jooɗowii. Aahiiɓe makko ngari to makko.
40005002	Sey o fuɗɗi waajaade ɓe, o wi'i :
40005003	—On mbelii ko'e, onon annditinɓe ko oɗon kaani wattude hoolaare mooɗon he Alla, ngam onon njeyi Laamu Alla.
40005004	On mbelii ko'e, onon woyooɓe, ngam Alla fukkinan ɓerɗe mon.
40005005	On mbelii ko'e, onon leesiniiɓe, ngam Alla ronnan on duuniyaaru.
40005006	On mbelii ko'e, onon hiɗuɓe dartinaaku sanne, ngam on kaaran, on ɗomɗitan.
40005007	On mbelii ko'e, onon yurmotooɓe, ngam Alla yurmoto on.
40005008	On mbelii ko'e, onon laaɓuɓe ɓerɗe, ngam on ngi'an Alla.
40005009	On mbelii ko'e, onon waddooɓe jam, ngam on noddirtee ɓiɓɓe Alla.
40005010	On mbelii ko'e, onon torraaɓe ngam dartinaaku, ngam onon njeyi Laamu Alla.
40005011	On mbelii ko'e nde himɓe njenni on, torrii on, ndeki on iri bononda fuu ngam am.
40005012	Mbelnee, keewiree welwelo, ngam baraaje mawɗe no ndoomi on dow kammu. Ngam hano non annabiiɓe artuɓe on ɓeen torriraa.
40005013	—Onon ngoni lamɗam duuniyaaru nduu. Amma nde ɗam lamsaa, ɗume wattetee kaden ko ɗam lamsa ? Ɗam nafataa baafuy ! Ɗam faɗɗetee yaasin, himɓe njaaɓa ɗam.
40005014	Onon ngoni jeyngol duuniyaaru nduu. Huɓeere nyiɓaande dow waamnde waawaa suuɗaade.
40005015	Walaa kuɓɓanɗo fitilla, nden hippa tummbude dow makka. Sey nii joomum ɓila ka, ka yaynana tawaaɗo nder suudu nduun fuu.
40005016	Hano non jeyngol mooɗon haani yaynirde yeeso himɓe, ngam ɓe ngi'a golleeji lobbi ɗi ngatton, nden ɓe njetta Baabii'on gonɗo dow.
40005017	—To miilee mi wari ngam moytude tilsinooje binndaaɗe nder Tawreeta naa nder dewte annabiiɓe. Mi waraay ngam mi moyta ɗe amma ngam mi humna ɗe.
40005018	Goonga kaalananmi on : Se nii kammu e leydi no keddii, toɓɓel naa masel moytataake nder Tawreeta faa ɗum fuu ɗum tabbita.
40005019	Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu jedduɗo ko ɓuri famɗude nder tilsinooje ɗeen, dey ekkitii woɓɓe faa ngaɗa non, joomum laatotoo ɓurɗo famɗude nder Laamu Alla. Amma neɗɗo fuu tokkuɗo Tawreeta goonga e goonga, dey ekkitii woɓɓe ngaɗa ko winndaa nder mayre, joomum laatoto mawɗo nder Laamu Alla.
40005020	Ngam miɗo haalana on : Se nii on ɓuraay jannginooɓe Tawreeta he Fariisa'en fuu dartinaaku, on naatataa nder Laamu Alla.
40005021	—On nani maamiraaɓe meeɗen mbi'anooma : To ittu yonki goɗɗo, ittuɗo yonki fuu no haani hiiteede.
40005022	Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on : Tikkanɗo banndum fuu, no haani hiiteede. Neɗɗo fuu bi'uɗo banndum no kaaŋaaɗo, no haani darneede yeeso alkaali. Kaden duu, neɗɗo fuu bi'uɗo banndum no milkaaɗo no haani watteede nder jahannama.
40005023	Ndenne, nde nii a warii dow hirsirde faa ngaɗaa sadaka, nden miccitiɗaa wakkati mum da ko mettal ɓerne no hakkune maa, aan he bannda :
40005024	Too ! Accu sadaka maa toon, njahaa njaafodiron ginan, nden ngartaa ngaɗaa sadaka maa.
40005025	Nde goɗɗo felii ma, wakkati njaadoton to sariya, yawɗa tefaa potal hakkune maa, aan e joomum, fadde mooɗon yottaade ngam to o watte nder juuɗe hiitotooɓe. Nden kamɓe duu, ɓe ngatte nder juuɗe doomoowo kasu, uddeɗaa.
40005026	Goonga kaalananmaami, a wurtataako abada nde a yoɓaay ko tokketeɗaa ɗum faa laaɓa.
40005027	—On nani wi'anooma : To yeenu !
40005028	Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on : Ƴeewuɗo debbo janaano faa suunaa mo, joomum yeenii mo nder ɓerne mum.
40005029	Ndenne, nde hitere maa nyaamo no waɗa ngaɗaa hakke, ittu nde, paɗɗaa nde to woɗɗi ! Ceedaa he mayre no ɓuri moƴƴande ma dina ɓanndu maa fuu faɗɗee nder jahannama.
40005030	Nde junngo maa nyaamo no waɗa ngaɗaa hakke, taƴu ngo, paɗɗaa ngo to woɗɗi ! Ceedaa he maggo no ɓuri moƴƴande ma dina ɓanndu maa fuu naata jahannama.
40005031	—Wi'anooma kaden : Ceerɗo deekum fuu, hokka mo talkuru ceergal.
40005032	Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on : Neɗɗo fuu ceerɗo deekum ko hanaa ngam jeenu, joomum waɗii mo jeenoowo. Neɗɗo fuu ɓaŋuɗo debbo ceeraaɗo, kam duu yeeni.
40005033	—On nanii kaden, maamiraaɓe meeɗen mbi'anooma : Taa ummin hunayeere maa, amma sey nii kumnaa ko kunaniɗaa ɗum yeeso Joomiraawo.
40005034	Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on : Taa huna baa. Taa hunoraa kammu, ngam ngu jooɗorgal Alla.
40005035	Taa hunoraa leydi, ngam ndi yaaɓirde koyɗe makko, naa Ursaliima, ngam ngo huɓeere Laamiiɗo mawɗo.
40005036	Taa hunoraa hoore maa, ngam a waawaa rawninde naa ɓawlinde baa leeɓol mayre gootol.
40005037	Nde nii a jaɓi, mbi'aa tan a jaɓi, nde nii a jaɓaay duu, mbi'aa tan a jaɓaay. Ko ƴaari ɗum, to bonɗo oon ƴuwi.
40005038	—On nanii wi'anooma : Hitere yomnitortee hitere, nyiire yomnitortee nyiire.
40005039	Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on : To njomnitee gaɗuɗo on ko boni. Nde goɗɗo feenyii ma dow nyaamo, linnyu mo gooto duu.
40005040	Nde goɗɗo noddi ma kiite ngam teeta toggoore maa, accu o yaada he jabbaare maa duu.
40005041	Nde goɗɗo tilsinii ma ronndaade donngal yaadu kilo go'o, ronndaa ngal yahde kilooji ɗiɗi.
40005042	Nde goɗɗo ƴamii ma, hokku ɗum. Nde goɗɗo wi'ii ma mbuƴoɗaa ɗum, to sala.
40005043	—On nanii wi'anooma : Ngiɗaa gondo maa, mbanyaa ganyo maa.
40005044	Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on : Ngiɗee wayɓe mon, ndu'anoɗon torrooɓe on,
40005045	ngam laatoɗon ɓiɓɓe Baabii'on gonɗo dow. Ngam no o fuɗinirta naange makko dow bonɓe, hano non duu o fuɗinirta nge dow moƴƴuɓe. No o tomnirta ndiyam dow dartiiɓe nii, non duu o tomnirta ɗam dow oonyiiɓe.
40005046	Nde hiɗuɓe on tan ngiɗɗon, baraaje ɗeye keɓoton ? Baa jaɓooɓe janngal non ngaɗata !
40005047	Nde banndiraaɓe mon tan njewtanton, ndenne ɗume senndi on he ɓeeto ? Baa ɓe anndaa Alla non ngaɗata !
40005048	Ngam majjum, laatee huuɓuɓe hano Baabii'on kuɓɗo gonɗo dow.
40006001	—Tinnee to ngaɗee golleeji lobbi ngam himɓe ngi'a on. Nde on ngaɗii ɗum, on keɓataa baraaje fuu to Baabii'on gonɗo dow.
40006002	Ndenne, nde aɗa sakkana talkaaɓe, taa huuɓu ngam himɓe ngi'e. Non munaafiki'en ngaɗata nder cuuɗi baajorɗi he dow laabi ngam himɓe mana ɗum'en. Goonga kaalananmi on, ɓe keɓidii baraaje maɓɓe fuu.
40006003	Amma aan kay, nde nii aɗa sakkana talkaaɓe, to nano maa faamu ko nyaamo maa waɗata.
40006004	Ko cakkataa fuu, sakku ɗum nder cuccukka. Baabiraawo maa gi'oowo ko suuɗi fuu yoɓete.
40006005	—Nde oɗon ndu'oo, to nyemminee munaafiki'en darotooɓe nder cuuɗi baajorɗi he dow pottirɗi laabi, no ndu'oo ngam himɓe fuu ngi'a ɓe. Goonga kaalananmi on, ɓe keɓidii baraaje maɓɓe fuu.
40006006	Amma aan kay, wakkati fuu mo ndu'otoɗaa, naatu nder suudu maa, ommba dammbugal ngaal, eelaa Baabiraawo maa gonduɗo he maa nder nokkuure suuɗiine. Nden, Baabiraawo maa gi'oowo ko suuɗi fuu, no yoɓete.
40006007	Nde oɗon ndu'oo, to njuunnee du'aa'uuji mon he haalaaji meereeji ɗi ngalaa fuu nafakka hano no ɓe anndaa Alla ndu'ortoo, miilooɓe kam'en no njaabantee nde nii ɓe ɗunni haalaaji maɓɓe.
40006008	To nyemminee ɓe, ngam Baabii'on no anndi ko kaajaɗon illa on eelaay mo.
40006009	Ndaa no ndu'ortoɗon nii : Baabiraawo amin gonɗo dow, innde maa seniine teddinee.
40006010	Laamu maa wara. Muuyɗe maa ngaɗee ɗo dow leydi hano no ɗe ngaɗiraa dow kammu nii.
40006011	Hoynan min hannden nyaamdu heƴunu ndu min kaajaa.
40006012	Yaafana min gacceeji amin hano no min njaafonortoo toonyiiɓe min nii.
40006013	Taa accu min cii'ee, amma hisin min bonɗo oon. [Ngam laamu, baawɗe he teddungal no ngonani ma faa abada abadin. Aamiin !]
40006014	Ndenne, nde nii on njaafake toonyiiɓe on, Baabii'on gonɗo dow duu no yaafoto on.
40006015	Amma nde nii on njaafataako toonyiiɓe on, Baabii'on duu yaafataako gacceeji mon.
40006016	—Nde nii oɗon cuumii, to njoofee ɓalli mooɗon, ɓalinoɗon hano munaafiki'en ɓalintooɓe ngam himɓe fuu anndita ko ɓe cuumiiɓe. Goonga kaalananmi on : Ɓe keɓidii baraaje maɓɓe fuu.
40006017	Amma aan kay, nde nii a suumake, lootu yeeso maa, mbujaa nebbam uurɗam,
40006018	to neɗɗo fuu faamu a cuumiiɗo. Baabiraawo maaɗa gonɗo nder to suuɗi oon tan anndata. Wooɗi duu, Baabiraawo maa gi'oowo ko ngaɗɗaa nder cuccukka oon, no yoɓete.
40006019	—To ndesanee ko'e mooɗon njawdi nder duuniyaaru nduu, to mooƴu he puunyol mbonninta, to wuyɓe kelata ommbooɗe, mbujja.
40006020	Ndesanee ko'e mooɗon njawdi dow kammu, to baafuy bonnataa, mooƴataa, fuunyataa, to wuyɓe duu kelataa ommbooɗe sako mbujja.
40006021	Ngam to njawdi maa woni, toon ɓerne maa duu wonata.
40006022	—Gite ngoni fitillaaji ɓanndu. Nde gite maa no mbooɗi, ɓanndu maa fuu no yaynan.
40006023	Amma nde nii ɗe mbooɗaa, ɓanndu maa fuu no niɓɓan. Ndenne, nde nii jeyngol tawaangol nder ɓanndu maa niɓɓi, sikka fuu walaa nimre ndeen no tekkiɗan !
40006024	—Neɗɗo fuu waawtaa gollande mawɓe ɗiɗo, ngam joomum wanyan gooto, hiɗaa ooto, naa teddina gooto, yawo ooto. On mbaawtaa gollande Alla ngollanon njawdi.
40006025	Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo wi'a on : To cuulee ko'e mooɗon nder mbuurnam mooɗon dow ko nyaamton, ko njarton naa ko ɓornotoɗon. Ngam mbuurnam no ɓuri nyaamdu, ɓanndu duu no ɓuri koltal, naa hanaa ?
40006026	Ndaaree pooli piirooji ɗii : Ɗi aawataa, ɗi kettataa, ɗi ndesataa, amma Baabii'on gonɗo dow nyamnata ɗi. Onon nee, on ɓuraa pooli ɗii teddungal naa ?
40006027	Moy he mooɗon waawi ɓeydude nyalooma gooto dow balɗe mum ngam hoore mum haɓɓake ?
40006028	Ɗume waɗi ko kolte no cuuli on ? Ndaaree no piindiiji ladde mawnirta : Ɗi ngollataa, ɗi mottataa.
40006029	Amma miɗo haalana on : Baa Suleymaanu he darjaaji mum fuu holtiraay ko foti gootel nder majji.
40006030	Nde nii Alla no holtina huɗo taweteeko nder ngesa hannden, taƴeteeko faɗɗee nder hiite jaaŋo, ɗume haɗata mo holtinde on faa ɓura nii, onon famɗuɓe goonɗinol ?
40006031	Ndenne, to ko'e mooɗon kaɓɓo faa mbi'on : « Ɗume nyaameten ? Ɗume njarten ? Ɗume ɓornotoɗen ? »
40006032	Ngam kujje ɗee fuu, ɓe anndaa Alla pilotoo ɗe. Nde goonga, Baabii'on gonɗo dow no anndi ko oɗon kaajaa ɗum, ɗum fuu.
40006033	Ndenne, tefee Laamu Alla he dartinaaku makko ginan, o ɓeydanan on kujje ɗee fuu.
40006034	Nyalaane fuu he donngal mum. To ko'e mooɗon kaɓɓo ngam jaaŋo, ngam jaaŋo duu no wardan he ko muuɗum.
40007001	—To kiitee himɓe, ngam to Alla hiito on.
40007002	Ngam no kiitortoɗon woɓɓe, non onon duu kiiterteɗon. Kaden duu etirgal ngal etirton, kanngal etiranteɗon.
40007003	Ko waɗi ko aɗa hi'a kuɗel nder hitere bannda, amma a hi'ataa bonjariyal gonngal nder nde maaɗa ?
40007004	Naa noy mbaawɗaa wi'ude bannda : « Accu mi ittane kuɗel gom nder hitere maa », amma aan kay, bonjariyal no nder nde maaɗa ?
40007005	Munaafiki, ittu bonjariyal tawaangal nder hitere maaɗa ginan heɓa ngi'iraa no wooɗiri, keɓaa no ittirɗaa kuɗel tawaangel nder hitere bannda ngeel.
40007006	To kokkee dawaaɗi ko senii, to paɗɗee kaaƴe mooɗon dime yeeso girooji, ngam to ɗi njaaɓu ɗe, dawaaɗi duu mbaylito ŋata on.
40007007	—Eelee, on keɓan. Tefee, on ngiitan. Calminee, on omtantee.
40007008	Ngam eeluɗo fuu heɓan. Tefuɗo fuu hiitan. Calminɗo fuu omtantee.
40007009	Moy nder mooɗon hokkata ɓiyum hayre nde eeli buuru ?
40007010	Naa hokka mo mboddi se o eeli linngu ?
40007011	No mbonirɗon nii fuu, oɗon kokka ɓiɓɓe mooɗon kujje lobbe, sako Baabii'on gonɗo dow. Omo hokka eeluɗo mo fuu ko moƴƴi.
40007012	Ndenne, ngaɗiranee himɓe no ngiɗɗon ɓe ngaɗana on. Ngam ɗum woni ko Tawreeta Muusa he dewte annabiiɓe mbi'i.
40007013	—Naatiree dammbugal paaɗungal ! Ngam dammbugal halkere no yaaji, laawol maggal no hoyi, tokkooɓe ngol duu no ɗuuɗi.
40007014	Amma dammbugal mbuurnam no faaɗi, laawol maggal no ɓillii, hiitooɓe ngol duu ɗuuɗaa.
40007015	—Tinnee he annabiiɓe fewreeɓe, warooɓe to mooɗon nder nanndi baali, amma nder guri maɓɓe ɓe cuuli dafaaɗi.
40007016	Har golleeji maɓɓe annditirton ɓe, hano no lekki annditirtee har ɓiɓɓe mum. Cabiije teɓataake he kebbe, ibbe duu teɓataake he tuppe.
40007017	Lekki lobbi, ɓiɓɓe lobbe rimata. Amma lekki mbonki, ɓiɓɓe bonɗe rimata.
40007018	Lekki lobbi waawtaa rimude ɓiɓɓe bonɗe. Wooɗi duu, lekki mbonki waawtaa rimude ɓiɓɓe lobbe.
40007019	Lekki fuu ki rimataa ɓiɓɓe lobbe soppetee, faɗɗee nder hiite.
40007020	Ndenne, har golleeji maɓɓe annditirton ɓe.
40007021	—Hanaa wi'ooɓe no mbi'itoo kam Joomiraawo mum'en fuu naatata nder Laamu Alla. Sey waɗooɓe muuyɗe Baaba am gonɗo dow, ɓeen ngoni naatooɓe nder maggu.
40007022	Nyannde darŋal, heewɓe mbi'an kam : « Joomiraawo ! Joomiraawo ! Hanaa he innde maa min mbaajori haala Alla ? Hanaa he innde maa min ndiiwiri ginnaaji ? Hanaa he innde maa min ngaɗiri kaayɗe ɗuɗɗe ? »
40007023	Wakkati mum mbi'anmi ɓe : « Mi anndaa on abada. Mboɗɗee kam, onon waɗooɓe ko boni ! »
40007024	—Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu kettiniiɗo haalaaji am, golliri ɗi, nanndan he jom hakkillo nyiɓuɗo suudu mum dow tepaare.
40007025	Ndiyam toɓi, gooruuji mbubbi, keni mawɗi mbifiri semmbe dow mayru. Ɗum fuu ndu saamaay, ngam ndu sinngaama dow tepaare.
40007026	Amma neɗɗo fuu kettiniiɗo haalaaji am ɗii, dey golliraay ɗi, no nanndi he bahiima, nyiɓuɗo suudu mum dow taasiri.
40007027	Ndiyam toɓi, gooruuji mbubbi, keni mawɗi mbifiri semmbe dow mayru. Ndu saami, ndu sankitii.
40007028	Wakkati Iisa timminoo waaju mum, ɗum haayɗini jama'aare ndeen sanne.
40007029	Ngam o waajoraaki ɓe hano no jannginooɓe Tawreeta mbaajorto, amma he baawɗe o waajorii ɓe.
40008001	Wakkati Iisa jippinoo waamnde ndeen, jama'aare ɗuunde gom tokki mo.
40008002	Sey gorko ceppinɗo gom ɓattii mo, hofi yeeso makko, wi'i mo : —Moodibbo, nde nii a jaɓi, aɗa waawi yamɗintinde kam.
40008003	Iisa foorti junngo mum, meemi mo, wi'i : —Mi jaɓi, yamɗitin ! Wakkati mum da, gorko oon yamɗiti.
40008004	Gaɗa mum, Iisa wi'i mo : —Tinna taa haalan ɗum neɗɗo fuu. Amma yah, holloy hoore maa cakkanoowo Alla mooɗon, ngaɗaa cakkol ngol Muusa tilsini waɗee, ngam hollude himɓe ko sikka fuu walaa a yamɗiti.
40008005	Wakkati Iisa naatannoo Kafarnahum, hooreejo soogeeji Rooma gom ɓattii mo, eeli mo, wi'i :
40008006	—Moodibbo, golloowo am no fukkii nder suudu, sellaa baa seɗɗa faa bonngake. Omo torroo sanne !
40008007	Iisa wi'i mo : —Mi waran, mi yamɗintina mo.
40008008	Amma hooreejo soogeeji oon jaabii, wi'i : —Moodibbo, miin, mi fotaay to naataa ɓaade am. Haala maaɗa tan heƴi, golloowo am yamɗitaa.
40008009	Miin, miɗo woodi dawranooɓe kam, amma miɗo dawrana soogeeji Rooma duu. Nde nii mi tilsini gooto nder maɓɓe yaha, o yahan. Nde mi wi'i gooto nder maɓɓe wara, o waran. Nde nii mi wi'i maccuɗo am gom waɗa goɗɗum, o waɗan ɗum.
40008010	Wakkati Iisa nanunoo haala kaa, ɗum haayɗini mo, o wi'i tokkuɓe mo ɓeen : —Goonga kaalananmi on, baa nii hakkune himɓe Isra'el fuu, mi hi'aay ir goonɗinol ngool.
40008011	Miɗo haalana on, heewɓe ƴuwataana lettugal he gorgal, ngara njooɗodoo Ibrahim, Isiyaaku he Yakuuba, ɓe nyaamda nder Laamu Alla.
40008012	Amma haanunooɓe naata Laamu ɓeen, paɗɗetee nder nimre niɓɓude. Toon ɓe mboyata, iɓe ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe.
40008013	Gaɗa mum, Iisa wi'i hooreejo soogeeji oon : —Hootu. Ɗum laatane no ngoonɗinirɗaa. Wakkati mum da, golloowo hooreejo soogeeji Rooma oon yamɗiti.
40008014	Wakkati Iisa yehunoo wuro Piyer, tawi eso Piyer debbo no wondi wulowulo.
40008015	O meemi junngo makko, sey wulowulo makko heli, o yamɗiti. O ummii, o jaɓɓii Iisa.
40008016	Wakkati hiirunoo ndeen, Iisa waddanaa himɓe heewɓe ɓe ginnaaji ngoni dow mum'en. Haala makko tan o riiwri ginnaaji gonɗi dow maɓɓe ɗiin, o nyawti nyawɓe ɓeen fuu.
40008017	O waɗi kujje ɗee fuu ngam humnude ko annabi Esaaya haalunoo wakkati o wi'unoo : Kanko he hoore makko itti torraaji meeɗen, o ronndi nyawuuji meeɗen.
40008018	Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo jama'aare no fiilii ɗum, sey o wi'i aahiiɓe makko : —En njolu, ummowoɗen fonngo gooto.
40008019	Nden jannginoowo Tawreeta gom ɓadii mo, wi'i : —Moodibbo, mi tokkete to njahataa fuu.
40008020	Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Junkuuji no ngoodi gayɗe, pooli duu no ngoodi cuuɗi, amma Ɓii-Neɗɗo walaa baa nokku to fukkoo, fowtina hoore mum.
40008021	Nden aahiijo makko gom, wi'i mo : —Moodibbo, accu mi mooɓowa baaba am ginan.
40008022	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Tokkam, accu maayɓe mooɓa maayɓe mum'en.
40008023	Iisa naati nder laana, aahiiɓe makko tokki mo.
40008024	Say ƴuwonde ummii, henndu mawnu wifi sanne dow peta ngaan, faa benkeƴƴe no ummoo no naata nder laana kaan. Tawi Iisa no ɗaanii.
40008025	Aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓadii mo, pindini mo, iɓe mbi'a : —Moodibbo, dannu en ! En maayan !
40008026	Sey o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Ɗume hulƴinta on ? Onon famɗuɓe goonɗinol ! O ummii wakkati mum, o sappii henndu nduun he benkeƴƴe ɗeen. Ɗum fuu ɗum deƴƴiti, ɗum waɗi siw !
40008027	Ɗum haayɗini aahiiɓe ɓeen sanne, ɓe tokki iɓe mbi'odira : —Moy woni neɗɗo oo, mo baa keni e ndiyam no ɗowtanoo ɗum ?
40008028	Wakkati Iisa'en ummii, pedditi peta Galili, panndowi dow fonngo leydi Gadara, sey worɓe ɗiɗo ɓe ginnaaji ngonnoo dow mum'en mburtii nder annyeeje, potti he makko. Iɓe kulƴini sanne faa neɗɗo fuu suusaa tokkude laawol maɓɓe.
40008029	Ɓe tinni iɓe kuuɓa, iɓe mbi'a : —Ɓii-Alla, ɗume ngiɗaa waɗude min ? Naa a warii ngam torrude min fadde wakkati podaaɗo oon yottaade ?
40008030	Tawi sewre girooji mawne gom no toowti ɓe seɗɗa inde dura.
40008031	Ginnaaji ɗiin ŋaarii mo, mbi'i : —Nde riiwude min ngiɗaa, accu min naatowa nder sewre girooji ɗii.
40008032	Nden Iisa wi'i ɗi : —Naatowee ! Ginnaaji ɗiin mburtii, naatowi nder girooji ɗiin. Wakkati mum da, sewre ndeen fuu doggi no simmitoo waamnde ndeen, iɗi tallitoo, iɗi caamowa nder peta ngaan, iɗi njooloo.
40008033	Durooɓe ɓeen ndoggi kooti wuro, kaalowi ko hewti ɗum'en. Ɓe pilli habaru himɓe ɓe ginnaaji wonnoo dow mum'en ɓeen duu.
40008034	Himɓe wuro ngoon fuu mburtii, kawrowi to Iisa. Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo mo ndeen, ɓe ŋaarii mo o dilla nder leydi maɓɓe.
40009001	Iisa naati laana, fedditi peta ngaan, warti siire mum.
40009002	Himɓe gom ngaddani mo bonnguujo gom no fukkinaa dow kooƴirngal maayɓe. Wakkati o hi'unoo no goonɗinol maɓɓe foti, o wi'i bonnguujo oon : —Higo, fukkin ɓerne maa. Hakkeeji maa njaafaama.
40009003	Wakkati jannginooɓe Tawreeta gom nanunoo ɗum sey ɓe mbi'odiri hakkune maɓɓe : —Gorko oo no bonna innde Alla.
40009004	Amma Iisa faami miilooji maɓɓe, nden wi'i ɓe : —Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon miiloo miilooji bonɗi nder ɓerɗe mooɗon ?
40009005	Hakkune wi'ude « Hakkeeji makko njaafaama » naa « O ummoo, o yaha », ɗume ɓuri hoyde ?
40009006	Amma miɗo hiɗi paamon ko Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jogii baawɗe yaafaade hakkeeji himɓe nder duuniyaaru nduu. Sey o wi'i bonnguujo oon : —Umma, hooƴu kooƴirngal maayɓe ngal ngaddiraɗaa, hootu !
40009007	Gorko oon ummii, hooti.
40009008	Wakkati jama'aare ndeen hi'unoo ɗum, ɓe kuli, ɓe tinni iɓe njetta Alla ngam iri baawɗe ɗe o hokki ɓii-aadama.
40009009	Wakkati Iisa waɗannoo jahaangal mum, o hi'i gorko gom bi'eteeɗo Matta no jooɗii nder suudu janngal. Sey o wi'i mo : —Tokkam. Sey Matta ummii, tokki mo.
40009010	Gaɗa mum, nyannde gom Iisa no nyaama nder suudu Matta. Jaɓooɓe janngal gom he ɓooyɓe nder gaɗol hakke gom, kamɓe ɗuɓɓe ngari njooɗii no nyaamda he makko, kanko he aahiiɓe ɓeen.
40009011	Wakkati Fariisa'en ngi'unoo ɗum, mbi'i aahiiɓe makko : —Ɗume waɗi ko moodibbo mooɗon no nyaamda he jaɓooɓe janngal, he waɗooɓe hakke ɓee ?
40009012	Amma wakkati Iisa nanunoo ɗum, wi'i ɓe : —Nyawɗo haajaa cawroowo hanaa jamɗuɗo.
40009013	Njehee, njanngee ko Dewtere Alla wi'i : Yurmeene ngiɗumi, hanaa sadaka. Miin, mi waraay noddude miilooɓe kam'en no dartiiɓe, amma mi waraana ngam annduɓe kam'en no waɗooɓe hakke.
40009014	Gaɗa mum aahiiɓe Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma ngari to Iisa, ƴami mo mbi'i : —Ko waɗi minen he Fariisa'en miɗen cuumoo, amma aahiiɓe maaɗa kay cuumataako ?
40009015	Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Warɓe ɓanngal no mbaawi ɓalinaade wakkati ɓaŋuɗo oon no wondi he maɓɓe naa ? Amma nyalaaɗe ngaran ɗe ɓaŋuɗo oon suutetee hakkune maɓɓe. Nder balɗe ɗeen, ɓe cuumoto.
40009016	Neɗɗo fuu nyootataa lefol kesol he koltal kiinngal ngam lefol ngool serkan koltal kiinngal ngaal, cerkol ngool ɓeydoo.
40009017	Kaden duu cabiijam kesam loowataake nder sumalleeji kiɗɗi. Nde ɗum waɗi, sumalleeji ɗiin pusan, cabiijam ɗaam rufa, sumalleeji ɗiin mbona. Ndenne, cabiijam kesam nder sumalleeji kesi loowetee, faa ɗum fuu ɗum reenoo.
40009018	Wakkati Iisa haaldannoo he Fariisa'en, sey hooreejo waajordu gom nii yottii, hofi yeeso makko, wi'i mo : —Jooni ɓiyam debbo maayi, amma war, yowu junngo maaɗa dow makko, heɓa o ummitoo.
40009019	Iisa, he aahiiɓe muuɗum, ummii tokki mo.
40009020	Dow laawol maɓɓe, sey yeyraajo gom nii gaɗuɗo duuɓi sappo he ɗiɗi ƴiiƴam daranaaki mo. Omo miila nder ɓerne makko, ko nde nii o meemi jabbaare Iisa tan, o nyawtan. O ƴuwri Iisa har gaɗa, o meemi hunnduko jabbaare makko.
40009022	Iisa yeeƴitii, hi'i mo, wi'i : —Banndam debbo, fukkin hakkillo maaɗa, goonɗinol maa dannii ma. Wakkati mum da, debbo oon daɗi.
40009023	Wakkati Iisa yottinoo wuro hooreejo waajordu oon, o hi'i fuufooɓe seeseeji ciryake ngam mooɓoyde maayɗo oon, himɓe gom duu no har ɗo no mboya.
40009024	O wi'i ɓe : —Mburtee, suka oo maayaay. O ɗaanii tan. Sey himɓe ɓeen njali jaleeɗe yawaare.
40009025	Wakkati ɓe njaltintoo mo yaasin ndeen, o naati nder suudu nduun, o nanngi junngo suka oon, sey suka oon ummii.
40009026	Habaru oon sankitii nder leydi ndiin fuu.
40009027	Wakkati Iisa dillannoo toon, wumɓe ɗiɗo gom tokki mo, no kuuɓa no mbi'a : —Taan Daawda, yurma min !
40009028	Wakkati o naatunoo to o wernoo, wumɓe ɓeen ngari to makko. O ƴami ɓe, o wi'i : —On ngoonɗini ko miɗo waawi wallude on naa ? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Ayyo Moodibbo, min ngoonɗini.
40009029	Nden o meemi gite maɓɓe, o wi'i : —Ɗum laatanoo on, no ngoonɗinirɗon nii.
40009030	Ɓe mbumti wakkati mum, nden o fooɗi noppi maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe : —Tinnee, to kaalanee ɗum neɗɗo fuu.
40009031	Amma ɓe mburtii tan ɓe cankitowii habaru Iisa nder leydi ndiin fuu.
40009032	Wakkati wumtinaaɓe ɓeen ndillannoo, Iisa waddanaa gorko gom mo ginnaaru beebi.
40009033	O riiwi ginnaaru nduun, sey beebaaɗo oon fuɗɗi no haala. Ɗum haayɗini jama'aare ndeen fuu faa iɓe mbi'a : —Hano ɗum hi'aaka nder Isra'el abada !
40009034	Amma Fariisa'en ɓeen mbi'i ko hooreejo ginnaaji oon, kam hokki mo baawɗe riiwude ɗi.
40009035	Illa ɗon Iisa fuɗɗi no fiiloo nder ci'e he gure fuu, omo waajoo nder cuuɗi baajorɗi, omo filloo filla Habaru lobbo, filla Laamu Alla. Omo nyawta nyawuuji he laruuji ir iri fuu.
40009036	Wakkati o hi'unoo jama'aare wonnde gaɗa makko, o nani yurmeene maɓɓe, ngam ɓe tampi, ɓe cuulake sanne hano baali ɗi ngalaa duroowo.
40009037	Sey o wi'i aahiiɓe makko ɓeen : —Kettol no ɗuuɗi, hettooɓe ɗuuɗaa.
40009038	Ndenne, eelee Jom kettol lilda hettooɓe ngam kettol mum.
40010001	Iisa noddi aahiiɓe muuɗum sappo he ɗiɗo ɓeen, hokki ɓe baawɗe riiwude ginnaaji he nyawtude iri nyawuuji he laruuji fuu.
40010002	Ndaa inɗe lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen nii : Arano maɓɓe woni Simon inndirteeɗo Piyer he minyiiko Andiire, Yakuuba ɓii-Jebede he minyiiko Yahaaya,
40010003	Filipa, Bartolome, Tomas, Matta jaɓoowo janngal, Yakuuba ɓii-Alfee, Tadde,
40010004	Simon kiranoowo suudu baaba he Yahuuda Iskariyot mo yahde yeeso jammboytoo Iisa oon.
40010005	Iisa lili lilaaɓe mum sappo he ɗiɗo ɓeen, o wi'i ɓe : —To njehee to ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, kaden duu to naatee gure Samariya.
40010006	Amma njehee nder ɓaadeeji Isra'ilankooɓe laatiiɓe hano baali majjuɗi ɓeen.
40010007	To njehoton fuu, mbaajoɗon mbi'on : « Laamu Alla ɓadake ! »
40010008	Nyawton nyawɓe, ummintinon maayɓe, nyawton seppinɓe, ndiiwon ginnaaji. Forba keɓuɗon moƴƴere ndee, kokkitiron nde forba.
40010009	To njaaree kaŋŋe, cardi naa ceede gaɗa mooɗon.
40010010	To kooƴee basi ɗiɗi naa toggooje ɗiɗi. To kooƴee paɗe naa cabbi, ngam golloowo no haani nyaamdu.
40010011	Nder siire fuu naa nder wuro fuu ngo ngarɗon nder mum, tefee bernoowo lobbo, wooɗi njooɗoɗon to bernoowo mooɗon faa nyannde ndilloton.
40010012	Nde oɗon naata nder ɓaade, ndu'oɗon Alla hokka nde jam.
40010013	Nde nii ɓaade lobbere non, barke du'aa'u mooɗon tabbitan he mayre. Amma nde nii nde lobbiɗaa, nde heɓataa barke du'aa'u mooɗon.
40010014	Wuro fuu ngo jaɓɓaaki on, naa ngo himɓe mum calii jaɓude haala mooɗon, piɗɗee sollaare koyɗe mooɗon nde nii on mburtake ngo.
40010015	Goonga kaalananmi on : Nyannde darŋal, kiite wuro ngoon no ɓuran ɗe kuɓeeje Sodooma e Gomoora naawde.
40010016	—Kettinee ! Mi lili on hano baali caka pobbi. Ndenne kakkilanee ko'e mooɗon hano no bolle ngaɗata, laatoɗon jom'en jam hano buugaali.
40010017	Tinnoɗon he himɓe ɓeen, ngam ɓe ngattan on nder kiite, ɓe ɓoccan on nder baajorɗi maɓɓe.
40010018	On njaaretee yeeso hooreeɓe he yeeso laamiiɓe ngam sabbu am, ngam ceedonoɗon kam yeeso maɓɓe, kamɓe he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe.
40010019	Wakkati ndarnaɗon nder hiitorde fuu, to ko'e mooɗon kaɓɓo dow ko kaaloton. Ngam on kokketee haalaaji ɗi kaanuɗon haalude wakkati mum.
40010020	Ruuhu Baabiraawo mooɗon, kam haalata nokku mooɗon.
40010021	Himɓe no kokkitiran sakiraaɓe mum'en mbaree, baaba no hokkitiran ɓiyum. Sukaaɓe no ummanto saarooɓe mum'en, gaɗa dabare ɓe mbaree.
40010022	Ngam am, himɓe fuu mbanyan on. Amma tarsiniiɗo faa yottii he timmoode, joomum no hisintee.
40010023	Nde nii on torraama nder wuro gom, pa'ee wonngo. Goonga kaalananmi on : On timmintaa gure Isra'el ɗeen fuu tawa Ɓii-Neɗɗo wartaay.
40010024	Walaa aahiijo ɓurɗo moodibbo mum, naa maccuɗo ɓurɗo joomum.
40010025	Aahiijo no waawi laatoo hano moodibbo mum, maccuɗo duu laatoo hano joomum. Miin he hoore am ɓe noddiri kam Be'eljebul, mawɗo ginnaaji, sako faa onon banndiraaɓe am.
40010026	—Ndenne, to kulee himɓe. Walaa fuu ko suuɗi ko wanngintaake, walaa sirri ndi anndataake.
40010027	Ko kaalanmi on nder nimre, kaalee ɗum nder jeyngol. Ko nyo'anmi on fuu, kaalee ɗum yaasin nder daane toowne.
40010028	To kulee warooɓe ɓanndu, ɓe mbaawanaa yonkiiji fuy. Alla kaanɗon hulude. Kanko woni baawɗo halkude ɓanndu he yonki fuu nder jahannama.
40010029	Pooloy ɗiɗoy no connee tammal gootal. Amma baa gootel nder makkoy saamataa he leydi tawa hanaa nder muuyɗe Baabiraawo mooɗon.
40010030	Onon, baa leeɓi ko'e mooɗon fuu no limaaɗi faa laaɓi.
40010031	Ndenne, to kulee, ngam oɗon ɓuri pooloy ɗukkoy koy teddungal.
40010032	Neɗɗo fuu bi'uɗo no anndi kam yeeso himɓe, miin duu, mi annditan ɗum yeeso Baaba am gonɗo dow.
40010033	Amma caliiɗo kam yeeso himɓe fuu, miin duu, mi salanto ɗum yeeso Baaba am gonɗo dow.
40010034	—To miilee ko mi wari ngam waddude jam nder duuniyaaru nduu. Mi waraay ngam waddude jam, amma konu ngarmi waddude.
40010035	Mi wari ngam mi sennda ɓiɗɗo gorko he bammum, ɓiɗɗo debbo he inna mum, ɓaŋaaɗo he esum debbo.
40010036	Koreeji neɗɗo laatoo wayɓe mum.
40010037	Korsinɗo innum naa bammum faa ɓuri kam fuu, fotaay laatoo aahiijo am. Korsinɗo ɓiyum gorko naa debbo faa ɓuri kam fuu, fotaay laatoo aahiijo am.
40010038	Mo wakkaaki leggal mum bardugal, tokki kam fuu, joomum fotaay laatoo aahiijo am.
40010039	Tefuɗo hisinde yonki mum fuu, mursan ki. Amma mursuɗo ki ngam am fuu, heɓitan ki.
40010040	—Jaɓɓiiɗo on fuu, jaɓɓake kam. Jaɓɓiiɗo kam fuu jaɓɓake lilɗo kam oon.
40010041	Jaɓɓiiɗo annabiijo ngam o annabiijo Alla, heɓan ir baraaje ɗe annabiijo oon fodanaa ɗeen. Jaɓɓiiɗo neɗɗo dartiiɗo ngam dartinaaku mum, heɓan ir baraaje ɗe dartiiɗo oon fodanaa ɗeen.
40010042	Goonga kaalananmi on : Neɗɗo fuu kokkuɗo ɓurɗo famɗude nder aahiiɓe am, baa nii laatoo nyeɗerde ndiyam peewɗam non ngam o aahiijo am, joomum heppataa baraaje muuɗum.
40011001	Wakkati Iisa haalidinnoo ko hiɗi he aahiiɓe mum sappo he ɗiɗo ɓeen, sey o ummii o fiilowi nder gure takkol ɗon. Omo janngina himɓe, omo waajoo ɓe.
40011002	Wakkati mum tawi Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma no nder kasu. Sey o nani ko Almasiihu gollata, nden o lili aahiiɓe makko he Iisa.
40011003	Ɓe ngari, ɓe ƴami Iisa, ɓe mbi'i : —Aan woni Almasiihu bi'aaɗo waran oon, naa min ndooma goɗɗo ?
40011004	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Njehee, kaalanowee Yahaaya ko nanuɗon he ko ngi'uɗon fuu :
40011005	Wumɓe no mbumtaa, laƴooɓe no njaha faa wooɗa, seppinɓe no nyawtee, pahuɓe no pahitee, maayɓe no ummintinee, talkaaɓe duu no pillanee Habaru lobbo.
40011006	Barkinaaɗo woni mo salaaki goonɗinde kam.
40011007	Wakkati aahiiɓe Yahaaya ɓeen ndillunoo, Iisa fuɗɗi fillanaade jama'aare ndeen filla Yahaaya, o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i : —Ko njaanoɗon nder ladde yeeruure, ɗume ndaaroyɗon ? Huɗo ko henndu wifata ndaaroyɗon ?
40011008	Naa ɗume njaaɗon daaroyde ? Oɗon miila ngi'on gorko ɓorniiɗo koltal nyaaƴo naa ? Ɓornotooɗo koltal nyaaƴo nder ɓaade laamiiɗo tawetee.
40011009	Ndenne, ɗume ndaaroyɗon ? Naa annabiijo njaaɗon daaroyde ? Too, miɗo haalana on, Yahaaya no ɓuri annabiijo.
40011010	Kanko woni mo haala Alla wi'i dow mum har hunnduko annabiijo gom : Ndaa, mi ardinan lilaaɗo am moƴƴinane laawol maaɗa.
40011011	Goonga kaalananmi on : Dimaaɗo waɗaay nder duuniyaaru nduu ɓurɗo Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma. Amma fuu nii, ɓurɗo famɗude nder Laamu Alla no ɓuri mo teddude.
40011012	Illa jamaanu Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma warde hannden, himɓe no kaɓa, no nyaamodira dow Laamu Alla sanne. Jom'en semmbe duu no tefa teeta ngu.
40011013	Tawreeta Muusa he dewte annabiiɓe fuu kaali dow Laamu nguun fadde jamaanu Yahaaya warde.
40011014	Nde nii on njaɓiino haala maɓɓe, Yahaaya woni Eliya, mo garol muuɗum hollaa.
40011015	Jom nowru fuu nana.
40011016	Amma he ɗume mbaawmi nanndinde himɓe jamaanu hannden oo ? Iɓe nanndi he sukaaɓe jooɗiiɓe nder luuɓe, no nodda higiraaɓe mum'en, no mbi'a :
40011017	« Min puufanii on seeseeji, amma on mbomaay ! Min njimanii on jimi jurminiiɗi, amma on mboyaay ! »
40011018	Ngam wakkati Yahaaya warnoo, omo suumoo, o yarataa cabiijam, amma wi'aama o laddaaɗo.
40011019	Ɓii-Neɗɗo duu wari, no nyaama, no yara, amma wi'aama : « Ndaaree neɗɗo oo, nyaamɗe he jarɗe tan adi hakkillo makko, o higo jaɓooɓe janngal he waɗooɓe hakke ! » Dey goonɗinɓe anndal Alla no kolla nder mbuurnam mum'en ko laawol Alla no goonga.
40011020	Nden Iisa fuɗɗi felude himɓe gure ɗe o ɓuri waɗude kaayɗe nder mum, ngam wonɓe nder majje tuubaay.
40011021	Omo wi'a : —Bone saaman dow maa, aan Korasin ! Bone saaman dow maa, aan Baytisayda ! Ngam nde nii kaayɗe gaɗanooɗe nder mooɗon ɗeen, ngaɗanooma nder Tirus he nder Sidon, tawan wonɓe nder majje tuubinoo ila. Ɓe ɓoornakeno saakuuji, ɓe mbujakeno ndooni, ngam hollude ko ɓe tuubii.
40011022	Ngam majjum, miɗo wi'a on : Nyannde darŋal, kiite mooɗon no ɓuran ɗe Tirus he Sidon naawde.
40011023	Aan duu Kafarnahum, aɗa miila a townetee faa dow naa ? Too, a leynetee faa laahara. Ngam nde nii kaayɗe gaɗanooɗe nder maaɗa ɗeen, ngaɗanooma nder Sodooma, nden wuro ngoon no heddotonoo faa joonin.
40011024	Ngam majjum, miɗo wi'a on : Nyannde darŋal, kiite mooɗon no ɓuran ɗe Sodooma naawde.
40011025	Nder wakkati mum non Iisa haali, wi'i : —Mi yettii ma, Baabiraawo jom dow he ley, ngam a suuɗanii jom'en hakkillo he anndal kujje ɗee fuu amma a wannginanii ɗe sukaaɓe famarɓe.
40011026	Noon non jaati Baaba, ngam kanƴum welii ma.
40011027	Baaba am watti huune fuu nder juuɗe am. Walaa annduɗo Ɓiɗɗo oon nde hanaa Baabiraawo oon. Walaa annduɗo Baabiraawo oon duu nde hanaa Ɓiɗɗo oon, he mo Ɓiɗɗo oon muuyi wannginande Baaba oon.
40011028	Onon tampuɓe, ronndiiɓe donle tedduɗe, on fuu ngaree to am, mi fowtinan on.
40011029	Ɗowtanee kam baa ko ɗum hoyaa, accon mi janngina on. Ngam mi leesiniiɗo hoore, ɓerne am duu no feewi, yonkiiji mooɗon keɓan powtiri.
40011030	Ngam ɗowtanaaki am nannduki ko satti no hoyi, donngal am duu no huyfi.
40012001	Balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa majjum, Iisa he aahiiɓe muuɗum no peddita gese alkamaaje. Nyannde mum ɗum fototiri he nyalaane fowteteene, aahiiɓe ɓeen ndafaa, iɓe mborsoo camme alkama, iɓe ƴakka.
40012002	Wakkati Fariisa'en ngi'unoo ɗum ndeen, ɓe mbi'i Iisa : —A hi'i aahiiɓe maaɗa no ngaɗa ko haɗaa nder nyalaane fowteteene !
40012003	Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —On njanngaay ko Daawda waɗunoo wakkati kanko he yaadiraaɓe makko fuu ndafanoo ?
40012004	O naatidi he maɓɓe nder suudu Alla. Ɓe nyaami buuru ittanaaɗo Alla oon. Ɓe kaanaa nyaamude mo, cakkanooɓe Alla tan kaani nyaamude mo.
40012005	Naa duu, on njanngaay nder Tawreeta Muusa, ko baa nder nyalaane fowteteene cakkanooɓe Alla no ngolla nder Juulirde mawne ndeen ? Nyannde mum iɓe lutta he tilsinooje nyalaane ndeen, amma ɓe pelirtaake ɗum.
40012006	Miɗo wi'a on ko ɓuri Juulirde mawne ndeen no ɗo.
40012007	Nde nii on paaminoo ko haala Alla kaa fiirtata : Yurmeene ngiɗumi, hanaa sadaka, nden on ndekataano gacce dow mo gaccaaka.
40012008	Ngam Ɓii-Neɗɗo woni jom nyalaane fowteteene.
40012009	Iisa dilli toon, naatowi nder waajordu maɓɓe.
40012010	Gorko gom mo junngo mum waati no tawa toon. Wonɓe ɗon ɓeen no tefa ko pelirta Iisa, nden ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i : —Tawreeta hokki laawol neɗɗo nyawtee nder nyalaane fowteteene naa hokkaay ?
40012011	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Alal misaali, oɗon ngoodi mbaalu mon ngootu, dey ngu saama nder luggere nder nyalaane fowteteene, ndenne on mburtinoyta ngu naa ?
40012012	Oɗon anndi sanne ko neɗɗo no ɓuri mbaalu teddungal ! Ndenne, no dagii neɗɗo waɗanee ko wooɗi nder nyalaane fowteteene.
40012013	Nden o wi'i gorko oon : —Foortu junngo maa ! Oon foorti ngo, ngo yamɗiti, ngo warti hano ngooto.
40012014	Sey Fariisa'en mburtii, kawrowi ngam caawodira dow no ɓe mbardata Iisa.
40012015	Wakkati Iisa heɓunoo habaru majjum, o dilli toon, jama'aare mawne tokki mo. O nyawti nyawɓe ɓeen fuu,
40012016	o wi'i ɓe to ɓe kaalan neɗɗo fuu moy o woni.
40012017	Ɗum duu ngam humnude ko annabi Esaaya haalunoo wakkati o wi'i :
40012018	Ndaa golloowo am mo cuɓiimi. Omo horsi he am, omo welna ɓerne am. Mi jippinan Ruuhu am dow makko, o yottinan laawol dartinaaku to lenyol fuu.
40012019	O yeddodirtaa he neɗɗo fuu, o olkataa. Daane makko nanataake dow laabi.
40012020	O jokkititta ƴommbal kelngal, o nyifataa fitilla ka jeyngol muuɗum famɗi sey nii nyannde o waɗi dartinaaku jaali.
40012021	Lenyol fuu dekan gokka mum dow makko.
40012022	Wakkati gorko gom, mo ginnaaru wumni, beebi, waddaa to makko, Iisa nyawti mo. Gorko oon no hi'a, no haala.
40012023	Ɗum haayɗini himɓe ɓeen fuu, nden ɓe tinni iɓe mbi'a : —Gorko oo, sikka fuu walaa o taanu Daawda.
40012024	Amma wakkati Fariisa'en nanunoo ɗum ndeen, ɓe mbi'i : —Baawɗe Be'eljebul hooreejo ginnaaji, o riiwrata ɗi.
40012025	Ngam Iisa no anndi miilooji maɓɓe, waɗi o wi'i ɓe : —Laamu fuu feccii ɗiɗi, no ɓoorodira ɓooyataa. Wuro fuu fecciingo naa ɓaade fuu fecciine pecce ɗiɗi, himɓe mum potataa, ɓe cankititto.
40012026	Nde nii Ibiliisa riiwi ginnaaji muuɗum, feccii hoore mum. Ndenne, noy laamu mum darortoo ?
40012027	Nde tawi Be'eljebul ndiiwiranmi ginnaaji, aahiiɓe mooɗon, ɗume ndiiwirta ɗi ? Ndenne, golleeji maɓɓe he hoore mum kollata ko on ngalaa goonga !
40012028	Amma nde nii Ruuhu Alla ndiiwiranmi ginnaaji, iɗum holla ko Laamu Alla wari to mooɗon.
40012029	Neɗɗo fuu waawaa naati wuro jom semmbe, teeta njawdi makko, nde nii hanaa no artu haɓɓi mo non ginan, nden hooƴa njawdi ndiin fuu.
40012030	Mo wondaa he am fuu no ganyo am. Mo wallataa kam mi hawra, joomum no cankitoowo.
40012031	Ngam majjum, miɗo wi'a on : Hakkeeji himɓe he haalaaji mum'en bonɗi fuu no mbaawi yaafeede. Amma bonnuɗo innde Ruuhu Ceniiɗo fuu yaafataake.
40012032	Neɗɗo fuu kaaluɗo ko boni dow Ɓii-Neɗɗo, joomum no waawi yaafeede. Amma neɗɗo fuu kaaluɗo ko boni dow Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, yaafataake hannden, yaafataake duu nder wakkati garoowo.
40012033	—Nde nii lekki no wooɗi, ɓiɓɓe muuɗum mbooɗan. Nde lekki wooɗaa, ɓiɓɓe muuɗum mbooɗataa. Ngam lekki ɓiɓɓe mum annditirtee.
40012034	Ɓiɓɓe bolle ! Noy mbaawirton haalude ko wooɗi tawee on bonɓe ? Ngam ko heewi nder ɓerne, hunnduko wurtinta.
40012035	Neɗɗo moƴƴuɗo, ko moƴƴi ko resi nder ɓerne mum, kam hunnduko mum wurtinta. Neɗɗo bonɗo duu, ko boni ko resi nder ɓerne mum, kam hunnduko mum wurtinta.
40012036	Miɗo wi'a on : Nyannde darŋal, neɗɗo fuu jaaboto ngam haalaaji muuɗum meereeji.
40012037	Ngam neɗɗo fuu haalaaji muuɗum hiitortee. Ndenne, kanƴi ngatta neɗɗo dartiiɗo naa jukketeeɗo.
40012038	Nyannde gom, jannginooɓe Tawreeta he Fariisa'en gom mbi'i Iisa : —Moodibbo, miɗen ngiɗi kollaa min alaama ko Alla lili ma.
40012039	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Onon himɓe jamaanu bonɗo, mo hulataa Alla. Oɗon ngiɗi holleede alaama. Amma alaama fuu non on kollataake ko ƴaari alaama annabi Yunuusa.
40012040	Ngam no Yunuusa waɗiri balɗe tati jemma he nyalooma nder reedu linngu manngu nguun, hano non Ɓii-Neɗɗo duu waɗirta balɗe tati jemma he nyalooma nder leydi.
40012041	Nyannde darŋal, himɓe Niniwe ummodoto he himɓe jamaanu hannden. Ɓe kiitodoo he maɓɓe, ɓe liɓa ɓe, ngam kamɓe, ɓe tuubii wakkati ɓe nanunoo waaju Yunuusa. Haya, ɓurɗo Yunuusa nii ɗo !
40012042	Nyannde darŋal, debbo laamiiɗo leydi hoore huɗo gom ummodoto he himɓe jamaanu hannden oo. O hiitodo he maɓɓe, o liɓa ɓe. Debbo oo ƴuwi faa to woɗɗi, wari ngam hettinaade haalaaji Suleymaanu keewɗi hikmaaku. Haya, ɓurɗo Suleymaanu nii ɗo !
40012043	—Nde nii ginnaaru wurtake neɗɗo, ndu yahan indu warta. Ndu tefan nokkuuje joorɗe to ndu fowtata, amma ndu heɓataa.
40012044	Nden ndu wi'a : « Ndaa, mi soƴƴoto wuro am to ƴuwnoomi. » Nde nii ndu wartii, ndu tawaa, nokkuure ndeen wuuwaama, moƴƴinaama.
40012045	Nden ndu yaha, ndu waddowa ginnaaji jeɗɗi ɓurɗi ndu bonde gom. Ɗi naata, ɗi koɗa nder wuro ngoon. Sakitoo mbuurnam neɗɗo mo ndu wurtinoo nder mum oon ɓura ɗam arannde ɗam bonde. Nii himɓe jamaanu bonɗo oo laatortoo.
40012046	Wakkati Iisa haaldannoo he jama'aare ndeen, sey inniiko he minyiraaɓe makko worɓe njottii, ɓe ndarii yaasin. Iɓe ngiɗi hi'ude mo.
40012047	Sey goɗɗo wi'i mo : —Ndaa, inna maa he rimdaaɓe maaɗa no ndarii yaasin, no ngiɗi ngi'e.
40012048	O jaabii neɗɗo oon, o wi'i mo : —Moy woni inna am ? Ɓeye ngoni rimdaaɓe am ?
40012049	O sappii aahiiɓe makko ɓeen, o wi'i : —Ndaaree inna am he rimdaaɓe am nii.
40012050	Gaɗoowo muuyɗe Baabiraawo am gonɗo dow, kam woni dimdaaɗo am, kam woni inna am.
40013001	Nyannde mum, Iisa no wonnoo nder suudu sey o wurtii, o jooɗowii daane peta Galili.
40013002	Jama'aare mawne gom wari, fiilii mo, ngam majjum o naatowi laana ndiyam o jooɗii. Himɓe ɓeen ndarii hunnduko maayo ngoon.
40013003	O haalani ɓe kujje keewɗe nder kippol haala. Omo wi'a : —Aawoowo gom dilli faa aawowa aawdiiri mum.
40013004	Nder aawre ndeen, gabbe gom caami sera laawol. Nden pooli ngari coppi ɗe.
40013005	Gere majje caami nder korkaaƴe to leydi ɗuuɗaa. Ɗe puɗilawi ngam luggiɗaa sanne.
40013006	Amma wakkati naange wulnoo ndeen, ɗe ɗayli, ɗe njoori ngam ɗe ngaɗaay ɗaɗi.
40013007	Gere majje caami to kebbe puɗata. Kebbe ɗeen mawni, nanngi ɗe.
40013008	Gere majje duu caami nder leydi lobbiri. Ɗe puɗi, ɗe ndimi : Wassaaŋo gom rimi camme hemre, wonngo lasooji tati, wonngo duu woronja.
40013009	Jom nowru fuu nana !
40013010	Sey aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓattii, ƴami mo, mbi'i : —Ɗume waɗi ko aɗa haalana ɓe kujje ɗee nder kippol haala ?
40013011	Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Onon, Alla hokkii on baawɗe anndude ko suuɗi dow habaru Laamu muuɗum. Amma kamɓe, ɓe kokkaaka ɗum.
40013012	Ngam jogiiɗo fuu, no ɓeydantee faa heewa. Amma mo walaa oon, baa seɗɗa mo jogii oon, no teetetee.
40013013	Ko waɗi miɗo haalana ɓe kujje ɗee nder kippol haala woni : Baa nde ɓe ndaari, ɓe ngi'ataa, baa nde ɓe kettinake, ɓe nanataa, ɓe paamataa.
40013014	Hakiika ko annabi Esaaya haalunoo dow maɓɓe ɗum tabbiti, wakkati wi'unoo ɓe : On nanan faa wooɗa, amma on paamataa. On ndaaran faa wooɗa, amma on ngi'ataa.
40013015	Ngam himɓe lenyol ngool no njoori ɓerɗe : Ɓe cukkii noppi maɓɓe, ɓe maɓɓii gite maɓɓe, ngam to gite maɓɓe ngi'u, to noppi maɓɓe nanu, to hakkillooji maɓɓe paamu, to ɓe tuubu sako mi danna ɓe.
40013016	Amma onon, on welɓe ko'e. Gite mooɗon ngi'an, noppi mooɗon duu nanan !
40013017	Goonga kaalananmi on, annabiiɓe heewɓe he dartiiɓe ɗuɓɓe muuyiino hi'ude ko ngi'oton ɗum, amma ɓe ngi'aay ɗum. Ɓe muuyiino hettinaade ko nanuɗon ɗum, amma ɓe nanaay ɗum.
40013018	Nden Iisa wi'i aahiiɓe mum : —Kettinee piirtol kippol haala dow aawoowo ngool nii.
40013019	Sera laawol to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala Laamu Alla, dey paamaay ka. Gaɗa mum bonɗo oon waran, ɗoofa ko aawaa nder ɓerne maɓɓe.
40013020	Korkaaƴe to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala kaan, njaɓɓorii ka welwelo wakkati mum da.
40013021	Amma ngam ka waɗaay ɗaɗi nder maɓɓe, ɓe nanngan ka wakkati seɗɗa tan. Nde nii ɓe ɓillake naa nde nii ɓe torraama ngam makka, ɓe mboppan ka wakkati mum da.
40013022	To kebbe puɗidi aawdiiri ndiin woni nanuɓe haala kaan, amma sakkulla duuniyaaru he suuno njawdi kuman ka nder maɓɓe, ka laatoo ndimara.
40013023	Leydi lobbiri to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala kaan, paamii ka faa ɓe ngaɗi barke : Woɓɓe kile hemre, woɓɓe kile lasooji tati, woɓɓe duu kile woronja.
40013024	Iisa waɗani ɓe kippol haala gom, wi'i ɓe : —Ndaa no Laamu Alla nanndi nii : Gorko gom wicci aawdiiri alkama lobbiri nder ngesa muuɗum.
40013025	Amma wakkati himɓe fuu ɗaaninoo ndeen, ganyo makko gom wari, wicci huɗo bonko nder magga, dilli.
40013026	Wakkati aawdiiri ndiin fuɗunoo ndeen faa ndi fii camme, huɗo bonko koon wanngi.
40013027	Maccuɓe jom ngesa oon mbi'owi mo : « Alla sabbinane, hanaa aawdiiri lobbiri aawuɗaa naa ? Ndenne toy huɗo bonko koo ƴuwi ? »
40013028	O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : « Ganyo gom waɗi ɗum. » Nden maccuɓe ɓeen ƴami mo, mbi'i : « Aɗa hiɗi min ɗoofowa ko naa ? »
40013029	Amma o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : « Aa'a, ngam nde nii oɗon ɗoofa ko, on ɗoofidan ko he alkama oon.
40013030	Accidee ko he alkama oon faa kettol. Nden, mi wi'an hettooɓe ɓeen ɗoofa ko ginan, ɓe kaɓɓa ko kaɓɓe kaɓɓe faa ko wulee, nden ɓe ketta alkama oon, ɓe kawra mo nder ƴeelu am. »
40013031	Iisa waɗani ɓe kippol haala gom, wi'i ɓe : —Laamu Alla no nanndi he wabbere mutaari nde neɗɗo hooƴi, aawi nder ngesa muuɗum.
40013032	Wabbere ndeen woni ɓurde gabbe fuu famɗude, amma nde nii nde fuɗi, nde ɓuran leɗɗe koogol ngool fuu. Nde laatoto lekki mawki faa pooli ngara nyiɓa cuuɗi mum'en dow licce makki.
40013033	Iisa waɗani ɓe kippol haala gom kaden, wi'i ɓe : —Laamu Alla no nanndi he ƴuufinirɗum ko debbo budi nder muddiiji conndi alkama tati mawɗi faa ɗum fuu ɗum ƴuufi.
40013034	Iisa haalani ɓe kujje ɗee fuu nder kippol haala. Walaa fuu ko o haalani ɓe ko hanaa nder kippol haala o haali ɗum.
40013035	O waɗiri non duu ngam tabbintinde haala kaa annabiijo gom haalunoo wakkati wi'unoo : Mi haaldan he himɓe nder kippol haala, mi haalanan ɓe kujje cuuɗaaɗe fadde duuniyaaru tageede.
40013036	Iisa ummii, acci himɓe ɓeen, naatowi nder suudu. Aahiiɓe makko ɓattii mo, mbi'i mo : —Fiirtan min kippol haala ngool.
40013037	Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Aawɗo aawdiiri lobbiri ndiin, oon woni Ɓii-Neɗɗo.
40013038	Ngesa ngaan duu woni duuniyaaru. Aawdiiri lobbiri ndiin woni ɓiɓɓe Laamu Alla. Huɗo bonko koon woni ɓiɓɓe bonɗo oon.
40013039	Ganyo jom ngesa oon woni Ibiliisa. Kettol ngool woni timmoode duuniyaaru, hettooɓe ɓeen ngoni maleykaaɓe.
40013040	Hano no huɗo koon ittirtee, faɗɗee nder hiite nii, hano non timmoode duuniyaaru duu laatortoo.
40013041	Ɓii-Neɗɗo lilan maleykaaɓe muuɗum, kawra itta nder laamu mum waɗooɓe woɓɓe ngaɗa hakke ɓeen, he waɗooɓe ko boni fuu.
40013042	Ɓe paɗɗee nder kaatane hiite nge nyifataa. Toon ɓe mbuletee, iɓe ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe.
40013043	Amma wakkati mum, dartiiɓe ɓeen no ƴelkiɗan hano naange nder Laamu Baabiraawo mum'en. Jom nowru fuu, nana !
40013044	Iisa waɗi kippol haala gom wi'i kaden : —Laamu Alla no nanndi he njawdi cuuɗiini nder ngesa. Gorko gom hiiti ndi, suuɗitini, suuɗi kam duu. Nder welwelo makko, o yehi, o sottowi ko o joginoo fuu, nden o soodi ngesa ngaan.
40013045	Laamu Alla no nanndi kaden he luumotooɗo tefoowo kaaƴe dime.
40013046	Nde joomum hi'i hayre rimre soodeteene law, joomum no yahan sonnowa ko jogii fuu nden sooda nde.
40013047	Iisa waɗi kippol haala gom kaden wi'i : —Laamu Alla no nanndi he taaruwol paɗɗaangol nder maayo, dey nanngi iri liƴƴi fuu.
40013048	Wakkati taaruwol ngool heewunoo, nanngooɓe liƴƴi ɓeen pooɗi ngol faa he hunnduko ndiyam. Ɓe njooɗii, iɓe cennda liƴƴi ɗiin. Liƴƴi lobbi ɗiin no ngattee nder kandeeje, bonɗi ɗiin duu no paɗɗee.
40013049	Hano non timmoode duuniyaaru ndu laatortoo. Maleykaaɓe ngaran cennda bonɓe he dartiiɓe.
40013050	Ɓe paɗɗan bonɓe ɓeen nder hiite jahannama, toon ɓe mbuletee, iɓe ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe.
40013051	Iisa ƴami ɓe, wi'i : —On paamii maana ɗum fuu naa ? Nden ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Ayyo, min paamii.
40013052	Sey, o wi'i ɓe : —Jannginoowo Tawreeta fuu laatiiɗo aahiijo nder Laamu Alla, no nanndi he jom ɓaade keɓoowo nafakka nder kujje kese he kujje kiɗɗe.
40013053	Wakkati Iisa hanti kippi haala mum, ummii,
40013054	hooti nder Nasaratu, wuro ngo o mawnunoo nder mum. Omo waajoo nder waajordu maɓɓe. Ɗum haayɗini hettinaniiɓe mo ɓeen sanne, ɓe tinni iɓe mbi'a : —Toy o heɓi anndal ngal ? Noy o heɓiri baawɗe waɗude kaayɗe ɗee ?
40013055	Hanaa ya kanko woni ɓii sekkeejo oon ? Hanaa Mariyaama woni inniiko ? Hanaa kanko woni mawnu Yakuuba, Yusufu, Simon he Yahuuda'en ?
40013056	Hanaa enen he minyiraaɓe makko rewɓe ngondi ? Ndenne, moy hokki mo anndal ngaal he baawɗe ɗee fuu ?
40013057	Ngam majjum waɗi ɓe calii mo. Amma Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Annabiijo no teddinee nder nokkuuje fuu, dey hanaa nder wuro muuɗum he ɓaade muuɗum.
40013058	Iisa waɗaay toon kaayɗe ɗuɗɗe ngam ɓe ngoonɗinaay mo.
40014001	Wakkati Hirudus, laamiiɗo leydi Galili, nanunoo filla Iisa no waɗee.
40014002	Sey o wi'i gollooɓe makko : —Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma ! Maayɗo oon, kam ummitii. Ngam majjum waɗi, omo jogii baawɗe waɗude kaayɗe.
40014003	Hirudus haɓɓani Hirudiya dee-mawnum Filipa. Sey Yahaaya duu wi'i ɗum daganaaki mo. Ngam majjum Hirudus duu tilsini Yahaaya nanngee, haɓɓee, uddee nder kasu.
40014005	Hirudus no hiɗi wara Yahaaya amma suusaa, ngam himɓe fuu no mbi'a o annabiijo.
40014006	Ko wakkati nyalaane miccintinoore dimeeki Hirudus yottinoo, ɓii-Hirudiya debbo womi yeeso noddaaɓe-ngari to juulɗe ɗeen. Hirudus nani belɗum majjum sanne,
40014007	faa hunii no hokkan mo huune fuu ko o eeli ɗum.
40014008	Surbaajo oon tokki haala innum, wi'i Hirudus : —Waddanam jooni jooni hoore Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma nder le'al !
40014009	Ɗum naawi ɓerne Hirudus, amma ko heƴi o huni ɗum yeeso noddaaɓe ɓeen, tilay makko o hokka laawol surbaajo oon hokkee ko ŋaarii ɗum.
40014010	O lili goɗɗo yaha nder kasu oon, taƴowa hoore Yahaaya.
40014011	Hoore ndeen taƴaa, tummbaa nder le'al, nde hokkaa suka debbo oon. Kam duu hokkowi nde innum.
40014012	Aahiiɓe Yahaaya ɓeen ngari kooƴi ɓanndu makko, mooɓowi. Nden ɓe njehi, ɓe kaalanowi Iisa ko waɗi.
40014013	Wakkati Iisa nanunoo habaru maayde Yahaaya ndeen, o ummii kanko tan o dilli, o naatowi nder laana ndiyam, o fa'i nokkuure yeewne gom. Wakkati himɓe nanunoo ɗum ndeen, mburtii nder gure takkiiɗe daane peta ngaan, tokki mo.
40014014	Wakkati o wurtinoo nder laana kaan, o hi'i jama'aare mawne no hawri. Ɓe njurminii mo sanne. O nyawti nyawɓe wonɓe nder maɓɓe fuu.
40014015	Wakkati hiirunoo ndeen, aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓattii Iisa, mbi'i mo : —Joonin kay futuro waɗi, nokkuure ndee duu no ladde. Accu jama'aare ndeen yaha, naatowa nder gure ngam coodowa ko nyaamata.
40014016	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Fotaay ɓe njaha nder gure. Onon he ko'e mooɗon, kokkee ɓe ko ɓe nyaamata.
40014017	Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Buuruuje joy he liƴƴi ɗiɗi tan min njogii.
40014018	O wi'i ɓe : —Ngaddanee kam ɗum ɗo.
40014019	O wi'i himɓe ɓeen njooɗoo dow huɗo koon. O hooƴi buuruuje joy ɗeen he liƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗiin, o tiggitii, o yetti Alla. O helti buuruuje ɗeen, o hokki aahiiɓe ɓeen kokka jama'aare ndeen.
40014020	Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami faa ɓe kaari. Aahiiɓe ɓeen kawri kelte koddiiɗe ɗeen. Ɗum hebbini kandeeje sappo he ɗiɗi.
40014021	Nyaamuɓe ɓeen no ngaɗa hano worɓe ujunaaji joy mbaka rewɓe he sukaaɓe ɓeen ngalaa.
40014022	Wakkati mum da, o hokki laawol aahiiɓe ɓeen naata nder laana kaan, ardoo, peddita peta ngaan, fadde makko waynaade jama'aare ndeen.
40014023	Gaɗa waynitaaki jama'aare ndeen, o ƴeenyowi dow waamnde ngam du'aade kanko tan. Naange yani, tawi mo dow mayre.
40014024	Laana aahiiɓe ɓeen duu woɗɗowake. Ika dilli yahde ika fotta he henndu, sey benkeƴƴe puɗɗi no piya ka.
40014025	Wakkati ɓadinoo weetude, o wari to aahiiɓe ɓeen, omo dilla he koyɗe dow ndiyam ɗaam.
40014026	Amma wakkati aahiiɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo omo dilla he koyɗe dow ndiyam ɗaam, ɓerɗe maɓɓe taƴi, ɓe mbi'i : —Mbeelu maayɗo non ! Ɓe kuli kulal manngal.
40014027	Wakkati mum da Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Pukkinee hakkillooji mooɗon ! Miin non. To kulee !
40014028	Sey Piyer jaabii mo, wi'i : —Joomam, nde nii aan non, waɗu mi wara to maa.
40014029	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —War ! Piyer wurtii laana kaan, no yaaɓa dow ndiyam ɗaam, no fa'i to Iisa.
40014030	Amma wakkati o hi'unoo henndu nduun sattii sanne ndeen, o huli, sey o fuɗɗi yoolaade, nden o huuɓi, o wi'i : —Joomam, hisinam !
40014031	Wakkati mum da, Iisa foorti junngo mum, nanngi mo, wi'i : —Hey pamɗuɗo goonɗinol, ko waɗi cikkuɗaa ?
40014032	Gaɗa mum ɓe fuu ɗiɗo, ɓe naati laana kaan, sey henndu nduun duu darii.
40014033	Nden aahiiɓe wonɓe nder laana kaan cujidani mo, mbi'i : —Hakiika, aan woni Ɓii-Alla !
40014034	Wakkati ɓe pedditinnoo peta ngaan, ɓe njottii leydi Genesaret.
40014035	Himɓe wuro ngoon fuu annditi mo, ɓe ngaɗi lilaaɓe leydi ndiin fuu haalanee garki makko. Himɓe ɓeen ngaddani mo nyawɓe mum'en fuu.
40014036	Ɓe eeli mo o acca nyawɓe ɓeen meema baa nii hunnduko jabbaare makko tan. Meemuɗo nde fuu nyawti.
40015001	Fariisa'en he jannginooɓe Tawreeta ƴuwi Ursaliima, ngari to Iisa ƴami mo, mbi'i :
40015002	—Ɗume waɗi ko aahiiɓe maaɗa tokkataa laabi finaa-tawaaji maamiraaɓe meeɗen ? Ɓe lootataa juuɗe maɓɓe fadde maɓɓe nyaamude.
40015003	Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Onon nee, ɗume waɗi ko on tokkataa tilsinooje Alla, oɗon tokka finaa-tawaaji mooɗon ?
40015004	Ngam Alla wi'i : Teddin inna maa he bammaa. O wi'i kaden : Kuɗuɗo innum naa bammum fuu no haani wareede.
40015005	Amma onon, oɗon njanngina ko neɗɗo no waawi wi'ude innum naa bammum, kam sakkani Alla ko haani wallirde ɓe ɗum.
40015006	Oɗon mbi'a fotaay joomum teddina saarooɓe muuɗum. Ndenne ngam sabbu finaa-tawaaji mooɗon, oɗon ngartira haala Alla meere !
40015007	Munaafiki'en ! Esaaya woofaay sam wakkati o waɗunoo annabaaku dow mooɗon.
40015008	Nder maggu Alla wi'i : Himɓe ɓee no mbi'an kam'en no teddina kam, amma ɓerɗe maɓɓe no mboɗɗi kam.
40015009	Dewal maɓɓe no meere ngam ko ɓe ngoni iɓe njanngina ɗum to ɓiɓɓe aadama ƴuwi.
40015010	Nden Iisa noddi jama'aare ndeen, wi'i nde : —Kettinee.
40015011	Paamee ko hanaa ko naatata nder hunnduko neɗɗo, tunninta ɗum, amma ko wurtotoo nder makko.
40015012	Sey aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓattii mo, mbi'i : —Aɗa anndi ko haalaaji maaɗa ɗiin metti ɓerɗe Fariisa'en ?
40015013	Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Wasaango fuu ngo Baaba am gonɗo dow aawaay, no ɗoofetee.
40015014	Accee ɓe, ɓe wumɓe ɗowooɓe wumɓe ! Nde bumɗo ɗowi bumɗo, sey ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe caamowan nder ngayka.
40015015	Sey Piyer wi'i mo : —Fiirtan min banndol ngool.
40015016	Nden Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Onon duu, faa hannden ɗum laaɓanaay on naa ?
40015017	On anndaa ko naati nder hunnduko fuu no yahan nder reedu, gaɗa mum ɗum yehee gaɗa wuro naa ?
40015018	Amma ko wurtotoo nder hunnduko ɗum, nder ɓerne ɗum ƴuwata, kanƴum jaati tunninta neɗɗo.
40015019	Ngam nder ɓerne neɗɗo miilooji bonɗi, uppooji neɗɗo itta yonki, yeena, fija, wujja, seedo dow fewre, he mbonka fuu ƴuwata.
40015020	Ɗum woni ko tunninta neɗɗo. Amma nyaama tawee lootaay juuɗe muuɗum hano no finaa-tawaaji wi'iri ɗum nii tunnintaa neɗɗo.
40015021	Nyannde gom Iisa ummidii aahiiɓe mum, fonndi seraaji Tirus he Sidon.
40015022	Sey Kanananke debbo gom tawaaɗo nder seraaji ɗiin waddi bojji mum to makko, wi'i : —Joomam, taan Daawda, yurmam ! Ɓiyam debbo, ginnaaru woni dow mum, indu torra mo sanne !
40015023	Amma Iisa jaabaaki mo. Nden aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓattii mo, mbi'i : —Riiwu debbo oo, omo nii gaɗa meeɗen, omo wulla.
40015024	Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Ngam baali Isra'el majjuɗi ɗiin waɗi lilaami.
40015025	Nden debbo oon wari, sujidi yeeso makko, wi'i : —Joomam, wallam !
40015026	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Hegaaki neɗɗo hooƴa nyaamdu sukaaɓe, faɗɗana dawaaɗi.
40015027	Debbo oon jaabitii mo, wi'i kaden : —Goonga non, Joomam. Amma dawaaɗi duu no nyaama nyaamdu joomiraaɓe mum'en ɓiltotoondu nder le'e maɓɓe no saama.
40015028	Nden, Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Goonɗinol maa ngool no mawni ! Ɗum laatane no ngiɗirɗaa fuu. Nder wakkati mum, ɓiyiiko debbo nyawti.
40015029	Iisa dilli Tirus he Sidon, o tokkitii daane peta Galili yahde. O ƴeenyi waamnde gom, o jooɗowi toon.
40015030	Himɓe heewɓe ngari to makko, ngaddani mo laƴooɓe, wumɓe, larɗuɓe, pahuɓe, he nyawɓe heewɓe. Ɓe ngaddi ɓe yeeso makko, nden o nyawti ɓe.
40015031	Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo pahuɓe ɓeen no kaala, larɗuɓe ɓeen no larɗita, laƴooɓe ɓeen no laƴita, wumnooɓe ɓeen no ngi'a. Ɗum haayɗini ɓe sanne. Ɓe tinni iɓe njetta Alla mo Isra'el.
40015032	Iisa noddi aahiiɓe mum, wi'i ɓe : —Himɓe ɓee no njurminii. Balɗe tati nii hannden ko iɓe ngondi he am, ɓe ngalaa fuu ko nyaamee. Mi hiɗaa ɓe ndilla tawee ɓe nyaamaay, to rafo liɓoy ɓe dow laawol.
40015033	Nden aahiiɓe ɓeen mbi'i mo : —Toy keɓeten ko nyamni jama'aare ndee fuu nder ladde yeeruure ndee ?
40015034	Sey o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i : —Buuruuje foti njogiɗon ? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Buuruuje jeɗɗi, he likkoy seɗɗa min njogii.
40015035	Nden o wi'i jama'aare ndeen jooɗoo he leydi.
40015036	O hooƴi buuruuje jeɗɗi ɗeen he likkoy koy. O yetti Alla, o helti ɗe, o hokki aahiiɓe ɓeen, njeddani jama'aare ndeen.
40015037	Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami faa ɓe kaari. Aahiiɓe ɓeen kawri kelte ɗeen, ɗe kebbini kandeeje jeɗɗi.
40015038	Worɓe nyaamuɓe ɓeen tan no ngaɗa ujunaaji nayo, sukaaɓe he rewɓe ɓeen ngalaa nder.
40015039	Gaɗa Iisa waynii himɓe ɓeen, o naati laana, o fa'i leydi Magadan.
40016001	Fariisa'en he Sadduki'en gom ngari to Iisa faa tunna mo. Ɓe ŋaarii mo o holla ɓe alaama kaayɗiniiɗo ƴuwɗo dow kolloowo ko Alla lili mo.
40016002	Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Wakkati naange hiɗi yanude, kammu no wojji, oɗon mbi'a nyalooma jaaŋo oon no welan.
40016003	Illa beete duu, nde duule boɗeeje ƴeenyi, faa kammu niɓɓi, oɗon mbi'a hannden ndiyam no toɓan. Oɗon mbaawi senndodirde alamaaji kammu, amma on mbaawaa senndodirde alamaaji wakkatiiji !
40016004	Himɓe jamaanu bonɗo mo hulataa Alla ngiɗi holleede alaama. Alaama fuu non on kollataake ko ƴaari alaama annabi Yunuusa. Nden o dilli, o acci ɓe.
40016005	Wakkati aahiiɓe ɓeen pedditannoo peta Galili, ɓe njeggiti ɓe pantiraay buuru gaɗa maɓɓe.
40016006	Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Kakkilee, paddee ko'e mooɗon he ƴuufinirɗum Fariisa'en he Sadduki'en oo.
40016007	Sey aahiiɓe ɓeen puɗɗi no mbi'odira : —Ngam en pantiraay buuru, waɗi omo wi'a haalaaji ɗii.
40016008	Iisa faami ko ɓe ngoni iɓe kaala, nden o wi'i ɓe : —Onon famɗuɓe goonɗinol ! Ɗume waɗi oɗon mbi'odira hakkune mooɗon ngam on ngalaa buuru non ?
40016009	On paamaay faa hannden ? On njeggitani buuruuje joy, ɗe njeddanmi worɓe ujunaaji joyo ɗeen naa ? Nyannde mum kandeeje foti kebbinirɗon kelte buuru oon ?
40016010	On njeggitani kaden buuruuje jeɗɗi, ɗe njeddanmi worɓe ujunaaji nayo ɗeen naa ? Nyannde mum kandeeje foti kebbinirɗon kelte ɗeen ?
40016011	Noy waɗi ko on paamaay, hanaa haala buuru kaalananmi on ? Mi wi'aana paddoɗon ko'e mooɗon he ƴuufinirɗum Fariisa'en he Sadduki'en.
40016012	Nden aahiiɓe ɓeen paami ko o wondaa ƴuufinirɗum tawaaɗo nder buuru oon, amma ɓe kakkilo he ko Fariisa'en he Sadduki'en njannginta.
40016013	Wakkati Iisa yottinoo nder leydi Kaysariya Filipi. O ƴami aahiiɓe makko, o wi'i : —Moy himɓe mbi'ata Ɓii-Neɗɗo oon woni ?
40016014	Sey ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Woɓɓe no mbi'a a Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma. Woɓɓe no mbi'a a Eliya. Woɓɓe duu kaden no mbi'a a Yeremiya naa a gooto nder annabiiɓe.
40016015	Nden Iisa ƴami ɓe wi'i : —Dey onon nee, moy mbi'oton ngonmi ?
40016016	Sey Simon Piyer jaabii mo, wi'i : —Aan, a Almasiihu, Ɓii-Alla duumiiɗo.
40016017	Nden Iisa wi'i mo : —Aan Simon ɓii-Yunuusa, a barkinaaɗo. Ngam hanaa ɓii-aadama wannginani ma ɗum, amma Baabiraawo am gonɗo dow.
40016018	Miin duu, mi inndirte Piyer, ɗum woni hayre. Dow hayre ndeen nyiɓanmi hawriine goonɗinɓe kam. Maayde naa jahannama he semmbe mum fuu walaa ko waawani nde.
40016019	Mi hokkete omtirɗe dammbugal Laamu Alla : Huune fuu ko kaɗuɗaa dow leydi, haɗetee dow kammu. Huune fuu ko njaɓuɗaa dow leydi, jaɓetee dow kammu.
40016020	Nden, Iisa fooɗi noppi maɓɓe wi'i to ɓe kaalan neɗɗo fuu ko kam woni Almasiihu.
40016021	Gaɗa tabbintinol ngol Piyer waɗi, Iisa fuɗɗi anndinde aahiiɓe mum ko no tilsi kam yaha Ursaliima. To mawɓe Yahudankooɓe, mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe Tawreeta torrata ɗum sanne, nden ɓe mbara ɗum. Balɗe tati gaɗa mum kam ummitittoo.
40016022	Sey, Piyer fooɗi mo senngo, tinni no haalda he makko, no wi'a : —Alla reene, Joomam ! Ɗum hewtotaako ma sam !
40016023	Iisa yeeƴitii Piyer, wi'i : —Woɗɗam, aan Seyɗan ! A fergere dow laawol am, ngam miilooji maaɗa ɗii ƴuwaay to Alla, amma to himɓe ɗi ƴuwi !
40016024	Nden Iisa wi'i aahiiɓe mum : —Muuyɗo tokkude kam fuu, acca daarude hoore mum, hooƴa leggal bardugal mum, tokka kam.
40016025	Ngam giɗɗo hisinde yonki mum, mursan ki. Amma mursuɗo ki ngam am, heɓitan ki.
40016026	Ɗume keɓol duuniyaaru nduu fuu nafirta neɗɗo, nde joomum mursi yonki mum ? No woodi ko neɗɗo waawi hokkitirde ngam heɓita ki naa ?
40016027	Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wardan he maleykaaɓe mum nder teddungal Baabiraawo mum. Wakkati mum, o yoɓan neɗɗo fuu ko foti he golle muuɗum.
40016028	Goonga kaalananmi on : Woɓɓe nder tawaaɓe ɗo hannden maayataa tawee ngi'aay Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wara nder laamu mum.
40017001	Balɗe jeegom gaɗa tabbintinol ngol Piyer waɗi, Iisa nyakkodi Piyer, Yakuuba he dimdaaɗo mum Yahaaya dow waamnde toowne gom.
40017002	Tagaadi makko waylitii yeeso maɓɓe. Yeeso makko no yayna hano naange, kolte makko duu no ƴelkita hano jeyngol.
40017003	Wakkati mum da aahiiɓe tato ɓeen ngi'i Muusa he Eliya mbanngii, iɓe kaalda he makko.
40017004	Sey Piyer wi'i Iisa : —Joomam, no wooɗi ko tawaaɗen ɗo. Nde nii aɗa hiɗi, mi nyiɓan hukumuuji tati ɗo : Aan worru, Muusa worru, Eliya worru.
40017005	Wakkati o haalannoo ndeen sey luuldere ƴelkitoore gom wari suddi ɓe. Daane gom ƴuwi nder luuldere ndeen, wi'i : —Oo woni Ɓiyam mo korsinmi, mo mbelniranmi. Kettinanee mo !
40017006	Wakkati aahiiɓe ɓeen nanunoo daane ndeen, kippi he leydi. Ɓe kuli sanne.
40017007	Iisa ɓattii ɓe, meemi ɓe, wi'i : —Ummee ! To kulee !
40017008	Sey ɓe ɓanti ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe ngi'aay neɗɗo fuu, se hanaa Iisa.
40017009	Wakkati ɓe njippotonoo waamnde ndeen, Iisa fooɗi noppi maɓɓe, wi'i : —To kaalanee neɗɗo fuu ko ngi'uɗon ɗum, sey wakkati Ɓii-Neɗɗo ummitii e maayde.
40017010	Nden aahiiɓe ɓeen ƴami mo, mbi'i : —Ɗume waɗi ko jannginooɓe Tawreeta no mbi'a no tilsi Eliya arta Almasiihu warde ?
40017011	O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Goonga non, Eliya artata wara, moƴƴina kujje fuu.
40017012	Amma miɗo wi'a on : Eliya warii faa yawti, ɓe annditaay mo, ɓe ndaaraay mo goɗɗum. Hano non duu ɓe ndaarataa Ɓii-Neɗɗo goɗɗum, ɓe torra mo.
40017013	Nden aahiiɓe ɓeen paamii ko filla Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma o waɗani ɓe.
40017014	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ngartunoo to jama'aare ndeen, gorko gom ɓadii mo, hofi yeeso makko,
40017015	wi'i : —Moodibbo, yurma ɓiyam gorko oo ! Paɗɗe o woodi, ɗum tampinii mo sanne. Kile keewɗe omo saama nder hiite naa nder ndiyam.
40017016	Mi yaarii mo to aahiiɓe maaɗa amma ɓe keppi nyawtude mo.
40017017	Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Hey onon himɓe jamaanu bonɗo, ɓe ngoonɗinaay ! Faa nde ngondanmi he mooɗon ? Faa nde tinnotoomi miɗo munyana on ? Ngaddanee kam suka oon ɗo !
40017018	O sajiti ginnaaru nduun. Ndu takkiti suka oon. Wakkati mum da suka oon nyawti.
40017019	Wakkati Iisa wonnoo feere mum, aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓadii mo, ƴami, mbi'i : —Ɗume waɗi ko minen, min keppi riiwude ginnaaru nduun ?
40017020	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Ngam oɗon pamɗi goonɗinol. Goonga kaalananmi on : Nde goonɗinol mooɗon no famɗi faa foti gabbel mutaari, nde nii on mbi'i waamnde ndee : « Sottu ɗo, njahaa to », nde sottan. Huune fuu hepportaa on. [
40017021	Amma iri ginnaaru nduu riiwataako nde hanaa du'aa'u he suumayeere non.]
40017022	Nyannde gom, wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum pottunoo nder leydi Galili, o wi'i ɓe kaden : —Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jammbetee, wattee nder juuɗe.
40017023	O waree, balɗe tati gaɗa mum, o ummitoo. Haala kaa metti ɓerɗe aahiiɓe ɓeen sanne.
40017024	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum njottinoo Kafarnahum, jaɓooɓe janngal Juulirde mawne gom ngari to Piyer, mbi'i mo : —Moodibbo mooɗon no yoɓa janngal Juulirde mawne naa ?
40017025	Piyer jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Omo yoɓa. Wakkati Piyer naatannoo nder Juulirde ndeen, fadde makko yeccaade, sey Iisa wi'i mo : —Simon, ɗume miiliɗaa ? Moy haani yoɓande laamiiɓe duuniyaaru janngal ? Ɓiɓɓe leydi naa hoɓɓe ?
40017026	Nden Piyer jaabii mo, wi'i : —Hoɓɓe. Sey Iisa wi'i mo : —Ndenne, ɓiɓɓe leydi kaanaa yoɓude naa ?
40017027	Amma, en ngiɗaa mettinde ɓerɗe himɓe ɓee. Yah toon dow peta, paɗɗaa mamaruwol maa. Linngu ngu artuɗaa nanngude nguun, omtu hunnduko maggu. A tawan tammal cardi, joɓoowal janngal meeɗen. Ittaa ngal, njoɓana en, miin he maa.
40018001	Aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓadii Iisa, ƴami mo, mbi'i : —Moy ɓuri teddude nder Laamu Alla ?
40018002	Nden Iisa noddi cukalel gom, darni yeeso maɓɓe,
40018003	wi'i : —Goonga kaalananmi on : Nde nii on mbattitaay, faa nannduɗon he cukaloy koy, on naatataa nder Laamu Alla.
40018004	Leesinɗo hoore mum faa nanndi he cukalel ngel, kam woni ɓurɗo teddude nder Laamu Alla.
40018005	Jaɓɓiiɗo suka gooto hano cukalel ngel dow innde am, miin jaati joomum jaɓɓii.
40018006	Neɗɗo fuu waɗi cukalel gootel goonɗinngel kam waɗa hakke, ko ɓuri moƴƴande joomum woni kaaƴa mannga haɓɓee he daane mum, yoolee nder nokkuure ɓurne luggiɗidde nder maayo.
40018007	Kaari duuniyaaru nduu no heewi laabi gaɗol bone. Sikka fuu walaa laabi gaɗol ko boni keppataa nder mayru faa abada. Amma bone saama dow neɗɗo fuu laatii sabiili majji !
40018008	Se tawi junngo maaɗa naa koyngal maaɗa no waawi waɗa ngaɗaa hakke, taƴa junngo ngoon naa koyngal ngaal paɗɗaa. Naataa nder mbuurnam nduumiiɗam a larɗuɗo no ɓuri moƴƴande ma dina paɗɗeɗaa nder hiite duumiinge tawi aɗa huuɓi.
40018009	Se tawi hitere maaɗa no waawi waɗa ngaɗaa hakke, itta nde paɗɗaa. Naataa nder mbuurnam nduumiiɗam a ɗokko, no ɓuri moƴƴande ma dina paɗɗideɗaa gite maaɗa ɗiɗi fuu no kuuɓi nder hiite jahannama.
40018010	Kakkilee to njawee baa gooto nder cukaloy koy. Ngam miɗo wi'a on : Maleykaaɓe makkoy wonɓe dow kammu ɓeen, wakkati fuu iɓe yeeso Baabiraawo am gonɗo dow, iɓe ngi'a huune fuu. [
40018011	Ngam Ɓii-Neɗɗo waraana hisinde majjuɓe.]
40018012	—Ɗume miilotoɗon ? Nde nii tawaama neɗɗo no jogii baali hemre, dey ngootu majjaa, hanaa joomum no accan baali hemre go'o walaa ɗiin nder ferro ɗi ndura, nden tefowa majjungu nguun naa ?
40018013	Goonga kaalananmi on : Nde nii o hiitii ngu, o welniran ngu faa ngu ɓura hemre go'o walaa ɗiito.
40018014	Hano non Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo dow oon, hiɗaa baa gooto nder cukaloy koy majjaa.
40018015	—Nde nii bannda goonɗinɗo gom waɗani ma gacce, yah to makko, nodda mo feere kollaa mo gacce makko. Nde nii o hettinake, o jaɓi kollitooje maa, a wartiri enɗam hakkune mooɗon.
40018016	Amma nde nii o jaɓaay, soƴƴa to makko, aan he neɗɗo gom naa njahdaa himɓe ɗiɗo. Ngam seedeeɓe ɗiɗo naa tato tabbintina haala ngaɗaaka fuu.
40018017	Nde nii o jaɓaay faa hannden, kaalanaa ɗum hawriine goonɗinɓe. Nde nii o salake jaɓude haala hawriine goonɗinɓe kaan, adu mo hano neɗɗo mo anndaa Alla naa jaɓoowo janngal, caliiɗo tuubude.
40018018	Goonga kaalananmi on : Huune fuu ko kaɗuɗon dow leydi, no haɗetee dow kammu. Huune fuu ko njaɓuɗon dow leydi, no jaɓetee dow kammu.
40018019	Miɗo haalana on kaden : Nde nii himɓe ɗiɗo nder mooɗon potii dow huune worre nder duuniyaaru faa ŋaarake ɗum Alla, Baabiraawo am gonɗo dow no jaabanto ɓe ɗum.
40018020	Ngam nokku fuu to himɓe ɗiɗo naa tato kawri dow innde am, miɗo wondi he maɓɓe.
40018021	Piyer ɓadii Iisa, ƴami mo wi'i : —Joomam, nde nii banndam waɗanii kam gacce, kile foti kaanumi yaafanaade mo ? Kile jeɗɗi, naa kile foti ?
40018022	Nden Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Mi wi'aay ma kile jeɗɗi tan. Njaafoɗaa mo kile lasooji tati he sappo faa nde jeɗɗi.
40018023	Ngam majjum waɗi Laamu Alla no nanndinee he laamu laamiiɗo gom, anniyiiɗo lima njawdi mum wondi nder juuɗe gollanooɓe ɗum.
40018024	Wakkati o fuɗɗunoo limude ndeen, o waddanaa golloowo gom mo o tokkata nyamaane nde golloowo oon waawtaa yoɓi keerol mbuurnam mum fuu.
40018025	Ko gorko oon heppi yoɓidide mo fuu, sey laamiiɗo oon hokki laawol gorko oon, deekum, sukaaɓe mum he ko jogii fuu connee, faa ɗum yoɓa nyamaane ndeen.
40018026	Sey golloowo oon hofi yeeso laamiiɗo oon, eeli mo, wi'i : « Munyanam, mi yoɓete fuu ! »
40018027	Nden laamiiɗo oon yurmii mo, yaafanii mo nyamaane ndeen, acci mo o dilli.
40018028	Amma golloowo oon no wurtorii, sey fotti he mo ɓe ngolliditta gom mo o tokkata nyamaane seɗɗa. O nanngi daane onɗon, o ɗeɗɗi, o wi'i mo : « Yoɓan ceede am ! »
40018029	Gollidoowo he makko oon hofi yeeso makko, eeli mo, wi'i : « Munyanam, mi yoɓete ! »
40018030	Amma o jaɓaay. O uddowii mo kasu, sey nde o yoɓi nyamaane ndeen fuu.
40018031	Wakkati gollooɓe ɓeeto ngi'unoo ɗum ndeen, ɗum metti ɓerɗe maɓɓe sanne. Ɓe njehi ɓe kaalanowi ɗum laamiiɗo oon.
40018032	Nden, laamiiɗo oon noddi golloowo oon, wi'i mo : « Aan a neɗɗo bonɗo ! Wakkati eelunoɗaa kam, mi yaafanake ma ko tokkanoomaami fuu.
40018033	Ndenne aan, a haanaa yurmaade jaada oo naa, hano no njurmorimaami nii ? »
40018034	Laamiiɗo oon tikki sanne, nanngi mo portol sey nyannde o yoɓidi nyamaane ndeen fuu faa laaɓi.
40018035	Non duu Baabiraawo am gonɗo dow waɗanta gooto mooɗon fuu, caliiɗo yaafaade banndum he ɓerne worre.
40019001	Wakkati Iisa timminnoo waaju mum, o dilli Galili o fa'i gaɗa maayo Urdun nder leydi Yahudiya.
40019002	Jama'aare mawne tokki mo, o nyawti nyawɓe maɓɓe.
40019003	Fariisa'en gom ngari to makko faa tunna mo. Ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i : —No dagii gorko seera deekum ngam daliila fuu naa ?
40019004	Sey o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Ndenne, on njanngaay ko winndaa nder dewte ɗeen naa ? Illa fuɗɗorde Alla tagi himɓe gorko he debbo.
40019005	Ngam majjum waɗi gorko no acca innum e bammum ngam hawtaa he deekum, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe laatoo ɓanndu worru.
40019006	Ndenne, joonin ɓe kanaa ɗiɗo kaden, amma ɓe go'o. To neɗɗo fuu senndu ko Alla hawri.
40019007	Ɓe ƴami mo kaden, ɓe mbi'i : —Ndenne ɗume waɗi Muusa tilsini gorko hokka deekum talkuru ceergal, nde no seera mo ?
40019008	O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —On tiɓɓe-nyireeɓe, ngam majjum waɗi Muusa hokki on laawol no ceerirton rewɓe mooɗon. Amma illa fuɗɗorde, hanaa non ɗum worri.
40019009	Miɗo wi'a on : Neɗɗo fuu ceerɗo deekum ko hanaa ngam jeenu, dey ɓaŋi debbo gom, joomum yeeni.
40019010	Sey aahiiɓe ɓeen mbi'i mo : —Nde nii hakkune neɗɗo he deekum nii worri, tawee neɗɗo ɓaŋaay mo no ɓuri.
40019011	Amma Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Hanaa neɗɗo fuu waawi jaɓude haala kaa, sey nii mo Alla hiɗani ɗum.
40019012	Daliila kaɗoowo gorko ɓaŋa no woodi. Ngam goɗɗo rimaama no baatoraaɗo. Goɗɗo no tappaaɗo. Goɗɗo duu, kam haɗi hoore mum ɓaŋude ngam ngollana Laamu Alla. Neɗɗo fuu waawi yardaade he haala kaa, jaɓa ka !
40019013	Himɓe ngaddi cukaloy mum'en ngam o yowa juuɗe makko dow makkoy, o du'anoo koy, amma aahiiɓe ɓeen nduki ɓe.
40019014	Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Accee cukaloy koy ngara to am. To kaɗee koy, ngam nannduɓe he makkoy njeyii Laamu Alla.
40019015	O yowi junngo makko dow makkoy, o du'anii koy, nden o dilli.
40019016	Iɓe ɗon nii, sey gorko gom ɓadii Iisa, ƴami mo, wi'i : —Moodibbo, yerre ndeye kaanumi waɗude ngam heɓude mbuurnam nduumiiɗam ?
40019017	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Ɗume ƴamantaa kam yerre nde kaanuɗaa waɗude ? Alla tan woni jeɗɗuɗo ! Nde aɗa hiɗi naata nder mbuurnam nduumiiɗam, tokku tilsinooje Tawreeta.
40019018	Nden gorko oon ƴami mo wi'i kaden : —Tilsinooje Tawreeta ɗeye tokkanmi ? Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —To ittu yonki goɗɗo, to yeenu, to wujju, to seedana fewre.
40019019	Teddin inna maa he bammaa, ngiɗaa gondo maa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maa.
40019020	Suka jokolle oon wi'i mo : —Miɗo waɗa kujje ɗee fuu. Ɗume hoddi kaden ?
40019021	Sey Iisa wi'i mo : —Nde aɗa hiɗi laatoɗaa kuuɓuɗo, sonnoy ko njogiɗaa fuu, njeddana talkaaɓe, a heɓan baraaje dow. Gaɗa mum, ngaraa tokkaa kam.
40019022	Jokolle oon no diikuɗo sanne. Wakkati o nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, o ɓalinii, o dillidi mettorgal ɓerne.
40019023	Gaɗa mum, sey Iisa wi'i aahiiɓe mum : —Goonga kaalananmi on : Naatol diikuɗo nder Laamu Alla no tiiɗi faa !
40019024	Miɗo haalana on duu : Naatol ngolooba nder wudde battal no ɓuri hoyde dina naatol diikuɗo nder Laamu Alla.
40019025	Wakkati aahiiɓe ɓeen nanunoo haala kaan, ɗum haayɗini ɓe sanne. Nden ɓe mbi'i : —Ndenne, moy hisata ?
40019026	O daari ɓe, o wi'i : —To himɓe ɗum waɗataako naa ? Amma walaa fuu ko hepportaa Alla.
40019027	Piyer itti hunnduko, wi'i Iisa : —Minen, min mboppii fuu, min tokkii ma. Noy min laatoytoo ?
40019028	Sey Iisa jaabii, wi'i : —Goonga kaalananmi on : Nder duuniyaaru heyru warooru nduu, nde Ɓii-Neɗɗo jooɗake dow jooɗorgal laamu mum teddungal, onon sappo he ɗiɗo tokkuɓe kam ɓee, onon duu on njooɗoto dow jooɗorɗe laamiiɓe sappo he ɗiɗi, laamoɗon lenyi Isra'el sappo e ɗiɗi ɗiin.
40019029	Kaden neɗɗo fuu boppuɗo ɓaade mum, naa rimdaaɓe mum worɓe naa rewɓe, naa woppi innum naa bammum, naa sukaaɓe mum, naa gese mum ngam am, joomum heɓan ko ɓuri ko woppi ɗum kile hemre. Kaden duu joomum heɓan mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
40019030	Amma ardiiɓe heewɓe keedan gaɗa. Gaɗaaɓe ɓeen duu laatoto ardiiɓe.
40020001	Ndaa no Laamu Alla wa'i nii : —Ingu nanndi he jom ngesa cabiije, dilluɗo illa beete faa hooƴowa gollooɓe, gollanooɓe ɗum.
40020002	O heɓi ɓe, o fotidi he maɓɓe dow ko nyalooma fuu, o yoɓataana neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu tammal cardi gootal. Nden o yaari ɓe nder ngesa makko.
40020003	Nyawli seɗɗa, sey o wurtii kaden, o hi'i woɓɓe no njooɗii nder luumo, ɓe ngalaa gollal fuu.
40020004	O wi'i ɓe : « Njehee onon duu ngollowon nder ngesa am. Mi yoɓan on ko haani yoɓeede. »
