40020005	Ɓeen duu njehi ngollowi. Har caka nyalooma o wurtii kaden, o hi'i woɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe njaha ɓe ngollowa nder ngesa makko. O wurtitii kaden har juura sey o hi'i woɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe kamɓe duu ɓe ngollowa nder ngesa makko.
40020006	Faa hannden har laasara pewɗo dey-dey yamnde joy, o wurtii kaden. O tawi woɓɓe nder luumo, ɓe ngalaa golle. O wi'i ɓe : « Ko waɗi ko nyalluɗon ɗo on ngollaay ? »
40020007	Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : « Neɗɗo fuu hooƴaay min golle. » Nden o wi'i ɓe : « Too, njehee onon duu ngollowon nder ngesa am. »
40020008	Wakkati naange yanunoo ndeen, sey o wi'i golloowo makko gom : « Noddu gollooɓe ɓeen, njoɓaa ɓe. Artir sakitiiɓe warde ɓeen, nden ngayniraa artuɓe ɓeen. »
40020009	Warɓe laasara pewɗo ɓeen ngari, neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu hokkaa tammal cardi gootal.
40020010	Artunooɓe ɓeen duu ngari, miili no njoɓetee ko ɓuri non. Amma kamɓe duu, neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu hokkaa tammal cardi gootal.
40020011	Wakkati ɓe njoɓanoo ndeen, sey ɓe tinni iɓe nguunitoo yeeso jom ngesa oon.
40020012	Iɓe mbi'a : « Sakitiiɓe warɓe ɓeen yamnde worre tan ngolli, dey njobdi amin fonnee. Minen nyalluɓe no tampa nder naange wulnge ! »
40020013	Sey jom ngesa oon jaabii gooto nder maɓɓe, wi'i : « Neɗɗo am, mi toonyaaki ma. Hanaa dow tammal cardi gootal kaalduɗen ngam ngollanon kam nyalooma oon fuu naa ?
40020014	Ndenne, jaɓu njobdi maa, tinnoɗaa. Mi muuyi hokkude sakitiiɓe warɓe ɓeen dey-dey ko kokkumaami.
40020015	Hanaa ko weli kam ngaɗiranmi ceede am naa ? Naa moƴƴere nde ngaɗumi ndeen woni welaay ma ? »
40020016	Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Non non ardiiɓe ɓeen keedan gaɗa, gaɗaaɓe ɓeen duu laatoo ardiiɓe.
40020017	Nyannde gom Iisa he lilaaɓe mum sappo he ɗiɗo ɓeen no pa'i Ursaliima. Dow laawol, sey o henni ɓe senngo, o wi'i ɓe :
40020018	—Kettinee, eɗen ɗon njaha Ursaliima. Toon Ɓii-Neɗɗo wattetee nder juuɗe hooreeɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe Tawreeta. Ɓe kiitoo mo kiite maayde.
40020019	Ɓe ngatta mo nder juuɗe ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe. Kamɓe duu ɓe njawoo mo, ɓe ɓocca mo, ɓe tonta mo dow leggal bardugal ngam o maaya. Amma nyalaane tataɓere mum o ummitittoo.
40020020	Inna ɓiɓɓe Jebede ɓattini sukaaɓe mum to Iisa. O sujidi yeeso makko ngam eelude mo.
40020021	Sey Iisa wi'i mo : —Ɗume ngiɗaa ? Nden yeyraajo oon jaabii mo, wi'i : —Miɗo hiɗi podanoɗaa ɓiɓɓe am worɓe ɗiɗo ɓee, ɓe njooɗoo takkol maaɗa nder laamu maa. Gooto nyaamo maa, ooto nano maa.
40020022	Nden Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i Yakuuba he Yahaaya : —On anndaa ko eeloton. Oɗon mbaawi yarirde nyeɗerde nde njaranmi ndeen naa ? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Miɗen mbaawi.
40020023	O wi'i ɓe : —Goonga, on njaran nde. Amma jooɗaade nyaamo am naa nano am, hanaa miin woodi baawɗe hokkude ɗum. Baabiraawo am moƴƴini jooɗorɗe ɗee ngam ɓe o suɓi.
40020024	Wakkati lilaaɓe sappo ɓeeto nanunoo ɗum, ɓerɗe maɓɓe metti he ɗiɗo ɓeeto.
40020025	Nden Iisa noddi ɓe, ɓe fuu wi'i ɓe : —Oɗon anndi ko doole doole laamiiɓe ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe laamorii himɓe mum'en. Mawɓe maɓɓe ɓeen duu kolli baawɗe.
40020026	Amma onon kay, ɗum waɗataa hakkune mooɗon. Giɗɗo laatoo tedduɗo hakkune mooɗon on fuu, no haani laatoo golloowo mooɗon.
40020027	Kaden duu, giɗɗo ardaade nder mooɗon, no haani laatoo maccuɗo mooɗon.
40020028	Noon duu, Ɓii-Neɗɗo waraay faa gollanee, amma o wari faa o ngollana himɓe fuu, o mursa yonki makko ngam hisinde himɓe heewɓe.
40020029	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum njawtannoo nder Yeriko, jama'aare mawne no tokki mo.
40020030	Wumɓe ɗiɗo gom no njooɗii sera laawol. Wakkati ɓe nanunoo no wi'ee Iisa woni no yawta, sey ɓe kuuɓi, iɓe mbi'a : —Moodibbo ! Taan Daawda, yurma min !
40020031	Jama'aare ndeen darii no sajitoo he maɓɓe, no wi'a ɓe ndeƴƴita. Sey ɓe tinni iɓe kuuɓa, iɓe mbi'a : —Moodibbo ! Taan Daawda, yurma min !
40020032	Iisa darii, noddi ɓe, ƴami ɓe, wi'i : —Ɗume ngiɗuɗon mi waɗana on ?
40020033	Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Moodibbo, miɗen ngiɗi min mbumtaa.
40020034	Iisa yurmii ɓe, meemi gite maɓɓe. Wakkati mum da ɓe mbumti, ɓe tokki mo.
40021001	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum njottinoo ci'el Baytifaaji hadde Ursaliima har waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun, sey o lili aahiiɓe makko ɗiɗo gom,
40021002	o wi'i ɓe : —Ummee, njehee nder wurel gonngel yeeso mooɗon ngeel. No njottoriɗon, on tawan ara gom no haɓɓii, he ɓiyum. Kaɓɓitee nga, ngaddanon kam ɗi.
40021003	Nde nii goɗɗo ƴamii on, njaaboɗon mo mbi'on Joomiraawo haajaa ɗi. Dey ɗi ngartirtee law.
40021004	Ɗum waɗi ngam tabbintinde ko annabiijo gom haalunoo wakkati o wi'unoo :
40021005	Mbi'ee himɓe huɓeere Siyon : Ndaaree da, laamiiɗo mooɗon no wara to mooɗon, no leesinkini, no waɗɗii ara, ɓinngel mum gorel no tokki.
40021006	Sey aahiiɓe ɓeen njehi, ngaɗowi ko o wi'i ɗum'en.
40021007	Ɓe ngaddi ara ngaan he ɓinngel mum. Ɓe ngaɗi kolte maɓɓe jappe, ɓe njowi dow majji, nden Iisa waɗɗii.
40021008	Himɓe ɗuɓɓe mbeɗɗiti kolte mum'en dow laawol. Woɓɓe duu kelti licce, mbeerti dow maggol.
40021009	Jama'aare wonnde yeeso Iisa ndeen, he tokkude gaɗa makko fuu no ilina, no mbi'a : — Hosanna ! Jettooje ngoodani Taan Daawda ! Barkinaaɗo woni garɗo dow innde Joomiraawo ! Jettooje ngoodani Alla Toowɗo !
40021010	Wakkati o naatunoo Ursaliima, huɓeere ndeen fuu iirti. Himɓe no kuuɓa no mbi'a : —Moy woni gorko oo ?
40021011	Sey jama'aare wonnde gaɗa makko ndeen no jaaboo, no wi'a : —Ay, oo woni annabi Iisa mo Nasaratu nder leydi Galili.
40021012	Iisa naati jawreeru Juulirde mawne ndeen. O riiwi soodooɓe he sonnooɓe wonɓe nder mayru fuu. O liɓi teburuuji weccooɓe ceede he jooɗorɗe sonnooɓe buugaali.
40021013	Nden o wi'i ɓe : —No winndaa nder dewte Alla ko suudu am noddirtee suudu du'aa'u. Amma onon, on ngartiri ndu wumpere wuyɓe !
40021014	Wumɓe he laƴooɓe ngari to makko, o nyawti ɓe.
40021015	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe Tawreeta ngi'ii kujje kaayɗiniiɗe, ɗe o waɗata. Ɓe nani duu sukaaɓe no ilina nder Juulirde mawne no mbi'a : — Hosanna ! Jettooje ngoodani Taan Daawda ! Ɗum tiimi, ɗum metti ɓerɗe maɓɓe faa noy walaa.
40021016	Sey ɓe mbi'i Iisa : —A nanii ko cukaloy koy mbi'ata naa ? Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Mi nani. Ndenne, on njanngaay baa nde worre nder dewte Alla to winndaa, wi'aa : A waɗi kunndule entaaɓe e musinooɓe no njette ?
40021017	Illa ndeen, o seedi he maɓɓe. O dilli nder huɓeere ndeen, o yehi, o waalowi Baytaniya.
40021018	Beete, wakkati Iisa wartannoo nder huɓeere ndeen, sey o rafaa dow laawol.
40021019	O holliri ibbi gom sera laawol ngool. O fanti ki, amma o tawraay ki fuy nde hanaa haako. Nden o huɗi ki, o wi'i : —Taa rimu abada kaden ! Wakkati mum da, ibbi kiin yoorii koƴon.
40021020	Wakkati aahiiɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo ɗum, ɗum haayɗini ɓe. Ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Noy waɗi ko ibbi kii yoorii, wakkati gooto ?
40021021	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Goonga kaalananmi on : Nde nii on ngoonɗini, on cikkay, oɗon mbaawi ngaɗi ko ɓuri ko ngaɗumi ibbi kii. On mbaawan wi'ude baa waamnde ndee : « Ɗoofa, saamoy nder maayo », ɗum laato non duu.
40021022	Nde nii on ngoonɗini, ko eeluɗon nder du'aa'u fuu no jaabetee.
40021023	Iisa naati nder Juulirde mawne, omo waajoo. Sey hooreeɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe ɓadii mo, ƴami mo, mbi'i : —Baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗirtaa kujje ɗee fuu ? Moy hokki ma laawol waɗude ɗe ?
40021024	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Miin duu, huune worre tan ƴamanmi on. Nde nii on njaabake kam, miin duu, mi haalanan on baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗiranmi kujje ɗee fuu.
40021025	Alla naa himɓe kokki Yahaaya laawol waɗude batisma ? Sey iɓe caawodira hakkune maɓɓe, iɓe mbi'a : —Nde nii en mbi'i Alla, o wi'an ko waɗi en ngoonɗinaay Yahaaya ?
40021026	Amma nde en mbi'i himɓe, too, eɗen kaani kulen jama'aare ndee, ngam himɓe fuu no anndi tabbat Yahaaya no annabiijo.
40021027	Sey ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i : —Min anndaa. Iisa duu jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Too, miin duu, mi haalantaa on baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗiranmi kujje ɗee fuu.
40021028	Iisa wi'i hooreeɓe Yahudankooɓe ɓeen kaden : —Too ! Ɗume miilotoɗon nder huune ndee : Gorko gom no woodunoo ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo. O ɓadii arano oon, o wi'i mo : « Ɓinngel am, yah golloy hannden nder ngesa cabiije meeɗen. »
40021029	Sey ɓiɗɗo oon jaabii mo, wi'i kam yahataa. Gaɗa mum o nimsiti, o yehi, o gollowi.
40021030	Nden Baaba oon ɓadii ɗiɗaɓo oon, wi'i mo ko wi'unoo arano oon. Oon duu jaabii mo, wi'i : « Wooɗi Baaba, mi yahan. » Amma o yehaay.
40021031	Nder maɓɓe moy waɗi ko bammum hiɗi ? Nden ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i : —Arano oon. Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Goonga kaalananmi on : Jaɓooɓe janngal he rewɓe fijooɓe no artan on nder Laamu Alla.
40021032	Ngam Yahaaya wari to mooɗon, o holli on laawol dartinaaku, amma on ngoonɗinaay mo. Jaɓooɓe janngal he rewɓe fijooɓe kam'en ngoonɗini mo. Baa wakkati ngi'unoɗon ɗum ndeen, on tuubaay, ngoonɗinɗon mo.
40021033	Iisa wi'i hooreeɓe Yahudankooɓe ɓeen : —Too, kettinee kippol haala gom nii kaden : Neɗɗo gom waɗi ngesa mum cabiije, waɗi koogol fiiltini nga. O wasi luggere ɓoosirde cabiijam ɗaam. O nyiɓi suudu toownu ngam doomooɓe magga. Nden o wuƴi nga remooɓe gom, o waɗi jahaangal.
40021034	Wakkati teɓol cabiije ɗeen yottinoo, o lili gollooɓe makko gom to remooɓe ɓeen, ngam ɓe ngaddanowa ɗum mbaka mum nder ɓiɓɓe cabiije ɗeen.
40021035	Amma remooɓe ɓeen nanngi gollooɓe ɓeen, piyi arano oon, mbari ɗiɗaɓo oon, paɗɗi tataɓo oon kaaƴe faa maayi.
40021036	Jom ngesa oon lili gollooɓe gom kaden, ɓurɓe aranɓe ɓeen ɗuɗde. Remooɓe ɓeen ngaɗi ɓe no ngaɗunoo aranɓe ɓeen.
40021037	Nden o sakitii, o lili ɓiyiiko gorko he maɓɓe, o wi'i hoore makko : « Ɓe teddinan mo ngam o ɓiyam. »
40021038	Amma wakkati remooɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo ɓiyiiko ndeen, ɓe mbi'odiri hakkune maɓɓe : « Ma'adalla. Oo nii woni donoowo oon. Ngaree mbaren mo, heɓa ndonen ngesa ngaa ! »
40021039	Sey ɓe nanngi mo, ɓe mburtini nder ngesa ngaan, ɓe mbari mo.
40021040	Joonin nee, nde nii jom ngesa cabiije oon wari, noy o waɗata remooɓe ɓee ?
40021041	Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —O halkan himɓe bonɓe ɓee no boniri. O halfina ngesa ngaan remooɓe gom, kokkooɓe mo mbaka makko nder ɓiɓɓe magga wakkati teɓol majje.
40021042	Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Ndenne on njanngaay ko winndaa nder dewte ɗeen, wi'aa naa ? Hayre nde nyiɓooɓe mboppi ndeen, kayre laatii hoore nyibdi ndiin. Ɗum golle Joomiraawo, haayne non duu he giiɗe meeɗen !
40021043	Ngam majjum miɗo wi'a on : —Laamu Alla no teetetee he juuɗe mooɗon, hokkee waɗirooɓe ngu ko haani.
40021044	Neɗɗo fuu caamuɗo dow hayre ndeen, helan. Neɗɗo fuu, mo nde saami dow mum, no mornyotoo.
40021045	Wakkati hooreeɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he Fariisa'en nanunoo kippi haala ɗiin, ɓe paami ko filla mum'en o waɗi.
40021046	Ɓe tefi no ɓe nanngirta mo, amma ɓe kuli jama'aare ndeen, ngam nde adii mo o annabiijo.
40022001	Iisa waɗani ɓe kippol haala gom, wi'i ɓe :
40022002	—Ndaaree no Laamu Alla nanndi nii : Laamiiɗo gom mo ɓiyum ɓaŋi, waɗi nyaamdu ngam batu dewngal ngaal.
40022003	O lili gollooɓe makko noddowa noddaaɓe ɓeen ngara ɓe nyaama. Amma noddaaɓe ɓeen calii warde.
40022004	O lili kaden gollooɓe gom, o wi'i ɗum'en : « Mbi'ee noddaaɓe ɓeen nyaamdu ɓanngal ngaal moƴƴinaama faa wooɗi. Mi hirsii ga'i he nyalbi payɗi. Ɗum fuu ɗum siryaama. Ɓe ngara, ɓe nootoo kam nder nyalaane welwelo am ndee. »
40022005	Amma noddaaɓe ɓeen limtaay mo baa, ɓe naati haaju maɓɓe : Oo yehi ngesa mum, ooto duu naati haaju mum.
40022006	Hoddiiɓe ɓeen nanngi gollooɓe ɓeen, torri ɓe, mbari ɓe.
40022007	Laamiiɗo oon tikki, lili soogeeji mum mbarowa waruɓe lilaaɓe ɓeen, ɓe mbula wurooji maɓɓe.
40022008	Gaɗa mum, o wi'i gollooɓe makko ɓeen : « Nyaamdu welwelo am nduun moƴƴinaama, amma noddaaɓe ɓeen kaandinaaka ndu.
40022009	Ndenne, ummee njehee dow laabi mawɗi, noddon neɗɗo fuu mo pottuɗon wara nyaama. »
40022010	Gollooɓe ɓeen ummii njehi dow laabi ɗiin, noddi mo ɓe potti fuu. Bonɗo yahde moƴƴuɗo faa wuro jom ɓanngal oon heewi himɓe pet.
40022011	Wakkati laamiiɗo oon naatunoo faa hi'a noddaaɓe ɓeen, sey o holliri gorko gom mo ɓornaaki kolte ɓanngal ngaal.
40022012	Nden o wi'i mo : « Higo, noy naatirɗaa ɗo, dey a ɓornaaki kolte ɓanngal ngaal ? » Amma oon wi'aay mo fuy.
40022013	Sey laamiiɗo oon wi'i gollooɓe mum : « Nanngee mo, kaɓɓee juuɗe makko he koyɗe makko, paɗɗon mo toon yaasin nder nimre. Toon o woyan, omo ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe. »
40022014	Nden Iisa wi'i : —Noddaaɓe no ɗuuɗi amma suɓaaɓe ɓeen no pamɗi.
40022015	Iɓe ɗon nii sey Fariisa'en njehi ndawridowi no tunnirta Iisa ngam nanngude mo nder haalaaji mum.
40022016	Ɓe lili aahiiɓe maɓɓe gom he tokkuɓe Hirudus to Iisa. Lilaaɓe ɓeen mbi'i Iisa : —Moodibbo, miɗen anndi ko goonga tan kaalataa. Aɗa janngina laawol Alla goonga e goonga. A hulataa neɗɗo fuu, a ɓurdinaay himɓe.
40022017	Ndenne, haalan min se no hegii min kokka laamiiɗo Rooma mawɗo janngal naa hegaaki ?
40022018	Amma ngam Iisa no anndi anniyaaji maɓɓe bonɗi ɗiin. O wi'i ɓe : —Onon munafikiiɓe ! Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon tunna kam ?
40022019	Kollee kam tammal joɓirteengal janngal. Ɓe kolli mo tammal cardi gootal.
40022020	Nden o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i : —Foto moy he innde moy woni ɗo ?
40022021	Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Laamiiɗo Rooma. Sey o wi'i ɓe : —Ndenne, kokkee laamiiɗo Rooma ko jeyi, kokkon Alla duu ko jeyi.
40022022	Wakkati ɓe nanunoo ko o jaabii ɓe, ɗum haayɗini ɓe. Ɓe acci mo, ɓe ndilli.
40022023	Nder nyalooma gooto oon, himɓe gom, wonɓe nder hawriine Sadduki'en ngari to Iisa. Kamɓe ngoni yeddooɓe no mbi'a ko maayɗo fuu ummitittaako.
40022024	Ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Moodibbo, Muusa wi'iino, nde nii gorko maayi heɓaay ɓiɗɗo, minyum naa mawnum dewla deekiiko ngam heɓana mo jippotooɓe.
40022025	Waɗinoo worɓe rimdaaɓe jeɗɗo gom. Arano oon dewli, maayi, heɓaay ɓiɗɗo. Minyiiko haɓɓani deekiiko,
40022026	kam duu maayi, heɓaay ndimki. Tataɓo oon duu tokki, faa jeɗɗo ɓeen fuu maayi.
40022027	Gaɗa maayde maɓɓe, debbo oon duu maayi.
40022028	Ndenne, nyannde darŋal, moy nder jeɗɗo ɓeen laatoto goro debbo oo ? Ngam ɓe fuu kaɓɓani mo.
40022029	Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —On mboofi, ngam on paamaay ko dewte ɗeen mbi'i, on anndaa duu baawɗe Alla.
40022030	Ngam nyannde maayɓe ummitii, worɓe ndewlataa, rewɓe duu ndewlataake. Himɓe fuu no mbuuran hano no maleykaaɓe mbuurdiri nder kammu.
40022031	Wooɗi, dow haala ummitaaki maayɓe, ndenne on njanngaay ko Alla wi'i on ɗum naa ? O wi'i :
40022032	Miin woni Alla Ibrahim, Alla Isiyaaku, Alla Yakuuba. Nden Iisa ɓeydi wi'ude ɓe : —O Alla wuurɓe, o hanaa Alla maayɓe.
40022033	Wakkati himɓe nanunoo waaju makko, ɗum haayɗini ɓe sanne.
40022034	Wakkati Fariisa'en nanunoo ko Iisa jaalake Sadduki'en nder yewtere maɓɓe, sey ɓe kawri ngam ndaarodirde kaden.
40022035	Nden jannginoowo Tawreeta gom tawaaɗo nder maɓɓe ƴami Iisa ngam tunnude mo, wi'i :
40022036	—Moodibbo, tilsinoore ndeye ɓuri tilsinooje fuu semmbe nder Tawreeta ?
40022037	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : — Hiɗir Alla Joomiraawo maa he ɓerne maa fuu he yonki maa fuu he hakkillo maa fuu.
40022038	Ɗum woni tilsinoore arandere, kayre duu ɓuri semmbe.
40022039	Ndaa tilsinoore ɗiɗaɓere ndeen nii, ɗe fuu ɗe potu : Ngiɗaa gondo maa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maa.
40022040	Tawreeta he dewte annabiiɓe ɗeen fuu dow tilsinooje ɗiɗi ɗee tiggii.
40022041	Wakkati Fariisa'en kawrunoo nokkuure worre, sey Iisa ƴami ɓe, wi'i :
40022042	—Ɗume miiliɗon dow Almasiihu ? O taan moy ? Nden ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —O taan Daawda.
40022043	O wi'i ɓe kaden : —Ndenne, noy Daawda nder baawɗe Ruuhu Alla noddiri mo Joomam wakkati o wi'unoo :
40022044	Alla Joomiraawo wi'i Joomiraawo am : War, njooɗaa nyaamo am, faa mi sorna wayɓe maa ley teppere maa.
40022045	Nde nii Daawda noddiri mo Joomiraawo, ndenne, noy o laatortoo taanum tan ?
40022046	Ɓe fuu ɓe keppi jaabaade mo. Illa nyannde mum, neɗɗo fuu suusaay ƴamude mo goɗɗum kaden.
40023001	Wakkati jama'aare hawrunoo hadde Iisa, o haalani nde, kayre he aahiiɓe makko, o wi'i :
40023002	—Jannginooɓe Tawreeta he Fariisa'en, kam'en kalfinaa jannginol Tawreeta Muusa.
40023003	Ngam majjum waɗi, oɗon kaani waɗude huune fuu ko ɓe mbi'i on. Amma to nyemminee golleeji maɓɓe, ngam ɓe ngaɗataa ko ɓe mbaajotoo.
40023004	Iɓe kaɓɓa donle tedduɗe, ɗe donngal mum'en no tiiɗi, ɓe ndeka dow himɓe. Amma ɓe ngiɗaa meemirde ɗe baa daane honndu maɓɓe ngam wallude ɓe.
40023005	Huune fuu ko ɓe ngaɗata, ɓe ngaɗan ɗum ngam himɓe ngi'a. Iɓe kaɓɓa talki mawɗi dow tiiɗe maɓɓe he jokkule juuɗe maɓɓe, iɓe njuutina daane kolte maɓɓe faa no ndaasoo.
40023006	Iɓe ngiɗi jooɗorɗe ɓurɗe teddude nde nii ɓe noddaama batu. Iɓe ngiɗi duu jooɗorɗe ɓurɗe teddude nder baajorɗi.
40023007	Iɓe ngiɗi sanneede cannooje tedduɗe nder luuɓe he noddireede « moodibbo ».
40023008	Amma onon, to njaɓee noddireɗon « moodibbo », ngam Moodibbo gooto tan ngooduɗon. On fuu on banndiraaɓe.
40023009	To mbi'ee neɗɗo fuu « baaba » nder duuniyaaru. Ngam Baabiraawo gooto tan ngooduɗon, gonɗo dow.
40023010	To njaɓee noddireɗon « hooreejo ». Ngam Hooreejo gooto tan ngooduɗon, kanko woni Almasiihu.
40023011	Ɓurɗo teddude hakkune mooɗon laatoo golloowo mooɗon.
40023012	Ƴettuɗo hoore mum dow, no leesintee. Leesinɗo hoore mum, no ƴettetee.
40023013	Bone saaman dow mooɗon onon jannginooɓe Tawreeta he Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon ommbana himɓe dammbugal Laamu Alla. Onon e ko'e mooɗon, on naatataa. On accataa naatooɓe naata. [
40023014	Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe Tawreeta he Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon nyaama njawdi rewɓe ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi, oɗon njunna du'aa'uuji mooɗon ngam ngi'eɗon. Ngam majjum, on kiitetee kiite naawɗe.]
40023015	Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe Tawreeta he Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon piiloo nder leyɗe, oɗon peddita maayooji ngam keɓon neɗɗo gooto tuubuɗo tokki on. Amma nde nii on keɓii mo, sey ngaɗon o laatoo ɓii-jahannama ɓurde on.
40023016	Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon wumɓe, ɗowooɓe himɓe ! Oɗon mbi'a : « Nde neɗɗo hunorake Juulirde mawne ɗum ɓolum, amma nde hunorake kaŋŋe mayre, hunayeere mum nanngan. »
40023017	Wumɓe, bahimaaɓe ! Ɗume ɓuri teddude : Kaŋŋe ɗeen naa Juulirde senɗinoore kaŋŋe ɗeen ?
40023018	Oɗon mbi'a kaden : « Nde neɗɗo hunorake sakkirde ɗum ɓolum, amma nde joomum hunorake sadaka gonɗo dow mayre oon, hunayeere mum nanngan. »
40023019	Wumɓe ! Ɗume ɓuri teddude : Sadaka oon naa sakkirde senɗinoore sadaka oon ?
40023020	Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu kunoriiɗo sakkirde ndeen, hunorake nde, kayre he huune fuu ko yowaa dow mayre.
40023021	Neɗɗo fuu kunoriiɗo Juulirde ndeen, hunorake nde, kayre he Alla gonɗo nder mayre.
40023022	Neɗɗo fuu kunoriiɗo kammu, hunorake jooɗorgal Alla ngaal he Jooɗiiɗo dow maggal.
40023023	Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe Tawreeta he Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon ittana Alla jakka baa dow kaakooli mbelɗi ɗi ndemoton hano mantu, anisa he kume. Amma oɗon njeeboo ko ɓuri huune fuu teddude nder tilsinooje Tawreeta : Kanƴe ngoni dartinaaku, yurmeene he goonɗinol. Ɗum kaanuɗon waɗude tawee on mboppaay ɗiito duu.
40023024	Onon wumɓe ardiiɓe himɓe ! Oɗon cuuta buubel, amma oɗon moɗa ngolooba !
40023025	Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe Tawreeta he Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon lawƴa gaɗa kore e gaɗa le'e mooɗon, amma har nder iɗe keewi golleeji mooɗon bonɗi, gineeji guyka e kiram.
40023026	Fariisaajo bumɗo ! Lawƴu nder kore ɗeen ginan, nden gaɗa majje duu laaɓan.
40023027	Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe Tawreeta he Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon nanndi he annyeeje dawninaaɗe, ɗe dow mum'en no mbooɗi, tawee nder toon no heewi gi'e maayɓe he ko tuuni fuu.
40023028	Onon duu, hano non nga'uɗon : He hitere oɗon nanndi dartiiɓe, amma nder mooɗon no heewi pet he munafikaaku he rafi dartinaaku.
40023029	Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe Tawreeta he Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon nyiɓana annabiiɓe annyeeje lobbe, oɗon peɗa annyeeje dartiiɓe.
40023030	Oɗon mbi'a : « Nde nii min pottiino he jamaanu maamiraaɓe amin, nden min kaɓɓiditaano daane he maɓɓe nder barol annabiiɓe. »
40023031	Nii kollirɗon ko onon he ko'e mooɗon on jippotooɓe he warunooɓe annabiiɓe.
40023032	Ndenne, kuumnee ko maamiraaɓe mooɗon puɗɗunoo !
40023033	Firsooje, ɓiɓɓe bolle bonɗe ! Noy ndaɗirton kiite jahannama ?
40023034	Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo lilda on annabiiɓe, jom'en hikmaaku he jannginooɓe Tawreeta. On mbaran woɓɓe maɓɓe, tonton woɓɓe nder maɓɓe, ɓoccon woɓɓe maɓɓe nder baajorɗi mooɗon, oɗon tokkitii ɓe wuro warde wuro oɗon tampina ɓe.
40023035	Ndenne, onon Alla tampinta ngam sabbu yonkiiji dartiiɓe ittaaɗi nder duuniyaaru nduu ɗiin. Illa Haabiila dartiiɗo oon faa wara he Jakariya ɓii-Barakiya mo mbarnoɗon caka Juulirde mawne he sakkirde oon.
40023036	Goonga kaalananmi on : Kiite majjum fuu saaman dow himɓe jamaanu oo !
40023037	—Hey Ursaliima ! Ursaliima, huɓeere warude annabiiɓe. A wariri lilaaɓe he maaɗa kaaƴe ! Mi muuyi kile keewɗe hawrude ɓiɓɓe maa hano no gortogal hawrirta coppi mum ley bippoole nii. Amma a jaɓaay.
40023038	Joonin kam nii ɓaade mooɗon no ɗon no woppee. Neɗɗo fuu jooɗotaako nder, nde laatotoo winnde.
40023039	Miɗo wi'a on : On ngi'ataa kam illa joonin faa wara wakkati mo mbi'oyton : Barkinaaɗo woni garɗo dow innde Joomiraawo !
40024001	Wakkati Iisa wurtinoo nder Juulirde mawne ndeen, sey aahiiɓe makko ɓadii mo, kolli mo nyibdi mayre.
40024002	Nden o haalani ɓe, o wi'i : —On ngi'ii kujje ɗee fuu naa ? Goonga kaalananmi on : Baa hayre worre hoddataako no deki dow wonnde. Ndi fuu ndi liɓetee.
40024003	Wakkati Iisa jooɗinoo dow waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun ndeen, sey aahiiɓe ɓeen ngari to makko kam'en tan, mbi'i mo : —Haalan min nde ɗum waɗata ? Alaama oye hollata gartol maa, he timmoode duuniyaaru ?
40024004	Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Kakkilee to neɗɗo fuu majjina on.
40024005	Ngam heewɓe no ngardan innde am, iɓe mbi'a : « Miin woni Almasiihu. » Ɓe majjina himɓe heewɓe.
40024006	On nanan habaru konuuji naa siri majji, amma to kulee. No tilsi ɗum waɗa, amma ɗum hanaa alaama kolloowo timmoode duuniyaaru.
40024007	Lenyol habdan he lenyol, laamu habdan he laamu. Rafooji he dimmbaaki leydi ngaɗan nokku nokkuuje.
40024008	Kujje garooje ɗee fuu, nanndoytaana he fuɗɗorde ŋatawere.
40024009	Nden nanngeɗon, njaareɗon nder kiitorɗe ngam torreɗon, mbareɗon. Lenyi ɗiin fuu mbanyan on ngam sabbu am.
40024010	Wakkati mum, heewɓe nder goonɗinɓe pergoto, mboppa goonɗinol mum'en, tinnoo no njammbodira, no mbanyodira.
40024011	Annabiiɓe fewreeɓe heewɓe mbanngan, kiila himɓe heewɓe.
40024012	Bonandaaji keewan faa hidde himɓe heewɓe ɓuytoo.
40024013	Amma tarsiniiɗo faa yottii he timmoode, joomum no hisintee.
40024014	Habaru lobbo filla Laamu Alla no sankitittee nder duuniyaaru fuu, faa o fillee nder lenyol fuu. Nden duuniyaaru timma.
40024015	—On ngi'an huune bonde, ɓurne nyiddinaade nde annabi Daniyel haalunoo filla muuɗum. Huune ndee, waddetee nder nokkuure seniine ndeen. (Jannguɗo ɗum fuu faama ɗum no wooɗiri.)
40024016	Nden tawaaɓe nder Yahudiya fuu ndoggira baamle.
40024017	Tawaaɗo dow suudu fuu, to jippoo hooƴa ginol gom nder mayru.
40024018	Tawaaɗo ngesa, to yeeƴito hooƴa koltal mum.
40024019	Nder balɗe mum bone no saaman dow saawɓe he musinooɓe !
40024020	Eelee Alla to doggudu mooɗon nduun fottodir he dunngu naa nyalaane fowteteene.
40024021	Ngam nder wakkati mum, torra mawka no waɗan kaa hano mum waɗaayno illa fuɗɗorde duuniyaaru faa warde hannden. Iri makka waɗataa kaden duu faa abada.
40024022	Nde nii tawiino balɗe ɗeen raɓɓinɗinaaka, neɗɗo fuu hisataano. Amma Alla raɓɓinɗinii ɗe ngam suɓaaɓe muuɗum.
40024023	Nder wakkati mum, nde nii goɗɗo wi'i on, ndaaree Almasiihu nii ɗo naa too'en, to ngoonɗinee joomum.
40024024	Ngam almasiihuuɓe fewreeɓe he annabiiɓe fewreeɓe mbanngowan, ɓe ngaɗa alamaaji mawɗi he kaayɗe, ngam majjinde baa suɓaaɓe Alla ɓeen, nde nii no waɗoo.
40024025	Paamee ko mi haalani on ɗum illa ɗum waraay.
40024026	Nde nii on mbi'aama : « Kanko nii nder ladde yeeruure », to njehee. Naa nde nii ɓe mbi'ii on : « Kanko nii to nder cuuɗi », to ngoonɗinee.
40024027	Hano no maƴƴere yaynirta nder kammu illa lettugal faa gorgal, hano non Ɓii-Neɗɗo wardata.
40024028	To caangu woni, ɗon jigaaje kawrata.
40024029	—Gaɗa saɗɗormaaji nyalaaɗe ɗeen, sey naange niɓɓa, lewru accaa yeynude, koode caama, Alla waɗa baawɗe gonɗe dow fuu ndimmboo.
40024030	Wakkati mum, alaama Ɓii-Neɗɗo wanngata dow, ɓerɗe lenyi duuniyaaru fuu mettan. Ɓe ngi'an Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wara dow duule. Omo warda baawɗe e teddungal manngal.
40024031	Luwal manngal fuufee, nden o lila maleykaaɓe makko nder kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu, ɓe kawrowa suɓaaɓe makko, illa hoore leydi ndii faa hoore leydi ndiito.
40024032	Too, ndaaree ibbi kii, ekkitoɗon goɗɗum he makki. Nde nii licce makki keyɗitii, kaakooli makki mbilitii, oɗon anndi ko dunngu ɓadake.
40024033	Hano non kaden, nde nii on ngi'ii kujje ɗee fuu no ngara, paamee ko wakkati oon ɓadake, Ɓii-Neɗɗo no dammbugal wuro.
40024034	Goonga kaalananmi on : Jamaanu oo timmataa tawee kujje ɗee fuu ngaraay.
40024035	Kammu e leydi taggan, amma haalaaji am timmataa abada.
40024036	—Walaa annduɗo nyalaane ndeen naa wakkati mo ɗum waɗoyta, baa maleykaaɓe wonɓe dow ɓeen, naa Ɓiɗɗo oon anndaa ɗum, sey nii Baabiraawo oon tan.
40024037	Hano no ɗum waɗirnoo nder jamaanu Nuhu, hano non gartol Ɓii-Neɗɗo duu waɗirta.
40024038	Hano no fadde ndiyam tuufaana warde, himɓe no nyaama, no njara, no ɓaŋa, no ɓaŋee, faa nyannde Nuhu naati laana kaan.
40024039	Ɓe paamaay fuu nder ko ɓe ngoni, naako ndiyam tuufaana wari, yooli ɓe, ɓe fuu. Hano non duu gartol Ɓii-Neɗɗo, waɗirta.
40024040	Wakkati mum, worɓe ɗiɗo tawetee nder ngesa. Gooto hooƴee, ooto accee.
40024041	Rewɓe ɗiɗo tawetee no unida dow boɓi. Gooto hooƴee, ooto accee.
40024042	Ndenne, tinnee heɓa taweɗon on ciryiiɓe, ngam on anndaa wakkati Joomiraawo mooɗon wartoyta.
40024043	Paamee, ko nde nii jom wuro no anndi wakkati mo gujjo warta nder jemma, nden o ɗaanataakono, o acca oon naata suudu makko.
40024044	Ndenne, onon duu ciryee, to gartol Ɓii-Neɗɗo juhu on.
40024045	—Moy woni golloowo kolniiɗo, jom hakkillo ? Golloowo mo mawɗo mum halfini ɓaade mum, wi'i o hokka maccuɓe mum gom nyaamdu mum'en nder wakkati mo haani.
40024046	Belɗo hoore woni golloowo mo mawɗo mum warti, tawi no waɗa golle mum.
40024047	Goonga kaalananmi on : Mawɗo oon no halfinan mo njawdi mum fuu.
40024048	Amma nde golloowo oon no bonɗo, o wi'annoo hoore makko, mawɗo am wartilawtaa.
40024049	Sey o fuɗɗa fiyude banndiraaɓe makko gollooɓe. Omo nyaamda, omo yarda he jarooɓe.
40024050	Too, mawɗo golloowo oo no wartan nyannde nde o miilaaka.
40024051	Mawɗo makko riiwan mo, fiya mo sawru munafikiiɓe, toon o woyata omo ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe.
40025001	—Ndaa Laamu Alla nanndaana he taariihi surbaaɓe sappo, ɓe anndaa worɓe, kooƴuɓe fitillaaji mum'en njehi faa njaɓɓowoo ɓaŋuɗo gom.
40025002	Nder maɓɓe joyo ngalaa hakkillo, joyo ɓeeto duu no jom'en hakkillo.
40025003	Ɓe ngalaa hakkillo ɓeen kooƴi fitillaaji mum'en amma pantiraay nebbam.
40025004	Jom'en hakkillo ɓeen kay adi fitillaaji mum'en, ɓe njaldi nebbam nder paali maɓɓe.
40025005	Ɓaŋuɗo oon jenngi waraay, ɓe fuu ɓe ŋoŋi, sey ɓe ɗaanii.
40025006	Har caka jemma, kuuɓaali nanaa, no wi'ee : « Ɓaŋuɗo wari ! Ɓaŋuɗo wari ! Ummee njaɓɓowee mo ! »
40025007	Sey surbaaɓe ɓeen fuu pini, no moƴƴina fitillaaji mum'en.
40025008	Surbaaɓe ɓe ngalaa hakkillo ɓeen mbi'i jom'en hakkillo ɓeen : « Kokkaree min seɗɗa he nebbam mooɗon, fitillaaji amin no ɗon no nyifa. »
40025009	Jom'en hakkillo ɓeen njaabii, mbi'i : « Ɗam heƴataa en, en fuu. Njehee to sonnooɓe ɓeen, coodowon no ɓuri ! »
40025010	Wakkati ɓe mburtii, ɓe coodowi nebbam, sey ɓaŋuɗo oon yottii. Siryiiɓe taɓɓitaade mo ɓeen naatidi he makko nder batu nguun, nden dammbugal ngal ommbaa.
40025011	Ɓooyi seɗɗa gaɗa mum, sey surbaaɓe wurtiiɓe ɓeen ngarti, tawi ingal ommbii. Ɓe tiimi iɓe nodda, iɓe mbi'a : « Moodibbo, Moodibbo ! Omtan min ! »
40025012	Amma ɓaŋuɗo oon jaabii ɓe, wi'i : « Goonga kaalananmi on : Mi anndaa on. »
40025013	Nden Iisa sakitii wi'i ɓe : —Kakkilee ndenne, ngam on anndaa nyalaane ndeen naa wakkati oon.
40025014	—Laamu Alla no nanndi he gorko gom gaɗuɗo jahaangal, noddi gollooɓe mum, halfini ɓe njawdi mum.
40025015	Gooto nder maɓɓe o halfini ɗum cabbi kaŋŋe keme joy, ooto o halfini ɗum cabbi keme ɗiɗi, tataɓo oon cabbi hemre. Neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu dey-dey he ko waawi, gaɗa mum o dilli.
40025016	Wakkati mum da, kalfinaaɗo cabbi kaŋŋe keme joy oon yehi luumorii ɗi, heɓi cabbi keme joy gom.
40025017	Jom keme ɗiɗi oon duu, luumorii ɗi mum, heɓi kam duu cabbi keme ɗiɗi gom.
40025018	Amma jom cabbi hemre oon kay wasoy ngayka non, ufi ko hokkanoo ɗum fuu.
40025019	Ɓooyi seɗɗa gaɗa majjum, sey nyannde gom mawɗo maɓɓe warti, noddi ɓe, ngam daara, hiiso ceede ɗeen.
40025020	Kalfinaaɗo cabbi kaŋŋe keme joy oon wari, waddi cabbi keme joy gom, wi'i : « Joomam, a halfinii kam cabbi keme joy. Ndaa, mi luumorake ɗi, mi heɓi cabbi keme joy gom. »
40025021	Sey joomiiko wi'i mo : « Gasii. A golloowo lobbo, kolniiɗo. Ngam a hilnake ko famɗi, mi halfinte ko ɗuuɗi. War naatu, mbelniden ! »
40025022	Kalfinaaɗo cabbi keme ɗiɗi oon duu wari, wi'i : « Joomam, a halfinii kam cabbi kaŋŋe keme ɗiɗi. Ndaa, mi lumtorake ɗi, mi heɓi cabbi keme ɗiɗi gom. »
40025023	Sey joomiiko wi'i mo : « Gasii. A golloowo lobbo, kolniiɗo. Ngam a hilnake ko famɗi, mi halfinte ko ɗuuɗi. War naatu, mbelniden ! »
40025024	Kalfinaaɗo cabbi kaŋŋe hemre oon wari, kam duu, wi'i : « Joomam, miɗo anndi a gorko cattuɗo. Aɗa hetta ko a aawaay. Aɗa ɓotta ko a hawraay.
40025025	Ngam majjum waɗi, kulumi, njehumi, ufoymi kaŋŋe maa. Joonin, ndaa cabbi maaɗa nii. »
40025026	Sey joomiiko jaabii mo, wi'i : « Bonɗo, jaayɗo ! Janɗo ! Aɗa anndi miɗo hetta ko mi aawaay, miɗo ɓotta ko mi hawraay ?
40025027	Nde nii a wattiino kaŋŋe am ɗeen nder banki, faa nde ngartumi, nden ɗe ngaddanan kam riiba.
40025028	Joonin, teetee cabbi kaŋŋe hemre ɗiin, kokkon ɗi jom keme joy oon.
40025029	Ngam jogiiɗo fuu no ɓeydantee faa heewa. Amma mo walaa oon, baa seɗɗa mo jogii oon, no teetetee.
40025030	Paɗɗee golloowo jaayɗo oo yaasin nder nimre. Toon, o tinnotoo omo woya, omo ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe. »
40025031	—Wakkati Ɓii-Neɗɗo wardi he teddungal mum, he maleykaaɓe mum fuu, o jooɗoto dow jooɗorgal laamu makko teddungal.
40025032	Himɓe duuniyaaru fuu no kawretee yeeso makko, o senndan ɓe, no duroowo senndirta baali he be'i mum.
40025033	O wartiran baali ɗiin har junngo makko nyaamo, o wartira be'i ɗiin har nano makko.
40025034	Wakkati mum Laamiiɗo oon wi'a wonɓe nyaamo makko : « Ngaree, onon ɓe Baabiraawo am barkini, ndonee laamu ngu ndesanaɗon illa tagol duuniyaaru.
40025035	Ngam mi rafanooma, on nyamnii kam. Mi ɗomɗiino, on njarnii kam. Mi laatakeno beero, on mbernii kam.
40025036	Mi walaano koltal, on koltinii kam. Mi nyawiino, on kilnake kam. Mi uddanooma, on ndaarowii kam. »
40025037	Nder wakkati mum, dartiiɓe ɓeen njaabotoo mo, mbi'a : « Joomiraawo, wakkati oye min ngi'ii ndafeɗaa, min nyamnii ma, naa wakkati oye ɗomɗeɗaa, min njarnii ma ?
40025038	Wakkati oye min ngi'ii a beero, min mbernii ma, naa a walaa koltal, min koltinii ma ?
40025039	Naa wakkati oye min ngi'ii a nyawɗo naa a uddaama, min ndaarowii ma ? »
40025040	Sey Laamiiɗo oon jaaboo ɓe wi'a : « Goonga kaalananmi on : Ko ngaɗanɗon gooto nder ɓurɗo famɗude nder banndiraaɓe am fuu, miin ngaɗanɗon. »
40025041	Gaɗa mum, o wi'an wonɓe nano makko : « Mboɗɗee kam, onon naalaaɓe ! Njehee nder hiite duumiinge, nge Alla resani Ibiliisa he maleykaaɓe tokkuɓe mo !
40025042	Ngam mi rafaama, on nyamnaay kam. Mi ɗomɗaama, on njarnaay kam.
40025043	Mi weeraniino on, on njippinaay kam. Mi walaano koltal, on koltinaay kam. Mi nyawiino, mi uddanooma, on ngaraay ndaaruɗon kam. »
40025044	Sey ɓe njaaboo mo kamɓe duu, ɓe mbi'a : « Joomiraawo, wakkati oye min ngi'ii ndafeɗaa, naa ɗomɗeɗaa, naa mbeeruɗaa, naa a holtaay, naa nyawɗaa, naa uddeɗaa, min mballaay ma ? »
40025045	Wakkati mum sey o jaaboo ɓe o wi'a : « Goonga kaalananmi on : Ko on ngaɗanaay gooto nder ɓurɓe famɗude ɓee, miin woni on ngaɗanaay. »
40025046	Himɓe ɓee, ngoni naatooɓe nder torra duumiiɗo, amma dartiiɓe ɓeen duu ngoni keɓooɓe mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
40026001	Wakkati Iisa timminnoo waaju mum, o wi'i aahiiɓe makko :
40026002	—Oɗon anndi ko balɗe ɗiɗi kori he Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe, Ɓii-Neɗɗo hokkitirtee ngam tontee dow leggal bardugal.
40026003	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla e mawɓe Yahudankooɓe kawri wuro mawɗo mawɓe cakkanoowo Alla gom bi'eteeɗo Kayafas.
40026004	Ɓe caawodiri ngam ɓe keɓa no ɓe kiiliri Iisa ɓe nannga, ɓe mbara mo.
40026005	Amma ɓe mbi'i : —To en ngaɗu ɗum wakkati juulɗe ɗeen, ngam to himɓe murtu.
40026006	Wakkati Iisa wonnoo Baytaniya nder ɓaade Simon inndirteeɗo Simon Ceppinnga,
40026007	debbo gom ɓadii mo no jogii faanu nebbam uurɗam, caadiɗam sanne. O tawi Iisa no nyaama, o joorti ɗam dow hoore makko.
40026008	Wakkati aahiiɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo ɗum, ɓerɗe maɓɓe metti, iɓe mbi'a : —Ɗum bonnere, ɗume ɗum nafata ?
40026009	Iɗam waawi sonneede ceede ɗuɗɗe, ɗe kokkee talkaaɓe.
40026010	Iisa faami ko ɓe ngoni iɓe kaala, nden o wi'i ɓe : —Ko waɗi ko oɗon torra debbo oo ? Ko o waɗani kam ɗum no wooɗi sanne.
40026011	Talkaaɓe no tawdee he mooɗon wakkati fuu. Amma miin, mi tawdataake he mooɗon wakkati fuu.
40026012	O wuji nebbam uurɗam ɗam he ɓanndu am ngam siryaade mooɓol am.
40026013	Goonga kaalananmi on, nokku fuu to Habaru lobbo oo waajaa nder duuniyaaru, ko debbo oo waɗi ɗum no filletee ngam miccitaade he makko.
40026014	Yahuuda Iskariyot, gooto nder lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, yehi to mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen,
40026015	wi'i ɓe : —Ɗume kokkoton kam nde nii mi watti Iisa nder juuɗe mooɗon ? Nden ɓe kokki mo tammaaje cardi woronja.
40026016	Illa nyannde mum, Yahuuda no tefa, no jammborii Iisa.
40026017	Nyalooma arano Juulɗe buuru mo walaa ƴuufinirɗum, aahiiɓe ɓeen ngari to Iisa, ƴami mo, mbi'i : —Toy ngiɗaa min ciryanowe hiraane Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe ?
40026018	O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Njehee nder huɓeere to waane, mbi'on mo : « Moodibbo wi'i, wakkati oon yonii. Nder ɓaade maaɗa kam waɗata Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe ɗeen, kanko he aahiiɓe makko. »
40026019	Sey aahiiɓe ɓeen ngaɗi ko Iisa wi'i ɓe, ɓe ciryii hiraane ndeen.
40026020	Futuro, wakkati naange yanunoo, Iisa jooɗodii he lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen iɓe ndoomi hiraane ndeen.
40026021	Wakkati ɓe kiirtotonoo ndeen, o wi'i : —Goonga kaalananmi on : Gooto nder mooɗon no jammboto kam.
40026022	Sey ɓe ɓalinii sanne, ɓe keddii iɓe ƴama mo gooto gooto, neɗɗo fuu no wi'a mo : —Moodibbo, kori hanaa miin non ?
40026023	O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Cuuwidiɗɗo he am junngo mum nder le'al ngaal, oon jammbotoo kam.
40026024	Ɓii-Neɗɗo accan duuniyaaru hano no ɗum winndiraa dow makko nder dewte. Amma bone saaman dow jammbotooɗo mo ! Joomum nde nii rimaakano, nden no ɓurananoo ɗum.
40026025	Yahuuda jammboytooɗo mo oon fiirti hunnduko, ƴami mo, wi'i : —Moodibbo, kori hanaa miin non ? O jaabii mo, o wi'i : —Aan haali he hunnduko maa.
40026026	Wakkati ɓe nyaamannoo ndeen, Iisa hooƴi buuru, yetti Alla, helti mo, hokki aahiiɓe mum, wi'i : —Njaɓee, nyaamee. Ɗum woni ɓanndu am.
40026027	Gaɗa mum, o hooƴi nyeɗerde cabiijam, o yetti Alla, o hokki ɓe, o wi'i : —Njaree, on fuu.
40026028	Ɗum woni ƴiiƴam am tabbintinoojam amaana Alla, ƴiiƴam ndufeteeɗam ngam hakkeeji himɓe heewɓe njaafee.
40026029	Miɗo haalana on : Mi yarataa cabiijam ɗam kaden, sey nii nyannde njardowanmi kesam gom he mooɗon nder Laamu Baabiraawo am.
40026030	Gaɗa ɓe njimi jimi Jabuura, ɓe mburtii, ɓe njehi dow waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun.
40026031	Dow waamnde ndeen Iisa wi'i aahiiɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen : —Nder jemma oo, on fuu on mboppan kam, ngam no winndaa, wi'aa : Mi fiyan duroowo oon, sewre baali ndeen sankitoo.
40026032	Sey o wi'i ɓe kaden : —Nde mi ummitake, mi artan on Galili.
40026033	Nden Piyer itti hunnduko, wi'i mo : —Baa nde nii ɓe fuu ɓe pergake, ɓe mboppi ma, miin kay, abada mi woppataa ma.
40026034	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Goonga kaalananmaami : Nder jemma oo, fadde ndontoori jogginde, a wi'an a anndaa kam kile tati !
40026035	Sey Piyer wi'i mo : —Baa nde a maayan non, mi maaydan he maaɗa, abada mi wi'ataa mi anndaa ma. Non aahiiɓe ɓeeto duu mbi'i.
40026036	Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ummii, njehi nokkuure wi'eteene Gesemaane, toon o wi'i ɓe : —Njooɗee ɗo, faa mi du'owo.
40026037	O yahdi Piyer he ɓiɓɓe Jebede ɗiɗo ɓeen Yakuuba he Yahaaya. Iɓe ɗon nii sey taƴo-taƴo fuɗɗi nanngude mo, ɓillaare naatani mo sanne.
40026038	Sey o wi'i ɓe : —Bononda ɓerne am ɗuuɗi sanne faa no tefa warude kam. Ndaree ɗo, ndoomee, kakkilee to on ɗaanee.
40026039	O woɗɗi ɓe seɗɗa, o turni yeeso makko faa he leydi, omo du'oo, omo wi'a : —Baaba, nde nii tawi iɗum waɗoo, woɗɗinam nyeɗerde torra kaa. To ɗum laatoo muuyɗe am, amma ɗum laatoo muuyɗe maa aan.
40026040	Gaɗa mum o warti, o tawi aahiiɓe makko no ɗaanii. O wi'i Piyer : —Jaa on mbaawaa doomude kam baa nii yamnde worre naa ?
40026041	Ummee, ndu'ee, to on caamu nder cii'aaki. Ɓerne no hiɗi amma ɓanndu tampi.
40026042	O soƴƴii kaden, o du'ii, o wi'i : —Baaba, nde nii tawi nyeɗerde torra kaa waawtaa woɗɗi kam, sey nii mi yarii nde. Too ! Muuyɗe maa laato.
40026043	O warti, o tawi iɓe ɗaanii kaden, ɗoyngol maɓɓe moddi sanne.
40026044	O soƴƴii kaden, o du'owii nde tataɓere, hano no o du'orinoo illa arannde nii.
40026045	Gaɗa mum, o warti to aahiiɓe makko, o wi'i ɓe : —Oɗon ɗaanii, oɗon powta naa ? Ndaaree, wakkati oon yottake ! Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wattetee nder juuɗe waɗooɓe hakke.
40026046	Ummee, ndillen ! Ndaa, jammbotooɗo kam oon nii, no wara !
40026047	Iisa no caka haala, sey Yahuuda, gooto nder lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, yottii no wondi he jama'aare mawne. Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe lili ɓe, iɓe njogii takubaaje he cabbi.
40026048	Tawi Yahuuda jammbotooɗo mo oon tinndinnoo ɓe wi'i : —Mo mbunndotoomi oon kam woni mo. Nanngon mo.
40026049	No ɓe njottorii, sey o fa'i to Iisa, o wi'i : —Foofoo, Moodibbo ! Nden o wunndii mo.
40026050	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Giɗo am, waɗu ko waddi ma. Wakkati mum da, ɓe ɓadii Iisa, ɓe caami dow makko, ɓe nanngi mo.
40026051	Gooto nder wondunooɓe he Iisa ɓeen sorti takubaahi mum, soppi gollanoowo mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla fuu, taƴi nowru makko.
40026052	Nden, Iisa wi'i mo : —Soornu takubaahi maa nder hulgo mum, ngam kaɓidoowo he takubaahi fuu, takubaahi warata ɗum.
40026053	Oɗon miiloo joonin ko mi waawaa tefude balla to Baaba am naa ? O lilda kam jonnda maleykaaɓe ɓurɓe cefe soogeeji sappo he ɗiɗi.
40026054	Too, amma nde nii mi waɗi ɗum, noy ko winndaa nder dewte ɗum tabbitirta ?
40026055	Wakkati mum, o wi'i jama'aare ndeen : —Ko waɗi ngarduɗon takubaaje e cabbi faa nanngon kam hano miin woni mawɗo murtuɓe ? Wakkati fuu miɗo wondunoo he mooɗon nder Juulirde mawne, miɗo waajoo, on nanngaay kam.
40026056	Amma ɗum fuu, ɗum waɗan ngam ko dewte annabiiɓe kaali ɗum tabbita. Wakkati aahiiɓe makko ɓeen nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, ɓe fuu ɓe ndoggi ɓe mboppi Iisa.
40026057	Nanngunooɓe Iisa ɓeen njaari Iisa to Kayafas mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla fuu. Tawi jannginooɓe Tawreeta he mawɓe Isra'ilankooɓe kawri.
40026058	Amma Piyer toowti ɓe seɗɗa, tokkitii ɓe, naako nder batamaare ɓaade mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon. O naati nder ɓaade ndeen, o jooɗii hadde doomooɓe ɓaade ndeen ngam o hi'a no ɗum sakitortoo.
40026059	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he hawriine dawrooɓe no tefa fewre nde peliri Iisa ngam o waree.
40026060	Himɓe heewɓe ngari seedanaade mo dow fewre, amma ɗum fuu waɗaay ɓe keɓa no ɓe mbarirta mo. Ko sakitii worɓe ɗiɗo gom ngari,
40026061	mbi'i : —Kanko wi'unoo omo waawi liɓude Juulirde meeɗen mawne, o nyiɓitoo nde nder balɗe tati.
40026062	Nden mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon ummii, wi'i Iisa : —Ɗume njaabotoɗaa dow ko himɓe ɓee mbi'i ?
40026063	Iisa wi'aay baafuy. Nden mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon wi'i mo kaden : —Mi eelirii ma innde Alla duumiiɗo, kaalanaa min ko aan a Almasiihu Ɓii-Alla.
40026064	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Aan, e hoore maaɗa wi'i ka. Kaden, miɗo wi'a on : Illa joonin, on ngi'an Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jooɗii nyaamo Jom baawɗe, no wara dow duule.
40026065	Mone majjum wari mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon faa o serki kolte makko, o wi'i : —O bonni innde Alla ! Walaa fuu ko kaajaɗon seedaade dow makko kaden ! On narrii noppi mooɗon ko o bonni innde Alla.
40026066	Ɗume miiliɗon ? Sey ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i omo haani wareede.
40026067	Nder maɓɓe woɓɓe kaarti, tutti dow yeeso Iisa, woɓɓe duu luƴƴii mo.
40026068	Nder maɓɓe woɓɓe peenyii mo, no mbi'a : —Hey Almasiihu ! Nde nii a annabiijo, haalan min moy fiyi ma !
40026069	Piyer no jooɗii yaasin nder batamaare ɓaade ndeen. Sey korɗo ɓaade ndeen gom ɓadii mo, wi'i : —Aan duu, aɗa wondunoo ɓii-Galili oo.
40026070	Hakkune himɓe fuu sey Piyer yeddi, wi'i : —Mi faamaay ko kaalataa.
40026071	Wakkati Piyer fonndinoo har dammbugal ɓaade ndeen, sey korɗo gom hi'i mo, wi'i wonɓe ɗon ɓeen : —Gorko oo no wondunoo he Iisa mo Nasaratu.
40026072	Sey Piyer yeddi kaden, huni wi'i : —Mi anndaa gorko oo.
40026073	Ɓooyi seɗɗa gaɗa mum, sey dariiɓe ɗon ɓeen ɓadii Piyer, mbi'i mo : —Sikka fuu walaa, nder maɓɓe njeyaɗaa, ngam ɗemngal maaɗa ngal tabbintinta ɗum.
40026074	Sey Piyer fuɗɗi hunaade no huniitoo no wi'a : —Mi anndaa gorko oo ! Wakkati mum da, ndontoori joggini.
40026075	Nden Piyer miccitii ko Iisa wi'unoo ɗum : —Fadde ndontoori jogginde, a wi'an a anndaa kam kile tati. Nden Piyer darii yaasin tinni no wulla no wulla.
40027001	Illa beete, mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe kawri, kaɓɓi anniya mbara Iisa.
40027002	Ɓe kaɓɓi mo, ɓe njaari, ɓe ngatti nder juuɗe Pilaatus kawjiiɗo leydi Yahudiya.
40027003	Wakkati Yahuuda jammbiiɗo Iisa oon hi'unoo no Iisa hiitira kiite maayde, o nimsiti. O wartiri tammaaje cardi woronja ɗeen to mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe ɓeen.
40027004	O wi'i ɗum'en : —Mi waɗi hakke ngam mi jammbake mo waɗaay gacce fuu faa o waree ! Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Ko hilli min ! Aan ɗum daarata.
40027005	Yahuuda faɗɗi tammaaje ɗeen nder Juulirde mawne ndeen, dilli, hooƴowi ɓoggol, wari hoore mum.
40027006	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen kooƴi tammaaje ɗeen, mbi'i : —Dagaaki tammaaje ɗe ngattee nder keesuwal, ngam ɗe njobdi ƴiiƴam.
40027007	Nden ɓe caawodiri dow majje, ɓe kooƴi ɗe, ɓe coodowi nokkuure gom wi'eteene ngesa mahoowo looɗe. Ɓe ngaɗi nga annyeeje ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe.
40027008	Ngam majjum waɗi faa warde hannden ngesa ngaan no wi'ee « Ngesa Ƴiiƴam ».
40027009	Ɗum humnii haala ka annabi Yeremiya haalunoo mbi'unooka : Ɓe kooƴi tammaaje cardi woronja, ceede ɗe himɓe Isra'el kiisorii yonki makko,
40027010	ɓe coodiri ɗe ngesa mahoowo looɗe, hano no Joomiraawo wi'iri kam ɗum nii.
40027011	Iisa darii yeeso Pilaatus kawjiiɗo leydi Yahudiya oon. Oon ƴami mo, wi'i : —Aan a laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe naa ? Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Aan, e hoore maaɗa wi'i ka.
40027012	Amma wakkati mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe pelannoo mo ndeen, o nootaaki ɓe.
40027013	Nden Pilaatus wi'i mo kaden : —A nanaay ko woni no wi'ee dow maaɗa ɗum fuu naa ?
40027014	Iisa nootaaki mo baa. Ɗum haayɗini Pilaatus sanne.
40027015	He Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe fuu, Pilaatus kawjiiɗo leydi Yahudiya no woowi yoofande Yahudankooɓe kasunke gooto mo ɓe ngiɗi yoofee.
40027016	Nder wakkati mum, no woodunoo kasunke bonɗo gom, bi'eteeɗo [Iisa] Barabas gaɗɗo innde sanne.
40027017	Wakkati jama'aare ndeen warunoo sey Pilaatus ƴami ɓe, wi'i : —Moy ngiɗuɗon mi yoofana on : [Iisa] Barabas, naa Iisa bi'oowo kam no Almasiihu ?
40027018	Ngam hakiika, Pilaatus no anndi ko haasidaaku waɗi ɓe ngaddi Iisa to mum.
40027019	Wakkati Pilaatus jooɗinoo nder suudu kiite nduun, jom suudu makko lili he makko, wi'i o sela gorko dartiiɗo oo, ngam hankin koyɗi ɗi o waɗi dow makko ɗiin tampinii mo sanne.
40027020	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe uppi jama'aare ndeen, eela Pilaatus yoofana ɓe Barabas, amma o wara Iisa.
40027021	Pilaatus ƴamtinii ɓe, wi'i : —Moy nder ɗiɗo ɓeen ngiɗuɗon mi yoofana on ? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Barabas !
40027022	Pilaatus ƴami ɓe, wi'i : —Dey noy ngaɗanmi Iisa bi'eteeɗo Almasiihu oon ? Ɓe fuu ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Tontu mo dow bardugal !
40027023	O ƴami ɓe, o wi'i : —Dey ɗume o waɗi ko foti nii fuu ? Nden ɓe kuuɓi sanne, ɓe mbi'i : —Tontu mo dow bardugal !
40027024	Pilaatus hi'i walaa fuu ko kam waawi, omo hula duu murtol ummoo. Sey o hooƴi ndiyam, o looti juuɗe makko yeeso himɓe fuu, o wi'i : —Miin kay, juuɗe am ngalaa hen, nder dufol ƴiiƴam gorko oo. Onon ɗum daarata.
40027025	Nden ɓe fuu ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i : —Hakke dufol ƴiiƴam makko no dow amin, minen he ɓiɓɓe amin !
40027026	Nden, Pilaatus yoofani ɓe Barabas, hokki laawol Iisa ɓoccee, gaɗa mum, o tontowee dow leggal bardugal.
40027027	Illa ɗon soogeeji kawjiiɗo leydi Yahudiya ɗiin njaari Iisa nder batamaare ɓaade Pilaatus. Ɓe ngaddi sewre soogeeji gom piilii mo.
40027028	Ɓe ɓorti kolte makko, ɓe ɓornii mo alkubbaare woɗeere.
40027029	Ɓe canyi taarde gi'e, ɓe kippi dow hoore makko, ɓe ngatti loocol nder junngo makko nyaamo. Nden ɓe kofi yeeso makko, iɓe njawoo mo iɓe mbi'a : —Alla sabbinane, laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe !
40027030	Ɓe kaarti dow makko, ɓe kooƴi loocol iɓe piya mo dow hoore.
40027031	Wakkati ɓe njawinoo mo faa heƴi ɓe, ɓe itti alkubbaare ndeen, ɓe ɓornii mo kolte makko. Ɓe njaari mo yaasin faa ɓe tontowa mo.
40027032	Wakkati ɓe njahannoo ndeen, sey ɓe potti he gorko gom jeyaaɗo Sirene bi'eteeɗo Simon. Soogeeji ɗiin tilsini mo o wakkoo leggal bardugal Iisa ngaal.
40027033	O wakkii ngal faa ɓe njottii nokkuure gom wi'eteene Golgota. Maana Golgota woni « nokkuure laalagal hoore ».
40027034	Toon ɓe kokki Iisa cabiijam kawrodiriɗam he safaare haaɗune gom ngam o yara. Wakkati o wooɓunoo ɗam ndeen, o salii yarude ɗam.
40027035	Wakkati ɓe tontunoo mo ndeen, ɓe piyi caaca ngam senndude kolte makko caka maɓɓe.
40027036	Gaɗa mum, ɓe njooɗii, ɓe ndoomi mo.
40027037	Sabaabu gaɗɗo ɓe tonti mo, winndaa dow alluwal ɓe takki ngal dow timtude hoore makko. Ndaa ko winndaa nii : « Oo woni Iisa, Laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe. »
40027038	O tontidaama he wuyɓe ɗiɗo gom, oo no nyaamo, ooto duu no nano makko.
40027039	Yawtooɓe har toon ɓeen no njenna mo, no njinnga ko'e mum'en,
40027040	no mbi'a : —Aan Liɓoowel Juulirde mawne, dey nyiɓitoo nde nder balɗe tati, dannu hoore maa ! Nde nii a Ɓii-Alla, jippa dow leggal bardugal ngaal !
40027041	Noon duu, mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla, jannginooɓe Tawreeta e mawɓe Yahudankooɓe tinni no njaltinoo mo hakkune mum'en, no mbi'a :
40027042	—O dannii woɓɓe, dey o waawaa dannude hoore makko. Oo woni Laamiiɗo Isra'el naa ? Nde nii o jippake joonin joonin, en ngoonɗinan mo !
40027043	O halfinii hoore makko Alla. Too, joonin nde Alla no hiɗi mo, hisinan mo, ngam nii o wi'i o Ɓii-Alla.
40027044	Wuyɓe pasotooɓe tontidaaɓe he makko ɓeen duu, no njennira mo non.
40027045	Caka nyalooma, nimre huuri leydi ndiin fuu faa ɗum waɗi jamɗe tati.
40027046	Har yamnde tati juura, Iisa fii wullaanu mawnu, wi'i : Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani ? Kam woni : Yaa Alla am ! Yaa Alla am ! Ɗume waɗi ko mboppuɗaa kam ?
40027047	Wakkati darinooɓe toon ɓeen nanunoo ɗum, woɓɓe nder maɓɓe mbi'i : —Kettinee, omo nii omo nodda Eliya.
40027048	Sey gooto nder maɓɓe doggi waddowi tekkere, suuwi nder ndiyam lammuɗam gom, haɓɓi nde he loocol, waddi nde hadde hunnduko Iisa ngam Iisa siiɓoo ɗam.
40027049	Amma hoddiiɓe ɓeeto mbi'i : —Accu ndaaren tawte Eliya waran danna mo.
40027050	Iisa fii wullaanu mawnu kaden, sey o foofi foofaango makko sakitiingo.
40027051	Riido palaaɗo nder Juulirde mawne oon serki illa dow faa ley, laatii pecce ɗiɗi. Leydi ndiin dimmbii, kaaƴe cerki,
40027052	annyeeji udditi. Seniiɓe maaynooɓe heewɓe ummitii,
40027053	mburtii nder annyeeje mum'en. Gaɗa ummitaaki Iisa, ɓe naatidi nder Ursaliima wuro seniingo. Himɓe heewɓe ngi'ii ɓe.
40027054	Soogeeji doomuɗi Iisa ɗiin he hooreejo majji nani no leydi ndiin dimmbiri, ngi'ii duu ko waɗi fuu, kuli sanne, mbi'i : —Sikka fuu walaa, oo Ɓii-Alla !
40027055	Rewɓe heewɓe tokkunooɓe mo, illa Galili ngam ɓe ngollana mo no ndarii to toowti, no ndaara.
40027056	Nder maɓɓe no tawa Mariyaama mo Magdaala, Mariyaama inna Yakuuba e Yusufu, he inna ɓiɓɓe Jebede.
40027057	Futuro, gorko jom njawdi gom jeyaaɗo wuro Arimatiya wari. Omo wi'ee Yusufu. Kanko duu, o aahiijo Iisa.
40027058	O yehi to Pilaatus, o ŋaarii mo ɓanndu Iisa. Pilaatus hokki laawol o hokkee ndu.
40027059	O hooƴi ɓanndu nduun, o fiili ndu nder kasanke.
40027060	O watti ndu nder annyeere heyre nde o seɓanii hoore makko nder tepaare mawne gom. Nden o waɗi kaaƴa mannga gom tallitaa, dammbugal annyeere ndeen uddaa, o dilli.
40027061	Mariyaama mo Magdaala he bi'eteeɗo Mariyaama gom no njooɗii, no kuccitii annyeere ndeen.
40027062	Jaangoore mum woni nyalaane fowteteene. Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he Fariisa'en kawri to Pilaatus,
40027063	mbi'i mo : —Alla sabbinane, min miccitake ko kiiloowo himɓe oon, wakkati wuurunoo wi'iino, ko kam no ummitittoo balɗe tati gaɗa maayde mum.
40027064	Ndenne, ngaɗaa annyeere ndeen ndoomee faa balɗe tati ɗeen njawta, ngam to aahiiɓe makko ngaru, mbujja ɓanndu makko mbi'a himɓe o ummitake e maayde. Nden kay, hiila cakitittooɗo oon, no ɓuran arandeejo oon bonde.
40027065	Nden Pilaatus jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Ndaa soogeeji doomooji ɗiin nii. Njehee, ndoomon annyeere ndeen no mbaawruɗon fuu.
40027066	Ɓe njehi, ɓe ndoomowi annyeere ndeen. Ɓe pii kaatimiije laamiiɗo Rooma dow mayre, ngam faamee se nde fiirtaama. Ɓe ngatti soogeeji ndaara nde.
40028001	Alal, gaɗa nyalaane fowteteene ndeen, illa subaka kecco, Mariyaama mo Magdaala he Mariyaama gom njehi ndaarowi annyeere ndeen.
40028002	Wakkati mum da, leydi dimmbii sanne. Maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom jippii, talliti kaaƴa ngaan jooɗii dow magga.
40028003	Omo ƴelkiɗaa hano maƴƴere, kolte makko duu no ndawni tarr hano haabu.
40028004	Doomooɓe ɓeen kuli sanne faa no ndiwna, ɓe laatii hano maayɓe.
40028005	Sey maleykaajo oon wi'i rewɓe ɓeen : —To kulee ! Miɗo anndi Iisa tontanooɗo oon tefoton.
40028006	Amma o walaa ɗo, o ummitake hano no o wi'irnoo ɗum nii. Ngaree, ndaaree nokkuure to o fukkinaa nii.
40028007	Dey njaawɗee, njehee, kumpitowoɗon aahiiɓe makko mbi'on o ummitake. Wooɗi, joonin o artan on Galili, toon ngi'oyton mo. Ɗum njoginoomi faa mi haalana on.
40028008	Rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen ummii, ndilli to annyeere ndeen. Kulal manngal he welwelo manngo heewi ɓe. Ɓe ndoggi, ɓe kaalanowi aahiiɓe Iisa ɓeeto habaru oon.
40028009	Wakkati mum da, Iisa fotti he maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe : —Foofo mooɗon ! Ɓe ɓadii mo, ɓe nanngi koyɗe makko, ɓe cujidani mo.
40028010	Nden o wi'i ɓe : —To kulee ! Njehee mbi'owee giɗaaɓe am, ɓe njaha Galili. Toon ɓe ngi'oyta kam.
40028011	Wakkati rewɓe ɓeen ndillannoo ndeen, soogeeji doomuɗi annyeere Iisa ndeen kooti, kaalanowi mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen huune fuu ko waɗi.
40028012	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe caawodiri, kokki soogeeji ɗiin ceede ɗuɗɗe,
40028013	mbi'i : —Mbi'on aahiiɓe makko ngari nder jemma tawi oɗon ɗaanii. Ɓe mbujji ɓanndu makko.
40028014	Nde nii haala kaan yehi to kawjiiɗo leydi oon, min keɓan ko min mbi'i ngam suddude on. Min keedana on he torra fuu.
40028015	Soogeeji ɗiin njaɓi ceede ɗeen, ngaɗi ko mbi'aa. Nii haala kaa fillortee hakkune Yahudankooɓe faa warde hannden.
40028016	Aahiiɓe sappo he go'o ɓeen njehi Galili, dow waamnde nde Iisa tinndinnoo ɓe ndeen.
40028017	Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo mo, ɓe cujidani mo, amma nder maɓɓe woɓɓe duu no cikka.
40028018	O ɓadii, o wi'i ɓe : —Mi hokkaama baawɗe fuu tawaaɗe dow e ley.
40028019	Ndenne, njehee nder kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu, ngaɗee lenyi fuu aahiiɓe am, ngaɗanon ɓe batisma dow innde Baabiraawo, Ɓiɗɗo he Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
40028020	Njannginon ɓe, ɓe tokka ko mbi'umi on ɗum fuu. Paamee ko miɗo wondi he mooɗon wakkati fuu sey nyannde duuniyaaru timmi.
41001001	Filla Habaru lobbo, habaru dow Iisa Almasiihu Ɓii-Alla, filla oo
41001002	fuɗɗirii haala Alla tawaaka nder dewtere annabi Esaaya, mbi'uka : Ndaa, mi ardinan lilaaɗo am moƴƴinane laawol maaɗa.
41001003	Daane no huuɓa nder ladde yeeruure no wi'a : Ciryanee Joomiraawo laabi ɗi o tokkata, moƴƴinee laabi makko.
41001004	Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma wanngi nder ladde yeeruure. Omo ɓornii koltal canyiraangal leeɓi ngolooba. Omo tunndi tunndorgol nguru. Ɓaɓɓatti he njuumri o wuurdi. Omo nodda himɓe tuuba ngam hakkeeji maɓɓe njaafee, ɓe ngaɗanee batisma. Himɓe leydi Yahudiya he himɓe huɓeere Ursaliima no ngara to makko. Iɓe njardoo yeeso Alla e yeeso himɓe fuu dow hakkeeji maɓɓe. Omo waɗana ɓe batisma nder maayo Urdun.
41001007	Omo waajoo nder daane toowne, omo wi'a himɓe : —Ɓurɗo kam baawɗe no wara gaɗa am. Miin, mi fotaay baa to turotoomi ngam fiirtude ɓoggi paɗe makko.
41001008	Miin, ndiyam ngaɗirananmi on batisma, amma kanko kay, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo o waɗiranta on batisma.
41001009	Nder balɗe Yahaaya waɗanannoo himɓe batisma, Iisa wari, ƴuwi Nasaratu nder leydi Galili. Yahaaya waɗani mo batisma nder maayo Urdun.
41001010	Wakkati o umminoo o darii nder ndiyam ɗam, sey o hi'i kammu omtii, Ruuhu Alla wari nder nanndi wuugaanu, jippii dow makko.
41001011	Daane gom ƴuwi dow wi'i : « Aan woni Ɓiyam korsuɗo, aan naniranmi belɗum. »
41001012	Wakkati mum da, Ruuhu jippiiɗo dow makko oon, soggi mo yaari nder ladde yeeruure.
41001013	Balɗe makko lasooji ɗiɗi toon, Ibiliisa no sii'oo mo, omo hakkune dabbaaji ladde, maleykaaɓe no ngollana mo.
41001014	Balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa uddol Yahaaya, Iisa ummii, yehi Galili. Omo waajoo Habaru lobbo ƴuwɗo to Alla.
41001015	Omo wi'a himɓe : —Wakkati doomaaɗo oon yottake, Laamu Alla ɓadake. Tuubee, ngoonɗinee Habaru lobbo.
41001016	Nyannde gom, Iisa no fiiloo takkol peta Galili. Sey o hi'i nanngooɓe liƴƴi ɗiɗo gom : Simon inndirteeɗo Piyer he minyum Andiire, no paɗɗa taaruuji mum'en.
41001017	Sey Iisa wari to maɓɓe wi'i ɓe : —Ngaree, tokkee kam, mi waɗan on nanngooɓe himɓe.
41001018	Wakkati mum da ɓe mboppi taaruuji maɓɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
41001019	O yehi yeeso seɗɗa, sey o hi'i Yakuuba ɓii-Jebede he minyum Yahaaya no nder laana ndiyam mum'en, iɓe moƴƴina taaruuji maɓɓe.
41001020	Kamɓe duu no Iisa noddirnoo ɓe, sey ɓe acci baabiiɓe Jebede he gollooɓe mum, ɓe tokki mo ɓe ndilli.
41001021	Iisa e jaɓuɓe tokkude ɗum njehi Kafarnahum. Nyalaane fowteteene gom Iisa naati nder waajordu Kafarnahum, fuɗɗi waajaade.
41001022	Waaju makko haayɗini hettinaniiɓe mo. Ngam o waajoraaki ɓe hano no jannginooɓe Tawreeta mbaajorto, amma he baawɗe o waajorii ɓe.
41001023	Nder waajordu nduun no tawa gorko gom, mo ginnaaru woni dow mum no tampina. Sey ginnaaru nduun huuɓi,
41001024	wi'i : —Iisa mo Nasaratu, ɗume ngiɗaa waɗude min ? A warii faa mbaraa min naa ? Miɗo anndi moy woni ma, a Ceniiɗo ƴuwɗo to Alla !
41001025	Sey Iisa laayani ginnaaru nduun, sajiti he mayru wi'i ndu : —Maɓɓu hunnduko maa, takkita mo !
41001026	Wakkati mum da ginnaaru nduun dimmbiri gorko oon he semmbe, ndu huuɓi sanne, ndu takkitii mo.
41001027	Ɗum haayɗini jama'aare ndeen fuu. Himɓe tokki, no ƴamodira, no mbi'a : —Ɗume woni ɗum nee kaden ? Ɗume woni anndal kesal jannginiraangal he baawɗe ngaal nee ? Omo dawrana baa ginnaaji, iɗi ɗowtanoo mo duu.
41001028	Wakkati gooto habaru Iisa sankitii nder leydi Galili fuu.
41001029	Wakkati Iisa wurtinoo waajordu Kafarnahum, Yakuuba e Yahaaya tokki mo ɓe njaadi wuro Simon Piyer he Andiire'en.
41001030	Eso Simon Piyer debbo no fukkii, no wondi wulowulo. No Iisa yottii naatiri ɓaade Simon Piyer, o waɗana filla rafi cellal debbo oon.
41001031	Iisa yehi to debbo oon, nanngi junngo makko, ummini mo. Wakkati mum da wulowulo ngoon heli, o yamɗiti. O ummii, o jaɓɓii ɓe.
41001032	Futuro nyannde mum, gaɗa janki naange, himɓe tinni no ngadda nyawɓe mum'en he wonduɓe he ginnaaji to Iisa.
41001033	Wuro ngoon fuu hawri dammbugal ɓaade Simon'en.
41001034	Iisa nyawti himɓe heewɓe, nyawɓe nyawuuji feere-fereeji. O riiwi ginnaaji keewɗi. Iɗi anndi mo amma o haɗi ɗi haalude.
41001035	Iisa ummii illa subaka kecco, wurtii wuro Simon Piyer'en. O yehi nder nokkuure yeewne gom to neɗɗo fuu walaa, o waɗi ko du'aade.
41001036	Simon Piyer he wondunooɓe he mum gom ummii, tinni no tefa mo.
41001037	Wakkati ɓe ngiitowi to o woni, ɓe ngari ɓe mbi'i mo : —Toy ngonnoɗaa ko himɓe fuu no tefe ?
41001038	Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe : —En njah nder gure ɓadiiɗe gom, mi waajoo toon duu, ngam majjum waɗi ngarmi.
41001039	Iisa fiilii leydi Galili fuu. O riiwi ginnaaji dow himɓe. O waajii nder baajorɗi leydi Galili fuu.
41001040	Nyannde gom gorko ceppinɗo gom wari, hofi yeeso Iisa, wi'i mo : —Nde nii a jaɓi, aɗa waawi yamɗintinde kam !
41001041	Yurmeene ceppinɗo oon nanngi Iisa, nden Iisa foorti junngo mum, meemi mo, wi'i : —Mi jaɓi, yamɗitin !
41001042	Wakkati mum da, ceppam ɗaam ƴuwi he gorko oon, o nyawti.
41001043	Iisa sallimii mo, amma fooɗi nowru makko,
41001044	wi'i mo : —Hakkila, to haalan ɗum neɗɗo fuu. Umma, yah holloy hoore maa cakkanoowo Alla mooɗon, ngaɗaa cakkol ngol Muusa tilsini waɗee, ngam hollude himɓe ko sikka fuu walaa a yamɗiti.
41001045	Amma no o dilliri to Iisa, o fuɗɗi sankitidde habaru oon. Iisa waɗi wakkati, wurtataako naata huɓeere gom. Himɓe fuu no kollira mo, ngam filla nyawtol ceppinɗo oo sankitake nokku fuu. Nder nokkuuje jeewɗe tan o woni omo jooɗo. Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay jama'aare he jama'aare no ƴuwa nokku fuu no wara to makko.
41002001	Balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa jonnde Iisa nder nokkuuje jeewɗe, o warti Kafarnahum. Himɓe nani ko o warti, omo nder suudu makko.
41002002	Jama'aare ɗuunde wari hawri dammbugal makko, faa walaa to neɗɗo tuttata joode baa seɗɗa. Iisa tinni no waajoo ɓe dow haala Alla.
41002003	Himɓe gom ngari to makko, ɓe ngardi he bonnguujo gom. Worɓe nayo ndoondii mo dow kooƴirngal maayɓe.
41002004	Jama'aare heewi nokkuure ndeen faa walaa to ɓe tokkira, ɓe njottina bonnguujo oon to Iisa. Sey ɓe ƴeenyi suudu nduun, ɓe kunci ndu dey-dey to fotata he to Iisa darii, ɓe njuri bonnguujo oon, omo foorti dow kooƴirngal maayɓe.
41002005	Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo no goonɗinol maɓɓe foti, o wi'i bonnguujo oon : —Higo, hakkeeji maa njaafaama.
41002006	Sey jannginooɓe Tawreeta jooɗinooɓe ɗon tinni no miiloo nder ɓerɗe mum'en no mbi'a :
41002007	—Ɗume waɗi gorko oo no haalira nii ? O bonni innde Alla ! Moy waawi yaafaade hakke se hanaa Alla ?
41002008	Wakkati mum da Iisa faami miilooji maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe : —Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon miiloo ir miilooji ɗii nder ɓerɗe mooɗon ?
41002009	Ɗume ɓuri hoyde hakkune wi'ude bonnguujo oo : « Hakkeeji mum njaafaama » naa o ummoo, o hooƴa kooƴirngal ngaal, o dilla ?
41002010	Amma, miɗo hiɗi paamon ko Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jogii baawɗe yaafaade hakkeeji himɓe nder duuniyaaru nduu. Nden, o wi'i bonnguujo oon :
41002011	—Aan, umma, hooƴu kooƴirngal maayɓe ngal ngaddiraɗaa, kootaa.
41002012	Wakkati mum da gorko oon ummii yeeso himɓe fuu, hooƴi ngal, dilli. Ɗum haayɗini ɓe, ɓe fuu, ɓe tinni iɓe njetta Alla, iɓe mbi'a : —Abada min ngi'aay ir ɗum !
41002013	Iisa ummii wuro, soƴƴii dow peta Galili. Jama'aare no wara to makko, omo waajoo ɓe.
41002014	Nyannde gom jaɓoowo janngal gom bi'eteeɗo Lewi ɓii-Alfee no jooɗii nder suudu janngal. Wakkati Iisa yawtannoo, sey hi'i mo, wi'i mo : —Tokkam ! Lewi ummii, tokki mo.
41002015	Nyannde gom Iisa he aahiiɓe mum no nyaama nder suudu Lewi. Jaɓooɓe janngal gom, he ɓooyɓe nder gaɗol hakke, heewɓe no njooɗodii Iisa he aahiiɓe mum, iɓe nyaamda. Iri maɓɓe heewɓe tokki Iisa.
41002016	Wakkati jannginooɓe Tawreeta gom, jeyaaɓe nder hawriine Fariisa'en, ngi'unoo ɗum, ɓe mbi'i aahiiɓe Iisa : —Ɗume waɗi omo nyaamda he jaɓooɓe janngal, he waɗooɓe hakke ɓee ?
41002017	Wakkati Iisa nanunoo haalaaji maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe : —Nyawɗo haajaa cawroowo hanaa jamɗuɗo. Mi waraay noddude miilooɓe kam'en no dartiiɓe, amma mi waraana ngam annduɓe kam'en no waɗooɓe hakke.
41002018	Nyannde gom aahiiɓe Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma he Fariisa'en no cuumii, sey himɓe gom ngari to Iisa, ƴami mo, mbi'i : —Ko waɗi aahiiɓe Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma he aahiiɓe Fariisa'en no cuumoo, amma aahiiɓe maaɗa kay cuumataako ?
41002019	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Warɓe ɓanngal no mbaawi suumaade wakkati ɓaŋuɗo oon wondi he maɓɓe naa ? Nde nii ɓaŋuɗo oon no wondi he maɓɓe, ɓe cuumataako.
41002020	Amma nyalaaɗe ngaran ɗe ɓaŋuɗo oon suutetee hakkune maɓɓe. Nder balɗe ɗeen ɓe cuumoto.
41002021	Baa gooto nyootataa lefol kesol he koltal kinngal. Nde joomum waɗi ɗum, lefol kesol ngool serkata koltal kinngal ngaal, cerkol ngool ɓeydoo.
41002022	Kaden duu, walaa loowoowo cabiijam kesam nder sumalleeji kiɗɗi. Nde joomum waɗii ɗum, cabiijam ɗaam no fusan ɗi, joomum mursa ɗam, kanƴam he sumalleeji ɗiin fuu. Cabiijam kesam nder sumalleeji kesi loowetee !
41002023	Nyalaane fowteteene gom, Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ummii, no peddita gese alkamaaje. Iɓe caka yaadu sey aahiiɓe ɓeen puɗɗi no mborsoo camme ɗeen.
41002024	Nden Fariisa'en mbi'i mo : —Ndaa, ko waɗi aahiiɓe maaɗa no ngaɗa ko haɗaa nder nyalaane fowteteene ?
41002025	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Ndenne on njanngaay ko Daawda waɗunoo, wakkati kanko he yaadiraaɓe makko ndafanoo ?
41002026	Nder jamaanu cakkanoowo Alla mawɗo gom bi'eteeɗo Abiyatar, Daawda naati nder suudu Alla, o adi buuru ittanaaɗo Alla oon, o nyaami, o hokki mo yaadiraaɓe makko. Tawi duu nder Tawreeta wi'aama ko cakkanooɓe Alla tan kaani nyaamude mo.
41002027	Kaden duu, nyalaane fowteteene himɓe waɗanaa, amma hanaa himɓe ngaɗaa ngam mayre.
41002028	Ndenne, Ɓii-Neɗɗo woni jom nyalaane fowteteene ndeen, kayre he hoore mayre.
41003001	Nyannde gom Iisa naati waajordu. Gorko gom mo junngo mum waati no tawa nder mayru.
41003002	Fariisa'en wonɓe nder mayru fuu no kora Iisa, ngi'a nde o nyawtan gorko oon nder nyalaane fowteteene ndee, nden ɓe keɓa ko ɓe pelirta mo.
41003003	Iisa wi'i jom junngo waanngo oon ummoo, daroo yeeso himɓe fuu.
41003004	Sey o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i : —Nder nyalaane fowteteene ɗume haani waɗeede ? Ko wooɗi naa ko boni ? Dannude neɗɗo naa accude mo o maaya ? Ɓe calii jaabaade mo.
41003005	Iisa daari ɓe, ɓe fuu, ɓerne makko metti. O wanni ngam tiiɗal nyiraaku maɓɓe. Nden o wi'i gorko oon : —Foortu junngo maa ! Gorko oon foorti junngo mum, ngo yamɗiti.
41003006	Wakkati Fariisa'en wonɓe nder waajordu nduun mburtii, ɓe njehi law law, ɓe caawodirowi he Hirudus'en dow no ɓe mbardata Iisa.
41003007	Iisa ummii, he aahiiɓe mum, ɓe ponndi peta Galili. Jama'aare mawne no tokki mo.
41003008	Nder maɓɓe no tawa ƴuwɓe Galili, Ursaliima, Yahudiya, Idumiya, lettugal maayo Urdun, he seraaji Tirus he Sidon. Jama'aaje ɗee fuu nani ko o waɗannoo, ɓe ndillowi ɓe ngari to makko.
41003009	Ngam doggude himɓe njaaɓa mo, Iisa waɗi aahiiɓe mum ngaddana ɗum laanel ndiyam gom.
41003010	Nyawɓe heewɓe no tefa yottaade mo, meema mo ngam o nyawtiino himɓe ɗuɓɓe.
41003011	Wakkati fuu mo ɓe ginnaaji bonɗi ngoni dow mum'en, ngi'ii mo, no kofo yeeso makko, no kuuɓa, no mbi'a : —Aan, a Ɓii-Alla !
41003012	Amma omo hajoo ɓe ngam to ɓe mbanngin moy o woni.
41003013	Nyannde gom Iisa ƴeenyi waamnde, o noddi ɓe o haajaa nder tokkuɓe mo ɓeen, ngara to makko.
41003014	Ɓe ngari to makko, o suɓii sappo e ɗiɗo nder maɓɓe. O waɗi ɓe lilaaɓe makko, laatiiɓe wakkati fuu no hadde makko. O suɓake ɓe duu ngam omo hiɗi, o lila ɓe, ɓe mbaajowoo himɓe.
41003015	O hokki ɓe baawɗe riiwude ginnaaji duu.
41003016	Lilaaɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo, ɓe o suɓi ɓeen nii : Simon mo o inndiri Piyer,
41003017	Yakuuba ɓii-Jebede he minyum Yahaaya sowirteeɓe Bowanerges kam woni nannduɓe he riggaaŋo,
41003018	Andiire, Filipa, Bartolome, Matta, Tomas, Yakuuba ɓii-Alfee, Tadde, Simon kiranoowo suudu baaba e
41003019	Yahuuda Iskariyot mo yahde yeeso jammboytoo Iisa.
41003020	Iisa hooti wuro, jama'aare wari, hawriti dow makko kaden faa kanko he aahiiɓe makko fuu anndaa no ngatta ko nyaama.
41003021	Wakkati jeydaaɓe Iisa nanunoo himɓe no mbi'a : « Hoore Iisa sottake », ɓe ngarani mo.
41003022	Jannginooɓe Tawreeta ƴuwɓe Ursaliima gom ngari, no mbi'a Be'eljebul, hooreejo ginnaaji, woni dow makko. Kanko hokki mo baawɗe riiwude ginnaaji ɗiin.
41003023	Dow haalaaji ɗii, Iisa nootii ɓe, wi'i : —Ibiliisa no waawi riiwude Ibiliisa naa ?
41003024	Nde nii laamu leydi he hoore mum feccake, feccere worre no habda he ndeeto, leydi ndiin no daroo naa ?
41003025	Nde wuro senndake, ingo laatoo naa ?
41003026	Nde nii Ibiliisa no habda he hoore mum, laamu mum feccake, hanti he maggu.
41003027	Kaden neɗɗo fuu waawaa naati wuro jom semmbe, teeta njawdi makko, nde nii hanaa no artu haɓɓi mo non ginan, nden hooƴa njawdi ndiin fuu.
41003028	Goonga kaalananmi on hakke he haala yawaare ko waɗanaa Alla fuu no mbaawi yaafeede.
41003029	Amma neɗɗo fuu bonnuɗo innde Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, yaafataake abada, ngam hakke duumotooɗo joomum waɗi.
41003030	Iisa wi'i kujje ɗee fuu ngam himɓe mbi'ii o walanaa hoore makko, ginnaaru o wondi.
41003031	Jama'aare no jooɗii no fiilii Iisa. Inna Iisa he minyiraaɓe Iisa worɓe ngari, ndarii yaasin. Ɓe ngaɗi lilaaɗo nodda Iisa. Sey himɓe mbi'i Iisa : —Inna maa he rimdaaɓe maa no yaasin, iɓe nodde.
41003033	Nden Iisa ƴami ɓe, wi'i : —Moy'en ngoni inna am he rimdaaɓe am ?
41003034	O daari jooɗiiɓe no piilii mo ɓeen, o wi'i : —Ndaaree inna am e rimdaaɓe am nii.
41003035	Gaɗoowo muuyɗe Alla, kam woni dimdaaɗo am, kam woni inna am.
41004001	Iisa soƴƴii nyannde gom dow peta Galili no waajoo. Jama'aare mawne gom wari, fiilii mo. Ɗuuɗol himɓe ngool waɗi o naati laana ndiyam, o jooɗii. Jama'aare ndeen duu no darii hunnduko peta ngaan.
41004002	Omo waajoroo ɓe kippi haalaaji keewɗi, omo wi'a ɓe :
41004003	—Kettinee ! Aawoowo gom dilli nyannde gom faa aawowa aawdiiri mum.
41004004	Nder aawre ndeen, gabbe gom caami sera laawol. Nden pooli ngari coppi ɗe.
41004005	Gere majje caami nder korkaaƴe to leydi ɗuuɗaa. Ɗe puɗilawi ngam luggiɗaa sanne.
41004006	Amma wakkati naange wulnoo ndeen, ɗe ɗayli, ɗe njoori ngam ɗe ngaɗaay ɗaɗi.
41004007	Gere majje caami to kebbe puɗata. Kebbe ɗeen mawni, ɓillii ɗe, ɗe ndimaay.
41004008	Gere majje duu caami nder leydi lobbiri, puɗi, mawni, ndimi. Wassaaŋo gom rimi camme woronja, wonngo lasooji tati, wonngo duu hemre.
41004009	Jom nowru nanooru fuu, nana !
41004010	Wakkati Iisa wonnoo feere mum, aahiiɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen he woɓɓe nder piiliiɓe mo ƴami mo maana kippol haala ngool.
41004011	O jaabii ɓe o wi'i : —Onon, Alla hokkii on baawɗe anndude ko suuɗi dow habaru Laamu mum. Amma ɓe tawaaka hakkune mooɗon kippi haala kaalantee huune fuu.
41004012	Ngam majjum waɗi : Baa nde ɓe ndaari, ɓe ngi'ataa, baa nde ɓe nani, ɓe paamataa, ngam nde nii ɓe paamii, ɓe tuuban, ɓe njaafee.
41004013	Ndenne, nde nii on paamaay kippol haala ngool, noy paamirton ɗiito ?
41004014	Aawoowo oon, haala Alla aawata.
41004015	Sera laawol to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala Alla, amma wakkati mum da Ibiliisa wari, itti ka nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
41004016	Korkaaƴe to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala Alla, njaɓɓorii ka welwelo wakkati mum da.
41004017	Amma ngam ka waɗaay ɗaɗi nder maɓɓe, ɓe nanngan ka wakkati seɗɗa tan. Nde nii ɓe ɓillake naa nde ɓe torraama ngam makka, ɓe mboppan ka wakkati mum da.
41004018	To kebbe puɗidi aawdiiri ndiin woni nanuɓe haala Alla,
41004019	amma sakkulla duuniyaaru, suuno njawdi, he muuyɗe ɓerne naatanta ɓe, kuma haala Alla, ka laatoo ndimara.
41004020	Leydi lobbiri to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala Alla dey njaɓi ka, naforii ka faa ɓe ngaɗi barke : Woɓɓe kile woronja, woɓɓe kile lasooji tati, woɓɓe duu kile hemre.
41004021	Iisa ɓeydi wi'ude ɓe kaden : —No woodi kuɓɓoowo fitilla dey hippa tummbude dow makka naa sorna ka ley leeso ? Hanaa on ɓilan ka naa ?
41004022	Huune fuu ko suuɗi no wanngowan nyannde gom. Ko soomaa fuu duu no somtetee.
41004023	Jom nowru nanooru fuu, nana !
41004024	Korkitee noppi mooɗon faa wooɗa ! Etirgal ngal etirton, kanngal etiranteɗon faa duu ɓeydaneɗon.
41004025	Jogiiɗo fuu no ɓeydantee. Amma mo walaa oon, baa seɗɗa mo jogii oon, no teetetee.
41004026	—No Laamu Alla tinndinirtee nii : Ngu nanndaana he neɗɗo biccuɗo aawdiiri mum nder ngesa.
41004027	Balɗe no njaha, balɗe no ngarta aawdiiri ndiin fuɗi, mawni. Amma neɗɗo oo anndaa baa seɗɗa no waɗi ko ndi mawni.
41004028	Leydi ndiin funni aawdiiri ndiin, ndi fiyi ƴommbe, wutaanu tokki, gaɗa mum, gabbe tokki.
41004029	Wakkati ngesa ngaan ɓenndowi, sey neɗɗo oo adi kettirngal mum, hetti nga, ngam nga foti hetteede.
41004030	He ɗume mbaawten nanndinde Laamu Alla kaden ? Tinndinoore ndeye tinnidirten ngu ?
41004031	Laamu Alla no nanndi he wabbere mutaari, ɓurde gabbe fuu famɗude.
41004032	Amma nde nii nde aawaama, nde fuɗan, nde mawna faa nde laatoo lekki mawki. Lekki kiin waɗa licce mawɗe, ɗe cukka faa pooli no mbaawi nyiɓi cuuɗi mum'en ley majje.
41004033	Iisa naforake iri kippi haala keewɗi, omo gollira ɗi, dey-dey no jama'aare ndeen waawirta faamude.
41004034	Walaa fuu ko o haalani ɓe ko hanaa nder kippol haala o haalii ɗum, amma wakkati o tawa kanko tan sey aahiiɓe ɓeen, omo fiirtana ɓe maana majji.
41004035	Laasara, Iisa wi'i aahiiɓe mum : —En pedditin peta ngaa, koɗowen fonngo gooto.
41004036	Ɓe ummii ɓe acci jama'aare ndeen, ɓe naati nder laana ka Iisa wonnoo nder mum kaan, iɓe peddita, laanaaji gom no tokki ɓe.
41004037	Henndu sattunu gom ummini benkeƴƴe no piya laana kaan faa ka hosi rufude.
41004038	Iisa no gaɗa, no wahii wawlaare, no ɗaanii. Sey aahiiɓe ɓeen pindini mo, mbi'i mo : —Moodibbo, a faalaaka maayen naa ?
41004039	Nden Iisa ummii, sappii henndu nduun, wi'i benkeƴƴe ɗeen : —Fatti ! Ndaree ! Henndu nduun darii, joonkay ɗum waɗi siw nokku fuu.
41004040	Iisa wi'i aahiiɓe ɓeen : —Ko waɗi kulirɗon nii ? Noy waɗi on ngoonɗinaay naa ?
41004041	Kulkulal manngal nanngi ɓe, ɓe tokki iɓe mbi'odira : —Moy woni neɗɗo oo, mo baa henndu e ndiyam no ɗowtanoo ɗum ?
41005001	Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ummii, pedditi peta Galili, panndowi dow fonngo leydi Gerasa.
41005002	Wakkati Iisa jippinoo laana kaan, sey gorko gom mo ginnaaru bondu woni dow mum wurtowi nder annyeeje, no wara har makko.
41005003	Gorko oo nder annyeeje ɗeen jooɗii. Neɗɗo fuu waawaa haɓɓi mo, ngam baa o haɓɓiraama callali, ɗi nanngataa mo.
41005004	Himɓe no mbownoo haɓɓirde koyɗe he juuɗe makko callali, o taƴa ɗi, o hela jamɗe ɗeen. Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu waawaa faddii mo.
41005005	Jemma he nyalooma nder annyeeje naa ley baamle ɗeen o woni, omo huuɓa, omo nawna hoore makko he kaaƴe.
41005006	Illa to o hollirnoo Iisa, o doggi, o wari, o hofi yeeso Iisa.
41005007	Nden Iisa wi'i : —Ginnaaru bondu, takkita gorko oo. Sey ginnaaru bondu wonndu dow gorko oon huuɓi daane toowne wi'i Iisa : —Iisa Ɓii-Alla Toowɗo, ɗume ngiɗaa waɗude kam ? Mi eeli ma ngam sabbu Alla, to torram !
41005009	Iisa ƴami ndu, wi'i : —Noy mbi'eteɗaa ? Ndu jaabii mo, ndu wi'i : —Ujunaaji ngam miɗen ɗuuɗi.
41005010	Nden ɗi ŋaarii Iisa faa noy walaa, to wurtin ɗi nder leydi Gerasa.
41005011	Nyannde mum ɗum fotodiri, hadde maɓɓe ɗon da, sewre girooji mawne gom no durannoo hoore waamnde.
41005012	Sey ginnaaji ɗiin ŋaarii mo, o acca ɗum'en naata nder girooji ɗiin.
41005013	Iisa jaɓi, acci ɗi. Ginnaaji ɗiin takkiti gorko oon, naatowi nder girooji ɗiin. Sewre ndeen fuu doggi, saamowi nder peta Galili ngaan, njoolii. Sewre girooji ndeen no waɗa hano girooji ujunaaji ɗiɗi.
41005014	Durooɓe majji ndoggi, kaalanowi himɓe wuro ngoon he himɓe seraaji maggo ko hewtii ɗum'en. Himɓe njehi ƴeewowi ko waɗi.
41005015	Ɓe ngari to Iisa, ɓe ngi'i gorko mo ginnaaji ngonnoo dow mum oon no jooɗii hadde Iisa. Omo holti, hakkillo makko duu no huuɓi. Kulal nanngi ɓe.
41005016	Himɓe ɓe ɗum waɗunoo yeeso mum'en pillanii warɓe ndarii ɓeen huune fuu ko waɗi.
41005017	Warɓe ɓeen ŋaarii Iisa dilla nder leydi mum'en.
41005018	Wakkati Iisa naatannoo laana kaan, gorko nyawtaaɗo oon wi'i mo : —Mi eeli ma, accu mi tokke.
41005019	Iisa jaɓaay, wi'i mo : —Hootu wuro maa nder koreeji maa, kaalanaa ɓe ko Joomiraawo waɗani ma, he no o yurmorii ma.
41005020	Nden gorko nyawtaaɗo oon dilli, fuɗɗi no sankita habaru oon nder leydi Gure-sappo gonɗe hakkune hoore huɗo he lettugal peta Galili. Ɗum haayɗini himɓe fuu.
41005021	Iisa naati laana soƴƴitii gaɗa koyɗe mum. Jama'aare mawne gom wari hawri to makko takkol peta Galili.
41005022	Wakkati Jayrus, gooto nder hooreeɓe waajordu wuro ngoon, hi'unoo Iisa, o wari, o hofi yeeso Iisa.
41005023	O ŋaarii Iisa, o wi'i : —Ɓiyam debbo woni no habda yonki. War ! Yowu junngo maa dow makko, heɓa o daɗa, o wuura !
41005024	Iisa ummii tokki Jayrus. Jama'aare mawne tokki mo faa himɓe no njaaɓodira.
41005025	Debbo gom mo ƴiiƴam sukkitani ko waɗata duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi no wonnoo hakkune maɓɓe.
41005026	O tampi sanne, o yehi to sawrooɓe heewɓe, ɓe nyaamdi njawdi makko fuu. O heɓaay jam, nyaw nguun no nii no ɓeydoo.
41005027	O nani habaru Iisa no waɗee sey o feeri hakkune jama'aare ndeen, ngam omo miila ko nde nii o meemii jabbaare Iisa tan o nyawtan. Sey o ƴuwri Iisa har gaɗa, o meemi jabbaare makko.
41005029	Wakkati mum da, ƴiiƴam ɗaam darii, o nani jam nder ɓanndu makko.
41005030	Iisa duu nani semmbe gom ƴuwi he muuɗum. O yeeƴitii hakkune jama'aare ndeen, o wi'i : —Moy meemii jabbaare am ?
41005031	Aahiiɓe makko mbi'i mo : —A hi'ii jama'aare hawri, no ɓillii ma dey ƴamaa, mbi'aa moy meemii ma ?
41005032	Iisa tinni no daara nder fiiliiɓe ɗum ɓeen fuu, ngam hi'a meemuɗo ɗum oon.
41005033	Debbo meemuɗo Iisa oon huli, no diwna ngam no anndi ko waɗi. O wari, o hofii yeeso Iisa, o haalani mo fuu no waɗi.
41005034	Nden Iisa wi'i mo : —Banndam debbo, goonɗinol maa danni ma. Yah he jam ! A daɗii nyaw maaɗa.
41005035	Wakkati Iisa haaldannoo he debbo oon, sey himɓe gom ngari ƴuwi wuro Jayrus, mbi'i Jayrus : —Ko tampintaa moodibbo oo kaden ! Ɓiya heddaaki.
41005036	Amma Iisa hettinaaki haala maɓɓe, nden o wi'i Jayrus : —Taa hulu, goonɗin tan !
41005037	Iisa accaay neɗɗo fuu yaada he mum wuro Jayrus se hanaa Piyer, Yakuuba he minyum Yahaaya.
41005038	Wakkati ɓe njottinoo wuro Jayrus, Iisa tawi jama'aare. Himɓe no mboya, no cimoo.
41005039	Nden o naati, o wi'i ɓe : —Ɗume woni bojji ɗii e hakkillo ummiingo ngoo nee ? Suka oon maayaay, o ɗaanii tan.
41005040	Ɓe njali jaleeɗe yawaare. O waɗi ɓe mburtina, ɓe fuu. Nden ɓe naati dow suka oon, kanko Iisa oon, Jayrus e deekum, he aahiiɓe tato ɓeen.
41005041	Iisa nanngi junngo suka oon, wi'i mo : —Talita kuum ! Kam woni : « Suka debbo, umma ! »
41005042	Ɓii-Jayrus debbo oo, duuɓi mum sappo e ɗiɗi. O ummii wakkati mum da, omo dilla. Ɗum haaynii himɓe ɓeen sanne sanne.
41005043	Nden Iisa wi'i to ɓe kaalan ɗum neɗɗo fuu. O wi'i kaden suka oon hokkee ko nyaamee.
41006001	Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ndilli wuro Jayrus, pa'i Nasaratu, wuro ngo Iisa mawnunoo nder mum.
41006002	Nyalaane fowteteene jaaƴi, o fuɗɗi waajaade nder waajordu Nasaratu. Jama'aare hettinaniide waaju makko fuu haayɗinaama. Nden ɓe keddii iɓe mbi'a : —Toy o heɓi kujje ɗee fuu ? Moy hokki mo anndal ? Noy o heɓiri baawɗe waɗude kaayɗe ɗee ?
41006003	Hanaa ya kanko woni sekkeejo oo ? Hanaa kanko woni ɓii-Mariyaama naa ? Hanaa kanko woni mawnu Yakuuba, Yoses, Yahuuda he Simon'en ? Minyiraaɓe makko rewɓe no ngondi he meeɗen. Kujje ɗee ngaɗi ɓe calii Iisa.
41006004	Amma Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i ko annabiijo no teddinee nokku fuu sey nder wuro mum, hakkune rimdaaɓe mum, he nder ɓaade mum'en.
41006005	Ko ƴaari junngo makko ngo o yowi dow nyawɓe gom, o nyawti ɓe, Iisa heɓaay waɗi haayne baa worre ɗon.
41006006	Rafi goonɗinol maɓɓe haayɗini Iisa sanne. Iisa ummii naati gure cakaaje ɗeen fuu, omo waajoo.
41006007	Nyannde gom o noddi lilaaɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, o liliri ɓe ɗiɗɗiɗo. O hokki ɓe baawɗe riiwude ginnaaji,
41006008	o wi'i ɓe : —Nde nii oɗon njaha, to kooƴee huune fuu, se hanaa cabbi mooɗon. To kooƴee nyaamdu, mbasu naa ceede.
41006009	Ɓornee paɗe mooɗon, to ƴaaree toggooje ɗiɗi.
41006010	Nder wuro fuu ngo ngarɗon, ɓaade fuu nde njippiɗon nder mum, njooɗee nder mayre sey nyannde ndilloton.
41006011	Nde on ngari nder nokkuure, nde nii himɓe njaɓɓaaki on naa kettinanaaki on, nde nii on ummake ndilludu, piɗɗee sollaare koyɗe mooɗon ngam ɗum laatanoo ɓe seeda gacce maɓɓe.
41006012	Aahiiɓe ɓeen ummii, njehi no mbaajoo, no mbi'a himɓe tuuba.
41006013	Ɓe ndiiwi ginnaaji ɗuɗɗi, ɓe mbuji himɓe heewɓe nebbam, himɓe ɓeen nyawti.
41006014	Innde Iisa walaa fuu to yehaay. Hirudus, laamiiɗo leydi Galili, nani habaru Iisa no waɗee. No woodi wi'ooɓe Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma ummitii. Ngam majjum waɗi, omo waɗa kaayɗe.
41006015	Woɓɓe no mbi'a o Eliya. Woɓɓe duu no mbi'a o annabiijo nii non hano annabiiɓe aranɓe.
41006016	Wakkati Hirudus nani haalaaji ɗii, o tinni omo ƴama hoore makko omo wi'a : —Yahaaya mo taƴunoomi hoore mum oon, kam ummitii, naa noy ?
41006017	Hirudus he hoore mum tilsiniino Yahaaya nanngee, haɓɓee, uddee, ngam Yahaaya wi'i mo ɗum daganaaki mo haɓɓande dee-mawniiko Filipa bi'eteeɗo Hirudiya.
41006019	Hirudiya duu no jogitani Yahaaya ngam sabbu ko o wi'i Hirudus ɗum. O tefi laawol fuu no o waɗata, o waɗa Yahaaya waree. Amma o heɓaay laawol majjum,
41006020	ngam Hirudus no teddina Yahaaya sanne. Omo anndi duu ko Yahaaya gorko ceniiɗo non, dartiiɗo. Omo hakkilii he makko sanne. Haalaaji ɗi Yahaaya haaldata he makko no jiiɓodira hakkillo makko. Amma fuu nii haɗataa omo nana belɗum hettinaade haalaaji Yahaaya.
41006021	Balɗe no njaha balɗe no ngarta faa nyannde gom ɗum fotodiri he nyalaane nde Hirudus rimaa. Nyannde mum Hirudus hawri himɓe ɓadiiɓe ɗum. O hawri hawjiiɓe laamu, o hawri hooreeɓe soogeeji, ngam ɓe kiirto wuro makko. Nyannde mum duu Hirudiya heɓi laawol no waɗata ko Yahaaya waree.
41006022	Jama'aare ndee fuu wari hawri, sey ɓii-Hirudiya debbo naati no woma. Ɗum weli Hirudus he warɓe kawri ɓeen fuu. Hirudus ummii, wi'i suka debbo oon : —Haalanan ko ngiɗaa mi waɗane.
41006023	Hirudus huni, wi'i kam no hokkan suka debbo oo huune fuu ko eeli ɗum, baa se tawi feccere leydi mum non.
41006024	Suka debbo oon wurtii, wi'i innum : —Ɗume eelanmi ? Nden Hirudiya, inna suka debbo oon jaabii ɓiyum, wi'i : —Hoore Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma !
41006025	Sey suka debbo oon doggi, yehi to Hirudus wi'i mo : —Joonin joonin, miɗo hiɗi hoore Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma waddee ɗo nder le'al !
41006026	Wakkati Hirudus nanunoo haala kaa, ɓerne makko metti faa hanaa seɗɗa. O hiɗaa egginde haala makko ngam hunayeere nde o waɗi yeeso noddaaɓe ɓeen fuu.
41006027	Nder soogeeji doomooɓe mo ɓeen, o lili soogeeru gom, taƴowa hoore Yahaaya, waddaa. Soogeeru nduun yehi, taƴi hoore Yahaaya,
41006028	tummbi nder le'al, waddi, hokki suka debbo oon. Suka debbo oon duu hokki nde innum.
41006029	Wakkati aahiiɓe Yahaaya ɓeen nanunoo ɗum, ɓe ngari, ɓe kooƴi ɓanndu Yahaaya, ɓe mooɓowi.
41006030	Nyannde gom lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen ngari kaalani Iisa, to kam'en mbaajii he ko kam'en ngaɗi.
41006031	Himɓe no njaha, no ngarta dow maɓɓe faa ɓe keppi fuu to ɓe njooɗoo ɓe nyaama. Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Ngaree njehen to yeewii gom, heɓa baa powton.
41006032	Nden ɓe naati laana, kamɓe tan, ɓe ndilli.
41006033	Amma wakkati ɓe ndillannoo, himɓe heewɓe annditii to ɓe pa'i. Nden ɓe ƴuwri seraaji ɗiin fuu, ɓe ndoggi, ɓe artowi ɓe.
41006034	Wakkati Iisa wurtinoo laana kaan, o hi'i jama'aare ndeen, ɓe njurminii mo sanne, ngam iɓe nanndi baali ɗi ngalaa duroowo. O tinni omo waajoo ɓe
41006035	dow kujje keewɗe faa jenngi. Sey aahiiɓe makko ɓadii, mbi'i mo : —Joonin no ɗon no jennga, nokkuure ndee walaa fuy, ladde non.
41006036	Accu jama'aare ndeen sankitoo, ɓe naata nder gure he nokkuuje ɓadiiɗe, ngam ɓe coodowa ko nyaamee.
41006037	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Onon he ko'e mooɗon, kokkee ɓe ko ɓe nyaamata ! Nden ɓe mbi'i : —Aɗa hiɗi min coodanowa ɓe buuru tammaaje cardi keme ɗiɗi ɓe nyaama naa ?
41006038	Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Njehee ndaarowee, buuruuje foti njogiɗon ? Wakkati ɓe ndaaroynoo, ɓe ngarti ɓe mbi'i Iisa buuruuje joy he liƴƴi ɗiɗi, kam'en njogii.
41006039	Nden Iisa wi'i aahiiɓe mum, ɓe njonna jama'aare ndeen cefe cefe dow huɗo hecco ɗon da.
41006040	Aahiiɓe ɓeen njonniri jama'aare ndeen cefe hemre hemre, he cefe woygu woygu.
41006041	Iisa hooƴi buuruuje joy ɗeen e liƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗiin, tiggitii, yetti Alla. Nden o helti buuruuje ɗeen, o hokki aahiiɓe ɓeen njeddana himɓe. He liƴƴi ɗiin duu, o waɗiri non.
41006042	Jama'aare ndeen fuu nyaami faa haari.
41006043	Aahiiɓe ɓeen kawrodiri buuru e liƴƴi koddiiɗum ɗum, ɗum hebbini kandeeje sappo e ɗiɗi.
41006044	Nyannde mum worɓe ujunaaji joyo nyaami buuru oon.
41006045	Gaɗa nyamnol worɓe ujunaaji joyo ɓeen, Iisa wi'i aahiiɓe mum naata laana, peddita ardoo ɗum, njaha fonngo gooto hedde Baytisayda. Kanko duu o sallimoo jama'aare ndeen.
41006046	O seedi he jama'aare ndeen, o nyakki waamnde faa o du'oo.
41006047	Naange yani, laana aahiiɓe ɓeen no caka peta ngaan. Iisa duu, kam tan no darii dow fonngo ngo ɓe ndillunoo dow mum.
41006048	Fajiri wakkati Iisa hi'unoo ko laana aahiiɓe ɓeen no fotta henndu, awƴaaki makka duu no tampinii. Iisa dilli he koyɗe dow ndiyam ɗaam, tayni ɓe. O hewti ɓe, faa omo tefa yawtude he maɓɓe.
41006049	Amma wakkati aahiiɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo mo ndeen, ɓe miili ko mbeelu maayɗo gom non. Ɓerɗe maɓɓe taƴi, ɓe tinni iɓe kuuɓa. Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Pukkinee hakkillooji mooɗon ! To kulee ! Miin non !
41006051	O naati laana kaan, henndu nduun darii. Haayne majjum nanngi aahiiɓe ɓeen sanne.
41006052	Ngam ɓerɗe maɓɓe no bumɗe, ɓe paamaay maana nyamnol worɓe ujunaaji joyo ɓeen.
41006053	Ɓe pedditi peta ngaan, ɓe njottii leydi Genesaret, ɓe ndarii.
41006054	Wakkati ɓe mburtii laana kaan, himɓe annditi Iisa.
