41006055	Wonnooɓe toon cankitii nder seraaji ɗiin fuu. Ɓe tinni iɓe ada nyawɓe maɓɓe dow kooƴirɗe maayɓe, iɓe njaara nokku fuu to ɓe nani Iisa woni.
41006056	Nokku fuu to Iisa yehi, rumtoowo non, siire non naa nder huɓeere non, o tawan himɓe no pukkina nyawɓe mum'en hunnduko luumo, iɓe eela mo, o acca nyawɓe ɓeen meema baa nii hunnduko jabbaare makko non. Nyawɓe heɓuɓe meemii mo ɓeen fuu nyawti.
41007001	Nyannde gom Fariisa'en he jannginooɓe Tawreeta gom ƴuwi Ursaliima ngari to Iisa.
41007002	Nder finaa-tawaa Fariisa'en e Yahudankooɓe, neɗɗo nyaamataa, lootaay juuɗe mum faa laaɓa. Kaden duu se neɗɗo warti, ƴuwi luumo, nyaamataa se lootaaki. Iɓe ngoodi duu finaa-tawaaji gom ɗi ɓe tokki hano lawƴol kore, ƴogirɗe, nyamruɗe, looɗe, e payanɗe. Fariisa'en he jannginooɓe Tawreeta ɓee ngi'ii ko nder aahiiɓe Iisa woɓɓe lootaay juuɗe mum'en, iɓe nyaamira juuɗe ɗe laaɓaa.
41007005	Nden ɓe ƴami Iisa, ɓe mbi'i : —Ɗume waɗi aahiiɓe maaɗa tokkataa finaa-tawaaji maamiraaɓe meeɗen, iɓe nyaamira juuɗe tunnuɗe ?
41007006	Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Munafiki'en ! Esaaya woofaay sam, wakkati o waɗunoo annabaaku dow mooɗon. Nder maggu Alla wi'i : Himɓe ɓee no mbi'an kam'en no teddina kam, amma ɓerɗe maɓɓe no mboɗɗi kam.
41007007	Dewal maɓɓe no meere ngam ko ɓe ngoni iɓe njanngina ɗum to ɓiɓɓe aadama ƴuwi.
41007008	Onon Fariisa'en, oɗon acca tilsinooje Alla, oɗon tokka finaa-tawaa ɓii-aadama.
41007009	Oɗon coofi finaa-tawaaji mooɗon he tilsinoore Alla !
41007010	Ngam nder Tawreeta, Muusa wi'i : Teddin inna maa he bammaa. O wi'i kaden duu : Kuɗuɗo innum naa bammum fuu no haani wareede.
41007011	Amma onon, ɗume mbi'oton, se neɗɗo wi'i innum naa bammum : Ko mbaawmi wallirde ma ɗum no « Korban », ko mi sakkanta Alla.
41007012	On mbi'an mo, o accaa waɗande inniiko naa baabiiko fuy naa ?
41007013	Nii ngaɗirton, oɗon ngartira haala Alla meere ngam finaa-tawaaji mooɗon ɗi njannginton sukaaɓe. Ir majjum re'ataa ngonɗon oɗon ngaɗa.
41007014	Iisa nodditi jama'aare ndeen wi'i nde : —On fuu, kettinanee kam, paamee ko
41007015	huune fuu ko ƴuwi yaasin naati nder ɓanndu neɗɗo hanaa kam watta joomum tunna yeeso Alla. Amma ko wurtotoo nder neɗɗo kam tunninta neɗɗo yeeso Alla. [
41007016	Jom nowru nanooru fuu nana !]
41007017	Iisa seedi he jama'aare ndeen, warti wuro. Aahiiɓe makko ngari, ƴami mo maana ko o wi'i ɗum.
41007018	Nden o jaabii ɓe o wi'i : —Onon duu, on paamaay naa ? On paamaay ko huune fuu ko ƴuwi yaasin, naati ɓanndu neɗɗo, tunnintaa ɗum.
41007019	Ɗum naataay nder ɓerne joomum, nder reedu joomum tan ɗum naati, nden ɗum yehee gaɗa wuro. Nder haalaaji ɗii, Iisa no holla ko nyaamdu fuu no laaɓi.
41007020	O wi'i aahiiɓe ɓeen kaden : —Ko wurtotoo ɓerne ɓii-aadama, kam tunninta ɗum.
41007021	Ngam nder ɓerne neɗɗo miilooji bonɗi mburtoto hano iri ko semtini, nguyka, ittol yonki,
41007022	jeenu, eelgal bonngal, bononda, jammba, golle nyidduɗe, haasidaaku, haala mbonka, mawnitaare, he bahimaare.
41007023	Golle bonɗe fuu nder ɓerne ƴuwata, kanƴe duu tunninta neɗɗo.
41007024	Iisa ummii, wari weeri leydi Tirus. O jippii nder ɓaade gom, o hiɗaa neɗɗo fuu faama to o woni. Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay himɓe anndi to o woni.
41007025	Nder wakkati mum, debbo ɓii-leydi Finisi-Siriya gom, ɓiyum debbo, ginnaaru no dow mum. Debbo oo hanaa Yahudanke, o nani habaru Iisa no waɗee. O ummii, o wari, o hofi yeeso Iisa. O eeli Iisa riiwa ginnaaru wonndu gaɗa ɓiyiiko.
41007027	Nden Iisa wi'i mo : —Accu sukaaɓe nyaama faa kaara ginan. Ngam hegaaki neɗɗo hooƴa nyaamdu sukaaɓe faɗɗana dawaaɗi.
41007028	Debbo oon jaabii Iisa, wi'i : —Goonga non, Joomam. Amma dawaaɗi duu no nyaama ko sukaaɓe camninta yeeso mum'en.
41007029	Sey Iisa wi'i debbo oon : —Ngam njaabaaki maaɗa kii, hootu, ɓiya seedi he ginnaaru nduun.
41007030	Debbo oon hooti, tawi ɓiyum seedi he ginnaaru nduun, no fukkii dow leeso.
41007031	Iisa ummii leydi Tirus, fa'i leydi Sidon, nden warti har peta Galili, o naati leydi Gure-sappo.
41007032	Nder leydi Gure-sappo, o waddanaa gorko paho gom, mo haala mum laaɓaa. O eelaa, o yowa junngo makko dow gorko oon.
41007033	Iisa hakkiti paho oon he jama'aare ndeen, watti kolli mum nder noppi paho oon, tutti nder junngo mum, meemi ɗemngal makko.
41007034	O tiggitii, o uumi, nden o wi'i paho oon nder aramankoore : —Efata ! Kam woni : « Cukkitee ! »
41007035	Wakkati mum da, noppi gorko oon cukkiti, ɗemngal makko yoofaa, haala makko darti.
41007036	Nden Iisa wi'i to neɗɗo fuu haalan ɗum goɗɗo. Amma ngam omo haɗa ɓe, waɗi kamɓe duu iɓe ɓeyda sankitidde haala kaan.
41007037	Haayne nanngi ɓe faa noy walaa, ɓe tinni iɓe mbi'a : —Golle Iisa fuu no mbooɗi, faa yottii to Iisa no waɗa pahuɓe nana, beebeeɓe duu njeccoo.
41008001	Balɗe tati nii ko jama'aare mawne gom wari hawri to Iisa. Jama'aare ndee walaa fuu ko nyaama. Sey Iisa noddi aahiiɓe mum, wi'i ɓe :
41008002	—Himɓe ɓee no njurminii, balɗe tati nii hannden ko iɓe ngondi he am, ɓe ngalaa fuu ko ɓe nyaama.
41008003	Nde nii mi acci, ɓe koota ɓe nyaamaay, ɓe tampan sanne dow laawol. Ngam nder maɓɓe no woodi ƴuwɓe to woɗɗi.
41008004	Nden aahiiɓe ɓeen njaabii mo, mbi'i : —Toy keɓeten ko nyamnirten ɓe nder ladde yeeruure ndee ?
41008005	Iisa ƴami ɓe, wi'i : —Buuruuje foti njogiɗon ? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Buuruuje jeɗɗi.
41008006	Nden o wi'i jama'aare ndeen jooɗoo he leydi. O hooƴi buuruuje jeɗɗi ɗeen, o yetti Alla, o helti ɗe, o hokki aahiiɓe ɓeen njeddani jama'aare ndeen.
41008007	Iɓe njoginoo kaden likkoy seɗɗa gom. Iisa adi koy, yetti Alla, wi'i aahiiɓe ɓeen njeddana ɓe koy, kankoy duu.
41008008	Jama'aare ndeen nyaami faa haari. Aahiiɓe ɓeen kawri kelte ɗeen, ɗe kebbini kandeeje jeɗɗi.
41008009	Nyaamuɓe nyannde mum ɓeen, no ngaɗa hano worɓe ujunaaji nayo. Gaɗa mum, Iisa sallimii ɓe,
41008010	naddi aahiiɓe mum laana, fonndi leydi Dalmanuuta.
41008011	Nyannde gom Fariisa'en ngari faa tunna Iisa. Ɓe puɗɗi haaldude he makko, ɓe ƴami mo, o holla ɓe alaama kaayɗiniiɗo ƴuwɗo dow kolloowo ko Alla lili mo.
41008012	Sey Iisa uumi, wi'i ɓe : —Ɗume waɗi ko onon himɓe jamaanu oo, oɗon ngiɗi holleede alaama ? Goonga kaalananmi on, alaama fuu walaa mo kolleteɗon !
41008013	Gaɗa haalaaji ɗii walaa ko o ɓeydi, nden o seedi he maɓɓe, o naati laana, o fonndi fonngo gooto.
41008014	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ponndinoo fonngo gooto, Iisa fooɗi noppi maɓɓe wi'i ɓe, ɓe kakkilo he ƴuufinirɗum Fariisa'en he ƴuufinirɗum Hirudus oon. Pooɗol noppi ngool fotodiri ko buuruure worre tan tawaa nder laana maɓɓe. Ɓe njeggiti ko no haani ɓe njalda buuruuje ɗuɗɗe gaɗa maɓɓe.
41008016	Sey aahiiɓe ɓeen puɗɗi no kaalda, no mbi'a : —Naa ngam eɗen njogii buuruure ndee tan, waɗi o haali haala kaa ?
41008017	Iisa faami ko ɓe kaalata, nden wi'i ɓe : —Ɗume kaaloton hakkune mooɗon, oɗon mbi'a on ngalaa buuru ? Ɗume waɗi ko on paamataa ? Naa ɓerɗe mooɗon mbumu non ?
41008018	Oɗon ngoodi gite, amma on ngi'ataa ? Oɗon ngoodi noppi, amma on nanataa ? On miccitaaki naa ?
41008019	Wakkati njeddanmi worɓe ujunaaji joyo ɓeen buuruuje joy ɗeen, kandeeje foti kebbinirɗon ko nyaama hodda ɗum ? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Kandeeje sappo he ɗiɗi.
41008020	Iisa ƴami ɓe kaden, wi'i : —Nyannde njeddanmi worɓe ujunaaji nayo buuruuje jeɗɗi ɗeen, kandeeje foti kebbinɗon ko nyaama horii ɗum ? Ɓe njaabii Iisa, ɓe mbi'i : —Kandeeje jeɗɗi.
41008021	Nden, Iisa wi'i ɓe : —On paamaay faa joonin naa ?
41008022	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum njottinoo Baytisayda, sey himɓe ngaddani Iisa bumɗo gom. Wadduɓe bumɗo oo, eeli Iisa meema mo.
41008023	Iisa nanngi junngo bumɗo oon, hakkiti mo he himɓe, yaari mo gaɗa wuro ngoon. O tutti he gite bumɗo oon, o yowi juuɗe makko dow bumɗo oon, o wi'i : —Aɗa hi'a goɗɗum joonin naa ?
41008024	Sey bumɗo oon feerti gite mum, wi'i : —Miɗo hi'a himɓe, amma iɓe nga'ani kam hano leɗɗe jehooje nii.
41008025	Iisa yowi juuɗe mum dow gite makko kaden. Gorko oon feerti gite mum, sey wumti faa wooɗi, gite makko laaɓi tarr.
41008026	Gaɗa mum Iisa wi'i mo : —Hootu, dey to naatu wuro ngoo.
41008027	Nyannde gom Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ummii naati nder gure cakaaje Kaysariya Filipi. Dow laawol o ƴami aahiiɓe makko o wi'i : —Moy himɓe mbi'ata ngonmi ?
41008028	Nden ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —No woodi wi'ooɓe a Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma, no woodi wi'ooɓe a Eliya, no woodi wi'ooɓe kaden a gooto nder annabiiɓe.
41008029	O ƴami ɓe kaden, o wi'i : —Dey onon nee, moy mbi'oton ngonmi ? Sey Piyer jaabii mo, wi'i : —Aan woni Almasiihu.
41008030	Nden Iisa fooɗi noppi maɓɓe wi'i to ɓe kaalan ɗum neɗɗo fuu.
41008031	Wakkati Piyer wi'unoo ko Iisa woni Almasiihu, Iisa fuɗɗi no famtina aahiiɓe mum, omo wi'a ɓe ko no tilsi Ɓii-Neɗɗo torree sanne. Ardiiɓe mawɓe, hooreeɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe Tawreeta tottitoo mo. O waree, nden gaɗa balɗe tati o ummitoo.
41008032	O daraaki fuu o suuɗaana ɓe goɗɗum. Sey Piyer fooɗi mo senngo, tinni no haalda he makko dow ko o wi'i ɗum.
41008033	Nden Iisa hucciti har aahiiɓe ɓeen, daari ɓe, nduki Piyer, wi'i mo : —Woɗɗam, aan Ibiliisa ! Sabu miilooji maaɗa, ƴuwaay to Alla, to himɓe ɗi ƴuwi.
41008034	Iisa noddi jama'aare ndeen, aahiiɓe makko no tawaa nder mayre, o wi'i ɓe : —Muuyɗo tokkude kam fuu, acca daarude hoore mum, hooƴa leggal mum bardugal, tokka kam.
41008035	Sabu giɗɗo hisinde yonki mum, mursan ki. Amma mursuɗo ki ngam am he ngam Habaru lobbo oo, hisinan ki.
41008036	Ɗume keɓol duuniyaaru nduu fuu nafirta neɗɗo, nde joomum mursi yonki mum ?
41008037	No woodi ko neɗɗo waawi hokkitirde ngam heɓita ki naa ?
41008038	Neɗɗo fuu caliiɗo kam, miin he haalaaji am nder jamaanu bonɗo oo, murtuɗo he Alla, miin Ɓii-Neɗɗo, miin duu, mi saloto joomum wakkati ngartitoymi, miin he maleykaaɓe seniiɓe, teddungal Baabiraawo am no tokki.
41009001	O wi'i ɓe : —Goonga kaalananmi on, nder tawaaɓe ɗo ɓe hannden, woɓɓe maayataa ngi'aay Laamu Alla no warda he baawɗe.
41009002	Balɗe jeegom gaɗa kollitol no Iisa tokkirtee, Iisa adi Piyer, Yakuuba, he Yahaaya, ɓe ŋabbi waamnde toowne gom. Tagaadi makko waylitii yeeso maɓɓe.
41009003	Kolte makko no ƴelkita, ɗe ndawni tar. Walaa lonnoowo koltal baawɗo ɓoosi koltal ngal laaɓa faa ngal rawnira non.
41009004	Aahiiɓe tato ɓeen ngi'ii Eliya he Muusa mbanngi no kaalda he makko.
41009005	Kulkulal nanngi aahiiɓe tato ɓeen fuu faa Piyer tinni no haala fuulu faalaaji gom no wi'a : —Moodibbo, no wooɗi ko tawaaɗen ɗo. Accu min nyiɓa hukumuuji tati ɗo. Aan worru, Muusa worru, Eliya worru.
41009007	Luuldere gom wari suddi ɓe, sey daane gom ƴuwi nder luuldere ndeen wi'i : —Oo woni Ɓiyam mo korsinmi. Kettinanee mo !
41009008	Nden aahiiɓe ɓeen ndaari ngi'aay neɗɗo fuu se hanaa Iisa.
41009009	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ɓeen njippotonoo waamnde ndeen, Iisa wi'i ɓe to ɓe kaalan neɗɗo fuu ko ɓe ngi'ii sey wakkati Ɓii-Neɗɗo ummitii e maayde.
41009010	Ɓe njaɓi, amma ɓe keddii, iɓe ƴamodira hakkune maɓɓe maana « ummitaaki ».
41009011	Nden ɓe ƴami Iisa, ɓe mbi'i : —Ɗume waɗi jannginooɓe Tawreeta no mbi'a no tilsi Eliya arta Almasiihu warde ?
41009012	Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Goonga, Eliya artata wara ginan, moƴƴina kujje fuu. Amma ɗume waɗi dewte Alla mbi'i no tilsi Ɓii-Neɗɗo torree sanne, yennee ?
41009013	Miɗo haalana on, Eliya wariinoo, himɓe ngaɗanii mo ko ngiɗi hano no dewte Alla pillori ɗum.
41009014	Wakkati ɓe ngartunoo to aahiiɓe ɓeeto, ɓe tawi jama'aare mawne no fiilii ɓe. Jannginooɓe Tawreeta no njeddodira he maɓɓe.
41009015	Wonnooɓe nder jama'aare ndeen miilaayno ngi'a Iisa. Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo mo ɓe nani belɗum, nden ɓe ndoggi ɓe njaɓɓowii mo.
41009016	O ƴami ɓe, o wi'i : —Dow ɗume njeddodirton he jannginooɓe Tawreeta ɓee ?
41009017	Sey gorko gom fiirti hunnduko, wi'i Iisa : —Moodibbo, mi waddanii ma ɓiyam gorko mo ginnaaru beebi.
41009018	Wakkati ɗum ummani mo fuu, iɗum liɓa mo, hunnduko makko no wurtina nguufo. Omo ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe, o yoora karaw. Mi eeli aahiiɓe maaɗa ndiiwa ginnaaru nduun, amma ɓe keppi.
41009019	Nden Iisa wi'i jama'aare ndeen : —Hey onon himɓe jamaanu ɓe ngoonɗinaay ! Faa nde ngondanmi he mooɗon ? Faa nde tinnotoomi miɗo munyana on ? Ngaddanee kam suka oon !
41009020	Iisa waddanaa suka oon. Wakkati ginnaaru nduun hi'unoo Iisa, ndu dimmbi suka oon, ndu liɓi suka oon. O heddi omo tallitoo, hunnduko makko no wurtina nguufo.
41009021	Iisa ƴami baaba oon, wi'i mo : —Illa nde ɗum heɓi mo ? Baaba oon jaabii mo, wi'i : —Illa omo famɗi.
41009022	Kile keewɗe indu liɓa mo nder hiite naa nder ndiyam ngam tefude no ndu warirta mo. Yurma min, mballaa min nde nii aɗa waawi !
41009023	Nden Iisa wi'i mo : —Nde nii miɗo waawi mbiiɗaa naa ? Too, huune fuu no hoyani goonɗinɗo.
41009024	Wakkati mum da, baaba suka oon huuɓi, wi'i : —Mi goonɗini, amma wallam ngam goonɗinol saɗi kam.
41009025	Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo himɓe no ndogga warde, o sajiti ginnaaru nduun o wi'i : —Aan beebinoowo e pahinoowo, ƴuw gaɗa suka oo, to tokku mo kaden faa abada !
41009026	Ginnaaru nduun huuɓi, dimmbiri suka oon semmbe semmbe, ƴuwi gaɗa makko. Suka oon wa'i hano maayɗo nii, faa ko heewi nder wonnooɓe ɗon ɓeen no mbi'a o maayi.
41009027	Iisa nanngi junngo makko, umminii mo, o darii.
41009028	Wakkati Iisa naatunoo suudu, aahiiɓe makko ngari ƴami mo, mbi'i : —Ɗume waɗi ko minen, min keppi riiwude ginnaaru nduun ?
41009029	Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Du'aa'u tan, waɗataa neɗɗo riiwa iri ginnaaru nduu.
41009030	Gaɗa nyawtol suka beebaaɗo oon, Iisa ummidii aahiiɓe mum, ɓe pedditi leydi Galili. O hiɗaa neɗɗo fuu faama to o woni.
41009031	Omo waajoo aahiiɓe makko, omo wi'a ɓe Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jammbetee, wattee nder juuɗe. O waree, balɗe tati gaɗa mum, o ummitoo.
41009032	Aahiiɓe makko ɓeen paamaay maana haala makko, ɓe kuli duu ƴamude mo.
41009033	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum njottinoo Kafarnahum, ɓe naati suudu weerirde maɓɓe. Iisa ƴami ɓe, wi'i : —Dow ɗume ngonɗon oɗon njeddodira wakkati ngonnoɗen dow laawol ?
41009034	Amma ɓe njaabaaki, ngam dow ɓurɗo teddude hakkune maɓɓe ɓe njeddodiri.
41009035	Iisa jooɗii, noddi ɓe, kamɓe lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, wi'i ɓe : —Neɗɗo fuu hiɗi ardaade himɓe, tilay sey heeda gaɗa, laatoo golloowo maɓɓe, ɓe fuu.
41009036	O nanngi junngo cukalel gom, o darni yeeso maɓɓe, o huufi ngel,
41009037	o wi'i ɓe : —Jaɓɓiiɗo suka gooto hano cukalel ngel dow innde am, miin jaati joomum jaɓɓii. Jaɓɓiiɗo kam fuu, hanaa miin tan jaɓɓii, lilɗo kam joomum jaɓɓii.
41009038	Nden Yahaaya wi'i mo : —Moodibbo, min ngi'ii gorko gom no riiwira innde maa ginnaaji. Min kaɗi mo, ngam o wondaa he meeɗen.
41009039	Sey Iisa wi'i : —To kaɗee mo, ngam neɗɗo fuu waawaa waɗude haayne gom dow innde am, dey seɗɗa gaɗa mum, sakitoo bonna innde am.
41009040	Mo wanyaay en, fuu no wondi he meeɗen.
41009041	Goonga kaalananmi on, neɗɗo fuu kokkuɗo on ndiyam nder nyeɗerde ngam oɗon ngondi he Almasiihu, joomum heppataa baraaje mum baa seɗɗa.
41009042	Neɗɗo fuu waɗi gooto nder sukaaɓe goonɗinɓe kam ɓe waɗi hakke, ko ɓurani joomum wodde woni kaaƴa mannga haɓɓee he daane joomum, nden joomum faɗɗee nder maayo.
41009043	Se tawi junngo maaɗa waɗi ngaɗaa hakke, taƴu ngo. Ngam naatude nder mbuurnam nduumiiɗam he junngo wooto, no ɓuri moƴƴande neɗɗo dina naatirde juuɗe mum ɗiɗi nder jahannama, hiite nge nyifataa abada. [
41009044	Toon, gilƴi mum mbaatataa, hiite mum duu nyifataa.]
41009045	Se tawi koyngal maa waɗi ngaɗaa hakke, taƴu ngal. Ngam naatude nder mbuurnam nduumiiɗam he koyngal gootal no ɓurani neɗɗo dina faɗɗeede koyɗe mum ɗiɗi fuu no kuuɓi he mum nder jahannama hiite nge nyifataa. [
41009046	Toon, gilƴi mum mbaatataa, hiite mum duu nyifataa.]
41009047	Se tawi hitere maaɗa waɗi ngaɗaa hakke, ittu nde. Ngam naatude Laamu Alla a ɗokko, no ɓuri moƴƴande ma dina paɗɗideɗaa gite maaɗa ɗiɗi fuu no kuuɓi nder jahannama.
41009048	Toon, gilƴi mum mbaatataa, hiite mum duu nyifataa.
41009049	No nyaamdu gom tilay sey wattanee lamɗam ngam ndu wela, hano non duu himɓe fuu sey hiite tukkee he mum'en heɓa jikkuuji mum'en ngarta lobbi.
41009050	Lamɗam huune lobbere non, amma nde ɗam lamsaa, ɗume lamsinta ɗam ? Laatee hakkune mooɗon hano lamɗam, ngondon he jam.
41010001	Iisa dilli Kafarnahum, fa'i gaɗa maayo Urdun nder leydi Yahudiya. Jama'aare wari, fiilii mo, o tinni omo waajoo ɓe hano no o woowrunoo waajoraade ɓe.
41010002	Sey Fariisa'en gom ngari to makko faa tunna mo, nden ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i : —No daganii gorko seera deekum naa dagaaki ?
41010003	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Ɗume Muusa tilsini on ngaɗon ?
41010004	Ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i : —Muusa hokki laawol se gorko no seera deekum, winnda talkuru ceergal makko, nden seera mo.
41010005	Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Ngam on tiɓɓe-nyireeɓe, waɗi Muusa winndani on tilsinoore ndee.
41010006	Amma illa fuɗɗorde, wakkati Alla no tagannoo huune fuu, o tagi himɓe gorko he debbo.
41010007	Ngam majjum waɗi ko gorko no acca innum e bammum hawtaa he deekum,
41010008	ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe laatoo ɓanndu worru. Ndenne joonin, ɓe kanaa ɗiɗo kaden, amma ɓe go'o.
41010009	To neɗɗo senndu ko Alla hawri.
41010010	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum kootunoo, aahiiɓe ɓeen ƴamti mo maana haala kaan.
41010011	Sey o wi'i ɓe : —Neɗɗo fuu ceerɗo deekum ɓaŋi goɗɗo, yeeni,
41010012	hano non duu, debbo fuu ceeduɗo he gorum, dey ɓaŋa, debbo oon duu yeeni.
41010013	Nyannde gom himɓe ngaddi cukaloy mum'en to Iisa ngam o yowa juuɗe dow makkoy, amma aahiiɓe ɓeen nduki ɓe.
41010014	Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo ɗum, ɗum naawi mo, nden o wi'i aahiiɓe ɓeen : —Accee cukaloy koy ngara to am. To kaɗee koy, ngam nannduɓe he makkoy njeyi Laamu Alla.
41010015	Goonga kaalananmi on, mo jaɓɓoraaki Laamu Alla hano no cukalel ngel jaɓɓoraa nii, joomum naatataa nder maggu.
41010016	Nden o wunndii cukaloy koy, o yowi juuɗe dow makkoy, o barkini koy.
41010017	Nyannde gom, Iisa no caka yaadu sey gorko gom doggi wari, hofi yeeso makko, wi'i mo : —Moodibbo lobbo, ɗume kaanumi waɗude ngam heɓude mbuurnam nduumiiɗam ?
41010018	Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Ngam ɗume noddirtaa kam lobbo ? Lobbo fuu walaa sey Alla.
41010019	Aɗa anndi tilsinooje bi'ooje : To ittu yonki goɗɗo, to yeenu, to wujju, to seedana fewre, to toonya. Teddin inna maa e bammaa. Aɗa anndi ɗe naa ?
41010020	Gorko oon wi'i : —Moodibbo, kujje ɗee fuu miɗo hakkilii he majje illa cukaaku am.
41010021	Nden Iisa daari mo daarɗe hidde, wi'i mo : —Huune worre tan hoddanii ma. Sonnoy ko njogiɗaa fuu, njeddana talkaaɓe, a heɓan baraaje dow. Gaɗa mum, ngaraa tokkaa kam.
41010022	Gorko oo no diikuɗo sanne. Wakkati o nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, o ɓalinii, o dillidi mettorgal ɓerne.
41010023	Iisa daari aahiiɓe mum, wi'i : —Naatol jom njawdi nder Laamu Alla no tiiɗi faa !
41010024	Nanol haala kaa haayɗini aahiiɓe ɓeen sanne. O wi'i ɓe kaden : —Giɗaaɓe am, naatude Laamu Alla no tiiɗi faa !
41010025	Ngam naatol ngolooba nder wudde battal no ɓuri hoyde dina naatol jom njawdi nder Laamu Alla.
41010026	Haayne ɓeydi nanngude aahiiɓe ɓeen kaden. Ɓe keddii, iɓe ƴamodira hakkune maɓɓe, iɓe mbi'a : —Ndenne, moy hisata ?
41010027	Iisa daari ɓe, wi'i : —Ko heppori ɓii-aadama hepportaa Alla. Walaa fuu ko hepporta Alla.
41010028	Sey Piyer fiirti hunnduko wi'i mo : —Minen, min mboppii fuu, min tokki ma !
41010029	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Goonga kaalananmi on. Neɗɗo fuu woppi wuro mum, rimdaaɓe mum worɓe naa rewɓe, neɗɗo fuu woppi innum naa bammum, woppi sukaaɓe mum naa gese mum ngam am he ngam Habaru lobbo oo,
41010030	joomum no heɓan ko ɓuri ɗum kile hemre nder duuniyaaru ndu ngonɗen nder muuɗum joonin nduu. Joomum no heɓan cuuɗi, rimdaaɓe worɓe he rewɓe, inniraaɓe, ɓiɓɓe e gese. Joomum no torretee duu nder mayru. Amma nder wakkati garoowo, joomum no heɓan mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
41010031	Amma ardiiɓe heewɓe keedan gaɗa. Gaɗaaɓe ɓeen duu laatoto ardiiɓe.
41010032	Nyannde gom Iisa no ardi aahiiɓe mum no tokki, iɓe pa'i Ursaliima. Nder jahaangal maɓɓe ngaal, kulkulal no yaha no warta nder ɓerɗe aahiiɓe ɓeen he nder ɓerɗe wondunooɓe he maɓɓe fuu. Iisa noddi lilaaɓe mum sappo he ɗiɗo ɓeen feere, o haalani ɓe ko hewtoytoo mo Ursaliima.
41010033	O wi'i ɓe : —Kettinee, joonin enen nii eɗen njaha Ursaliima, Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wattetee nder juuɗe mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe Tawreeta. Ɓe ngatta mo nder juuɗe ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, ɓe kiitoo mo kiite maayde.
41010034	Ɓe njawoo mo, ɓe kartoo ɓe tutta dow makko, ɓe ɓocca mo, ɓe mbara mo. Amma balɗe tati gaɗa mum, o ummitoo.
41010035	Yakuuba he Yahaaya, ɓiɓɓe Jebede, ngari to Iisa mbi'i mo : —Moodibbo, miɗen ngiɗi min eele goɗɗum. Miɗen ngiɗi ngaɗanaa min ɗum duu.
41010036	Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Ɗume ngiɗɗon mi waɗana on ?
41010037	Nden ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Nyannde njooɗiɗaa dow jooɗorgal laamu maa ngu darja, accu min njooɗoo takkol maaɗa, gooto nyaamo maa, ooto nano maa.
41010038	Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —On anndaa ko eeloton. Oɗon mbaawi yarirde nyeɗerde nde njaranmi ndeen naa ? Oɗon mbaawi munyi waɗaneede batisma mo ngaɗanteemi oo naa ?
41010039	Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Miɗen mbaawi. Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe : —On njaran nyeɗerde nde njaranmi ndeen, on ngaɗantee batisma mo ngaɗanteemi oon,
41010040	amma jooɗaade nyaamo am naa nano am, hanaa miin woodi baawɗe hokkude ɗum. Alla moƴƴini jooɗorɗe ɗee ngam ɓe o suɓi.
41010041	Wakkati aahiiɓe sappo ɓeeto nanunoo ko Yakuuba e Yahaaya ƴamani ko'e mum'en, ɗum monnini ɓe.
41010042	Sey Iisa noddi ɓe, ɓe fuu, wi'i : —Oɗon anndi doole doole laamiiɓe ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe laamorii himɓe mum'en. Mawɓe maɓɓe ɓeen duu kolli baawɗe.
41010043	Amma onon kay, ɗum waɗataa hakkune mooɗon. Giɗɗo laatoo tedduɗo hakkune mooɗon, on fuu, no haani laatoo golloowo mooɗon.
41010044	Kaden duu, giɗɗo ardaade nder mooɗon, no haani laatoo maccuɗo mooɗon, on fuu.
41010045	Ɓii-Neɗɗo he hoore mum waraay faa gollanee, amma o wari faa o ngollana himɓe fuu, o mursa yonki makko ngam hisinde himɓe heewɓe.
41010046	Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ngari Yeriko. Wakkati Iisa, aahiiɓe mum he jama'aare gom umminoo Yeriko no pa'i Ursaliima, bumɗo gom bi'eteeɗo Bartima'us ɓii-Tima'us no jooɗii no garbina takkol laawol.
41010047	O nani no wi'ee Iisa mo Nasaratu woni no yawta, sey o fuɗɗi huuɓude, omo wi'a : —Iisa, taan Daawda, yurmam !
41010048	Himɓe heewɓe tokkitii no cajitoo he makko, no mbi'a o deƴƴita, amma kanko duu wakkati mum nii, o huuɓi kaden, o wi'i : —Taan Daawda, yurmam !
41010049	Sey Iisa darii, wi'i Bartima'us noddee. Nden, o noddaa o wi'aa : —Haya ! Umma, o wi'i ngaraa !
41010050	Bartima'us garbisi, faɗɗi suddamaare mum, wari to Iisa.
41010051	Iisa ƴami mo, wi'i : —Ɗume ngiɗaa mi waɗane ? Bartima'us jaabii mo, wi'i : —Moodibbo, miɗo hiɗi mi wumta.
41010052	Sey Iisa wi'i mo : —Yah ! Goonɗinol maaɗa hisinii ma. Wakkati mum da o wumti, o tokki Iisa, ɓe ndilli.
41011001	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum wonnoo hakkune Baytifaaji he Baytaniya, hedde har waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun, ɓe mboɗɗaaki Ursaliima sanne, sey Iisa lili aahiiɓe mum ɗiɗo gom,
41011002	o wi'i ɓe : —Ummee, njehee nder wurel gonngel yeeso mooɗon ngeel. No nattirɗon nder maggel, on tawan ɓinngel ara gom, ngel waɗɗaaka abada gom no haɓɓii. Kaɓɓitee ngel, ngaddanon kam.
41011003	Nde nii goɗɗo ƴamii on wi'i ngam ɗume waɗi oɗon ngaɗa ɗum, mbi'on Joomiraawo haajaa ngel. Dey o wartiran ngel law.
41011004	Ɓe njehi, ɓe tawi ɓinngel ara ngel no haɓɓii yaasi dammbugal ɓaade ndeen, ɓe kaɓɓiti ngel.
41011005	Sey wonnooɓe no ndarii ɗon ɓeen ƴami ɓe, mbi'i : —Ɗume ngatton ɗo nii ? Ɗume kaɓɓitanton arel ngeel ?
41011006	Aahiiɓe ɓeen njaaborii ɓe dey-dey no Iisa wi'irnoo ɓe. Himɓe ɓeen acci ɓe, ɓe ndillidi arel ngel.
41011007	Ɓe njaari ngel to Iisa, ɓe mbeɗɗiti kolte maɓɓe dow maggel, Iisa waɗɗii.
41011008	Dow laawol, himɓe ɗuɓɓe mbeɗɗiti kolte mum'en, woɓɓe kelti licce mbeerti dow maggol.
41011009	Ardiiɓe mo he heedanɓe mo gaɗa no kuuɓa no mbi'a : — Hosanna ! Barkinaaɗo woni garɗo dow innde Joomiraawo !
41011010	Barke tabbita he laamu ngaroowu, laamu maama meeɗen Daawda ! Jettooje ngoodani Alla Toowɗo !
41011011	Wakkati Iisa naatunoo Ursaliima, o naati nder Juulirde mawne. O hi'i huune fuu ko woni nder mayre. Amma ngam naange no yana, o wurtii Ursaliima, o yehi Baytaniya, kanko he aahiiɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen.
41011012	Wakkati Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ndawannoo Baytaniya no pa'i Ursaliima, Iisa no nanannoo rafo.
41011013	Sey toon dow laawol, o holliri ibbi gom ngooduki haako. O yehi, o ƴeewowi nde iki tawdee ɓiɓɓe. Wakkati o yottinoo to makki, fuy non o tawaay he makki se hanaa kaakooli, wakkati dimol ibbe waɗaay.
41011014	Iisa wi'i ibbi kiin : —To neɗɗo fuu yeeƴito nyaama ɓiɓɓe maa kaden ! Aahiiɓe makko nani ko o wi'i ki.
41011015	No Iisa'en njottorii Ursaliima, Iisa naati jawreeru Juulirde Ursaliima mawne, o fuɗɗi omo riiwa soodooɓe e sonnooɓe wonɓe nder mayru. O liɓi teburuuji weccooɓe ceede he jooɗorɗe sonnooɓe buugaali.
41011016	O haɗi yaha-warta ɓiɓɓe luumooɓe he donle mum'en nder mayre.
41011017	O waajii ɓe o wi'i : —Hanaa no winndii nder dewte, Alla wi'i : Suudu am no inndirtee suudu to lenyi fuu ngarta du'oo ! Amma onon, on ngaɗii ndu wumpere wuyɓe.
41011018	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe Tawreeta nani ko o wi'i. Ɓe tefi joonkay no ɓe mbardata mo, amma ɓe kuli mo, ngam waaju makko naatii jama'aare ndeen sanne.
41011019	Wakkati naange yanunoo Iisa he aahiiɓe mum mburtii huɓeere Ursaliima pa'i Baytaniya.
41011020	Jaangoore kippol teburuuji weccooɓe ceede e sonnooɓe buugaali ɓeen, Iisa'en kejji illa beete coƴƴi Ursaliima. Wakkati ɓe paani ibbi kiin sey ɓe ngi'ii ko ki yoorii karaw faa he ɗaɗi.
41011021	Nden Piyer miccitii, wi'i Iisa : —Moodibbo, ndaa ! Ibbi ki kuɗunoɗaa kiin yoorii.
41011022	Sey Iisa jaabii, wi'i ɓe : —Ngoonɗinee Alla !
41011023	Goonga kaalananmi on. Neɗɗo fuu bi'uɗo waamnde ndee ɗoofa, saamoy ley maayo, nde nii joomum goonɗinii nder ɓerne muuɗum, ko kam wi'i ɗum waɗan. Sikka fuu walaa joomum no jaabantee ko wi'i ɗum.
41011024	Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo wi'a on, ko eeluɗon nder du'aa'u fuu, ngoonɗinee ko on keɓii ɗum, on njaabantee ɗum duu.
41011025	Kaden wakkati fuu mo ndariɗon oɗon du'oo, nde nii no woodi mo njogitaniɗon, njaafanee mo ko o waɗi on ɗum, ngam Baabii'on gonɗo dow yaafanoo on gacceeji mooɗon. [
41011026	Amma se on njaafaaki, Baaba mooɗon gonɗo dow oon duu yaafataako hakkeeji mooɗon.]
41011027	Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ngarti Ursaliima. Wakkati Iisa fiilotonoo nder Juulirde Ursaliima mawne, hooreeɓe cakkanooɓe Alla, jannginooɓe Tawreeta he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe ɓadii mo,
41011028	ƴami mo mbi'i : —Baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗirtaa kujje ɗee fuu ? Moy hokki ma laawol waɗude ɗe ?
41011029	Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Mi ƴaman on huune worre tan, onon duu. Nde nii on njaabake kam, mi haalanan on baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗiranmi kujje ɗee fuu.
41011030	Alla naa himɓe kokki Yahaaya laawol waɗude batisma ? Miɗo hettinanii on !
41011031	Sey iɓe caawodira hakkune maɓɓe, iɓe mbi'a : —Nde nii en mbi'i Alla, o wi'an ko waɗi en ngoonɗinaay Yahaaya ?
41011032	Amma eɗen mbaawi wi'ude himɓe naa ? Ɓe ƴamodiri nde iɓe mbaawi mbi'i nii ngam iɓe kula himɓe. To himɓe fuu, tabbat Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma no annabiijo.
41011033	Sey ɓe njaabii Iisa, ɓe mbi'i : —Min anndaa. Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Too, miin duu, mi haalantaa on baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗiranmi kujje ɗee fuu.
41012001	Nder Ursaliima Iisa tinni no haalda aahiiɓe mum he hooreeɓe Yahudankooɓe nder kippol haala, omo wi'a : —Neɗɗo gom waɗi ngesa cabiije. O waɗi koogol o fiiltini nga. O wasi luggere ɓoosirde, o nyiɓi suudu toownu ngam doomooɓe magga. Nden o wuƴi nga remooɓe gom, o waɗi jahaangal.
41012002	Wakkati teɓol cabiije ɗeen yottinoo, o lili golloowo makko gom jaɓowa mbaka makko to remooɓe ɓeen.
41012003	Remooɓe ɓeen nanngi lilaaɗo oon, piyi mo, njoofi mo juuɗe ɓole.
41012004	Jom ngesa kaan liliti golloowo mum gom kaden to maɓɓe. Ɓe eli mo, ɓe njenni mo.
41012005	Jom ngesa oon lili faa hannden golloowo mum gom kaden, ɓe mbari lilaaɗo oon. O lili gollooɓe makko re'ataa he maɓɓe. Ɓe piyi woɓɓe, ɓe mbari woɓɓe duu.
41012006	Neɗɗo gooto koraniiɗo mo oon, woni ɓiyiiko korsuɗo. Kanko duu o lili mo he maɓɓe, o wi'i hoore makko : « Ɓe teddinan mo ngam o ɓiyam. »
41012007	Amma remooɓe ɓeen mbi'odiri hakkune mum'en : « Ma'adalla. Oo nii woni donoowo oon. Ngaree mbaren mo, heɓa ndonen ngesa ngaa ! »
41012008	Sey ɓe nanngi mo, ɓe mburtini mo nder ngesa ngaan, ɓe mbari mo.
41012009	Gaɗa pillaaki kippol haala ngool, Iisa ƴami, wi'i : —Too ! Joonin, noy jom ngesa ngaan waɗata ? O waran kanko he hoore makko, o wara remooɓe ɓeen, o halfina ngesa ngaan woɓɓe, naa noy ?
41012010	On njanngaay ko winndaa nder dewte ɗeen, wi'aa : Hayre nde nyiɓooɓe ɓeen mboppi ndeen, kayre laatii hoore nyibdi ndiin.
41012011	Ɗum golle Joomiraawo, haayne non duu he giiɗe meeɗen !
41012012	Hooreeɓe Yahudankooɓe tefi no nanngirta Iisa, ngam ɓe paamii ko kippol haala ngool, kamɓe ngol sappii. Amma ɓe cuusaay jama'aare ndeen, ngam majjum waɗi ɓe acci mo, ɓe ndilli.
41012013	Balɗe no njaha balɗe no ngarta sey nyannde gom Fariisa'en he himɓe Hirudus lili lilaaɓe he Iisa ngam tunna mo nder haalaaji makko.
41012014	Ɓe ngari, ɓe mbi'i mo : —Moodibbo, miɗen anndi ko goonga tan kaalataa. A hulataa neɗɗo fuu, a ɓurdinaay himɓe, aɗa janngina laawol Alla goonga e goonga. No hegii min kokka laamiiɗo Rooma mawɗo janngal naa hegaaki ?
41012015	Min kokka mo naa to min kokku mo ? Iisa faamani munafikaare maɓɓe, nden wi'i ɓe : —Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon tunna kam ? Ngaddanee kam tammal cardi, mi hi'a.
41012016	Ɓe ngaddani mo. O ƴami ɓe o wi'i : —Foto moy he innde moy woni ɗo ? Ɓe mbi'i mo : —Laamiiɗo Rooma.
41012017	Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Ndenne kokkee laamiiɗo Rooma ko jeyi, kokkon Alla duu ko jeyi. Ko Iisa jaabii ɗum haaynii ɓe sanne.
41012018	Sadduki'en, kam'en ngoni yeddooɓe no mbi'a ko maayɗo fuu ummitittaako. Nyannde gom, ɓe ummii ɓe ngari to Iisa.
41012019	Ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Moodibbo, Muusa tilsinii enen Yahudankooɓe, nde gorko dewli, dey maayi rimaay, minyum naa mawnum dewla deekiiko ngam heɓana mo jippotooɓe.
41012020	Waɗiino rimdaaɓe jeɗɗo gom. Arano oon dewli debbo mum, dey maayi, rimaay.
41012021	Ɗiɗaɓo oon dewli debbo oon, kam duu maayi rimaay. Tataɓo oon duu waɗi hano non.
41012022	Rimdaaɓe jeɗɗo ɓeen fuu tokki ndewli debbo oon, baa gooto maɓɓe rimaay. Gaɗa maayde maɓɓe, ɓe fuu, debbo oon duu maayi.
41012023	Too, nyannde darŋal, moy nder maɓɓe laatoto goro debbo oo ? Ngam ɓe fuu jeɗɗo kaɓɓani mo.
41012024	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —On mboofii, oɗon anndi ngam ɗume ? Ngam on paamaay ko dewte ɗeen mbi'i, on anndaa duu baawɗe Alla.
41012025	Ngam nyannde maayɓe ummitii, worɓe ndewlataa, rewɓe duu ndewlataake. Himɓe fuu no mbuuran hano no maleykaaɓe mbuurdiri nder kammu.
41012026	Har ko daarata ummitaaki maayɓe, on njanngaay ɗum jaa nder dewtere Muusa, nder taariihi wuumoore huɓɓoore. Hano no Alla haaldiri he Muusa nii, wi'i : Miin woni Alla Ibrahim, Alla Isiyaaku, Alla Yakuuba.
41012027	Nden Iisa ɓeydi wi'ude ɓe : —O Alla wuurɓe, o hanaa Alla maayɓe. Ndenne, on mboofii sanne sanne.
41012028	Nyannde gom jannginoowo Tawreeta gom nani yewtere Iisa he Sadduki'en. O nani duu ko Iisa jaabake ɓe faa wooɗi. Jannginoowo Tawreeta oo ɓadii Iisa, ƴami mo wi'i : —Nder tilsinooje ɗee fuu, ndeye ɓuri semmbe ?
41012029	Nden Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Ɓurne ɗe fuu semmbe woni wi'ude : Hettina Isra'el ! Alla Joomiraawo meeɗen tan woni Joomiraawo.
41012030	Hiɗir Alla Joomiraawo maa he ɓerne maa fuu he yonki maa fuu he hakkillo maa fuu he semmbe maa fuu.
41012031	Tilsinoore ɗiɗaɓere ndeen woni : Ngiɗaa gondo maa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maa. Walaa fuu tilsinooje ɓurɗe tilsinooje ɗiɗi ɗee semmbe.
41012032	Nden jannginoowo Tawreeta oon wi'i mo : —Moodibbo ! A haalii goonga, ko mbi'uɗaa Alla tan woni Joomiraawo, kaden duu Alla gom fuu walaa se hanaa kanko.
41012033	Hiɗirde Alla he ɓerne mum fuu he hakkillo mum fuu he semmbe mum fuu, he hiɗirde gondo mum hano neɗɗo hiɗiri hoore mum, no ɓuri sadakaaji buleteeɗi he sadakaaji fuu !
41012034	Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo ko jannginoowo Tawreeta oo jaaborake ɗum he hakkillo, nden o wi'i mo : —A woɗɗaa Laamu Alla. Gaɗa jannginoowo Tawreeta oo, neɗɗo fuu suusaay ƴamude Iisa goɗɗum kaden.
41012035	Nyannde gom Iisa no waajoo nder Juulirde Ursaliima mawne, sey o ƴami, o wi'i : —Noy waɗi jannginooɓe Tawreeta no mbi'a ko Almasiihu taan Daawda non ?
41012036	Ngam Daawda he hoore mum haali nder baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i : Alla Joomiraawo wi'i Joomiraawo am : War, njooɗaa nyaamo am, faa mi sorna wayɓe maa ley teppere maa.
41012037	Daawda he hoore mum inndiri Almasiihu Joomiraawo mum. Ndenne, noy o laatortoo taaniiko tan ? Jama'aare e jama'aare woni no hettinanii Iisa nder welwelo.
41012038	Nder waaju makko, o wi'i ɓe : —Tinnee, kakkilee he jannginooɓe Tawreeta. Iɓe ngiɗi ɓornaade kolte mawɗe. Iɓe ngiɗi sanneede cannooje tedduɗe nder luuɓe.
41012039	Iɓe ngiɗi jooɗorɗe ɓurɗe teddude nder baajorɗi. Iɓe ngiɗi jooɗorɗe ɓurɗe teddude nde nii ɓe noddaama batu.
41012040	Iɓe eyta rewɓe ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi ngam teetude njawdi maɓɓe. Iɓe njunna du'aa'uuji maɓɓe ngam ɓe limtee nder lobbuɓe. Kiite naawɗe ɓe ngaɗantee.
41012041	Iisa no jooɗii nder waajordu, omo hucciti he keesuwal mayru. Omo daara no himɓe ngattirta hadiyaaji mum'en nder maggal. Riikuɓe heewɓe ngatti ceede ɗuɗɗe nder maggal.
41012042	Fotodiri nyannde mum debbo gom mo gorum maayi, mo walaa fuy, wari, watti buuɗoy ɗiɗoy nder maggal.
41012043	Sey Iisa noddi aahiiɓe mum, wi'i ɓe : —Goonga kaalananmi on : Debbo oo, ko o watti nder keesuwal ngaal no ɓuri ko ɓeeto fuu ngatti.
41012044	Ngam ko ɓe ngatti nder keesuwal ngaal ɓuytataa fuy nder njawdi maɓɓe. Amma debbo oo, ko o joginoo ngam o wuurda, ɗum o watti nder maggal.
41013001	Nyannde gom wakkati Iisa wurtinoo nder Juulirde mawne, aahiijo makko gom wi'i mo : —Moodibbo, ndaa kaaƴo mawko koo, kanko he nyibdiiji booɗuɗi ɗii fuu !
41013002	Sey Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —A hi'i nyibdi ndii, no ndi foti manngu, baa hayre worre hoddataako no deki dow wonnde. Ndi fuu, ndi liɓetee.
41013003	Nyannde gom Iisa no jooɗii dow waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun. Omo hucciti har Juulirde Ursaliima mawne. Sey Piyer, Yakuuba, Yahaaya he Andiire ummii njehi to makko kamɓe tan, ƴami mo, mbi'i :
41013004	—Haalan min nde liɓol ngool waɗata. Alaama oye hi'etee wakkati ɗum hiɗi waɗude ?
41013005	Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Kakkilee to neɗɗo fuu majjina on.
41013006	Himɓe heewɓe no ngardan innde am, iɓe mbi'a : « Miin woni Almasiihu. » Ɓe majjina himɓe heewɓe.
41013007	Nde nii on nani habaru konuuji naa siri majji, to kulee. No tilsi ɗum waɗa, amma ɗum hanaa alaama kolloowo timmoode duuniyaaru.
41013008	Lenyol habdan he lenyol, laamu habdan he laamu. Dimmbaaki leydi waɗan nokku nokkuuje, rafooji duu ngaɗan. Ɗum nanndaana he fuɗɗorde ŋatawere.
41013009	Ndeenee ko'e mooɗon, ngam himɓe no njaaran on to hiitotooɓe. Ɓe piyan on nder baajorɗi maɓɓe. Ɓe ndarna on yeeso hooreeɓe kam e laamiiɓe ngam sabbu am, ngam ceedoɗon yeeso maɓɓe dow Habaru lobbo oo.
41013010	No tilsi Habaru lobbo oon waajee nder lenyi fuu.
41013011	Wakkati ɓe nanngoyta on faa ɓe njaara on yeeso hiitotooɓe, to ko'e mooɗon kaɓɓo dow ko kaaloton. Nde wakkati oon warii fuu, on keɓan ko kaaluɗon. Ngam hanaa onon kaalata, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo haalata.
41013012	Himɓe no kokkitiran sakiraaɓe mum'en mbaree, baaba no hokkitiran ɓiyum. Sukaaɓe no ummanto saarooɓe mum'en, gaɗa dabare ɓe mbaree.
41013013	Ngam am, himɓe fuu mbanyan on. Amma tarsiniiɗo faa yottii he timmoode, joomum no hisintee.
41013014	On ngi'an huune bonde, ɓurne nyiddinaade no waddetee, darnee to nde haanaa darneede. (Jannguɗo ɗum fuu faama ɗum no wooɗiri.) Nden, tawaaɓe nder Yahudiya fuu ndoggira baamle.
41013015	Tawaaɗo dow suudu, to jippoo wi'a naatan suudu hooƴa goɗɗum.
41013016	Tawaaɗo ngesa, to yeeƴito hooƴa koltal mum.
41013017	Nder balɗe mum bone no saaman dow saawɓe he musinooɓe !
41013018	Eelee Alla to ɗum fottodir he dunngu.
41013019	Ngam nder wakkati oon ɗon, torra mawka waran. Illa wakkati Alla tagi duuniyaaru faa warde hannden iri makka waɗaayno abada. Iri makka waɗataa kaden duu faa abada.
41013020	Nde nii Joomiraawo raɓɓinɗinaayno balɗe ɗeen, neɗɗo fuu hisataano. Amma o raɓɓinɗinii ɗe ngam suɓaaɓe makko.
41013021	Nder wakkati oon, nde nii goɗɗo wi'i on : « Ndaaree Almasiihu nii ɗo » naa « too'en », to ngoonɗinee joomum.
41013022	Ngam almasiihuuɓe fewreeɓe he annabiiɓe fewreeɓe mbanngowan, ɓe ngaɗa alamaaji e kaayɗe, ngam majjinde baa suɓaaɓe Alla ɓeen, nde nii no waɗoo.
41013023	Ndenne, kakkilee ! Mi haalani on huune fuu illa ɗum waraay.
41013024	—Gaɗa saɗɗormaaji nyalaaɗe ɗeen, sey naange niɓɓa, lewru accaa yeynude,
41013025	koode caama, Alla waɗa baawɗe gonɗe dow fuu ndimmboo.
41013026	Wakkati mum, Ɓii-Neɗɗo no hi'etee, no wara dow duule. Omo warda baawɗe e teddungal manngal.
41013027	O lilan maleykaaɓe makko nder kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu, ɓe kawrowa suɓaaɓe makko illa hoore leydi ndii faa hoore leydi ndiito.
41013028	Too, ndaaree ibbi kii, ekkitoɗon goɗɗum he makki. Nde nii licce makki keyɗitii, kaakooli makki mbilitii, oɗon anndi ko dunngu ɓadake.
41013029	Hano non kaden, nde nii on ngi'ii kujje ɗee no ngara, paamee ko wakkati oon ɓadake, Ɓii-Neɗɗo no dammbugal wuro.
41013030	Goonga kaalananmi on : Jamaanu oo timmataa tawee kujje ɗee fuu ngaraay.
41013031	Kammu e leydi taggan, amma haalaaji am timmataa abada.
41013032	Walaa annduɗo nyalaane ndeen naa wakkati mo ɗum waɗoyta, baa maleykaaɓe wonɓe dow ɓeen, naa Ɓiɗɗo oon anndaa ɗum, sey nii Baabiraawo oon tan.
41013033	Kakkilee, tinnee to on ɗaanee ngam on anndaa nde wakkati oon warta.
41013034	Wakkati oo no wi'ee omo nanndi e gorko gaɗuɗo jahaangal. O acci ɓaade makko nder juuɗe gollooɓe makko. O holli neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu ko hakkiltoo. O wi'i doomoowo dammbugal oon dooma ngal no wooɗiri.
41013035	Ndenne, tinnee heɓa taweɗon on ciryiiɓe, ngam on anndaa wakkati jom ɓaade oon wartoyta. No waawi waɗa o warta futuro naa caka jemma, naa fajiri fadde dontooje jogginde naa illa beete.
41013036	To o juhu on, o tawa oɗon ɗaani !
41013037	Ko kaalananmi on ɗum, kam kaalananmi himɓe fuu : Tinnee to on ɗaanee !
41014001	Balɗe ɗiɗi fadde Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe e Juulɗe buuru mo walaa ƴuufinirɗum, mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla e jannginooɓe Tawreeta no tefa nder cuccukka no nanngirii Iisa, mbara mo.
41014002	Amma iɓe mbi'odira hakkune maɓɓe : —To en nanngu mo wakkati juulɗe ɗeen, ngam to himɓe murtu.
41014003	Iisa no Baytaniya nder ɓaade Simon, inndirteeɗo Simon Ceppinnga. Omo jooɗii, omo nyaama, sey debbo gom naati, no jogii faanu nebbam uurɗam, caadiɗam sanne, ɗam hawrodiraaka he huune fuu. Debbo oon heli daane faanu nduun, joorti nebbam ɗaam dow hoore Iisa.
41014004	Nder himɓe tawaaɓe toon ɓeen, woɓɓe ɓerne mum'en metti, no mbi'odira : —Bonnude iri nebbam ɗaam, ɗume ɗum nafata ?
41014005	Iɗam waawi sonneede, gollooɓe keme tato njoɓee, naa ceede ɗeen kokkee talkaaɓe ! Ɓe tokki iɓe njanca debbo oon.
41014006	Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Accee mo ! Ngam ɗume njancoton mo ? Ko o waɗanii kam ɗum no wooɗi sanne.
41014007	Talkaaɓe no tawdee he mooɗon wakkati fuu, nde muuyɗon fuu oɗon mbaawi waɗande ɓe moƴƴere. Amma miin, mi tawdataake he mooɗon nyannde fuu.
41014008	O waɗi ko o waawi. O wuji nebbam uurɗam ɗam he ɓanndu am ngam siryaade mooɓol am.
41014009	Goonga kaalananmi on : Nokku fuu to Habaru lobbo oo waajaa nder duuniyaaru, ko debbo oo waɗi ɗum, no filletee, ngam miccitaade he makko.
41014010	Yahuuda Iskariyot, gooto nder lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, yehi to mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ngam wattude Iisa nder juuɗe maɓɓe.
41014011	Ɓe kettinani mo, ɓe nani belɗum, faa ɓe adi alkawal ɓe mbi'i kam'en kokkan mo ceede. Illa wakkati oo, Yahuuda no tefa, no jammborii Iisa.
41014012	Nyalooma arano Juulɗe buuru mo walaa ƴuufinirɗum, nyalooma mo ɓe kirsannoo jawɗi ngam Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe, aahiiɓe Iisa ƴami Iisa, mbi'i : —Toy ngiɗaa min ciryowoo hiraane juulɗe ɗeen ?
41014013	Iisa lili ɗiɗo nder maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe : —Ummee naatee huɓeere ndee, on pottan gorko gom no ronndi loone ndiyam, tokkon mo.
41014014	Ɓaade nde o naati ndeen, mbi'on joomiire moodibbo lili min, min ƴame toy suudu ndu o nyaamdata he aahiiɓe makko hiraane juulɗe nduun woni ?
41014015	Jom ɓaade ndeen hollan on suudu mawnu gom, wonndu no deki dow wonndu. Moƴƴinee ndu, nder mayru ngaɗanton en hiraane ndeen.
41014016	Sey aahiiɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen njehi, naatowi huɓeere ndeen. Ɓe ngiiti huune fuu ko Iisa wi'unoo ɓe, ɓe ciryii hiraane ndeen.
41014017	Futuro, wakkati naange yanunoo, Iisa wardi he lilaaɓe mum sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen.
41014018	Wakkati ɓe kiirtotonoo, Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Goonga kaalananmi on : Hakkune mooɗon, onon nyaamdooɓe he am, gooto nder mooɗon no jammboto kam.
41014019	Ɓe ɓalinii sanne, sey ɓe ƴami mo gooto gooto, ɓe mbi'ii : —Kori hanaa miin non ?
41014020	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Gooto nder mooɗon, onon sappo e ɗiɗo ɓee, gonɗo no suuwida junngo mum he am nder le'al gootal, oon non.
41014021	Ɓii-Neɗɗo accan duuniyaaru hano no ɗum winndiraa dow makko nder dewte. Amma bone saaman dow jammbotooɗo mo ! Joomum nde nii rimaakano non, nden no ɓuranan ɗum.
41014022	Wakkati ɓe nyaamannoo ndeen, Iisa hooƴi buuru, yetti Alla, helti mo, hokki ɓe, wi'i : —Njaɓee, ɗum woni ɓanndu am.
41014023	Gaɗa mum, o hooƴi nyeɗerde cabiijam, o yetti Alla, o hokki ɓe, ɓe fuu ɓe njari.
41014024	O wi'i ɓe : —Ɗum woni ƴiiƴam am, ƴiiƴam ndufeteeɗam ngam sabbu himɓe heewɓe, ƴiiƴam tabbintinoojam amaana Alla.
41014025	Goonga kaalananmi on. Mi yarataa cabiijam kaden, sey nii nder Laamu Alla.
41014026	Iisa he aahiiɓe ɓeen njimi jimi Jabuura, ɓe mburtii, ɓe njehi dow waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun.
41014027	Toon Iisa wi'i ɓe : —On fuu, on mboppan kam ndoggon, ngam no winndaa, wi'aa : Mi fiyan duroowo oon, baali ɗiin cankitoo.
41014028	Amma nde mi ummitake, mi artan on Galili.
41014029	Sey Piyer itti hunnduko, wi'i mo : —Baa nde nii ɓe fuu ɓe ndoggi ɓe mboppii ma, miin kay, mi woppataa ma.
41014030	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Goonga kaalananmaami. Nder jemma oo, fadde ndontoori jogginde kile ɗiɗi, a wi'an a anndaa kam kile tati !
41014031	Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay Piyer wi'i mo kaden : —Baa nde a maayan non, mi maaydan he maaɗa, abada mi wi'ataa mi anndaa ma. Non aahiiɓe ɓeeto duu mbi'i.
41014032	Iisa he aahiiɓe mum ngari nokkuure wi'eteene Gesemaane, toon o wi'i ɓe : —Njooɗee ɗo, mi yahan mi du'owo.
41014033	O noddi Piyer, Yakuuba e Yahaaya, o yahdi he maɓɓe. Iɓe ɗon nii sey taƴo-taƴo fuɗɗi nanngude mo, ɓillaare naatani mo sanne.
41014034	Sey o wi'i aahiiɓe makko : —Bononda ɓerne am ɗuuɗi sanne faa no tefa warude kam. Ndaree ɗo, ndoomee kam, kakkilee to on ɗaanee.
41014035	O woɗɗi ɓe seɗɗa, o turni yeeso makko faa he leydi, omo du'oo, omo wi'a : —Baaba, nde nii tawi iɗum waɗoo, woɗɗinam nyeɗerde torra kaa.
41014036	Yaa Abba am ! Walaa ko hepporte. Amma to ɗum laatoo muuyɗe am, ɗum laatoo muuyɗe maa aan.
41014037	Nden o warti, o tawi aahiiɓe ɓeen no ɗaanii. Sey o wi'i Piyer : —Simon ! Simon ! A ɗaanii naa ? Jaa a waawaa doomude kam baa nii yamnde worre ?
41014038	Ummee, ndu'ee, to on caamu nder cii'aaki. Ɓerne no hiɗi amma ɓanndu tampi.
41014039	Iisa soƴƴii kaden, du'ii hano no o du'ori arannde nii.
41014040	O warti, o tawi iɓe ɗaanii kaden. Ɗoyngol maɓɓe moddi sanne. Ɓe mbaawaa jooɗaade ndoomi, ɓe keppi duu fuu ko ɓe njaabortoo Iisa.
41014041	Iisa yehi, warti tataɓere mum, o wi'i ɓe kaden : —Faa joonin oɗon ɗaanii, oɗon powta naa ? Too, joonin kay hanti. Wakkati mo Ɓii-Neɗɗo wattetee nder juuɗe waɗooɓe hakke oon wari.
41014042	Ummee ndillen ! Ndaa, jammbotooɗo kam oon nii, no wara.
41014043	Iisa no caka haala, sey Yahuuda, gooto nder lilaaɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, yottii no wondi he himɓe heewɓe. Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla, jannginooɓe Tawreeta, he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe gom lili ɓe, iɓe njogii takubaaje he cabbi.
41014044	Tawi Yahuuda jammbotooɗo mo oon, tinndinnoo ɓe wi'i : —Mo mbunndotoomi oon, kam woni mo. Nanngon mo, njaaron, paddoɗon mo.
41014045	No Yahuuda yottorii, fonndi Iisa, wi'i mo : —Moodibbo ! Sey o wunndii mo.
41014046	Warduɓe he makko, nanngi Iisa.
41014047	Aahiijo Iisa gom tawaaɗo hadde maɓɓe, sorti takubaahi mum, soppi gollanoowo mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla, o taƴi nowru makko.
41014048	Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Ko waɗi ngarduɗon takubaaje e cabbi faa nanngon kam hano miin woni mawɗo murtuɓe ?
41014049	Miɗo wondunoo he mooɗon wakkati fuu nder Juulirde mawne miɗo waajoo. On nanngaay kam, amma tilay ko dewte Alla mbi'i ɗum tabbita.
41014050	Sey aahiiɓe ɓeen fuu ndoggi mboppi mo.
41014051	Jokolle gom no wakkii wudere mum, tokkitii gaɗa koyɗe Iisa. Ɓe tefi ɓe nannga mo,
41014052	o woppi wudere makko, o doggi ɓanndu ɓoldu.
41014053	Nanngunooɓe Iisa ɓeen njaari Iisa to mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla fuu. Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla, jannginooɓe Tawreeta, he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe gom kawri nokkuure ndeen.
41014054	Piyer toowti ɓe seɗɗa, tokkitii ɓe naako nder batamaare ɓaade mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon. Nden kanko duu o wari, o jooɗii hadde doomooɓe ɓaade ɓeen, omo ƴilfoo.
41014055	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla he hawriine dawrooɓe no tefa ko peliri Iisa ngam o waree, amma ɓe keɓaay ɗum.
41014056	Heewɓe no tuuma mo dow fewre, amma haalaaji maɓɓe ngalaa no tokkodira.
41014057	Nder maɓɓe woɓɓe tuumi mo, mbi'i :
41014058	—Min nani omo wi'a, o liɓan Juulirde mawne nde himɓe mahiri juuɗe mum'en. Nden nder balɗe tati o nyiɓa juulirde nde junngo fuu mahaay.
41014059	Ɓe potaay baa dow haala ka ɓe mbi'i kaa.
41014060	Nden mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon ummii, darii caka jama'aare ndeen, ƴami Iisa wi'i : —No woodi ko njaabotoɗaa dow ko ɓe mbi'i dow maaɗa ɗum naa ?
41014061	Iisa deƴƴiti, wi'aay baa. Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon ƴami mo kaden, wi'i : —Aan woni Almasiihu, Ɓii-Alla Jom barke naa ?
41014062	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Miin non. On ngi'an Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jooɗii nyaamo Jom baawɗe, no wara dow duule.
41014063	Sey mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon ɓerne mum ummii, serki kolte mum, wi'i : —Haala gom no gaɗa kaden ɓurka ka naa ?
41014064	On narrii noppi mooɗon ko o bonni innde Alla. Ɗume ngi'uɗon nder huune ndee ? Nden ɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'i omo haani wareede, omo haani wareede.
41014065	Nder maɓɓe, woɓɓe kaarti tutti dow makko, cuddi yeeso makko, luƴƴii mo, mbi'i mo : —Nde nii a annabiijo, haalan min moy fii ma ! Doomooɓe ɓaade ndeen duu tinni no piya mo.
41014066	Wakkati Piyer wonnoo nder batamaare ɓaade mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon, sey gooto nder horɓe ɓaade ndeen yottii.
41014067	O hi'i Piyer no ƴilfoo, o ƴeewi Piyer faa wooɗi, o wi'i mo : —Aan duu, aɗa wondunoo Iisa mo Nasaratu.
41014068	Piyer yeddi, wi'i mo : —Mi anndaa ! Mi faamaay ko kaalataa. No Piyer haaliri haala kaa, sey o ummii, o darowi dammbugal ɓaade ndeen. [Wakkati mum da ndontoori joggini.]
41014069	Korɗo oon wurtii, fotti he makko kaden, sey haalani darinooɓe ɗon ɓeen, wi'i ɓe : —Oo duu, no gooto nder maɓɓe !
41014070	Piyer yeddi kaden. Ɓooyi seɗɗa gaɗa mum, sey darinooɓe ɗon ɓeen mbi'i mo : —Sikka fuu walaa, nder maɓɓe njeyaɗaa, ngam a ɓii-leydi Galili.
41014071	Sey Piyer fuɗɗi hunaade. Omo hunoo, omo hutto, omo wi'a : —Mi anndaa gorko mo kaalaton haala mum oo sam !
41014072	Wakkati mum da, ndontoori joggini nde ɗiɗaɓere. Sey Piyer miccitii ko Iisa wi'unoo ɗum : « Fadde ndontoori jogginde kile ɗiɗi, a wi'an a anndaa kam kile tati. » Nden Piyer darii yaasin tinni no wulla no wulla.
41015001	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla, jannginooɓe Tawreeta, mawɓe Yahudankooɓe he tawaaɓe nder hawriine dawrooɓe, kawri illa beete caawodiri. Ɓe kaɓɓi Iisa, ɓe njaari to Pilaatus.
41015002	Nden Pilaatus ƴami mo, wi'i : —Aan woni laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe oon naa ? Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Aan e hoore maa wi'i ka.
41015003	Sey mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen tinni no pela Iisa dow kujje keewɗe.
41015004	Pilaatus ƴamti Iisa kaden wi'i : —Walaa ko njaabotoɗaa naa ? A nanaay ko ɓe mbi'i dow maaɗa ɗum fuu naa ?
41015005	Amma Iisa fiirtaay hunnduko, jaabii ɓe. Rafi njaabaaki Iisa kiin haayɗini Pilaatus.
41015006	Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe fuu, himɓe no cuɓo kasunke gooto mo yoofantee.
41015007	Juulɗe dimɗinol gom ngari fotodiri, gorko gom bi'eteeɗo Barabas no uddidaa he murtuɓe gom. Murtuɓe ɓee, nder murtol mum'en mbaraana goɗɗo.
41015008	Nyannde juulɗe ɗee jama'aare wari to Pilaatus, eeli mo o waɗana ɓe ko woowi waɗeede he juulɗe fuu ɗum. Kam woni o yoofana ɓe kasunke gom.
41015009	Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Oɗon ngiɗi mi yoofana on laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe oo naa ?
41015010	Pilaatus jaaborake nii ngam no anndi ko haasidaaku waɗi mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ngaddi Iisa to mum.
41015011	Kamɓe duu tutii jama'aare ndeen wara, eela ɗum kam yoofa Barabas no ɓuri kam yoofa Iisa.
41015012	Pilaatus ƴamii ɓe kaden, wi'i : —Ndenne, ɗume ngiɗɗon mi waɗa, mo mbi'oton laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe oon nee ?
41015013	Sey ɓe kuuɓi, ɓe mbi'i : —Tontu mo dow bardugal !
41015014	Pilaatus ƴami ɓe, wi'i : —Ɗume o waɗi ko foti nii fuu ? Sey ɓe kuuɓi sanne ɓe mbi'i : —Tontu mo dow bardugal !
41015015	Pilaatus yoofi Barabas ngam welnude ɓerne jama'aare ndeen. O hokki laawol Iisa ɓoccee, tontowee dow leggal bardugal.
41015016	Soogeeji ɗiin njaari Iisa nder batamaare ɓaade Pilaatus, ɓe kawri soogeeji ɗiin fuu.
41015017	Ɓe ɓornii Iisa alkubbaare woɗeere gom. Ɓe canyi taarde gi'e, ɓe kippi dow hoore makko.
41015018	Ɓe puɗɗi salminde he makko, iɓe mbi'a : —Alla sabbinane, laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe.
41015019	Ɓe piiri mo loocol dow hoore, ɓe kaarti ɓe tutti dow makko. Ɓe kofi yeeso makko, iɓe cujidana mo.
41015020	Wakkati ɓe njawinoo mo faa heƴi ɓe, ɓe itti alkubbaare ndeen, ɓe ɓornii mo kolte makko. Ɓe njaari mo yaasin faa ɓe tontowa mo.
41015021	Simon, baaba Skandaaru e Rufus, gorko jeyaaɗo Sirene, no wara no ƴuwa gese sey fotti Iisa he soogeeji ɗiin. Soogeeji ɗiin tilsini mo o wakkoo leggal bardugal Iisa ngaal.
41015022	Ɓe njaari Iisa nokkuure wi'eteene Golgota. Maana Golgota woni « nokkuure laalagal hoore ».
41015023	Ɓe kokki Iisa cabiijam kawrodiriɗam he ɗakke kaaɗɗe gom ngam o yara, amma o salii.
41015024	Yamde jeenay subaka, ɓe tonti Iisa dow leggal ngaal. Ɓe piyi kolte makko caaca, ngam ɓe ndaara moy heɓata ɗe.
41015026	« Laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe » winndaa dow alluwal, ɓe takki ngal dow timtude hoore makko. Ɗum woni sabaabu mo waɗi o tontaa.
41015027	Ɓe tontidi mo he wuyɓe ɗiɗo gom, oo nyaamo makko, ooto nano makko. [
41015028	Ɗum tabbintini ko dewte mbi'ii : O fiyetee sawru bonɓe.]
41015029	Yawtooɓe har toon ɓeen no njenna mo, no njinnga ko'e mum'en, no mbi'a : —Hey ! Liɓowel Juulirde mawne, dey nyiɓitoo nde nder balɗe tati,
41015030	dannu hoore maa. Jippa dow leggal bardugal ngaal !
41015031	Noon duu, mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla e jannginooɓe Tawreeta tinni no njaltinoo mo hakkune mum'en, no mbi'a : —O dannii woɓɓe, dey o waawaa dannude hoore makko !
41015032	Almasiihu, Laamiiɗo Isra'el jippoo dow leggal bardugal ngal joonin joonin. Nde nii en ngi'ii ɗum, en ngoonɗinan mo ! Himɓe ɗiɗo tontidaaɓe he makko ɓeen duu no njenna mo.
41015033	Nyannde Iisa tontanoo ndeen, caka nyalooma, nimre huuri leydi ndiin fuu faa ɗum waɗi jamɗe tati.
41015034	Har yamnde tati juura, Iisa fii wullaanu mawnu, wi'i : —Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani ? Kam woni : Yaa Alla am ! Yaa Alla am ! Ɗume waɗi ko mboppuɗaa kam ?
41015035	Wakkati darinooɓe toon ɓeen nanunoo ɗum, woɓɓe nder maɓɓe mbi'i : —Kettinee, omo nii omo nodda Eliya !
41015036	Nden gooto nder maɓɓe doggi, suuwowi tekkere nder ndiyam lammuɗam, haɓɓi he loocol, waddi nde hadde hunnduko Iisa ngam Iisa siiɓoo ɗam. Nden o wi'i : —Accee, ndaaren tawte Eliya no waran jippina mo !
41015037	Iisa fii wullaanu mawnu kaden, sey o foofi foofaango makko sakitiingo.
41015038	Riido palaaɗo nder Juulirde mawne oon serki illa dow faa ley, laatii pecce ɗiɗi.
41015039	Hooreejo soogeeji Rooma darinooɗo yeeso Iisa oon hi'i no Iisa acciri duuniyaaru. Nden o wi'i : —Sikka fuu walaa, neɗɗo oo no Ɓii-Alla !
41015040	Rewɓe gom toowti ɗon seɗɗa, ndarii no ndaara. Nder maɓɓe no tawa : Mariyaama mo Magdaala, Salome he Mariyaama inna Yoses he Yakuuba inndirteeɗo Pamarel.
41015041	Rewɓe ɓee, tokkunoo Iisa no ngollana mo, wakkati o wonnoo Galili. Rewɓe heewɓe gom duu, yaadunooɓe he makko Ursaliima no ngonnoo ɗon.
41015042	Hiiri, fotodiri he jemma nyalaane fowteteene, himɓe no ciryanoo juulɗe ɗeen.
41015043	Sey Yusufu mo Arimatiya, tawaaɗo nder hawriine dawrooɓe, neɗɗo non kettinanteeɗo sanne nder mayre, keɗiiɗo banngol Laamu Alla. O hulaay fuu yahde to Pilaatus ngam ŋaaraade mo ɓanndu Iisa.
41015044	Wakkati Pilaatus nanunoo ko Iisa ɓooyaay dow bardugal ngal ko maayi, ɗum haaynii mo. Nden o noddi mawɗo soogeeji Rooma, o ƴami ɗum se goonga fuu Iisa maayi.
41015045	Wakkati mawɗo soogeeji ɗiin haalannoo mo ɗum, o hokki Yusufu laawol hooƴa ɓanndu Iisa.
41015046	Yusufu soodi kasanke, jippini ɓanndu Iisa, waɗi ndu kasanke. O watti mo nder annyeere seɓaane nder tepaare. Gaɗa mum, o waɗi kaaƴa mannga gom tallitaa, dammbugal annyeere ndeen uddaa.
41015047	Mariyaama mo Magdaala e Mariyaama inna Yoses ngi'ii to Iisa wattaa.
41016001	Nyalaane fowteteene ndeen wari, yawti. Mariyaama mo Magdaala, Salome he Mariyaama inna Yakuuba, coodi uurdiiji faa mbuja ɓanndu Iisa.
41016002	Dow laawol fadde maɓɓe yottaade, iɓe ƴamodira, iɓe mbi'a : —Moy tallitanta en kaaƴa ngonnga dammbugal annyeere ndeen ? Rewɓe ɓee ngari to annyeere ndeen, alal illa beete.
41016004	Amma wakkati ɓe njottinoo, ɓe ngi'ii kaaƴa ngaan tallitaama.
41016005	Wakkati ɓe naatunoo nder annyeere ndeen, sey ɓe ngi'i har nyaamo maɓɓe, jokolle gom no jooɗii, no ɓornii kolte daneeje, sey ɓe kuli.
41016006	Jokolle oon itti hunnduko wi'i ɓe : —To kulee ! Iisa mo Nasaratu tontanooɗo oon, tefoton. O ummitake, o walaa ɗo. Ndaa nokku to o wattanoo ɗon nii.
41016007	Joonin sey njehon, mbi'owon Piyer he aahiiɓe makko ɓeeto ko o artan ɓe Galili. Toon ngi'oyton mo hano no o wi'irnoo on ɗum.
41016008	Rewɓe ɓeen ndoggi, mburtii, no ndiwna, ɗum wemmbii ɓe sanne. Ɓe kuli sanne faa ɓe keppi haalande ɗum neɗɗo fuu. [
41016009	Alal, illa subaka wakkati Iisa ummitii, Mariyaama mo Magdaala, mo o riiwunoo ginnaaji jeɗɗi dow mum, kam o arti wanngande.
41016010	Mariyaama yehi haalanowi wondunooɓe he Iisa ɓeen, o tawi iɓe ɓalinii, iɓe mboya.
41016011	Amma baa ko Mariyaama wi'i ɓe he hoore mum hi'i mo, ɓe ngoonɗinaay ummitaaki Iisa kiin.
41016012	Gaɗa Iisa wanngani Mariyaama, aahiiɓe Iisa ɗiɗo gom no pa'i nguroy gom, kamɓe duu o wannganii ɓe nder nanndi gom.
41016013	Ɓe ngarti ɓe kaalani aahiiɓe ɓeeto, amma aahiiɓe ɓeen ngoonɗinaay haala maɓɓe.
41016014	Ko sakitii, o wanngani aahiiɓe makko sappo e go'o ɓeen, wakkati ɓe nyaamannoo. O nanaay belɗum rafi goonɗinol e njorki ɓerɗe maɓɓe. O duki ɓe duu ngam ɓe ngoonɗinaay warɓe mbi'i kam'en ngi'ii mo, o ummitake.
41016015	Nden o wi'i ɓe : —Njehee, mbaajee himɓe dow Habaru lobbo oo nder kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu.
41016016	Neɗɗo fuu goonɗini, waɗana batisma, joomum no hisintee. Amma neɗɗo fuu mo goonɗinaay no hiitetee.
41016017	Alamaaji kaayɗiniiɗi gi'eteeɗi he goonɗinɓe nii : Ɓe ndiiwan ginnaaji bonɗi dow innde am. Ɓe ndu'oto nder ɗemle feere feereeje ɗe ɓe meeɗaay haalude.
41016018	Ɓe nanngiran juuɗe maɓɓe bolle. Baa nii ɓe njari tooke, ɗum waɗantaa ɓe huune fuu. Ɓe njowan juuɗe maɓɓe dow nyawɓe, nyawɓe ɓeen nyawtaa.
41016019	Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen haalani aahiiɓe mum kujje ɗee fuu, nden o ƴencinaa dow. O yehi o jooɗowi nyaamo Alla.
41016020	Aahiiɓe makko ɓeen duu cankiti nder duuniyaaru, no mbaajoo nokku fuu. Joomiraawo wondi he maɓɓe, o hokki ɓe baawɗe waɗude kaayɗe ngam tabbintinde ko ɓe mbi'ata fuu to makko ɗum ƴuwi.]
42001001	Yaa Tawfilus tedduɗo, himɓe ɗuɓɓe puɗɗi winndude habaru dow ko Iisa waɗi hakkune meeɗen.
42001002	Habaru mo ɓe mbinndi oo duu, ƴuwaana he kunndule aranɓe seedoriiɓe gite mum'en ko Iisa waɗi. Kamɓe duu laatii halfinaaɓe golle anndinde himɓe haala Alla.
42001003	Miin duu, mi tewtirii hakkillo am kujje ɗeen fuu ngam mi winnda ɗe dey-dey no ɗe ngaɗiraa.
42001004	Mi winndanii ma habaru oo ngam tabbintina goongaaku ekkintinol ngol keɓuɗaa.
42001005	Nder laamu Hirudus, laamiiɗo leydi Yahudiya, no woodunoo cakkanoowo Alla gom bi'eteeɗo Jakariya, jeyaaɗo nder hawriine cakkanooɓe Alla wi'eteene Abiya. Dee-Jakariya no wi'ee Elisabet, o ƴuwi he lenyol Haaruuna.
42001006	Jakariya e deekum fuu no dartiiɓe yeeso Alla, feloore fuu walaa he maɓɓe. Ɓe tokkuɓe tilsinooje Joomiraawo e farillaaji mum duu.
42001007	Ɓe keɓaay ɓeyngu, ngam Elisabet no dimaro, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo duu, ɓe naywi.
42001008	Nder tawaangal cakkanooɓe Alla, cakkanoowo Alla gom suɓetee, naata nder Juulirde mawne ngam waɗude sadakaaji gaɗanteeɗi Alla. Nyannde gom, kuɗel Jakariya suɓaa ngam o naata nder Juulirde mawne, o wula uurdi nder mayre.
42001010	Wakkati uurdi ndiin wuletee, jama'aare ndeen fuu darii yaasin no du'oo.
42001011	Sey maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani mo, no darii nyaamo urorde ndeen.
42001012	Wakkati Jakariya hi'unoo maleykaajo oon, hakkillo makko ummii, kulol nanngi mo.
42001013	Amma maleykaajo oon wi'i mo : —Jakariya, taa hulu, ngam du'aa'u maaɗa jaabaama. Elisabet, jom suudu maa, no rimante ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndiraa mo Yahaaya.
42001014	Suka dimaaɗo oo no waddante welwelo manngo. Himɓe ɗuɓɓe nanan belɗum dimeeki makko.
42001015	O laatoto neɗɗo mawɗo yeeso Joomiraawo. O yarataa cabiijam e ko soptinta hoore fuu. O heewan Ruuhu Ceniiɗo illa nder reedu inniiko.
42001016	O wartiran ɓiɓɓe Isra'el ɗuɓɓe to Alla Joomiraawo mo ɓe ndewata.
42001017	O artan Almasiihu warde. Nder ir baawɗe Ruuhu Alla ɗe annabi Eliya heɓunoo o wartirta ɓerɗe baabiraaɓe har ɓiɓɓe mum'en, hakkillooji murtuɓe har himɓe dartiiɓe. O siryoo lenyi duu ngam garki Joomiraawo.
42001018	Jakariya ƴami maleykaajo oon, wi'i mo : —Noy anndiranmi ko mbiiɗaa ɗum no goonga ? Ngam miin, mi naywi, deekam duu, duuɓi mum ɗuuɗi.
42001019	Maleykaajo oon jaabii mo, wi'i : —Miin woni Jibirilla takkiiɗo Alla, lilaaɗo he maaɗa ngam haalane habaru lobbo oo.
42001020	Joonin a beebeete, a waawtaa yecci sey nyannde ko mbi'umaami ɗum tabbiti, ngam a goonɗinaay. Amma ɗum tabbitowan nde wakkati majjum waɗi.
42001021	Himɓe no yaasin no ndoomi Jakariya. Ɗum haayɗini ɓe ko o ɓooyi nder Juulirde mawne ndeen.
42001022	Wakkati o wurtinoo, o heppi fuu haaldude he maɓɓe. Nden ɓe paami ko o hi'i ko haayɗini gom nder mayre. O beebii, o darii omo tinndina ɓe he juuɗe.
42001023	Wakkati golle makko kantunoo, o hooti wuro makko.
42001024	Balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa mum, deekiiko Elisabet saawi, suuɗii lebbi joy, no wi'a :
42001025	—Ndaaree ko Joomiraawo waɗani kam. Nder wakkati mo hiɗi, o hi'i yurmeene am, o ittanii kam mone yeeso himɓe.
42001026	Nder lewru Elisabet jeegaɓuru, Alla lili maleyka Jibirilla Nasaratu nder leydi Galili.
42001027	O lili mo he surbaajo nannganaaɗo Yusufu, ƴuwɗo he lenyol Daawda. Surbaajo oo no wi'ee Mariyaama, o anndaa gorko abada.
42001028	Jibirilla wari to makko, wi'i mo : —Jam woni, aan keɓuɗo moƴƴere ƴuwne to Alla. Joomiraawo no wondi he maaɗa.
42001029	Haala Jibirilla ummini hakkillo Mariyaama sanne faa omo ƴama omo ƴamtinoo hoore makko maana sannoore ndee.
42001030	Jibirilla wi'i mo : —Taa hulu, Mariyaama, ngam a heɓii moƴƴere ƴuwne to Alla.
42001031	Ndaa, a saawan, ndimaa ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndiraa mo Iisa.
42001032	O laatoto mawɗo, o noddirtee Ɓii-Alla Toowɗo. Alla Joomiraawo hokkan mo laamu maamiiko Daawda.
42001033	O laamoto dow lenyol Yakuuba faa abada abadin, laamu makko duu walaa keerol.
42001034	Mariyaama ƴami maleyka Jibirilla, wi'i : —Noy ɗum laatortoo, miin mo anndaa gorko sam ?
42001035	Jibirilla jaabii mo, wi'i : —Ruuhu Ceniiɗo no jippoto dow maaɗa, baawɗe Alla Toowɗo no huurete. Ngam majjum, ɓiɗɗo ceniiɗo mo ndimataa oon no noddirtee Ɓii-Alla.
42001036	Ndaa Elisabet, sakiike maa duu saawi. Baa ko o naywi, o riman ɓiɗɗo gorko. Kanko mo himɓe mbi'annoo no dimaro, jooni omo nder lewru makko jeegaɓuru,
42001037	ngam walaa fuu ko hepporta Alla.
42001038	Mariyaama jaabii mo, wi'i : —Ndaa, mi korɗo Joomiraawo. Ɗum waɗa he am hano no mbi'irɗaa. Nden maleykaajo oon dilli.
42001039	Nder balɗe Jibirilla haaldunoo he Mariyaama, nyannde gom Mariyaama ummii dow ko yaawi yehi nder wuro leydi Yahudiya gom tawaango nder baamle.
42001040	Wakkati o yottinoo, o naati nder hoggo Jakariya, o sanni Elisabet.
42001041	Wakkati Elisabet nanunoo sannoore Mariyaama ndeen, ɓiyiiko dimmbi nder reedu makko. Elisabet hebbinaa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo,
42001042	o huuɓi daane mawne, o wi'i : —A barkinaaɗo ɓurɗo rewɓe fuu, ɓiɗɗo gonɗo nder reedu maa duu no barkinaaɗo !
42001043	Noy potumi, faa inna Joomiraawo am wara to am ?
42001044	Ndaa, wakkati sannoore maa toɓɓinoo nder nowru am, ɓiɗɗo gonɗo nder reedu am dimmborake welwelo.
42001045	A belɗo hoore, aan goonɗinɗo kumnol ko Joomiraawo wi'unoo ma !
42001046	Mariyaama wi'i : —Yonki am no teddina Joomiraawo,
42001047	ɓerne am duu heewi welwelo Alla Kisinoowo kam,
42001048	ngam o jaɓi daarude kam, miin korɗo makko leesuɗo. Illa jooni, jamanuuji fuu no noddiran kam belɗo hoore.
42001049	Ngam Jom baawɗe waɗanii kam kujje mawɗe ! Innde makko no seniine.
42001050	Yurmeene makko no faa abada dow hulooɓe mo fuu nder jamanuuji fuu.
42001051	O waɗi kujje mawɗe he junngo makko semmbiɗingo, o sankitii ɓe ɓerɗe mum'en keewiri mawnitaare.
42001052	O jippinii laamiiɓe dow laamu mum'en, leesuɓe duu, o ɓanti ɗum'en.
42001053	O harni rafaaɓe kujje lobbe, riikuɓe duu, o soƴƴi ɗum'en juuɗe ɓole.
42001054	O walli lenyol Isra'el, lenyol tawaangol nder golle makko. O yeggitaay alkawal ngal o waɗannoo maamiraaɓe himɓe Isra'el, Ibrahim e jippotooɓe he mum faa abada.
42001056	Mariyaama jooɗodii he Elisabet ko waɗata lebbi tati, nden gaɗa mum o hooti.
42001057	Wakkati lebbi Elisabet kuuɓunoo, o rimi ɓiɗɗo gorko.
42001058	Wondiraaɓe makko e koreeji makko fuu nani moƴƴere mawne ndee nde Joomiraawo waɗani mo. Nden ɓe kawri ɓe mbelbeltidi he makko.
42001059	Wakkati cukalel ngel waɗunoo balɗe jeɗɗi, himɓe ngari juulnol maggel. Ɓe ngiɗiino wattande ngel Jakariya,
42001060	amma inniigel jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Aa'a, ngel wattee Yahaaya.
42001061	Nden ɓe njaabii Elisabet, ɓe mbi'i : —Nder lenyol maa fuu, walaa inndiraaɗo ir innde ndee.
42001062	Ɓe ƴami baabiigel nder beebeere, noy o hiɗi ngel wattanee.
42001063	O wi'i kam hokkee alluwal. O hokkaa ngal nden o winndi dow maggal o wi'i : —Ngel wattanee Yahaaya. Ɗum haayɗini himɓe fuu.
42001064	Wakkati Jakariya wi'unoo ngel wattanee Yahaaya, wakkati mum da, hunnduko makko fiirtii, ɗemngal makko yoofaa, o fuɗɗi omo haala, omo teddina Alla.
42001065	Kulal nanngi tawaaɓe seraaji makko fuu. Habaru oon sankitii nder wurooji tawaaɗi nder baamle Yahudiya fuu.
42001066	Nanuɗo habaru oo fuu jogii mo nder ɓerne mum, tinni no ƴama hoore mum no wi'a : « Ɗume cukalel ngel laatoytoo nde ngel mawni ? » Ngam nde goonga junngo Joomiraawo no wondi he maggel.
42001067	Jakariya, baaba cukalel ngel heewnaa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, nden waɗi annabaaku, wi'i :
42001068	—Teddungal laatanoo Joomiraawo, Alla Isra'el, ngam o walli himɓe makko, o soptini ɓe.
42001069	O lildani en Kisinoowo jom semmbe, jippotooɗo he golloowo makko Daawda.
42001070	Ɗum duu woni ko o haalunoo illa arannde har kunndule annabiiɓe makko seniiɓe.
42001071	O wi'i o hisinan en honnooɓe en, o soptinan en he juuɗe wayɓe men fuu.
42001072	O holli maamiraaɓe men yurmeene o jogake amaana makko ceniiɗo,
42001073	amaana mo o hunaninoo maamii'en Ibrahim.
42001074	O soptinan en he juuɗe wayɓe men. Yeeso makko, ndeewen mo nder senaare e dartinaaku keddi balɗe men, kulal fuu tawataake nder ɓerɗe meeɗen.
42001076	Aan duu, ɓinngel am, a noddirtee annabiijo Alla Toowɗo, ngam a ardoto Joomiraawo moƴƴinana mo laawol makko.
42001077	Anndinaa himɓe makko laawol kisinam ngam hakkeeji maɓɓe no njaafetee.
42001078	Alla meeɗen no keewɗo yurmeene mawne, ngam yurmeene makko, o lildowan en jeyngol makko manngol diga dow,
42001079	ngam ngol yaynana tawaaɓe nder nimre e wonɓe nder ɗowdi maayde, ngol ɗowa en dow laawol jam.
42001080	Yahaaya no mawna, hakkillo mum no ɓeydoo. O hoɗowi nder ladde yeeruure naako wakkati mo o wanngintee yeeso himɓe Isra'el oon yottii.
42002001	Nder balɗe dimeeki Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma, Ogustus mawɗo laamiiɓe leydi Rooma, tilsini jooɗiiɓe nder laamu Rooma fuu limee.
42002002	Limngal ngaal duu woni limngal aranal gaɗaangal wakkati Kiriniyus wonnoo guferner leydi Siriya.
42002003	Neɗɗo fuu yehi nder wuro mum'en ngam limee.
42002004	Yusufu duu ngam ƴuwi he lenyol Daawda ummii Nasaratu nder leydi Galili, he Mariyaama ƴamaaɗo mum, pa'i Baytilaama nder leydi Yahudiya ngam limoyde ko'e mum'en. Jahaangal maɓɓe ngaal duu fotodiri Mariyaama no caawɗo.
42002006	Wakkati ɓe njottinoo Baytilaama, ŋatawere nanngi mo.
42002007	Ɓe keɓaay nokku nder suudu nannganaadu weerɓe nduun. Nden ɓe cori ley mayru, toon to dabbaaji kaɓɓetee ɓe njippi. Ɗon o rimi afo makko, o soomi nder wudere lobbere, o fukkini nder akala.
42002008	Nder jemma mo Iisa rimetee, durooɓe gom ngari no coggina dabbaaji mum'en nder seraaji Baytilaama.
42002009	Maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani ɓe, teddungal Joomiraawo yayni ɓe, sey kulal manngal nanngi ɓe.
42002010	Nden Maleykaajo oon wi'i ɓe : —To kulee, ngam mi waddani on habaru lobbo. Habaru laatantooɗo himɓe fuu welwelo manngo.
42002011	Hannden nder wuro Daawda on ndimanaama Kisinoowo, kanko woni Almasiihu, Joomiraawo.
42002012	Ndaaree, ɗum woni alaama mo kokkeɗon : On tawan cukalel keccel no soomaa nder wudere lobbere, no fukkinaa nder akala.
42002013	Wakkati mum da maleykaaɓe ɗuɓɓe gom duu, ƴuwi dow, ngari, tawi maleykaajo arano oon, nden ɓe fuu ɓe tinni iɓe njetta Alla, iɓe mbi'a :
42002014	—Teddungal laatanoo Alla toon dow, jam laatoo dow leydi ngam horsuɓe e makko.
42002015	Wakkati maleykaaɓe ɓeen ƴeenyunoo dow kammu, sey durooɓe ɓeen mbi'odiri : —En njaha Baytilaama, ndaarowen ko waɗi, ko Joomiraawo anndini en ɗum.
42002016	Nden ɓe njaawɗi, ɓe njehi, ɓe tawi Mariyaama, Yusufu he cukalel keccel ngeel, ingel fukkinaa nder akala.
42002017	Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo cukalel ngeel, ɓe pillii ko maleykaajo oon haalannoo ɓe fuu dow maggel.
42002018	Nanuɓe ko durooɓe ɓeen mbi'unoo fuu ɗum haayɗini ɗum'en sanne.
42002019	Mariyaama kam duu jogii ko ɓe mbi'i ɗum nder ɓerne mum, tinni no miiloo dow majjum.
42002020	Durooɓe ɓeen coƴƴiti, no teddina Alla, no njetta mo, ngam ko ɓe nani e ko ɓe ngi'ii ɗum, waɗiri dey-dey no maleykaajo oon wi'irnoo ɓe.
42002021	Balɗe jeɗɗi gaɗa dimeeki cukalel ngeel, ngel juulnaa, ngel wattanaa Iisa. Innde ndee woni innde nde maleykaajo oon haalannoo Mariyaama illa saawaaynoo reedu maggel.
42002022	Wakkati balɗe lamnol Mariyaama kuuɓunoo, hano no Tawreeta Muusa tilsiniri ɗum, Yusufu e Mariyaama njaari Iisa Ursaliima ngam halfinde mo Joomiraawo.
42002023	Ngam ɗum woni ko Joomiraawo wi'i nder Tawreeta : Ɓiɗɗo, gorko afo fuu no cuɓanaaɗo Joomiraawo.
42002024	Ɓe ngari sakkude buugaali ɗiɗi naa tantabalaaji pamari ɗiɗi hano no ɗum woni iɗum winndiraa nder Tawreeta nii.
42002025	Simeyon, gorko dartiiɗo, tokkuɗo Alla he ɓerne worre, no wonnoo nder wuro Ursaliima. Omo heɗi wakkati gonɗi Isra'el moytetee. Ruuhu Ceniiɗo no wondi he makko.
42002026	Ruuhu oo wannginani mo ko o maayataa o hi'aay Almasiihu Joomiraawo.
42002027	Nyannde Yusufu e Mariyaama ngaddunoo Iisa faa ngaɗana mo ko Tawreeta tilsini, nyannde mum Ruuhu oon ɗowi Simeyon faa nder Juulirde mawne.
42002028	Nden Simeyon adi Iisa temmbi mo, yetti Alla, wi'i :
42002029	—Joonin Joomam, accu miin, maccuɗo maa, mi maaya he jam, ngam a jogake haala maa.
42002030	Mi hi'iri gite am kisinam maaɗa,
42002031	kisinam ɗam ciryiɗaa ngam himɓe fuu,
42002032	jeyngol bannginaangol ngam lenyi duuniyaaru fuu, jeyngol teddinoowol Isra'el, lenyol maa.
42002033	Ko haalaa dow cukalel ngeel haayɗini inniigel e baabiigel.
42002034	Simeyon barkini ɓe, wi'i inniigel Mariyaama : —Cukalel ngeel, ngel giɗaangel, ngel wari liɓude ɗuɓɓe e umminde ɗuɓɓe nder Isra'el. Ngel laatoto alaama Alla mo himɓe caloto.
42002035	Ngel wannginan miilooji ɓerɗe himɓe ɗuɓɓe gonɗi no cuuɗi. Aan duu, Mariyaama, naawɗum yuwan ɓerne maa hano no takubaahi yuwirta goɗɗum.
42002036	Nder wakkati juulnol cukalel ngel nii no woodunoo annabiijo debbo gom bi'eteeɗo Anna, ɓii-Fanu'el, jeyaaɗo he lenyol Asiira. Debbo oo nii naywi sanne. O haɓɓanaama illa omo surbaajo. Duuɓi jeɗɗi gaɗa dewngal makko, goriiko maayi.
42002037	O jooɗii o walaa goriiyo faa o naywi, duuɓi makko duu no ngaɗa lasooji-nay e nay (84). O faddaaki koyngal makko abada he Juulirde mawne. Omo teddina Alla, omo suumoo. Omo du'oo jemma e nyalooma.
42002038	Nder wakkati mum, kanko duu o wari, omo yetta Alla. Omo haalana heɗiiɓe coptinol Ursaliima fuu, habaru cukalel ngeel.
42002039	Wakkati saarooɓe Iisa kumnunoo ko Joomiraawo wi'unoo nder Tawreeta fuu, ɓe coƴƴi Nasaratu.
42002040	Cukalel ngeel no mawna no semmbiɗa. Ingel heewaa hakkillo, moƴƴere Alla duu no wondi he maggel.
42002041	Hitaane fuu he Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe, saarooɓe Iisa no njeha Ursaliima.
42002042	Wakkati Iisa wannoo duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi, ɓe njehi Ursaliima hano no ɓe mboowrunoo, ɓe njaari Iisa gaɗa maɓɓe.
42002043	Ko juulɗe ɗeen timmi, ɓe nanngi laawol wuro. Ɓe miili omo wondi yaadiraaɓe maɓɓe. Jaa ɓe anndaa Iisa no Ursaliima. Ɓe ngaɗi yaadu nyalooma muɓɓo, nden ɓe puɗɗi iɓe tefa mo hakkune koreeji maɓɓe e anndaaɓe maɓɓe.
42002045	Amma ɓe ngiitaay mo. Nden ɓe coƴƴi Ursaliima ngam tefude mo.
42002046	Balɗe tati gaɗa mum, ɓe ngiiti mo nder Juulirde mawne. Omo jooɗii hakkune jannginooɓe Tawreeta, omo hettinanii ɓe, omo waɗana ɓe ƴamɗe.
42002047	Nanuɓe ƴamɗe makko, faamo makko e njaabaaki fuu makko ɗum haayɗini ɗum'en.
42002048	Wakkati saarooɓe makko ngi'unoo mo hakkune jannginooɓe Tawreeta ɓee, ɗum haayɗini ɓe sanne. Sey inniiko wi'i mo : —Iisa am, no waɗi ko ngaɗɗaa min huune ndee ? Miin e bammaa, hakkillooji amin fuu ummake sanne. Min tinni miɗen tefe.
42002049	Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Ɗume tefanton kam ? On anndaa ko no tilsi mi hinnoo golleeji Baaba am naa ?
42002050	Amma saarooɓe ɓeen paamaay haalaaji makko ɗii.
42002051	Nden o tokki ɓe, ɓe kooti Nasaratu. Omo ɗowtanoo ɓe. Inniiko jogii kujje ɗee fuu nder ɓerne mum.
42002052	Iisa no mawna, hakkillo mum no ɓeydoo. Omo weli Alla e himɓe fuu.
42003001	Haala Alla warani Yahaaya, ɓii-Jakariya nder ladde yeeruure. Nder wakkati mum Tiberiya laamiiɗo Rooma mawɗo no woodi duuɓi sappo e joy dow laamu. Pontiyus Pilaatus hawji leydi Yahudiya. Hirudus no guferner leydi Galili. Filipa mawnu Hirudus no laamii leydi Ituriya e leydi Tarakonitis. Lisaniyas no laamii leydi Abilene. Annas e Kayafas kam'en ngoni mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla fuu.
42003003	Ko nii waɗi haala Alla ka wanngi yahde he makko, sey Yahaaya ummii yehi nder leyɗe tawaaɗe hadde maayo Urdun. Omo nodda himɓe tuuba ngam hakkeeji maɓɓe njaafee, ɓe njaɓa ngaɗanee batisma
42003004	hano no ɗum winndiraa nder dewtere annabi Esaaya wi'aa : Daane no huuɓa nder ladde yeeruure no wi'a : Ciryee laabi ɗi Joomiraawo tokkata, moƴƴinee ɗi ngam garki makko.
42003005	Naɗɗere fuu hebbinee, waamnde e ƴolde fuu leynee, guurti oonyiiɗi ndartinee, laabi bonuɗi moƴƴinee.
42003006	Neɗɗo fuu hi'an kisinam Alla.
42003007	Himɓe ɗuɓɓe ngari to Yahaaya ngam o waɗana ɓe batisma. Nden o wi'i ɓe : —Onon ɓiɓɓe bolle ! Moy wi'i ndogganon tikkere Alla waroore ?
42003008	Ngaɗee ko hollata on tuubii. Nde on mbi'i nder ɓerɗe mooɗon on jippotooɓe he Ibrahim, miin mi wi'an on : Alla no waawi wayli kaaƴe ɗee, ɗe laatoo taaniraaɓe Ibrahim.
42003009	Joonin jammbere aagaama ngam soppude ɗaɗi leɗɗe. Ndenne, lekki fuu ki rimataa ɓiɓɓe lobbe, no soppetee, faɗɗee nder hiite.
42003010	Himɓe ɗuɓɓe ƴami mo, mbi'i : —Ndenne, ɗume min kaani waɗude ?
42003011	Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Neɗɗo fuu jogiiɗo toggooje ɗiɗi, hokka mo walaa worre. Jogiiɗo nyaamdu duu, waɗa hano non.
42003012	Jaɓooɓe janngal duu ngari faa ngaɗanee batisma, ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Moodibbo, ɗume min kaani waɗude ?
42003013	Yahaaya jaabii kamɓe duu, wi'i : —To ɓeydee dow ko mbi'aɗon njaɓon.
42003014	Soogeeji gom duu ƴami mo, mbi'i : —Minen nee, ɗume min kaani waɗude ? O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —To teetiree njawdi neɗɗo fuu semmbe semmbe. To tuumee neɗɗo fuu dow fewre ngam njaɓon ceede he mum. Ndaree he njobdi mon.
42003015	Himɓe kaaɓi ngi'aay Almasiihu. Neɗɗo fuu no ƴama hoore mum no wi'a naa Yahaaya woni Almasiihu ?
42003016	Nden Yahaaya wi'i ɓe : —Miin, ndiyam ngaɗirananmi on batisma, amma ɓurɗo kam baawɗe no wara. Mi fotaay baa fiirtude ɓoggi paɗe makko. Kanko kay, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo e hiite o waɗiranta on batisma.
42003017	Omo jogii ƴarorde makko ngam ƴaraade alkamaari makko faa laaɓa. O hawra gabbe makko, o loowa nder ƴeelu. Nden o wula nyaane ndeen nder hiite nge nyifataa abada.
42003018	Yahaaya no waajoo himɓe dow Habaru lobbo, omo hollita ɓe dow kujje ɗuɗɗe.
42003019	Hirudus, teeti mawnum debbo mum bi'eteeɗo Hirudiya. Nden Yahaaya feli mo, o feli mo duu dow kujje bonɗe fuu ɗe o waɗannoo.
42003020	Sey Hirudus ɓeydi waɗude bone kaden, o uddi Yahaaya.
42003021	Wakkati himɓe fuu ngaɗantee batisma, Iisa duu waɗana batisma. Wakkati o du'otonoo, sey kammu omtii,
42003022	Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippii dow makko nder nanndi wuugaanu. Daane gom ƴuwi dow, wi'i : —Aan woni Ɓiyam korsuɗo. Aan naniranmi belɗum.
42003023	Wakkati Iisa fuɗɗi golle mum, o faanake duuɓi woronja (30). Nder miilooji himɓe Iisa no ɓii-Yusufu. Yusufu duu no ɓii-Eli,
42003024	Eli ɓii-Mattat, Mattat ɓii-Lewi, Lewi ɓii-Melki, Melki ɓii-Yannaay, Yannaay ɓii-Yusufu,
42003025	Yusufu ɓii-Mattatiya, Mattatiya ɓii-Amos, Amos ɓii-Nahum, Nahum ɓii-Hesli, Hesli ɓii-Naggaay,
42003026	Naggaay ɓii-Maata, Maata ɓii-Mattatiya, Mattatiya ɓii-Semeyin, Semeyin ɓii-Yosek, Yosek ɓii-Yoda,
42003027	Yoda ɓii-Yowanan, Yowanan ɓii-Resa, Resa ɓii-Jorobaabiila, Jorobaabiila ɓii-Salaatiyel, Salaatiyel ɓii-Neeri,
42003028	Neeri ɓii-Melki, Melki ɓii-Addi, Addi ɓii-Koosam, Koosam ɓii-Elmadam, Elmadam ɓii-Eri,
42003029	Eri ɓii-Iisa, Iisa ɓii-Eliyeser, Eliyeser ɓii-Yoorim, Yoorim ɓii-Mattat, Mattat ɓii-Lewi,
42003030	Lewi ɓii-Simeyon, Simeyon ɓii-Yahuuda, Yahuuda ɓii-Yusufu, Yusufu ɓii-Yonam, Yonam ɓii-Eliyakim,
42003031	Eliyakim ɓii-Meleya, Meleya ɓii-Menna, Menna ɓii-Mattata, Mattata ɓii-Natan, Natan ɓii-Daawda,
42003032	Daawda ɓii-Yesa, Yesa ɓii-Yobed, Yobed ɓii-Bo'es, Bo'es ɓii-Sala, Sala ɓii-Naason,
42003033	Naason ɓii-Aminadabu, Aminadaabu ɓii-Admin, Admin ɓii-Arni, Arni ɓii-Hesruna, Hesruuna ɓii-Fares, Fares ɓii-Yahuuda,
42003034	Yahuuda ɓii-Yakuuba, Yakuuba ɓii-Isiyaaku, Isiyaaku ɓii-Ibrahim, Ibrahim ɓii-Tera, Tera ɓii-Nakor,
42003035	Nakor ɓii-Seruku, Seruku ɓii-Ragaw, Ragaw ɓii-Faleka, Faleka ɓii-Eber, Eber ɓii-Sala,
42003036	Sala ɓii-Kayinan, Kayinan ɓii-Arfakasada, Arfakasada ɓii-Sem, Sem ɓii-Nuhu, Nuhu ɓii-Lemek,
42003037	Lemek ɓii-Metusela, Metusela ɓii-Enok, Enok ɓii-Yaret, Yaret ɓii-Maleliyel, Maleliyel ɓii-Kayinan,
42003038	Kayinan ɓii-Enos, Enos ɓii-Setu, Setu ɓii-Aadamu, Aadamu ɓii-Alla.
42004001	Iisa ƴuwi maayo Urdun no heewi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo. Ruuhu oon ɗowi mo nder ladde yeeruure.
42004002	Toon Ibiliisa sii'ii mo balɗe lasooji ɗiɗi. O nyaamaay fuy nder balɗe lasooji ɗiɗi ɗee fuu faa o rafaa.
42004003	Nden Ibiliisa wi'i mo : —Se goonga fuu a Ɓii-Alla, tilsin hayre ndee laatoo nyaamdu.
42004004	Sey Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Dewtere Alla wi'i : Hanaa nyaamdu tan neɗɗo wuurdata.
42004005	Nden Ibiliisa yaari mo nokkuure toowne gom, holli mo nder maƴƴere hitere laamuuji duuniyaaru fuu,
42004006	wi'i mo : —Mi hokkete baawɗe dow majji, ɗi fuu, kanƴi e teddungal majji fuu ngam mi hokkaama ɗi. Miɗo waawi hokki ɗi mo muuyanmi fuu.
42004007	Nde a sujidanii kam, mi hokkete ɗi, ɗii fuu.
42004008	Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Dewtere Alla wi'i : Alla Joomiraawo maa tan kaanɗaa sujidande. Kanko tan kaanɗaa rewude.
42004009	Nden Ibiliisa yaari mo huɓeere Ursaliima, darni mo dow hoore Juulirde mawne, wi'i mo : —Se goonga fuu a Ɓii-Alla, jikku,
42004010	ngam Dewtere Alla wi'i : Alla tilsinan maleykaaɓe mum ndeene.
42004011	Ɓe taɓɓite to koyngal maaɗa fii he hayre.
42004012	Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Dewtere Alla wi'i : A sii'ataako Alla Joomiraawo maa.
42004013	Wakkati Ibiliisa sii'ii mo iri cii'aaki fuu, sey dilli acci mo faa nde gom.
42004014	Iisa soƴƴii Galili, baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo no dow makko. Habaru makko sankitii nder leydi Galili ndiin fuu.
42004015	Omo waajoo nder baajorɗi Yahudankooɓe, himɓe fuu no teddina mo.
42004016	Nyannde gom Iisa yehi Nasaratu, wuro ngo o mawnunoo nder mum. Nyannde mum ɗum fotodiri nyalaane fowteteene. O naati waajordu hano no o woowrunoo. O ummii faa o jannga,
42004017	sey o hokkaa dewtere annabi Esaaya. O taggiti nde, o fotodiri he nokku to winndaa, wi'aa :
42004018	—Ruuhu Joomiraawo no dow am, ngam o suɓake kam, ngam talkaaɓe mbaajee Habaru lobbo. O lili kam ngam nanngaaɓe kaalanee joofol mum'en, wumɓe duu, bumtinol mum'en, torraaɓe keɓa dimɗinol mum'en.
42004019	Himɓe duu kaalanee wakkati mo Joomiraawo wannginta moƴƴere mum.
42004020	O taggi dewtere ndeen, o hokkiti deenoowo waajordu nduun, o jooɗii. Wonnooɓe toon fuu puttini gite he makko.
42004021	Sey o wi'i ɓe : —Ko nanuɗon nder dewtere Alla ndee, tabbiti hannden.
42004022	Ɓe mani mo ɓe fuu. Haalaaji lobbi burtiɗi nder hunnduko makko ɗiin duu haayɗini ɓe. Nden ɓe mbi'i : —Hanaa o ɓii-Yusufu naa ?
42004023	Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Sikka fuu walaa, on ngaɗanan kam banndol ngool mbi'on : « Cawroowo, sawru hoore maa ». On mbi'an kam kaden : « Ɗo duu wuro maa non. Ndenne, waɗu ko min nani ngaɗɗaa nder Kafarnahum. »
42004024	Iisa ɓeydi wi'ude ɓe kaden : —Nde goonga miɗo wi'a on, annabiijo fuu jaɓɓataake nder wuro mum.
42004025	Goonga miɗo haalana on, nder jamaanu annabi Eliya, ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayunoo no ɗuuɗi nder leydi Isra'el. Wakkati ndiyam waɗunoo duuɓi tati e lebbi jeegom toɓaayno, rafo manngo gom waɗiino nder leydi ndiin fuu.
42004026	Amma Eliya lilaaka he baa gooto maɓɓe, sey he debbo mo gorum maayi gom, debbo jeyaaɗo Sarepta nder leydi Sidon.
42004027	Nder jamaanu annabi Eliisa, seppinɓe no ɗuuɗunoo nder Isra'el. Amma baa gooto maɓɓe nyawtaaka, nde hanaa Naaman, jeyaaɗo leydi Siriya.
42004028	Wakkati wonnooɓe nder waajordu nduun, nanunoo haala kaa, ka mettini ɓerɗe maɓɓe sanne.
42004029	Ɓe nanngi Iisa ɓe njaari mo gaɗa wuro ngoon. Ɓe njaari mo toon dow hoore waamnde nde dow mum, wuro ngoon nyiɓa, ngam ɓe tutoo mo o saama ley.
42004030	Amma Iisa feeri hakkune maɓɓe, dilli.
42004031	Iisa yehi Kafarnahum nder leydi Galili. Nyalaane fowteteene gom o naati waajordu omo waajoo.
42004032	Waaju makko haayɗini ɓe ngam he baawɗe o waajorii ɓe.
42004033	Gorko gom, mo ginnaaru woni dow mum no tampinaa no tawaa nder waajordu nduun. Sey ginnaaru nduun huuɓi daane toowne, wi'i :
42004034	—Hey ! Iisa mo Nasaratu, ɗume ngiɗaa waɗude min ? A wari faa mbaraa min naa ? Miɗo anndi moy woni ma. A Ceniiɗo ƴuwɗo to Alla !
42004035	Sey Iisa laayani ginnaaru nduun, sajiti he mayru, wi'i : —Maɓɓu hunnduko maa, takkita mo ! Ndu liɓi gorko oon hakkune himɓe. Ndu takkiti mo, walaa to ndu nawni he ɓanndu makko.
42004036	Ɗum haayɗini himɓe ɓeen fuu. Nden ɓe tinni iɓe ƴamodira, iɓe mbi'a : —Iri kaye woni haala kaa ? Ngam haala makko kaa no woodi baawɗe e semmbe. Omo dawrana baa ginnaaji, iɗi takkitoo neɗɗo.
42004037	Habaru Iisa oo sankitii nder leyɗe ɗeen fuu.
42004038	Iisa wurtii waajordu nduun, yehi wuro Simon Piyer. Eso Simon Piyer debbo no wondi wulowulo naawngo, ɓe ƴami Iisa walla mo.
42004039	Iisa turii dow makko, tilsini wulowulo ngoon hela. Ngo heli, debbo oon yamɗiti, ummii wakkati mum da, jaɓɓii ɓe.
42004040	Ko naange yani, wooduɓe nyawɓe, nyawirɓe nyawuuji ir iriiji fuu ngaddi nyawɓe mum'en to makko. O deki juuɗe makko dow maɓɓe, o yamɗintini ɓe, ɓe fuu, gooto gooto.
42004041	Ginnaaji ɗiin no takkitoo himɓe heewɓe, no kuuɓa, no mbi'a : —Aan woni Ɓii-Alla. Amma Iisa no sajito he majji, omo haɗa ɗi haalude, ngam iɗi anndi kanko woni Almasiihu.
42004042	Ko weeti, Iisa wurtii Kafarnahum, yehi nder nokkuure yeewne gom. Himɓe heewɓe tinni no tefa mo faa ngiitowi mo. Ɓe njaɓaay o seeda he maɓɓe kaden.
42004043	Amma Iisa wi'i ɓe : —No tilsi mi waajoo Habaru lobbo dow Laamu Alla nder gure feere feereeje. Ngam majjum waɗi lilowaami.
42004044	Iisa yehi no waajoo nder baajorɗi leydi Yahudiya.
42005001	Nyannde gom, Iisa no darii dow fonngo peta Genesaret, jama'aare no dow makko no ɓillodira ngam hettinoo haala Alla.
42005002	Iisa holliri laanaaji ɗiɗi gom no panndi dow fonngo peta ngaan. Nanngooɓe liƴƴi gom mburtii nder majji no loota taaruuji mum'en.
42005003	Simon bi'eteeɗo Piyer no tawa nder maɓɓe. Sey Iisa naati nder laana makko, wi'i mo, o awƴoo ka seɗɗa, ɓe mboɗɗoo fonngo ngoon. Iisa jooɗii nder makka tinni no waajoo jama'aare ndeen.
42005004	Wakkati o hantunoo waaju makko, o wi'i Simon : —Yah to luggiɗi, paɗɗon taaruuji mon, aan e banndiraaɓe maa, nanngon liƴƴi.
42005005	Simon jaabii Iisa, wi'i mo : —Moodibbo, min mbaalii miɗen ngolla, min keɓaay baafuy. Amma ngam a haali, mi faɗɗan taaruuji ɗiin.
42005006	Wakkati ɓe paɗɗunoo ɗi, ɗi nanngi liƴƴi ɗuɗɗi faa ɗi puɗɗi serkude.
42005007	Nden ɓe noddi banndiraaɓe maɓɓe gom wonɓe nder laana feereha gom ngara mballira ɓe. Ɓe ngari, ɓe kebbini laanaaji ɗiɗi ɗiin fuu, faa ɗi kosi rufude.
42005008	Wakkati Simon hi'unoo ɗum, o diccii yeeso Iisa, o wi'i mo : —Moodibbo, woɗɗam, ngam miin mi gaɗoowo hakke.
42005009	Simon haalani Iisa haala kaa ngam kanko e wonduɓe he makko ɓeen fuu, ɗuuɗal liƴƴi nanngaaɗi ɗii haayɗini ɓe.
