43009027	O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i : —Mi haalaniino on ɗum, amma on njaɓaay. Ɗume waɗi oɗon ngiɗi nantude ɗum kaden ? Tawte onon duu, oɗon ngiɗi laataade aahiiɓe makko non ?
43009028	Ɓe njenni mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Aan nii woni aahiijo makko ! Minen kay, min aahiiɓe Muusa.
43009029	Minen, miɗen anndi Alla haaldii he Muusa, amma neɗɗo oo kay, min anndaa fuu to o ƴuwata.
43009030	Gorko oon jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Haba ? Hannden mi hi'i haayne. On anndaa to o ƴuwi, dey o wumtinii kam !
43009031	Eɗen anndi Alla hettintaako waɗooɓe hakke, amma omo jaabanoo kuloowo mo, gaɗoowo muuyo makko.
43009032	Illa fuɗɗam duuniyaaru walaa nanuɗo bumtinɗo dimdaaɗo mbumdam.
43009033	Se nii hanaa to Alla gorko oo ƴuwi, o waawtaa waɗude baafuy.
43009034	Ɓe njaabii mo : —Aan, laatiiɗo a fuu nder hakke ndimeɗaa, aan waajoto min naa ! Ɓe ndiiwi mo.
43009035	Iisa nani ɓe ndiiwii mo, sey yehi tawowi mo, wi'i mo : —Aan nee, a goonɗini Ɓii-Neɗɗo naa ?
43009036	O jaabii, o wi'i : —Moodibbo, moy woni Ɓii-Neɗɗo ? Hollan mo faa mi goonɗina mo ?
43009037	Nden Iisa wi'i mo : —A hi'i mo, kanko jaati woni no haalda he maa.
43009038	Sey o jaabii Iisa o wi'i : —Joomiraawo, mi goonɗini. O sujidani Iisa.
43009039	Nden Iisa wi'i mo : —Mi wari nder duuniyaaru ngam kiite ngaɗaa, wumɓe ngi'a, hi'ooɓe mbumaa.
43009040	Woɓɓe nder Fariisa'en wonɓe hadde makko, nanuɓe haala kaa, ƴami mo mbi'i : —Ndenne, min wumɓe naa ?
43009041	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Se on wumɓe, nden on gaɗataano hakke. Amma ko mbi'uɗon joonin oɗon ngi'a, hakkeeji mooɗon tabbitii.
43010001	Iisa wi'i : —Miɗo haalana on goonga : Neɗɗo fuu naatoowo hoggo baali dey naatiraay dammbugal, kam woni gujjo, kam woni teetoowo.
43010002	Amma naatiroowo dammbugal oon woni duroowo baali ɗiin.
43010003	Deenoowo dammbugal oon no maɓɓitanan mo, baali ɗiin duu no nanan daane makko. O noddiran mbaalu makko fuu he innde mum, o wurtina ɗi yaasi.
43010004	Nde o wurtini ɗi ɗi fuu, o ardoto, ɗi tokka mo ngam iɗi anndi daane makko.
43010005	Ɗi tokkataa koɗo sam, amma ɗi ndoggan mo sabu ɗi anndaa daane makko.
43010006	Iisa hippani ɓe haala kaa, amma ɓe paamaay maana makka.
43010007	O ɓeydi wi'ude : —Miɗo haalana on goonga, miin woni dammbugal hoggo baali.
43010008	Artuɓe kam fuu no wuyɓe e teetooɓe, baali ɗiin nanaay daaɗe maɓɓe.
43010009	Miin woni dammbugal, neɗɗo fuu naatirɗo kam, hisan, no oornan heɓa duurduɗe, jaaƴina.
43010010	Gujjo warataana ngam wujja, itta yonki, bonna, amma miin, mi warii faa himɓe keɓa mbuurnam ngam ɓe keɓira ɗam no ɗuuɗiri.
43010011	Miin woni duroowo lobbo. Duroowo lobbo woni cottoowo yonki mum ngam baali mum.
43010012	Amma duroowo joɓeteeɗo hanaa duroowo goongaajo. O hanaa jom baali, illa o holliri suunu no wara, o doggan o acca ɗi. Nden ndu saama e majji, ɗi cankitoo.
43010013	O doggan ngam o duroowo joɓeteeɗo tan, walaa fuu ko hilli mo he baali ɗiin.
43010014	Miin woni duroowo lobbo. Miɗo anndi baali am, baali am duu no anndi kam.
43010015	Hano no Baabiraawo anndiri kam, non anndirmi Baabiraawo. Miɗo sotta yonki am ngam baali am.
43010016	Miɗo woodi baali gom kaden ɗi ngalaa nder hoggo ngoo. Kanƴi duu no tilsi mi waddowa ɗi. Ɗi nanan daane am, ɗi laatoto sewre worre nde duroowo gooto.
43010017	Ko waɗi Baabiraawo no hiɗi kam woni ngam mi sottan yonki am faa mi heɓita ki kaden.
43010018	Walaa ittoowo ki, ngam miin e hoore am hokkata ki. Miɗo woodi baawɗe hokkude ki. Miɗo woodi baawɗe heɓtude ki. Ɗum woni tilsinoore nde keɓumi to Baaba am.
43010019	Haalaaji ɗii ɓeydi senndude Yahudankooɓe.
43010020	Ɗuɓɓe nder maɓɓe no mbi'a : —O kaaŋaaɗo kuɓɗo ! Ko saabii oɗon kettinanii mo ?
43010021	Gere maɓɓe duu mbi'i : —Haala kaa hanaa haala laddaaɗo. Laddaaɗo no waawi wumtinde bumɗo naa ?
43010022	Juulɗe cenɗinol Juulirde mawne ngaɗi Ursaliima. Ɗum fotodiri he dabbune.
43010023	Nder Juulirde mawne ndeen, Iisa no yaha no warta ley danki Suleymaanu.
43010024	Sey Yahudankooɓe piili mo, mbi'i : —Faa nde tinnotoɗaa aɗa jogii min nder wemmbere ? Se aan woni Almasiihu, laaɓinan min.
43010025	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Mi arti mi haalanii on ɗum, amma on ngoonɗinaay. Golleeji ɗi ngaɗumi dow innde Baaba am ɗiin, kanƴi jaati ceedantoo kam.
43010026	Amma onon, on ngoonɗinaay ngam on kanaa baali am.
43010027	Baali am no nana daane am. Miɗo anndi ɗi, iɗi tokka kam.
43010028	Miɗo hokka ɗi mbuurnam nduumiiɗam, ɗi mbaatataa abada. Walaa baawɗo teetirde ɗi semmbe semmbe nder junngo am.
43010029	Baabiraawo kokkuɗo kam ɗi oon, no ɓuri huune fuu. Walaa baawɗo teetirde ɗi semmbe semmbe nder junngo Baabiraawo.
43010030	Miin e Baabiraawo fuu, min go'o.
43010031	Sey Yahudankooɓe adi kaaƴe faa paɗɗa mo.
43010032	Amma Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Yeeso mooɗon, baawɗe Baabiraawo ngaɗirmi golle ɗuɗɗe lobbe sanne ɗe fuu. Nder golle ɗe ngaɗumi ɗe fuu, ngam gollal ngale ngiɗɗon faɗɗude kam kaaƴe ?
43010033	Yahudankooɓe njaabii mo mbi'i : —Hanaa ngam golle lobbe min ngiɗi warirde ma kaaƴe. Ko waɗi miɗen ngiɗi warude ma woni a famɗini Alla. Aan a tagaaɗo, dey a adi hoore maa Alla.
43010034	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Hanaa no winndaa nder Tawreeta mooɗon ko Alla wi'i : Onon, on allaaɓe?
43010035	Eɗen anndi ko haala Alla sottataa. Nde Alla noddiri ɓe o suɓii ɓeen « allaaɓe »,
43010036	too, miin mo Alla senɗini, lili nder duuniyaaru nduu, noy haala am laatortoo pamɗinol Alla ngam mi wi'i : « Miin, mi Ɓii-Alla » ?
43010037	Se nii mi waɗaay golleeji Baaba am, to ngoonɗinee kam.
43010038	Amma se miɗo waɗa ɗi, baa se on ngoonɗintaa kam, ngoonɗinee golleeji ɗii, ngam paamon, njaɓon duu no wooɗiri ko Baabiraawo no wondi he am, miɗo wondi he makko.
43010039	Nden ɓe tefi nanngude mo kaden. O soptii ɓe.
43010040	Iisa soƴƴii toon gaɗa maayo Urdun nokkuure to Yahaaya waɗanannoo himɓe batisma, o jooɗii toon.
43010041	Himɓe ɗuɓɓe ngari to makko, iɓe mbi'odira : —Yahaaya waɗaay haayne baa wootere. Amma, ko o haali dow gorko oo fuu no goonga.
43010042	Toon ɗuɓɓe ngoonɗini Iisa.
43011001	Nder wuro Baytaniya no woodi gorko bi'eteeɗo Laajaru, Laajaru oo yemaaki. Omo woodi sakiraaɓe makko rewɓe ɗiɗo gom, Marta e Mariyaama.
43011002	Mariyaama woni debbo bujunooɗo nebbam uurɗam dow koyɗe Iisa, moytiri ɗe gaasa mum. Too, Mariyaama oo banndum gorko woni Laajaru oo.
43011003	Sakiraaɓe Laajaru rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓee lili goɗɗo wi'a Iisa : —Moodibbo, war ! Giɗo maaɗa yamɗaa.
43011004	Nde Iisa nanunoo ɗum, sey wi'i : —Nyaw nguu hanaa nyaw mbaroowu. Amma ngu wari ngam wannginde teddungal Alla, heɓa Ɓii-Alla oon duu teddinee.
43011005	Iisa no hiɗi Marta, Mariyaama e sakiike maɓɓe gorko Laajaru.
43011006	Baa nii ko Iisa nanii Laajaru yamɗaa, ɗum haɗaay mo jooɗaade to o wonnoo toon balɗe ɗiɗi.
43011007	Gaɗa ɗum o wi'i aahiiɓe makko : —En coƴƴoo leydi Yahudiya !
43011008	Aahiiɓe ɓeen mbi'i mo : —Moodibbo, ɓooyaay ko Yahudankooɓe tefi faɗɗude ma kaaƴe nder leydi ndiin. Toon ngiɗaa soƴƴaade kaden naa ?
43011009	Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i : —Hanaa jamɗe sappo e ɗiɗi ngoni nder nyalooma gooto naa ? Dilloowo nyalooma fuu fergataako ngam no hi'a jeyngol duuniyaaru.
43011010	Amma dilloowo jemma fergoto ngam jeyngol walaa he makko.
43011011	Gaɗa o haalii haalaaji ɗii, o wi'i ɓe : —Higii'en Laajaru ɗaanake, mi yahan, mi findinowa mo.
43011012	Nden ɓe mbi'i mo : —Moodibbo, se tawaama o ɗaaniiɗo, ndenne o daɗan.
43011013	Maayde Laajaru o haalani ɓe. Amma kamɓe kay, ɓe miilataana ko filla ɗoyngol allawol ngool nii o wondi.
43011014	Nden Iisa laaɓinani ɓe, wi'i : —Laajaru laatake !
43011015	Mi nani belɗum ngam mooɗon ko mi tawaaka toon. Ɗum laatanto on sabaabu goonɗinol. Amma en njaha to makko.
43011016	Nden Tomas bi'eteeɗo Funeejo wi'i aahiiɓe ɓeeto : —Accee, njehen enen duu baa nde en maaydan he makko non.
43011017	Wakkati Iisa yottii, tawi Laajaru waɗi balɗe nay he mooɓeede.
43011018	Hakkune Baytaniya e Ursaliima ɓuraa kilooji tati.
43011019	Yahudankooɓe ɗuɓɓe ngari kinniri Mariyaama e Marta maayde Laajaru.
43011020	Wakkati Marta nanunoo Iisa no wara, o acci Mariyaama no jooɗii nder suudu, o yehi o jaɓɓitowii mo.
43011021	Marta wi'i Iisa : —Joomam, se nii aɗa wonnoo ɗo, banndam gorko maayataano.
43011022	Amma miɗo anndi baa joonin, ko ƴamɗaa Alla fuu, o waɗante ɗum.
43011023	Nden Iisa wi'i mo : —Bannda gorko no ummitoto.
43011024	Marta wi'i : —Miɗo anndi ko o ummitittoo nyannde darŋal.
43011025	Iisa wi'i mo : —Miin woni ummitaaki maayɓe, miin woni mbuurnam duu. Neɗɗo fuu goonɗinɗo kam, baa se maayi, no wuuran.
43011026	Buurɗo goonɗinɗo kam fuu, maayataa abada. A goonɗini ɗum naa ?
43011027	Marta wi'i mo : —Ayyo, Joomam ! Mi goonɗini aan woni Almasiihu, Ɓii-Alla, bannganɗo duuniyaaru nduu.
43011028	Gaɗa ko o haali ɗum, o yehi o noddowi sakiike makko, Mariyaama. O nyo'ani mo, o wi'i : —Moodibbo oon warii, omo nodde.
43011029	Illa ko Mariyaama nanunoo ɗum, o yaawɗi o yehi to Iisa.
43011030	Wakkati mum fuu Iisa naataay wuro ngoon ginan. Omo wonnoo to Marta fottunoo he makko.
43011031	Yahudankooɓe wondunooɓe he Mariyaama nder suudu no cawrina mo, wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo o yaawɗi o wurtii, sey ɓe tokki mo, ngam ɓe miilii to annyeere ndeen o fa'i faa o woyowa.
43011032	Nde Mariyaama yottii to Iisa woni, illa o hi'i mo, o hofi yeeso makko, o wi'i : —Joomam, se nii aɗa wonnoo ɗo, banndam gorko maayataano.
43011033	Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo Mariyaama e Yahudankooɓe wondunooɓe he mum ɓeen no mboya, ɓerne makko metti sanne.
43011034	O wi'i : —Toy mooɓuɗon mo ? Ɓe mbi'i mo : —Moodibbo, war, ƴeewu !
43011035	Sey Iisa fusi gonɗi.
43011036	Nden Yahudankooɓe gom mbi'i : —Ƴeewee no o hiɗiri mo.
43011037	Amma woɓɓe maɓɓe duu mbi'odiri : —Bumtinɗo bumɗo no waawaa haɗude gorko oo maayde naa ?
43011038	Ɓerne Iisa metti kaden, nden o yehi tiimoyde annyeere ndeen. Annyeere ndeen, lowol maɓɓiraangol hayre non.
43011039	Nden Iisa wi'i : Ittee hayre ndee ! Marta sakiike maayɗo oon wi'i mo : —Joomam, hannden tawan henndu makko waylake, sabu hannden woni balɗe makko nay he maayde.
43011040	Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i : —Hanaa mi wi'i ma, se a goonɗini, a hi'an baawɗe Alla naa ?
43011041	Ɓe itti hayre ndeen. Iisa tiggitii, wi'i : —Baabiraawo, mi yettii ma ngam a hettinake kam.
43011042	Miin kay, miɗo anndi nyannde fuu aɗa hettinanii kam. Amma mi haaliri nii sabu himɓe dariiɓe ɓee, ngam ɓe ngoonɗina aan lili kam.
43011043	Gaɗa haalaaji ɗii, o ɓanti daane makko, o huuɓi sanne, o wi'i : —Laajaru, wurta !
43011044	Sey maaynooɗo oon wurtii. Juuɗe mum e koyɗe mum no kaɓɓaa leppi, yeeso mum no suddii. Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Piirtee mo o yaha !
43011045	Ɗuɓɓe nder Yahudankooɓe warnooɓe to Mariyaama, hi'uɓe ko waɗi, ngoonɗini Iisa.
43011046	Amma gere maɓɓe njehi to Fariisa'en, kaalani ɓe ko Iisa waɗi.
43011047	Nden Fariisa'en e hooreeɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ngaɗi hawriine mawne, ɓe mbi'i : —Noy ngatten ? Ngam gorko oo no waɗa kaayɗe ɗuɗɗe.
43011048	Se en accirii mo nii, ɓe fuu, ɓe ngoonɗinan mo. Nden himɓe Rooma ngara, nannga Juulirde meeɗen mawne e lenyol meeɗen.
43011049	Gooto maɓɓe bi'eteeɗo Kayafas laatiiɗo mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla nder hitaane ndeen, wi'i ɓe : —Onon, on anndaa baafuy.
43011050	On anndaa ko neɗɗo gooto maayana himɓe fuu no ɓuri wooɗande en dina lenyol ngool fuu halka.
43011051	Hanaa muuyo makko o haaliri haala kaa, amma annabaaku o waɗi ɗoon. Hitaane ndeen kanko woni mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla, nder annabaaku nguu o wi'i ko Iisa no maayanan lenyol ngool.
43011052	Hanaa lenyol ngool tan o maayanta, amma ngam o hawra ɓiɓɓe Alla sankitiiɓe ɓeen fuu laatoo gootum.
43011053	Illa nyannde mum, hooreeɓe Yahudankooɓe caawodiri dow no ɓe mbardata mo.
43011054	Ɗum duu waɗi Iisa acci fiilaade hakkune Yahudankooɓe. Nden o yehi Efrayim, wuro wonngo har ladde yeeruure. O jooddii he aahiiɓe makko.
43011055	Juulɗe Yahudankooɓe gom bi'eteeɗe Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe ɓadake. Sey himɓe ɗuɓɓe nder leydi ndiin njehi Ursaliima faa laaɓina ko'e mum fadde juulɗe ɗee fuɗɗude.
43011056	Ɓe ndarii nder Juulirde mawne ndeen, iɓe tefa Iisa, ɓe mbi'odiri : —Ɗume miiloton ? O waran to juulɗe ɗee naa noy ?
43011057	Tawi mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla e Fariisa'en kokki tilsinoore wi'ude annduɗo to o woni fuu, haala faa o nanngee.
43012001	Balɗe jeegom fadde Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe yottaade, Iisa yehi Baytaniya to Laajaru mo o ummintinnoo he maayde oon.
43012002	Ɓe njonngani mo hiraane, Marta woni no yeddana ɓe nde. Laajaru no wondi he nyaamdooɓe he Iisa ɓeen.
43012003	Nden Mariyaama hooƴi feccere liteereeru nebbam uurɗam, nebbam caadiɗam, ɗam hawrodiraaka he huune fuu, wuji koyɗe Iisa, moytiri ɗe gaasa mum. Suudu nduun fuu uuri.
43012004	Sey Yahuuda Iskariyot, gooto nder aahiiɓe ɓeen, jammboytooɗo Iisa, wi'i :
43012005	—Ɗume waɗi nebbam ɗaam sonnaaka, ceede ɗeen kokkee talkaaɓe ? Ngam ceede majjam no yoɓa gollooɓe keme tato.
43012006	Hanaa ngam yurmeene talkaaɓe waɗi o wi'i haala kaa, amma ngam o gujjo. Kanko wonnoo jogiiɗo mbasu ceede maɓɓe. Omo wujjanno duu he majje.
43012007	Amma Iisa wi'i : —Takkita debbo oo. O resi ɗam ngam nyalaane mooɓeteemi.
43012008	Talkaaɓe no tawdee he mooɗon nyannde fuu. Amma miin, mi tawdataake he mooɗon nyannde fuu.
43012009	Yahudankooɓe ɗuɓɓe nanani Iisa Baytaniya, njehi toon. Hanaa Iisa tan waɗi ɓe njehi toon, ɓe njehi duu ngam ɓe ngi'a Laajaru ummintinaaɗo oon.
43012010	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ngaɗi daane worre ngam warude Laajaru duu.
43012011	Ngam daliila Laajaru, Yahudankooɓe ɗuɓɓe ceedi he mawɓe mum'en, ngoonɗini Iisa.
43012012	Jaangoore mum jama'aare ɗuunde, warde to juulɗe ɗeen, nani ko Iisa no wara Ursaliima.
43012013	Sey ɓe taƴi licce dabinaaje, ɓe njaɓɓitowii mo. Iɓe kuuɓa, iɓe mbi'a : —Hosanna ! Barkinaaɗo woni garɗo dow innde Joomiraawo, Laamiiɗo Isra'el !
43012014	Iisa duu heɓi arel gom, waɗɗii, hano no ɗum winndiraa nder dewte wi'aa :
43012015	Himɓe huɓeere Siyon, to kulee ! Ndaaree da : Laamiiɗo mon no wara, no waɗɗii arel.
43012016	Arannde fuu aahiiɓe makko paamaayno ko woni no waɗa. Amma wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo Iisa teddinaa, nden ɓe miccitii ko ɓe ngaɗani mo ɗum fuu winndaanooma dow makko nder dewte.
43012017	Jama'aare tawanoone toon wakkati o noddanno Laajaru wurtoo nder annyeere ndeen, e ko o ummintini mo fuu ceedake dow ko ɓe ngi'ii ɗum.
43012018	Ɗum duu waɗi himɓe ɗuɓɓe njaɓɓiti mo, wakkati ɓe nanunoo haayne nde o waɗi.
43012019	Nden Fariisa'en mbi'odiri : —On ngi'ii, walaa fuu ko mbaawɗen waɗande mo. Duuniyaaru nduu fuu no dogga gaɗa makko.
43012020	Gerekankooɓe gom ngari Ursaliima to juulɗe ɗeen ngam ndewa Alla.
43012021	Ɓe ɓattii Filipa jeyaaɗo Baytisayda, nder leydi Galili. Ɓe mbi'i ɗum : —Mawɗo, miɗen ngiɗi min ngi'a Iisa.
43012022	Filipa haalanowi Andiire, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo njehi kaalanowi Iisa.
43012023	Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Wakkati teddinol Ɓii-Neɗɗo warii.
43012024	Miɗo haalana on goonga : Wabbere alkama fusataa nder leydi se nde ufaaka. Amma se nde ufaama, nde fusan. Nden nde fuɗan, nde rima faa ɗuuɗa.
43012025	Giɗɗo yonki mum fuu no mursan ki, jeebiiɗo ki nder duuniyaaru nduu, no heɓan mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
43012026	Giɗɗo gollande kam fuu, sey se tokki kam. To ngonmi fuu, ɗon golloowo am duu tawetee. Baabiraawo no teddinan gollanoowo kam fuu.
43012027	Joonkay, mi wemmbaama. Ɗume mbi'anmi ? Mi wi'a Baabiraawo hisinam e wakkati oo naa ? Aa'a, mi waawtaa wi'ude ɗum ngam sabbu wakkati oo jaati ngarmi.
43012028	Baabiraawo, teddin innde maa. Sey daane gom ƴuwi dow, wi'i : —Mi teddiniino nde, mi teddinan nde kaden.
43012029	Himɓe dariiɓe toon nani ko waɗi, nden mbi'i ɗum riggaaŋo kammu. Woɓɓe mbi'i maleykaajo haaldi he makko.
43012030	Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Ɓeydaari mooɗon waɗi daane ndee nanaa amma nde nanaaka ngam ɓeydaari am.
43012031	Joonin woni wakkati kiite duuniyaaru nduu. Joonin, Ibiliisa laamiiɗo duuniyaaru nduu riiwetee.
43012032	Miin, se mi ƴencinaama dow, mi fooɗan himɓe fuu ngara to am.
43012033	Iisa haaliri nii ngam hollude no kam maayirta.
43012034	Nden himɓe ɓeen njaabii mo mbi'i : —Winndaama nder Tawreeta : Almasiihu oon maayataa abada. Noy mbi'irtaa Ɓii-Neɗɗo no ɓantetee dow ? Moy woni Ɓii-Neɗɗo oo ?
43012035	Iisa jaabii ɓe : —Oɗon nder jeyngol ginan, amma ɗum ɓooyataa. Ndillee illa oɗon nder jeyngol, ngam to nimre juhu on. Sabu dilloowo nder nimre anndaa fuu to yahata.
43012036	Ngoonɗinee jeyngol illa oɗon nder maggol heɓa laatoɗon ɓiɓɓe jeyngol ngool. Gaɗa Iisa haaliri nii, yehi, suuɗowii.
43012037	Baa ko o waɗi kaayɗe ɗuɗɗe ɗee fuu yeeso maɓɓe, ɓe ngoonɗinaay mo.
43012038	Ɗum fuu waɗi ngam humnude haala Esaaya mbi'uka : Joomiraawo, moy goonɗini waaju meeɗen ? Moy Joomiraawo wannginani baawɗe mum ?
43012039	Esaaya haali duu ko waɗi himɓe ɓee mbaawtaa goonɗinde, o wi'i :
43012040	Alla wumnii ɓe, yoornii ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ngam to gite maɓɓe ngi'u, to ɓerɗe maɓɓe paamu, sako ɓe tuuba faa mi danna ɓe.
43012041	Esaaya wi'i ɗum, ngam o hi'iino teddungal Iisa, o haali dow makko duu.
43012042	Amma baa ko nii waɗi ɗuɓɓe nder hooreeɓe Yahudankooɓe ngoonɗinii Iisa. Dey ngam kulal Fariisa'en waɗi ɓe ceedanaaki mo ngam to ɓe ndiiwee nder waajordu.
43012043	Iɓe coofi teddinde himɓe ɓurde teddinde Alla.
43012044	Nden Iisa huuɓi, wi'i : —Neɗɗo fuu goonɗini kam, hanaa miin tan goonɗini, amma lilɗo kam oon joomum goonɗini.
43012045	Gi'uɗo kam fuu, hi'i lilɗo kam.
43012046	Min woni jeyngol, mi wari nder duuniyaaru heɓa goonɗinɗo kam fuu to tawee nder nimre.
43012047	Nde goɗɗo nani haalaaji am, goonɗinaay, hanaa miin hiitoto mo. Ngam mi waraay hiitaade duuniyaaru nduu, amma mi wari faa mi hisina ndu.
43012048	Caliiɗo kam jaɓataa haalaaji am, heɓi ko hiitoto ɗum. Haala ka kaalumi kaa, kanka hiitoto joomum nyannde darŋal.
43012049	Mi walaa miɗo haala muuyo hoore am, amma Baabiraawo lilɗo kam, kam hokki kam ko kaalanmi e ko mbaajotoomi.
43012050	Miɗo anndi ko waaju mo o halfini kam oo no hokka mbuurnam nduumiiɗam faa abada. Ngam majjum waɗi ko kaalumi fuu, miɗo haalira ɗum, hano no Baabiraawo haalirani kam ɗum.
43013001	Fadde Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe yottaade, Iisa anndi ko wakkati mo o dillata nder duuniyaaru o soƴƴoo to Baabiraawo yottake. Omo hiɗi himɓe makko wonɓe nder duuniyaaru, omo hiɗi ɓe keerol baawɗe makko.
43013002	Wakkati Iisa e aahiiɓe mum ngoni no kiirtoo, tawi Ibiliisa re'i watti anniya jammbaade mo nder ɓerne Yahuuda Iskariyot ɓii-Simon.
43013003	Iisa no anndi ko Alla watti huune fuu nder junngo mum. Omo anndi duu to Alla kam ƴuwi, to Alla kam soƴƴoto.
43013004	O ummii, o ɓoorti jabbaare makko, o hooƴi lefol, o tuundi.
43013005	Nden o wanji ndiyam nder tummbude, o fuɗɗi lootude koyɗe aahiiɓe makko, omo moytira ɗe lefol ngol o tuundi.
43013006	Wakkati o yottinoo to Simon Piyer, Simon Piyer wi'i mo : —Joomam, aan lootata koyɗe am ?
43013007	Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —A faamataa ko ngaɗanmi jooni, amma a faamowan yeeso seɗɗa.
43013008	Piyer wi'i mo : —A lootataa koyɗe am abada ! Iisa jaabii mo : —Se nii mi lootaay ɗe, a walaa mbaka to am.
43013009	Sey Simon Piyer wi'i mo : —Joomam ! Se non ɗum worri, taa haaɗu he koyɗe am tan, lootu juuɗe am e hoore am duu.
43013010	Iisa wi'i mo : —Lootiiɗo fuu no laaɓuɗo. Koyɗe makko tan o haajaa lootude. Onon on laaɓuɓe, amma hanaa on fuu.
43013011	Iisa no anndi jammbotooɗo ɗum, kam waɗi o wi'i hanaa ɓe fuu ngoni laaɓuɓe.
43013012	Nde Iisa lootidinnoo koyɗe maɓɓe, o hooƴi jabbaare makko, o jooɗii, nden o wi'i : —On paamii ko ngaɗanmi on ɗum ?
43013013	Oɗon noddira kam Moodibbo e Joomiraawo. On penaay, sabu miin woni ɗum fuu.
43013014	Ndenne, se miin gonɗo Joomiraawo e Moodibbo mooɗon, se mi lootii koyɗe mooɗon, onon duu oɗon kaani lootodirde koyɗe.
43013015	Ko kollumi on ɗum no laawol non ngam onon duu ngaɗon hano ko ngaɗanmi on ɗum.
43013016	Miɗo haalana on goonga, maccuɗo ɓurataa joomum, lilaaɗo ɓurataa lilɗo ɗum.
43013017	Jooni ko annduɗon ɗum, se on ngollirii ɗum, on mbelii ko'e.
43013018	—Mi walaa miɗo haalda he mooɗon, on fuu, miɗo anndi ɓe cuɓiimi. Amma no tilsi ko winndaa nder dewte ɗum huuɓa, kam woni : Junngo nyaamdoowo he am ngoon fiyi kam.
43013019	Miɗo haalana on ɗum illa jooni fadde majjum yottaade, ngam nde ɗum yottake fuu, ngoonɗinon ko « Miin woni oon mo ngonmi » !
43013020	Miɗo haalana on goonga : Neɗɗo fuu jaɓɓiiɗo mo lilumi, miin jaɓɓii. Neɗɗo fuu jaɓɓiiɗo kam, jaɓɓake lilɗo kam oon duu.
43013021	Gaɗa ko o haaliri nii, ɓerne makko metti sanne, o wi'i : —Goonga kaalananmi on : Gooto nder mooɗon jammboto kam.
43013022	Aahiiɓe ɓeen ƴeewodiri, ɓe anndaa dow moy o woni omo haala.
43013023	Gooto nder aahiiɓe ɓeen mo Iisa hiɗi oon, no wahinoo hadde makko.
43013024	Simon Piyer fiyani mo hitere ngam o ƴama Iisa moy o wondi.
43013025	Nden aahiijo oon ɓaggi Iisa, ƴami mo : —Joomam, moy non ?
43013026	Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Mi suuwan ŋoppitto buuru, mo kokkanmi ngo, woni mo. Nden o hooƴi ngo, o suuwi, o hokki Yahuuda Iskariyot, ɓii-Simon.
43013027	Illa o jaɓi ŋoppitto ngoon Ibiliisa naati nder ɓerne makko. Iisa wi'i mo : —Waɗu ko ngaɗataa law law !
43013028	Nder wahinooɓe toon ɓeen baa gooto faamaay ngam ɗume o haali ɗum.
43013029	Ngam Yahuuda no joginoo mbasu ceede nguun, woɓɓe miili ko Iisa lili mo o soodowa ko ɓe kaajaa ngam juulɗe ɗeen, naa kaden ngam o heɓa ko o hokki talkaaɓe.
43013030	Yahuuda jaɓi ŋoppitto ngoon tan, wurtii. Tawi jemma naati.
43013031	Nde Yahuuda wurtinoo, Iisa wi'i : —Joonkay Ɓii-Neɗɗo teddinaama, Alla duu teddinaama ngam makko.
43013032	Se Alla teddinaama ngam makko, Alla e hoore mum duu no teddinan mo. Alla teddinan mo jooni jooni.
43013033	Sukaaɓe am, no hoddanii kam wakkati seɗɗa mo ngondanmi he mooɗon. On tefan kam, amma hano no mbi'irnoomi mawɓe Yahudankooɓe mbaawtaa yahde to pa'umi toon, non, onon duu, mbi'iranmi on ɗum jooni.
43013034	Miɗo hokka on tilsinoore heyre : Ngiɗodiree ! Hano no ngiɗirmi on nii, onon duu ngiɗodiree !
43013035	Nde hidde no hakkune mooɗon, ɗum waɗan himɓe fuu anndita ko on aahiiɓe am.
43013036	Simon Piyer wi'i mo : —Joomam, toy njahataa ? Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —To pa'umi toon, a waawtaa tokkude kam jooni. Amma yahde yeeso a tokkan kam !
43013037	Piyer wi'i mo : —Joomam, ngam ɗume waɗi ko mi waawtaa tokkude ma joonin ? Mi siryake mursude yonki am sabu maaɗa.
43013038	Iisa jaabii, wi'i : —A siryake mursude yonki maa sabu am naa ? Goonga kaalananmaami : Fadde ndontoori jogginde, a wi'an a anndaa kam kile tati !
43014001	Iisa wi'i aahiiɓe mum : —To accee ɓerɗe mon mbona, ngoonɗinee Alla, ngoonɗinon kam, miin duu.
43014002	Cuuɗi ɗuɗɗi no nder hoggo Baaba am. Mi yahan toon, mi siryanoo on nokkuure. Se hanaa goonga non, mi haalantaa on ɗum.
43014003	Ndenne, nde mi siryanake on nokkuure, mi wartanan on, mi yaara on ngam to ngonmi fuu, ngonden.
43014004	Oɗon anndi laawol jehoowol to njahanmi toon.
43014005	Sey Tomas wi'i mo : —Joomam, min anndaa to njahataa. Noy min anndirta laawol ngol ?
43014006	Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Miin woni laawol, miin woni goonga, miin woni mbuurnam duu. Walaa jehoowo to Baabiraawo se tokkiraay to am.
43014007	Se oɗon anndunoo kam, on anndannoo Baaba am duu. Illa jooni oɗon anndi mo, on ngi'ii mo.
43014008	Filipa wi'i mo : —Joomam, hollu min Baabiraawo, ɗum ɗon tan heƴii min.
43014009	Iisa wi'i mo : —Filipa, no ɓooydirmi he mooɗon nii fuu, a anndaa kam naa ? A anndaa ko giiɗo kam fuu, hi'i Baabiraawo naa ? Noy mbaawɗaa wi'ude hollu min Baabiraawo ?
43014010	A goonɗinaay ko miɗo hawti he Baabiraawo, Baabiraawo duu no hawti he am naa ? Haalaaji ɗi kaalanmi on ɗi fuu, ƴuwaay to am. Baabiraawo gonduɗo he am, waɗata golle mum.
43014011	Ngoonɗinee kam se mi wi'i : Miɗo hawti he Baabiraawo, Baabiraawo duu no hawti he am. Baa se on ngoonɗinaay haala am, ngoonɗinee ngam golle am.
43014012	Miɗo haalana on goonga : Neɗɗo fuu goonɗinɗo kam, no waɗan golleeji ɗi ngaɗumi ɗii. O waɗan baa ko ɓuri ɗi sabu mi yahan to Baabiraawo.
43014013	Mi waɗanan on huune fuu ko eelirɗon innde am. Mi waɗan ɗum ngam Baabiraawo teddinee sabu Ɓiɗɗo oon.
43014014	Ko eelirɗon innde am fuu, mi waɗan ɗum.
43014015	—Se oɗon ngiɗi kam, on tokkan tilsinooje am.
43014016	Mi ŋaaroto Baabiraawo hokka on Balloowo gom. O wondan he mooɗon faa abada.
43014017	Kanko woni Ruuhu goonga. Duuniyaaru nduu waawtaa jaɓude mo, ngam ndu hi'ataa mo, ndu anndaa mo. Amma onon, oɗon anndi mo sabu omo jooddii he mooɗon, o wondan he mooɗon.
43014018	Mi accataa on, onon tan hano alatuumi'en, mi wartanan on.
43014019	Se ɓooyii seɗɗa duuniyaaru nduu hi'ataa kam. Amma onon, on ngi'an kam, sabu mi buurɗo, onon duu on mbuuran.
43014020	Nyannde mum on paaman ko miɗo hawti he Baabiraawo, oɗon kawti he am, miɗo hawti he mooɗon.
43014021	Annduɗo tilsinooje am, nden golliri ɗe, kam woni giɗɗo kam. Giɗɗo kam, Baaba am hiɗan ɗum. Miin duu, mi hiɗan mo, mi wannganan mo.
43014022	Nden Yahuuda, mo hanaa Yahuuda Iskariyot, wi'i Iisa : —Joomam, noy ɗum laatorto mbannganaa min, tawee a wanngantaa duuniyaaru fuu ?
43014023	Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Giɗɗo kam fuu no golliran haala am, Baaba am duu hiɗan ɗum. Miin e Baabiraawo, min ngardan to joomum, min cinnga jooɗorɗe amin to makko.
43014024	Neɗɗo fuu mo hiɗaa kam, gollirta haala am. Haala ka nanoton kaa ƴuwaay to am, amma ka ƴuwaana to Baabiraawo lilɗo kam.
43014025	Ɗum fuu, mi haalanii on ɗum, illa miɗo wondi he mooɗon.
43014026	Balloowo oon, woni Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, mo Baabiraawo lildanta on dow innde am, kanko anndinta on kujje fuu. O miccintinan on ko kaalannoomi on fuu.
43014027	Jam accidanmi on, mi hokkan on jam am. Hanaa hano no duuniyaaru nduu hokkirta on, kokkiranmi on. To hakkillo mon ummoo, to kulee.
43014028	On nanii nii ko mbi'umi on : Mi yahan, mi wartan to mooɗon. Se oɗon ngiɗunoo kam, on mbelnan dow jaaki am to Baabiraawo, sabu kanko ɓuri kam manngu.
43014029	Too, miɗo haalana on joonin, illa ɗum waraay ginan, ngam se ɗum warii, ngoonɗinon.
43014030	Gaɗa hannden mi haaldataa he mooɗon sanne, sabu Ibiliisa laamiiɗo duuniyaaru no wara. O waawanaa kam baafuy.
43014031	Amma sey duuniyaaru nduu annda ko miɗo hiɗi Baabiraawo, ndu annda duu ko miɗo waɗa ko Baabiraawo tilsini kam. Ummee, ndillen ɗo.
43015001	—Miin woni cabiihi goongaahi, Baabiraawo woni demoowo ngesa cabiije.
43015002	Liccal am ngal rimataa fuu, o taƴan ngal. Dimoowal fuu, o saltoto ngal, ngam ngal ɓeyda rimude.
43015003	Onon, jooni jaati laaɓuɗon sabu waaju mo ngaɗanmi on.
43015004	Kawtee he am, miin duu mi hawtan he mon. Liccal fuu waawtaa rimde feere mum nde ngal sinngaaki he cabiihi kiin, hano non, onon duu on mbaawtaa waɗude ko woodi barke se on kawtaay he am.
43015005	Miin woni cabiihi kiin, onon ngoni licce ɗeen. Se neɗɗo hawti he am, miin duu mi hawtan he mum, o waɗan ko ɗuuɗi ko woodi barke. Sabu on mbaawtaa waɗude baafuy se ɗum ƴuwaay to am.
43015006	Mo hawtaay he am, no faɗɗetee nder ladde hano liccal jorngal. Licce joorɗe ɗeen no kawretee, paɗɗee nder hiite, mbulee.
43015007	Se on kawti he am, se waaju am duu no duumii nder mon, nden kay ko ƴamuɗon fuu, on keɓan.
43015008	Se on ngaɗi ko ɗuuɗi ko woodi barke, ɗum hollan ko on laatake aahiiɓe am. Ndenne Baaba am teddinaama.
43015009	Hano no Baabiraawo hiɗiri kam nii, hano non ngiɗirmi on. Kawtee nder hidde am.
43015010	Se on tokkii tilsinooje am, on kawtan nder hidde am, hano no kawtirmi nder hidde Baaba am nii, ngam mi tokki tilsinooje makko.
43015011	Mi haalanii on ɗum ngam welwelo am jooɗo nder mon, nden welwelo mon duu huuɓa.
43015012	Tilsinoore am woni ngiɗodiron hano no ngiɗirmi on nii.
43015013	Walaa hidde fotune neɗɗo sotta yonki mum ngam higiraaɓe mum.
43015014	Se on ngaɗii ko tilsinmi on, onon ngoni higiraaɓe am.
43015015	Mi yeeƴataako mi noddira on maccuɓe kaden, sabu maccuɗo anndaa ko joomum waɗata. Amma mi noddiran on higiraaɓe sabu mi anndinii on ko narrumi Baaba am fuu.
43015016	Hanaa onon cuɓii kam, amma miin suɓii on. Mi lilii on faa njehon, ngaɗon ko woodi barke, barke mon duu duumoo. Nden Baabiraawo hokkan on ko ŋaariɗon mo fuu nder innde am.
43015017	Ndenne, ko tilsinanmi on woni ngiɗodiron.
43015018	—Se duuniyaaru nduu wanyii on, anndee ko miin ndu artii wanyude.
43015019	Se nii on laatakeno ɓe duuniyaaru, duuniyaaru hiɗanno ko jeyi. Amma on njeyaaka he mayru. Miin suɓii on, senndi on he duuniyaaru nduu. Ngam majjum waɗi ndu wanyi on.
43015020	Miccitee ko mbi'unoomi on : « Maccuɗo ɓurataa joomum. » Se ɓe torrii kam, ɓe torran on, onon duu. Se ɓe njogake haala am, ɓe njogoto haalaaji mooɗon.
43015021	Amma kujje ɗee fuu, ɓe ngaɗan on ɗe sabu innde am, ngam ɓe anndaa lilɗo kam.
43015022	Nde mi waraayno kaaldumi he maɓɓe, hakkeeji maɓɓe limataakeno. Amma jooni ɓe ngalaa no ɓe kisirta hakkeeji maɓɓe.
43015023	Banyuɗo kam fuu wanyii Baabiraawo duu.
43015024	Nde mi waɗaayno golleeji ɗi neɗɗo fuu meeɗaay waɗude hakkune maɓɓe, hakkeeji maɓɓe limataakeno. Amma jooni ɓe ngi'ii ɗi, ɗi fuu, baa ko non waɗi, ɓe accaay wanyude kam, miin e Baabiraawo.
43015025	Amma ɗum waɗi ngam humnude ko winndaano nder Tawreeta maɓɓe, wi'aa : Ɓe mbanyii kam ngam meere.
43015026	Nde Balloowo mo lildanmi on warii, kanko woni Ruuhu goonga ƴuwoowo to Baabiraawo, kanko seedantoo kam.
43015027	Onon duu, on ceedanto kam sabu oɗon ngondi he am illa fuɗɗorde.
43016001	—Mi haalanii on ɗum fuu ngam to on pergo.
43016002	Ɓe ndiiwan on nder baajorɗi. Wakkati waran, ko barɗo on fuu miilan waɗi ko Alla hiɗi.
43016003	Ɓe ngaɗan non sabu ɓe anndaa Baabiraawo, ɓe anndaa kam, miin duu.
43016004	Mi haalanii on ɗum, ngam nde wakkati oon wari, miccitoɗon ko mi haalaniino on ɗum. —Mi haalanaay on kujje ɗee illa arannde sabu miɗo wondunoo he mooɗon.
43016005	Joonin miɗo ɗon miɗo hoota to liluɗo kam oon, dey baa gooto nder mooɗon ƴamataa kam to njahanmi.
43016006	Amma ɓerɗe mooɗon metti ngam mi haalanii on kujje ɗee fuu.
43016007	Amma nder ɗum fuu, miɗo haalana on goonga, yahdu am ɓuri wooɗande on. Nde mi yahaay, Balloowo oon warataa to mooɗon. Amma nde mi yehi, mi lildanan on mo.
43016008	Nde o warii, o faamtinan himɓe duuniyaaru nduu ko ɓe mboofi har ko daarta hakke, foccitaare e kiite.
43016009	Har ko daarta hakke, ɓe mboofi ngam ɓe ngoonɗinaay kam.
43016010	Har ko daarta foccitaare, ɓe mboofi ngam ɓe paamaay coƴƴitaaki am to Baabiraawo kolloohi foccitaare am. On ngi'ataa kam kaden.
43016011	Har ko daarta kiite, ɓe mboofi ngam ɓe paamaay ko Ibiliisa laamiiɗo duuniyaaru re'i hiitaama.
43016012	Miɗo woodi kujje ɗuɗɗe ɗe kaalananmi on, amma on mbaawtaa faamude ɗe joonin.
43016013	Wakkati Ruuhu goonga oon wari, o ɗowan on nder goonga oon fuu, ngam o haaldataa he muuyo hoore makko, amma o haalanan on ko o nani, o wannginanan on ko warata fuu.
43016014	O haalanan on ko o nani to am fuu, hano non o wannginirta teddungal am.
43016015	Ko Baaba am jeyii fuu, miin jeyii, ngam majjum waɗi mbi'umi ko Ruuhu goonga oon no faaminan on ko o nani to am fuu.
43016016	—Nder wakkati seɗɗa on ngi'ataa kam, nder wakkati seɗɗa kaden on ngi'an kam.
43016017	Gere nder aahiiɓe makko ƴamodiri, mbi'i : —Ɗume woni maana haala makko kaa : « Nder wakkati seɗɗa on ngi'ataa kam, nder wakkati seɗɗa kaden on ngi'an kam ? » E ko o wi'i : « Ngam mi yahan to Baabiraawo ? »
43016018	Ɓe mbi'odiri : —Ɗume woni maana haala kaa : « Nder wakkati seɗɗa » ? Min paamaay ko ɗum hiɗi wi'ude ɗo.
43016019	Iisa faami iɓe ngiɗi ƴamude ɗum, wi'i ɓe : —Oɗon ƴamodira maana haala am kaa : « Nder wakkati seɗɗa on ngi'ataa kam, nder wakkati seɗɗa kaden on ngi'an kam. »
43016020	Miɗo haalana on goonga : Onon, on mboyan, on mboytoto, tawaa duuniyaaru nduu no nder welwelo. Ɓerɗe mon no mettan, amma mettal ɓerɗe mooɗon no waylititto welwelo.
43016021	Nde ŋatawere caawɗo yottake, o nanan naawɗum sanne ngam wakkati torra makko wari. Amma nde o rimii, o yeggitan torra makko, o welnan ngam cukalel kesel naati duuniyaaru.
43016022	Onon duu hano non nanirton naawɗum jooni, amma en ngiidowan. Wakkati mum, on nanan belɗum, kaden walaa baawɗo ittude welwelo mooɗon.
43016023	Nyannde mum, on ƴamataa kam dow baafuy. Miɗo haalana on goonga, ko ŋaariɗon Baabiraawo dow innde am fuu on kokketee.
43016024	Faa joonin, walaa fuu ko eeluɗon dow innde am. Ŋaaree, on keɓan ngam welwelo mooɗon huuɓa.
43016025	—Ko kaalanmi on ɗum fuu nder haala kippaaka kaalirmi ɗum. Amma wakkati waran ko mi hippataa haala, no laaɓiri kaalirananmi on dow Baabiraawo.
43016026	Nyannde mum on ŋaaroto Baabiraawo he innde am. Mi wi'aay mi ŋaaranto on Baabiraawo,
43016027	ngam Baabiraawo he hoore mum no hiɗi on. Omo hiɗi on sabu oɗon ngiɗi kam, on ngoonɗinii to Alla ƴuwumi.
43016028	Mi ƴuwii to Baabiraawo, mi warii nder duuniyaaru. Jooni duu mi accan duuniyaaru mi soƴƴoo to Baabiraawo.
43016029	Sey aahiiɓe makko mbi'i mo : —Joonkay, a haalii faa laaɓii, a acci hippude haalaaji maa.
43016030	Joonin miɗen anndi ko walaa fuu ko suuɗanii ma, sabu aɗa anndi ko neɗɗo ƴamata illa o ƴamaay ma. Ɗum waɗi min ngoonɗini ko a ƴuwɗo to Alla.
43016031	Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i : —Joonkay ! On ngoonɗinii naa ?
43016032	Too, wakkati no wara, wakkati oon yottake, nde on fuu on cankitoto, neɗɗo fuu dogga hoota wuro mum, joofon kam, miin tan. Amma mi wonaa miin tan, sabu Baabiraawo no wondi he am.
43016033	Mi haalanii on ɗum, ngam keɓon jam nder kawtal mooɗon he am. Oɗon ngondi he torra nder duuniyaaru. Amma cemmbiɗee, sabu mi jaalake duuniyaaru.
43017001	Wakkati Iisa laaɓinani aahiiɓe mum to fa'i, sey o tiggitii kammu, o wi'i : —Baabiraawo, wakkati oo yonii, wanngin teddungal Ɓiya, faa Ɓiya duu wanngina teddungal maa.
43017002	A hokkii mo baawɗe dow himɓe fuu, ngam o hokka, ɓe kokkuɗaa mo fuu mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
43017003	Mbuurnam nduumiiɗam woni ɓe annde, aan Alla gooto goongaajo, ɓe annda mo lilɗaa oon duu, Iisa Almasiihu.
43017004	Mi teddinii ma nder duuniyaaru, mi humnii golle ɗe kokkuɗaa kam mi golla.
43017005	Joonkay, Baabiraawo, teddinam teddungal ngal ngoodunoomi to maaɗa illa duuniyaaru tagaaka.
43017006	Mi wannginii ma to himɓe duuniyaaru ɓe kokkuɗaa kam. Aan jeynoo ɓe, a hokkii kam ɓe. Ɓe tokki haala maa.
43017007	Joonkay, ɓe anndii ko kokkuɗaa kam fuu, to maaɗa ɗum ƴuwi.
43017008	Mi yottinanii ɓe haala ka kaalanɗaa kam kaan. Ɓe njaɓi ka, ɓe tabbitinii ko to maaɗa ƴuwumi, ɓe ngoonɗinii aan lili kam.
43017009	Ngam maɓɓe ndu'otoomi. Mi du'ataako ngam duuniyaaru nduu. Amma miɗo du'oo ngam ɓe kokkuɗaa kam ɓee, sabu aan jeyii ɓe.
43017010	Huune fuu ko njeymi, aan jeyii ɗum, huune fuu ko njeyɗaa, miin jeyii ɗum. Teddungal am wanngi hakkune maɓɓe.
43017011	Mi jooɗotaako nder duuniyaaru, mi wartan to maaɗa. Amma kamɓe, iɓe nder duuniyaaru. Aan Baabiraawo Ceniiɗo, reenir ɓe innde maaɗa nde kokkuɗaa kam, ngam ɓe laatoo gooto hano no laatoriɗen gooto.
43017012	Wakkati ngondunoomi he maɓɓe nder duuniyaaru, mi reenirii ɓe innde nde kokkuɗaa kam. Mi reenii ɓe, baa gooto halkaay se hanaa kalkuɗo ngam ko sappaa wi'aa nder dewte ɗum huuɓaa.
43017013	Joonkay miɗo fa'i to maa. Miɗo haala haalaaji ɗii illa miɗo nder duuniyaaru ngam welwelo am heewa nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
43017014	Mi haalanii ɓe haala maa. Amma duuniyaaru wanyii ɓe, sabu ɓe njeyaaka nder duuniyaaru, hano no mi jeyiraaka nder duuniyaaru nii.
43017015	Mi ŋaaraaki mburtinaa ɓe nder duuniyaaru, amma miɗo eela ndeenaa ɓe e bonɗo.
43017016	Ɓe njeyaaka nder duuniyaaru, hano no mi jeyiraaka nder duuniyaaru nii.
43017017	Haala maa woni goonga. Ndenne, senɗinir ɓe goonga oon.
43017018	Hano no lilirɗaa kam nder duuniyaaru nii, non miin duu lilirmi ɓe nder duuniyaaru.
43017019	Miin e hoore am mi hokkii ma hoore am ngam kamɓe duu ɓe kokka ko'e maɓɓe nder goonga.
43017020	Hanaa sabu maɓɓe tan ndu'otoomi. Amma miɗo du'oo duu sabu goonɗinɓe kam har waaju maɓɓe.
43017021	Baabiraawo, miɗo eela ngam ɓe laatoo gootum. Ɓe kawta e meeɗen hano no kawtirɗaa he am, e no kawtirmi he maa. Ɓe fuu ɓe laatoo gootum heɓa duuniyaaru goonɗina aan lili kam.
43017022	Miin, mi hokkii ɓe teddungal ngal kokkuɗaa kam, ngam ɓe laatoo gootum, hano no laatoriɗen gootum nii.
43017023	Miɗo wondi he maɓɓe, aɗa wondi he am, ngam ɓe laatoo gootum, faa duuniyaaru annda ko aan lili kam. Aɗa hiɗi ɓe duu hano no ngiɗirɗaa kam nii.
43017024	Baabiraawo, miɗo hiɗi ɓe kokkuɗaa kam ɓeen tawee to ngonmi fuu ngam ɓe ngi'a teddungal ngal kokkuɗaa kam ngaal, sabu a hiɗii kam illa duuniyaaru diidaaka.
43017025	Baabiraawo dartiiɗo, duuniyaaru anndaa ma, amma miin kay miɗo anndii ma, ɓeeɗo duu anndii aan lili kam.
43017026	Mi anndinii ɓe ma. Mi anndinan ɓe ma kaden ngam hidde nde ngiɗirɗaa kam tawee nder maɓɓe, miin duu mi wonda he maɓɓe.
43018001	Gaɗa du'aa'u oo, Iisa yahdi he aahiiɓe mum gaɗa gooruwol bi'eteengol Kedoron. Toon no woodi koogol gom, o naddi he aahiiɓe makko nder maggol.
43018002	Yahuuda jammbotooɗo mo oon no anndi nokkuure ndee, sabu Iisa e aahiiɓe mum no mboowi yahde toon.
43018003	Yahuuda ardii oorngal soogeeji e dogariiɓe ƴuwɓe to cakkanooɓe Alla e Fariisa'en gom. Ɓe naati koogol ngool, iɓe njogii yulbaaji, fitillaaji e kaɓirɗe.
43018004	Tawi Iisa no anndi huune fuu ko heɓata ɗum, taɓɓitii ɓe, wi'i : —Moy tefoton ?
43018005	Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Iisa mo Nasaratu. Nden o wi'i ɓe : —Miin non ! Yahuuda jammbotooɗo mo oon no dardii he maɓɓe.
43018006	Nde Iisa wi'unoo « Miin non ! » Ɓe coƴƴorii gaɗa, ɓe caami e leydi.
43018007	Iisa ƴamii ɓe kaden wi'i : —Moy tefoton ? Ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i : —Iisa mo Nasaratu.
43018008	Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i : —Mi wi'i on, miin non. Se miin tefoton, accee himɓe am kay ndilla.
43018009	Noon ɗum laatorii ngam haala Iisa kaa tabbita : « Walaa kalkuɗo nder ɓe kokkuɗaa kam ɓeen. »
43018010	Nden Simon Piyer no joginoo takubaahi gom, sorti ki, soppi Malkus gollanoowo mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla gom, taƴi nowru makko nyaamo.
43018011	Sey Iisa wi'i Piyer : —Wattu takubaahi maa nder hulgo mum. No tilsi mi yara nyeɗerde torra nde Baabiraawo fodanii kam.
43018012	Oorngal soogeeji e hooreejo mum, kam e dogariiɓe Yahudankooɓe nanngi Iisa, kaɓɓi mo.
43018013	Ɓe artii yaarude mo to Annas, eso Kayafas. Nder hitaane ndeen, Kayafas woni mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla fuu.
43018014	Kayafas faamtiniino mawɓe Yahudankooɓe ko no ɓuri wooɗude, neɗɗo gooto maayana himɓe fuu.
43018015	Simon Piyer e aahiijo gom tokki Iisa. Ko nii waɗi mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon no anndi aahiijo oon, sey aahiijo oon naddi he Iisa nder hoggo mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon.
43018016	Amma Piyer darii dammbugal ɓaade ndeen. Aahiijo anndaaɗo oon, wurtii haaldi he korɗo deenoowo dammbugal oon, nden debbo oon acci Piyer naati hoggo ngoon.
43018017	Korɗo deenoowo oon wi'i mo : —Aan nee, a hanaa gooto nder aahiiɓe gorko oo naa ? Piyer jaabii mo : —Mi hanaa !
43018018	Tawi jaaŋol waɗi. Gollooɓe e dogariiɓe ɓeen kuɓɓi hiite no ƴilfoo. Piyer duu darii hadde maɓɓe no ƴilfoo.
43018019	Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla fuu ƴamii Iisa dow aahiiɓe mum e dow ko o waajotoo.
43018020	Iisa jaabii mo : —Mi wannginanii duuniyaaru nduu fuu waaju am. Mi waajake nder cuuɗi baajorɗi e nder Juulirde mawne to Yahudankooɓe kawrata nyannde fuu. Walaa fuu ko kaalumi nder cuccukka.
43018021	Ko saabii aɗa ƴama kam ? Ƴamu hettinaniiɓe kam ko kaalannoomi ɓe. Iɓe anndi ko kaalumi.
43018022	Wakkati o wi'unoo nii, gooto nder dogariiɓe ɓeen no darii ɗon feenyii Iisa wi'i : —Nii nootortoɗaa mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla naa ?
43018023	Iisa jaabii mo : —Se ko boni kaalumi, haalu ko bonni ko kaalumi. Se tawi ko wooɗi kaalumi, ɗume piyanɗaa kam ?
43018024	Nden Annas lildi mo to Kayafas mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla fuu gom, tawi omo haɓɓii.
43018025	Simon Piyer no ƴilfoo toon, sey ɓe mbi'i mo : —Aan, a gooto nder aahiiɓe makko naa ? Piyer yeddi, wi'i : —Mi hanaa !
43018026	Gooto nder gollooɓe mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla fuu, sakiike mo Piyer taƴunoo nowru mum oon, wi'i mo : —Mi hiidaayno ma he makko too nder koogol naa ?
43018027	Piyer yeddi kaden. Wakkati mum da, ndontoori joggini.
43018028	Jaangoore mum illa subaka kecco ɓe itti Iisa to Kayafas, ɓe njaari mo hoggo Pilaatus, kawjotooɗo leydi Yahudiya. Yaaruɓe mo ɓeen naataay hoggo ngoon ngam to ɓe tunnin ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe kaɗee nyaamude nyaamdu Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe nduun.
43018029	Pilaatus yehi tawowi ɓe yaasin, wi'i : —Ɗume pelirton gorko oo ?
43018030	Ɓe njaabii mo ɓe mbi'i : —Se nii o gollataano ko boni, min ngaddataano mo to maa.
43018031	Sey Pilaatus wi'i ɓe : —Njaaree mo, kiitoroɗon mo Tawreeta mooɗon. Nden ɓe mbi'i mo : —Min kokkaaka laawol hiitanaade goɗɗo kiite maayde.
43018032	Ɗum tabbintini haala ka Iisa wi'unoo wakkati o haalunoo dow no o maayirta.
43018033	Pilaatus soƴƴii nder hoggo mum, noddi Iisa, wi'i mo : —Aan, a laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe naa ?
43018034	Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Haala kaa he becce maa ittuɗaa ka naa woɓɓe narruɗaa ka ?
43018035	Pilaatus jaabii mo wi'i : —Miin, mi Yahudanke naa ? Himɓe lenyol maa e mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ngaddi ma to am. Ɗume ngaɗɗaa ?
43018036	Iisa jaabii wi'i : —Laamu am hanaa laamu duuniyaaru. Se nii ngu laamu duuniyaaru, aahiiɓe am no kaɓan ngam to mi naatu juuɗe mawɓe Yahudankooɓe. Amma jooni laamu am hanaa laamu ɗo non.
43018037	Nden Pilaatus wi'i mo : —Ndenne, a laamiiɗo naa ? Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Aan wi'i ka. Ngam majjum ndimaami, mi warii nder duuniyaaru ngam mi seedanoo goonga. Giɗɗo goonga fuu, nanan haala am.
43018038	Pilaatus ƴami mo : —Ɗume woni goonga ? Nden Pilaatus wurtii kaden, o tawowi mawɓe Yahudankooɓe ɓeen yaasin, o wi'i ɓe : —Mi heɓaay feloore baa worre nde nanngiranmi gorko oo.
43018039	Oɗon mboowi Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe fuu mi yoofana on kasunke gooto. Oɗon ngiɗi mi yoofana on laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe naa ?
43018040	Sey ɓe puɗɗi huuɓude, iɓe mbi'a : —Hanaa kanko, Barabas. Tawi Barabas nee no murtuɗo he gomnati.
43019001	Pilaatus tilsini Iisa ɓoccowee.
43019002	Soogeeji canyi taarde gi'e, kippi dow hoore makko. Ɓe ngattani mo alkubbaare woɗeere.
43019003	Ɓe ɓadii mo, iɓe mbi'a : —Alla sabbinane, laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe ! Iɓe peenya mo.
43019004	Pilaatus wurtii kaden, wi'i Yahudankooɓe ɓeen : —Mi wurtinanan on mo, ngam anndon mi heɓaay feloore fuu nde nanngiranmoomi.
43019005	Iisa wurtii taarde gi'e no hippaa dow hoore mum. Omo watti alkubbaare woɗeere. Pilaatus wi'i ɓe : —Ndaaree neɗɗo oo !
43019006	Wakkati mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla e dogariiɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo mo, ɓe kuuɓi ɓe mbi'i : —Tontu mo ! Tontu mo dow bardugal ! Nden Pilaatus wi'i ɓe : —Nanngee mo onon, tonton mo, sabu miin kay, mi heɓaay feloore e makko.
43019007	Yahudankooɓe njaabii mo mbi'i : —Nder Tawreeta amin, omo haani wareede, sabu o adi hoore makko Ɓii-Alla.
43019008	Nde Pilaatus nanunoo haala kaa, o ɓeydi hulude.
43019009	O naati nder ɓaade, o wi'i Iisa : —Aan, toy ƴuwɗaa ? Iisa jaabaaki mo baa.
43019010	Nden Pilaatus wi'i mo : —A jaabataako kam naa ? Tawte a anndaa ko miɗo woodi baawɗe yoofude ma, e baawɗe tontude ma naa ?
43019011	Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Walaa fuu ko mbaawanɗaa kam, se hanaa ko fodaa ɗum. Sabu gattuɗo kam nder junngo maa oon, ɓuri ma waɗude hakke.
43019012	Illa wakkati oo, Pilaatus no tefa yoofude mo. Amma Yahudankooɓe no kuuɓa, no mbi'a : —Se nii a yoofii mo, a hanaa giɗo laamiiɗo Rooma mawɗo. Sabu aduɗo hoore mum laamiiɗo fuu, no ganyo laamiiɗo Rooma mawɗo.
43019013	Illa wakkati Pilaatus nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, o wurtini Iisa, o jooɗii dow jooɗorgal kiitotooɗo nder nokkuure wi'eteene « Hayre seɓaane », nokkuure inndirteene « Gabbata » nder ibrankoore.
43019014	Nyalaane fadde Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe waɗa, har caka nyalooma, Pilaatus wi'i Yahudankooɓe : —Laamiiɗo mooɗon nii !
43019015	Ɓe kuuɓi ɓe mbi'i : —Waru mo ! Waru mo ! Tontu mo dow bardugal ! Pilaatus jaabii wi'i : —Mi tonta laamiiɗo mooɗon naa ? Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla mbi'i : —Min ngalaa laamiiɗo se hanaa laamiiɗo Rooma mawɗo !
43019016	Nden o watti Iisa nder juuɗe maɓɓe ngam tontowee dow leggal bardugal. Soogeeji nanngi Iisa.
43019017	Iisa wurtii no ronndii leggal mum bardugal. Ɓe paadi mo gaɗa wuro toon to wi'etee nder ibrankoore Golgota naa mbi'en Laalagal hoore.
43019018	Toon ɓe tontidi mo himɓe ɗiɗo gom : Oo no nano, ooto no nyaamo Iisa.
43019019	Pilaatus waɗi ɗum winndaa dow alluwal : « Iisa mo Nasaratu, Laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe », o tilsini ngal takkee dow leggal bardugal ngaal.
43019020	Ɗuɓɓe nder Yahudankooɓe njanngi binndi ndii sabu to Iisa tontaa toon woɗɗaa wuro ngoon. Alluwal ngaal winndaama nder ibrankoore, romankoore e gerekankoore.
43019021	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla mbi'i Pilaatus : —Taa winndu « O laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe », amma winndu : « Kanko wi'i o laamiiɗo Yahudankooɓe. »
43019022	Pilaatus jaabii ɓe wi'i : —Ko mbinndumi ɗum, winndake.
43019023	Nde soogeeji ɗiin kantunoo tontude Iisa, ɗi cenndi kolte makko cenndanɗe nay, neɗɗo fuu hooƴi mbaka mum. Ɓe adi jabbaare makko ngaɗiraane lefol gootol, jabbaare ndee walaa nyoogol illa dow faa ley.
43019024	Soogeeji ɗiin kaaldi, potti, mbi'i : —To en cerku nde. En piya nde caaca, ƴeewen nyaamoowo nde. Ɓe ngaɗi non ngam humnude ko sappanoo nder dewte mbi'u ɗum : Ɓe cenndii kolte am hakkune maɓɓe, ɓe piyi jabbaare am caaca. Nii soogeeji ɗiin ngaɗi.
43019025	Inna Iisa e minyum debbo, Mariyaama dee-Kolopas e Mariyaama mo Magdaala no ndarii hadde leggal, ngal Iisa tontaa dow mum ngaal.
43019026	Iisa hi'i innum e aahiijo mo o hiɗi oon no ndardii. O wi'i inniiko : —Inna, ɓiya nii !
43019027	Gaɗa mum, o wi'i aahiijo oon : —Inna maa nii. Illa nyannde mum, aahiijo oo yaari Mariyaama wuro mum.
43019028	Gaɗa ko Iisa anndii walaa fuu ko hoddi, ngam ko wari nder dewte ɗum tabbita, o wi'i : —Mi ɗomɗii.
43019029	Loone heewne ndiyam lammuɗam no wonnoo toon. Sey ɓe cuuwi tekkere nder ndiyam lammuɗam ɗam, ɓe kaɓɓi e loocol isop, ɓe ngaddi nde hadde hunnduko Iisa.
43019030	Wakkati Iisa siiɓinoo ndiyam lammuɗam ɗaam, wi'i : —Ɗum hanti ! O turni hoore, o foofi foofaango makko sakitiingo.
43019031	Tawi nyalaane siri juulɗe non. Yahudankooɓe ngiɗaa ɓalli tontaaɓe ɓeen tawee dow leɗɗe ɗeen nder nyalaane fowteteene, sabu nyalaane ndee no teddi sanne. Ɗum waɗi, ɓe ƴamii Pilaatus koyɗe tontaaɓe ɓeen kelee, ɓe kooƴee.
43019032	Soogeeji ɗiin ngari, keli koyɗe worɓe ɗiɗo tontidaaɓe he Iisa ɓeen.
43019033	Amma wakkati ɓe njottinoo to Iisa, ɓe tawi o maayi, ngam majjum waɗi, ɓe kelaay koyɗe makko.
43019034	Amma gooto nder soogeeji ɗiin yuwi Iisa nder wuttudu. Wakkati mum da ƴiiƴam e ndiyam ili.
43019035	Ceediiɗo kujje ɗee hi'i ɗe, seedanake goonga. O haalii goonga ngam onon duu ngoonɗinon.
43019036	Ɗum fuu waɗii ngam ko sappaa nder dewte ɗee huuɓa : Baa gi'al makko gootal helataake.
43019037	Aayaare gom duu wi'i : Ɓe ndaaran mo ɓe njuwi oon.
43019038	Gaɗa mum, Yusufu mo Arimatiya, kam duu no aahiijo Iisa nder cuccukka ngam omo hulanno Yahudankooɓe, o ƴamii Pilaatus hokka mo ɓanndu Iisa. Pilaatus jaɓii, Yusufu wari hooƴi ndu.
43019039	Nikodemu, artunooɗo yahde to Iisa nder jemma, kam duu wari waddi ɗakke uurɗe kawrodiraaɗe he leɗɗe uurɗe, ko waɗata kilooji woronja.
43019040	Ɓe kooƴi ɓanndu Iisa, ɓe piili ndu leppi, cuuwaaɗi nder uurdi hano no Yahudankooɓe mboowi waɗude nde no mooɓa maayɗo nii.
43019041	No woodunoo koogol takkol to Iisa tontanoo toon. Nder maggol no woodi annyeere heyre nde baa gooto mooɓaaka nder mum.
43019042	Ngam annyeere ndeen ɓuri ɓadaade e ngam nyalaane fowteteene no hiɗi naatude, sey ɓe ngatti ɓanndu Iisa toon.
43020001	Alal Mariyaama mo Magdaala hejji illa nder nimre, yehi tuumtowii annyeere Iisa. O tawi kaaƴa ommbiranoonga annyeere ndeen tallitaama.
43020002	Sey o doggi, o yehi to Simon Piyer e aahiijo mo Iisa hiɗi oon, o wi'i ɓe : —Ɓe itti ɓanndu Iisa nder annyeere ndeen, min anndaa duu to ɓe ngatti ndu.
43020003	Piyer e aahiijo gom mburtii pa'i to annyeere ndeen.
43020004	Ɓe fuu ɗiɗo iɓe ndogga. Aahiijo ooto daɗi Piyer, artii mo yottaade to annyeere ndeen.
43020005	O turii o yuurni, o hi'i leppi ɗiin no dekodiri, amma o naataay.
43020006	Simon Piyer yottii, naati, tawi leppi ɗiin no njoowii.
43020007	Lefol piilanoongol e hoore makko ngool wondaa he leppi ɗiin. Ngol tawaama ingol taggii feere maggol.
43020008	Nden aahiijo artuɗo warde oon, kam duu naati, hi'i ɗum, goonɗini.
43020009	Tawi faa hannden ɓe paamaay ko sappanoo nder dewte mbi'u ɗum Iisa no haani ummitaade.
43020010	Gaɗa mum aahiiɓe ɓeen kooti.
43020011	Mariyaama hootaay no darii yaasin, no huybiti har annyeere ndeen, no woya. O turii, omo yuurnoo ley annyeere ndeen.
43020012	Sey o hi'i maleykaaɓe ɗiɗo ɓorniiɓe kolte daneeje no njooɗii to Iisa fukkinanoo : Gooto har hoore, ooto har koyɗe.
43020013	Maleykaaɓe ɓeen ƴami mo mbi'i : —Debbo, ɗume mboyataa ? O jaabii ɓe o wi'i : —Ɓe adi Joomam, mi anndaa to o yaaraa.
43020014	Wakkati o hantunoo haala kaa, o yeeƴitii, sey o hi'i Iisa no darii, amma o annditaay mo.
43020015	Iisa wi'i mo : —Banndam debbo, ɗume mboyataa ? Moy tefataa ? Amma Mariyaama miili ko gonɗo no haalda he mum oon woni golloowo nder koogol ngool, nden o wi'i mo : —Gorko mawɗo, se aan hooƴi mo, haalanan to njaaruɗaa mo, faa mi hooƴowa mo.
43020016	Iisa wi'i mo : —Mariyaama ! Mariyaama waylitii, daari mo, wi'i nder ibrankoore : — Rabbuni kam woni « Moodibbo ».
43020017	Iisa wi'i mo : —Taa jogam, sabu mi ƴeenyaay to Baaba am ginan. Yah to banndiraaɓe am, mbi'aa ɓe : « Mi yahan to Baaba am, Baabiraawo mon, Alla am, Alla mon. »
43020018	Mariyaama mo Magdaala yehi to aahiiɓe ɓeen, wi'i : —Mi hi'i Joomiraawo. Nden, o haalani ɓe ko Iisa wi'i mo fuu.
43020019	Alal laasara peewɗo, aahiiɓe Iisa fuu kawri nder suudu, maɓɓi dammbule ɗeen sabu kulal mawɓe Yahudankooɓe, sey Iisa wanngi hakkune maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe : —Jam wonda he mooɗon !
43020020	Gaɗa haala kaa, o holli ɓe juuɗe makko e wuttudu makko. Aahiiɓe ɓeen nanii belɗum nde ngi'unoo mo.
43020021	Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe kaden : —Jam wonda he mooɗon. Hano no Baabiraawo liliri kam non, liliranmi on.
43020022	Wakkati o hantunoo haalaaji ɗii, o fuufi dow maɓɓe, o wi'i : —Njaɓee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
43020023	Mo njaafiɗon fuu, yaafaama, mo on njaafaaki duu, yaafataake.
43020024	Tomas bi'eteeɗo Funeejo, gooto nder lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, walaano ɗoon wakkati Iisa wanngunoo.
43020025	Sey aahiiɓe ɓeen mbi'i mo : —Min ngi'ii Joomiraawo ! O jaabii ɓe o wi'i : —Se mi hi'aay tontanɗe ɗeen he juuɗe makko, mi watta honndu am nder majje, mi loowa junngo am nder wuttudu makko, mi goonɗintaa sam.
43020026	Jeɗɗiire gaɗa mum, aahiiɓe ɓeen kawri kaden nder suudu, indu maɓɓii, Tomas no wondi he maɓɓe. Dammbule ɗeen fuu no maɓɓii, sey Iisa wanngi hakkune maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe : —Jam wonda he mooɗon !
43020027	O wi'i Tomas : —Wattu honndu maa ɗo, ƴeewu juuɗe am. Loowu junngo maa nder wuttudu am. Accu sikka, goonɗin tan.
43020028	Tomas jaabii mo wi'i : —Joomam, Alla am.
43020029	Iisa wi'i mo : —Ngam a hi'i kam, a goonɗinii. Too, ɓe ngi'aay kam se ngoonɗinii kam, kamɓe ngoni welɓe hoore.
43020030	Iisa waɗi kujje kaayɗiniiɗe ɗuɗɗe yeeso aahiiɓe mum ɗe mbinndaaka nder dewtere ndee.
43020031	Amma dewtere ndee winndaama ngam ngoonɗinon ko Iisa woni Almasiihu Ɓii-Alla, ngam se on ngoonɗinii ɗum, keɓon mbuurnam daliila makko.
43021001	Gaɗa bannganol Tomas ngool Iisa wannganii aahiiɓe mum hadde peta Tiberiya. Ndaa no o wanngiri nii :
43021002	Simon Piyer, Tomas bi'eteeɗo Funeejo, Natanayel mo wuro Kaana nder leydi Galili, ɓiɓɓe Jebede worɓe e aahiiɓe ɗiɗo gom, no tawaa toon.
43021003	Sey Simon Piyer wi'i ɓe : —Mi nanngowan liƴƴi. Ɓe mbi'i : —Minen duu, min njahdan he maa. Ɓe njehi, ɓe naatowi laana. Jemma oon, ɓe keɓaay baafuy.
43021004	Wakkati pooyngol umminoo, Iisa wari darii fonngo maayo ngoon, amma aahiiɓe ɓeen anndaay hala kanko non.
43021005	Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Sukaaɓe, on keɓii liƴƴi ? Ɓe njaabii mo ɓe mbi'i : —Min keɓaay !
43021006	Nden o wi'i ɓe : —Paɗɗee taaruwol ngool nyaamo laana kaan, on keɓan. Ko ɓe paɗɗi ngol, ɓe keɓi liƴƴi ɗuɗɗi faa ɓe keppi naatinde ngol nder laana kaan.
43021007	Aahiijo mo Iisa hiɗi oon wi'i Simon Piyer : —Joomiraawo non ! Nde Simon Piyer nanunoo Joomiraawo non, o hooƴi jabbaare makko, o ɓornii sabu o ɓoortakeno, o fitti, o jikki nder ndiyam ɗaam.
43021008	Amma aahiiɓe ɓeeto ngardi he laana kaan, iɓe ndaasa taaruwol keewngol liƴƴi ngool. Ɓe mboɗɗaaki fonngo ngoon ko waɗata kuule hemre.
43021009	Wakkati ɓe ƴeenyunoo fonngo ngoon, ɓe ngi'ii pette, liƴƴi no ndekii dow mum. Ɓe ngi'ii buuru duu no resii.
43021010	Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Ngaddee seɗɗa nder liƴƴi ɗi nannguɗon ɗiin.
43021011	Simon Piyer naati laana kaan, fooɗi taaruwol keewngol liƴƴi mawɗi ngool. Liƴƴi hemre e woygu e tati ngol ƴeenyini. No ɗi keewiri nii fuu, taaruwol ngool serkaay.
43021012	Iisa wi'i ɓe : —Ngaree, pummee ! Nden ɓe annditi mo amma baa gooto nder aahiiɓe ɓeen suusaay ƴamude mo wi'aa : « Aan woni moy ? »
43021013	Nden Iisa ɓadii, o hooƴi buuru o hokki ɓe. O hokki ɓe liƴƴi ɗiin duu.
43021014	Ɗum woni tataɓere nde Iisa wanngani aahiiɓe mum gaɗa ummitaaki mum.
43021015	Gaɗa pummaari, Iisa wi'i Simon Piyer : —Simon ɓii-Yahaaya, aɗa ɓuri ɓe hidde kam naa ? Piyer jaabii mo wi'i : —Ayyo ! Joomam, aɗa anndi miɗo hiɗi ma. Nden Iisa wi'i mo : —Duru ɓiɓɓe baali am !
43021016	Iisa wi'i mo kaden : —Simon, ɓii-Yahaaya, aɗa hiɗi kam naa ? O jaabii mo o wi'i : Ayyo ! Joomam, aɗa anndi miɗo hiɗi ma ! Nden Iisa wi'i mo : —Duru baali am !
43021017	Iisa wi'i mo kaden : —Simon, ɓii-Yahaaya, aɗa hiɗi kam naa ? Sey ɓerne Piyer metti, sabu o wi'i mo nde tati : « Aɗa hiɗi kam naa ? » Piyer wi'i mo : —Joomiraawo, aɗa faamani huune fuu, aɗa anndi duu miɗo hiɗi ma. Iisa wi'i mo : —Duru baali am.
43021018	Mi haalante goonga, nder njokollaaku maa, a haɓɓanan hoore maa duhol, njahaa to welii ma. Amma nde a naywi, a ɓantan juuɗe maa, kaɓɓaneɗaa duhol maa njaareɗaa to welaa ma.
43021019	Iisa wi'i haalaaji ɗii ngam hollude no Piyer maayirta, e no o teddinirta Alla. Gaɗa ɗum, o wi'i Piyer : —Tokkam.
43021020	Piyer yeeƴitii, hi'i aahiijo mo Iisa hiɗi oon no tokki ɓe. Aahiijo oo woni gonnooɗo no wahi hadde Iisa wakkati ɓe kiirtotonoo. Kanko ɓagginoo ƴami Iisa, wi'i : « Moy woni jammbotooɗo ma ? »
43021021	Wakkati Piyer hi'unoo mo, wi'i Iisa : —Joomam, oo nee ɗume o laatoto ?
43021022	Iisa jaabii mo wi'i : —Se mi hiɗii o wuura faa mi warta, ko hilli ma ? Aan kay, tokkam tan !
43021023	Haala kaan sankitii hakkune goonɗinɓe Iisa fuu ko aahiijo oo maayataa, amma Iisa wi'aay o maayataa. O wi'aana tan : « Se mi hiɗii o wuura faa mi warta, ko hilli ma ? »
43021024	Aahiijo oo woni aahiijo ceedaniiɗo kujje ɗee ko winndi ɗee, eɗen anndi duu ko seede makko no goonga.
43021025	Iisa waɗi kujje ɗuɗɗe gom duu laatiiɗe se mbinndanooma gootel, gootel, miɗo miila duuniyaaru nduu waawaa hooƴude dewte majje.
44001001	Banndam Tawfilus, nder dewtere am arandeere, mi winndanii ma dow ko Iisa fuɗɗiri e ko o waajii illa arannde
44001002	faa wara nyalaane nde o ƴeencinaa. Fadde makko ƴeencineede, nder baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo o fooɗi hakkillo lilaaɓe makko ɓe o suɓinoo, o tinndini ɓe.
44001003	Gaɗa torraaji makko, he maayde makko, nder alamaaji ɗuɗɗi tabbintinooji ummitaaki makko o wanngani ɓe, omo wuuri. Omo haalda he maɓɓe dow Laamu Alla duu. O waɗi ɗum, ɗum fuu, nder balɗe lasooji ɗiɗi.
44001004	Nyannde gom wakkati o nyaamidanoo he maɓɓe o fooɗi hakkillo maɓɓe o wi'i ɓe : —To ndillee nder Ursaliima, amma njooɗee keɗoɗon alkawal ƴuwanngal to Baaba am ngal kaalanannoomi on,
44001005	mbi'umi : « Yahaaya, ndiyam waɗiranannoo himɓe batisma, amma onon nder balɗe seɗɗa, batisma mooɗon, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo waɗirtee. »
44001006	Nden lilaaɓe ɓeen kawri, ƴami mo, mbi'i : —Joomiraawo, jooni ngartirta laamu Isra'el naa ?
44001007	Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i : —On ngalaa baawɗe anndude hitaane naa wakkati mo Alla Baabiraawo darni nder baawɗe hoore mum.
44001008	Amma wakkati Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippoto dow mooɗon, on keɓan baawɗe. On laatoto seedantooɓe kam nder Ursaliima, nder leydi Yahudiya, nder leydi Samariya fuu, happa ɗon faa hulna duuniyaaru fuu.
44001009	Wakkati o hantunoo haalaaji ɗii, ɓe fuu iɓe ndaara mo faa o ƴencinaa. Luuldere gom wari senndi mo he gite maɓɓe.
44001010	Wakkati ɓe tiggitinoo, iɓe ndaara omo ƴeencinee ndeen, worɓe ɗiɗo gom ɓorniiɓe kolte daneeje mbanngi he maɓɓe,
44001011	mbi'i ɓe : —Hey, onon ɓiɓɓe Galili, ɗume waɗi ko oɗon nii oɗon tiggitii dow ? Iisa gooto dilluɗo hakkune mooɗon oon, ƴeencinaaɗo oo, wartan. O wartitan hano no ngi'irɗon mo, wakkati o ƴeencintenoo.
44001012	Nden lilaaɓe ɓeen njippi waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun ngarti nder Ursaliima. Waamnde ndeen yahde Ursaliima ɓuraay kilo go'o.
44001013	Wakkati ɓe ngartunoo nder huɓeere ndeen, ɓe ƴeenyi ɓe naatowi nder suudu dowuuru to ɓe mbowunoo weerde. Piyer, Yahaaya, Yakuuba, Andiire, Filipa, Tomas, Bartolome, Matta, Yakuuba ɓii-Alfee, Simon kiranoowo suudu baaba, e Yahuuda ɓii-Yakuuba no tawa nder maɓɓe.
44001014	Ɓe fuu ɓe poti ɓe ngaɗi daane worre, kamɓe he inna Iisa, minyiraaɓe Iisa he rewɓe gom, ɓe tinni iɓe ndu'oo.
44001015	Nder balɗe mum hawriine gom waɗi. Goonɗinɓe waɗooɓe hano himɓe hemre he laso kawri. Piyer ummii, darii hakkune maɓɓe wi'i :
44001016	—Banndiraaɓe, no tilsi ko Ruuhu Ceniiɗo haalunoo nder Dewtere Alla Seniine har hunnduko Daawda ɗum tabbita. Dow Yahuuda Ruuhu Ceniiɗo haali, wakkati o wi'unoo : « Omo limenoo nder meeɗen, o heɓi mbaka makko nder gollal ngal ngolleten ». Yahuuda kam ardi nannguɓe Iisa. (
44001018	Ceede ɗe o yoɓaa ngam gollal makko nyiddungal ngaal, o soodiri ngesa. Toon o saamiri hoore hoore, reedu makko fusi, teketti makko ndufi, o maayi.
44001019	Habaru oo sankitii nder Ursaliima fuu, ngesa ngaan inndiraa Akeldama nder ɗemngal maɓɓe, kam woni « Ngesa nga Ƴiiƴam ».)
44001020	Ngam ɗum winndaa nder dewtere Jabuura wi'aa : Wuro makko laatoo winnde, to neɗɗo fuu hoɗu toon. No winndaa kaden : Neɗɗo gom naata nokku makko.
44001021	Ndenne, no tilsi goɗɗo suɓee ngam seedaade dow ummitaaki Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Neɗɗo oo duu no haani laatoo neɗɗo gondunooɗo he meeɗen illa wakkati mo Yahaaya waɗani Iisa batisma faa warde nyalaane nde Iisa ƴeencinaa.
44001023	Sey goonɗinɓe ɓeen ndarni haala dow himɓe ɗiɗo : Yusufu Barsabas inndirteeɗo Yustus, he Mattiyas.
44001024	Ɓe ndu'i, ɓe piirti hunnduko, ɓe mbi'i : —Joomiraawo, aan annduɗo ɓerne neɗɗo fuu, hollu min, moy cuɓiɗaa nder himɓe ɗiɗo ɓee,
44001025	ngam ada gollal lilaaku ngal Yahuuda acci, yehi nanngowi golle ɗe o haani.
44001026	Ɓe cuɓi, cuɓaaki kiin saami dow Mattiyas. Nden o ɓeydaa he lilaaɓe sappo e go'o ɓeen.
44002001	Wakkati Juulɗe kettol alkamaari bi'eteeɗe Pentakota njottinoo, goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu kawri nokkuure worre.
44002002	Sey olko gom ƴuwi dow, nanndungo olko henndu mawnu, wari heewni suudu ndu ɓe kawri nder mum nduun.
44002003	Nden goɗɗum nannduɗum he ɗemle hiite wanngi, sankitii, jippowi dow neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu.
44002004	Ɓe fuu ɓe keewi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, ɓe puɗɗi iɓe kaala nder ɗemle feere-fereeje hano no Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hokkiri ɓe baawɗe haalirde.
44002005	Nder huɓeere Ursaliima no woodunoo Yahudankooɓe hulooɓe Alla gom, ƴuwɓe nder sera-seraaji duuniyaaru fuu.
44002006	Wakkati ɓe nanunoo olko ngoon, ɓe mbemmbaa, ɓe ndoggi, ɓe pa'i to lilaaɓe ɓeen. Neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu no nana goonɗinɓe ɓeen no kaala nder ɗemngal mum.
44002007	Huune ndee haayɗini ɓe, ɗum naati ɓalli maɓɓe sanne, sey ɓe tokki, iɓe ƴamodira iɓe mbi'a : —Himɓe ɓee, ɓe kanaa ɓiɓɓe Galili naa ?
44002008	Noy waɗi ko neɗɗo meeɗen fuu no nana ko ɓe kaalata nder ɗemngal mum ?
44002009	Nder meeɗen no tawa Partiyankooɓe, Mediyankooɓe, Elamiyankooɓe, no woodi jooɗiiɓe Mesopotamiya, Yahudiya, Kapadokiya, Pontus he Asiya,
44002010	Firigiya, Pamfiliya, Misira, leyɗe Libiya hedde har Sirene. Gere meeɗen ƴuwi nder leydi Rooma,
44002011	woɓɓe ƴuwi duune Kereta, woɓɓe duu ƴuwi leydi Arabiya. Woɓɓe nder meeɗen no Yahudankooɓe, woɓɓe duu no tuubuɓe njaɓi diina Yahudankooɓe. Enen wonɓe ɗo, eɗen nana ko ɓe kaalata nder ɗemle meeɗen dow kaayɗe ɗe Alla waɗi.
44002012	Ɗum haayɗini ɓe, ɗum hooƴi hakkillooji maɓɓe sanne, faa iɓe ƴamodira, iɓe mbi'a : —Ɗume woni maana ɗum naa ɗum to ?
44002013	Amma woɓɓe nder maɓɓe duu no njala goonɗinɓe ɓeen, no mbi'odira : —Cabiijam ɓe njari faa ɗam soptini hakkillooji maɓɓe.
44002014	Piyer ummii, ndarii, kanko he lilaaɓe sappo e go'o ɓeen, o ɓanti daane makko o wi'i : —Onon Yahudankooɓe he tawaaɓe nder Ursaliima, kettinee ! Korkitee noppi mooɗon heɓa paamon ko won no waɗa.
44002015	Himɓe ɓee, ko'e maɓɓe coptaaki hano no miilirɗon ngam jamɗe jeenay subaka ngonɗen joonin !
44002016	Amma ɗum waɗi ngam tabbintinande en ko annabi Yo'el haalunoo nder annabaaku mum. Nder maggu Alla wi'i :
44002017	Nder jamaanu cakitittooɗo, mi jippinan Ruuhu am dow ɓii-aadama fuu. Ɓiɓɓe mooɗon worɓe he rewɓe no ngaɗan annabaaku. Sukaaɓe mooɗon jokolɓe no kolletee ko waɗata. Nayeeɓe mooɗon duu no koyɗan koyɗi ƴuwɗi to am.
44002018	Nder balɗe mum mi jippinan Ruuhu am dow gollooɓe am worɓe he rewɓe. Ɓe ngaɗan annabaaku.
44002019	Mi waɗan kujje kaayɗiniiɗe dow kammu, he alamaaji duu dow leydi. Ƴiiƴam, hiite he cuurki ɓaleehi mbanngan.
44002020	Fadde nyalaane mawne, nyalaane teddude, nyalaane Joomiraawo ndee warde, naange no niɓɓan, lewru duu wojja hano ƴiiƴam.
44002021	Wakkati mum neɗɗo fuu noddi innde Joomiraawo, joomum no heɓan kisinam.
44002022	—Onon Isra'ilankooɓe, kettinee, Iisa mo Nasaratu woni mo Alla suɓii, hokki baawɗe waɗude kujje kaayɗiniiɗe, he alamaaji ɗuɗɗi hakkune mooɗon. Onon e ko'e mooɗon, oɗon anndi ko waɗi.
44002023	Gorko oo, nanngaaɗo, wattaa nder juuɗe bonɗe, tontaaɗo dow leggal bardugal hano no Alla waadori ɗum nder muuyɗe mum.
44002024	Alla ummintinii mo, soptini mo he baawɗe maayde ngam maayde waawaa faddaade mo.
44002025	Se goonga Daawda winndinoo dow makko wi'i : Wakkati fuu miɗo hi'a Joomiraawo yeeso am, mi diwnirtaa kulkulal ngam omo nyaamo am.
44002026	Ngam majjum ɓerne am no nder welwelo, hunnduko am no mana mo. Ɓanndu am duu no jooɗoto nder gokka,
44002027	ngam Joomiraawo, a accataa yonki am nder annyeere. A accataa Ceniiɗo maa nyola.
44002028	A hollii kam laabi jaarooji to mbuurnam. Wondude he maaɗa no heewnira kam welwelo.
44002029	—Banndiraaɓe, ko kaalananmi on ɗum dow maamii'en Daawda, se goonga, o maayi, o ufaama, annyeere makko no ɗon faa warde hannden.
44002030	Ngam Alla waɗi mo annabiijo, omo anndi duu ko Alla hunake, waɗanii mo amaana, wi'i ko kam no dekan gooto nder jippotooɓe he makko dow jooɗorgal laamu.
44002031	Daawda hi'i ummitaaki Iisa Almasiihu, o haali dow makki o wi'i : Yonki makko accaaka nder annyeere, ɓanndu makko nyolaay.
44002032	En fuu eɗen ceedi ko Alla ummintinii Iisa mo ngonmi miɗo haala dow mum oon.
44002033	Alla teddini Iisa, joonnii mo nyaamo mum, hokki mo Ruuhu mum Ceniiɗo mo alkawal mum ngaɗanaɗen oon. Iisa duu jippini mo dow amin hano no ngonɗon oɗon ngi'ira ɗum, oɗon nana ɗum hannden.
44002034	Daawda ƴeencinaaka amma o wi'i kanko he hoore makko : Alla Joomiraawo wi'i Joomiraawo am : War, njooɗaa nyaamo am,
44002035	faa mi sorna wayɓe maa ley teppere maa.
44002036	—Ndenne Isra'ilankooɓe fuu, no kaani paama ko sikka fuu walaa Iisa mo tontuɗon oo, kanko Alla waɗi Joomiraawo, o waɗi mo duu Almasiihu.
44002037	Wakkati ɓe nanunoo haalaaji ɗii fuu, ɗum suuli ɓerɗe maɓɓe sanne, nden ɓe mbi'i Piyer he lilaaɓe ɓeeto : —Banndiraaɓe ɗume min ngaɗata ?
44002038	Piyer jaabii ɓe wi'i : —Tuubee, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu waɗanee batisma dow innde Iisa Almasiihu, ngam hakkeeji mooɗon njaafee, nden Alla jippina Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, kokkal mum dow mooɗon.
44002039	Alla waɗi alkawal oo ngam mooɗon, ngam ɓiɓɓe mooɗon, he himɓe wonɓe to woɗɗi. O waɗaama duu ngam neɗɗo fuu mo Alla Joomiraawo meeɗen noddi.
44002040	Piyer haalanii ɓe haalaaji ɗuɗɗi ngam ɓe paama, ɓe cemmbiɗaa. O wi'i ɓe ndogga, ɓe ndaɗa jamaanu bonɗo oo.
44002041	Jaɓuɓe haala makko fuu ngaɗanaama batisma. Nyannde mum, himɓe waɗooɓe hano himɓe ujunaaji tato ngari ɓeydi he hawriine goonɗinɓe ndeen.
44002042	Iɓe kettinoo waaju lilaaɓe ɓeen nde hennon fuu, iɓe nanngodira nder hawriine maɓɓe, iɓe cennda buuru, iɓe ngaɗida du'aa'u.
44002043	Ngam sabbu kaayɗe ɗuɗɗe ɗe lilaaɓe ɓeen ngoni no ngaɗa nder baawɗe Alla, kulal Alla nanngi neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu.
44002044	Goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu kawri laatii inna gooto baaba gooto. Neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu no hokkara banndum he ko woodi.
44002045	Ɓe conni ko ɓe ngoodi fuu, ɓe cenndi ceede ɗeen caka maɓɓe, neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu heɓi keddi ko heƴata ɗum.
44002046	Wakkati fuu iɓe ngara, iɓe kawra nder Juuliirde Alla mawne. Iɓe cennda buuru nder cuuɗi maɓɓe, iɓe nyaamda nder welwelo he ɓerne worre.
44002047	Iɓe njetta Alla, iɓe mbeegina himɓe. Nyannde fuu Joomiraawo no ɓeyda himɓe nder hawriine maɓɓe.
44003001	Nyalooma gom har yamnde tati, Piyer he Yahaaya no njahda Juulirde Alla mawne ngam du'aade.
44003002	Hadde dammbugal mayre, dammbugal inndirteengal dammbugal Wodde, gorko gom bonnguɗo illa dimeeki mum no tawee ɗon wakkati fuu. Nyannde fuu omo waddee, omo jonnee yeeso maggal, ngam o garbina he naatooɓe ɓeen.
44003003	Wakkati bonnguujo oon hi'unoo Piyer he Yahaaya no naata, o eeli ɓe, ɓe cakkana mo.
44003004	Piyer he Yahaaya tiimi mo, nden Piyer wi'i mo : —Ndaaru min !
44003005	O daari ɓe faa wooɗi ngam omo miila ko o heɓan goɗɗum he maɓɓe.
44003006	Sey Piyer wi'i mo : —Mi walaa kaŋŋe, mi walaa cardi, amma mi hokkete ko ngoodumi. Dow innde Iisa Almasiihu mo Nasaratu, umma, dillu.
44003007	Nden Piyer nanngi junngo makko nyaamo, faa ummina mo. Wakkati mum da koyɗe makko cemmbiɗi.
44003008	O garbisi, o darii, o fuɗɗi omo dilla. O tokki ɓe o naati Juulirde ndeen, omo dilla, omo fitta, omo yetta Alla.
44003009	Himɓe fuu ngi'ii omo dilla, omo yetta Alla.
44003010	Ɓe annditii ko kanko woni garbinoowo yeeso dammbugal Wodde ngaal, ɗum haayɗini ɓe sanne, ɗum haɓɓi ko'e maɓɓe duu.
44003011	Bonnguujo oon woɗɗaaki Piyer e Yahaaya. Ɗum haayɗini himɓe fuu, ɓe ndoggi, ɓe ngari, ɓe kawri to maɓɓe ley danki Suleymaanu, hadde batamaare Juulirde mawne.
44003012	Wakkati Piyer hi'unoo ɗum, o wi'i jama'aare ndeen : —Isra'ilankooɓe, ɗume waɗi ko yamɗintinol ngool no haayɗina on ? Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon ƴeewa min, hano har semmbe amin naa har tokkol amin Alla he ɓerne worre waɗi gorko oo no dillira koyɗe mum ?
44003013	Alla Ibrahim, Alla Isiyaaku e Alla Yakuuba, Alla maamiraaɓe meeɗen, teddinii Iisa Golloowo mum. Amma onon, on ngattii mo nder juuɗe hooreeɓe leydi, on calake mo yeeso Pilaatus, baa ko o muuyi yoofude mo.
44003014	On calake Ceniiɗo Dartiiɗo, dey ƴamuɗon njoofaneɗon ittoowo yonki nokku makko.
44003015	On mbari Wuddu Mbuurnam, amma Alla ummintini mo. Miɗen ceedii ɗum.
44003016	Baawɗe innde Iisa he goonɗinol mum yamɗintini neɗɗo oo mo ngi'uɗon, mo annduɗon no wuurirnoo. Goonɗinde Iisa hokki mo jam ɓanndu hano no ngi'irton mo nii.
44003017	Too banndiraaɓe, miɗo anndi ko nder rafi anndal ngaɗuɗon golle ɗee, onon he ardiiɓe mooɗon fuu.
44003018	Amma Alla humni haala ka o wi'unoo har kunndule annabiiɓe makko dow Iisa, wakkati ɓe mbi'unoo ko Almasiihu no torretee.
44003019	Ndenne tuubee, ngartee he Alla ngam hakkeeji mooɗon moytee.
44003020	Joomiraawo hokka on wakkatiiji powtiri, o lilda on Iisa, Almasiihu mo o fodani on.
44003021	Jooni Iisa no haani jooɗoo dow, sey nyannde Alla heyɗintini huune fuu hano no annabiiɓe makko kaaliri ɗum illa ko ɓooyi.
44003022	Ngam Muusa wi'i : Alla Joomiraawo mooɗon no suɓoto gooto nder mooɗon waɗa annabiijo. O lila mo hano no o liliroy kam. Kettinee huune fuu ko o wi'ata on.
44003023	Neɗɗo fuu mo jaɓaay ko o wi'i, no ittetee nder himɓe Alla.
44003024	Annabiiɓe fuu illa Samuwiila faa wara he waruɓe gaɗa makko fuu ngaɗi annabaaku dow nyalaaɗe ɗee.
44003025	Onon ngoni donuɓe annabaaku nguu, he amaana mo Alla watti hakkune mum he Ibrahim wakkati o wi'unoo mo : Duuniyaaru fuu no barkintee ngam sabbu jippotooɓe he maaɗa.
44003026	Onon Alla arti wannginande Golloowo mum wakkati o ummintinii mo, ngam o barkina on, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu woppa golleeji mum bonɗi.
44004001	Wakkati Piyer e Yahaaya kaaldannoo jama'aare ndeen, cakkanooɓe Alla he hooreejo doomooɓe Juulirde Alla mawne ndeen, he Sadduki'en njotti.
44004002	Ɗum metti ɓerɗe maɓɓe faa noy walaa, ngam ɓe ngi'ii Piyer he Yahaaya no mbaajoo, no njanngina himɓe, no mbi'a har Iisa, Alla no ummintina maayɓe.
44004003	Nden ɓe nanngi ɓe, ɓe uddowi faa weeta ngam jenngi sanne wakkati mum.
44004004	Amma himɓe ɗuɓɓe nder hettiniiɓe waaju oon ngoonɗinii. Iɓe ngaɗa hano himɓe ujunaaji joyo.
44004005	Jaangoore mum wooduɓe ardaŋal, mawɓe Yahudankooɓe, he jannginooɓe Tawreeta kawri nder Ursaliima.
44004006	Nder hawriine ndeen no tawa Annas mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla fuu, Kayafas, Yahaaya, Skandaaru e jippotooɓe he mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla.
44004007	Ɓe noddi Piyer e Yahaaya, ɓe ƴami ɓe, ɓe mbi'i : —Baawɗe ɗeye naa dow innde moy nyawtirɗon gorko oo ?
44004008	Nden Piyer heewi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, wi'i ɓe : —Onon wooduɓe ardaŋal he mawɓe Yahudankooɓe,
44004009	on ƴamii min hannden dow moƴƴere nde gorko oo hokkaa, he no waɗi ko o bonngiti.
44004010	Too, paamee ko gorko gonɗo yeeso mooɗon oo, bonngiti dow innde Iisa Almasiihu mo Nasaratu, mo Alla ummintinii, gaɗa ko onon tontuɗon mo dow leggal bardugal.
44004011	Iisa woni Hayre nde onon nyiɓooɓe mboppi, kayre duu laatii hoore nyibdi ndiin.
44004012	To Iisa tan kisinam ƴuwata. Ngam hakkune ɓiɓɓe aadama, innde fuu walaa nde Alla hokki nde kaanirɗen hisinireede, nde hanaa innde makko.
44004013	Wakkati ardiiɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo cuusal Piyer e Yahaaya, ɗum haayɗini ɓe. Ɓe paamii ko Piyer e Yahaaya himɓe ladde non, ɓe njanngaay. Ɓe paamii duu ko himɓe wonduɓe he Iisa non.
44004014	Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo bonngitaaɗo oon no darii hadde maɓɓe, ɓe keppi fuu ko ɓe mbi'a kaden.
44004015	Ɓe mbi'i Piyer e Yahaaya mburtinee, nden ɓe caawodiri,
44004016	ɓe mbi'i : —Noy ngatten worɓe ɓee ? Ngam sikka fuu walaa Ursaliima fuu nani haayne nde ɓe ngaɗi, en mbaawaa yeddude duu.
44004017	Amma joonin ngam to habaru oo sankitoo hakkune himɓe, en pooɗu noppi maɓɓe, kaɗen ɓe haaldude himɓe dow innde Iisa.
44004018	Nden ɓe noddi Piyer e Yahaaya, ɓe tilsini ɗum'en ɓe mbi'i, to ɓe pilloo sam-sam, to ɓe mbaajoo neɗɗo fuu dow innde Iisa kaden.
44004019	Amma Piyer e Yahaaya njaabii ɓe mbi'i : —Too, laasibee ndaaree hakkune mooɗon he Alla, ɗume ɓuri hegaade, min tokka ko mbi'uɗon naa min tokka ko Alla wi'i ?
44004020	Ngam no tilsi he amin, min ceedo dow ko min ngi'ii e dow ko min nani.
44004021	Ardiiɓe ɓeen pooɗi noppi maɓɓe kaden, nden njoofi ɓe. Ɓe keppi fuu heɓude laawol jukkude ɓe ngam himɓe wonɓe ɗon fuu no njetta Alla ngam ko waɗi ɗum.
44004022	Bonngitaaɗo oon ɓuran duuɓi lasooji ɗiɗi.
44004023	Wakkati ɓe njoofanoo, Piyer e Yahaaya coƴƴi to banndiraaɓe mum'en. Ɓe pillanii ɓe huune fuu ko ardiiɓe ɓeen mbi'i.
44004024	Wakkati ɓe nanunoo haalaaji ɗiin, kamɓe duu, ɓe ummii he ɓerne worre ɓe ngaɗi du'aa'u, ɓe mbi'i : —Yaa Joomiraawo, aan taguɗo dow e ley, aan taguɗo maayo e huune fuu ko tawa nder mum.
44004025	Aan mo nder baawɗe mum, nder Ruuhu mum waɗi maamiimin Daawda golloowo mum, wi'i : Ɗume waɗi hakkillo leyɗe fuu ummii ? Lenyi fuu no ngaɗa haɓɓi-daane meere meere ?
44004026	Ɗume waɗi laamiiɓe duuniyaaru no ciryoo konu ? Ardiiɓe no caawodira dow Joomiraawo he Almasiihu mum.
44004027	—Tabbat sikka fuu walaa nder huɓeere ndee non, Hirudus, Pontiyus Pilaatus, lenyi gom he Isra'ilankooɓe ngaddi hunnduko wooto dow Iisa, golloowo maaɗa ceniiɗo mo cuɓiɗaa.
44004028	Ɓe kawri, ɓe kumni ko podinooɗaa nder baawɗe maaɗa he ko muuyɗaa fuu.
44004029	Yaa Joomiraawo, jooni, ƴeewu haalaaji maɓɓe bonɗi ɗii, kokkaa gollooɓe maaɗa cuusal haalude haalaaji maaɗa.
44004030	Wanngin baawɗe maaɗa, heɓa himɓe njamɗitaa, kujje kaayɗiniiɗe he alamaaji ngi'ee ngam sabbu innde Iisa, golloowo maaɗa ceniiɗo.
44004031	Wakkati ɓe kantunoo du'aa'u maɓɓe, nokkuure nde ɓe tawanoo nder mum ndeen yinngi. Ɓe fuu ɓe keewi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, ɓe ɓeydi suusude, ɓe tinni iɓe mbaajoo haala Alla.
44004032	Goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu, laatii inna gooto baaba gooto. Iɓe cennda ko ɓe ngoodi fuu, walaa fuu bi'oowo kam tan jeyii ginol ngool naa kam jeyaa ngol.
44004033	Nder baawɗe mawɗe lilaaɓe ɓeen ngoni no ceedoro dow ummitaaki Iisa Joomiraawo, Alla duu no barkina ɓe sanne.
44004034	Nder maɓɓe, walaa fuu keppuɗo goɗɗum. Gooduɗo ngesa naa suudu fuu, sonnii,
44004035	watti ceede ɗeen nder juuɗe lilaaɓe ɓeen. Ɓe cenndi, ngam neɗɗo fuu fiirta haaju mum.
44004036	Nder sonnuɓe ɓeen no tawa Lewinke gom, ƴuwɗo duune Kipurus bi'eteeɗo Yusufu mo lilaaɓe ɓeen coowirta Barnabas, kam woni cemmbinɗinoowo ɓerɗe himɓe.
44004037	O sonni ngesa makko, o watti ceede magga nder juuɗe lilaaɓe ɓeen.
44005001	Nyannde gom, gorko gom bi'eteeɗo Ananiyas e deekum Safira conni ngesa mum'en.
44005002	Sey Ananiyas saawodiri he deekiiko, nden o fecci ceede magga, o suuɗi feccere gom, o wattowi feccere ndeeto nder juuɗe lilaaɓe ɓeen.
44005003	Wakkati o waddi ceede ɗeen, sey Piyer wi'i mo : —Ananiyas ɗume waɗi accuɗaa Seyɗan naati nder ɓerne maa, penanɗaa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, peccuɗaa ceede ɗeen cuuɗuɗaa feccere majje ?
44005004	Ko a sonnaayno ngesa ngaa, aan jeynoo nga, hannden duu ko connuɗaa nga, aan jeyii ceede magga. Noy waɗi ko ngaɗɗaa ir huune ndee ? Hanaa ɓiɓɓe aadama penanɗaa amma Alla he hoore mum penanɗaa.
44005005	Wakkati Ananiyas nanunoo haala kaa, o fooɗaay koyngal ko o maayi. Kulal manngal nanngi nanuɓe haala kaan.
44005006	Jokolɓe ngari, ngatti mo nder kasanke, mooɓowi.
44005007	Janɗe tati gaɗa mum, jom suudu makko kam duu wari amma anndaayno ko waɗi.
44005008	Sey Piyer ƴami mo wi'i : —Ceede ɗe connuɗon ngesa mooɗon ɗeen tan nii naa ? Safira jaabii mo wi'i : —Ayyo, keddi majje nii non.
44005009	Nden Piyer wi'i mo : —Noy waɗi ko aan he gora kaɓɓuɗon daane, cii'iɗon Ruuhu Joomiraawo. Ndaa, ufoyɓe gora nii no ngarta, ɓe ufoyte, aan duu !
44005010	Wakkati mum da debbo oon duu fooɗaay koyngal ko maayi. Jokolɓe ɓeen naati, ɓe tawi o maayi. Ɓe adi mo, ɓe ufowi hadde goriiko.
44005011	Kulal manngal nanngi goonɗinɗo Iisa fuu tawaaɗo nder Ursaliima, he himɓe heewɓe nanunooɓe haala kaan.
44005012	Lilaaɓe ɓeen ngaɗi alamaaji he kujje keewɗe kaayɗiniiɗe hakkune himɓe. Goonɗinɓe Iisa ɓeen fuu no kawra ley danki Suleymaanu.
44005013	Neɗɗo fuu mo walaa nder hawriine maɓɓe suusaa yottaade to maɓɓe amma no teddina ɓe faa hanaa seɗɗa.
44005014	Jama'aare, worɓe e rewɓe ngoonɗini Joomiraawo. Iɓe ngara, iɓe ɓeydoo he goonɗinɓe ɓeen.
44005015	Ɗum yottii joonkay faa to dow laabi, himɓe tinni no ngadda nyawɓe mum'en. Iɓe pukkina ɓe dow leece naa dow daage ngam ɗowdi Piyer tokka dow maɓɓe wakkati o yawtata.
44005016	Himɓe tawaaɓe nder gure piiliiɗe Ursaliima no ngadda nyawɓe mum'en he ɓe ginnaaji bonɗi culnani. Ɓe fuu duu nyawti.
44005017	Wakkati mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla e Sadduki'en ngi'unoo ko lilaaɓe ɓeen ngoni no ngolla, ɓerɗe maɓɓe keewi kiram.
44005018	Sey ɓe ngaɗi lilaaɓe ɓeen nanngaa, uddaa.
44005019	Amma nder jemma mum, Maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom omti dammbugal kasu ngaal, wurtini ɓe,
44005020	nden wi'i ɓe : —Naatowee nder Juulirde Alla mawne, mbaajoɗon himɓe dow mbuurnam kesam.
44005021	Wakkati ɓe nanunoo haala kaa, illa subaka ɓe naatowi nder Juuliirde ndeen, ɓe puɗɗi waajaade himɓe. Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla he wondunooɓe he mum ɓeen, noddi mawɓe Yahudankooɓe ngam ɓe caawodira. Nden ɓe kokki doomooɓe Juulirde mawne ndeen laawol ittowa lilaaɓe ɓeen nder kasu, ngadda ɓe.
44005022	Amma wakkati ɓe njottinoo, ɓe tawaay lilaaɓe ɓeen toon. Ɓe coƴƴi ɓe kaalanowi hawriine dawrooɓe ndeen, ɓe mbi'i :
44005023	—Min tawi kasu oon no maɓɓi no wooɗiri, reenooɓe kasu ɓeen duu no ndarii nokkuuje mum'en. Amma wakkati dammbugal ngaal fiirtanoo, baa gooto maɓɓe tawaaka nder kasu oon.
44005024	Wakkati mawɗo doomooɓe Juulirde mawne ndeen he mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen nanunoo haalaaji ɗiin, ɗum haɓɓi ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe tinni iɓe ƴamodira ko ɗum rimanta ɓe.
44005025	Iɓe ɗon nii, sey goɗɗo wari, wi'i ɓe : —Ɓe udduɗon ɓeen, no nder Juulirde mawne no mbaajoo.
44005026	Nden mawɗo doomooɓe ɓeen he himɓe mum njehi ngaddowi lilaaɓe ɓeen. Amma ɓe ngaɗiraay ɗum semmbe semmbe ngam iɓe kula to himɓe paɗɗu ɓe kaaƴe.
44005027	Wakkati ɓe ngaddanoo yeeso hawriine dawrooɓe ndeen, mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla oon ƴami ɓe wi'i :
44005028	—Min kaɗi on waajaade sam dow innde gorko oo, amma on calake. Oɗon mbaajoo himɓe. Filla waaju mooɗon no nokku fuu to neɗɗo tokki nder Ursaliima. Oɗon tefa dekude gacce dufol ƴiiƴam makko dow amin.
44005029	Nden Piyer he lilaaɓe ɓeeto njaabii mo mbi'i : —Neɗɗo tokka ko Alla wi'i no ɓuri neɗɗo tokka ko himɓe mbi'i.
44005030	Alla maamiraaɓe meeɗen, ummintini Iisa mo ngaɗɗon tontaa, wara dow leggal bardugal.
44005031	Alla ƴeencini mo, joonni nyaamo mum. Alla waɗi mo laamiiɗo e kisinoowo ngam Isra'ilankooɓe keɓa laawol no tuubiri, hakkeeji mum'en duu njaafee.
44005032	Minen he Ruuhu Ceniiɗo mo Alla hokki tokkuɓe ko o wi'i fuu, min ceedake dow kujje ɗee.
44005033	Wakkati mawɓe ɓeen nanunoo haalaaji ɗiin, ɓe tikki sanne faa ɓe ngiɗiino warude ɓe.
44005034	Amma nder hawriine ndeen no tawa Fariisaajo gom bi'eteeɗo Gamaliyel, jannginoowo Tawreeta mawɗo, mo haala mum no jaɓee. Sey o ummii, o ndarii, o wi'i lilaaɓe ɓeen mburtinee wakkati seɗɗa.
44005035	Nden o fooɗi noppi dawrooɓe ɓeen, o wi'i : —Onon Isra'ilankooɓe, kakkilee faa he ko ngiɗɗon wadde himɓe ɓee.
44005036	Ko ɓooyaay da en ngi'iino neɗɗo gom bi'eteeɗo Tewdas, miiluɗo kam no goɗɗum. Himɓe waɗooɓe hano keme nayo tokkii mo. Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay kanko he hoore makko o waraama, tokkuɓe mo ɓeen duu cankitaama, walaa fuu koddiiɗo nder maɓɓe.
44005037	Gaɗa majjum, hitaane limngal waɗeteeno ndeen, en ngi'ii duu ɓii-Galili gom bi'eteeɗo Yahuuda kam duu, wari murtinii himɓe ɗuɓɓe, kanko duu o waraama, tokkuɓe mo ɓeen duu cankitaa.
44005038	Jooni, ko ngiɗumi haalande on woni mboɗɗee himɓe ɓee, accon ɓe ndilla. Ngam nde nii tawaama anniyaaji ɗii he golleeji maɓɓe ɗii fuu no ƴoƴe ɓiɓɓe aadama, fotaay junngo gom sankita ɗum, ɗum sankitanto hoore majjum.
44005039	Amma nde nii goonga e goonga to Alla ɗum ƴuwi, too on mbaawaa kabdi he maɓɓe, kakkilee to kabdee he Alla !
44005040	Hawriine ndeen jaɓi kollitooje makko, amma ɓe ngaɗi lilaaɓe ɓeen ɓoccaa, ɓe kaɗi ɓe haalude dow innde Iisa, nden ɓe njoofaa.
44005041	Lilaaɓe ɓeen mburtii no nana belɗum ngam ɓe poti torreede ngam sabbu Iisa.
44005042	Illa nyannde mum, ɓe tinni iɓe mbaajoo nder Juulirde mawne. Iɓe njaha nder cuuɗi himɓe, iɓe mbaajoo Habaru lobbo haala Iisa Almasiihu.
44006001	Nder balɗe mum aahiiɓe ɓeen no nii no ɓeydoo yahde. Sey Yahudankooɓe haalooɓe gerekankoore no mbullira Yahudankooɓe haalooɓe ibrankoore. Iɓe mbullira ɓeen, iɓe mbi'a ko ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi wonɓe nder mum'en ngalaa no keɓa mbaka mum'en nyaamdu wonndu no senndee nyannde fuu.
44006002	Nyannde gom lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen kawri goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu mbi'i ɓe : —Ɗum hegaaki min acca waaju haala Alla, min cenndana himɓe nyaamdu.
44006003	Ngam majjum waɗi banndiraaɓe, miɗen ngiɗi ndaaron hakkune mooɗon, cuɓoɗon worɓe jeɗɗo anndiraaɓe golle lobbe, heewɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo he hakkillo ngam ɓe kalfinee golle cenndol nyaamdu ɗeen.
44006004	Dey accon min, min njaara golle amin yeeso, min tittinkinoo nder du'aa'u e waaju haala Alla.
44006005	Haala kaa weli jama'aare ndeen fuu. Ɓe cuɓi Etiyen keewɗo goonɗinol e Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, Filipa, Porokorus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas he Nikolas mo Antiyokiya tuubuɗo jaɓi diina Yahudankooɓe.
44006006	Suɓaaɓe jeɗɗo ɓeen ngaddaa yeeso lilaaɓe ɓeen, ɓe njowi juuɗe dow maɓɓe, ɓe ngaɗani ɓe du'aa'u.
44006007	Haala Alla no sankitoo yahde, lilaaɓe ɓeen duu no ɓeydoo sanne nder Ursaliima, cakkanooɓe Alla ɗuɓɓe ngoonɗini Iisa.
44006008	Etiyen keewɗo moƴƴere he baawɗe Alla no waɗa kaayɗe e alamaaji mawɗi hakkune himɓe.
44006009	Amma himɓe waajordu inndirteenu waajordu rimɗinaaɓe, ngari puɗɗi yeddodirde he makko. Nder maɓɓe no tawa ƴuwɓe nder leydi Sirene, leydi Alekasandiire, Silisi e Asiya.
44006010	Amma ɓe keppi jaalaade mo ngam omo haalda he maɓɓe nder hakkillo e Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
44006011	Nden ɓe kokki himɓe ceede nder cuccukka, mbi'a ko kam'en nani omo bonna innde Muusa he innde Alla.
44006012	Ɓe uppi himɓe he mawɓe mum'en fuu, he jannginooɓe Tawreeta. Sey ɓe nanngi Etiyen, ɓe njaari yeeso hawriine dawrooɓe.
44006013	Ɓe ngaddi seedeeɓe fewreeɓe gom, no mbi'a : —Gorko oo accaay bonnude innde Juulirde Alla Seniine e Tawreeta Muusa.
44006014	Min nani omo wi'a Iisa mo Nasaratu no sankitan Juulirde ndeen, o waylitan finaa-tawaaji ɗi Muusa holli en ɗiin.
44006015	Jooɗiiɓe nder hawriine ndeen fuu no puttini gite mum'en dow Etiyen no ndaara mo, sey ɓe ngi'ii yeeso makko no nanndana ɓe hano yeeso maleykaajo.
44007001	Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla tawaaɗo nder hawriine dawrooɓe ndeen ƴami Etiyen wi'i : —Ko mbi'eɗaa ɗum no goonga naa ?
44007002	Nden Etiyen jaabii mo wi'i : —Baabiraaɓe e banndiraaɓe am, accee hakke kettinanee kam. Alla jom teddungal wanngani maamii'en Ibrahim wakkati o wonnoo nder leydi Mesopotamiya fadde makko jooɗowaade nder wuro Haran.
44007003	O wi'i mo : Wurta nder leydi maa, nder lenyol maa, njahaa nder leydi ndi kollanmaami.
44007004	—Nden Ibrahim dilli nder leydi Kaldiya, o jooɗowi nder wuro Haran. Gaɗa maayde baabiiko, o dilli toon o wari nder leydi ndi ngonɗon nder mum hannden ndii.
44007005	Alla ronnaay mo, baa kuulal naa yabbere nder mayri. Amma Alla waɗi alkawal hokkude mo leydi ndii, ndi laatoo halal-mulal makko, kanko e jippotooɓe he makko. Dey nder wakkati mum, Ibrahim walaano ɓiɗɗo baa gooto.
44007006	Alla wi'i mo kaden : Jippotooɓe he maaɗa no peran koɗowa nder leydi gom, ɓe torree duuɓi keme nay, ɓe ngaɗee maccuɓe.
44007007	Amma mi jukkan leydi torrundi ɓe, waɗi ɓe maccuɓe. Nden ɓe ngarta nder nokkuure ndee, ɓe teddina kam.
