44007008	Alla haɓɓidii Ibrahim amaana, juulnol laatii alaama kolloowo amaana oon. Ngam majjum waɗi Ibrahim juulni Isiyaaku balɗe jeɗɗi gaɗa dimeeki mum. Isiyaaku duu juulni Yakuuba, Yakuuba kam duu juulni ɓiɓɓe mum worɓe sappo e ɗiɗo, laatiiɓe maamiraaɓe meeɗen.
44007009	Maamiraaɓe meeɗen nder haasidaaku mum'en nanngi Yusufu, connani yehooɓe Misira gom, amma Alla no wondi he makko.
44007010	Alla soptini mo he torraaji makko fuu, moƴƴani mo hokki mo hakkillo yeeso Firawna, laamiiɗo Misira. Firawna ardini Yusufu, dawrana ko watta nder ɓaade mum he ko waɗetee nder Misira fuu.
44007011	Nder jamaanu ardaaki makko, rafo manngo gom waɗi nder kappa kuula leydi Misira e leydi Kanaana. Ngo torri himɓe sanne, maamiraaɓe meeɗen ngalaa fuu ko nyaamata.
44007012	Wakkati Yakuuba nanunoo ko Misira no woodi nyaamdu, lili ɓiɓɓe mum. Maamiraaɓe meeɗen coodowa nyaamdu. Ɓe njehi, ɓe ngarti.
44007013	Nder coƴƴitaaki maɓɓe ɗiɗaɓi, Yusufu wannginani ɓe hoore mum. Nii waɗi ko Firawna duu anndi lenyol Yusufu.
44007014	Nden Yusufu lilani bammum Yakuuba he koreeji mum, himɓe lasooji tato e sappo he joyo ngara Misira.
44007015	Nden Yakuuba he koreeji mum ngari Misira. O jooɗii toon faa ɓe maayi gooto gooto, kanko he ɓiɓɓe makko, maamiraaɓe meeɗen.
44007016	Nder ngesa nga Ibrahim soodunoo he ɓiɓɓe Hamor nder wuro Sikem, toon ɓe mooɓaa.
44007017	Nde wakkati mo Alla humnannoo ko wi'unoo Ibrahim ɗum yottinoo, Ibrankooɓe ɗuuɗi sanne nder leydi Misira.
44007018	Nder wakkati mumduu, laamiiɗo gom, mo anndaa Yusufu, mellaa nder Misira.
44007019	Laamiiɗo oon ƴoyni lenyol meeɗen, torri maamiraaɓe men, tilsinii ɓe, ɓe mboppa cukaloy maɓɓe maaya.
44007020	Nder wakkati mum Muusa rimaa, omo horsi he Alla. Lebbi tati tan o waɗi wuro baabiiko, nden kanko duu o woppaa.
44007021	Wakkati o woppanoo, ɓii-Firawna debbo hooƴi mo, jogii hano ɓiyum reedu.
44007022	Muusa ekkita hikmaaku Misirankooɓe fuu, o laatii neɗɗo baawɗo haala e golle.
44007023	Wakkati Muusa waɗunoo duuɓi lasooji ɗiɗi, nyannde gom o anniyi tuntowaade banndiraaɓe makko Isra'ilankooɓe.
44007024	Sey o hi'i Misiranke gom no torra Isra'ilanke gom, o tettini mo, o wari Misiranke oon ngam yoptanaade banndiiko.
44007025	Muusa no miila ko banndiraaɓe mum no paamowan ko har junngo mum Alla hisinirta ɓe, amma ɓe paamaay.
44007026	Jaangoore mum Muusa hi'i Isra'ilankooɓe ɗiɗo gom no kaɓa. Nden o tefi fonnude ɓe, sey o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i : « Hey ! Onon, on banndiraaɓe ! Ɗume waɗi oɗon piyodira ? »
44007027	Sey gonɗo no torra banndum oon tutii Muusa wi'i mo : Moy watti ma ardoɗaa min naa kiitoɗaa min ?
44007028	Naa miin duu, aɗa hiɗi mbaraa kam non, no mbarirɗaa Misiranke oo keeŋa ?
44007029	Wakkati Muusa nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, doggi, suuɗowi nder leydi Midiyan, to o rimi ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo.
44007030	Duuɓi lasooji ɗiɗi gaɗa mum, maleykaajo gom wanngani Muusa nder ladde yeeruure, takkol waamnde Sinayi nder ɗemle hiite wuumoore gom wonnde no jaɓa.
44007031	Wakkati o hi'unoo ɗum, ɗum haayɗini mo. Wakkati o ummii faa o daarowa ɗum, sey o nani daane Alla wi'i mo :
44007032	Miin woni Alla maamiraaɓe maaɗa, Alla mo Ibrahim, Isiyaaku e Yakuuba tokkunoo.Sey Muusa huli, darii, no diwna faa waawtaa daari wuumoore ndeen.
44007033	Nden Joomiraawo wi'i mo : Ɓortu paɗe maa, ngam nokkuure nde ndariɗaa dow mum ndee no seniine.
44007034	Mi hi'i torra himɓe am wonɓe nder leydi Misira. Mi nani duu uumaali maɓɓe. Mi wari ngam soptinde ɓe. Jooni war, mi lile nder Misira.
44007035	Muusa mo Isra'ilankooɓe calinoo faa mbi'i moy watti mo o ardoo ɓe naa o hiitoo ɓe, kanko nii Alla lili he maɓɓe. Har hunnduko maleykaajo bannganɗo mo, Alla waɗi mo ardiiɗo e coptinoowo maɓɓe.
44007036	Muusa oon duu nii, wurtini ɓe nder leydi Misira. Nder duuɓi lasooji ɗiɗi, o waɗi kaayɗe e alamaaji gom nder Misira, nder maayo Maaliya he nder ladde yeeruure.
44007037	Muusa gooto oon duu wi'unoo Isra'ilankooɓe : Alla no lildan on annabiijo gom hano am, burtotooɗo hakkune mooɗon.
44007038	Wakkati jama'aare ndeen hawrunoo nder ladde yeeruure, Muusa laatii naatuɗo hakkune maamiraaɓe meeɗen he maleykaajo bannganɗo mo dow waamnde Sinayi. Kanko duu heɓi haalaaji kokkooji mbuurnam, hokki en ɗi.
44007039	Amma maamiraaɓe men tokkaay ko o wi'i. Ɓe calii mo, hakkillooji maɓɓe fuu kuybiti har Misira.
44007040	Nden ɓe mbi'i Haaruuna waɗana ɓe tooruure ardotoone ɓe ngam hakiika Muusa wurtini ɓe nder Misira amma ɓe anndaa fuu ko heɓi mo.
44007041	Nder balɗe mum ɓe ngaɗi ga'el gom, ngel laatii tooruure maɓɓe. Ɓe ngaɗani ngel sadaka, ɓe nani belɗum golle juuɗe maɓɓe.
44007042	Amma Alla duu tottiti ɓe, acci ɓe, ɓe ndewa koode hano no ɗum winndiraa nder dewtere annabiiɓe. Alla wi'i nder mayre : Onon himɓe Isra'el, duuɓi lasooji ɗiɗi ɗii fuu ɗi ngaɗuɗon nder ladde yeeruure, on cakkanii kam ndabba naa on ngaɗanii kam sadaka gom ?
44007043	Aa'a. On ndonndaakina hukumuuru Moloko, tooruure mon e Refan, hoodere nde ndewuɗon, ngam ndewon tooruuje ɗee, waɗi ngaɗuɗon ɗe. Miin duu, mi waɗan nanngeɗon, njaareɗon nder leydi Baabiila.
44007044	—Nder ladde yeeruure ndeen, maamiraaɓe meeɗen no ngoodunoo hukumuuru, nyiɓaanu hano no Alla tinndiniri Muusa nyiɓol mayru nii. Kayru hollata Alla no wondi he maɓɓe.
44007045	Hukumuuru ndu maamiraaɓe meeɗen ndoni, kayru ɓe njaari nder leydi ndi ɓe koni, ɓe teeti he lenyi gom ɗi Alla riiwi yeeso maɓɓe nder ardaaki Yosu'a. Ndu jooɗake faa nder jamaanu Daawda,
44007046	keɓuɗo moƴƴere Alla Yakuuba. Daawda tefi laawol he makko ngam nyiɓande mo suudu nder mayri,
44007047	amma Suleymaanu nyiɓi ndu.
44007048	Dey Alla Toowɗo jooɗotaako nder suudu ndu ɓiɓɓe aadama nyiɓi hano no o wi'iri ɗum har kunndule annabiiɓe, wakkati o wi'unoo :
44007049	Kammu woni jooɗorde laamu am leydi woni njaaɓirdi koyɗe am. Suudu nduye, nyiɓanton kam ? Toy woni nokkuure nde powtanmi ?
44007050	Hanaa junngo am tagi huune fuu naa ?
44007051	—Onon tiɓɓe-nyiireeɓe, ɓe ɓerɗe mum'en tottiti Alla, ɓe noppi mum'en cukki. Wakkati fuu oɗon caloo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, onon he maamiraaɓe mooɗon on fuu on go'o.
44007052	Annabiijo oye non maamiraaɓe mooɗon torraay ? Ɓe mbari duu annabiiɓe, haalunooɓe illa hanaa hannden dow garki Dartiiɗo, gorko oo mo njammbiɗon, mbarɗon.
44007053	Onon keɓuɓe Tawreeta he juuɗe maleykaaɓe, on njogaaki nde.
44007054	Wakkati hawriine dawrooɓe ndeen nanunoo haalaaji Etiyen ɗii, ɓe nani mone makko sanne sanne faa iɓe ƴakkana mo nyiiƴe.
44007055	Amma Etiyen keewɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, ndarii no tiggitii kammu. Sey o hi'i teddungal Alla, o hi'i Iisa no ndarii nyaamo Alla.
44007056	Nden o wi'i : —Ndaa ! Kammu nii no udditii, miɗo hollira Ɓii-Neɗɗo no darii nyaamo Alla.
44007057	Ɓe cukki noppi maɓɓe, ɓe kuuɓi sanne, ɓe fuu, ɓe pa'i mo.
44007058	Ɓe pooɗi mo, ɓe mburtini nder huɓeere ndeen. Nden ɓe tinni iɓe paɗɗira mo kaaƴe faa ɓe mbara mo. Seediiɓe ɗum ɓorti kolte mum'en kalfini jokolle gom bi'eteeɗo Sol.
44007059	Wakkati ɓe ngonnoo iɓe paɗɗira mo kaaƴe, o du'ii, o wi'i : —Yaa Iisa Joomam ! Jaɓɓa yonki am !
44007060	Nden o dicci, o huuɓi, o wi'i : —Yaa Joomiraawo ! To nanngir ɓe hakke oo. Nden yonki makko saami.
44008001	Sol yardake he barol Etiyen. Nyannde maayde Etiyen, nyannde mum nder huɓeere Ursaliima torra mawka fuɗɗani hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa. Goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu ndoggi cankiti nder leydi Yahudiya e leydi Samariya acci lilaaɓe ɓeen tan.
44008002	Worɓe hulooɓe Alla gom mooɓi Etiyen, ɓe nani naawɗum maayde makko, ɓe mboyi sanne.
44008003	Amma Sol kay, no durwa sankita hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa. Omo naata suudu yahde suudu, omo nannga semmbe semmbe gorko e debbo maɓɓe, omo udda.
44008004	Goonɗinɓe sankitaaɓe ɓeen tinni no mbaajoo Habaru lobbo oon nokku fuu to ɓe njehi.
44008005	Nder wakkati mum Filipa yehi nder huɓeere Samariya mawne gom omo waajoo himɓe filla Iisa Almasiihu.
44008006	Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo kaayɗe e kujje ɗe o woni omo waɗa, himɓe fuu no ngara no kettino waaju makko he hakkillo.
44008007	Himɓe heewɓe nder maɓɓe, woodunooɓe ginnaaji bonɗi, ginnaaji ɗiin no kacca sanne no njippo dow maɓɓe, bonnguuɓe ɗuɓɓe, he laƴooɓe njamɗiti.
44008008	Ɗum laatii welwelo manngo nder huɓeere ndeen.
44008009	Nder wakkati mum, gorko gom bi'eteeɗo Simon no tawa nder huɓeere ndeen. Omo waɗa dobo-dobooji, iɗum haayɗina himɓe, omo ada hoore makko no o goɗɗum.
44008010	Himɓe fuu, gorko yahde debbo no teddina mo no mbi'a : —Golle gorko oo no baawɗe Alla bi'eteeɗe Baawɗe Mawɗe.
44008011	Iɓe kettinanoo mo sanne ngam ɗum ɓooyi ko golleeji makko no kaayɗina ɓe.
44008012	Amma wakkati ɓe ngoonɗinnoo Habaru lobbo dow filla Laamu Alla he dow filla Iisa Almasiihu, Habaru mo Filipa woni no waajoo oon, gorko yahde debbo maɓɓe tinni no hokka hoore mum no waɗanee batisma.
44008013	Simon duu goonɗini, waɗana batisma. O woɗɗaaki Filipa kaden. Omo hi'a kaayɗe he alamaaji ɗi Filipa woni no waɗa, ɗum haayɗini mo.
44008014	Lilaaɓe wonɓe nder Ursaliima nani ko himɓe Samariya ngoonɗini haala Alla, nden ɓe lili Piyer e Yahaaya to maɓɓe.
44008015	Wakkati ɓe njottinoo nder leydi Samariya, ɓe njippi to goonɗinɓe ɓeen. Ɓe ndu'ani ɓe heɓa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippoo dow maɓɓe,
44008016	ngam Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippaaki dow baa gooto maɓɓe ginan. Dow innde Iisa Joomiraawo tan ɓe ngaɗana batisma.
44008017	Nden Piyer e Yahaaya njowi juuɗe dow maɓɓe, sey Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippii dow maɓɓe.
44008018	Wakkati Simon hi'unoo lilaaɓe ɓeen njowi juuɗe mum'en dow goonɗinɓe ɓeen, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo duu jippii dow maɓɓe, o waddi ceede.
44008019	O wi'i ɓe : —Miin duu, kokkaree he baawɗe ɗee, ngam mo ndekumi juuɗe dow mum fuu heɓa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo oo.
44008020	Amma Piyer jaabii mo wi'i : —Aɗa miila ko ceede coodirtaa kokkal Alla ngal naa ? Alla halke, aan e ceede maa fuu.
44008021	A walaa mbaka fuu, a ronataa duu gollal ngal, ngam ɓerne maa dartinaaki yeeso Alla.
44008022	Tuubu ngam dabareeji maa bonɗi, eela Alla, tawte o yaafante iri anniyaaji maa ɗii.
44008023	Ngam mi hi'i ɓerne maa no ɓawli sanne, a maccuɗo hakke duu.
44008024	Nden Simon jaabii ɓe wi'i : —Too, onon he ko'e mon, ndu'anee kam, eelanon kam Joomiraawo ngam baa gootel nder ko mbi'uɗon ɗum fuu to heewtoo kam.
44008025	Wakkati ɓe ngayni tabbintinande ɓiɓɓe leydi Samariya haala goonɗinol Iisa, he waajaade haala Joomiraawo, ɓe coƴƴi Ursaliima. Iɓe njaha, iɓe mbaajoo Habaru lobbo oon nder wurooji Samariya ɗuɗɗi tawaaɗi dow laawol maɓɓe.
44008026	Nyannde gom Maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani Filipa wi'i mo : —Umma, yah har hoore huɗo, tokka laawol boppaangol ngool, laawol ƴuwrowol Ursaliima no yaha Gaaja.
44008027	Filipa ummii, dilli. Wakkati o yehannoo ndeen, sey o fotti he Etiyopiyanke gom, jehunooɗo Ursaliima ngam teddinde Alla no warta no ƴuwa Ursaliima. Gorko oo no mantaaɗo, kanko duu hakkilii ceede Kandake, debbo laamiiɗo leydi Etiyopiya.
44008028	Wakkati o hootanoo, omo jooɗii nder torko pucci makko, omo jannga dewtere annabi Esaaya.
44008029	Sey Ruuhu Alla wi'i Filipa : —Doggu, hewtowa jom torko oo.
44008030	Nden Filipa doggi hewtowi mo. Wakkati o yottinoo, sey o nani gorko oon no jannga ko annabi Esaaya winndunoo nder dewtere mum. Nden Filipa ƴami gorko oon wi'i mo : —Aɗa faama ko ngonɗaa aɗa jannga ɗum naa ?
44008031	Nden gorko oon jaabii mo wi'i : —Noy paamiranmi ɗum, nde goɗɗo famtinaay kam ? Sey o wi'i Filipa ŋabba jooɗo hadde makko.
44008032	Aayaaje ɗe o wonnoo omo jannga nder dewtere ɗeen nii : Omo nanndi he mbaalu njaareetengu hirsirde. Hano jawngel deƴƴungel, no maɓɓi hunnduko, wakkati ngel femmbetee.
44008033	Ɓe cemtini mo, o hiitanaaka e goonga. Moy waawi fillaade habaru jippotooɓe he makko, ngam ɓe itti yonki makko nder duuniyaaru nduu.
44008034	Nden Etiyopiyanke oon ƴami Filipa wi'i : —Famtina. Dow moy aayaaje ɗee ngoni no kaala ? Annabiijo oon he hoore mum ɗe ngondi naa neɗɗo fereejo gom.
44008035	Sey Filipa fuɗɗi famtinde mo maana majji faa o yottii he Habaru Iisa lobbo oon.
44008036	Iɓe njaha yahde faa ɓe njottii feto gom, sey Etiyopiyanke oon wi'i Filipa : —Ndaa ndiyam nii. Ɗume waawi haɗude, mi waɗanee batisma ? [
44008037	Sey Filipa jaabii mo wi'i : —Nde nii a goonɗini he ɓerne worre, aɗa waawi waɗaneede batisma. Etiyopiyanke oon wi'i mo : —Mi goonɗini ko Iisa Almasiihu no ɓii-Alla.]
44008038	Nden o wi'i torko oon darnee. Ɓe njippi nder ndiyam ɗam, Filipa waɗani mo batisma.
44008039	Wakkati ɓe mburtotonoo nder ndiyam ɗam, sey Ruuhu Joomiraawo adi Filipa. Gorko oon yeeƴitaaki hi'i mo kaden, tokki laawol mum nder welwelo.
44008040	Filipa duu yehi Ajotus. Omo yaha, omo waajoo wurooji tawaaɗi dow laawol makko fuu faa o yottii nder wuro wi'eteengo Kaysariya.
44009001	Sol no torra aahiiɓe Joomiraawo ɓeen sanne, faa omo wi'a o waran ɓe. Nyannde gom o yehi o tawowi mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen fuu,
44009002	o ƴami mo, o winnda ɗerol hokkude mo laawol naatude cuuɗi baajorɗi huɓeere Damas ngam nanngude gorko e debbo tokkuɓe laawol Iisa Almasiihu, o uddowa ɗum'en nder kasu Ursaliima.
44009003	Wakkati o wonnoo dow laawol Damas faa o faani huɓeere ndeen, sey jeyngol gom ƴuwi dow huuri mo.
44009004	O saami, sey o nani daane gom no wi'a mo : —Sol ! Sol ! Ɗume waɗi aɗa torra kam ?
44009005	Nden o jaabii nde o wi'i : —Aan woni moy Joomiraawo ? Daane ndeen nooti mo wi'i : —Miin woni Iisa mo ngonɗaa aɗa torra.
44009006	Amma jooni, umma naatu nder huɓeere ndee, toon kaalanteɗaa ko kaanuɗaa waɗude.
44009007	Ɗowtuɓe mo fuu ndarii no ndaara, keppi fuu ko mbi'ata. Ɓe nani daane ndeen kay, amma ɓe ngi'aay neɗɗo fuu.
44009008	Sol ummii darii, no futtina gite amma o hi'ataa yeeso makko baa seɗɗa. Ɓe nanngi junngo makko, ɓe ɗowi mo faa nder huɓeere Damas.
44009009	Balɗe tati o waawtaa hi'i, o nyaamata, o yarataa.
44009010	Nder Damas no tawanoo aahiijo Iisa gom bi'eteeɗo Ananiyas. Joomiraawo wannginani mo, wi'i mo : —Ananiyas ! O jaabii, o wi'i : —Miin nii, Joomiraawo !
44009011	Nden Joomiraawo wi'i mo : —Umma jooni jooni, njahaa dow beddawol bi'eteengol Laawol Portiingol. Naataa ɓaade Yahuuda, ƴamaa moy woni bi'eteeɗo Sol ƴuwɗo Tarsus. Jooni to o woni fuu, omo ɗon omo du'oo.
44009012	Mi wannginani mo, o hi'i gorko gom bi'eteeɗo Ananiyas no deka juuɗe mum dow makko ngam o hepta gite makko. Aan duu woni gorko oo.
44009013	Ananiyas jaabii wi'i : —Joomiraawo, himɓe heewɓe kaalani kam, bone fuu mo gorko oo waɗani goonɗinɓe maa nder Ursaliima.
44009014	O heɓi duu to mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla laawol garki nder wuro ngoo ngam nanngude noddoowo innde maa fuu.
44009015	Nden Joomiraawo wi'i : —Ananiyas, umma, yah ngam mi suɓake gorko oo ngollana kam. O waajoo innde am hakkune lenyi ɗuɗɗi e laamiiɓe mum'en. O waajoo nde duu hakkune Isra'ilankooɓe.
44009016	Mi hollan mo kaden duu ko no tilsi o torree torraaji keewɗi ngam sabbu am.
44009017	Nden Ananiyas ummii yehi ɓaade Yahuuda, naatowi nder suudu ndu Sol weeri nder mum. O deki juuɗe makko dow Sol o wi'i mo : —Banndam, Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen bannganɗo ma dow laawol oo wakkati ngarannoɗaa ndeen, lili kam ngam mbumtaa, keewa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
44009018	Wakkati mum da koɓitte gom koɓɓiti, ƴuwi he gite makko caami. O hepti gite makko. O ummii, o darii, o waɗana batisma.
44009019	O nyaami, nden semmbe makko warti. Sol jooɗii to aahiiɓe Damas balɗe seɗɗa.
44009020	Nder balɗe mum, omo naata nder baajorɗi Damas omo waajoo, omo wi'a Iisa no Ɓii-Alla.
44009021	Nanuɗo haala kaa fuu, ɗum haayɗina ɗum. Nden ƴama hoore mum wi'a : —Hanaa yaa gorko oo wonnoo no torra faa noy walaa goonɗinɓe Iisa nder Ursaliima ? Naa o waru non yaa goonga e goonga ngam eytude ɓe, o nannga ɓe o yaara to mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ?
44009022	Wakkati fuu mo o waajotoo, omo holla himɓe wuro ngoon, ko sikka fuu walaa Iisa woni Almasiihu Alla faa joonkay ɓe mbaawtaa mbi'i goɗɗum kaden.
44009023	Balɗe no njeha, balɗe no ngarta, sey nyannde gom Yahudankooɓe kawri ngaɗi haɓɓi-daane ngam mbara Sol.
44009024	Nden ɓe ngaɗi dammbule wuro ngoon fuu ndoomee jemma e nyalooma ngam ɓe nannga mo, ɓe mbara. Amma Sol heɓi habaru haɓɓi-daane maɓɓe ndeen.
44009025	Sey jemma gom aahiiɓe makko adi mo ngatti nder hanndeere, njaari mo senngo birniyol wuro ngoon juri mo yaasin.
44009026	Wakkati Sol warnoo nder Ursaliima, o tefi jooɗaade nder hawriine aahiiɓe Iisa gom amma ɓe koolaaki mo. Ɓe fuu iɓe kula mo ngam ɓe tabbintinaay goonga e goonga ko o aahiijo Iisa.
44009027	Nden Barnabas adi mo, yaari to lilaaɓe ɓeen. O fillanii ɓe fuu noy Sol hi'iri Joomiraawo, he no Joomiraawo haaldiri he makko dow laawol Damas. Barnabas fillanii ɓe duu ko Sol hulaay hitere fuu, o waajake dow innde Iisa nder huɓeere Damas goonga e goonga.
44009028	Illa nyannde mum Sol jooɗii hakkune maɓɓe, omo fiilido he maɓɓe, omo waajoo dow innde Iisa nder Ursaliima he ɓerne worre.
44009029	Omo waajoo Yahudankooɓe haalooɓe gerekankoore, omo yeddodira he maɓɓe, kamɓe duu iɓe tefa warude mo.
44009030	Wakkati banndiraaɓe makko goonɗinɓe Iisa nanunoo ɗum, ɓe njaari mo nder huɓeere Kaysariya, nden ɓe lili mo Tarsus.
44009031	Illa wakkati mum hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa heɓi jam nder leydi Yahudiya, Galili e Samariya fuu. Hawriine maɓɓe no ɓeydoo yahde, inde semmbiɗa. Inde ɓeyda kulal Joomiraawo, inde ɓeyda himɓe, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo no wondi he maɓɓe no semmbinɗina ɓe.
44009032	Wakkati Piyer wonnoo no fiiloo hakkune leydi Samariya he leydi Yahudiya, o weerani goonɗinɓe Iisa wonɓe nder huɓeere Lidda.
44009033	Nyannde mum o tawi Ayne'as, gorko bonngiriiɗo duuɓi jeetati no fukkii dow daago mum.
44009034	Sey Piyer wi'i mo : —Ayne'as, Iisa Almasiihu nyawti ma ! Umma, taggu daago maa. Sey o ummii.
44009035	Wakkati himɓe Lidda he himɓe leydi Saron ngi'unoo mo, ɓe fuu ɓe tuubii ɓe ngoonɗini Joomiraawo.
44009036	Nder huɓeere Yoppe, no woodunoo aahiijo Iisa debbo gom bi'eteeɗo Tabita, Dorkas nder gerekankoore, kam woni « lella ». Wallude talkaaɓe e gollude ko wooɗi tan debbo oo anndira.
44009037	Nder balɗe Piyer wonnoo nder Lidda no fiiloo, debbo oo jontaa, maayi. O lootaa, o wattowaa nder suudu wonndu dow gom.
44009038	Yoppe woɗɗaa Lidda. Wakkati aahiiɓe Iisa ɓeen nanunoo ko Piyer no nder Lidda, sey ɓe ummini worɓe ɗiɗo gom njaha mbi'owa mo, o yaawɗo o wara Yoppe.
44009039	Worɓe ɓeen njottini lilal ngal, nden Piyer ummii tokki ɓe. Wakkati o yottinoo ndeen, ɓe njaari mo to maayɗo oon. Rewɓe ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi gom ɓadii no mbulla, no kolla kolte ɗe maayɗo oon waɗannoo ɓe.
44009040	Piyer wi'i himɓe fuu mburtinee, o hofi, o du'i, o huybiti har maayɗo oon, wi'i mo : —Tabita, umma ! Sey Tabita fiirti gite mum, hi'i Piyer, ummii, jooɗii.
44009041	Nden Piyer nanngi junngo makko, darni mo. Piyer noddi ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi ɓeen e worɓe goonɗinɓe tawaaɓe ɗon ɓeen, holli ɓe Tabita no foofaa.
44009042	Habaru oon sankitii nder huɓeere Yoppe fuu, walaa fuu mo nanaay mo. Himɓe ɗuɓɓe ngoonɗini Joomiraawo.
44009043	Piyer jooɗii balɗe seɗɗa nder Yoppe nder ɓaade gargasaajo gom bi'eteeɗo Simon.
44010001	Nder Kaysariya no tawa gorko gom bi'eteeɗo Korneliyus, mawɗo sewre soogeeji inndirteene « nde Italiya ».
44010002	Korneliyus no wakkiliiɗo he Alla. Kanko he koreeji makko fuu, ɓe hulooɓe Alla. Omo walla faa noy walaa Yahudankooɓe ɓe ngalaa, omo du'oo, omo eela Alla wakkati fuu.
44010003	Nyannde gom, nyalooma har yamnde tati maleykaajo gom wanngani mo, wari no wi'a mo : —Korneliyus !
44010004	O darii o daari maleykaajo oon faa wooɗi, omo diwna, o jaabii o wi'i : —Joomam, ɗume ngiɗaa ? Nden maleykaajo oon wi'i mo : —Joomiraawo jaabake du'aa'uuji maa, omo hi'a duu balla ka ngonɗaa aɗa waɗana talkaaɓe. O yeggitaay ma.
44010005	Joonin waɗu lilaaɓe njeha Yoppe noddowa Simon inndirteeɗo Piyer.
44010006	Omo wuro gargasaajo bi'eteeɗo Simon, mo wuro mum tawa daane maayo.
44010007	Wakkati maleykaajo oon dillunoo, Korneliyus noddi gollooɓe mum ɗiɗo gom, he soogeeru kulooru Alla gom wonndu wuro makko.
44010008	O fillani ɓe ko maleykaajo oon wi'unoo mo fuu, nden o lili ɓe Yoppe.
44010009	Jaangoore dilludu lilaaɓe Korneliyus, wakkati ɓe ngonnoo dow laawol faa ɓe paani Yoppe. Caka nyalooma, fotodiri Piyer duu ƴeenyi dow suudu to o weerunoo faa o du'oo.
44010010	Wakkati o wonnoo omo du'oo, rafo nanngi mo sanne faa omo suuna nyaamdu. Wakkati o waɗantenoo nyaamdu ndeen, sey Alla wannginani mo,
44010011	o hi'i kammu maɓɓiti, goɗɗum nannduɗum he guda mannga no jippinee, yahde har makko. Kunndule majjum nay ɗeen fuu no njogaa.
44010012	Nder mayre no tawa dabbaaji iri iriiji fuu : Dabbaaji ɗi koyɗe nay, ɓodooji, he pooli iri iriiji fuu.
44010013	Sey daane gom wi'i mo : —Piyer, umma, hirsu, nyaama !
44010014	Nden Piyer jaabii, wi'i : —Aa'a, Joomam ! Abada mi nyaamaay ko harmi naa ko nyiddinii yeeso Alla.
44010015	Sey daane ndeen wi'i mo kaden : —Ko Alla harminaay, to hooƴu ɗum ko harmi.
44010016	Ɗum waɗi faa nde tati. Sey guda ngaan ƴencinaa.
44010017	Huune ndee wemmbii Piyer. O tinni omo ƴama hoore makko maana ko o hi'i ɗum. Wakkati o ƴamannoo hoore makko maana ko o hi'i ɗum, tawi lilaaɓe Korneliyus ɓeen tefiino faa ngiiti wuro Simon gargasaajo oon. Kamɓe duu nii no ndarii dammbugal makko.
44010018	Ɓe calmini ɓe ƴami se Piyer no ɗon.
44010019	Sey Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i Piyer : —Worɓe tato gom nii no ƴamane,
44010020	njippaa yah to maɓɓe, to dara fuu mbi'a goɗɗum, miin waɗi ɓe lilaa he maaɗa.
44010021	Nden Piyer jippii, wari to worɓe ɓeen, o wi'i ɓe : —Miin woni Piyer mo ƴamanton. Jam nda waddi on ɗo ?
44010022	Nden ɓe mbi'i mo : —Korneliyus, mawɗo soogeeji Rooma kam lili min. Gorko non dartiiɗo, kuloowo Alla. Filla golle makko lobbe no dow ɗemle Yahudankooɓe fuu. Maleykaajo ceniiɗo gom wanngani mo, wi'i, o waɗa lilaaɓe noddowee ngam no woodi ko mbi'ata mo.
44010023	Nden Piyer weerni ɓe. Jaangoore mum, o ummii, o tokki ɓe, ɓe pa'idi Kaysariya. Yahudankooɓe goonɗinɓe Iisa gom jeyaaɓe Yoppe ɗowtiri mo, ɓe njahdi Kaysariya.
44010024	Faɓɓi-jaangoore mum Piyer he ɗowtirɓe ɗum njottii Kaysariya. Ɓe tawi Korneliyus hawri lenyi mum he higiraaɓe mum fuu, iɓe keɗi Piyer.
44010025	Wakkati Piyer naatannoo ndeen, Korneliyus ummii jaɓɓitii mo, sujidani mo.
44010026	Sey Piyer nanngi mo ummini, wi'i : —Umma, miin he hoore am mi ɓii-aadama.
44010027	Nden ɓe puɗɗi iɓe njewta. Piyer e Korneliyus naati nder ɓaade, sey Piyer tawi jama'aare no hawri no doomi ɗum.
44010028	Nden o wi'i ɓe : —Onon he ko'e mooɗon, oɗon anndi ko no harmi Yahudanke hawta he lenyol gom naa yaha wuro mo hanaa Yahudanke. Amma miin, Alla hollii kam ko neɗɗo fuu haana wi'ude goɗɗo no karmuɗo naa no nyiddiniiɗo yeeso mum.
44010029	Ngam majjum waɗi wakkati liluɗon mi noddowee, mi daraaki fuu mi wi'a goɗɗum. Joonin, miin nii, miɗo hiɗi mi faama ko waɗi noddanɗon kam ?
44010030	Korneliyus jaabii, wi'i : —Balɗe nay nii, nyannde gom har yamnde tati nyalooma, miɗo nder suudu am, caka du'aa'u, sey gorko ɓorniiɗo kolte ƴelkitooje gom wanngi yeeso am.
44010031	Gorko oon wi'i kam : « Korneliyus, Alla jaabake du'aa'uuji maa, o hi'i duu ko ngonɗaa aɗa waɗana talkaaɓe.
44010032	Waɗu lilaaɓe njahaa Yoppe noddowa Simon inndirteeɗo Piyer. Omo daane maayo, wuro gargasaajo bi'eteeɗo Simon. »
44010033	Ngam majjum waɗi ngaɗumi noddeɗaa, mi daraaki fuu ndoomumi goɗɗum. A wonnii duu ko ngarɗaa. Joonin min fuu miɗen ɗo ngam hettinaade ko mbi'ataa min nder ko Joomiraawo holli ma fuu.
44010034	Nden Piyer itti hunnduko, wi'i : —Joonin, tabbat sikka fuu walaa, Alla walanaa oo naa ooto.
44010035	Neɗɗo fuu huli Joomiraawo, teddini mo, waɗi ko wooɗi he ko dartii, joomum welan Alla.
44010036	Alla lildi haala mum dow ɓiɓɓe Isra'el fuu. O waɗani ɓe filla Habaru lobbo, Habaru jom jam har Iisa Almasiihu, Joomiraawo himɓe fuu.
44010037	Oɗon anndi ko waɗi nder leydi Galili faa sankitii nder leydi Yahudiya fuu gaɗa waaju he batismaaji ɗi Yahaaya waɗani himɓe.
44010038	Oɗon anndi no Alla jippiniri baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo dow Iisa mo Nasaratu. Oɗon anndi duu no Iisa fiilori nder leydi ndiin fuu no golla golleeji lobbi, no soptina wonɓe nder maccangaaku Ibiliisa. Iisa waɗi kujje ɗee fuu ngam Alla no wondi he makko.
44010039	Minen, min ceedake ko o waɗi fuu nder leydi Yahudiya he nder Ursaliima. Ɓe tontii mo dow leggal bardugal, ɓe mbari mo.
44010040	Amma balɗe tati gaɗa mum Alla ummintini mo, hokki mo baawɗe wanngande himɓe.
44010041	Amma o wannganaay neɗɗo fuu nde hanaa minen, ɓe Alla suɓii ngam seedanaade mo. Min nyaamdi, min njardii he makko gaɗa ummitaaki makko.
44010042	O wi'i min duu, min mbaajoo himɓe, min kolla ɓe ko kanko Alla suɓii waɗi kiitotooɗo wuurɓe he maayɓe.
44010043	Annabiiɓe fuu kaali dow makko mbi'i neɗɗo fuu goonɗini mo, hakkeeji mum no njaafetee ngam sabbu makko.
44010044	Wakkati Piyer wonnoo no waajoo, sey Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippii dow hettiniiɓe ɓeen fuu.
44010045	Keɓal Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ngaal, haayɗini Yahudankooɓe goonɗinɓe tokki Piyer ngari ɓeen.
44010046	Ɓe nani, ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ɓeen no njetta Alla nder ɗemle ɗe ɓe meeɗaay nanude. Nden Piyer jaabii ɓe, wi'i :
44010047	—Jooni himɓe ɓee, ɓe ngi'oton, keɓi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo mo keɓunoɗen. No woodi baawɗo haɗude ɓe ngaɗanee batisma naa ?
44010048	Nden Piyer hokki laawol ɓe ngaɗanee batisma nder innde Iisa Almasiihu. Gaɗa gaɗol batisma ngool, ɓe eeli Piyer jooɗo, waɗana ɓe balɗe seɗɗa.
44011001	Lilaaɓe ɓeen he goonɗinɓe tawaaɓe nder leydi Yahudiya nani ko ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe duu njaɓi haala Alla.
44011002	Wakkati Piyer wartunoo Ursaliima, Yahudankooɓe goonɗinɓe, tiiɗuɓe he juulnol janci mo,
44011003	mbi'i : —A weerani ɓe njulnaaka, a nyaamdi he maɓɓe !
44011004	Nden Piyer fillani ɓe no ɗum waɗiri, o wi'i ɓe :
44011005	—Nder Yoppe, nyannde gom, wakkati ngonnoomi, miɗo du'oo, sey kollaami goɗɗum nannduɗum he guda gom. Kunndule magga nay fuu no njogaa, ɗum ƴuwi dow, iɗum fa'i har am.
44011006	Ndariimi, tiimumi ɗum faa wooɗi, sey ngi'umi dabbaaji ɗi koyɗe nay, dabbaaji ɓodooji e pooli ir iriiji nder majjum.
44011007	Nden nanumi daane gom no wi'a kam : « Piyer, umma, hirsu, nyaamu ! »
44011008	Njaabiimi nde mbi'umi : « Joomam ! Abada abadilla mi nyaamaay ko harmi naa ko nyiddinii yeeso Alla. »
44011009	Sey nde wi'i kam kaden : « Ko Alla harminaay, to hooƴu ɗum ko harmi. »
44011010	Kile tati iɗum waɗa, nden guda ngaan ƴeenyina dow.
44011011	Nder wakkati mum, worɓe tato gom ƴuwi faa Kaysariya ngari to am.
44011012	Sey Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i to mi daroo fuu mi wi'a goɗɗum, mi ummoo, mi yahda he maɓɓe tan. Nden min njahdi Kaysariya, min naati faa nder ɓaade Korneliyus. Worɓe goonɗinɓe jeego'o gom tokki min.
44011013	Wakkati min fuu min ngonnoo nder ɓaade makko, o fillanii min no o hi'iri maleykaajo bannganɗo mo caka mayre, wi'i mo o waɗa mi noddowee.
44011014	Mi wara mi waajoo, waaju kisinoowo mo kanko he ɓaade makko.
44011015	Wakkati puɗɗumi waajaade, sey Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippii dow maɓɓe hano no o jipporinoo dow amin illa arannde.
44011016	Nden miccitiimi he ko Joomiraawo wi'i, wakkati o wi'unoo : « Yahaaya, ndiyam waɗiranannoo himɓe batisma. Amma onon, batisma mooɗon, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo waɗirtee. »
44011017	Nde nii Alla hokki ɓe huune fuu ko o hokkunoo min wakkati min ngoonɗinnoo Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Ndenne noy potumi faa mi heppora Alla, mi fonna hoore am he makko ?
44011018	Wakkati Yahudankooɓe goonɗinɓe ɓeen nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, ɓe fuu ɓe peewi. Nden ɓe tinni, iɓe njetta Alla, iɓe mbi'a : —Jaa ! Alla hokki ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe duu laawol tuubude he heɓude mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
44011019	Torra umminooka faa Etiyen waraa kaan, sankitii goonɗinɓe heewɓe. Nder maɓɓe woɓɓe njehi Finisi, Kipurus, Antiyokiya Siriya. Iɓe mbaajoo Yahudankooɓe tan dow habaru Iisa Almasiihu.
44011020	Amma goonɗinɓe gom duu ƴuwi Kipurus he Sirene ngari Antiyokiya no mbaajoo ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe dow Habaru lobbo, habaru Iisa Joomiraawo.
44011021	Junngo Joomiraawo no dow maɓɓe. Himɓe heewɓe tuubii ngoonɗini.
44011022	Wakkati hawriine goonɗinɓe Ursaliima nanunoo ko waɗi Antiyokiya, ɓe cuɓi Barnabas, ɓe lili toon.
44011023	Barnabas neɗɗo lobbo non, keewɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo he goonɗinol. Wakkati o yottinoo Antiyokiya, o hi'i no Alla barkiniri goonɗinɓe ɓeen, o nani belɗum majjum. O holliti ɓe, o semmbinɗini ɓe ngam ɓe tittinkinoo nder hoolaade Alla. Himɓe heewɓe ngoonɗini, ngari ɓeydi he goonɗinɓe illa arannde ɓeen.
44011025	Barnabas ummii Antiyokiya fa'i Tarsus ngam tefoyde Sol.
44011026	Wakkati o hiitunoo Sol, o ardii mo, ɓe ngari Antiyokiya. Ɓe njooɗii hitaane muɓɓere hakkune hawriine aahiiɓe Iisa, ɓe njanngini himɓe heewɓe. Nder Antiyokiya goonɗinɓe ɓeen puɗɗa noddireede tokkuɓe Almasiihu.
44011027	Nder balɗe mum, annabiiɓe ɗuɓɓe ummake Ursaliima ngari Antiyokiya.
44011028	Nder baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, Agabus gooto nder maɓɓe, ummii, wi'i rafo manngo no waɗan nder duuniyaaru fuu. Ir maggo waɗinoo nder jamaanu laamiiɗo Rooma bi'eteeɗo Kalawdiyus.
44011029	Aahiiɓe wonɓe leydi Antiyokiya, anniyi wallude banndiraaɓe mum'en tawaaɓe nder leydi Yahudiya, neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu keddi baawɗe mum.
44011030	Ɓe adi keddi ko ɓe mbaawi hokkude, ɓe ngatti nder juuɗe Barnabas e Sol ngam ɓe njaara ɓe kokkowa mawɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa wonnde Ursaliima.
44012001	Nder wakkati mo Pol e Barnabas njaarannoo balla goonɗinɓe Antiyokiya nder Ursaliima, Hirudus laamiiɗo Yahudiya fuɗɗi, kam duu, torrude goonɗinɓe Iisa gom.
44012002	O waɗi Yakuuba mawnu Yahaaya soppira takubaahi, waraa.
44012003	Wakkati o hi'unoo ko torrol goonɗinɓe ngool no weli Yahudankooɓe, o nanngi Piyer duu o uddi. Uddol Piyer ngool fottodiri he Juulɗe buuru mo walaa ƴuufinirɗum.
44012004	O watti cefe soogeeji nay paddo Piyer, sewre fuu soogeeji nay. O adi duu anniya hiitaade mo yeeso himɓe fuu, gaɗa Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe.
44012005	Piyer faddaa, amma hawriine goonɗinɓe ndeen duu tinni no du'anoo mo.
44012006	Jemma mo Hirudus waaldiri anniya ko nde weeti fuu kam no hiitoto Piyer, Piyer no fukkii no ɗaanii hakkune soogeeji ɗiɗi. Omo haɓɓiraa callali ɗiɗi, daarooɓe dammbule kasu ɓeen duu no ndarii no ndooma ɗe.
44012007	Sonnyo fuu waɗaay, sey Maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani Piyer, jeyngol gom waɗi nder cuurel to o faddaa. Maleykaajo oon meemi wecco makko, findini mo, wi'i o ummoo law law. Callali ɗiin piirti, ƴuwi he juuɗe makko, caami.
44012008	Maleykaajo oon wi'i mo kaden : —Tunnda, kaɓɓa paɗe maa. Piyer ummii, tunndi, haɓɓi paɗe mum. Nden maleykaajo oon wi'iti mo : —Wattu alkubbaare maa, tokkaa kam.
44012009	Piyer watti alkubbaare mum ummii tokki maleykaajo oon wurtii. O faamaay fuu ko woni no waɗa. Ɗum wa'ani mo hano koyɗol nii.
44012010	Ɓe njawti doomoowo arano oon, ɗiɗaɓo oon, nden ɓe njotti dammbugal njamndi daroowal huɓeere ndeen. Wakkati ɓe ndarinoo yeeso maggal, sey ngal omtanii hoore maggal. Ɓe mburtii, ɓe njehi yeeso seɗɗa sey maleykaajo oon majjani mo.
44012011	Wakkati Piyer faamanoynoo hoore mum, o wi'i : —Sikka fuu walaa, Joomiraawo lili maleykaajo mum, wara soptina kam he juuɗe Hirudus e ko Yahudankooɓe ndoomi heewtoo kam.
44012012	Nden o ummii, o yehi to jama'aare hawrata no waɗa du'aa'u nder ɓaade Mariyaama, inna Yahaaya inndirteeɗo Markus.
44012013	Piyer darii dammbugal salmini. Debbo golloowo gom bi'eteeɗo Roda ɓattii, faa daara moy woni dammbugal.
44012014	Wakkati o annditinnoo daane Piyer, o heewi welwelo faa o yeggiti omtande mo. O doggi, o haalanowi wonɓe nder suudu ɓeen, o wi'i ɓe Piyer woni no darii dammbugal no salmina.
44012015	Sey ɓe mbi'i o kaaŋaaɗo. O tokki omo wi'a ko hanaa fuu goɗɗo non, Piyer nii woni dammbugal. Nden ɓe mbi'i tawte maleykaajo duroowo makko non.
44012016	Piyer tinni no salmina. Wakkati ɓe omtunoo dammbugal ngaal, sey ɓe ngi'ii Piyer, ɗum haayɗini ɓe.
44012017	O deki honndu dow hunnduko makko ngam wi'ude ɓe ndeƴƴita. O fillanii ɓe no Joomiraawo wurtiniri mo nder kasu oon. O wi'i ɓe kaalana Yakuuba he goonɗinɓe ɓeeto fuu. Nden o wurtii, o yehi to goonɗinɓe gom.
44012018	Wakkati weetunoo, burtaaki Piyer kiin ummini faa noy walaa hakkillo soogeeji ɗiin. Ɓe tinni iɓe ƴamodira toy Piyer naati.
44012019	Hirudus waɗi o tefee nokku fuu amma o hiitaaka. O noddi soogeeji ɗiin, o ƴami ko waɗi. Nden o hokki laawol ɗi nanngee ɗi mbaree. Ɗi nanngaa, ɗi mbaraa. Gaɗa mum Hirudus ummii Yahudiya, hoɗowi Kaysariya balɗe seɗɗa.
44012020	Waɗiino wakkati ko Hirudus fotaa he ci'e Tirus he Sidon. Mbuurnam ci'e ɗeen fuu ngalaana no keɓee nder leydi makko. Nyannde gom himɓe gom nder ci'e ɗee, ummii faa ngara to Hirudus ngam tefa potal. Tawi ɓe narriino he mawɗo faada Hirudus bi'eteeɗo Bilastus.
44012021	Nyannde ɓe pottannoo, Hirudus ɓornii kolte mum laamu, jooɗii no haalda he maɓɓe.
44012022	Huune fuu nanaaka sey ɓe kuuɓi, iɓe mbi'a : —Daane ndee, hanaa daane tagaaɗo, daane deweteeɗo non !
44012023	Wakkati mum da, maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom fiyi mo, ngam o teddinaay Alla. Gilƴi tinni no nyaama mo faa o maayi.
44012024	Haala Alla no waajee yahde, ika sankitoo nokku fuu.
44012025	Wakkati Barnabas e Sol timminnoo golle mum'en nder Ursaliima, Yahaaya inndirteeɗo Markus tokki ɓe, ɓe kootidi.
44013001	Nder hawriine goonɗinɓe wonnde Antiyokiya no tawa annabiiɓe e jannginooɓe gom, Barnabas, Simeyon inndirteeɗo Ɓaleejo, Lukiyus mo Sirene, Sol e Manahen, mo he laamiiɗo Hirudus ummodi nokku ngootu.
44013002	Nyannde gom wakkati ɓe teddinannoo Joomiraawo, iɓe cuumi nyannde mum, sey Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i ɓe : —Cuɓanee kam Barnabas e Sol ngam golle ɗe noddanmi ɓe.
44013003	Wakkati ɓe kumtinoo, ɓe ndu'ii, ɓe njowi juuɗe maɓɓe dow Barnabas e Sol, ɓe callimi ɓe, ɓe ndilli.
44013004	Ruuhu Ceniiɗo lili Barnabas e Sol nder duune Kipurus. Wakkati ɓe njehannoo, ɓe tokkiri har Selewkiya, ɓe naatowi laana ndiyam, ɓe ponndi Kipurus.
44013005	Wakkati ɓe njottinoo Salamis, ɓe mbaajii haala Alla nder baajorɗi Yahudankooɓe. Yahaaya inndirteeɗo Markus no wondi he maɓɓe no walla ɓe.
44013006	Ɓe piili duune ndeen fuu faa ɓe njottii Pafos. Nder Pafos ɓe potti he Bar-Iisa, Yahudanke gaɗoowo dobo-dobooji, aduɗo hoore mum hano annabiijo.
44013007	Bar-Iisa no wondi he laamiiɗo Sergiyus Polus, gorko jom hakkillo. Nyannde gom Sergiyus Polus noddi Barnabas e Sol ngam hettinaade haala Alla.
44013008	Amma Elimas gaɗoowo dobo-dobooji, mo maana innde mum woni « jom dobo-dobooji » nder gerekankoore, no tefa haɗude ɗum. O hiɗaa laamiiɗo oon hettinanoo ɓe faa goonɗina.
44013009	Sol gooto, lilidaaɗo he Barnabas, no inndiree Pol. O heewi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, o daari Elimas faa wooɗi,
44013010	o wi'i : —Hey ƴoyre ! Jammbotoongel, aan Seyɗan ganyo Alla, ganyo ko wooɗi ! Nde celataa bonude laabi Joomiraawo ?
44013011	Jooni sawru Joomiraawo saaman dow maa, mbumaa. A waɗan balɗe, a hi'aay jeyngol naange. Wakkati mum da nimre huuri mo, gite makko ngi'ataa fuy. Omo memmemta, omo tefa ɗowoo mo.
44013012	Waaju haala Joomiraawo oo naati ɓerne laamiiɗo Sergiyus Polus sanne. Wakkati o hi'unoo ko waɗi, o tuubii, o goonɗini Iisa.
44013013	Pol he wondunooɓe he mum ummii naati laana ndiyam Pafos, ponndi Perga nder leydi Pamfiliya. Yahaaya inndirteeɗo Markus seedi he maɓɓe, soƴƴii Ursaliima.
44013014	Amma Pol he horiiɓe ɓeen ummii Perga, ngari Antiyokiya nder leydi Pisidiya. Nyalaane fowteteene gom Pol'en naati waajordu njooɗii.
44013015	Wakkati ɓe kantunoo jannde aayaaje gom nder Tawreeta he nder dewte annabiiɓe, hooreeɓe waajordu nduun ngaɗi lilaaɓe ngari mbi'i Pol'en : —Banndiraaɓe, nde nii oɗon ngoodi ko mbi'oton himɓe hawruɓe hannden nder waajordu nduun ngam semmbinɗinde ɓe, oɗon mbaawi wi'ude ɗum jooni.
44013016	Sey Pol ummii, darii sappii ɓe wi'i : —Onon Isra'ilankooɓe he onon hulooɓe Alla, kettinee ko mbi'anmi on.
44013017	Wakkati maamiraaɓe meeɗen ngonnoo Misira, Alla mo Isra'ilankooɓe ngoonɗini suɓii ɓe mawnini ɓe. Nder baawɗe makko duu o wurtiniri ɓe nder mayri.
44013018	Wakkati ɓe ngaɗunoo duuɓi lasooji ɗiɗi nder ladde yeeruure, kanko nyamni ɓe, yarni ɓe.
44013019	Nder leydi Kanaana o moyti lenyi jeɗɗi, o hokki ɓe ndi, ɓe ndona
44013020	ko watta duuɓi keme nay e woygu (450). Illa duuɓi keme nay e woygu ɗiin faa wara he jamaanu annabi Samuwiila, Alla hokki ɓe hiitotooɓe gom.
44013021	Maamiraaɓe meeɗen eeli mo o hokka ɗum'en laamiiɗo. O hokki ɓe Sawulu ɓii-Kis jippotooɗo he Benyamin, mari ɓe duuɓi lasooji ɗiɗi.
44013022	Wakkati Alla teeti laamu Sawulu, o suɓii Daawda laamoo ɓe. O haali dow Daawda, o wi'i : Mi hi'i ko Daawda ɓii-Yesa, gorko non pottanɗo ɓerne am, gaɗoowo muuyɗe am fuu.
44013023	Nder jippotooɓe he Daawda Iisa ƴuwi. Kanko duu Alla waɗi Kisinoowo Isra'ilankooɓe hano no o wi'irnoo ɗum nii.
44013024	Fadde Iisa warde, Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma watti daane he himɓe Isra'el fuu o wi'i, ɓe tuuba, ɓe ngaɗanee batisma.
44013025	Wakkati Yahaaya gaɗoowo batisma timminnoo golle mum, wi'i ko kam hanaa neɗɗo mo ɓe ndoomi garki mum oon. Gaɗa mum neɗɗo oon warta, kam fotaay duu baa fiirtude ɓoggi paɗe makko.
44013026	Banndiraaɓe, onon jippotooɓe he Ibrahim he hulooɓe Alla, enen habaru kisinam oo lildanaa.
44013027	Himɓe Ursaliima he mawɓe mum'en annditaay moy woni Iisa. Wakkati ɓe kiitotonoo Iisa, ɓe kumni haalaaji annabiiɓe ɗi ɓe njanngata nyalaane fowteteene fuu.
44013028	Baa nii ko ɓe keɓaayno feloore fuu he makko, ɓe eeli Pilaatus waɗa o waree.
44013029	Wakkati ɓe kumnunoo ko dewte kaalunoo dow Iisa, o jippinaa dow leggal bardugal, o mooɓaa.
44013030	Amma Alla ummintinii mo.
44013031	O waɗi balɗe omo wanngana wondunooɓe he makko illa Galili faa wara Ursaliima, laatiiɓe seedantooɓe mo hannden yeeso himɓe.
44013032	Minen he ko'e amin, miɗen kaalana on dow Habaru lobbo oo, mo Alla fodaninoo maamiraaɓe meeɗen.
44013033	Wakkati Alla ummintinnoo Iisa, o humni fodoore ndee ngam meeɗen en fuu, enen jippotooɓe he maɓɓe. Ngam no winndaa nder Jabuura suura ɗiɗi : Aan woni Ɓiyam, ɓaawo hannden miin woni Bammaa.
44013034	Kaden duu, Alla wi'iino kam no ummintinan mo, kam accataa ɓanndu makko nyola. Nii woni no o haaliri ɗum : Mi hokkan on barke ceniiɗe, barke goongaaje ɗe podaniimi Daawda.
44013035	Ngam majjum waɗi Daawda wi'i nder aayaare Jabuura gom : —A accataa ceniiɗo maa nyola nder annyeere.
44013036	Daawda gollani Alla, maayi, mooɓaa hadde annyeeje maamiraaɓe mum. Ɓanndu makko nyoli,
44013037	amma mo Alla ummintini oon kay, ɓanndu mum nyolaay.
44013038	Banndiraaɓe, paamee ko dow filla moytol hakkeeji daliila Iisa min mbaajii on. Neɗɗo fuu goonɗini mo no soptinte he maccangaaku hakke, ngu Tawreeta waawaay soptinde on he mum.
44013040	Kakkilee to ko winndaa nder dewte annabiiɓe ɗum waɗu he mooɗon :
44013041	Kettinee onon yawiiɓe Alla, ɗum laatanto on haayne, kalkon ! Ngam mi waɗan gollal nder mbuurnam mooɗon, ngal baa nde goɗɗo fillanii on, on njaɓataa.
44013042	Wakkati Pol e Barnabas mburtii waajordu nduun, jama'aare ndeen eeli ɓe, ɓe ngarta nyalaane fowteteene waroore, ɓe mbaajoo ir waaju oo.
44013043	Gaɗa cankitaaki hawriine ndeen, Yahudankooɓe ɗuɓɓe e tuubuɓe gom, njaɓi diina Yahudankooɓe, tokki Pol e Barnabas. Pol e Barnabas njewtani ɓe, cemmbinɗini ɓe ngam ɓe ɓeyda feŋaade he Alla moƴƴuɗo.
44013044	Wakkati nyalaane fowteteene ndeen wartunoo, ɗuuɗal himɓe wuro ngoon fuu ngari kettini waaju Pol e Barnabas.
44013045	Wakkati Yahudankooɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo jama'aare ndeen, haasidaaku naatani ɓe. Ɓe tinni iɓe njeddodira he Pol'en, iɓe njanca haalaaji Pol.
44013046	Sey caka jama'aare ndeen, Pol e Barnabas acci kulal fuu, mbi'i ɓe : —Waajibi, onon haala Alla kaa haani haalaneede. On calake ka, ngam oɗon miila ko on kaandaa mbuurnam nduumiiɗam. Ndenne, min coƴƴoto to ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, min kaalana ɓe ka.
44013047	Ngam kanƴum woni ko Joomiraawo wi'i min ngaɗa, wakkati o wi'unoo : Mi suɓake ma laatoɗaa jeyngol duuniyaaru, ngaddaa kisinam nder kappa kuula mayru fuu.
44013048	Wakkati ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe nanunoo haala kaa, ɓe nanii belɗum. Ɓe tinni iɓe teddina haala Alla. Himɓe fuu, ɓe Alla fodi laatoo goonɗinɓe nyannde mum, ngoonɗini.
44013049	Haala Joomiraawo sankitii nder leydi ndiin fuu.
44013050	Yahudankooɓe uppi rewɓe e worɓe, haalooɓe nanee nder wuro ngoon tokkuɓe diina maɓɓe, ngam ɓe torra Pol e Barnabas. Ɓe ndiiwi Pol e Barnabas nder leydi ndiin.
44013051	Wakkati Pol e Barnabas ndillannoo, ɓe piɗɗi sollaare koyɗe maɓɓe dow wuro ngoon, ɓe pa'i Ikoniyum.
44013052	Aahiiɓe wonɓe Antiyokiya Pisidiya keewi belɗum ɓerne e Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
44014001	Nder Ikoniyum Pol e Barnabas naati nder waajordu Yahudankooɓe mbaajii. Waaju maɓɓe oo nafi sanne faa Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe heewɓe ngoonɗini.
44014002	Amma Yahudankooɓe horiiɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay ngatti miilooji bonɗi nder ɓerɗe ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ngam ɓe mbanya banndiraaɓe maɓɓe goonɗinɓe.
44014003	Amma ɗum fuu waɗaay Pol'en ndilla, ɓe ɓooyi Ikoniyum, iɓe mbaajoro cuusal haala Joomiraawo moƴƴuka. Iɓe kooli Joomiraawo, omo hokka ɓe baawɗe waɗude alamaaji e kujje kaayɗiniiɗe. Omo holla ɓe duu ko goonga nii ɓe ngoni iɓe mbaajoo.
44014004	Nder huɓeere ndeen himɓe cenndi, woɓɓe no ngaɗa Yahudankooɓe ɓeen, woɓɓe duu no tokki lilaaɓe ɓeen.
44014005	Yahudankooɓe, ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe e mawɓe mum'en, fuu ciryii torrude Pol e Barnabas, ɓe paɗɗa ɓe kaaƴe, ɓe mbara.
44014006	Wakkati Pol e Barnabas paamunoo ɗum, ɓe ndoggi ɓe pa'i ci'e Listira e Derbe nder leydi Likoniya e gure piiliiɗe ɗum.
44014007	Ɓe mbaajii Habaru lobbo oon.
44014008	Nder Listira no woodunoo gorko bonngiiɗo illa nder cukaaku mum. O yaaɓaay koyngal baa nde worre, o dilla.
44014009	Nyannde gom o wari, o jooɗii, omo hettini ko Pol woni no wi'a. Pol ƴetti gite daari mo faa wooɗi, sey hi'i ko goonɗinol gorko oo no waawi waɗa o nyawta.
44014010	Pol toowni daane wi'i mo : —Umma, dara dow koyɗe maa ! Sey gorko oon garbisi, darii, no yaha.
44014011	Wakkati jama'aare hi'unoo ɗum ɓe kuuɓi iɓe mbi'a nder likoniyankoore : —Deweteeɓe gom njippi, mbayliti, laatii tagaaɓe ngari to amin !
44014012	Nden ɓe noddiri Barnabas « Jewus », Pol duu « Hermes », ngam kanko Pol woni ɓurɗo haalude.
44014013	Suudu rewirde Jewus no tawa dammbugal huɓeere ndeen. Cakkanoowo tooruure inndiraane Jewus oon wari, waddi ga'i peɗiraaɗi pinni. O darni ɗi dammbule mayru. Omo hiɗi, kanko he jama'aare ndeen, ngaɗana Pol e Barnabas sadakaaji hano no ɓe ngaɗiranta deweteeɓe maɓɓe.
44014014	Wakkati Barnabas e Pol nanunoo ɗum, ɓe cerki kolte maɓɓe, ngam hollude mettal ɓerɗe maɓɓe. Ɓe ndoggi, ɓe naatowi nder jama'aare ndeen,
44014015	iɓe mbi'a : —Ɗume ngatton huune ndee fuu ? Min tagaaɓe hano mooɗon. Min ngaraana waajaade oon dow Habaru lobbo, mboppon filla dewol tooruuje ɗe ngalanaa oon fuu nafakka gom. Kuybiton har Alla Duumiiɗo, taguɗo dow e ley, taguɗo diyeele e ko tawa nder gootel majji fuu.
44014016	Nder jamanuuji bittiiɗi, o acci neɗɗo fuu tokki ko weli ɗum.
44014017	Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay mo wannginde moƴƴe makko nder ko o waɗata fuu. Kanko jippinanta on dunngu mbarkinaangu. Omo nyamna on faa kaaron, omo welna ɓerɗe mooɗon.
44014018	Da cat he walaa hawli Barnabas e Pol keɓii kaɗi jama'aare ndeen hirsande ɓe sadakaaji ɗiin.
44014019	Yahudankooɓe gom ngari, ƴuwi Antiyokiya he Ikoniyum. Ɓe pooɗi hakkillooji himɓe ɓeen faa ɓe mbaawi ɗum'en. Nden ɓe murtini jama'aare ndeen, nde tinni inde faɗɗira Pol kaaƴe. Wakkati jama'aare ndeen miili o maayi, nden o daasaa, o yaaraa gaɗa wuro.
44014020	Wakkati aahiiɓe ɓeen kawrunoo dow makko, o ummii, o naati nder huɓeere ndeen. Ɓe mbaali toon faa weeti, nden kanko e Barnabas pa'i Derbe.
44014021	Pol e Barnabas mbaajake Habaru lobbo nder Derbe. Himɓe heewɓe laatii aahiiɓe Iisa. Gaɗa ɓe mbaajake nder Derbe, ɓe paɗɗiti dow koyɗe maɓɓe. Ɓe njehi Listira, Ikoniyum, he Antiyokiya.
44014022	Pol e Barnabas cemmbinɗini ɓerɗe goonɗinɓe, ngam ɓe tittinkinoo nder goonɗinol maɓɓe, iɓe mbi'a ɓe : —Nde haana en tampu non faa noy walaa, en naatata nder Laamu Alla.
44014023	Hawriine goonɗinɓe fuu, ɓe cuɓani ɗum ardiiɓe mum. Ɓe cuumi, ɓe ndu'i, ɓe kalfini ardiiɓe ɓeen Joomiraawo mo ɓe ngoonɗini.
44014024	Dow laawol maɓɓe ɓe panti nder Pisidiya, ɓe ngari leydi Pamfiliya.
44014025	Ɓe mbaajii nder wuro Perga, nden ɓe njippowi nder Ataliya.
44014026	Toon ɓe naati laana ndiyam, ɓe pa'i Antiyokiya Siriya. Nder Siriya, moƴƴere Alla eelaa wondaa he maɓɓe ngam golle ɗe ɓe ngayni ɗeen.
44014027	Wakkati ɓe ngartunoo, ɓe kawri goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu, ɓe kaalani ɗum'en huune fuu ko Alla waɗi he maɓɓe, he no o fiirtirani ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe laawol goonɗinde.
44014028	Ɓe njoddi he aahiiɓe wonɓe Antiyokiya ɓeen faa ɓooyi.
44015001	Himɓe gom ƴuwi Yahudiya ngari Antiyokiya Siriya, no mbaajoo goonɗinɓe no mbi'a : —Neɗɗo fuu, mo juulnaaka hano no Muusa haaliri ɗum, heɓataa kisinam.
44015002	Pol e Barnabas pooɗodiri sanne he maɓɓe dow ko ɓe mbi'i nder waaju oo. Sey ɗum waɗi Pol, Barnabas e goonɗinɓe Antiyokiya gom ummoo, njeha Ursaliima to lilaaɓe ɓeeto e ardiiɓe kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe ngam keɓowa hoore haala kaa.
44015003	Hawriine goonɗinɓe Antiyokiya hokki ɓe jooɓaari keƴuni, nden ɓe ndilli. Pol, Barnabas e wondunooɓe he maɓɓe nder jahaangal ngaal, pedditi leyɗe Finisi e Samariya. Iɓe njaha, iɓe pillanoo goonɗinɓe tawaaɓe nder nokkuuje ɗeen, no ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe tuubiri, tokki Joomiraawo. Haala kaa weli goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu.
44015004	Wakkati ɓe njottinoo nder Ursaliima, hawriine goonɗinɓe Ursaliima, lilaaɓe ɓeen he ardiiɓe kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe taɓɓitii ɓe. Pol'en pillanii ɓe huune fuu ko kam'en ngaɗi nder baawɗe ɗe Alla hokki ɗum'en.
44015005	Amma Fariisa'en goonɗinɓe gom ummii, mbi'i : —Tilay sey nii ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe njulnee, tilsinee tokka Tawreeta.
44015006	Lilaaɓe ɓeen e ardiiɓe kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe ɓeen njooɗii, ndaari haala kaan ngam hiitude hoore makka.
44015007	Ɓe neeɓi, iɓe caawodira faa ɓooyi. Nden Simon Piyer ummii, wi'i ɓe : —Banndiraaɓe, oɗon anndi ko Alla suɓii kam illa ko ɓooyi mi waajoo Habaru lobbo hakkune ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, ngam ɓe tuuba, ɓe ngoonɗina.
44015008	Wakkati Alla annduɗo ɓerne ɓii-aadama hokkunoo ɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hano no o hokkirnoo en mo, o holli ko kam jaɓi tuubu maɓɓe.
44015009	Walaa fuu ko o senndiri en he maɓɓe. O lamni ɓerɗe maɓɓe ngam ɓe tuubii, ɓe ngoonɗini.
44015010	Joonin, ko waɗi oɗon ngiɗi sii'aade haala Alla ? Oɗon tefa njowon donngal dow aahiiɓe makko, donngal ngal enen he maamiraaɓe meeɗen en fuu en mbaawaay ronndaade.
44015011	Enen he maɓɓe, en fuu en ngoonɗini ko ngam sabbu moƴƴere Iisa Joomiraawo waɗi keɓuɗen kisinam.
44015012	Hawriine ndeen fuu waɗi siw. Ɓe kettini Pol e Barnabas no pillo no Alla hokkiri ɗum'en baawɗe waɗude kaayɗe e alamaaji ɗuɗɗi hakkune ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe.
44015013	Wakkati ɓe ngaynunoo haala maɓɓe, Yakuuba wi'i : —Kettinee banndiraaɓe ! Kettinanee kam !
44015014	Simon Piyer haalani en ko illa arannde no Alla holliri ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe hidde mum, har cuɓaaki himɓe ngaɗaaki hakkune maɓɓe ngam ɓe laatoo himɓe mum.
44015015	Haalaaji annabiiɓe duu njardake dow majjum, ngam har kunndule maɓɓe Joomiraawo wi'i :
44015016	Mi wartan, gaɗa mum, mi nyiɓitoo suudu Daawda saamunu nduun. Mi fonndita ko boni fuu nder mayru, mi darna ndu,
44015017	ngam horiiɓe fuu tefa kam, lenyol fuu ngool noddumi laatoo halal am. Ɗum woni ko Joomiraawo anndinɗo ko kujje ɗee fuu ngaɗan illa fil'ajal, wi'i.
44015019	—Ngam majjum waɗi, miin kay ko ngi'umi woni to en tinnan ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe tuubuɓe tokki Alla.
44015020	Amma mbinndanen ɓe ko ɓe kaanaa nyaamude tewu ngu laaɓaa, tewu cakkanaangu tooruuje. Ɓe paddo ko'e maɓɓe he jeenu he golle jaayɗe he ko nanndi he mum, to ɓe nyaamu ko saaɗi, to ɓe nyaamu ƴiiƴam.
44015021	Ngam illa ko ɓooyi Tawreeta no waajee nder gure fuu, no jannginee nder baajorɗi nyalaane fowteteene fuu.
44015022	Lilaaɓe ɓeen, ardiiɓe kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa he goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu narrii, cuɓi hakkune mum'en goonɗinɓe ɗowtiranɓe Pol e Barnabas Antiyokiya Siriya. Nder suɓaaɓe ɓeen no tawa hooreeɓe ɗiɗo, Yahuuda inndirteeɗo Barsabas e Silas.
44015023	Ɓe kokkaa ɗerol ngool. Nder maggol ɓe mbinndi, ɓe mbi'i : —Minen, lilaaɓe e ardiiɓe kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa, gonɗe nder Ursaliima miɗen canna on, onon ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe goonɗinɓe Iisa tawaaɓe nder Antiyokiya, Siriya e leydi Silisi fuu.
44015024	Min nani ko himɓe gom ƴuwi nder wurooji amin ngari culnani on. Ɓe ummini hakkillooji mooɗon, baa ko min kokkaay ɓe laawol ɓe ngara ɓe kaalana on iri haalaaji ɗii.
44015025	Ngam majjum waɗi min kawri, min ngaɗi daane worre, min adi worɓe ɗiɗo ɓee, ɓe ɗowtira Barnabas e Pol higiraaɓe amin horsuɓe,
44015026	connuɓe yonkiiji mum'en ngam sabbu Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
44015027	Min lili Yahuuda e Silas he mooɗon ngam ɓe njanngana on ko winndaa nder ɗerol ngool.
44015028	Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hawri he amin, min potti dow ko haana ndekeɗon donngal fuu ngal tawaaka nder tilsinooje bi'uɗe :
44015029	To nyaamee tewu cakkanaangu tooruuje, to nyaamee ƴiiƴam, to nyaamee ko saaɗi, paddee ko'e mooɗon he jeenu he golle jaayɗe ko nanndi he mum. Nde nii on mboɗɗake kujje ɗee, too, on ngaɗi ko wooɗi. Jam wonda he mooɗon.
44015030	Nden ɗum waynodiri he worɓe ɓeen, ɓe tokki Pol'en ɓe pa'i Antiyokiya. Wakkati ɓe njottinoo Antiyokiya, ɓe kawri goonɗinɓe wuro ngoon fuu. Ɓe linnyi ɓe ɗerol ngool.
44015031	Wakkati ɓe njanngana ngol, ɓe nani belɗum maggol ngam ngol semmbinɗini ɓe sanne.
44015032	Yahuuda e Silas, ɓe annabiiɓe duu. Ɓe mbaajii goonɗinɓe ɓeen sanne ngam semmbinɗinde ɓe nder goonɗinol maɓɓe.
44015033	Ɓe ngaddi he maɓɓe balɗe. Nden nyannde gom ɗum waynodiri he maɓɓe, ɓe koota jam. [
44015034	Amma Silas kay ndillaay.]
44015035	Pol e Barnabas duu njooɗii toon. Kamɓe he himɓe heewɓe gom, njanngini, mbaajii haala Joomiraawo.
44015036	Balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa waaju maɓɓe, nyannde gom Pol ummii, wi'i Barnabas : —En tuntowoo nokkuuje ɗe mbaajiɗen ngi'en no banndiraaɓe meeɗen ngontiri.
44015037	Barnabas hiɗiino Yahaaya inndirteeɗo Markus tokka ɗum'en yaha.
44015038	Amma Pol jaɓaay ngam wakkati ɓe ngonnoo Pamfiliya, Markus dilli acci ɓe. Illa ndeen o yeeƴitaaki ɗowtirde ɓe kaden nder jahaale maɓɓe.
44015039	Pol e Barnabas njeddodiri sanne, amma ɓe potaay faa ɓe ceedi. Barnabas adi Markus, ɓe naati laana ndiyam, ɓe ponndi duune Kipurus.
44015040	Pol duu adi Silas. Goonɗinɓe wuro ngoon eeli moƴƴere Joomiraawo wonda he maɓɓe, nden ɓe ndilli.
44015041	Ɓe pa'i leyɗe Siriya e Silisi. Iɓe njaha, iɓe cemmbinɗina kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe.
44016001	Jahaangal Pol e Silas yaari ɓe gure Derbe e Listira. Nder Listira no tawa aahiijo Iisa gom, mo innum no Yahudanke tuubuɗo goonɗini Iisa, bammum duu no Gerekanke. Gorko oo no wi'ee Timote.
44016002	Goonɗinɓe wonɓe nder Listira e Ikoniyum fuu no mana mo sanne.
44016003	Pol no hiɗi jahdal makko. O juulni mo ngam Yahudankooɓe tawaaɓe nder leydi ndiin fuu no anndi ko baabiiko no Gerekanke.
44016004	Nder ci'e fuu ɗe ɓe panti, iɓe kaalana goonɗinɓe majje laabi adaaɗi nder hawriine waɗaane Ursaliima caka ardiiɓe goonɗinɓe he lilaaɓe ɓeen. Iɓe mbi'a ɓe, ɓe tokka laabi ɗiin.
44016005	Kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe ci'e ɗeen no ɓeydoo wakkati fuu, goonɗinɓe majje duu no ɓeyda semmbiɗidde nder goonɗinol mum'en.
44016006	Wakkati Ruuhu Ceniiɗo haɗunoo Pol'en waajaade Habaru lobbo nder leydi Asiya, ɓe tokki nder leyɗe Firigiya e Galatiya ɓe ngari leydi Misiya.
44016007	Wakkati ɓe ngarnoo he keerol Misiya, ɓe kosi yahde leydi Bitiniya. Amma Ruuhu Iisa, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, faddi ɓe.
44016008	Nden ɓe tokki nder Misiya ɓe ngari Torowas.
44016009	Nder jemma mum, Pol hoyɗi. O hi'i Makedoniyanke gom no eela mo, no wi'a : —War nder Makedoniya, paaboɗaa min !
44016010	Wakkati Pol waɗunoo koyɗol ngool, law law min he Pol'en min tefi yahde Makedoniya, ngam min tabbintini ko Alla noddi min, min mbaajoo Habaru lobbo toon.
44016011	Nyannde gom min ummii Torowas, min naati laana ndiyam, min ponndi duune Samotaras. Min mbaali, jaangoore mum min pa'i Neyapolis.
44016012	Min ummii Neyapolis, min ponndi Filipi, huɓeere Makedoniya mawne nde leydi Rooma ndawranta. Min ngaɗi mbalkoy nder mayre.
44016013	Nyalaane fowteteene gom min mburtii huɓeere ndeen, min njehi daane maayo. Ngam miɗen miila min ngiitannoo du'orde Yahudankooɓe toon. Min njooɗii daane maggo, min kaaldi he rewɓe kawruɓe toon gom.
44016014	Nder maɓɓe no tawa debbo gom, bi'eteeɗo Lidiya, debbo kuloowo Alla, ƴuwɗo huɓeere Tiyatira wari no sonna gude boɗeeje, gude caadiiɗe. Omo jooɗii, omo hettini waaju amin, sey Joomiraawo omti ɓerne makko heɓa o goonɗina ko Pol woni no waajoo.
44016015	Kanko e koreeji makko fuu ngaɗana batisma. Gaɗa mum, o eeli min, o wi'i : —Nde nii on njaɓi ko mi goonɗini Joomiraawo, naatee nder ɓaade am, mbeeranon kam. O tinnani min faa min njaɓi.
44016016	Nyannde gom wakkati min njehannoo to himɓe kawrata ngaɗa du'aa'u, min potti korɗo gom mo ginnaaru bondu gom woni gaɗa mum. Ngam mayru, debbo oo no anndi ko waɗoyta jaaŋo. Rimɓe makko no naforoo mo, no tefa ceede.
44016017	O tokki min, min e Pol, o tinni omo huuɓa, omo wi'a : —Himɓe ɓee, ɓe gollanooɓe Alla Toowɗo non. Laawol kisinam ɓe ngoni iɓe mbaajoo.
44016018	Debbo oo waɗi balɗe no haala haala kaa. Haala ka heƴi Pol, sey Pol wonƴiti wi'i ginnaaru nduun : —Nder innde Iisa Almasiihu ƴuwu gaɗa makko ! Wakkati mum da ndu ƴuwi gaɗa debbo oon.
44016019	Wakkati joomiraaɓe makko ɓeen ngi'unoo ko laawol njawdi mum'en hanti, ɓe nanngi Pol e Silas, ɓe njaari yeeso mawɓe huɓeere ndeen.
44016020	Ɓe ngaddi ɓe yeeso hiitotooɓe, ɓe mbi'i : —Yahudankooɓe, worɓe ɓee, no ɗon no ngatta fitina nder huɓeere meeɗen.
44016021	Ɓe ngalaana iɓe mbaajoo finaa-tawaaji karmuɗi to meeɗen, enen ɓiɓɓe leydi Rooma.
44016022	Wakkati mum da jama'aare ummodi he maɓɓe. Hiitotooɓe ɓeen ngaɗi kolte maɓɓe ittaa, ɓe ɓoccaa,
44016023	ɓe uddaa. Nden ɓe mbi'i doomoowo kasu oon, dooma ɓe faa wooɗa.
44016024	Wakkati ɓe kokkunoo mo tilsinoore ndee, o watti ɓe faa nder yeesooru kasu oon. O tummbi koyɗe maɓɓe caka lekko tedduko gom, o haɓɓiri callali faa tiiɗi.
44016025	Caka jemma, Pol e Silas no du'oo, no njimana Alla. Kasunkooɓe gom duu no kettinanii ɓe.
44016026	Huune fuu nanaaka, sey leydi dimmbii sanne, faa joƴƴinirɗe kasu ɗeen njinngi. Wakkati mum da dammbule kasu ɗeen fuu omtii, callali ɗi kasunkooɓe ɓeen kaɓɓiraa, fuu kaɓɓitii.
44016027	Wakkati doomoowo oon finunoo, o hi'i dammbule kasu ɗeen fuu no omtii. O miili kasunkooɓe ɓeen fuu ndoggi, ndilli. Sey o sorti takubaahi faa o wara hoore makko.
44016028	Nden Pol huuɓi he makko, wi'i mo : —To nawnu hoore maa ! Min fuu miɗen ɗon.
44016029	Wakkati o nanunoo daane ndeen, sey o wi'i, o hokkee yeynirngal. O doggi, o naati nder cuurel to Pol e Silas ngoni. O hofi yeeso Pol e Silas, omo weɗa kak kak.
44016030	O wurtini ɓe, nden o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i : —Moodiɓɓe ! Noy ngaɗanmi ko mi hisaa ?
44016031	Nden ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Goonɗin Iisa Joomiraawo, aan he koreeji maa, on fuu, on kisintee.
44016032	Nder jemma mum, o wurtini ɓe, o looti putte maɓɓe. Ɓe mbaajii mo, kanko he koreeji makko fuu, ɓe ngaɗani ɓe batisma.
44016034	Nden o yaari Pol e Silas, nder suudu makko, o hokki ɓe nyaamdu. Kanko e koreeji makko fuu nani belɗum ngam ɓe ngoonɗini Alla.
44016035	Waali weeti, hiitotooɓe ɓeen lili soogeeji kaalana doomoowo kasu oon, mbi'i Pol e Silas njoofee.
44016036	Nden doomoowo oon wari wi'i Pol : —Hiitotooɓe ɓeen njoofi on. Jooni oɗon mbaawi mburtii, njehee he jam.
44016037	Amma Pol fiirti hunnduko, wi'i : —Ɓe ngaɗi min ɓocca caka jama'aare, min kiitanaaka, nden ɓe uddi min nder kasu. Minen duu min ɓiɓɓe leydi Rooma non. Ɓe nannii min nder kasu, joonin ɓe mburtinan min nder cuccukka naa ? Ɗum waɗataako sam. Tilay kamɓe he ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe ngara ɓe mburtina min !
44016038	Nden lilaaɓe ɓeen pillanowi ɗum hiitotooɓe ɓeen. Wakkati ɓe nanunoo ko Pol e Silas no ɓiɓɓe leydi Rooma, ɓe kuli.
44016039	Ɓe njehi, ɓe tuubonowi Pol'en. Ɓe njoofi ɓe, amma ɓe eeli ɓe, ɓe ndilla nder huɓeere ndeen.
44016040	Wakkati ɓe njoofunoo ɓe, Pol e Silas njehi wuro Lidiya, ɓe kawri goonɗinɓe huɓeere ndeen fuu, ɓe cemmbinɗini ɓe, nden ɓe ndilli.
44017001	Pol e Silas ummii Filipi, tokkiri Amifipolis e Apolloni ngari nder Tesalonika, to Yahudankooɓe ngoodunoo waajordu.
44017002	Pol naati hano no woowrunoo nder waajordu Tesalonika. Nyalaaɗe powteteeɗe tati, o naati, omo haalda he himɓe tawaaɓe nder mayru dow Dewtere Seniine.
44017003	Omo famtina ɓe, omo holla ɓe duu ko Dewtere Seniine wi'i no haani Almasiihu oon torree, nden o ummintinee. Omo wi'a ɓe ko Iisa oo woni Almasiihu oon.
44017004	Nder maɓɓe, woɓɓe ngoonɗini tokki Pol e Silas. Gerekankooɓe heewɓe hulooɓe Alla, he rewɓe heewɓe haalooɓe nanee, tokki ɓe.
44017005	Ɗum monnini Yahudankooɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay ɓeen. Ɓe kawri himɓe ɓe limaaka no goɗɗum nder leydi ndiin, ummina fitina nokku fuu nder huɓeere ndeen. Himɓe ɓee, njehi wuro Yason, ɓe tefi Pol e Silas faa ɓe njaara ɓe yeeso mawɓe huɓeere ndeen.
44017006	Amma ɓe ngiitaay ɓe. Nden ɓe nanngi Yason, he banndiraaɓe mum gom, ɓe njaari yeeso hiitotooɓe ɓeen. Iɓe kuuɓa, iɓe mbi'a : —Himɓe ɓee, umminii hakkillooji duuniyaaru fuu, hannden kamɓe nii wuro meeɗen.
44017007	Yason weerni ɓe wuro mum ! Iɓe ngaɗa kujje ɗe njahdataa he laabi laamorde meeɗen. Ngam iɓe mbi'a ko no woodi laamiiɗo gom bi'eteeɗo Iisa ko hanaa laamiiɗo meeɗen.
44017008	Haalaaji kaalaaɗi ɗii ummini hakkillo hiitotooɓe ɓeen, he wonɓe nder huɓeere ndeen.
44017009	Yason he nanngidaaɓe he mum ɓeen ngaɗaa njoɓi, nden ko ɓe njoofaa.
44017010	Wakkati jenngunoo, goonɗinɓe gom mballi Pol e Silas mburtii Tesalonika, pa'i Bereya. Wakkati ɓe njottinoo Bereya, ɓe naati waajordu Yahudankooɓe gom.
44017011	Yahudankooɓe Bereya no ɓuri Yahudankooɓe Tesalonika jikku ngasungu. Ɓe njaɓɓori haala kaan juuɗe ɗiɗɗiɗi. Wakkati fuu iɓe njannga dewtere Alla ngam faamude se haalaaji Pol he ko dewtere Alla wi'i no njahda.
44017012	Heewɓe nder maɓɓe ngoonɗini Alla. Nder Gerekankooɓe duu worɓe ɗuɓɓe, he rewɓe heewɓe haalooɓe nanee, fuu ngoonɗini.
44017013	Wakkati Yahudankooɓe Tesalonika ɓeen nanunoo ko Pol waajake haala Alla nder Bereya, ɓe ummii Tesalonika ɓe ngari Bereya. Ɓe kuɓɓi hiite hakkune himɓe, ɓe uppi ɓe ngam ɓe murta.
44017014	Wakkati mum da, goonɗinɓe Bereya adi Pol njaari daane maayo, ngam o acca wuro ngoon. Amma Silas e Timote kay, njooɗii.
44017015	Pol e ɗowtirɓe ɗum, naati laana ndiyam ngari Ateena. Nden o lili ɓe, ɓe mbi'a Silas e Timote jaawɗo law law ngara tawa mo Ateena.
44017016	Wakkati Pol doomannoo Silas e Timote nder huɓeere Ateena, ɓerne makko nyawi sanne ngam huɓeere ndeen no heewi tooruuje.
44017017	Nder waajordu Ateena, omo yewtida he Yahudankooɓe, he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe kulooɓe Alla. Wakkatiiji gom omo haalda he himɓe nder hiirirde.
44017018	Nder Ateena jom'en annde luggiɗiɗɗe gom wi'eteeɓe Epikuri'en he Sitoyko'en kaaldi he makko. Wakkati ɓe nanannoo Pol no waajoo dow Iisa e ummitaaki mum, nder maɓɓe woɓɓe no mbi'a : —Ɗume olkoowo oo woni no wi'a ? Woɓɓe duu no mbi'a : —Iɗum nanndi filla diina leyɗe gom.
44017019	Ɓe adi mo ɓe njaari nokkuure wi'eteene Areyopagus, ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i : —Aɗa waawi famtinde min maana jannginooje kese ɗee, ɗe ngonɗaa aɗa janngina ?
44017020	Ngam aɗa haala dow ko min anndaa e ko min meeɗaay nanude abada. Miɗen ngiɗi min paama maana majje.
44017021	Ngam ɓiɓɓe wuro he hoɓɓe tawaaɓe nder Ateena fuu no njewta naa no kettinoo haalaaji kesi ɗii.
44017022	Sey Pol ummii darii caka hawriine Areyopagus, wi'i : —Jama'aare, himɓe Ateena, mi hi'i ko diina no nder ɓerɗe mooɗon sanne.
44017023	Ngam wakkati piiliimi huɓeere mooɗon, mi hi'i kujje ɗe ndewoton, mi hi'i duu no winndaa dow sakkirde mooɗon gom : « Sakkirde deweteeɗo mo anndaaka. » Too miin, mi wari haalande on filla mo ndewoton baa nde tawaama on anndaa mo.
44017024	Alla taguɗo duuniyaaru, he ko woni nder mayru fuu, kam woni jom dow e ley. O walaa nder juulirɗe mawɗe nyiɓiraaɗe juuɗe ɓiɓɓe aadama.
44017025	Walaa fuu ko neɗɗo waawi wallirde mo o wuura, ngam walaa ko njaccani mo. Kanko woni kokkuɗo neɗɗo mbuurnam, foofaango he ko hoddi.
44017026	He neɗɗo gooto o itti lenyi ɗuɗɗi, ɗi mbuura nokku fuu dow leydi. O diidi keeri caka leyɗe, o waɗi wakkati fuu he wakkaade mum.
44017027	Alla waɗaana kujje ɗee fuu ngam himɓe tefa mo. Tawte ɓe memmemtan faa ɓe ngiitowa mo, baa ko o woɗɗaaki neɗɗo meeɗen fuu.
44017028	Ngam baawɗo haala gom wi'i : « Kanko waɗi eɗen mbuura, eɗen ndilla, yonki duu no nder meeɗen. » Waawɓe haala nder mooɗon gom duu, goonga non mbi'i : « Enen duu, to makko ƴuwɗen. »
44017029	Ndenne, nde nii enen duu to makko ƴuwɗen, en kaana nanndinde mo he goɗɗum miilaaɗum waɗiraa kaŋŋe naa cardi naa golle juuɗe ɓiɓɓe aadama.
44017030	Alla nanngirtaa himɓe wakkati ɓe ngonnoo nder majjere. Amma joonin, o wi'i neɗɗo to tawaa fuu tuuba.
44017031	Ngam o itti nyalaane nde o hiitotoo duuniyaaru nduu he dartinaaku. O suɓake kiitotooɗo oon. Wakkati o ummintinnoo neɗɗo mo o suɓii oo, o holli goonga e goonga ko neɗɗo oo woni kiitotooɗo oon.
44017032	Wakkati Gerekankooɓe ɓeen nanunoo ko Alla no waawi ummintina maayɓe, nder maɓɓe woɓɓe no njaltinoo Pol, woɓɓe duu no mbi'a : —Nyannde gom min kettinto haala maa.
44017033	Nden Pol dilli to maɓɓe.
44017034	Nder Gerekankooɓe ɓeen woɓɓe njaɓi tokki Pol, laatii goonɗinɓe. Nder jaɓuɓe tokki ɓeen, no tawa Diyonisiyus jeyaaɗo nder hawriine Areyopagus, debbo gom bi'eteeɗo Damaris, he himɓe gom.
44018001	Pol ummii Ateena dilli fa'i huɓeere Korintu.
44018002	Wakkati o yottinoo Korintu, o fotti Yahudanke Pontus gom bi'eteeɗo Akilas, he deekum Piriskilla, warɓe ƴuwi Rooma, ngam Kalawdiyus, laamiiɗo Rooma mawɗo wi'i Yahudankooɓe fuu mburtoo huɓeere mum. Pol higodiri he maɓɓe,
44018003	jooɗii, ngollidi he maɓɓe, ngam ɓe fuu ɓe waɗooɓe hukumuuji.
44018004	Nyalaane fowteteene fuu omo yewtida Yahudankooɓe e Gerekankooɓe nder waajordu Korintu dow haala Alla. Omo fooɗa hakkillooji maɓɓe, omo tefa jaalaade ɓe, ɓe ngoonɗina Iisa.
44018005	Garki Silas e Timote ƴuwde Makedoniya, hokki Pol laawol wattude semmbe mum fuu he golle waaju, he tabbintinande Yahudankooɓe ko Iisa woni Almasiihu.
44018006	O waajii ɓe amma ɓe calii. Ɓe njeddodiri he makko, ɓe tinni iɓe njenna mo. Nden o ummii, o fiɗɗi kolte makko, o wi'i ɓe : —Juuɗe am he koyɗe am ngalaa hen ! Se on kalki, onon anndani ko'e mon. Ɓaawo hannden mi wartataa to mooɗon, to ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe pa'anmi.
44018007	Pol wurtii waajordu nduun, yehi takkol mayru, wuro mo hanaa Yahudanke gom bi'eteeɗo Titiyus Yustus, gorko kuloowo Alla.
44018008	Kirispus, hooreejo waajordu nduun, he koreeji mum fuu, ngoonɗini Joomiraawo. Himɓe Korintu ɗuɓɓe hettinaniiɓe Pol, ngoonɗini, ngaɗana batisma.
44018009	Jemma gom, Joomiraawo wannginani Pol nder koyɗol, wi'i mo : —Taa hulu, to deƴƴitin, neɗɗo fuu waawanaama goɗɗum, ngam miɗo wondi he maaɗa. Tinna waaja, ngam miɗo woodi himɓe heewɓe nder huɓeere ndee.
44018011	Pol waɗi hitaane he feccere hakkune maɓɓe, omo waajoo, omo janngina haala Alla.
44018012	Nder jamaanu mo Galliyon ardinoo leydi Akaya, Yahudankooɓe ngaɗi haɓɓi-daane dow Pol, ɓe nanngi mo, ɓe njaari yeeso hiitotooɓe leydi ndiin.
44018013	Ɓe peli mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Neɗɗo oo no tefa waylita ko'e himɓe, ɓe ndewa Alla dow laabi ɗi njahdataa he tilsinooje Tawreeta.
44018014	Pol fiirti hunnduko wi'i no yeccoto, sey Galliyon wi'i Yahudankooɓe ɓeen : —Onon Yahudankooɓe, nde nii tawanooma kiite goɗɗum ko dartaaki naa kiite gollal bonngal gom non, nden mi hiitanto on.
44018015	Amma jooni ko nii geddi dow filla karfeeje, filla inɗe he tilsinooje Tawreeta non, ɗum daarataa kam. Mi waawaa hiitanii on.
44018016	O riiwi ɓe nder hiitordu nduun.
44018017	Sey ɓe nanngi Sostenes, hooreejo waajordu Korintu, ɓe ɓocci mo yeeso jama'aare tawaane nder hiitordu nduun. Amma ɗum fuu waɗaay Galliyon wi'a goɗɗum.
44018018	Pol waɗi balɗe nder Korintu no wondi he goonɗinɓe ɓeen. Nden nyannde gom o waynodiri he maɓɓe, o naddi Piriskilla he Akilas laana ndiyam, ɓe pa'i Siriya. Nder Kenkereya Pol tokki finaa-tawaa Yahudankooɓe, o femmbi hoore makko ngam hunayeere nde o waɗannoo Alla.
44018019	Wakkati ɓe njottinoo Efeesu, Pol seedi he Piriskilla e Akilas, naatowi nder waajordu gom. O yewtidi Yahudankooɓe gom.
44018020	Yahudankooɓe ɓeen eeli mo, o waɗana ɓe mbalkoy amma o jaɓaay.
44018021	O wayni ɓe, o wi'i : —Nde Alla jaɓi nyannde gom mi wartan to mooɗon. Nden o naati laana ndiyam, o dilli Efeesu,
44018022	o yottowi Kaysariya. O nyakki Ursaliima, o sanni hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa. Pol ummii Ursaliima, yehi Antiyokiya.
44018023	O waɗi balɗe seɗɗa nder Antiyokiya, nden o dilli. O tokkiri nder Galatiya he Firigiya, omo yaha omo ɓeyda semmbinɗinde aahiiɓe ɓeen fuu.
44018024	Yahudanke dimaaɗo Alekasandiire bi'eteeɗo Apolos, wari Efeesu. Apolos, neɗɗo baawɗo haala non, jom anndal manngal dow Dewtere Alla.
44018025	O janngi laabi tokkol Joomiraawo fuu. Haala Alla no ɓula nder ɓerne makko. Omo waajoroo goonga e goonga huune fuu ko daarata Iisa Almasiihu baa nii ko batisma Yahaaya tan o anndi.
44018026	O tinni omo waajoroo ɓerne worre. Wakkati Piriskilla e Akilas nanunoo haalaaji makko, ɓe adi mo, ɓe njaari wuro maɓɓe, ɓe pamtini mo faa wooɗi laawol tokkol Alla.
44018027	Wakkati Apolos waɗunoo haaju yahde leydi Akaya, banndiraaɓe makko goonɗinɓe cemmbinɗini mo, mbinndani aahiiɓe tawaaɓe toon ɓeen ɗerol ngam ɓe taɓɓitoo mo no wooɗiri. O wari Akaya, nder baawɗe moƴƴere Alla o nafii sanne goonɗinɓe wonɓe Akaya.
44018028	Ngam waawde haala, omo yedda Yahudankooɓe, omo liɓa ɓe yeeso himɓe. Omo tuugo dow haalaaji dewte Ceniiɗe, omo holla himɓe ko sikka fuu walaa Iisa woni Almasiihu mo Joomiraawo suɓii.
44019001	Wakkati Apolos wonnoo huɓeere Korintu nder leydi Akaya, Pol ummii fedditi baamle cakantaraaje ɗeen, wari Efeesu. Nder Efeesu o tawi aahiiɓe gom,
44019002	o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i : —On keɓiino Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wakkati ngoonɗinoɗon naa ? Nden ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i : —Min meeɗaay nanude filla Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
44019003	Pol ƴami ɓe, wi'i kaden : —Ndenne, ir batisma oye ngaɗanaɗon ? Ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i : —Ir batisma Yahaaya.
44019004	Pol wi'i ɓe kaden : —Yahaaya no waɗana tuubuɓe batisma. Omo wi'a ɓiɓɓe Isra'el tuuba, goonɗina garoowo gaɗa mum. Garoowo gaɗa makko oo woni Iisa.
44019005	Wakkati ɓe nanunoo haalaaji Pol ɗii, ɓe ngaɗanaa batisma dow innde Iisa Joomiraawo.
44019006	Nden Pol deki juuɗe dow maɓɓe. Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippii dow maɓɓe, iɓe kaala nder ɗemle feere-fereeje, iɓe ngaɗa annabaaku.
44019007	Nyannde mum, ɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippii dow mum'en no ngaɗa worɓe sappo he ɗiɗo.
44019008	Lebbi tati, nyannde fuu Pol no naata nder waajordu Yahudankooɓe, omo waajoroo ɓerne worre. Omo haalda he hettinaniiɓe mo goonga e goonga, omo fooɗa hakkillooji maɓɓe, omo famtina ɓe dow filla Laamu Alla.
44019009	Amma tiɓɓe-nyireeɓe gom no tawa hakkune aahiiɓe ɓeen, ɓe calii goonɗinde, ɓe tinni iɓe njaltinoo laawol Iisa Almasiihu yeeso jama'aare ndeen. Nden Pol dilli accani ɓe nokkuure ndeen. O dillidi he goonɗinɓe jaɓuɓe tokki Iisa ɓeen. Omo janngina ɓe nyannde fuu nder janngirde Tiranus.
44019010	Duuɓi ɗiɗi omo waajoo faa Yahudanke he mo hanaa Yahudanke leydi Asiya fuu nani haala Joomiraawo.
44019011	Alla waɗi kaayɗe ɗuɗɗe har juuɗe Pol.
44019012	Baa tekkere naa koltal meemungal ɓanndu Pol no adee yaaree, yowee dow nyawɓe, ɓe nyawta. Woodunooɓe ginnaaji, ginnaaji ɗiin no njippo, no takkitoo ɓe.
44019013	Nder Yahudankooɓe, woɓɓe no piiloo nokku warde nokku iɓe ngollira innde Iisa. Iɓe ndiiwa ginnaaji bonɗi dow nyawɓe, iɓe mbi'a : —Nder barke innde Iisa, mo Pol waajotoo haala mum, njippee, takkitee neɗɗo oo !
44019014	Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla gom, Yahudanke bi'eteeɗo Sikewas, ɓiɓɓe mum worɓe jeɗɗo no nder waɗooɓe ir golle ɗee.
44019015	Nyannde gom, ginnaaru gom jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Miɗo anndi Iisa, Pol duu miɗo anndi ɗum. Amma onon, on moy'en ?
44019016	Huune fuu hi'aaka, sey mo ginnaaru nduun woni dow mum oon hippii ɓe, tirfi ɓe semmbe semmbe faa jaali ɓe. O torri ɓe faa ɓe ndoggi, ɓe mburtii suudu nduun ɓalli ɓoli, ɓalli maɓɓe fuu no barmanɗe.
44019017	Jooɗiiɓe Efeesu fuu, Yahudanke he mo hanaa Yahudanke, nani ko waɗi. Kulkulal manngal nanngi ɓe, ɓe fuu, ɓe tinni iɓe teddina innde Iisa Joomiraawo.
44019018	Fuɗɗuɓe goonɗinde ɓeen ngari, no towna daane no kaala gacce ɗe ngaɗunoo.
44019019	Jom'en dobo-dobooji heewɓe ɓotti dewte mum'en, mbuli yeeso himɓe fuu. Dimma ceede dewte bulaaɗe ɗeen, no ngaɗa tammaaje cardi ujunaaji woygu.
44019020	Nii waɗi ko haala Joomiraawo sankitii, kaa ɓeydi semmbe har baawɗe makko.
44019021	Gaɗa fii ɓiɓɓe Sikewas, Pol anniyi tokkira Makedoniya e Akaya, nden wara Ursaliima. O wi'i duu : —Nde nii mi yottake Ursaliima, tilay mi yaha Rooma.
44019022	Sey o lili Timote e Erastus, gollidooɓe he makko gom nder Makedoniya, kanko duu, o jooɗii Asiya balɗe seɗɗa.
44019023	Gaɗa dilludu Timote e Erastus, Pol tinni no janngina nder huɓeere ndeen. Nyannde gom, ngam sabbu laawol Iisa Almasiihu ngol Pol woni no janngina, fitina mawɗo gom ummii nder Efeesu.
44019024	Bahillo ciiwoowo cardi gom bi'eteeɗo Demetirus no siiwa cuuroy cardi nanndukoy he suudu to Artemis, tooruure maɓɓe rewetee. Golle ɗee no ngaddana mo ceede sanne, kanko he siiwooɓe ɓeen fuu.
44019025	Nyannde gom, o hawri gollidooɓe he makko, he waɗooɓe ir golle ɗee, o wi'i ɓe : —Banndiraaɓe, oɗon anndi ko nder golle ɗee, keɓal meeɗen tawa.
44019026	Oɗon ngi'a, oɗon nana ko woni no waɗa. Pol wi'i himɓe heewɓe ko tooruuje ɗee, ɗe ngonɗen eɗen ngaɗa kanaa goonga. Hanaa nder Efeesu ɗo tan o wi'i ɗum, amma nder leydi Asiya fuu. Himɓe heewɓe njaɓi haala makko. O wi'i duu ko kujje deweteeɗe, moƴƴiniraaɗe juuɗe ɓiɓɓe aadama kanaa ko neɗɗo rewata.
44019027	Nde nii ɗum soƴƴoraaki gaɗa fuu, too ɗum biisan en. Himɓe tottitittoo Artemis tooruure teddinaane, nde leydi Asiya e duuniyaaru fuu rewi. Ɓe mboppa suudu dewal mayre.
44019028	Haalaaji Demetirus ɗii uppi wahilɓe ɓeen fuu. Ɓe tinni iɓe kuuɓa, iɓe mbi'a : —Artemis nder Efeesu, deweteeɗo mawɗo non ! Artemis nder Efeesu, deweteeɗo mawɗo non !
44019029	Fitina oo sankitii nder huɓeere ndeen fuu. Ɓe nanngi yahdiraaɓe Pol, Gayus e Aristarkus ɓiɓɓe leydi Makedoniya, ɓe pa'idi ɓe hiirirde Efeesu.
44019030	Pol hiɗiino haalda he jama'aare ndeen amma aahiiɓe ɓeen kaɗi mo.
44019031	Gollooɓe mawɓe wonɓe leydi Asiya, laatiiɓe higiraaɓe makko ngaɗii baa lilaaɗo wi'a mo to o fantu hiirirde ndeen.
44019032	Jama'aare ndeen njiiɓi, woɓɓe no kuuɓa no mbi'a ɗum, woɓɓe duu ko kuuɓata no mbi'a no feere, faa ko heewi anndaa ko waddi ɗum'en. Na'i nii ndiggi gaɗa be'i.
44019033	Nder jama'aare ndeen, woɓɓe njehi kaalanowi Skandaaru, gorko mo Yahudankooɓe ardini. Skandaaru ɓanti junngo ngam wi'ude kam no hiɗi haalda he jama'aare ndeen.
44019034	Amma wakkati jama'aare ndeen faamunoo ko kanko he hoore makko o Yahudanke, ɓe tinni iɓe kuuɓa faa ɗum waɗi jamɗe ɗiɗi iɓe pota, iɓe mbi'a : —Artemis nder Efeesu, deweteeɗo mawɗo non !
44019035	Nden hunnduko ardiiɗo huɓeere ndeen heɓi deƴƴini ɓe, wi'i : —Ɓii-Efeesu walaa mo anndaa, ko Efeesu woni hijjorde dewooɓe Artemis, deweteeɗo mawɗo. Hayre makko ƴuwne dow nder Efeesu woni. Neɗɗo fuu duu no anndani ɗum.
44019036	Walaa baawɗo yeddi haala kaa. Ndenne oɗon kaani ndeƴƴon, pukkinon hakkillooji mooɗon.
44019037	Worɓe ɓee, ɓe ngadduɗon ɗo, mbujjaay gineeji Artemis, ɓe njennaay mo duu.
44019038	Nde nii Demetirus he banndiraaɓe mum siiwooɓe cardi no ngoodi ko njukkirta goɗɗo, no woodi to ɓe kaani ɓe njaha, he wakkati mo ɓe kaani yahde. To hiitotooɓe ɓe kaani yahde amma hanaa ɗo.
44019039	Nde nii tawaama duu oɗon ngoodi ko ngiɗɗon kaalon naa ƴamon, ɗum ndaretee nder hawriine laamu.
44019040	Ngam nde nii en kakkilaaki, en adetee hano hiɗuɓe murtude. Walaa fuu ko waawi hollude goongaaku kawrol mooɗon ɗo. En ngalaa duu ko woodi semmbe ko kaaleten nde nii en ƴamaama. Ndenne kootee, mi sallimake on.
44019041	Haalaaji ɗii ngoni ko hunndukoojo ardiiɗo Efeesu haalani ɓe ko ɓe cankitii.
44020001	Wakkati fitina Efeesu oon hantunoo, Pol hawri aahiiɓe ɓeen, semmbinɗini ɓe, nden wayni ɓe, dilli fa'i Makedoniya.
44020002	Wakkati o warunoo Makedoniya, o semmbinɗini goonɗinɓe toon ɓeen har yewtereeji makko keewɗi. Nden o dilli o fa'i leydi Geres.
44020003	O jooɗii Geres lebbi tati. Wakkati o naatannoo laana yahde Siriya, o nani ko Yahudankooɓe ngaɗi haɓɓi-daane dow makko. Nden o anniyi soƴƴaade Makedoniya.
44020004	Omo wondi Sopater ɓii-Pirrus jeyaaɗo Bereya, Aristarkus, Sekundus jeyaaɓe Tesalonika, Gayus jeyaaɗo Derbe. Timote, Tikikus e Torofimus jeyaaɓe leydi Asiya duu no ngondi he makko.
44020005	Ɓe ngoni ardiiɓe, ndoomowi min, minen e Pol nder Torowas.
44020006	Gaɗa Juulɗe buuru mo walaa ƴuufinirɗum, min ummii, min naati laana yahde Filipi. Balɗe joy gaɗa mum min kewti Torowas, min ngaɗi jeɗɗiire toon.
44020007	Asawe futuro wakkati min nyaamannoo hiraane seniine, min fuu, min kawri nder suudu dowuuru, miɗen nyaama. Fitillaaji ɗuɗɗi kuɓɓaa nder mayru. Sey Pol kaanuɗo dilla nde weeti alal, ummii no waajoo faa yottii caka jemma.
44020009	Pol junni waaju mum sanne, tawi jokolle gom bi'eteeɗo Ewtikus no jooɗii dow finetere. O ŋoŋi faa o ɗaanii. Ɗoyngol makko moddi sey o ɓiltii illa finetere suudu tataɓuru nduun, o saami. Ko himɓe ngara ada mo, tawi o maayi.
44020010	Nden Pol jippii, turii dow makko, wunndii mo, no wi'a himɓe pukkina hakkillooji mum'en, o maayaay, nden ummintini mo he maayde.
44020011	Pol ƴeenyi, taƴi buuru, nyaami, warti, waajii faa weeti, nden dilli.
44020012	Jokolle oon horraa no wuuri. Ɗum fukkini ɓerɗe maɓɓe sanne.
44020013	Pol anniyi yahde Asos he koyɗe, nden min ardi, min naati laana yahde Asos to Pol tawoyta min.
44020014	Wakkati o tawi min Asos, min naddi laana, min pa'i Mitilene.
44020015	Min ummii Mitilene, jaangoore mum min ngari daane duune Kiyos. Min ummii Kiyos, weeti min ngari takkol duune Samos. Min ummii Samos, min ndilli nyalooma gooto, nden min ngari Miletus.
44020016	Pol hiɗaa daraade Efeesu, ngam to o ɓooyu nder Asiya. Omo hari, nyalaane Juulɗe kettol alkamaari bi'eteeɗe Pentakota ngara, tawa omo Ursaliima.
44020017	Nder Miletus Pol waɗi lilaaɓe noddowa ardiiɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe Efeesu.
44020018	Wakkati ɓe ngarnoo, o wi'i ɓe : —Oɗon anndi, illa hanaa hannden no njooɗoriimi hakkune mooɗon illa garki am arani nder Asiya.
44020019	Mi gollani Joomiraawo nder leesinaaku, nder mettal ɓerne e torra, wakkati haɓɓi-daaneeji Yahudankooɓe gaɗaaɗi dow am.
44020020	Oɗon anndi ko mi suuɗaay on, huune fuu waawde nafude on. Mi waajake on, mi janngini on hakkune himɓe he nder ɓaadeeji mooɗon.
44020021	Mi holli Yahudanke e mo hanaa Yahudanke fuu tuuba, ngoonɗina Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen.
44020022	Joonin, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo tilsini kam mi yaha Ursaliima, mi anndaa ko hewtoytoo kam toon.
44020023	Amma ko anndumi woni, nder huɓeere fuu, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hollii kam ko torra e kasu ndoomi kam.
44020024	Amma miin kay, mi daaraay yonki am goɗɗum. Golle waajaade Habaru lobbo he moƴƴere Alla, ko Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen halfini kam, kam woni ko ngiɗumi humnude no wooɗiri.
44020025	Jooni miɗo anndi ko on ngi'ataa kam kaden, onon ɓe hakkune mum'en mbaajiimi Habaru lobbo oo.
44020026	Ngam majjum waɗi nder daane toowne, miɗo wi'a on : Nde gooto nder mooɗon seli laawol, hanaa gacce am non.
44020027	Ngam mi waajake on dow siri mo Alla waɗani ɓiɓɓe aadama fuu, walaa fuu ko cuuɗumi on.
44020028	Kakkilee he ko'e mooɗon, ndeenee njawdi ndi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo halfini on. Laatoɗon durooɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe Alla. Iisa mursi yonki mum ngam hisinde nde.
44020029	Miɗo anndi ko gaɗa am ir bonɓe ɓee, ɓe guri dawaaɗi, keppataa naatude hakkune mooɗon, ɓe accataa hawriine ndeen duu.
44020030	Baa hakkune mooɗon, no waɗan fenooɓe ngam pooɗa aahiiɓe gom tokka ɗum'en.
44020031	Kakkilee ndenne, miccitee ko duuɓi tati nii, jemma e nyalooma miɗo fooɗa noppi mooɗon dow maɓɓe. Miɗo woyana on ɗum wakkati fuu.
44020032	Jooni, mi halfini on he Alla e haala mum moƴƴuka. Haala ngooduka baawɗe sinngude hawriine mooɗon. Har makka duu Alla no waawi hokki on ndonngu ngu o fodani seniiɓe makko.
44020033	Mi suunaaka ceede, kaŋŋe naa koltal neɗɗo mooɗon fuu.
44020034	Oɗon anndi ko juuɗe am ngollirmi faa keɓumi ko mbuuriranmi he ko fiirti haajuuji wonduɓe he am.
44020035	Mi holli on duu ko oɗon kaani gollude ngam wallude ɓe ngalaa baawɗe. Mi holli on duu ko oɗon kaani miccitaade haalaaji ɗi Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen haali, wakkati o wi'unoo : « Kokkuɗo no ɓuran kokkaaɗo welwelo. »
44020036	Nden Pol hofidii he maɓɓe, du'ii.
44020037	Ɗum nanngi ɓerɗe maɓɓe faa gonɗi no mbanjanoo ɓe. Ɓe kippi dow makko, iɓe mbunndoo mo ngam hollude mo enɗam.
44020038	Ɓerɗe maɓɓe mboni. Amma ko ɓuri bonnude ɓerɗe maɓɓe woni ko Pol wi'i ɓe ngi'ataa ɗum kaden. Ɓe ɗowtiri mo faa to laana kaan.
44021001	Wakkati min ceedunoo he maɓɓe, min naati laana ndiyam, min pa'i duune Kos. Jaangoore mum min ummii Kos, min ngari duune Rodos. Min ƴuwi Rodos, min ngari Patara.
44021002	Nder Patara min tawi laana gom njehooka Finisi. Nden min naati ka, min ndilli.
44021003	Wakkati min njottinoo to neɗɗo hollirta duune Kipurus, min acci nde nano amin, min pa'i har leydi Siriya. Wakkati min ngarnoo Tirus, min ndarii ɗon ngam laana kaan no haani jippinde gineeji gom.
44021004	Nder Tirus, min tawi aahiiɓe gom, min njoddii he maɓɓe jeɗɗiire. Nder baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo iɓe mbi'a Pol to yehu Ursaliima.
44021005	Wakkati jeɗɗiire amin huuɓunoo, min nanngi laawol. Goonɗinɓe Tirus ɓeen ɗowtiri min : Kamɓe, deekiraaɓe maɓɓe e ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe fuu faa min mburtii huɓeere ndeen. Minen he maɓɓe, min fuu min kofi daane maayo ngoon, min ndu'ii.
44021006	Min mbaynodiri he maɓɓe, min naati laana, kamɓe duu ɓe coƴƴi gaɗa koyɗe maɓɓe.
44021007	Wakkati min ngarnoo nder Potolemayis, min cannowi goonɗinɓe tawaaɓe nder huɓeere ndeen. Min nyallidi he maɓɓe, nyalooma oon fuu.
44021008	Jaangoore mum, min ummii Potolemayis, min ngari Kaysariya. Min njippi wuro baajotooɗo Habaru lobbo gom bi'eteeɗo Filipa, gooto nder jeɗɗo suɓaaɓe nder Ursaliima.
44021009	Filipa no woodi ɓiɓɓe rewɓe nayo, surbaaɓe waɗooɓe annabaaku.
44021010	Min ngaɗi balɗe toon. Nder balɗe mum, annabiijo gom bi'eteeɗo Agabus ƴuwi Yahudiya,
44021011	wari tawi min Kaysariya, o adi tunndorgol Pol, o haɓɓi koyɗe makko e juuɗe makko, o wi'i : —Ɗum woni ko Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i : « Nder huɓeere Ursaliima Yahudankooɓe no nanngan jom tunndorgol ngool, kaɓɓa mo hano no kaɓɓirmi hoore am nii, nden ɓe ngatta mo nder juuɗe ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe. »
44021012	Wakkati min nanunoo haala kaa, minen he himɓe Kaysariya, min eeli Pol to yaha Ursaliima.
44021013	Amma o jaabii, o wi'i : —Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon mboya ? Accee to on taƴee ɓerne am. Mi hulataa haɓɓeede naa wareede nder Ursaliima ngam sabbu Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen.
44021014	Ngam min mbaawaay surude mo, min tinnanaay mo, amma min mbi'i : —Joomiraawo wonnu.
44021015	Wakkati min ngaɗunoo balɗe seɗɗa nder Kaysariya, min ciryii, nden min pa'i Ursaliima.
44021016	Aahiiɓe gom ɗowtiri min, ɓe njaari min to Manason jeyaaɗo Kipurus, aahiijo Iisa arano gom. Kanko haani werna min.
44021017	Wakkati min njottinoo Ursaliima, goonɗinɓe huɓeere ndeen taɓɓitii min no wooɗiri.
44021018	Jaangoore mum, ardiiɓe kawrital goonɗinɓe kawri wuro Yakuuba, Pol tokki min yehi toon.
44021019	Pol sanni tawaaɓe toon fuu, nden fillanii ɓe huune fuu ko Alla waɗi hakkune ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe daliila golle mum.
44021020	Wakkati ɓe nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, ɓe teddini Alla. Nden ɓe mbi'i Pol : —A hi'i naa banndiraawo, Yahudankooɓe ujunaaji ujunaaji ngoonɗini Iisa, amma iɓe ngiɗi tokkol Tawreeta sanne.
44021021	Ɓe nani duu, ko a waajake Yahudankooɓe jooɗiiɓe nokku nokkuuje fuu ngam ɓe mboppa Tawreeta, mbi'uɗaa ɓe to ɓe njuulnu sukaaɓe maɓɓe, to ɓe tokku finaa-tawaaji maɓɓe.
44021022	Ɗume ngatten jooni ? Tabbat ɓe nanan ko a wari, aɗa ɗo.
44021023	Ndenne waɗu ko min mbi'ete. Himɓe nayo gom nii wonɓe hakkune amin, waɗanɓe Alla alkawal.
44021024	Adu ɓe yaaru, ngaɗidon gaba go'o ko Tawreeta wi'i waɗee ngam laataade laaɓuɓe. Njoɓaa ɓe pemmbee, ɓe laatoo laaɓuɓe. Nde nii a waɗi kujje ɗee, too no faametee ko woni no wi'ee dow maaɗa ɗum baa gootel hanaa goonga. Amma aan he hoore maa a tokkuɗo Tawreeta.
44021025	Har ko ndaarata goonɗinɓe Iisa ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, min mbinndanii ɓe dow ko min kawri, min njardii kam woni : Ɓe kaanaa nyaamude tewu cakkanaangu tooruuje, ƴiiƴam, ko saaɗi, ɓe paddo ko'e maɓɓe he golle jaayɗe hano jeenu.
44021026	Nden Pol yahdi he worɓe ɓeen. Jaangoore mum, ɓe ngaɗidi huune fuu ko diina Yahudankooɓe tilsini ngam laaɓinde hoore mum. Gaɗa majjum o yehi nder Juulirde mawne, o haalani himɓe nyalaane nde laaɓinol ngool timmata, he wakkati mo sadaka neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu waɗetee.
44021027	Wakkati jeɗɗiire laaɓinol ngool ɓadinoo huuɓude, sey Yahudankooɓe gom ƴuwɓe Asiya ngi'ii Pol nder Juulirde mawne ndeen. Ɓe uppi jama'aare ndeen nannga mo.
44021028	Iɓe kuuɓa, iɓe mbi'a : —Isra'ilankooɓe ! Paabee, nanngee neɗɗo gonɗo no waajoo nokku fuu no wi'a ko lenyi meeɗen, Tawreeta e Juulirde meeɗen mawne kanaa goonga. Kanko nii naatidi he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe nder Juulirde meeɗen. Ɓe tunnini nokkuure meeɗen seniine !
44021029	Ngam ɓe ngi'idi Pol e Torofimus jeyaaɗo Efeesu nder Ursaliima, iɓe miila duu ko Pol nannii mo nder Juulirde ndeen.
44021030	Himɓe Ursaliima fuu ummii ngari. Ɓe nanngi Pol, ɓe mburtini ɓaade Juulirde mawne ndeen. Ɓe ommbii law law dammbule ɓaade ndeen.
44021031	Wakkati ɓe tefannoo warude mo, himɓe gom ndoggi kaalanowi mawɗo soogeeji Rooma mbi'i ko Ursaliima fuu irbodiri.
44021032	Nden o ummii sabbat, o hooƴi soogeeji gom e mawɓe mum'en, o fa'i to jama'aare ndeen. Wakkati himɓe kollirnoo mawɗo soogeeji ɗiin he soogeeji mum, ɓe acci piiɗe Pol.
44021033	Mawɗo soogeeji ɗiin ɓadii Pol, hokki callali ɗiɗi, wi'i Pol nanngee, haɓɓiree ɗi. Nden o ƴami jama'aare ndeen, moy woni gorko oo ? Ɗume o waɗi ?
