44021034	Nder jama'aare ndeen woɓɓe no mbi'a ɗum, woɓɓe duu no mbi'a ɗumtoo. Olko himɓe haɗi hooreejo soogeeji ɗiin faamude hoore haalaaji maɓɓe. Nden o wi'i Pol yaaree nder kaliyol soogeeji gom.
44021035	Sey himɓe fuu tokki Pol, no kuuɓa, no mbi'a : —Mbaree mo ! Mbaree mo ! Wakkati Pol yottinoo ƴencirgal suudu nduun, ngam sabbu fitina jama'aare ndeen, soogeeji ɗiin ƴetti mo nanni nder mayru.
44021037	Wakkati Pol nannetenoo nder kaliyol soogeeji ngool, sey o wi'i hooreejo maggol nder gerekankoore : —Miɗo waawi yeccaade naa ? Nden o jaabii Pol, o wi'i : —Oo ? Aɗa waawi gerekankoore naa ?
44021038	Ndenne hanaa aan woni ɓii-Misira, mo balɗe jawtuɗe murtini himɓe, ardi murtuɓe ujunaaji nayo, naddi he maɓɓe nder ladde yeeruure ?
44021039	Pol wi'i mo : —Miin, mi Yahudanke Tarsus, huɓeere nde suuɗaaki, nder leydi Silisi. Mi eeli ma, acca mi haalda he himɓe ɓee.
44021040	Nden hooreejo soogeeji ɗiin hokki mo laawol haaldude he maɓɓe. Pol darii dow ƴencirgal ngal, ɓantani jama'aare ndeen junngo wi'i ɓe kettinoo. Wakkati himɓe fuu ndeƴƴunoo, Pol fuɗɗi haala mum nder aramankoore, wi'i :
44022001	—Banndiraaɓe am e baabiraaɓe am, kettinee ko ngiɗumi haalande on ngam lamnude hoore am.
44022002	Wakkati ɓe nanunoo Pol haali aramankoore, ɓe ngaɗi siw ɓe ndeƴƴiti. Pol itti hunnduko wi'i :
44022003	—Miin, mi Yahudanke, mi rimaama Tarsus nder leydi Silisi. Amma Ursaliima mawnumi. Gamaliyel janngini kam. To makko njanngumi Tawreeta faa laaɓi tar. Miɗo wakkili he Alla hano no mbakkiliriɗon on fuu hannden he makko.
44022004	Mi jooɗake miɗo torra tokkuɓe laawol Iisa Almasiihu faa ɗum yottani ɓe he maayde. Mi nanngi worɓe e rewɓe goonɗinɓe Iisa, mi uddi.
44022005	Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla e mawɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa fuu no ceedanoo kam, kam'en duu. Kamɓe he ko'e maɓɓe kokki kam ɗerol ngam mi heɓa laawol yahde to banndiraaɓe meeɗen Yahudankooɓe wonɓe Damas. Nden njehumi ngam haɓɓoyde goonɗinɓe Iisa, mi wadda ɓe Ursaliima ɓe njukkee.
44022006	Wooɗi, ummiimi, pa'umi Damas faa ɓadiimi. Caka nyalooma, wakkati gooto, sey annuura mawɗo gom ƴuwi dow, saami dow am, fiilii kam.
44022007	Caamumi, sey nanumi daane gom no wi'a kam : « Sol ! Sol ! Ko waɗi aɗa torra kam ? »
44022008	Nden njaabiimi, mbi'umi : « Joomiraawo ! Aan woni moy ? » Sey nde wi'i kam : « Miin woni Iisa mo Nasaratu, mo ngonɗaa aɗa torra oon. »
44022009	Nden, mbi'umi : « Joomiraawo, ɗume ngaɗanmi ? » Sey Joomiraawo wi'i kam : « Umma, yehu Damas. Toon, a haalantee fuu ko haani ngaɗaa. » Wonduɓe he am ɓeen ngi'ii annuura oon, amma ɓe nanaay daane haaldude he am ndeen.
44022011	Ƴelkitol annuura ngool wumni kam, nden ɓe ɗowi kam, ɓe njaari nder Damas.
44022012	Nder Damas no tawa gorko kuloowo Alla gom, tokkuɗo Tawreeta bi'eteeɗo Ananiyas. Filla golle makko lobbe no dow ɗemle Yahudankooɓe Damas fuu.
44022013	Sey o wari, o darii yeeso am, o wi'i kam : « Banndam Sol, wumtu ! » Wakkati mum da, mbumtumi, ngi'umoomi.
44022014	Nden o wi'i kam : « Alla maamiraaɓe meeɗen suɓake ma ngam paama muuyɗe mum, ngi'aa Dartiiɗo, nanaa daane makko,
44022015	ngam a seedantoo mo yeeso himɓe fuu dow ko ngi'uɗaa e ko nanuɗaa.
44022016	Joonin, ko ndoomuɗaa ! Umma, ngaɗaneɗaa batisma, nodda innde Joomiraawo hakkeeji maaɗa njaafee. »
44022017	Wakkati coƴƴiimi Ursaliima, nyannde gom miɗo du'oo nder Juulirde Ursaliima mawne, sey kollaami, ngi'umi,
44022018	Joomiraawo no wi'a kam : « Yawɗa, mburtoɗaa Ursaliima, ngam himɓe huɓeere ndeen njaɓataa seedaaku fuu ngu ngaɗata dow am. »
44022019	Nden njaabiimi, mbi'umi : « Yaa Joomiraawo, iɓe anndi ko miɗo naatannoo nder baajorɗi, miɗo nannga himɓe, miɗo udda. Miɗo fiya ɓe ngam ɓe ngoonɗini ma.
44022020	Nyannde Etiyen goonɗinɗo ma waraa, miɗo darii, maayde makko welii kam. Miin duu doomi kolte warɓe mo ɓeen. »
44022021	Sey Joomiraawo jaabii kam, wi'i kaden : « Umma, wurta, mi lilete faa to woɗɗi, to ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe. »
44022022	Wakkati jama'aare ndeen nanunoo konngol « mi lilete faa to woɗɗi, to ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe » wurtii nder hunnduko Pol, sey ɓe ƴetti daaɗe maɓɓe dow, ɓe poti, ɓe mbi'i : —Mbaree mo, ittee mo nder duuniyaaru nduu ! O haanaa wuurude sam !
44022023	Ɓe tinni, iɓe kuuɓa, iɓe itta kolte maɓɓe, iɓe mbicca leydi.
44022024	Nden hooreejo soogeeji leydi Rooma hokki laawol Pol yaaree nder kaliyol mum'en, o ɓoccee heɓa faamee ko waɗi jama'aare ndeen no huuɓa ngam makko.
44022025	Wakkati ɓe kaɓɓunoo Pol faa o ɓoccee, sey o wi'i soogeeru mawnu wonndu ɗon gom : —Ɓii-Rooma mo hiitanaaka ngiɗɗon ɓoccude fa. Iɗum dagii duu nii ?
44022026	Wakkati soogeeru nduun nanunoo ko Pol wi'i ɗum, o yehi to mawɗo maɓɓe, o wi'i : —Aɗa anndi ko anniyiɗaa wadde naa ? Gorko oo no ɓii-Rooma !
44022027	Nden mawɗo soogeeji ɗiin wari to Pol, ƴami mo, wi'i : —Mbiiɗaa a ɓii-Rooma naa ? Pol jaabii mo, wi'i : —Ayyo, mi ɓii-Rooma !
44022028	Nden mawɗo soogeeji ɗiin, wi'i mo : —Ceede re'ataa njoɓumi ko laatiimi ɓii-Rooma. Sey Pol wi'i mo : —Miin, mi fini tawumi mi ɓii-Rooma.
44022029	Nden anniyiiɓe ɓocca Pol ɓeen takkiti mo. Wakkati hooreejo soogeeji ɗiin duu faamoynoo ko ɓii-Rooma nanngi haɓɓi, kulkulal nanngi mo faa noy walaa.
44022030	Nyannde mawɗo soogeeji Rooma faamunoo ko Pol no ɓii-Rooma, o naati tefude maana ko waɗi mawɓe Yahudankooɓe no tuuma Pol. Jaangoore mum, o noddi mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla e hawriine hiitotooɓe potta. O waɗi Pol haɓɓitee waddee daroo yeeso maɓɓe.
44023001	Pol wari darii yeeso hawriine ndeen, wi'i : —Banndiraaɓe, nyannde ummiimi warde hannden mbuurnam am fuu mi wattaana ɗum naa nder golle Joomiraawo, nder miilo lamngo.
44023002	Sey Ananiyas, mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla wi'i dariiɓe hadde Pol ɓeen, teɓɓa hunnduko Pol.
44023003	Nden Pol jaabii Ananiyas wi'i mo : —Aan Alla teɓɓata, aan ŋata-fuufowel ! Aan ! Aɗa jooɗii faa kiitoɗaa kam dow tilsinooje Tawreeta, dey piirta hunnduko mbi'aa mi fiyee. Haalanam toy ɗum winndaa naa ɗum wi'aa nder Tawreeta ?
44023004	Darinooɓe hadde makko ɓeen ndoofi mbi'i mo : —Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla, mo Alla suɓii njennataa naa ?
44023005	Pol jaabii ɓe, wi'i : —Banndiraaɓe, mi faamaay ko o mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla. Miɗo anndi ko no winndaa wi'aa : To yennu ardiiɗo mooɗon !
44023006	Pol no anndi ko nder hiitotooɓe ɓeen, woɓɓe no Sadduki'en, woɓɓe no Fariisa'en, ngam majjum waɗi nder daane toowne, o wi'i : —Banndiraaɓe, miin mi Farisaajo, ɓii-Farisaajo. Ngam mi tabbintini ko ummitaaki no goonga, waɗi miɗo hiitee !
44023007	Wakkati Pol haalunoo haala kaa, geddi ummii hakkune Fariisa'en e Sadduki'en, sey hawriine ndeen fecci.
44023008	Sadduki'en no mbi'a ko ummitaaki walaa, maleykaaɓe ngalaa, ruuhuuji duu ngalaa. Fariisa'en duu no ngoonɗini ko kujje ɗee fuu no ngoodi.
44023009	Ɓe tinni iɓe olka, faa olko maɓɓe mawni. Sey jannginooɓe Tawreeta gom wonduɓe he Fariisa'en, ndoofi no mbi'a : —Walaa fuu ko boni ko min ngi'ii he gorko oo ! No waawi taweede ruuhu naa maleykaajo haaldi he makko !
44023010	Geddi ndiin mawni hakkune maɓɓe faa mawɗo soogeeji ɗiin huli to ɓe ciccitta Pol. Sey o waɗi soogeeji ɗiin njippoo, itta Pol nder juuɗe himɓe ɓeen, njaara mo nder kaliyol mum'en.
44023011	Pol nannaa nder kaliyol ngool. Joomiraawo wanngani mo nder jemma, wi'i mo : —Taa hulu ! No ceedoraniɗaa kam Ursaliima nii, no tilsi duu ceedanoɗaa kam nder Rooma.
44023012	Pol waali nder kaliyol soogeeji Rooma, weeti Yahudankooɓe gom duu kawri ngaɗi haɓɓi-daane, kuni ko kam'en nyaamataa, kam'en njarataa se hanaa kam'en keɓu mbari Pol non.
44023013	Yahudankooɓe kuniiɓe ɓeen ɓuri lasooji ɗiɗo.
44023014	Ɓe ummii ɓe njehi to mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla e mawɓe Yahudankooɓe, ɓe mbi'i ɗum'en : —Min kunorake Alla ko min nyaamataa, min njarataa, se hanaa min keɓu Pol min mbari non.
44023015	Joonin, onon he hawriine dawrooɓe, ummee njehee to mawɗo soogeeji Rooma mbi'on mo, o waɗa Pol waddee, ƴamon ƴamton mo, ngam kiite makko ngaɗa no haaniri. Minen duu, min mbaran mo fadde makko yottaade to mooɗon.
44023016	Ɓii sakiike Pol debbo nani filla haɓɓi-daane ndeen, sey o yehi nder kaliyol soogeeji ngool, o naati, o haalani Pol filla haɓɓi-daane ndeen fuu.
44023017	Pol noddi soogeeru mawnu gom, wi'i ndu : —Miɗo hiɗi njaaranaa kam suka gorko oo to mawɗo mooɗon, ngam no woodi ko o hiɗi haalande mo.
44023018	Soogeeru mawnu nduun yaari mo to mawɗo mum'en, wi'i mo : —Uddaaɗo bi'eteeɗo Pol eeli kam mi wadda suka gorko oo to maaɗa, ngam no woodi ko o hiɗi haalande ma.
44023019	Nden mawɗo soogeeji oon nanngi junngo suka oon, towtidi seɗɗa he makko, ƴami mo wi'i : —Ɗume ngiɗaa kaalanaa kam ?
44023020	Sey suka oon fiirti hunnduko, wi'i mo : —Yahudankooɓe gom kawri faa ngara eele jaaŋo ngadanaa ɗum'en Pol yeeso hawriine dawrooɓe. Ɓe mbi'etee ko kam'en no ngiɗi daarude fii Pol oon no wooɗiri.
44023021	Amma to njaɓu. Ngam ko waɗata, Yahudankooɓe lasooji ɗiɗo tunnan Pol. Ɓe kunorake Alla ko ɓe nyaamataa, ɓe njarataa nde kam'en mbaraay Pol. Jooni ɓe ciryake, ko mbi'ataa tan ɓe ndoomi.
44023022	Nden hooreejo soogeeji oon wi'i suka gorko oon : —War hootu dey ŋata hunnduko maa deƴƴa, taa haalan baa gooto ko mbi'uɗaa kam ɗum.
44023023	Wakkati mawɗo soogeeji Rooma nannoo ko suka oon wi'unoo ɗum dow haɓɓi-daane mo Yahudankooɓe ngaɗi dow Pol, o noddi soogeeji makko mawɗi ɗiɗi gom, o wi'i ɗi : —Kawree worɓe keme ɗiɗo, waɗɗotooɓe pucci lasooji tati e sappo e jom'en labbe keme ɗiɗo. Ciryoɗon jamɗe jeenay hannden jemma,
44023024	kirkinon pucci, njaaron Pol no wooɗiri yeeso Filiki guferner Kaysariya.
44023025	O winndi ɗerol o hokki ɓe. Nder maggol o wi'i :
44023026	—Filiki guferner tedduɗo, miin Kalawdiyus Lisiya, miɗo yewte.
44023027	Gorko mo lildanmaami oo, Yahudankooɓe nanngi mo, kuni sey mbara mo. Wakkati paamoymi o ɓii-Rooma, naatumi, miin e sewre soogeeji am, coptinmoomi.
44023028	Ngam miɗo hiɗi faamude ko ɓe pelirta mo, nanngumoomi ngaddumi yeeso hawriine dawrooɓe.
44023029	Sey tawumi ko dow fii Tawreeta maɓɓe tan, ɓe pelirta mo, ndenne gacce makko fotaay o waree naa o uddee.
44023030	Gaɗa mum, nanumi kaden Yahudankooɓe kawri, ngaɗi haɓɓi-daane faa mbara mo. Ɗum waɗi ko lildumoomi jooni to maa. Mi tilsini felooɓe mo ɓeen duu ngara to maa, pela mo toon.
44023031	Soogeeji ɗiin ngaɗi ko mbi'aa. Ɓe ciryii, ɓe mburtodi Pol jamɗe jeenay jemma mum, ɓe njaari mo faa Antipatiris.
44023032	Waali weeti jaangoore mum, worɓe keme ɗiɗo ɓeen e jom'en labbe ɓeen coƴƴi Ursaliima nder kaliyol mum'en. Waɗɗiiɓe pucci ɓeen njaari Pol Kaysariya.
44023033	Wakkati ɓe njottinoo Kaysariya ndeen, ɓe kokki guferner oon ɗerol binndaangol ngool, ɓe ngatti Pol nder juuɗe makko.
44023034	Guferner oon janngi ɗerol ngool, nden ƴami Pol wi'i : « Toy njeyaɗaa ? » Pol jaabii mo wi'i : « Leydi Silisi. »
44023035	Nden o wi'i Pol : —Mi noddete nde nii felooɓe ma ngari. O hokki laawol Pol faddee nder laamorde Hirudus.
44024001	Balɗe joy gaɗa garki Pol nder Kaysariya, Ananiyas mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla kam duu wari nder Kaysariya. Omo wondi he mawɓe gom, omo wondi duu he Tertullus neɗɗo jannguɗo laabi kiite leydi Rooma ngam tettinde himɓe nder kiite. Ɓe fuu ɓe ngaraana ngam felude Pol yeeso guferner oon.
44024002	Pol noddaa wari darii yeeso Filiki. Tertullus fuɗɗi felude mo, fiirti hunnduko wi'i : —Alla sabbinane guferner ! Sabbu maaɗa, e laabi kesi ɗi ndarnuɗaa nder jamaanu maaɗa waɗi jam jippii hakkune amin.
44024003	Nokku fuu aɗa yettee jettooje ɗe ngalaa keerol.
44024004	Jooni nii to mi junnu haala, mi ŋaarake ma, kettinoɗaa min seɗɗa.
44024005	Min taykake min ndaari sey min tawi ko gorko oo no bonɗo faa hanaa seɗɗa. Neɗɗo oo kuɓɓoowo fitina non hakkune Yahudankooɓe to ɓe tawa fuu. O ardiiɗo sewre diina himɓe Nasaratu.
44024006	O waɗi no waɗee fuu ngam o liɓa darja Juulirde amin mawne. Ɗum waɗi min nanngi mo. [Min ngiɗiino hiitanaade mo dow laabi kiite amin,
44024007	amma Lisiya mawɗo soogeeji Rooma teeti mo semmbe semmbe nder juuɗe amin,
44024008	hokki laawol felooɓe mo ɓeen ngara, pela mo to maa. Aan he hoore maa, aɗa waawi ƴami mo,] ngam paama goonga e goonga ko waɗi miɗen pela mo.
44024009	Yahudankooɓe tawaaɓe toon ɓeen tokkitii haala Tertullus, mbi'i goonga nii Tertullus haali.
44024010	Guferner Filiki wonƴiti har Pol hokki mo laawol haalude. Pol fiirti hunnduko wi'i : —Hanaa hannden tan, amma illa ko ɓooyi miɗo anndi ko aan woni kiitantooɗo leydi amin. Ngam majjum waɗi ko sikka fuu walaa miɗo waawi tettinde hoore am yeeso maa nder kiite ɗee.
44024011	Mi ɓuraay balɗe sappo e ɗiɗi he warde nder Ursaliima ngam rewude Alla. Nde nii a taykake, a faaman ko mi ɓuraay non.
44024012	Walaa tawɗo kam nder Juulirde mawne, nder baajorɗi naa to gom nder huɓeere Ursaliima, miɗo yeddodira he goɗɗo naa miɗo uppa jama'aare murta.
44024013	Huune fuu ko ɓe tuumiri kam, nder maɓɓe walaa baawɗo tabbintinde ɗum.
44024014	Amma jooni yeeso maa, he daane toowne, miɗo anndi ko mi waraana rewude Alla maamiraaɓe amin dow laawol Alla. To maɓɓe laawol ngool hanaa goonga, ngol sewre diina tan. Amma miin, mi goonɗini ko winndaa fuu nder Tawreeta e nder dewte annabiiɓe,
44024015	kam woni ko Alla accataa maayɗo baa gooto. O ummintinan dartiiɓe, o ummintinan bonɓe duu. Huune ndee duu mi tabbintinti ɗum, tuumooɓe kam ɓee duu tabbintini ɗum.
44024016	Ngam majjum waɗi wakkati fuu miɗo dartii nder miilo laaɓuŋo ngo felataa kam yeeso Alla he yeeso himɓe.
44024017	Ko wayri kam ɗo waɗi duuɓi. Mi wari jooni yeddande himɓe amin kokke he waɗande Alla sadakaaji.
44024018	Nder Juulirde mawne toon ngonmi ko ɓe tawi kam. Mi gayni golle laaɓinol am fuu, mi wondaa fuu he jama'aare gom. Fitina fuu duu waɗaay.
44024019	Amma Yahudankooɓe Asiya no ngonnoo nder Juulirde ndeen. Nde nii iɓe ngoodunoo ko ɓe pelirta kam, kamɓe kaani ngara pela kam yeeso maa.
44024020	Naa wakkati ngaddaami yeeso hiitorde maɓɓe, himɓe wonɓe ɗo nanngiri kam gacce gom ? Nde nii ɓe nanngiri kam gacce gom, ɓe kaala.
44024021	Yeeso hawriine dawrooɓe nder daane toowne mi wi'i ko mi tabbintini ko Alla no ummintinan maayɓe. Haala ka kaalumi kaa tan woni no waɗa mi hiitee yeeso maaɗa naa ?
44024022	Guferner oon no anndi laawol Iisa Almasiihu, ngam majjum waɗi o itti hunnduko o wi'i Pol'en : —Mi hiitotoo fii mooɗon oo wakkati Lisiya, mawɗo soogeeji Rooma, wari. Kiite ɗeen eggina faa nyannde gom.
44024023	O hokki laawol mawɗo soogeeji ɗiin faddoo Pol, amma to o haɓɓee. To higiraaɓe makko duu kaɗee tuntaade mo.
44024024	Pol waɗi balɗe no uddii. Nyannde gom guferner Filiki wardi he deekum Yahudanke bi'eteeɗo Durusilla ngam tuntaade Pol. Filiki waɗi Pol noddaa, o hettini Pol no haala dow filla goonɗinde Iisa Almasiihu.
44024025	Nden Pol tinni no famtina dow noy neɗɗo wuurirta ngam wela Alla. Noy neɗɗo watta ko waawa hoore mum. O wi'i duu ko Alla no hiitoto duuniyaaru fuu. Sey Filiki huli, wi'i Pol : —Heƴi hannden kay ! Jooni soƴƴa jooɗowa. Wakkati keɓumi daama fuu, mi waɗan noddeɗaa.
44024026	Filiki no miila ko Pol soodan hunnduko mum waɗi o ƴuwtaa dow makko. Wakkati warde wakkati omo nodda mo ngam ɓe njewtida.
44024027	Pol waɗi duuɓi ɗiɗi no uddii. Sey nyannde gom Filiki ittaa guferner, Porsiyus Festus naati nokku makko. Amma ngam welnude ɓerɗe Yahudankooɓe Filiki dilli, acci Pol no uddii.
44025001	Balɗe tati gaɗa garki Festus ngam fuɗɗude golle gufernaaku, o ummii Kaysariya o wari Ursaliima.
44025002	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla e ardiiɓe Yahudankooɓe gom ngari peli Pol yeeso makko.
44025003	Ɓe eeli mo o waɗa Pol waddee Ursaliima ngam ɓe ciryake Yahudankooɓe warooɓe Pol gom, ɓe ndesi dow laawol.
44025004	Amma Festus jaabii ɓe wi'i : —Pol no uddii nder Kaysariya. Mi ɓooyataa Ursaliima, miin he hoore am mi soƴƴoto Kaysariya.
44025005	Mawɓe mooɗon ngara min njaada, nde tawi Pol waɗi ko foti feleede, ɓe pela mo.
44025006	Guferner Festus waɗidaayna he maɓɓe balɗe jeetati naa balɗe sappo nder Ursaliima, nden soƴƴii Kaysariya. Nder Kaysariya o waali, weeti jaangoore mum, o waɗi Pol waddee nder hiirirde ndeen ngam hiitanaade mo.
44025007	Pol wari, nden mawɓe Yahudankooɓe warɓe ƴuwi Ursaliima ngatti mo caka tinni no pelira mo gacce keewɗe. Amma ɓe mbaawaa tabbintinde baa worre nder majje.
44025008	Pol ummii ngam tettinde hoore mum wi'i : —Walaa gacce ɗe ngaɗumi, daarooje Tawreeta naa ƴeewooje Juulirde mawne. Mi waɗanaay laamiiɗo Rooma gacce fuu.
44025009	Amma ngam welnude ɓerɗe Yahudankooɓe ɓeen, Festus ƴami Pol, wi'i : —Aɗa hiɗi yahde Ursaliima, kiiteneɗaa toon yeeso am ?
44025010	Nden Pol jaabii, wi'i : —Nder sarɗorde Kaysar laamiiɗo Rooma mawɗo ngonmi, ɗon duu kaanaami hiitaneede. Walaa gacce ɗe ngaɗanmi Yahudankooɓe, aan he hoore maa aɗa anndani ɗum.
44025011	Nde nii mi nanngiraama gacce gom naa mi waɗi ko foti wareede mi salaaki wareede. Amma goonga fuu walaa nder ko ɓe peliri kam. Ndenne, walaa gooduɗo laawol watta kam nder juuɗe maɓɓe. Miɗo eela kiite am ɗee njaaree yeeso Kaysar.
44025012	Guferner Festus yewtidi saawidirooɓe mum, nden wi'i Pol : —A eeli kiite maa njaaree yeeso Kaysar. Yeeso Kaysar kiite maa njaaretee.
44025013	Guferner Festus adi laawol yaarude kiite Pol yeeso Kaysar, balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa mum, laamiiɗo Agirippa e mawnum debbo bi'eteeɗo Bernike, ngari Kaysariya ngam barkitaade Festus.
44025014	Ɓe ngaɗi balɗe Kaysariya iɓe njewtana Festus. Nyannde gom Festus waɗani Agirippa filla Pol, wi'i : —Gorko gom, mo Filiki acci no ɗo, no uddii nder Kaysariya.
44025015	Nder njaaki am Ursaliima mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla e mawɓe Yahudankooɓe ngari peli mo to am, ɓe eeli kam mi taƴa kiite makko.
44025016	Njaabiimi ɓe, mbi'umi : Nder leydi Rooma, min mboowaay hiitanaade pelaaɗo fuu nde hanaa omo darii felooɓe mo ɓeen duu nii no darii. O hokkee laawol tefude tettinde hoore makko.
44025017	Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla e ardiiɓe Yahudankooɓe gom tokki kam ngari ɗo. Miin duu, mi jooɗaaki fuu ndoomumi goɗɗum. Waali weeti nyannde ɓe ngarnoo, ngaɗumi o waddee nder hiirirde ngam hiitanaade mo.
44025018	Warɓe ngam felude mo ɓeen ngari, ndarii. Mi miilii ko iɓe ngoodi daliila mawɗo mo ɓe pelirta mo. Amma kas !
44025019	Dow filla laabi diina maɓɓe e dow fii neɗɗo gom bi'eteeɗo Iisa, ɓe tinni iɓe pelira mo. Neɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Iisa oo maayi amma Pol no wi'a omo wuuri.
44025020	Ɗum wemmbii kam, mi anndaa fuu ko mbi'anmi. Nden ƴamumi Pol nde no jaɓa kiite mum ngaɗaa Ursaliima.
44025021	Amma o eeli kam kiite makko ngattee nder juuɗe Kaysar. Wakkati o eelunoo kam ndeen, mbi'umi o faddee ginan. Nde keɓumi laawol fuu mi daaran no ngaɗanmi o yaaree to Kaysar.
44025022	Sey Agirippa jaabii Festus, wi'i mo : —Miin he hoore am, miɗo hiɗi mi narra nowru am ko gorko oo wi'ata. Nden Festus wi'i mo : —Jaaŋo o waran, a nanan ko o wi'ata.
44025023	Waali weeti, Agirippa e mawnum debbo Bernike, ngari no ƴuggini, ɓe naati nder hiirirde to kiite Pol ngaɗetee. Soogeeji mawɗi he mawɓe huɓeere ndeen no tokki. Festus waɗi Pol waddaa.
44025024	Nden o wi'i : —Laamiiɗo Agirippa e onon tawaaɓe ɗo, on ngi'ii gorko oo, kanko woni mo Yahudankooɓe fuu ngari peli to am nder Ursaliima. On ngi'ii ɓe ngari ɗo duu ɓe peli mo, ɓe mbi'i : Barol woni dow makko.
44025025	Amma miin he hoore am, mi hi'aay ko o waɗi ko foti wareede. Kanko he hoore makko, eeli kam kiite makko njaaree to Kaysar. Miin duu mbi'umi kiite makko no njaaretee to Kaysar.
44025026	Amma mi walaa fuu haala tabbitikka dow makko, ka mbinndananmi ɓurɗo baawɗe nder Rooma fuu. Ngam majjum waɗi ngaddumoomi yeeso mooɗon. Mi waddi mo duu yeeso maaɗa, aan Agirippa. Ƴamu mo, aan he hoore maaɗa. Nden miin duu, mi heɓan ko mbinndananmi Kaysar.
44025027	Ngam he giiɗe am yaarude kasunke yeeso Kaysar, neɗɗo winndaay ngam famtinde ko waɗi o felaa, huune non nde hegaaki.
44026001	Pol no darii nder hiirirde ndeen, sey Agirippa wi'i mo : —A hokkaama laawol haalude. Haalu haala maa. Nden, Pol ɓanti junngo mum, jaabii, wi'i :
44026002	—Laamiiɗo, mi nani belɗum sanne hannden ngam heɓude laawol daraade yeeso maaɗa faa mi tettina hoore am dow ko Yahudankooɓe pelirta kam ɗum fuu.
44026003	Aɗa anndi finaa-tawaaji Yahudankooɓe, aɗa anndi duu geddi fuu wondi hakkune maɓɓe e himɓe. Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo eele, ngatta munyal kettinoɗaa kam.
44026004	Yahudankooɓe fuu no anndi no mbuurdumi illa cukaaku am. Iɓe anndi no njooɗoriimi fuu nder suudu baaba am he nder Ursaliima.
44026005	Iɓe anndi, nde nii ɓe calaaki seedaade, ko illa arannde mi tokkuɗo laawol diina amin, laawol ɓurngol tiiɗude faa miɗo limtee nder Fariisa'en.
44026006	Joonin, miin nii miɗo hiitee ngam mi watti gokka am dow fodoore nde Alla waɗani maamiraaɓe meeɗen.
44026007	Lenyi meeɗen sappo e ɗiɗi ɗiin fuu no ngatti gokka mum'en dow tabbintinde alkawal Alla ngaal. Jemma e nyalooma, iɗi tittinkini nder dewol Alla ngam heewtaade fodoore ndee. Laamiiɗo, ngam sabbu gokka kaa waɗi Yahudankooɓe no pela kam !
44026008	Ko waɗi onon Yahudankooɓe, oɗon miila ko Alla waawaa ummitinde maayɓe ?
44026009	Miin he hoore am, nder balɗe jawtuɗe mi miiliino ko no haani no ngaɗan mi fuu, mi bonna innde Iisa mo Nasaratu.
44026010	Kujje ɗee fuu ngoni ko ngaɗumi nder huɓeere Ursaliima. Mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla kokki kam laawol mi udda goonɗinɓe heewɓe. Wakkati ɓe kiitantenoo faa ɓe mbaree, mi jaɓi ɓe mbaree.
44026011	Mi torri ɓe kile keewɗe nder baajorɗi. Miɗo tilsina ɓe, ɓe kaala haalaaji mettuɗi dow Almasiihu mo ɓe ngoonɗini oon. Miɗo nanannoo mone maɓɓe sanne sanne, faa miɗo tayna ɓe nder gure janaane, miɗo torra ɓe.
44026012	Nyannde gom mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla kokki kam laawol nanngude goonɗinɓe Iisa nder huɓeere Damas sey ummiimi njehumi Damas.
44026013	Laamiiɗo, miɗo wonnoo dow laawol Damas caka nyalooma, sey ngi'umi jeyngol gom, ingol ɓuri naange yeynude. Ngol ƴuwi dow, ngol fiilii kam, miin he yaadiraaɓe am fuu.
44026014	Min fuu, min caami. Wakkati min fuu min ngonnoo e leydi, sey nanumi daane gom no wi'a kam nder Ibrankoore : « Sol ! Sol ! Ko waɗi aɗa torra kam ? Nde mbanyuɗaa kam, a torri hoore maaɗa ngam meere. »
44026015	Nden njaabiimi, mbi'umi : « Joomiraawo ! Aan woni moy ? » Daane ndeen wi'i kam : « Miin woni Iisa mo ngonɗaa aɗa torra.
44026016	Umma, dara, ngam mi wanngani ma, mi suɓake ma ngam ngollanaa kam, ceedanoɗaa kam nder ko ngi'uɗaa joonin dow am he ko ngi'oyta nde mi wanngi he maa yahde yeeso.
44026017	Mi reenete he Yahudankooɓe, mi reenete he lenyol gom ngol lilanmaami he mum'en joonin.
44026018	Mi lilete ngam piirta gite maɓɓe, ɓe ƴuwa nder nimre, ɓe ngarta nder jeyngol. Ɓe copto baawɗe Ibiliisa, ɓe naata Laamu Alla. Ɓe keɓa hakkeeji maɓɓe njaafee, kamɓe he seniiɓe kawtida ndonu ngam ɓe ngoonɗini kam. »
44026019	Ngam majjum laamiiɗo, mi salaaki ɗowtanaade ko ngi'umi, ƴuwanɗum kam dow.
44026020	Ɓe artumi waajaade ɓeen ngoni himɓe Damas, himɓe Ursaliima he fiiliiɓe leydi Yahudiya fuu. Gaɗa mum, tokkinmi himɓe lenyi gom. Mbi'umi ɓe, ɓe tuuba, ɓe ngarta he Alla. Ɓe ngolla golle kollooje ɓe tuubii.
44026021	Ngam majjum waɗi Yahudankooɓe nanngi kam nder Juulirde mawne, ɓe tefi warude kam.
44026022	Amma Alla wallii kam illa nyannde mum faa warde hannden. Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo ɗo hannden ngam haalande mawɗo yahde pamaro goonga. Mi waajataako huune fuu nde hanaa ko annabiiɓe he Muusa mbi'unoo no warowan.
44026023	Kanƴum woni : Almasiihu no torretee faa maaya, o arta maayɓe ummitaade, o waajoo lenyi meeɗen he lenyi gom fuu dow kisinam, ɗam laatanoo ɓe jeyngol.
44026024	Wakkati Pol haalannoo ndeen, sey Festus hacci he makko, wi'i : —Pol, a haaŋaama ! Anndal maaɗa ngal haaŋii ma !
44026025	Nden Pol jaabii mo, wi'i : —Sabbuŋo maaɗa juuta, mi haaŋaaka. Ko kaalanmi ɗum no goonga. Hakkillo am soptaay baa.
44026026	Agirippa no anndani ɗum, ngam majjum waɗi miɗo suusi haalude ɗum yeeso makko. Nde goonga, mi tabbintini ko ɗum suuɗanaaki mo, ngam ɗum waɗaaka nder cuccukka.
44026027	Laamiiɗo ! A goonɗini annabiiɓe naa ? Miɗo anndi ko a goonɗini !
44026028	Sey Agirippa wi'i Pol : —Ndenne nder wakkati seɗɗa oo, aɗa hiɗi ngaɗaa kam law law goonɗinɗo Almasiihu naa ?
44026029	Nden Pol jaabii mo, wi'i : —Juuti neeɓi miɗo eela Alla, aan he hettinaniiɓe kam joonin on fuu laatoɗon hano am, amma tawee callali ɗi ngalaa he mooɗon.
44026030	Laamiiɗo oon, guferner oon, Bernike he jooɗodinooɓe he maɓɓe ɓeen fuu ummii.
44026031	Wakkati ɓe mburtinoo ndeen, iɓe mbi'odira : —Gorko oo waɗaay ko foti wareede naa ko foti haɓɓireede callali.
44026032	Sey Agirippa wi'i Festus : —Omo waawi yoofeede nde nii o wi'aayno kiite makko njaaree to Kaysar, laamiiɗo Rooma mawɗo.
44027001	Wakkati njaaki amin leydi Italiya tabbitinnoo ndeen, Pol e kasunkooɓe gom ngattaa nder junngo Yuliyus, mawɗo soogeeji gonɗo nder sewre soogeeji Kaysar.
44027002	Min naati laana ndiyam ƴuwka Adaramatiya, kaanuka fanta gure leydi Asiya, gure tawaaɗe dow hunnduko ndiyam. Miɗen ngondi he Aristarkus gorko jeyaaɗo leydi Makedoniya, ƴuwɗo Tesalonika. Min ndilli Kaysariya,
44027003	jaangoore mum weeti, tawi min njottake Sidon. Yuliyus nani yurmeene Pol, hokki mo laawol tuntowaade higiraaɓe makko wonɓe nder Sidon ngam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe mballiri mo.
44027004	Wakkati min ƴuwnoo Sidon, henndu mawnu woni no njaɓɓitoo min. Nden min tokkiri fonngo duune Kipurus.
44027005	Min pedditi hedde har Silisi e Pamfiliya. Min njottii Mira nder leydi Lisiya.
44027006	Mira toon, Yuliyus tawi laana ƴuwka Alekasandiire no fonndi Italiya. O nanni min nder makka.
44027007	Min ngaɗi balɗe, laana amin no yaha heese heese. Da cat he walaa hawli ko min njottii Kinidus. Henndu nduun haɗi min, min tokka to min kaani tokkirde. Nden min takki fonngo duune Kereta har to henndu walaa, min panti Salmoni.
44027008	Da cat ko min njottii nokkuure wi'eteene Jipporde Lobbere, nde woɗɗaa Lasiya.
44027009	Ngam min ɓooyi sanne dow laawol, jahaangal ngaal duu no hulƴinii jooni. Wakkati Juulɗe moytol hakkeeji ngari, faa njawti. Nden Pol holliti ɓe wi'i :
44027010	—Banndiraaɓe, mi hi'i ko jahaangal meeɗen ngal no keewngal torra he balaa'u. Hanaa ngam laana kaa he gineeji ɗii tan, amma enen he ko'e meeɗen duu no waawi laataade mursen yonkiiji meeɗen.
44027011	Yuliyus, mawɗo soogeeji oon, hoolaaki hollitoore Pol ndeen. Sey o hettinani ko mawɗo awƴooɓe laana kaan he joomiika mbi'i.
44027012	Ɗuuɗal himɓe tawaaɓe nder laana kaan ngiɗaa dabba nder jipporde ndeen ngam ɗon welaa dabbude. Nden ɓe mbi'i kam'en tefowa yottaade Fenikisa ngam dabbude toon. Fenikisa jipporde laanaaji non wonnde Kereta huccitidde caka hoore huɗo he gorgal, he caka soɓɓirde he gorgal.
44027013	Kenel hoore-huɗowel gom fuɗɗi no wifa, gollooɓe nder laana kaan miili ko kam'en mbaawan yottaade Fenikisa. Ɓe ƴeencini jamɗe darnooje laana ɗeen, ɓe takki fonngo Kereta, iɓe njaha yahde.
44027014	Amma wakkati seɗɗa gaɗa mum, sey henndu mawnu gom ƴuwanndu soɓɓirde huccitidde lettugal, ummiroy semmbe semmbe illa duune Kereta.
44027015	Henndu nduun taɓɓiti laana kaan faddii ka, min acci ka, ika doya yahde.
44027016	Wakkati min njawtunoo duungel Kawda, semmbe mayru ɓuyti seɗɗa. Da cat ko min keɓi, min pooɗi ngel, min ngartiri laanel pamarel ngel hadde laana mawka kaan.
44027017	Sey gollooɓe ɓeen ƴetti ngel, njowi dow laana mawka kaan. Nden ɓe kooƴi ɓoggi, ɓe piilii laana mawka kaan. Ngam hulude to ɓe nufoy dow fonngo nder soɓɓirde Libiya, ɓe njippini guda ngaɗoowa laana kaan dilla, ɓe acci ika doya yahde.
44027018	Henndu nduun tokki no yonka min faa jaangoore mum ɓe puɗɗi iɓe paɗɗa donle laana kaan nder maayo ngoon.
44027019	Faɓɓi jaangoore mum, kamɓe he ko'e maɓɓe adi gineeji gollirɗi maɓɓe paɗɗi nder maayo ngoon.
44027020	Naange he koode ngaɗi balɗe ngi'ataake. Henndu nduun tinni no wifa, faa min itti gokka kisol fuu nder ɓerɗe amin.
44027021	Min ngaɗi balɗe, min nyaamaay. Sey nyannde gom Pol ummii darii hakkune jama'aare fuu, wi'i : —Nde nii on njaɓiino haala am, on ndillataano Kereta, torraaji ɗii he mursere ndee duu hewtotaako on.
44027022	Joonin, ko kaalananmi on woni pukkinee hakkillooji mooɗon, baa gooto nder mooɗon mursataa yonki mum, laana kaa tan mursetee.
44027023	Hankin, Alla jeyɗo kam mo ndewanmi, lili maleykaajo gom he am.
44027024	Maleykaajo oon wi'i kam : « Pol, taa hulu, walaa ko waawi haɗude ma darowaade yeeso Kaysar. Alla reenete, aan he yaadiraaɓe maaɗa ɓeen fuu. »
44027025	Ndenne, pukkinee hakkillooji mooɗon, ngam miɗo hooli ko Alla haalani kam ɗum. Tabbat ko o wi'i ɗum waɗan.
44027026	Amma paamee faa ko tilay nufen dow duune gom.
44027027	Min ngaɗi jemmaaji sappo e nay, miɗen ndoya nder maayo Cakawo. Caka jemma sappo e nayaɓo oon, awƴooɓe laana kaan miili ko kam'en ɓadake leydi gom.
44027028	Ɓe paɗɗi ɓoggol ettirgol luggiɗirka ndiyam, ɓe tawi luggiɗirka kaan no waɗa gabaaje laso. Yeeso seɗɗa kaden, ɓe paɗɗi ngol, ɓe tawi luggiɗirka kaan no keddi gabaaje sappo he joy.
44027029	Ɓe kuli to ɓe caamoy dow kaaƴe. Nden ɓe njippini har gaɗa jamɗe nay darnooje laana kaan, iɓe keɗi Alla holla ɓe beete.
44027030	Wakkati gollooɓe nder laana kaan njippinoo laanel pamarel ngel dow ndiyam, faa ɓe ndilla kamɓe tan, sey ɓe peni ɓe mbi'i woɓɓe ko kam'en no njippinowan jamɗe yeesooje darnooje laana kaan.
44027031	Nden Pol wi'i mawɗo soogeeji oon, he soogeeji mum : —Nde nii ɓe ndillii ɓe acci on nder laana kaa, to baa gooto mooɗon daɗataa.
44027032	Wakkati soogeeji ɗiin nanunoo ko o wi'i ɗum, sey ɓe taƴi ɓoggi ɗi laanel ngel haɓɓiraa, ɓe acci ngel ingel dilla yahde kanngel tan.
44027033	Woɗɗa weetude, sey Pol eeli ɓe, ɓe fuu ɓe nyaama, o wi'i ɓe : —Hannden woni balɗe sappo he nay, on nyaamaay. Oɗon ndoomi ko watta.
44027034	Mi eeli on, ngaree, nyaamee ngam kison. Fakat baa leeɓol hoore gooto mooɗon solataa sako saama.
44027035	Wakkati o haaldannoo he maɓɓe ndeen, o hooƴi buuru, o yetti Alla yeeso maɓɓe, ɓe fuu. O helti, o fuɗɗi nyaamude.
44027036	Sey ɓe fuu hakkillooji maɓɓe pukki. Ɓe kooƴi, kamɓe duu buuruuje ɗeen iɓe nyaama.
44027037	Minen tawaaɓe nder laana kaan, miɗen ngaɗa himɓe keme ɗiɗo e lasooji tato e sappo he jeego'o (276).
44027038	Wakkati ɓe nyaamunoo faa ɓe kaari ndeen, sey ɓe kooƴi saakuuji alkama gonɗi nder laana kaan, ɓe paɗɗi nder maayo heɓa ɗum huyfinan ka.
44027039	Wakkati weetunoo, awƴooɓe laana kaan anndaa toy kam'en tawa amma ɓe kolliri fonngo gom to maayo ngoon waɗi hano luuro nii. Iɓe ngiɗi hoɗoyde toon he laana kaan, nde no waɗoo.
44027040	Nden ɓe taƴi ɓoggi jamɗe darnooje laana ɗeen, ɓe njoofi nder ndiyam. Ɓe kaɓɓiti ɓoggi awƴirngel laana kaan. Ɓe adi awƴirngel ngel, ɓe ƴenciniri wudere waɗoore ka yaha, ɓe peerti nde. Nden ɓe ponndi fonngo maayo ngoon, henndu no tutooka, ika doya yahde.
44027041	Ɓe njottii to taasiri gom, sey laana kaan fiyi he tilde gom. Hoore makka irii nder tilde ndeen faa ka sonnyataa. Semmbe benkeƴƴe ɗeen tinni no cerka ka har gaɗa.
44027042	Soogeeji gonɗi nder laana kaan ciryii warude kasunkooɓe wonɓe nder makka heɓa to baa gooto maɓɓe doggu.
44027043	Amma ngam Yuliyus mawɗo soogeeji ɗiin no hiɗi danna Pol, sey o itti ɓe dow anniya maɓɓe. Nden o hokki laawol waawɓe yinaade ɓeen arta njinoo mburtowoo.
44027044	Hoddiiɓe ɓeen duu tiigoo dow koɓitte laana kaan naa goɗɗum ƴuwɗum he makka. Nii waɗi ko min fuu min keɓi yottaade fonngo ngoon jam he seho.
44028001	Wakkati min kisunoo sarri maayo ngoon, nden min nani ko innde duune nde min ngari ndeen woni Malta.
44028002	Himɓe tawaaɓe dow mayre njaɓɓorii min teddirka. Ndiyam no toɓa, jaangol duu no woodi. Nden ɓe kuɓɓani min hiite min ƴilfoo.
44028003	Pol hawri leɗɗe, faɗɗi nder magge. Nguleeki magge waɗi mboddi tawani nder majje gom wurtii, soppi Pol he junngo.
44028004	Wakkati himɓe duune ndeen ngi'unoo mboddi ndiin no ɓilii he junngo Pol, sey ɓe mbi'odiri hakkune maɓɓe : —Tabbat gorko oo no ittoowo yonki non. Baa nii ko o hisi sarri maayo ngoo, kiite caami dow makko, ɗe accataa mo o wuura.
44028005	Pol fiɗɗi junngo mum, sey mboddi ndiin saami nder hiite ngeen. Meentol ngool torraay mo baa seɗɗa.
44028006	Ɓe miili o ɓuutan naa o saaman wakkati mum da, o maaya. Ɓe keɗi faa ɓooyi, ɓe ngi'ii ɗum torraay mo baa seɗɗa. Nden ɓe mbayli anniyaaji maɓɓe iɓe mbi'a : Deweteeɗo gom non !
44028007	Ɗon da hadde amin gese Pubiliyus, hooreejo duune ndeen, no kolliree. O wari, o jaɓɓii min no wooɗiri. O weerni min balɗe tati, omo hakkilii he amin.
44028008	Baabiiko no fukkii sellaa. O jontaaɗo, omo wondi wulowulo manngo, reedu makko no fiyaa, omo doggina ƴiiƴam. Pol ummii yehi to makko, du'ii, yowi juuɗe mum dow makko, o yamɗiti.
44028009	Wakkati baaba Pubiliyus yamɗitinnoo, nyawɓe duune ndeen fuu no ngara no nyawto to Pol.
44028010	Himɓe duune ndeen teddini min ir teddungal fuu. Wakkati min ciryinoo dillude, ɓe ngaddani min jooɓaari. Nder mayri ɓe ngatti huune fuu ko min kaajaa ngam jahaangal amin.
44028011	Miɗen ngonnoo Malta faa lebbi tati. Nyannde gom min naati laana ƴuwka Alekasandiire, ndabbunooka Malta, inndirteeka inɗe tooruuje funeeɓe worɓe Kastor e Polukisa, min ndilli.
44028012	Wakkati min ndillunoo Malta min ngari huɓeere Sirakus. Min ngaɗi balɗe tati nder mayre.
44028013	Min ndilli Sirakus, min takki daane maayo Cakawo, min ngari Regiyum. Jaangoore mum, henndu hoore huɗooru gom no wifa. Balɗe ɗiɗi tan min ngaɗi ko min njottowi Potiyoli.
44028014	Nder Potiyoli, min tawi banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe gom eeluɓe min, min ngaɗana ɗum'en jeɗɗiire. Gaɗa jeɗɗiire amin nder Potiyoli, min ummii, min njehi Rooma.
44028015	Wakkati banndiraaɓe amin gom wonɓe Rooma nanunoo garki amin, ɓe ummii ɓe ngari luumo Abiya he nokkuure wi'eteene Jipporɗe Tati ngam jaɓɓitaade min. Wakkati Pol hi'unoo ɓe, o yetti Alla, o ɓeydi suusude.
44028016	Min ummodi he maɓɓe min ngardi Rooma. Wakkati min njottinoo Rooma, Pol hokkaa laawol jippoo feere mum, soogeeru gom dooma mo.
44028017	Balɗe tati gaɗa garki amin nder Rooma, Pol noddi mawɓe Yahudankooɓe ngara jipporde mum. Wakkati ɓe kawrunoo to Pol, Pol wi'i ɓe : —Banndiraaɓe ! Baa nii ko mi waɗanaay himɓe meeɗen gacce fuu, mi yaaɓaay duu laawol finaa-tawaaji maamiraaɓe meeɗen baa gootol, mi nanngaama Ursaliima, mi wattaama nder juuɗe hooreeɓe leydi Rooma.
44028018	Wakkati hooreeɓe leydi ndiin ƴami ƴamtinii kam, ɓe ngiɗiino yoofude kam, ngam ɓe tawraay kam fuu goɗɗum kaanuɗum waɗa mi waree.
44028019	Amma Yahudankooɓe Ursaliima calii. Ngam majjum waɗi tilay am, baa nii ko mi hiɗaa felude himɓe am, mi ƴama kiite am njaaree yeeso Kaysar.
44028020	Ɗum woni sabiili gaɗɗo mi noddi on ngam fillanaade on. Oɗon anndi gokka Isra'ilankooɓe, ngam gokka kaa waɗi kaɓɓiraami callali ɗii.
44028021	Sey mawɓe Yahudankooɓe njaabii mo, mbi'i : —Minen, min keɓaay fuu ɗerol gom ƴuwngol Yahudiya garngol dow innde maa. Nder banndiraaɓe amin baa gooto waraay, waɗani min filla maaɗa naa haalana min ko boni gom dow maaɗa.
44028022	Amma ko min ngiɗi woni aan he hoore maaɗa kaalanaa min ko miiluɗaa. Ngam minen, miɗen anndi ko nokku fuu no woodi himɓe jancooɓe sewre diina maa.
44028023	Nden mawɓe Yahudankooɓe kokki Pol nyalaane nde ɓe ngartoyta to makko. Wakkati nyalaane nde ɓe mbi'unoo ɓe ngartan ndeen yottii, Yahudankooɓe heewɓe ngari to Pol weeri. Illa subaka kecco faa gaɗa kiraaɗe, Pol no waajoo ɓe dow filla Laamu Alla. Omo tuugo dow Tawreeta Muusa he dewte annabiiɓe, ngam ɓe ngoonɗina Iisa.
44028024	Nder maɓɓe woɓɓe njaɓi ko o haalani ɗum'en, woɓɓe duu njaɓaay.
44028025	Ɓe pooɗodiri hakkune maɓɓe, faa ɓe puɗɗi sankitaade, sey Pol wi'i ɓe : —Goonga Ruuhu Ceniiɗo haali, wakkati o wi'unoo maamiraaɓe mooɗon har hunnduko annabi Esaaya :
44028026	Yehu to lenyol ngool, mbi'aa : On nanan faa wooɗa, amma on paamataa. On ndaaran faa wooɗa, amma on ngi'ataa.
44028027	Ngam himɓe lenyol ngool no njoori ɓerɗe : Ɓe cukkii noppi maɓɓe, ɓe maɓɓii gite maɓɓe. Ngam to gite maɓɓe ngi'u, to noppi maɓɓe nanu, to hakkillooji maɓɓe paamu, to ɓe tuubu sako mi danna ɓe.
44028028	Pol wi'i ɓe kaden : —Paamee ko Alla lildi kisinam mum to ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, ngam kamɓe kay ɓe kettinto ! [
44028029	Wakkati Pol haalannoo haalaaji ɗii, Yahudankooɓe ɓeen ndilli, tinni no njeddodira sanne hakkune mum'en.]
44028030	Pol jooɗii duuɓi ɗiɗi nder suudu ndu o luwi. Omo jaɓɓoo warooɓe no ndaara mo fuu.
44028031	Nder cuusal manngal omo waajoo dow Laamu Alla, omo janngina Habaru Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo. Walaa fuu ko waawi haɗi mo.
45001001	Miin Pol, maccuɗo Iisa Almasiihu, mo Alla noddi ngam laatoo lilaaɗo makko. Miin mo Alla suɓii, waajoo Habaru lobbo filla dow Iisa Almasiihu winndi ɗerol ngool.
45001002	Habaru lobbo mo mbaajotoomi oo woni habaru mo illa fil'ajal Alla fodaninoo en nder dewte ceniiɗe har kunndule annabiiɓe mum.
45001003	Habaru oo walaana no haala dow Ɓiyiiko, Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, mo har ɓii-aadamaaku wurtaakina nder lenyol Daawda.
45001004	Amma har Ruuhu Ceniiɗo tabbintinaama ko o Ɓii-Alla, wakkati mo nder baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo o ummintina he maayde.
45001005	Alla barkinɗini kam waɗi kam lilaaɗo dow innde Iisa Almasiihu heɓa ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe fuu ngoonɗina mo tokka ko o wi'i ɗum'en.
45001006	Onon, ɓe Alla noddi warta tokkuɓe Iisa Almasiihu, onon duu, oɗon limtee nder maɓɓe.
45001007	On fuu wonɓe Rooma, ɓe Alla horsini, noddi ɗum'en ngam ngartaa himɓe mum, miɗo sanna on. Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen, he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen hokka on jam e moƴƴere.
45001008	Duuniyaaru fuu nani filla goonɗinol mooɗon. Ngam majjum waɗi, miɗo yetta Alla daliila Iisa Almasiihu ngam mooɗon.
45001009	Alla, mo ngollananmi he ɓerne am fuu, nder waaju Habaru lobbo, habaru Ɓiyiiko, no anndi ko nder du'aa'u am fuu, miɗo miccitoo he mooɗon.
45001010	Miɗo eela Alla, nde hiɗi, jaɓi hoynana kam laawol no mi warirta to mooɗon.
45001011	Miɗo hiɗi hi'ude on sanne ngam mi walla on keɓon kokkal ngal Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hokkata heɓa cemmbiɗon.
45001012	Kaden, miɗo hiɗi mi tawee hakkune mooɗon faa cemmbinɗinodiren nder goonɗinol ngol kawtuɗen ngool.
45001013	Banndiraaɓe, miɗo hiɗi paamon ko mi siryake kile keewɗe ngam warde to mooɗon amma faa warde hannden mi heɓaay laawol majjum. Miɗo hiɗi golle am ngaɗa barke hakkune mooɗon hano no ɗe ngaɗiri barke hakkune woɓɓe.
45001014	Waajibi non, teddorgal yahde to himɓe fuu no dow gi'al daane am. Teddorgal yahde to tawaaɓe nder huɓeere naa nder ladde, teddorgal yahde to jannguɓe he ɓe njanngaay, ɗum fuu no dow am.
45001015	Ndenne, daliila kujje ɗee fuu waɗi, miɗo hari warde waajaade on Habaru lobbo oo, onon tawaaɓe Rooma.
45001016	Waaju Habaru lobbo hanaa semteene non to am, ngam Habaru lobbo oo woni baawɗe Alla jottinooje goonɗinɗo fuu he kisinam. Arannde nii Yahudankooɓe, nden ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe.
45001017	Ngam Habaru lobbo wanngini dartinaaku ƴuwngu to Alla keɓeteengu daliila goonɗinol tan. Ngam nii woni no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Jom dartinaaku wuuran daliila goonɗinol mum.
45001018	Illa dow, Alla wanngini tikkere mum ngam ɓiɓɓe aadama ngaɗi hakke, iɓe nder gaɗol oonyaare. Har oonyaare maɓɓe duu iɓe kaɗa goonga wanngude.
45001019	Nde goonga, ko neɗɗo waawi anndude dow Alla fuu no laaɓani ɓe. Alla he hoore mum holli ɓe ɗum.
45001020	Goonga non ko woni he makko fuu hitere waawaa hi'ude ɗum. Amma illa fuɗɗorde o holli ko kam no Alla. O holli baawɗe makko dow ko o tagi fuu. Ngam majjum waɗi nde nii ɗum taykaama, ɗum daaraama ɓe ngalaa ko ɓe mbi'a.
45001021	Baa nii ko iɓe anndi Alla, ɗum fuu waɗaay ɓe njetta mo, ɓe teddina mo no foti o teddiniree. Ɓe tokkitii taykaaki meere faa ɓe mbini, ko'e maɓɓe mbaati, ɓerɗe maɓɓe duu niɓɓi.
45001022	Iɓe mbi'a ko kam'en no jom'en hakkillo, jaa ɓe haaŋaaɓe.
45001023	Fadde maɓɓe rewude Alla jom teddungal, Duumiiɗo faa abada abadin, tooruuje gaɗaaɗe nder nanndi neɗɗo maayoowo, naa pooli, naa dabbaaji, naa bolle, ɓe tinni iɓe ndewa.
45001024	Ngam majjum waɗi Alla duu acci ɓe tokki muuyɗe ɓerɗe maɓɓe tunnuɗe faa ɓe pekiti ɓalli maɓɓe he tuuni jeenu.
45001025	Ɓe mbattiti goonga Alla he fewre. Ɓe teddini ko tagaa ɗum, ɓe ndewi ɗum. Ɓe mboppi Taguɗo huune fuu oon, potuɗo yetteede faa abada ! Teddungal laatanoo mo faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
45001026	Ngam majjum Alla acci, ɓe tokka muuyɗe ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ngaɗa ko waɗude ko semtini. Rewɓe maɓɓe acci ko dagii, ko anndanoo, kam woni debbo hawra he gorko, rewɓe maɓɓe hakkune mum'en tefodirta.
45001027	Non duu worɓe maɓɓe acci ko dagii ko anndanoo, kam woni gorko hawra he debbo, worɓe maɓɓe hakkune mum'en tefodirta. Nii waɗi ko ɓe pooɗani ko'e maɓɓe kiite potuɗe dey-dey he golle maɓɓe nyidduɗe.
45001028	Ko nii ɓe calii wondude he anndal Alla, Alla duu accidi ɓe he hakkillooji maɓɓe benbaaɗi ɗi ngalaa fuu nafakka gom, ɓe ngaɗi ko haanaa waɗeede.
45001029	Iɓe keewi iri rafi dartinaaku fuu, iri haasidaaku fuu he ir caɗal fuu. Iɓe keewi borondi, suuno, ittodirol yonki, he habdo. Iɓe keewi ƴoyre he iri laru fuu, nyo'oore bonnoore innde he rafi herseene.
45001030	Iɓe mbi'odira haalaaji bonɗi, ɓe waayɓe Alla, ɓe toonyotooɓe, ɓe ƴettooɓe ko'e, ɓe hiɗuɓe innde. Iɓe nyenyi nder gaɗol bone. Iɓe murta he saarooɓe maɓɓe.
45001031	Ɓe ngalaa basiira, haala maɓɓe yottataako, ɓe koolnaaki, ɓe ngalaa yurmeene fuu.
45001032	Baa nii ko iɓe anndi ko Alla wi'i waɗooɓe iri golleeji ɗi fuu maayde woni mbaka mum'en, ɓe accaay waɗude ko boni. Iɓe njardii duu he waɗooɓe ko boni.
45002001	Ko nii waɗi ɓii-aadama fuu no woodi anndal dow dartinaaku Alla, ndenne aan peloowo goɗɗo, baa nii a moy non, walaa fuu no coptirtoɗaa. Ndenne, nde a felii goɗɗo, a liɓi hoore maa ngam aan he hoore maaɗa aɗa waɗa kujje ɗee.
45002002	Eɗen anndi ko kiite ɗe Alla taƴi fuu no poti dey-dey he waɗooɓe golle bonɗe.
45002003	Aan peloowo waɗooɓe golle bonɗe, tawi duu aan he hoore maaɗa aɗa waɗa ir majje, he giiɗe maaɗa aɗa miila ko a hisan kiite Alla naa ?
45002004	Naa a yawi ɗuuɗal moƴƴere Alla, munyal makko, he ko o yaawaa bonude he maaɗa ? Ndenne a anndaa ko moƴƴere Alla no waɗa tuuba ?
45002005	Amma tiiɗal nyiraaku he ɓerne ɓaleeraaku maaɗa waɗi kawranɗaa hoore maa kiite gonɗe no ndoomi ma nyannde fuu tikkere Alla wanngi. Nyalaane ndee nder mum kiite makko dartiiɗe wanngintee.
45002006	Alla yoɓan neɗɗo fuu dow golle mum.
45002007	Tittinkiniiɓe ngolli ko wooɗi ngam tefude teddungal, darja e mbuurnam nduumiiɗam, ɓee ngoni ɓe Alla hokkata laawol wuurdude he mum faa abada abadin.
45002008	Amma hiɗuɓe ko'e mum'en tan calii goonga, peŋi he waɗude bononda, tikkere he mone ngoni mbaka maɓɓe.
45002009	Torra he ɓillaare ngoodani gaɗoowo ko boni fuu. Yahudankooɓe artiree ginan, nden ko ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe tokkinee.
45002010	Amma darja, teddungal e jam ngoni mbaka gaɗoowo ko wooɗi fuu. Yahudankooɓe artiree ginan, nden ko ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe tokkinee.
45002011	Ngam Alla walaa hedran-hedran.
45002012	Neɗɗo fuu waɗi hakke ngam anndaa ko winndaa nder Tawreeta, joomum no hiitetee kiite maayde baa nii ko anndaano Tawreeta. Neɗɗo fuu anndi ko Tawreeta wi'i, dey waɗi hakke, no waɗantee kiite dey-dey dow ko Tawreeta wi'i.
45002013	Hanaa nanuɓe ko Tawreeta wi'i ngoni jom'en dartinaaku yeeso Alla, amma tokkuɓe ngolli ko nde wi'i, kam'en ngoni jom'en dartinaaku yeeso Alla.
45002014	Mo hanaa Yahudanke, baa nii anndaa ko Tawreeta wi'i, nde nii waɗi ko Tawreeta tilsini waɗee nder rafi anndal mum, too ɗum no holla ko joomum no anndi ko haani waɗeede, baa nii ko anndaano ko Tawreeta wi'i.
45002015	Ko o waɗi ɗum no holla ko Tawreeta wi'i fuu no winndaa nder ɓerne makko. Hanaa nder ɓerne makko tan, iɗum winndaa duu nder ɓerne neɗɗo fuu mo hanaa Yahudanke. Ɓerɗe maɓɓe no kolla ko ɗum goonga ngam wakkatiiji gom miilooji maɓɓe no pela ɓe, wakkatiiji gom duu iɗi lamna ɓe.
45002016	Ngam majjum waɗi hano no Habaru lobbo mo ngonmi miɗo waajoo wi'iri ɗum, non ɗum laatoytoo nyannde Alla tokkirta har Iisa Almasiihu hiito ko suuɗi fuu nder ɓerɗe himɓe.
45002017	Aan, bi'oowo aan he hoore maa, a Yahudanke. Aan mo wakkili hoore mum he Tawreeta, aan piyoowo gabaare dow kawtal mum he Alla.
45002018	Aan annduɗo muuyɗe Alla, aan mo nder nawtoraade he ko Tawreeta wi'i waawi suɓaade ko wooɗi.
45002019	Aan tabbintinɗo ko aɗa waawi ɗowi bumɗo, aan tabbintinɗo ko a jeyngol ngam yeynanande wonɓe nder nimre.
45002020	Aan ekkintinoowo ɓe ngalaa anndal, jannginoowo sukaaɓe ngam aɗa jogii goonga he anndal kuuɓungal tawaangal nder Tawreeta.
45002021	Aan ekkintinoowo woɓɓe, a ekkintintaa hoore maaɗa. Aɗa fooɗa noppi himɓe to ɓe mbujju, amma aan he hoore maaɗa aɗa wujja.
45002022	Aɗa fooɗa noppi himɓe ngam to ɓe jeenu, amma aan aɗa yeena. Aɗa harmini tooruuje, amma aɗa wujja nder cuuɗi majje.
45002023	Aɗa fiira Tawreeta gabaare, amma a ɗowtantaako ko nde wi'i. Ndenne, a hokkaay Alla teddungal mum.
45002024	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Daliila mooɗon waɗi ko ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe no mbonna innde Alla.
45002025	Tabbat juulnol no nafee, nde nii a ɗowtaniiɗo ko Tawreeta wi'i. Amma nde nii a hanaa ɗowtaniiɗo ko Tawreeta wi'i, baa nii ko a juulnaaɗo, aan he mo juulnaaka fuu no go'o.
45002026	Alal misaali mo juulnaaka gom no ɗowtanoo ko Tawreeta wi'i, Alla daarata joomum hano no juulnaaɗo naa ?
45002027	Mo juulnaaka oo, ɗowtaniiɗo ko Tawreeta wi'i oo, kam waɗante kiite. Aan juulnaaɗo, jogiiɗo Tawreeta muɓɓo binndaaɗo amma no murta he ko Tawreeta wi'i.
45002028	Yahudanke goonga e goonga hanaa mo dow ɓanndu mum tan hollata ko kam no Yahudanke, kaden juulnol goonga e goonga hanaa juulnol ngol waɗetee dow ɓanndu gorko.
45002029	Ndenne, Yahudanke goonga e goonga woni laatiiɗo Yahudanke nder ɓerne mum. Juulnol goonga e goonga woni juulnol ngol Ruuhu Alla waɗata nder ɓerne neɗɗo. Juulnol ngool ƴuwaay nder tilsinooje binndaaɗe. Ir neɗɗo oo Alla manata ɗum, hanaa ɓii-aadama.
45003001	Ndenne, nde nii woni no waɗa, nafakka kaye Yahudanke woodi ? Ɗume juulnol nafiri ?
45003002	Nde en etii en ndaari nder laabi keewɗi, ko Yahudanke ɓurdi mo hanaa Yahudanke no ɗuuɗi. Misaali seɗɗa gom nii, Yahudankooɓe Alla halfini haala mum.
45003003	Goonga non, woɓɓe nder maɓɓe kolaaki Alla, amma baa nii ko ɓe koolaaki mo, ɗum waawaa bonnude fuy nder ko Alla no kolniiɗo.
45003004	Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu faama ko Alla woni goonga, himɓe ngoni fenooɓe. Hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Aan Alla nde a haali, neɗɗo fuu no anndi ko a haali goonga. Nde a felaama duu, aan hepta goonga.
45003005	Nde nii rafi dartinaaku meeɗen no laatoo laawol tabbintinol dartinaaku Alla, ndenne ɗume woodi ko mbi'eten kaden ? Nde nii Alla jippinii tikkere mum dow meeɗen, en mbi'an ko o hanaa jom dartinaaku naa ? Ko mi wi'i ɗum no miiloo ɓii-aadama.
45003006	En mbaawaa wi'ude ɗum he Alla, ngam nde nii Alla hanaa jom dartinaaku, noy o hiitorto duuniyaaru ?
45003007	Nde fewre am walli himɓe ngi'a goonga Alla yaasin laaɓɗo, nde nde waɗi ɓe teddina mo, ndenne ɗume waɗi hannden miɗo hiitee hano mi gaɗoowo hakke ?
45003008	Nde nii non, sey tinnoɗen nder waɗude ko wooɗaa ngam ɗum laatoo laawol wurtinde ko wooɗi. Goonga non woɓɓe no mbi'an ko en mbi'iri nii amma ɗum hanaa goonga, ɗum kuddi tan. Ir himɓe ɓee no ngaɗantee kiite dey-dey golle mum'en.
45003009	Enen Yahudankooɓe, ɗume mbi'eten ? Eɗen ɓuri ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe naa ? Too, en ɓuraa ɓe baa fuy ! En artiino en mbi'i ko Yahudanke he mo hanaa Yahudanke fuu no nder maccangaaku hakke.
45003010	Hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Jom dartinaaku walaa, baa gooto.
45003011	Walaa gooto, gooduɗo faamu, naa gooto tefoowo yeeso Alla.
45003012	Ɓe fuu ɓe mbinake Ɓe fuu ɓe mboni. Walaa baa gooto gaɗoowo ko wooɗi. Baa gooto walaa.
45003013	Kunndule maɓɓe no nanndi he annyeeje omtiiɗe. Iɓe nawtoro ɗemle belɗe ngam hiilude himɓe. Toni maɓɓe no keewi tooke hano firsoori.
45003014	Kunndule maɓɓe no keewi kuddi he haalaaji mettuɗi.
45003015	Koyɗe maɓɓe no karganoo rufude ƴiiƴam.
45003016	To ɓe pa'i fuu, bononda e mettorgal ɓerne no tokki ɓe,
45003017	ɓe anndaa laawol waɗude jam.
45003018	Kulol Alla walaa nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe baa seɗɗa.
45003019	Eɗen anndi huune fuu ko Tawreeta wi'i, nde wi'aanaa ɗum na ngam wonɓe no ɗowtanoo ko nde wi'i. Neɗɗo fuu waawaa wi'ude ko kam waɗaay hakke. Ndenne, himɓe fuu no kaani paama ko kam'en ngaɗi hakke yeeso Alla.
45003020	Walaa tokkuɗo ko Tawreeta wi'i daaroyteeɗo jom dartinaaku yeeso Alla, ngam no tokki Tawreeta. Tawreeta waɗataa neɗɗo jom dartinaaku amma nde hollataana himɓe ɗume woni hakke.
45003021	Alla wanngini hannden laawol keɓol dartinaaku mum. Dartinaaku nguu hanaa har Tawreeta, ngu heɓirtee baa nii ko Tawreeta he dewte annabiiɓe ceedanake ngu.
45003022	Dartinaaku ƴuwngu to Alla nguu no heɓee daliila goonɗinde Iisa Almasiihu. Neɗɗo fuu goonɗini Almasiihu, Alla wartiran ɗum jom dartinaaku. Alla walaa hedran-hedran.
45003023	Himɓe fuu ngaɗi hakke, ɓe fuu ɓe mbaawaa keɓi dartinaaku Alla.
45003024	Amma joonin Alla wartiri neɗɗo meeɗen fuu jom dartinaaku daliila moƴƴere nde o waɗani en forba. Hakke neɗɗo meeɗen fuu moytaama yeeso makko nder barke dimɗinol ngol Almasiihu waɗani en.
45003025	Alla lili mo ngam o laatoo sadaka heɓa neɗɗo fuu goonɗini mo hakke mum moytee daliila ƴiiƴam makko. Alla waɗi ɗum ngam hollude dartinaaku mum, ngam ndenno o munyaniino waɗooɓe hakke. Kiite fuu non o taƴanaay ɓe.
45003026	Alla waɗi nii nder wakkati oo ngam hollude ko he hoore mum no jom dartinaaku, kaden duu o waɗan neɗɗo fuu goonɗini Iisa jom dartinaaku.
45003027	Ndenne, walaa ko neɗɗo fiyira gabaare wi'a kam no goɗɗum. Ɗume waɗi ko ɗum walaa ? Ɗum walaa ngam hanaa golle meeɗen waɗata en jom'en dartinaaku. Goonɗinol Iisa kam wartirta en jom'en dartinaaku.
45003028	Ngam eɗen anndi ko neɗɗo no wartiree jom dartinaaku yeeso Alla ngam no goonɗinɗo amma hanaa ngam no tokkuɗo Tawreeta.
45003029	Naa Alla, no Alla Yahudankooɓe tan ? Naa o hanaa Alla ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ? Nde goonga, o Alla ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe duu.
45003030	Alla, o gooto. Kanko duu waɗata juulnaaɓe jom'en dartinaaku ngam ɓe goonɗinɓe Iisa. Kanko duu waɗata ɓe njuulnaaka jom'en dartinaaku ngam ɓe goonɗinɓe Iisa.
45003031	Nde nii en ngoonɗini Iisa, ndenne en ngartiri Tawreeta meere, naa noy ? Aa'a, en ngartiraay nde meere, en tabbintinan nde non.
45004001	Ɗume mbi'eten dow Ibrahim maama meeɗen ? Ɗume o heɓiri hoore makko kanko tan ?
45004002	Nde nii o heɓiino nder golle makko, laawol laataade jom dartinaaku yeeso Alla, o heɓannoo goɗɗum ko o fiyirta gabaare yeeso woɓɓe, amma hanaa yeeso Alla.
45004003	No winndaa wi'aa : Ibrahim goonɗini Alla, ngam majjum waɗi, Alla adi mo jom dartinaaku.
45004004	Njobdi golloowo limtataake hano moƴƴere non, nde o hokkaa. Amma njobdi makko ndii, no tilsi non o hokkee ndi.
45004005	Neɗɗo fuu watti gokka goonɗini Alla, gartiroowo jom hakke jom dartinaaku yeeso mum, dey wattaay gokka mum dow gollal mum, too daliila goonɗinol neɗɗo oo, Alla adan mo jom dartinaaku.
45004006	Ɗum wonnoo ko Daawda hiɗunoo haalude wakkati o haalunoo dow neɗɗo mo Alla barkini noddi mo jom dartinaaku ko hanaa ngam golle mum lobbe.
45004007	Daawda wi'i : Belɗo hoore woni mo gacce mum ittaa, mo hakke mum yaafaa !
45004008	Belɗo hoore woni neɗɗo mo Joomiraawo limataa gacce mum kaden.
45004009	Too ! Yahudankooɓe tan njeyii barke ɗee naa ? Ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ngalaa mbaka nder majje naa ? En mbi'ii goonɗinol Ibrahim waɗi Alla wi'i o jom dartinaaku.
45004010	Nde Alla wi'i o jom dartinaaku ? Illa o juulnaaka naa gaɗa juulnol makko ? Illa o juulnaaka Alla wi'i ɗum hanaa gaɗa juulnol makko.
45004011	Amma wakkati o juulnaa ndeen, juulnol makko ngool laatake alaama mo seedantoo mo ko o jom dartinaaku har goonɗinol illa o juulnakaano. Ngam majjum waɗi Ibrahim laatii baaba goonɗinɓe Alla fuu, adaaɓe jom'en dartinaaku, baa nii ko ɓe njuulnaaka.
45004012	Nii duu waɗi ko Ibrahim laatii baaba juulnaaɓe, hanaa ngam ɓe juulnaaɓe tan amma ngam ɓe ngoonɗini Alla hano no Ibrahim goonɗiniri illa o juulnaaka.
45004013	Alkawal ndonngu duuniyaaru ngu Alla waɗani Ibrahim he jippotooɓe he mum hanaa ngam ɓe tokki ko Tawreeta wi'i o waɗaa. O waɗaakana daliila dartinaaku keɓeteengu har goonɗinol.
45004014	Nde nii tokkol Tawreeta waɗata neɗɗo donoowo duuniyaaru, ndenne goonɗinol neɗɗo warti meere, alkawal ngal Alla waɗi ngaal duu walaa ko nafirta.
45004015	Tawreeta, tikkere Alla tan waddata. Amma nde nii Tawreeta walaano, gaɗol hakke duu walaano.
45004016	Ngam majjum waɗi sey nde neɗɗo goonɗini ko rona fodoore Alla ndee. Ndonngu fodoore ndee duu no forba. Ɗum duu ngam hokkude jippotooɓe he Ibrahim fuu laawol heɓude ndonngu ngu. Hanaa tokkuɓe Tawreeta tan, baa goonɗinɓe hano no Ibrahim maama himɓe fuu goonɗiniri.
45004017	Hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Mi waɗi laatoɗaa baaba lenyi ɗuuɗi. Ndenne ɗum tabbintini amaana oon yeeso Alla mo Ibrahim goonɗini, Alla ummintinoowo maayɓe, mo nawtortaako goɗɗum, taga goɗɗum.
45004018	Ibrahim deki tammude mum dow Alla baa nii ko wakkati mum o walaano tammude fuu. O goonɗini ngam majjum waɗi o laatii baaba lenyi ɗuɗɗi. Hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Jippotooɓe he maaɗa ɗuuɗan hano koode kammu.
45004019	Wakkati mum Ibrahim walaana duuɓi hemre, baa nii ko o hi'i semmbe ɓanndu makko hanti, Saratu duuɓi ɓeyngu mum yawti, ɗum fuu waɗaay o soƴƴoroo gaɗa nder goonɗinol makko.
45004020	O sikkaay alkawal ngal Alla waɗani mo, o accaa goonɗinde Alla. Amma goonɗinol makko semmbinɗini mo, o teddini Alla.
45004021	O tabbintini ko Alla no woodi baawɗe humnude alkawal mum.
45004022	Ɗum waɗi Ibrahim daliila goonɗinol mum Alla adi mo jom dartinaaku.
45004023	Ko winndaa wi'aa o jom dartinaaku hanaa kanko tan wondaa.
45004024	Amma ɗum winndaama ngam meeɗen, enen ɓe Alla wartiri jom'en dartinaaku, enen goonɗinɓe ummintinɗo Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen.
45004025	Daliila hakkeeji meeɗen waɗi Iisa waraa, nden o ummintinaa he maayde ngam adeɗen jom'en dartinaaku yeeso Alla.
45005001	Ko nii en keɓii wartireede jom'en dartinaaku yeeso Alla har goonɗinol meeɗen, potal naati hakkune meeɗen he Alla daliila Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
45005002	Har goonɗinol meeɗen, kanko Iisa oon, o udditani en dammbugal keɓol moƴƴere Alla mo ngonɗen nder mum joonin. Eɗen nana belɗum ngam eɗen ngatti gokka heɓude teddungal Alla.
45005003	Hanaa ɗum tan, eɗen nana belɗum torraaji ɗi njarten ngam eɗen anndi ko jarɗe torra no ekkintina en dow munyal.
45005004	Nde neɗɗo no munya torra, munyal mum rimataana aadilaaku, aadilaaku duu rimataana tammude.
45005005	Tammude ndeen duu semtintaa en ngam Alla loowi hidde mum sanne nder ɓerɗe meeɗen har Ruuhu Ceniiɗo mo o hokki en.
45005006	Nder wakkati mo tampuɗen, dey-dey wakkati mo Alla suɓii, Almasiihu maayi ngam sabbu waɗooɓe hakke.
45005007	No tiiɗi, goɗɗo jaɓa mursa yonki mum ngam sabbu goɗɗo, baa nii nde tawi neɗɗo oo no jom dartinaaku. Amma tawte no waɗoo goɗɗo nyoƴƴa ɓerne mum mursa yonki mum ngam makko.
45005008	Amma Alla holli en hidde mum ngam wakkati ngonnoɗen waɗooɓe hakke, Almasiihu maayanii en.
45005009	Joonin ko ngartiraɗen jom'en dartinaaku daliila ƴiiƴam Almasiihu, ndenne tabbat o hisinan en tikkere Alla.
45005010	Ndenno en wayɓe Alla amma hannden potal warti hakkune meeɗen he makko daliila maayde Ɓiyiiko. Joonin ko potal no hakkune meeɗen he Alla en tabbintini ko Alla hisinan en ngam Ɓiyiiko no wuuri.
45005011	Eɗen nana belɗum Alla hanaa ngam potal ngaal tan, amma eɗen nana belɗum ngam Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen waɗi joonin keɓuɗen potal ngaal.
45005012	Hakke daliila neɗɗo gooto naatiri duuniyaaru. Hakke ɗe neɗɗo oo waɗi, waddi maayde. Nii waɗi ko maayde no dow gi'al daane neɗɗo fuu ngam walaa mo waɗaay hakke.
45005013	Tabbat fadde Tawreeta jippineede, hakke no nder duuniyaaru. Amma wakkati Tawreeta walaano Alla nanngirtaa himɓe hakkeeji mum'en.
45005014	Illa jamaanu Aadamu warde jamaanu Muusa maayde woodi jaalorgal dow himɓe fuu. Inde dow gi'al daane neɗɗo fuu baa mo waɗaay hakke ir hakke ɗe Aadamu waɗi wakkati o murtunoo he tilsinoore Alla. Aadamu woni alaama tinndinoowo garoowo oon.
45005015	Moƴƴere nde Alla hokkata no seedi he hakke mo Aadamu waɗi. Himɓe ɗuɓɓe maayi daliila hakke ɗe neɗɗo gooto waɗi. Amma moƴƴere nde Alla hokkata himɓe heewɓe daliila Iisa Almasiihu tan no mawni faa hanaa seɗɗa.
45005016	Amma, kokkal ngal Alla hokkata no seedi he hakke neɗɗo gooto oo, ngam kiite ɗe Alla taƴani neɗɗo gooto oo waɗi en jom'en hakke. Amma moƴƴere nde Alla waɗi forba daliila hakkeeji ɗi nde'ataa woni wartirde neɗɗo fuu jom dartinaaku.
45005017	Nde nii goonga fuu daliila hakke neɗɗo gooto maayde ŋabbi gi'al daane himɓe fuu. Ndenne, sikka fuu walaa ko heɓuɓe moƴƴere mawne ngam wartireede jom'en dartinaaku, laamodoto he Alla, mbuurda he makko daliila Iisa Almasiihu gooto oo.
45005018	Ndenne, no hakke neɗɗo gooto dekkiri maayde dow gi'al daane neɗɗo fuu, hano non duu gollal jom dartinaaku gooto waɗata himɓe fuu jom'en dartinaaku. Har gollal ngaal, ɓe fuu ɓe keɓi mbuurnam.
45005019	Hano no himɓe heewɓe laatori waɗooɓe hakke daliila gaɗol hakke neɗɗo gooto, hano non duu himɓe heewɓe ngartan jom'en dartinaaku daliila ɗowtanaaki neɗɗo gooto.
45005020	Daliila gaɗuɗo Tawreeta waddaa woni himɓe fuu mbaawa hi'ude no kam'en ngaɗiri hakke sanne. Wakkati fuu mo gaɗol hakke semmbe mum ɓeydi, sey moƴƴere Alla ɓura ɗum ɗuuɗude.
45005021	Ngam majjum waɗi hano no ndenno hakke laamorii har maayde, non hannden moƴƴere Alla duu woodiri baawɗe wartirde himɓe jom'en dartinaaku. Nii watta ko keɓen mbuurnam nduumiiɗam faa abada daliila Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
45006001	Ndenne, ɗume mbi'eten ɗo joonin ? En tinnotoo nder waɗude hakke heɓa moƴƴere Alla ɓeydoo naa noy ?
45006002	Toy nee, hitere fuu seedataako ɗum. To hakke en maayɓe, en ceedi he mayre, haanaa tinnoɗen eɗen ngaɗa hakke.
45006003	Ndenne, on anndaa ko batisma meeɗen peŋuɗo en he Iisa Almasiihu he hoore mum, feŋi en he maayde makko duu ?
45006004	Ndenne har batisma meeɗen, hano nii en ufidaaɓe he makko heɓa hano no o ummintiniraa he maayde nder baawɗe Alla, enen duu naaten nder mbuurnam kesam.
45006005	Ngam enen he makko, en fuu en kawti maayde worre, en tabbintinii ko en kawtidan duu he makko ummitaaki gooti.
45006006	Eɗen anndi duu ko jikku meeɗen kiinngu tontidaa he makko dow bardugal. Ndenne, hakke gonnooɗe he meeɗen ɗeen moytaama. Joonin en coptake maccangaaku hakke,
45006007	ngam maayɗo fuu rimɗinaama he maccangaaku hakke.
45006008	Ko nii waɗi, enen en maaydi he makko, tabbat non en mbuurdan he makko.
45006009	Ngam eɗen anndi ko waɗi Almasiihu ummitii he maayde, o maayataa kaden. Maayde walaa baawɗe gom fuu dow makko kaden.
45006010	Almasiihu maayi, maayde makko gaba go'o hakkiti hakke he makko. Joonin omo wuuri, omo wondi he Alla.
45006011	Hano non, onon duu, adee ko'e mooɗon hano on maayɓe, ɓe hakke walaa baawɗe gom fuu dow mum'en, mbuuron no Alla hiɗiri nder kawtal mooɗon he Iisa Almasiihu.
45006012	Ndenne, to accee hakke heɓa baawɗe fuu dow ɓalli mooɗon maayooji tokkon muuyɗe majji.
45006013	To adee terɗe ɓalli mooɗon kokkon hakke ɗe laatoo ko waawi nawtoreede ngam waɗude ko boni. Amma kokkee ko'e mooɗon Alla dey-dey no haaniri hano on ummintinaaɓe he maayde, ngartiraa he mbuurnam. Nawtoree terɗe ɓalli mooɗon ngam waɗude ko woodi dartinaaku.
45006014	Hakke heɓataa jaalorgal fuu dow mooɗon kaden ngam hanaa nder laamu Tawreeta ngonɗon amma nder laamu moƴƴere Alla ngonɗon.
45006015	Ndenne noy non ? En ngaɗan hakke ngam eɗen nder moƴƴere Alla, en ngalaa nder laamu Tawreeta naa ? Hitere fuu seedataako ɗum !
45006016	On anndaa ko nde on kokki ko'e mooɗon goɗɗo ngam ɗowtanoɗon joomum, on laatake maccuɗo joomum. Ndenne, nde nii on maccuɓe hakke, hakke yaarataana on na to maayde. Nde nii on maccuɓe Alla, Alla waɗa on jom'en dartinaaku ngam oɗon ɗowtanoo ɗum.
45006017	Yettoore woodani Alla. Ndenno on maccuɓe hakke, amma hannden on ɗowtanake ekkintinooje gaɗanaaɗe himɓe fuu he ɓerne worre.
45006018	On ndimɗinaama he hakke, on laatake maccuɓe dartinaaku.
45006019	Miɗo haalda he mooɗon ɗo no paamirton ngam on cemmbiɗaa. Ndenno on ngartiriino ko'e mooɗon maccuɓe terɗe ɓanndu ngaɗuɗon ko nyiddinii, walaa ko fonnditi nder mbuurnam mooɗon. Ko ɗum rimani on woni murtol he Alla. Joonin ko ngaɗoton woni, ngatton terɗe mooɗon fuu nder laawol dartinaaku hano on maccuɓe maggu, ko ɗum rimanoyta on woni senaare.
45006020	Wakkati ngonnoɗon nder maccangaaku hakke, on paalaaka he gaɗol golle dartinaaku.
45006021	Ɓeydaari ndiye keɓuɗon nder golle mooɗon ? Hannden semteene tan haɓɓi ko'e mooɗon ngam maayde woni ko ɗe ndimani on.
45006022	Amma joonin, ko on ndimɗinaama he maccangaaku hakke, on laatake maccuɓe Alla. Ɓeydaari ndi keɓuɗon woni senaare, nde timmirde mum woni mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
45006023	Ngam njobdi hakke woni maayde, amma moƴƴere nde Alla hokkata forba ndeen woni mbuurnam nduumiiɗam nder kawtal he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
45007001	Banndiraaɓe, on fuu on annduɓe ko wi'aa nder Tawreeta. Ndenne, oɗon mbaawi faamude ko ngiɗumi haalude. Wakkati neɗɗo wuuri tan, Tawreeta woodi baawɗe dawrande ɗum.
45007002	Alal misaali debbo kaɓɓanaaɗo, nde nii gorum no wuuri, Tawreeta haɓɓodirii ɓe. Amma nyannde fuu goriiko maayi, ɓoggi dewngal kaɓɓuɗi mo he goriiko taƴi.
45007003	Amma nde goriiko maayaay faa gorko gom haɓɓani mo, no wi'etee o jeenoowo non. Amma nde goriiko maayi, ɓoggi dewngal makko ɗi taƴi. Nde gorko gom haɓɓani mo, o wi'ataake jeenoowo.
45007004	Banndiraaɓe misaali oo, no misaali yahde he mooɗon. Onon duu, daliila maayde Iisa Almasiihu, on laatake maayɓe to Tawreeta. Ndenne, walaa fuu ko wondi on he Tawreeta, on kawtaana he neɗɗo maaynooɗo ummintina ngam ngaɗen ko woodi barke yeeso Alla.
45007005	Wakkati tokkunoɗen muuyɗe ɓalli meeɗen, Tawreeta semmbinɗini muuyɗe ɗeen ngam ngollen ko rimanta en maayde.
45007006	Amma daliila en maaydi he Almasiihu, en ndimɗinaama he Tawreeta gaɗuɗo en maccuɓe. Joonin en njoofi laawol meeɗen kiinngol, laawol Tawreeta, eɗen ngollana Alla dow laawol kesol gom, laawol Ruuhu makko.
45007007	Too, ɗume mbi'eten ɗo ? Tawreeta he hoore mum no hakke naa ? Nowru fuu nanataa ɗum. Nde hanaa daliila Tawreeta, mi waawaa anndi ɗume woni hakke. Nde Tawreeta wi'aay to suuna ko goɗɗo, nden mi anndataano ko woni suuno.
45007008	Amma hakke heɓi laawol nder tilsinooje Tawreeta uppi kam nder ir suuno fuu. Ngam nde Tawreeta walaano, semmbe hakke waati.
45007009	Miin he hoore am, wakkati mi anndaano Tawreeta, miɗo wuurunoo, amma wakkati anndunoomi ko haɗaa, hakke waɗi yonki, miin duu maayumi.
45007010	Tilsinooje Tawreeta kaanuɗe hollude kam laawol ngol tokkanmi ko mi heɓa mbuurnam nduumiiɗam, tilsinooje Tawreeta ɗe pooɗani-kam maayde.
45007011	Hakke heɓi laawol, nawtori tilsinooje Tawreeta, ƴoyni kam, wari kam.
45007012	Tabbat Tawreeta he hoore mum no senii, tilsinooje mayre duu no cenii. Iɗe moƴƴi, iɗe ngoodi dartinaaku.
45007013	Ndenne, ko wooɗi ɗum kanƴum waddani kam maayde naa ? Aa'a ! Hakke waddani kam maayde ndeen. Har tilsinooje Tawreeta lobbe ɗee, hakke rimani kam maayde ngam ɗum hi'a ko hakke no wannga nder baawɗe mawɗe.
45007014	Eɗen anndi nii ko Tawreeta ƴuwaana to Ruuhu Alla, amma miin kay, mi nanndaana he accidaaɗo he hoore mum, mi maccuɗo hakke.
45007015	Mi anndanaa ko ngaɗanmi ngam hanaa ko ngiɗumi waɗude kam mi woni miɗo waɗa. Kaden ko mbanyumi kam mi woni miɗo waɗa.
45007016	Nde nii miɗo waɗa ko mi hiɗaa waɗude, mi holli ko mi jaɓi ko Tawreeta no wooɗi.
45007017	Ndenne, hanaa min woni no waɗa ɗum, amma hakke gonɗe nder am ɗeen ngoni no waɗa ɗum.
45007018	Miɗo anndi duu ko wooɗi fuu walaa nder jikku am, ngam anniya waɗude ko wooɗi no nder ɓerne am amma mi waawaa waɗude ɗum.
45007019	Mi waɗataa ko wooɗi fuu ko ngiɗumi waɗude, amma ko boni ko mi hiɗaa waɗude kam woni ko ngaɗanmi.
45007020	Nde nii miɗo waɗa ko mi hiɗaa waɗude, ndenne iɗum holla ko hanaa miin woni no waɗa ɗum, amma hakke gonɗe nder am ngoni no waɗa ɗum.
45007021	Wakkati taykiimi fuu, miɗo hiɗi waɗude ko wooɗi, amma hakke no wondi he am no haɗa kam waɗude ɗum.
45007022	Nder ɓerne am miɗo nana belɗum tilsinooje Tawreeta.
45007023	Amma nder terɗe ɓanndu am fuu mi hi'i tilsinoore gom no habda he tilsinoore nde hakkillo am holli kam no wooɗi. Tilsinoore ndee no waɗa kam maccuɗo hakke gonɗe nder ɓanndu am.
45007024	Kaari, miɗo yurminii ! Moy hisinta kam sarri ɓanndu yaarooru he maayde nde hanaa Alla ?
45007025	Jettooje ngoodani Alla daliila Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen ! Ndenne miin, nder hakkillo am mi maccuɗo Tawreeta, amma ngam jikku no hakke, mi maccuɗo hakke.
45008001	Joonin kiite fuu ngalaa dow daane wonduɓe he Iisa Almasiihu.
45008002	Nde en ngondi he Almasiihu tilsinoore Ruuhu Alla hokkata en mbuurnam. Inde rimɗina en he laamu hakke, inde rimɗina en duu he maayde.
45008003	Tawreeta waawaayno rimɗinde en ngam nder ɓii-aadamaaku meeɗen en ngalaa semmbe ɗowtanaade ko wi'aa nder mayre amma Alla rimɗini en. O lili Ɓiyiiko nder duuniyaaru ngam rimɗina en. O wari nder ɓanndu nanndunu he ɓanndu waɗooɓe hakke ngam o laatoo sadaka ngam hakke. O sankita semmbe hakke gonɗo nder ɓalli meeɗen.
45008004	Alla waɗi ɗum ngam enen tokkuɓe ko Ruuhu Alla wi'i hanaa tokkuɓe muuyɗe ɓalli mum'en, mbaawen waɗude golle dartinaaku ɗe Tawreeta wi'i.
45008005	Tokkuɗo muuyɗe ɓanndu, muuyɗe ɓanndu ndawranta hakkillo mum. Amma tokkuɗo Ruuhu, Ruuhu dawranta hakkillo mum.
45008006	Neɗɗo fuu tokki giɗaale ɓerne mum, maayde woni ko mum. Amma neɗɗo fuu tokki ko Ruuhu Alla wi'i heɓan mbuurnam, heɓan jam.
45008007	Ngam dekude ɓerne mum dow giɗaale ɓanndu no wanyude Alla. Ɗe ɗowtanaaki Tawreeta, ɗe mbaawaa duu ɗowtanaade nde.
45008008	Tokkuɗo muuyɗe ɓanndu waawaa welude Alla.
45008009	Amma onon, on tokkaay muuyɗe ɓanndu. On tokkaana muuyɗe Ruuhu Alla ngam Ruuhu Alla oo no tawa nder mooɗon. Nde neɗɗo walaa Ruuhu Almasiihu, Almasiihu njeyaa ɗum.
45008010	Nde nii Almasiihu no nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, baa nii ko ɓanndu mooɗon no maayooru daliila hakke, Ruuhu makko no hokkan on mbuurnam ngam on jom'en dartinaaku yeeso Alla.
45008011	Nde Ruuhu mo ummintini Iisa Almasiihu he maayde no nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, ummintinɗo Iisa oo hokkan ɓalli mooɗon maayooji ɗii mbuurnam. O hokkiran ɗam Ruuhu makko gonɗo nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
45008012	Ngam majjum waɗi banndiraaɓe, no woodi nyamaane gom wonnde dow daaɗe meeɗen, amma hanaa muuyɗe ɓalli meeɗen tokki en nyamaane ndee. Ndenne, haanaa tokken muuyɗe ɓalli meeɗen.
45008013	Ngam nde nii oɗon tokkitii muuyɗe ɓalli mooɗon, on maayan. Amma nde nii on nawtorake Ruuhu Alla barɗo muuyɗe ɓalli mooɗon, on keɓan mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
45008014	Mo Ruuhu Alla ɗowata fuu no ɓii-Alla.
45008015	Alla hokkaay on Ruuhu gaɗoowo on maccuɓe, kulkulal heewa on. Amma o hokkaana on naa Ruuhu gaɗoowo on ɓiɓɓe makko. Ruuhu mo daliila mum noddirten mo Abba.
45008016	Ruuhu Alla he hoore mum no wi'a en nder ɓerɗe meeɗen ko en ɓiɓɓe Alla.
45008017	Nde nii en ɓiɓɓe Alla, eɗen ngoodi mbaka nder ndonu ngu o fodani himɓe makko. En ndonidan he Almasiihu kujje lobbe ɗe o heɓi fuu. Tabbat, nde nii en kawtidi he Almasiihu torra, en kawtidan duu he makko teddungal.
45008018	Mi tabbintini ko walaa no neɗɗo waawi fonnude torra meeɗen hannden he teddungal ngal Alla wannginanta en yahde yeeso.
45008019	Nde goonga, ko tagaa fuu no haaɓa hi'aay nyalaane nde Alla wannginta ɓiɓɓe mum.
45008020	Ko tagaa fuu saami nder juuɗe laamu ngu walaa fuu darja gom. Hanaa ko tagaa ɗum suɓii naatude nder juuɗe ɗee amma Alla he hoore mum watti ɗum nder majje. Amma baa ko nii he banndum waɗi, laawol tammude no ɗon ngol ittaaka.
45008021	Ko tagaa fuu no rimɗintee he maccangaaku semmbe bonnooje, ɗum heɓa mbaka nder teddungal ɓiɓɓe Alla.
45008022	Eɗen anndi duu ko faa warde hannden, ko tagaa fuu no otta dow e ley hano debbo mo ŋatawere nanngi.
45008023	Hanaa ko tagaa tan woni no otta. Enen he ko'e meeɗen eɗen otta, enen keɓuɓe Ruuhu Alla, Ruuhu laatiiɗo huune arannde nder kujje ɗe Alla hokkata en. Eɗen otta nder ɓerɗe meeɗen, en kaaɓi Alla waɗaay en ɓiɓɓe muuɗum, o rimɗina ɓalli meeɗen duu.
45008024	En kisinaama ngam eɗen ngoodi tammude tan. Amma nde nii en ngi'ii ko ngattuɗen tammude meeɗen dow mum, ndenne ko min tammi ɗum hanaa tammude meeɗen kaden. Moy wattata tammude mum he ko arti heɓi ?
45008025	Amma nde nii en ngatti tammude dow ko en keɓaay, too, en keɗoto ɗum, munyen.
45008026	Munyal wallan en non, Ruuhu kam duu waran walla en nder jaccere meeɗen. Ngam nde goonga, en anndaa ko kaanuɗen du'aade. Amma Ruuhu Alla he hoore mum eelanta en Alla wakkati fuu mo keppuɗen ko mbi'en. O uumanan en nder uumaali ɓurɗi haalaaji luggiɗidde.
45008027	Alla gi'oowo ko tawa nder ɓerne neɗɗo duu no anndi anniya Ruuhu mum, ngam Ruuhu Alla no eelana himɓe makko dey-dey he muuyɗe makko.
45008028	Eɗen anndi duu ko Alla waɗata fuu omo waɗa ɗum ngam ɗum laatanoo hiɗuɓe mo moƴƴere. Woodanɓe mo hidde ɓee, o noddi ɓe, no o hiɗiri.
45008029	Ɓe Alla artunoo suɓii ɓeen, o suɓake ɓe fadde duuniyaaru tageede, kamɓe duu o wartiri feere ngam ɓe ngarta hano Ɓiyiiko heɓa Ɓiyiiko duu laatoo afo hakkune rimdaaɓe mum heewɓe.
45008030	Ɓe o artunoo o suɓii ɓeen kamɓe ngoni ɓe o noddi. Ɓe o noddi ɓeen ngoni ɓe o wartiri jom'en dartinaaku yeeso makko. Heɓuɓe wartireede jom'en dartinaaku yeeso makko ɓeen, kam'en o hokki teddungal.
45008031	Nde Alla no wondi he meeɗen, moy waawi heɓude jaalorgal dow meeɗen ? Ndenne ɗume mbi'eten dow fii oo ?
45008032	Alla mo haɗaay Ɓiyum mursa yonki mum ngam meeɗen no waawa saloo moƴƴande en ko eeluɗen mo fuu naa ?
45008033	Moy waawi felude ɓe Alla suɓi ? Walaa, Alla he hoore mum wartiri ɓe jom'en dartinaaku !
45008034	Moy waawi hiitii ɓe ? Walaa ! Iisa Almasiihu maayi, kaden duu o ummitake. Omo jooɗii nyaamo Alla, omo eelana en Alla.
45008035	Ɗume waawi senndude en he hidde Almasiihu ? Saɗornam naa ɓillaare naa torra naa rafo naa rafi goɗɗum naa masiiba naa takubaahi ?
45008036	No winndaa wi'aa : Ngam maaɗa miɗen ɓadii maayde. Nyannde fuu, miɗen ndaaree, hano baali kirseteeɗi.
45008037	Amma nder fii fuu ko hewti en, enen ngoni heɓuɓe jaalorgal daliila giɗɗo en.
45008038	Ngam mi tabbintini ko hanaa maayde, hanaa mbuurnam, hanaa maleykaaɓe, hanaa ko laami dow, hanaa hannden, hanaa jaaŋo, hanaa semmbe,
45008039	hanaa ko tawa faa dow, hanaa duu ko tawa faa ley, huune fuu ko tagaa waawaa senndude en he hidde nde Alla waɗani en daliila kawtal meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
45009001	Ko ngiɗumi wi'ude ɗum tabbat ɗum goonga ngam miɗo wondi he Almasiihu. Nder ɓerne am duu, mi tabbintini ko Ruuhu Ceniiɗo no seedanoo kam ko kaalan mi ɗum tabbat no goonga.
45009002	Wakkati fuu mettorgal he naawɗum ɓerne no he am faa noy walaa.
45009003	Nde nii laawol no woodi, mi naalee, mi senndee he Almasiihu ngam banndiraaɓe am keɓa kisinam.
45009004	Kamɓe ngoni lenyol Isra'ilankooɓe ɓe Alla wartiri ɓiɓɓe mum. Alla wannginani ɓe teddungal mum, o haɓɓidi amaana he maɓɓe, o hokki ɓe Tawreeta, o holli ɓe no ɓe ndewirta mo, o waɗani ɓe alkawaliiji.
45009005	O itti ɓe he maamiraaɓe Yahudankooɓe mawɓe anndaaɓe. Almasiihu har ɓii-aadamaaku mum ƴuwi he lenyol ngool. Kanko woni Alla laamiiɗo dow huune fuu. Jettooje ngoodani mo faa abada. Aamiin !
45009006	Hanaa ngam wi'ude ko Alla humnaay alkawal mum, ngam hanaa jippotooɓe he Isra'el fuu ngoni ɓiɓɓe Isra'el.
45009007	Kaden duu hanaa jippotooɓe he Ibrahim fuu ngoni ɓiɓɓe ɓe Alla fodanii Ibrahim. Ngam Alla wi'i Ibrahim : Har Isiyaaku keɓirtaa jippotooɓe he maaɗa ɓe podanimaami.
45009008	Ndenne, hanaa ɓiɓɓe wurtiiɓe nder duhol Ibrahim fuu ngoni ɓiɓɓe Alla. Amma rimaaɓe daliila alkawal mo Alla waɗi, ɓeen ngoni jippotooɓe he makko.
45009009	Ngam Alla waɗanii mo alkawal wi'i : Mi wartan wuro maaɗa mawuuri nder wakkati oo, mi tawan deeka Saratu heɓi ɓiɗɗo gorko.
45009010	Hanaa misaali oo tan woodi, funeeɓe Rebeeka, Yakuuba e Isuwa. Isiyaaku maamii'en rimi ɓe.
45009011	Illa ɓe ndimaaka Alla wi'i Rebeeka : Minyiiyo oon maran mawnum. Ɗum tabbiti duu fadde maɓɓe waɗude ko wooɗi naa ko boni. Alla wi'i haala kaa ngam hollude cuɓeteeɗo oon no suɓetee non hanaa ngam golle ɗe waɗataa, amma joomum no suɓetee non ngam onɗon Alla noddoowo neɗɗo fuu hiɗi.
45009013	Hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Yakuuba korsinmi, amma Isuwa mbanyumi.
45009014	Ndenne, ɗume mbi'eten ? En mbi'an Alla waɗaay dey-dey naa ? Abada !
45009015	Ngam o wi'i Muusa : Mi moƴƴanan mo ngiɗumi moƴƴande, mi yurmoto mo ngiɗumi yurmaade.
45009016	Ndenne, Alla suɓataako neɗɗo ngam joomum no hiɗi o suɓoo ɗum naa ngam joomum no tittinkini. Amma o suɓoto joomum ngam omo yurmoo ɗum.
45009017	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa Alla wi'i Firawna : Mi waɗi ma laamiiɗo ngam daliila maaɗa, mi holla baawɗe am, innde am gooynee nokku fuu nder duuniyaaru.
45009018	Ndenne, Alla yurmoto mo hiɗi, yorna ɓerne mo hiɗi.
45009019	Hakkune mooɗon goɗɗo ƴaman kam wi'a : « Nde nii Alla no yurmoo mo hiɗi, yorna ɓerne mo hiɗi, ɗume Alla felirta himɓe ? Moy waawi salaade muuyɗe makko ? »
45009020	Aan ɓii-aadama, aan a moy faa njeddaa Alla ? Ko mahaa no waawi wi'ude mahuɗo ɗum Ko waɗi mahirɗaa kam nii ?
45009021	Mahoowo looɗe no waawi waɗirde loopal ko hiɗi fuu. Loopal gootal ngal o mahirta loone ngam nde golliree nder golle lobbe sanne. O maha wonnde duu ngam nde golliree nder golle ɗe ngalaa darja baa seɗɗa.
45009022	Nii woni no golle Alla nga'i. O hiɗiino hollude tikkere makko, nden o holla baawɗe makko. Amma himɓe haanuɓe tikkere makko, wonɓe dow laawol hiitaneede ɓeen, o munyii ɓe munyal manngal.
45009023	O waɗi ɗum duu ngam o wannginana ɓe o nanta yurmeene mum'en ɓeen teddungal makko ngal walaa keerol.
45009024	Enen duu ngoni ɓe o nanta yurmeene mum'en ɓeen. O noddaay en hakkune Yahudankooɓe tan. O noddi en duu hakkune ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe.
45009025	Ɗum woni ko Alla haali nder dewtere Hose'a : Himɓe ɓe kanaa himɓe am, mi noddiran ɓe himɓe am. Ɓe mi horsinaay, mi noddiran ɓe himɓe am horsuɓe.
45009026	To ɓe mbi'aa, ɓe kanaa himɓe am, ɓe inndirtee ɓiɓɓe Alla duumiiɗo.
45009027	Esaaya kam duu haali sanne dow ɓiɓɓe Isra'el, wi'i : Baa ɓiɓɓe Isra'el ɗuuɗi faa poti no taasiri maayo, nder maɓɓe seɗɗa tan hisintee.
45009028	Ngam Joomiraawo tabbintinan haala mum dow duuniyaaru. O humnan ka duu law-law.
45009029	Hano no Esaaya waɗirnoo annabaaku wi'i : Nde nii Alla Joomiraawo dawranoowo huune fuu accaayno himɓe seɗɗa nder lenyol meeɗen, nden en laatakeno ir Sodooma, en nanndiino he Gomoora.
45009030	Ɗume mbi'eten nde nii ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, ɓe tarsinaaki fuu tefi dartinaaku yeeso Alla keɓi dartinaaku ? Dartinaaku ngu ɓe keɓi nguu, ir dartinaaku keɓirteengu har goonɗinol non.
45009031	Amma ɓiɓɓe Isra'el tefuɓe dartinaaku har tokkol Tawreeta, keɓaay ngu.
45009032	Ko waɗi ? Ɓe miilaaki ko goonɗinol hokkata ɓe ngu. Amma ko ɓe miili woni golle maɓɓe kokkata ɓe ngu. Ɓe pergi he hayre fergoore neɗɗo ndeen.
45009033	Hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Mi resan nder Siyon hayre fergoore himɓe. Nde waɗa ɓe caama. Amma neɗɗo fuu goonɗini mo, semtataa abada.
45010001	Banndiraaɓe, ko ɓurmi hidde fuu kam woni ɓiɓɓe Isra'el fuu keɓa kisinam. Ɗum duu woni du'aa'u mo ndu'ananmi ɓe nder ɓerne am, mi eela Alla.
45010002	Miɗo seedanoo ɓe, wi'ude ko sikka fuu walaa ɓe kokki ko'e maɓɓe he ɓerne worre ɓe ngollana Alla. Amma kokkol ko'e maɓɓe ngool sinngaaki dow anndal.
45010003	Ɓe anndaa laawol ngol neɗɗo tokkata ko Alla wartira ɗum jom dartinaaku. Ɓe ndawrani ko'e maɓɓe laawol ngol ɓe tokkata ngam laataade jom'en dartinaaku yeeso Alla. Ɓe cuɓaaki tokkude laawol ngol Alla darni ngam wartirde himɓe jom'en dartinaaku.
45010004	Almasiihu wari humni Tawreeta ngam goonɗinɗo mo fuu wartiree jom dartinaaku.
45010005	Muusa winndi dow dartinaaku ƴuwngu nder Tawreeta wi'i : Neɗɗo fuu ɗowtani ko tilsinooje Tawreeta wi'i, wuuran daliila majjum.
45010006	Amma ndaa ko haala Alla wi'i dow laataade jom dartinaaku daliila goonɗinol neɗɗo nii : To wi'u nder ɓerne maa moy waawi ƴeenyi dow kammu ?Almasiihu jippaaki naa ?
45010007	Naa kaden : Moy jippina nder ngaykaa laahara nga walaa fuu keerol ?Almasiihu ummintinaaka he maayde naa ?
45010008	Ko winndaa wi'aa woni : Haala Alla no hadde maaɗa, ika nder hunnduko maaɗa, ika nder ɓerne maaɗa. Haala Alla ka woni waaju goonɗinol, mo min ngoni miɗen ngaɗa.
45010009	Ngam nde nii a yardake a wi'i aan he hoore maaɗa ko Iisa no Joomiraawo, ngoonɗinaa nder ɓerne maaɗa ko Alla ummintinii mo he maayde, a hisintee.
45010010	Goonɗinde nder ɓerne no waɗa Alla wartira neɗɗo jom dartinaaku. Fiirtude hunnduko mum yeeso himɓe fuu wi'a Iisa Almasiihu woni Joomiraawo mum no holla ko neɗɗo heɓi kisinam.
45010011	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Goonɗinɗo mo fuu semtataa.
45010012	Joonin, walaa ko senndi Yahudanke he mo hanaa Yahudanke. Joomiraawo gooto jeyii ɓe. Omo barkinɗina faa noy walaa neɗɗo fuu eeluɗo mo.
45010013	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Neɗɗo fuu eeli Joomiraawo hisina ɗum, o hisinan ɗum.
45010014	Amma noy waɗata neɗɗo eela mo nde goonɗinaay ? Noy neɗɗo goonɗinirta mo, nde nii neɗɗo nanaay filla makko ? Noy neɗɗo nanirta filla makko, nde nii baajotooɗo walaa ?
45010015	Noy neɗɗo waajortoo, nde nii lilaaka ? No winndaa wi'aa : Belɗum ɓerne non, gi'ol garki koyɗe jottinooje Habaru lobbo.
45010016	Amma hanaa himɓe fuu ngoonɗini Habaru lobbo oon. Esaaya wi'i : Yaa Joomiraawo, moy goonɗini waaju amin ?
45010017	Ngam majjum waɗi sey to neɗɗo hettinake waaju ko goonɗina. Waaju oo duu, o waaju dow Almasiihu.
45010018	Mi ƴaman on, goonga fuu ɓiɓɓe Isra'el nanaay mo naa ? Ɓe nani ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Daaɗe lilaaɓe Alla nanaama nder leyɗe fuu, waaju maɓɓe fiilake kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu.
45010019	Miɗo ƴama kaden, ɓiɓɓe Isra'el paamaay naa ? Arannde nii har hunnduko Muusa, Alla haali, wi'i : Mi waɗan kiron, ɓe kanaa jeyaaɓe am, mi waɗan tikkanon lenyol ngool walaa anndal.
45010020	Nden Esaaya hulaay wi'ude Alla wi'i : Ɓe tefaayno kam, ngiiti kam. Ɓe ƴamanaayno kam ɓeen duu, mi wannginanii ɗum'en hoore am.
45010021	Amma har ko daarata ɓiɓɓe Isra'el, Alla wi'i : Jemma e nyalooma, juuɗe am no peerti, ngam jaɓɓaade himɓe am, yorɓe-ko'e, saliiɓe ɗowtanaade kam.
45011001	Too, mi ƴami on : « Alla woppi ɓiɓɓe Isra'el fuu naa ? » Hitere fuu hi'ataa ɗum. Miin he hoore am, mi ɓii-Isra'el, mi jippotooɗo Ibrahim, mi ƴuwi nder lenyol Benyamin.
45011002	Alla woppaay himɓe mum ɓe suɓinoo illa arannde. Oɗon anndi ko winndaa wi'aa dow Eliya nder dewte Alla. No winndaa wi'aa ko Eliya wulliri ɓiɓɓe Isra'el to Alla, wi'i :
45011003	Yaa Joomiraawo, ɓe mbarii annabiiɓe maaɗa, ɓe cankitii nokkuuje ɗe dow mum'en sadakaaji maaɗa mbuletee. Miin tan hori, miin duu iɓe tefa warde kam.
45011004	Amma ko Alla jaabii mo wi'i nii : Mi resani hoore am worɓe ujunaaji jeɗɗo, ɓe cujidanaay Ba'al.
45011005	Non ɗum wa'i hannden duu. Hakkune himɓe, no tawa himɓe seɗɗa ɓe Alla suɓii daliila moƴƴere mum.
45011006	Cuɓaaki ki Alla suɓii neɗɗo daliila moƴƴere mum hanaa cuɓaaki ngaɗaaki daliila golle neɗɗo non. Ngam nde nii daliila golle neɗɗo Alla waɗi ki, nden moƴƴere makko laatataakono forba.
45011007	Ndenne, noy waɗi ? Ɓiɓɓe Isra'el keɓaay ko tefunoo. Amma ɓe Alla suɓii hakkune maɓɓe, keɓi ko tefannoo, horiiɓe ɓeen duu ɓe fuu ɓe ngarti yorɓe-ko'e.
45011008	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Alla wartirii ɓe wemmbaaɓe. Iɓe ngoodi gite, amma ɓe ngi'ataa, iɓe ngoodi noppi amma ɓe nanataa. Nii duu ɗum njooɗori he maɓɓe faa warde hannden.
45011009	Daawda duu wi'i : Alla wan juulɗe maɓɓe laatanoo ɓe tunnirgal, ɓe caama nder maggal, Alla wan ɓe pergo, fergere maɓɓe fooɗana ɓe kiite ɗe ɓe kaani.
45011010	Gite maɓɓe niɓɓa ngam to ɓe ngi'u. Alla wan ɓaawe torra ɓe, ɓe keppa turtaade faa abada.
45011011	Mi ƴaman on kaden : « Ko Yahudankooɓe perginoo caami ɗum, ɓe caamu ko ɓe ummitittaako non, naa noy ? » Abada. Fergere maɓɓe laatani ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe daliila keɓol kisinam. Alla waɗi ɗum duu heɓa Yahudankooɓe kiraa.
45011012	Nde nii fergere maɓɓe waddani duuniyaaru barke, nde nii mursere maɓɓe duu waddani ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe barke, ndenne noy barke keɓoyteeɗe nyannde fuu kappa kuula Yahudankooɓe fuu tuubii, wa'ata ?
45011013	Joonin, onon ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ngondaami. Ko laatiimi lilaaɗo yahde he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ɗum, mi nanngiran golle ɗe kokkaami ɗee juuɗe ɗiɗɗiɗi.
45011014	Mi nanngiran ɗe juuɗe ɗiɗɗiɗi ngam ɓeydude kiram banndiraaɓe Yahudankooɓe, mi hisina woɓɓe nder maɓɓe.
45011015	Nde nii kakkitol Yahudankooɓe ngool waddi potal hakkune Alla he duuniyaaru, ndenne noy wartirde ɓe he laawol Alla wa'ata ? Ɗum wa'ataana hano ummitaaki he maayde.
45011016	Nde nii conndi buuru budaama faa cabbi buuru arani ɗiin cakkaama ngam Alla, ndenne cabbi buuru ɗiin fuu cakkaa ngam Alla. Nde nii Alla jeyii ɗaɗi lekki, ndenne calɗi makki fuu kanko jeyii ɗum.
45011017	Accee mi hokka on misaali oo. Yahudankooɓe no nga'i hano jaytuuhi hilnaaki faa wooɗi. Aan mo hanaa Yahudanke duu aɗa wa'i hano liccal gariiri jaytuuhi. A taƴaama, ngaddeɗaa, kaɓɓeɗaa he jaytuuhi demanaaki faa wooɗi. Ndenne nyaamdu lobburu fuu, ndu licce makki mbaawi heɓude ngam mbuura, aɗa waawi heɓi ɗum.
45011018	Amma tinna to wi'u a fiiran ɗum gabaare, mbi'aa ko a goɗɗum yeeso maɓɓe. Aɗa hiɗi piya gabaare mbi'aa a goɗɗum naa ? To yeggitin dow ɗaɗi makki ngonɗaa, hanaa ɗaɗi makki ngoni dow maaɗa.
45011019	A wi'an : « Licce jaytuuhi aawaaɗe mbudditaama heɓa miin, liccal gariiri jaytuuhi ngal, mi waddee, mi haɓɓee nokku majje. »
45011020	Goonga ! Amma ngam rafi goonɗinol waɗi ɗe mbudditaa, ɗe ittaa, aan duu daliila goonɗinol maaɗa waɗi keɓuɗaa laawol jooɗaade aɗa haɓɓi he tunnduuru majje. Ndenne, to fiyu gabaare maa mbi'aa ko a goɗɗum, hakkila hulu Alla tan.
45011021	Ngam ko waɗi Alla accaay licce arane ɗeen waɗan o accataa ma, aan duu.
45011022	Ndenne, tayka moƴƴuki Alla, taykoɗaa tikkere makko duu ƴeewa : Tikkere makko no dow fergiiɓe caami, moƴƴuki makko no wondi he maaɗa, nde nii a tabbitii nder moƴƴuki makko kiin. Nde hanaa non, aan duu a saltetee.
