45011023	Ɓiɓɓe Isra'el duu, nde nii ɓe mboppi tiiɗal nyiraaku maɓɓe, ɓe ngoonɗini, Alla wartiran ɓe he jaytuuhi kiin. Ngam Alla no woodi baawɗe wartirde ɓe he makki.
45011024	Onon ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, onon tinndiniraaɓe liccal gariiri jaytuuhi, gaddaangal haɓɓaa he tunnduuru jaytuuhi aawaaki kiin. Ko ɗum waddi liccal gariiri ngal, ɗum haɓɓi he tunnduuru jaytuuhi aawaaki ɗum. Hegaaki ngal haɓɓee he tunnduuru makki. Yahudankooɓe ngoni licce makki goonga e goonga, ndenne dow ko yaawi Alla haɓirta ɗe he makki.
45011025	Banndiraaɓe, mi hiɗaa kepon faamude siri Alla mo woni no suuɗi ɗo ngam to on piyee gabaaje mooɗon mbi'on on goɗɗum. Ɓiɓɓe Isra'el heewɓe ɓerɗe mum'en njoori, faa heewɓe nder ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ngoonɗini, ngari kebbini Laamu Alla.
45011026	Nii waɗata ɓiɓɓe Isra'el fuu kisinee, hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Kisinoowo ƴuwan Siyon. O hakkitan rafi tokkude Alla nder ɓerɗe jippotooɓe he Yakuuba.
45011027	Ɗum woni amaana am he maɓɓe, wakkati mo moytanmi hakkeeji maɓɓe.
45011028	Yahudankooɓe ngarti wayɓe Alla, ngam ɓe tottitake Habaru lobbo, ɗum laatii ɓeydaari mooɗon. Baa nii ko ɓe ngarti wayɓe Alla, Alla suɓake ɓe, waɗi ɓe himɓe mum. Omo hiɗi ɓe daliila maamiraaɓe maɓɓe.
45011029	Alla waylataa anniya mum dow mo o moƴƴani kokkal makko, he dow mo o noddi.
45011030	Onon ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, ndenno nii on tottitakeno Alla, amma hannden on keɓi yurmeene Alla ngam Yahudankooɓe tottitake mo.
45011031	Noon duu, joonin Yahudankooɓe ngartii tottitiiɓe Alla ngam ɓe keɓa yurmeene Alla, nde Alla holli on.
45011032	Alla tinnanaay himɓe leesinanoo ɗum ngam hollude ɓe yurmeene mum.
45011033	Hey barkeeji Alla korsuɗi no ɗuuɗi no mawni ! Hikma makko he anndal makko no luggiɗɗi sanne ! Neɗɗo fuu waawaa anndude anniyaaji makko. Neɗɗo fuu waawaa faami no o gollirta.
45011034	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Moy anndi miilooji Joomiraawo ? Moy waawi hollita mo ?
45011035	Moy arti hokki mo goɗɗum, faa ɗum laatoo tilaay o yoɓa joomum ?
45011036	Nde goonga, kanko tagi huune fuu. Huune fuu to makko ƴuwi, kanko duu jeyii huune fuu. Teddungal woodani Alla faa abada. Aamiin !
45012001	Banndiraaɓe, miɗo eela on ngam barke yurmeene nde Alla holli en, kokkee ko'e mooɗon Alla hano sadaka ciryaaɗo ngam golle makko, sadaka ceniiɗo, belɗo ɓerne makko. Ɗum woni laawol ngol tokkoton ngam rewude Alla no haaniri.
45012002	To nyemminee duuniyaaru nduu, accee Alla heyɗintina hakkillooji mooɗon heɓa ɓerɗe mooɗon mbaylitoo, mbaawon anndude ko yaadata he muuyɗe Alla kam woni ko wooɗi, ko huuɓi he ko weli mo.
45012003	Daliila moƴƴere nde Alla waɗani kam, miɗo wi'a neɗɗo mooɗon fuu, to yaaru hoore mum to yottaaki. Neɗɗo fuu eta hoore mum daara no wa'i. Kam woni neɗɗo eta hoore mum dey-dey etirgal goonɗinol ngal Alla hokki ɗum.
45012004	Neɗɗo meeɗen fuu no woodi terde ɓanndu, terde fuu he gollal mum.
45012005	Baa nii ko eɗen ɗuuɗi, enen he ɗuuɗal meeɗen fuu, nder kawtal meeɗen he Almasiihu, en ɓanndu worru, en fuu eɗen njokkodiri yahde. Neɗɗo meeɗen fuu no terde ɓanndu.
45012006	En kokkaama kokke feere-fereeje ɗe Ruuhu Alla hokkata. Nde nii Alla waɗi kokkal meeɗen no kokkal waɗude annabaaku, too en ngaɗu annabaaku meeɗen dey-dey no ngoonɗinirɗen Iisa.
45012007	Mo Alla hokki kokkal wallude woɓɓe, walla ɓe. Mo Alla hokki kokkal jannginde, janngina.
45012008	Mo Alla hokki kokkal semmbinɗinde himɓe, semmbinɗina himɓe. Mo Alla hokki kokkal moƴƴande himɓe, moƴƴana himɓe he ɓerne worre. Mo Alla hokki kokkal ardaaki, ardoroo tinaare. Mo Alla hokki kokkal yurmaade himɓe duu, yeha waɗa golle mum he ɓerne welne.
45012009	Hidde mooɗon laatoo hidde goonga e goonga. Ndoggee waɗude ko boni, tiɓinee ko wooɗi.
45012010	Ngiɗodiree he ɓerne worre hano on banndiraaɓe. Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu teddina banndum faa ɓurna ɗum hoore muuɗum.
45012011	To accee yannde nannga on amma njagganee Joomiraawo hano maccuɓe, ngollanee Joomiraawo he ɓerne worre.
45012012	Nanee belɗum daliila tammude mooɗon. Munyee torra, tinnee he waɗude du'aa'u.
45012013	Cenndee ko njogiɗon kokkaron himɓe Alla hiɗuɓe walleede, laatee weernooɓe himɓe.
45012014	Mbarkinɗinee torrooɓe on. To kuɗee ɓe, amma mbarkinɗinee ɓe.
45012015	Nanidee belɗum he nanooɓe belɗum, mboydee he woyooɓe.
45012016	Laatee daane worre, to ndonndee ko'e amma laatee leesiniiɓe nder ko ngatton fuu. To adee ko'e mooɗon hano marɓe hikmaaku.
45012017	Nde goɗɗo waɗi on gacce, to njottitee. Ndurwee tawee ko ngaɗon fuu laatoo ko dartii yeeso himɓe fuu.
45012018	Nde no heɓo, njooɗodoɗon jam he himɓe fuu, nde nii onon ngoni waddooɓe jam.
45012019	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, nde nii on ngaɗaama ko metti, to njoptitanee ko'e mooɗon. Accee Alla watta tikkere mum yoptanoo on. Ngam no winndaa wi'aa Joomiraawo wi'i : Miin jeyii yoptitaade, mi yoɓan neɗɗo fuu dey-dey ko haani.
45012020	No winndaa wi'aa kaden Joomiraawo wi'i : Nde ganyo maaɗa rafaama, nyamnu mo. Nde nii o ɗomɗaama, yarnu mo. Nde nii a waɗani mo kujje ɗee, too hano nii pette ɓottuɗaa, njoowuɗaa dow hoore makko.
45012021	To accu gaɗol ko boni jaale, amma waɗu ko wooɗi, njaaloɗaa gaɗol ko boni.
45013001	Neɗɗo fuu ɗowtanoo ardiiɗo mum, ngam ardaŋal walaa ngal hanaa to Alla ngal ƴuwi. Ardiiɗo fuu, Alla ardini ɗum.
45013002	Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu salii ardaŋal leydi mum salake ko Alla wi'i. Caliiɗo ko Alla wi'i duu fooɗanan hoore mum kiite.
45013003	Neɗɗo gaɗoowo ko wooɗi walaa ko huldata ardiiɓe kiite leydi mum. Amma nde neɗɗo waɗi ko boni, ndenne tilay neɗɗo hula ɓe. Aɗa hiɗi acca hulude ardiiɓe leydi naa ? Ndenne, waɗu ko wooɗi. Nde nii a waɗi ko wooɗi fuu, ɓe njettete.
45013004	Ardiiɓe no gollanooɓe Alla ngam wattude ma waɗude ko wooɗi. Amma nde nii waɗude ko boni woni gollal maaɗa, too hulu ɓe, ngam meere waɗaay iɓe njogii cabbi fiyude waɗuɓe ko boni. Nder jukkol gaɗuɗo ko boni iɓe mbanngina tikkere nde Alla woodani gaɗoowo ko boni.
45013005	Ndenne, no haani ɗowtanoɗon ardiiɓe, hanaa ngam kulol kiite tan, amma ngam to ɓerɗe mooɗon pelu on.
45013006	Ngam majjum waɗi oɗon njoɓa janngal. Ardiiɓe jaɓooɓe janngal ngaal duu, Alla ardini ɓe ngam ɓe ngollana ɗum wakkati fuu.
45013007	Njoɓee neɗɗo fuu ko tokkata on. Nde nii janngal mooɗon, onon he ko'e mooɗon kaanuɗon yoɓude, njoɓee ngal. Nde janngal gineeji mooɗon kaanuɗon yoɓude duu, too njoɓee ngal, foti ko hen non fuu. Ɗowtanee mo kaanuɗon ɗowtanaade, teddinon mo kaanuɗon teddinde.
45013008	To njaɓee neɗɗo fuu tokka on nyamaane. Nyamaane worre tan haani naatude hakkune mooɗon, onon goonɗinɓe, nyamaane nde woni hiɗodirde. Ngam neɗɗo fuu hiɗi gondo mum, humni ko Tawreeta wi'i.
45013009	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa nder Tawreeta : To yeenu, to ittu yonki goɗɗo, to wujju, to suuna ko goɗɗo.Tilsinooje ɗee he koriiɗe ɗeen fuu kawra nder tilsinoore wi'ude : Ngiɗaa gondo maa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maa.
45013010	Neɗɗo fuu woodi hidde nder ɓerne mum waawaa waɗani gondo mum ko boni. Ndenne, hidde no humna ko Tawreeta wi'i.
45013011	Taykee kujje ɗee fuu ngam oɗon anndi wakkati mo ngonɗen nder mum. Wakkati mo kaanuɗon finude oon waɗi. Joonin kisinam ɓuri ɓadaade en dina wakkati mo puɗɗuɗen goonɗinde.
45013012	Jemma woɗɗini, woɗɗaa weetude, ndenne en mboɗɗoo golle bonɗe, ɓornoɗen kaɓorɗe meeɗen annuura.
45013013	Mbuuren mbuurnam wonɓe nder jeyngol, mboɗɗoɗen nyaamɗe he yaru-yaru ɗuɗɗo. En mboɗɗoo jeenu he golle nyiddiniiɗe. En mboɗɗoo pooɗodirol he haasidaaku.
45013014	Nder jikku meeɗen he nder ko mbi'eten fuu, en nyemmin Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. To en tokkito belɗum ɓerɗe meeɗen accen suuno bonngo heewa mbuurnam meeɗen.
45014001	Njaɓɓee mo goonɗinol muuɗum semmbiɗaa, to nanngiree mo duu, baa nde nii tawi ko o miili no feere, ko onon duu miiliɗon no feere.
45014002	Alal-misaali, goɗɗo ngam ɓenndi nder goonɗinol no miila ko no dagii kam nyaama ko heɓi fuu. Amma goɗɗo ngam ɓenndaay nder goonɗinol nyaamataa ko heɓi fuu, ɓiɓɓe kaliyol tan nyaamata.
45014003	Nyaamoowo ko heɓi fuu oon, to felu mo nyaamataa ko heɓi fuu oon. Mo nyaamataa ko heɓi fuu oon duu to felu nyaamoowo ko heɓi fuu oon, ngam nyaamoowo ko heɓi fuu oon, Alla jaɓɓake mo.
45014004	Aan woni moy faa mbi'aa gollanoowo goɗɗo gollal mum wooɗaay ? Mawɗo makko haani wi'ude ko o waɗi ɗum no wooɗi naa ɗum wooɗaa. Mo peluɗaa oo no tittinkinto ngam Joomiraawo woni balla makko.
45014005	Goɗɗo no hi'a ko nyalaane gom ɓuri nyalaaɗe fuu teddude. Goɗɗo duu to mum nyalaaɗe ɗeen fuu no potu. Neɗɗo fuu tabbintina ɗum nder ɓerne mum.
45014006	Peerodirɗo nyalaaɗe oon, ɓurdina ɗe ngam teddinde Joomiraawo. Kaden duu, nyaamoowo ko heɓi fuu, nyaama ko heɓi fuu ngam teddinde Joomiraawo, joomum yetta Alla. Mo nyaamataa ko heɓi fuu oon duu, suɓo nyaama ko hiɗi ngam teddinde Joomiraawo, joomum yetta Alla duu.
45014007	Hakkune meeɗen walaa gonɗo no wuura ngam ɓeydaari hoore mum tan. Walaa duu maayanɗo ngam ɓeydaari hoore muuɗum tan.
45014008	Nde en mbuuri, Joomiraawo mbuuranɗen. Nde en maayi duu, Joomiraawo maayanɗen. Ndenne, nde en mbuuri naa nde en maayi, Joomiraawo nii jeyii en.
45014009	Almasiihu maayaana ummitii ngam o laatoo Joomiraawo wuurɓe he maayɓe fuu.
45014010	Nde nii non, aan mo nyaamataa ko heɓi fuu oon, ɗume waɗi aɗa wi'a bannda waɗi ko wooɗaa ? Naa aan, nyaamoowo ko heɓi fuu oon, ɗume waɗi aɗa yawo bannda mo nyaamataa ko heɓi fuu oo ? En fuu, en ndaroyto yeeso Alla, o hiito en.
45014011	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Mi hunorake hoore am, miin Joomiraawo, howru fuu hofoto yeeso am, ɗemngal fuu jaɓan wi'a miin woni Alla.
45014012	Ndenne, neɗɗo meeɗen fuu haalan ko kam waɗi nder mbuurnam mum yeeso Alla.
45014013	Neɗɗo meeɗen fuu acca dekande banndum waɗude ko wooɗaa. Ko kaanuɗen waɗude woni faddaade ko'e meeɗen he huune fuu ko waawi fergude banndiraaɓe meeɗen, naa uppude ɓe, ɓe ngaɗa ko wooɗaa.
45014014	Miɗo anndi, mi tabbintini duu, ko nder kawtal meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, walaa ko harmi, he hoore mum. Amma nde neɗɗo miili ko huune ndee no harmi, ɗum harmanan joomum.
45014015	Nde a torri bannda goonɗinɗo ngam ko nyaamata, a tokkaay laawol hidde. Hakkila ngam ko nyaamata to laatoo laawol halkere bannda mo Almasiihu maayi daliila mum.
45014016	Tinna to ko ndaaruɗaa no wooɗi ɗum, laatoo ko bannda goonɗinɗo jancirtee.
45014017	Ngam Laamu Alla hanaa filla nyaamdu naa jarɗe tan. Laamu Alla filla dartinaaku, jam he seyo non keɓeten har kawtal meeɗen he Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
45014018	Neɗɗo fuu gollani Almasiihu nder iri nii he banndum welan Alla, himɓe duu teddinan ɗum.
45014019	Ndenne, en tefu ko ɓeydata jam hakkune meeɗen. Neɗɗo fuu tefa ko semmbinɗinta goonɗinol banndum.
45014020	To mbonnee golle Alla ngam filla nyaamdu. Nde goonga, nyaamdu fuu harmaa. Amma nde nii nyaamdu ndu nyaamata no laatoo fergere bannda goonɗinɗo, too wooɗaa, nyaama nyaamdu ndu omo hi'a.
45014021	Alal misaali ko ɓuri woni, to neɗɗo fuu nyaamu naa yaru naa mbi'en to neɗɗo fuu waɗu ko fergata banndum goonɗinɗo waɗa hakke.
45014022	Joga hakkune maaɗa he Alla tabbintinol ngol goonɗinol maaɗa hokki ma. Belɗo hoore woni mo ɓerne mum felataa ɗum nder ko woni no waɗa fuu.
45014023	Amma neɗɗo fuu sikki nyaamdu, dey nyaami ndu no jukkaaɗo, ngam nyaamiraay ndu goonɗinol. Huune fuu ko ɓerne maaɗa fukkaaki he mum, no hakke.
45015001	Enen, ɓe goonɗinol mum'en semmbiɗi, no haani munyen jikku ɓe goonɗinol mum'en semmbiɗaa. To en tefu ko weli en tan.
45015002	Neɗɗo meeɗen fuu tefa ko welata ɓerne banndum goonɗinɗo ngam semmbinɗina mo nder goonɗinol makko.
45015003	Ngam Almasiihu he hoore mum tokkaay mbelirka yonki mum, amma hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Jennooje, yennuɓe ma fuu, dow am saami.
45015004	Huune fuu ko winndanoo illa arannde nder dewte Alla, winndaama ngam ekkintinde en. Ɗum winndaama duu ngam keɓen tammude daliila tittinkinaaku he munyal ngal Dewtere Alla hokkata en.
45015005	Alla marɗo munyal, cemmbinɗinoowo ɓerɗe hokku on laawol laataade daane worre dow laawol Iisa Almasiihu.
45015006	O hokka on laawol ngool heɓa he ɓerne worre ngaɗon daane worre teddinon Alla Baaba Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
45015007	Njaɓɓodiree no Almasiihu jaɓɓori on heɓa Alla teddinee.
45015008	Miɗo wi'a on ko arannde fuu ngam Alla no kolniiɗo waɗi Almasiihu laatii gollanoowo Yahudankooɓe ngam humnude alkawal ngal Alla waɗannoo maamiraaɓe maɓɓe.
45015009	O wari duu ngam ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe teddina Alla ngam Alla no jom yurmeene, hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Hakkune ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe mi wi'an ko a Joomiraawo, mi yimante ngam teddinde innde maaɗa.
45015010	No winndaa kaden wi'aa : Onon ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, tokkee himɓe Alla nanon belɗum.
45015011	Winndaama duu wi'aa : Onon ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, on fuu, njettee Joomiraawo ! Neɗɗo fuu, yima teddungal makko !
45015012	Esaaya duu wi'i : Jippotooɗo he Yesa gom warowan, kanko ummoto laamoo ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe. Ɓe ngattan gokka maɓɓe fuu dow makko.
45015013	Alla Jom gokka hebbina on welwelo, hokka on jam ngam barke goonɗinol mooɗon, keewon tammude nder baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
45015014	Banndiraaɓe am, sikka fuu walaa to am, on keewɓe jikku lobbu, oɗon keewi anndal, kaden neɗɗo mooɗon fuu no waawi ekkintini banndum faa wooɗa.
45015015	Amma nder ɗerol am ngol mbinndanmi on ngool, mi hulaay miccintinde on ko njanngunoɗon. Mi waɗi ɗum duu ngam moƴƴere nde Alla hokki kam.
45015016	O waɗi kam gollanoowo Iisa Almasiihu hakkune ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe. O waɗi kam cakkanoowo Alla he baajotooɗo Habaru makko lobbo. Ndenne, ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe mbaawan laataade ir sadaka mo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wartiri feere, ngam wela Alla.
45015017	Ndenne, daliila kawtal am he Iisa Almasiihu, miɗo waawi fiyude gabaare dow golle ɗe ngollananmi Alla.
45015018	Mi suusaa wi'i goɗɗum ko ƴaari golle Almasiihu ɗe o walliri kam ngaɗumi. O wallii kam heɓa ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe tokka haala Alla daliila golle am e waaju am,
45015019	daliila alamaaji kaayɗiniiɗi gooduɗi baawɗe daliila baawɗe ɗe Ruuhu Alla jogii. Mi waajake Habaru lobbo, filla Almasiihu nanngaa illa Ursaliima faa tukka he leydi Illirikum.
45015020	Ko wonnoo nder ɓerne am woni waajaade Habaru lobbo, filla Almasiihu, nder nokkuuje ɗe himɓe meeɗaay nanude filla oo no waɗee ngam to mi nyiɓu dow diidol nyibdi ngol goɗɗo diidi.
45015021	Mi tokkiraana hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Ɓe mbaajaakano baa nde worre filla makko, ngi'owan mo, ɓe nanaayno filla makko duu paamowan.
45015022	Kile keewɗe, mi muuyi yottaade to mooɗon amma waajaade Habaru lobbo to waajaakano haɗi kam warde to mooɗon.
45015023	Joonin golle am hakkune ɓe meeɗaay nanude filla Almasiihu kanti. Duuɓi re'ataa nii ko mi haaɓi mi hi'aay on.
45015024	Mi anniyake hannden tuntowaade on. Nyannde fuu ummiimi yahde leydi Espaniya, miɗo hiɗi mi fanta to mooɗon. Nde mi wari, mi waɗan balɗe hakkune mooɗon. Nde mi hi'i on faa hakkillo am fukkake, miɗo hiɗi mi heɓa balla yottowaade Espaniya.
45015025	Amma joonin mi yahan Ursaliima ngam walloyde himɓe Alla wonɓe nder huɓeere ndee,
45015026	ngam goonɗinɓe wonɓe Makedoniya e Akaya anniyake hawrude balla ngam ɓe kokka talkaaɓe wonɓe hakkune himɓe Alla nder Ursaliima.
45015027	Ɓe anniyake wallude ɓe amma nde goonga ɗum hanaa balla, ɗum yoɓitaade nyamaane moƴƴere. Goonɗinɓe Makedoniya he Akaya kanaa Yahudankooɓe amma ɓe keɓi moƴƴere he barke Ruuhu ɗe Alla waɗani Yahudankooɓe alkawal mum. Ndenne, no haani ɓe ngatta njawdi maɓɓe ɓe mballira Yahudankooɓe Ursaliima.
45015028	Nyannde fuu njottinmi balla kawraaka kaa, mi fantan on fadde am yahde Espaniya.
45015029	Miɗo tabbintini ko nde nii mi wari to mooɗon, Almasiihu barkinan on faa noy walaa daliila barke garki am to mooɗon.
45015030	Banndiraaɓe, mi eeli on ngam barke Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, mi eeli on ngam barke hidde nde Ruuhu Alla hokkata : Kawree mballon kam nder durwo am, nder du'aa'u, eelanon kam Alla sanne.
45015031	Eelon Alla hiina kam sarri himɓe Yahudiya ɓe kanaa goonɗinɓe. Ndu'ee heɓa goonɗinɓe wonɓe Ursaliima njaɓira balla ka njaranmi kaa he ɓerne worre.
45015032	Nde Alla jaɓi du'aa'uuji mooɗon, mi yottoto to mooɗon he ɓerne welne, mi jooɗo mi fowta hakkune mooɗon.
45015033	Alla Jom jam wonda he mooɗon, on fuu. Aamiin !
45016001	Miɗo hiɗi mi wi'a on ko Fiibi, banndii'en debbo, golloowo hakkune goonɗinɓe Kenkereya no debbo jom goonga.
45016002	Njaɓɓoree mo nder innde Joomiraawo hano no himɓe Alla kaaniri. Mballiree mo huune fuu ko o haajaa, ngam o walli heewɓe, miin he hoore am, o wallii kam.
45016003	Miɗo yewta Piriskilla he Akilas, ɓe miin he mum'en kawtidi golle Iisa Almasiihu.
45016004	Ɓe kosi mursude yonkiiji maɓɓe ngam dannude yonki am. Hanaa miin tan yetti ɓe, kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe fuu njetti ɓe.
45016005	Miɗo yewta goonɗinɓe warooɓe no kawra nder suudu maɓɓe. Miɗo yewta Epaynetus, giɗo am korsuɗo. Kanko arti goonɗinde Almasiihu nder leydi Asiya.
45016006	Miɗo yewta Mariyaama tampanɗo on sanne.
45016007	Mi yewti Andaronikus he Yuniyas, Yahudankooɓe uddidaaɓe he am. Lilaaɓe mawɓe anndaaɓe sanne non, iɓe arti kam goonɗinde Almasiihu.
45016008	Mi yewti Ampiliyaatus, korsuɗo he am daliila Joomiraawo.
45016009	Miɗo yewta Urbanus, mo kawtuɗen golle Almasiihu, mi yeggitaay Estakis giɗo am korsuɗo.
45016010	Mi yewti Apeles, kolluɗo ko kam no tokkuɗo Almasiihu goonga e goonga. Mi yewti himɓe wuro Aristobulus.
45016011	Mi yewti Herodiyon banndam Yahudanke. Mi yewti himɓe wuro Narsisi goonɗinɓe Joomiraawo.
45016012	Mi yewti Tirifena he Tirifosa, rewɓe gollanooɓe Joomiraawo. Miɗo yewta Persis mo korsinmi, debbo tampuɗo sanne nder gollal Joomiraawo.
45016013	Mi yewti Rufus cuɓaaɗo Joomiraawo. Mi yewti inniiko laatiiɗo inna am, miin duu.
45016014	Mi yewti Asinkiritus, Felegon, Hermes, Patorobas he Hermas, mi yewti goonɗinɓe Iisa wonduɓe he maɓɓe fuu.
45016015	Mi yewti Filologus he Yuliya, njewtanee kam Nireyus he sakiike mum debbo, mi yewti Olimpas. Miɗo yewta duu himɓe Alla wonduɓe he maɓɓe fuu.
45016016	Mbundodiree hakkune mooɗon nder hidde he enɗam. Kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Almasiihu fuu no njewta on.
45016017	Banndiraaɓe, miɗo fooɗa hakkillo mooɗon, miɗo eela on, kakkiloɗon he wattooɓe pooɗodirol hakkune mooɗon. Himɓe tefuɓe perga on itta on dow ko ekkintinaɗon. Mboɗɗee himɓe ɓee,
45016018	ngam ɓe ngalaa iɓe ngollana Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Deeɗi maɓɓe tan ɓe ngollanta. Haalaaji mbelɗi he fewre, ɓe eytirta hakkillo kettinaniiɗo ɓe naa mo anndal mum luggiɗaa.
45016019	Onon nee, filla ɗowtanaaki mooɗon walaa fuu to yehaay, ngam majjum miɗo nana belɗum daliila mooɗon. Mi hiɗaana ngarton jom'en hakkillo, anndon ko wooɗi, mboɗɗoɗon waɗude ko wooɗaa.
45016020	Ɓooyataa, Alla Jom jam waɗan Seyɗan mornyo ley teppe mooɗon. Moƴƴere Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen wonda he mooɗon !
45016021	Timote gollidoowo he am no yewta on. Lukiyus, Yason he Sosipatoros banndiraaɓe am Yahudankooɓe no njewta on.
45016022	Miin, Tertiyus, binndanɗo Pol ɗerol ngool, miɗo yewta on daliila kawtal meeɗen he Joomiraawo.
45016023	Gayus, bernuɗo kam no yewta on, wuro makko goonɗinɓe fuu kawrata. Erastus kalfinaaɗo ceede huɓeere Korintu no yewta on. Banndii'en Kuwartus no yewta on. [
45016024	Moƴƴere Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen wonda he mooɗon, on fuu. Aamiin !]
45016025	Jettooje ngoodani Alla, gooduɗo baawɗe semmbinɗinde on daliila Habaru lobbo, filla Iisa Almasiihu mo mbaajotoomi. Har Habaru lobbo, Alla waɗi siri cuuɗaaɗo illa fil'ajal wannginee.
45016026	Amma hannden siri oo wannginaama yahde he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe har dewte ɗe annabiiɓe mbinndi hano no Alla Duumiiɗo wi'iri ɓe mbinndira ɗe ngam ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ngoonɗina Alla, ɗowtanoo mo.
45016027	Teddungal laatanoo Alla Jom hikmaaku. Teddungal woodani mo faa abada har Iisa Almasiihu. Aamiin !
46001001	Miin Pol mo, Alla suɓii waɗi lilaaɗo Iisa Almasiihu e banndi'en Sostenes, minen mbinndani on ɗerol ngool,
46001002	onon hawriine goonɗinɓe Alla wonnde huɓeere Korintu, hawriine nde nder kawtal mum he Almasiihu, Alla noddi ɗum wartiri feere ngam wartude seniiɓe. Miɗen njewta on, on fuu. Min mbinndii ɗerol ngool duu ngam noddooɓe innde Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, to ɓe tawa fuu. Iisa Almasiihu gooto oo nii woni Joomiraawo meeɗen, kanko oon duu woni Joomiraawo maɓɓe.
46001003	Alla Baabiraawo he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen hokku on jam e moƴƴere.
46001004	Wakkati fuu miɗo yetta Alla ngam mooɗon. Daliila yettoore am ndee woni moƴƴere nde o hokki on har Iisa Almasiihu.
46001005	Kawtal mooɗon he Iisa Almasiihu barkinii on dow laawol iri ngool hen non fuu. On diikiɗii nder iri haala fuu, he nder iri anndal fuu,
46001006	dey-dey no seedaaku Almasiihu tabbintiniraa hakkune mooɗon.
46001007	Ndenne, onon keɗiiɓe gartol Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, walaa kokkal ngal ŋakkani on nder kokke ɗe Ruuhu Alla hokkata goonɗinɗo.
46001008	Kanko Iisa Almasiihu oon semmbinɗinta on faa nyannde huune fuu timmi. Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu heɓataa ko feliri on nyannde fuu Iisa warti.
46001009	Alla no kolniiɗo, kanko duu noddi on kawton he Ɓiyiiko Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
46001010	Banndiraaɓe, ko eelanmi on woni ngam barke Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, nanngodiron, laatee hunnduko wooto. To accee pooɗodirol gom fuu naata hakkune mooɗon. Ngaɗee daane worre, miilooji mooɗon duu laatoo miilo wooto.
46001011	Banndiraaɓe am, se goonga koreeji debbo bi'eteeɗo Kolowe mbi'i kam ko pooɗodirol no hakkune mooɗon.
46001012	Ko ngiɗumi wi'ude ɗo kam woni, ko hakkune mooɗon no woodi bi'oowo : « Miin kay, Pol tokkumi. » Goɗɗo wi'a kam duu : « Miin kay, Apolos tokkumi. » Goɗɗo feere gom wi'a kam duu : « Miin kay, Piyer tokkumi. » Faa hannden duu hakkune mooɗon no woodi bi'oowo : « Miin kay, Almasiihu tokkumi. »
46001013	Hanaa Almasiihu no gooto naa noy ? Pol naa moy tontaa dow bardugal ngam mooɗon ? Dow innde Pol naa moy ngaɗanaɗon batisma ?
46001014	Mi yetti Alla ko ƴaari Kirispus he Gayus, walaa mo ngaɗanmi batisma hakkune mooɗon.
46001015	Ndenne, walaa fuu baawɗo wi'i dow innde am waɗana batisma.
46001016	Goonga non, mi waɗanii koreeji Istefanas duu batisma. Amma nder anndal am, ko ƴaari himɓe ɓee walaa mo ngaɗanmi batisma.
46001017	Iisa Almasiihu lilaay kam mi waɗowa batisma. O lilaana kam naa ngam mi waajowo himɓe dow Habaru lobbo, tawee mi naforaaki hikmaaku ɓii-aadama fuu, ngam to baawɗe tawaaɗe nder maayde makko dow bardugal wartu meere.
46001018	Filla maayde Iisa dow bardugal no kaanɗi to woppuɓe laawol Alla. To meeɗen, enen wonɓe dow laawol kisinam, ɗum baawɗe Alla.
46001019	Ngam no winndaa, wi'aa : Mi halkan hikmaaku jom'en hikma, mi moytan anndal jom'en annde.
46001020	Toy jom'en annde naa jannginooɓe Tawreeta ngoni ? Naa toy welɓe ɗemle ngoni ? Alla holli ko hikmaaku himɓe duuniyaaru nduu, he kaanɗi fuu no go'o.
46001021	Dow hikmaaku Alla, himɓe duuniyaaru, kam'en he hikmaaku mum'en fuu, keppi annditidde Alla. Ngam majjum waɗi, Alla hi'i ko no haani hisinde neɗɗo fuu goonɗinɗo mo nder laawol waaju Habaru lobbo, waaju mo himɓe ndaari, he kaanɗi fuu no go'o.
46001022	Yahudankooɓe no ngiɗi kollee alamaaji kaayɗiniiɗi, Gerekankooɓe duu no tefa hikmaaku duuniyaaru.
46001023	Amma minen, habaru Almasiihu tontaaɗo min mbaajooto. Habaru oo laatani Yahudankooɓe laawol fergere, ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe duu no ndaara mo hano kaanɗi.
46001024	Amma to mo Alla noddi fuu, Yahudanke naa mo hanaa Yahudanke, Almasiihu woni baawɗe Alla e hikmaaku Alla.
46001025	Ngam hikmaaku Alla ngu himɓe adi hano kaanɗi, no ɓuri hikmaaku ɓii-aadama. Kaden duu ko himɓe ndaarata hano jaccere Alla no ɓuri semmbe ɓii-aadama.
46001026	Banndiraaɓe, miccitee no ngorrunoɗon fadde Alla noddude on. Ɗuuɗaa hakkune mooɗon tawreteeɓe hikmaaku nder giiɗe ɓiɓɓe aadama. Ɗuuɗaa hakkune mooɗon duu tawreteeɓe laamu gom naa ƴuwɓe he cuuɗi mawɗi.
46001027	Amma ko tagaaɓe ndaari hano kaanɗi, Alla suɓii ngam semtinde jom'en hikmaaku. Ko tagaaɓe ndaari walaa semmbe fuu, Alla suɓii ngam semtinde jom'en semmbe.
46001028	O suɓake nder duuniyaaru kujje ɗe himɓe ndaari meere, ko yawni, ko hanaa fuy ngam ko anndanoo no woodi darja laatoo meere.
46001029	O waɗi ɗum ngam to neɗɗo fuu fiyu gabaare mum yeeso makko wi'a kam no goɗɗum.
46001030	Kanko feŋi on he Iisa Almasiihu. Alla duu waɗi o laatani en hikmaaku ƴuwngu to mum. Nder laawol Almasiihu waɗi laatiɗen dartiiɓe, laatiɗen seniiɓe, rimɗinaaɓe he maccangaaku hakke.
46001031	Hano no ɗum winndiraa nder dewte Alla wi'aa : Piyoowo gabaare mum fuu, waɗa ɗum ngam Joomiraawo.
46002001	Banndiraaɓe, wakkati ngarnoomi to mooɗon, mi nawtoraaki belɗum ɗemngal fuu naa hikmaaku gom ngam waajaade on dow siri Alla cuuɗiiɗo.
46002002	Mi waɗaay anniya waajaade dow huune fuu se hanaa dow Iisa Almasiihu e no o tontiraa dow bardugal.
46002003	Miin he hoore am, wakkati puɗɗumi warde to mooɗon, nder leesinaaku ngarmi to mooɗon, miɗo diwna ngam kulal heewi ɓerne am.
46002004	Haalaaji am e waaju am tiigaaki dow anndal lugguɗiggal naa dow ɗemngal mbelngal, amma dow baawɗe ɗe Ruuhu Alla waɗata ɗi tiigi.
46002005	Ɗi tiigake dow mum ngam to goonɗinol mooɗon tiigoo dow hakkillo ɓii-aadama, amma ngol tiigoo dow baawɗe Alla.
46002006	Tabbat, sikka fuu walaa, filla hikmaaku min ngoni miɗen ngaɗa hakkune ɓe goonɗinol mum'en ɓenndi. Hikmaaku ngu min ngoni miɗen ngaɗa filla mum nguu, hanaa hikmaaku duuniyaaru. Ngu hanaa duu hikmaaku wooduɓe ardaŋal nder mayru, ɓe laamu mum'en woodi keerol.
46002007	Amma ngu hikmaaku ƴuwngu to Alla, ngu ndenno siri mum suuɗaa. Ngam teddungal meeɗen waɗi Alla suɓii ngu, fodani en ngu illa duuniyaaru tagaakano.
46002008	Walaa jom ardaŋal gom nder duuniyaaru nduu anndanɗo hikmaaku nguu, ngam nde nii jom ardaŋal gom anndaniino ngu, nden ɓe tontataano Joomiraawo jom teddungal.
46002009	No winndaa, wi'aa : Ko hitere fuu hi'aay, ko nowru fuu nanaay, ko ɓerne fuu miilaaki, kam Alla siryanii hiɗuɓe ɗum.
46002010	Amma enen, Alla wannginani en ɗum har Ruuhu mum ngam Ruuhu Alla no tayko huune fuu, baa siri makko luggiɗiɗɗo.
46002011	Walaa baawɗo anndi ko tawaa nder ɓerne goɗɗo, nde hanaa ruuhu joomum. Ndenne walaa annduɗo siri Alla, nde hanaa Ruuhu makko.
46002012	Ruuhu mo keɓuɗen oo ƴuwaay nder duuniyaaru, amma to Alla o ƴuwani en ngam paamen moƴƴere fuu nde o fodani en.
46002013	Wakkati fuu mo min njannginta, min njanngintaana ko Ruuhu Alla ekkintini min. Min kaalataa ko hikmaaku ɓii-aadama jannginta. Heɓuɓe Ruuhu makko ɓeen, goongaaji Ruuhu Alla tan min ngoni miɗen njanngina ɗum'en.
46002014	Neɗɗo he hoore mum tan waawaa jaɓi ko ƴuwi to Ruuhu Alla. Ko ƴuwi to Ruuhu Alla fuu joomum waawaa faami ɗum ngam he giiɗe joomum ɗum wa'aana hano kaanɗi. Har Ruuhu Alla tan neɗɗo waawi faamude ɗum.
46002015	Gooduɗo Ruuhu Alla no waawi tayki huune fuu ko Ruuhu Alla ekkintinta. Amma kanko kay hanaa neɗɗo fuu waawi tayki miilo makko.
46002016	Ngam no winndaa, wi'aa : Walaa annduɗo miilo Joomiraawo, faa janngina ngo ? Amma enen, miilo meeɗen he miilo Almasiihu fuu no go'o.
46003001	Banndiraaɓe, mi waawaa haaldi he mooɗon hano no kaaldiranmi he heewɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo. Amma tilay mi haaldira on hano no kaaldiranmi tokkuɓe muuyɗe ɓerne. Mi haaldiran on hano no kaaldiranmi ɓe ɓenndaay nder goonɗinde Almasiihu.
46003002	Ko kokkumi on ɗum, hano ɓiraaɗam kokkumi on, hanaa nyaamdu tekkunu gom kokkumi on, ngam on keewtaaki nyaamude ko tekkiɗi. Faa warde hannden on potaay hokkeede ko tekkiɗi
46003003	ngam baa joonin muuyɗe ɓerɗe mooɗon tan tokkuɗon. Nde nii haasidaaku he geddi no hakkune mooɗon, too faa hannden nder tokkol muuyɗe ɓerne taweɗon, oɗon ngolla duu golle tokkuɓe duuniyaaru.
46003004	Nde nii goɗɗo mooɗon wi'i : « Miin, Pol tokkumi », faa ooto duu wi'i : « Miin kay, Apolos tokkumi. » Iri nii he banndum hollataana ko on ɓurdinaay ko'e mooɗon he tokkuɓe duuniyaaru.
46003005	Moy woni Apolos ? Moy woni Pol ? Min fuu ɗiɗo, min gollanooɓe Alla, ɓe daliila mum'en laatiɗon goonɗinɓe Iisa Almasiihu. Neɗɗo amin fuu humnii gollal ngal Joomiraawo halfini ɗum.
46003006	Miin aawii, Apolos yarni, amma Alla mawninta.
46003007	Aawɗo oon e jarnuɗo oon fuu kanaa fuy, amma Alla mawninɗo oon, kam woni fuu.
46003008	Ndenne aawɗo oon e jarnuɗo oon fuu no potu. Neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu dey-dey tampiri mum yoɓetee.
46003009	Ngam min fuu, min gollidooɓe dow laawol Alla. Onon duu ngoni gese Alla. On nyibdi Alla.
46003010	Dow moƴƴere nde Alla waɗani kam ndee, mi diidii nyibdi hano no nyiɓoowo lobbo fuɗɗirta. Goɗɗo duu wari nyiɓi dow diidol nyibdi ndiin. Ndenne, neɗɗo garoowo nyiɓa dow maggol fuu hakkiloo no nyiɓirta dow maggol.
46003011	Ngam walaa baawɗo wari diida diidol feerewol gom ɓurngol aranol ngool. Diidol aranol ngool sinngaakina dow Iisa Almasiihu.
46003012	Neɗɗo no waawi nyiɓirde kaŋŋe naa cardi, naa nyiɓira kaaƴe dime naa leɗɗe, naa nyiɓira huɗo naa ƴommbe dow diidol ngool.
46003013	Nyannde darŋal, neɗɗo fuu gollal mum wanngintee yaasin. Hiite mannge wanngata nyannde mum, nge wanngina gollal neɗɗo fuu.
46003014	Neɗɗo fuu nyiɓi, nde nii hiite ngeen waɗanaay nyibdi mum baafuy, too neɗɗo oo golle mum yoɓetee.
46003015	Amma neɗɗo fuu mo nge nyaami nyibdi mum, too joomum mursan njobdi mum. Joomum he hoore mum hisintee, wa'a hano dogguɗo fedditi hiite ngam daɗa.
46003016	On anndaa ko on suudu Alla naa ? Ndenne Ruuhu makko duu no nder mooɗon.
46003017	Onon ngoni suudu Alla, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu bonnuɗo suudu makko, o halkan joomum, ngam suudu makko no seniinu.
46003018	To neɗɗo fuu majjin hoore mum. Nde nii gooto nder mooɗon no miila ko kam no woodi hikmaaku ɓii-aadama, too joomum waɗa hoore mum kaaŋaaɗo ɓiɓɓe aadama heɓa joomum laatoo jom hikmaaku goonga e goonga.
46003019	Ngam hikmaaku ɓii-aadama no kaanɗi yeeso Alla. No winndaa, wi'aa : Alla no nannga ɓiɓɓe aadama nder ƴoƴe mum'en.
46003020	No winndaa, wi'aa kaden : Joomiraawo no anndi miilo jom'en hikmaaku. Omo anndi duu ko ngo meere.
46003021	Ngam majjum waɗi, to neɗɗo mooɗon fuu fiyu gabaare mum dow ɓii-aadama. Huune fuu, onon njeyi ɗum.
46003022	Pol, Apolos, Piyer, duuniyaaru, mbuurnam naa maayde, kujje joonin naa kujje garooje, ɗum fuu onon njeyi ɗum.
46003023	Onon, Almasiihu jeyii on, Almasiihu duu, Alla jeyii ɗum.
46004001	Adee min hano gollanooɓe Almasiihu ɓe potaa fuy, halfinaaɓe waaju siriiji Alla cuuɗiiɗi.
46004002	Amma ko hiɗaa he halfinaaɓe woni, ɓe laatoo hoolniiɓe.
46004003	Mi hiitataako hoore am. Mi wannaaka kiitoɗon kam naa mi yaaree yeeso hiitotooɓe ɓiɓɓe aadama kiitoo kam.
46004004	Baa nii walaa ko mi tuumirta hoore am, walaa ko hollataa ko mi dartiiɗo. Joomiraawo woni etoowo gollal am.
46004005	Ndenne, to neɗɗo fuu hiito banndum fadde wakkati podaaɗo oon yottaade, wakkati mo Joomiraawo wartata. Ko suuɗi nder nimre fuu, kanko wurtinta ɗum yaasin labɗo tar, o wanngina anniyaaji cuuɗiiɗi nder ɓerne fuu. Nder wakkati oo, Alla yettata neɗɗo fuu dey-dey no joomum haaniri.
46004006	Banndiraaɓe, mi haalanii on dow am, miin e Apolos, ngam min laatanoo on ko ƴeewoton, ekkitoɗon. Mi hokki on misaali oo dow amin ngam paamon maana haala kaa : « Neɗɗo fuu haanaa ƴaaro ko winndaa. » Ndenne to neɗɗo mooɗon fuu fiyu gabaare mum wi'a ardiiɗo oo no ɓuri ooto.
46004007	Moy ɓurdini ma goɗɗo ? Huune fuu ko keɓuɗaa, hanaa Alla hokki ma ɗum naa ? Nde nii a jaɓi ko ɗum goonga, too ɗume waɗi aɗa fiya gabaare dow majjum hano hanaa a hokkaa ɗum non ?
46004008	Illa ndeen oɗon kaari ! Illa ndeen on riikuɓe ! On laatake laamiiɓe, amma minen kay, min kanaa laamiiɓe ! Nde nii goonga fuu on laamiiɓe non, minen duu min laamodoto he mooɗon !
46004009	He giiɗe am, minen laatiiɓe lilaaɓe, Alla henni min gaɗa hano hiitanaaɓe kiite maayde. Min laatake ko duuniyaaru fuu, maleykaaɓe e ɓiɓɓe aadama ngarta ƴeewa.
46004010	Minen, min haaŋaaɓe ngam min tokkuɓe Almasiihu, amma onon goonɗinɓe Almasiihu, on jom'en hakkillo. Minen, min ngalaa semmbe fuu, amma onon kay, oɗon keewi semmbe. Onon, oɗon teddinee, minen duu, miɗen pamɗinee.
46004011	Baa nii nder wakkati mo ngonɗen oo, rafo e ɗomka seedaay he amin. Min koltaay koltal lobbal, miɗen ɓoccee, wakkati fuu miɗen nder eggu-eggu.
46004012	Miɗen njagga faa noy walaa. Miɗen njennee amma miɗen mbarkina jennooɓe min. Nde min torraama, min munyan.
46004013	Nde mettuka haalaama dow amin, miɗen njaaboro haalaaji jam. Faa warde jooni miɗen ƴeewee hano buuri duuniyaaru, hano tuuni ndi himɓe fuu paɗɗata.
46004014	Mi winndanaay on ɗerol ngool ngam mi semtina on, amma ngam fooɗude noppi mooɗon hano no pooɗiranmi noppi sukaaɓe am horsuɓe.
46004015	Baa nii nde tawi nder kawtal mooɗon he Almasiihu oɗon ngoodi jannginooɓe ujunaaji sappo, baaba gooto nii ngooduɗon. Miin duu woni baaba mooɗon oo, ngam min waajii on dow Habaru lobbo faa goonɗinɗo Iisa Almasiihu.
46004016	Ndenne mi eeli on, nyemminon kam.
46004017	Mi lili Timote, ɓiyam korsuɗo, kolniiɗo nder kawtal mum he Joomiraawo to mooɗon, ngam o miccintina on no tokkirmi laabi Iisa Almasiihu he no njannginiranmi ɗi nder kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe fuu.
46004018	Woɓɓe nder mooɗon no piya gabaaje mum'en no mbi'a kam'en no goɗɗum, ngam iɓe miila ko mi wartataa to mooɗon.
46004019	Amma nde Joomiraawo jaɓi, ɓooyataa mi waraay to mooɗon. Nyannde fuu ngarmi to mooɗon, miɗo hiɗi mi hi'a ir baawɗe ɗeye fiyooɓe gabaaje mum'en no mbi'a kam'en no goɗɗum njogii. Miin mi wannaaka he haalaaji maɓɓe mbelɗi.
46004020	Ngam Laamu Alla hanaa nder hunnduko tawaa amma nder baawɗe Ruuhu Alla.
46004021	Noy ngiɗɗon mi warda to mooɗon. Mi warda sawru naa hidde he ɓerne fewne.
46005001	Mi nani ko nyiddinii gom, ko waɗaa hakkune mooɗon, filla mum no waɗee nokku fuu. Ir majjum waɗataake baa hakkune heeferɓe. Ko nyiddinii ko nanumi no haalee ɗum woni, hakkune mooɗon, goɗɗo no waalda he dee-bammum.
46005002	Ɗum nyiddinaaki to mooɗon faa oɗon piira ɗum gabaare. Fadde mooɗon fiyirde ɗum gabaare, ɗum haanaana mettinde ɓerɗe mooɗon, nanngon neɗɗo oo mburtinon mo nder hawriine mooɗon.
46005003	Baa nii ko miin he hoore am mi tawaaka hannden hakkune mooɗon, hakkillo am no he mooɗon. Nyannde fuu kawruɗon dow innde Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, mi wondan he mooɗon nder baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo. To am, dow innde Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen mi taƴani neɗɗo golluɗo ir golle ɗee kiite ɗe taƴananmoomi baa nii miɗo fotti. Taƴanee mo iri kiite ɗe taƴanmoomi nder baawɗe Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen.
46005005	Kiite ɗe taƴanmoomi nii : Ngattee neɗɗo oo nder juuɗe Seyɗan, o bonna ɓanndu neɗɗo oo parkatak heɓa yonki makko hisinee nyannde gartol Joomiraawo.
46005006	On keɓaay ko gasi ko piiruɗon gabaare. On anndaa ko ƴuufinirɗum seɗɗa tan heƴi ƴuufina conndi budaani no ndi foti fuu naa ?
46005007	Ittee ƴuufinirɗum kiɗɗum ɗum ngam ngarton hano conndi heyri budaani. Sikka fuu walaa on kakkitaama, ittaɗon he ƴuufinirɗum fuu. Ngam Iisa Almasiihu, Njawdiri meeɗen Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe sakkaama.
46005008	Ndenne, to en njuulir juulɗe meeɗen ƴuufinirɗum kiɗɗum, ƴuufinirɗum ɓerne ɓaleere, waɗoore ko boni. En njuulir buuru mo walaa ƴuufinirɗum fuu. Buuru laatiiɗo goonga mo walaa munafikaaku fuu.
46005009	Nder ɗerol am gom, mi winndani on mbi'umi : To kawtee he yeenooɓe.
46005010	Ko mbi'umi to kawtee he maɓɓe, mi wi'aay to kawtidee he maɓɓe baa seɗɗa nder duuniyaaru nduu, mi wondaa ɓe nder mbuurnam mum'en fuu mbuurdaana jeenu, naa suuno seedere, naa pasaaki laabi naa dewol tooruure. Ngam nde nii mi wi'i to kawtidee he maɓɓe baa isilam, ndenne mi wi'i on mburtoɗon nder duuniyaaru nduu.
46005011	Amma, ko mbinndanmi, mi wi'a on ɗum woni : To ngondee he neɗɗo bi'oowo kam no banndii'on goonɗinɗo Iisa, dey tinni no yeena yahde, naa no suunee seedere yahde, naa no rewa tooruure yahde, naa no nder fiyodirde ko'e himɓe, naa nder yaru-yaru naa no faso laabi yahde. To nyaamdee sam he ir neɗɗo oo.
46005012	Hiitaade ɓe kanaa goonɗinɓe Iisa hanaa golle meeɗen. Gollal mooɗon woni kiitoɗon wonɓe nder hawriine mooɗon.
46005013	Alla hiitoto ɓe ngoonɗinaay Iisa. Ndenne, ndiiwee bonɗo oo hano no ɗum winndiraa, wi'aa : Ndiiwee bonɗo, itton hakkune mooɗon.
46006001	Nde luural naatii hakkune mooɗon, semteene non ƴaaroɗon goonɗinɓe Alla dey njaarodiron yeeso ɓe kanaa goonɗinɓe.
46006002	On anndaa ko nyannde gom goonɗinɓe Alla ɓee kiitoytoo duuniyaaru nduu naa ? Nde nii onon kiitoytoo himɓe duuniyaaru nduu, ndenne ɗume haɗataa on hiitanaade kujje pamare gonɗe hakkune mooɗon ?
46006003	On anndaa ko enen kiitoytoo maleykaaɓe naa ? Ndenne, eɗen mbaawi tabbat hiitaade kujje gonɗe no ngaɗee nder mbuurnam meeɗen hannden ɗam.
46006004	Nde nii iri kujje ɗee ngattii luural hakkune mooɗon, ɗume waɗi oɗon ada kiite mooɗon oɗon njaara yeeso hiitotooɓe, ɓe kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe adaay goɗɗum ?
46006005	Mi haalani on ɗum ngam semteene nannga on. Ndenne, jom hikmaaku gooto walaa hakkune mooɗon baawɗo hiitanaade banndiraaɓe mooɗon naa ?
46006006	Sey nii iɓe pooɗodira, iɓe noddodira yeeso ɓe ngoonɗinaay Iisa.
46006007	Pooɗodirol hakkune mooɗon ngool ŋappere mawne non hakkune mooɗon. Ɗume waɗi ko on mbaawaa munyi nde nii on toonyaama ? Naa munyi nde nii on ƴoynaama teetaɗon ko njogiɗon ?
46006008	Amma hannden fadde mooɗon munyude, onon he ko'e mooɗon ngoni no toonyo, naa no teeta banndiraaɓe mooɗon.
46006009	Tabbat oɗon anndi ko ɓe ngoonɗinaay ndonataa Laamu Alla. To njammbee ko'e mooɗon. Illa dewluɓe yeenooɓe naa ɓe ndewlaay, waɗooɓe luuɗu, rewooɓe tooruuje naa
46006010	yarooɓe, wuyɓe naa pasotooɓe, jom'en haasidaaku naa fiyodirooɓe ko'e himɓe, nder maɓɓe baa gooto ronataa Laamu Alla.
46006011	Nii woɓɓe nder mooɗon fuu nga'unoo ndenno. Amma joonin on laaɓinaama, ngartiraɗon himɓe Alla, jom'en dartinaaku dow innde Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen e Ruuhu Alla meeɗen.
46006012	Woɓɓe nder mooɗon no mbi'a : « Huune fuu no daganii ɗum'en. » Goonga non, amma hanaa huune fuu nafata neɗɗo. « Huune fuu no daganii kam », amma mi laatataako maccuɗo huune fuu.
46006013	Oɗon mbi'a kaden : « Nyaamdu reedu waɗana, reedu duu nyaamdu waɗana. » Goonga non, amma Alla halkan ɗi fuu ɗiɗi. Ɓanndu ɓii-aadama tagaaka ngam jeenu, amma ndu tagakanaa ngam rewude Joomiraawo. Ndenne Joomiraawo jeyii ndu.
46006014	Alla ummintinɗo Joomiraawo meeɗen e maayde, ummintinowan en, enen duu, nder baawɗe mum.
46006015	On anndaa ko ɓalli mooɗon ngoni terɗe Almasiihu naa ? No dagii mi hooƴa terɗe Almasiihu, mi hawra he terɗe jeenoowo naa ? Abada, ɗum dagaaki.
46006016	On anndaa ko neɗɗo fuu hawri he debbo jeenoowo, ɓanndu mum he ɓanndu debbo oo fuu ngartan ɓanndu worru. Ngam no winndaa, wi'aa : Ɓe fuu ɗiɗo, ɓe ngarta ɓanndu worru.
46006017	Amma neɗɗo fuu hawri he Joomiraawo, joomum he Joomiraawo ngartii go'o.
46006018	Ndoggee jeenu ! Ngam hakke fuu mo neɗɗo waɗata takkataako he ɓanndu joomum. Amma neɗɗo fuu yeeni, waɗanii ɓanndu mum hakke.
46006019	Naa on anndaa ko ɓanndu mooɗon woni suudu Ruuhu Ceniiɗo mo Alla watti nder mooɗon ? On njeyaa ko'e mooɗon.
46006020	Alla soodii on coggu caadiingu. Ndenne, teddinee mo har ɓalli mooɗon.
46007001	Joonin, mi jaaboto on dow ƴamɗe ɗe mbinndanɗon kam. No wooɗi tawee gorko anndaa debbo.
46007002	Amma, ngam hiinude neɗɗo mooɗon fuu jeenu, no haani gorko fuu dewla debbo gooto, debbo fuu duu gorko gooto haɓɓana ɗum.
46007003	Gorko fuu no haani humta haaju deekum, debbo fuu duu humta haaju gorum.
46007004	Debbo jeyaa ɓanndu mum, amma gorum jeyii ndu. Gorko duu jeyaa ɓanndu mum, amma deekum jeyii ndu.
46007005	To neɗɗo mooɗon fuu faddoo hoore mum he banndum, se hanaa nii on caawodir potuɗon, dow wakkati seɗɗa mo ittuɗon ngam du'aade. Amma ko ƴaari wakkati oo, to neɗɗo mooɗon fuu faddoo hoore mum he banndum nde hanaa non neɗɗo mooɗon fuu heppan jogaade hoore mum, Seyɗan heɓa laawol sii'aade on.
46007006	Nder ko mbi'umi ɗum, mi walaa miɗo tilsina on, amma mi walaana miɗo eela on.
46007007	Ko ɓurmi hiɗude woni neɗɗo mooɗon fuu jooɗo haɓɓaay hano am. Amma neɗɗo fuu he kokkal ngal Alla hokki ɗum. Woɓɓe keɓi iri ngalɗoo, woɓɓe duu iri ngaltoo.
46007008	Miɗo wi'a on, onon ɓe ndewlaay, ɓe ndewlaaka he rewɓe ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi, nde nii on njooɗake hano am on ndewlaay naa on ndewlaaka no ɓuri.
46007009	Amma nde nii on mbaawaa jogaade ko'e mooɗon, ko ɓuri woni ndewlee, ngam to suuno jeenu torru on.
46007010	Onon rewɓe wonɓe nder cuuɗi mum'en miɗo wi'a on : « Debbo haanaa seeda he gorum. Non duu gorko haanaa seera deekum. » Tilsinoore ndee hanaa tilsinoore ƴuwde to am, miin Pol, amma nde tilsinoore ƴuwne to Iisa, Joomiraawo meeɗen. Amma nde tawi debbo gom seedi he gorum duu, o jooɗoro non, to o tefu ɓaŋeede amma o tefa, o fota he makko.
46007012	Har ko daarata onon horiiɓe miɗo wi'a on miin he hoore am : Nde nii goonɗinɗo Iisa gom no woodi deekiiyo mo goonɗinaay, ko debbo oo jaɓi wuurdude he makko, to o seeru debbo oo.
46007013	Naa nde nii debbo goonɗinɗo gom no woodi goriiyo mo goonɗinaay, ko gorko oo jaɓi wondude he makko, to debbo oo seeru he gorum.
46007014	Sabu gorko mo goonɗinaay oon no laaɓinee har ɓanngal mum he deekum goonɗinɗo, kaden duu debbo mo goonɗinaay kam duu no laaɓinee har ɓanngal mum he gorum goonɗinɗo. Nde nii hanaano nii he banndum nden ɓiɓɓe mooɗon laaɓintaakeno. Amma joonin ɓe laaɓuɓe.
46007015	Nde nii mo goonɗinaay gom no hiɗi seera goonɗinɗo gom, o seera mo. Nden kay debbo naa gorko goonɗinɗo oon, walaa fuu ko haɓɓodiri ɗum he mo goonɗinaay oon. Ngam Alla noddi en faa mbuurden he jam.
46007016	Aan debbo goonɗinɗo, aɗa anndi se aɗa waawi hisinde gora naa ? Aan gorko goonɗinɗo, aɗa anndi se aɗa waawi hisinde deeka naa ?
46007017	Ɗum woni ko mbinndanmi kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe fuu kollumi ɓe : Neɗɗo fuu tinnoo wuura hano no Joomiraawo hokkirinoo ɗum laawol wuurude fadde Alla noddude ɗum.
46007018	Goɗɗo ko Alla noddi ɗum no juulnaaɗo, too, to joomum tefu suuɗude juulnol mum. Nde goɗɗo juulnaaka ko Alla noddi ɗum, to joomum waɗu juulnee.
46007019	Juulneede he rafi juulneede fuu ngalaa maana mawɗo gom. Ko ɓuri nafude neɗɗo woni tokkude tilsinooje Alla.
46007020	Neɗɗo fuu jooɗo jonnde mum hinnde wakkati Alla noddunoo ɗum.
46007021	Fadde Alla noddude ma, nde nii a maccuɗo, to ɗum haɓɓu hoore maa. Amma nde nii a heɓi laawol rimɗineede, too durwu laata dimo.
46007022	Ngam maccuɗo noddaaɗo warta har Joomiraawo, laatake dimo Joomiraawo. Non duu, dimo fuu noddaaɗo laatake maccuɗo Almasiihu.
46007023	Alla soodi on coggu fansaaki caadiingu sanne, ndenne to ngaɗee ko'e mooɗon maccuɓe himɓe.
46007024	Banndiraaɓe worɓe e rewɓe goonɗinɓe Almasiihu, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu jooɗo jonnde mum nde jooɗinoo wakkati Alla noddunoo ɗum.
46007025	Dow ɓe ɓaŋaaka, mi walaa fuu tilsinoore gom ƴuwande kam to Joomiraawo haaloore dow maɓɓe. Amma ngam Joomiraawo yurmake kam waɗi kam kolniiɗo ko mbi'anmi dow maɓɓe nii.
46007026	Ngam sabbu torraaji gonɗi no tummbi en, miɗo miila ko ɓuri nafude woni neɗɗo fuu jooɗo no worri.
46007027	Nde nii a haɓɓi, to tefu seerude. Nde nii a haɓɓaay duu, to tefu haɓɓude.
46007028	Amma nde nii a ɓaŋi naa a ɓaŋaama, a waɗaay gacce. Ɓaŋuɗo e ɓaŋaaɗo fuu torraaji cattuɗi njarta nyannde fuu nder mbuurnam mum'en. Torraaji ɗii duu ngiɗumi hisinde on.
46007029	Banndiraaɓe am, ko mbi'anmi oon woni wakkati gartol Iisa Almasiihu ɓadake. Illa joonin, dewluɗo fuu waɗa mbuurnam mum hano dewlaay.
46007030	Ɓaliniiɗo waɗa hano ɓalinaaki. Gonɗo nder mbelirka ɓerne waɗa hano ɓerne mum metti. Cooduɗo duu waɗa hano njeyaa ko soodi.
46007031	Nafortooɗo kujje duuniyaaru fuu waɗa hano meeɗaay naforaade ɗe. Ngam duuniyaaru hannden tabbitataa.
46007032	Ko ngiɗumi woni kison sukkullaaji. Mo dewlaay hakkiltaakona he golle Joomiraawo, ko weli Joomiraawo tan o tefata.
46007033	Amma dewluɗo, fii duuniyaaru adata hakkillo mum, ko welata deekum tan tefata.
46007034	Ndenne hakkillo makko senndake. Hano non duu, surbaajo he debbo mo gorum maayi dey dewlaaka, waɗude ko weli Joomiraawo tan adata hakkillo maɓɓe, ngam iɓe tefa ɓe lamna ɓalli maɓɓe e miilooji maɓɓe. Amma debbo dewlaaɗo, fii duuniyaaru adata hakkillo mum, ko welata gorum tan tefata.
46007035	Mi haalii ɗum ngam nafude on, hanaa ngam ɓillande on. Mi haalani on ɗum ngam mbuuron no haaniri, peŋoɗon e Joomiraawo he ɓerne worre.
46007036	Nde neɗɗo waɗi alkawal haɓɓande surbaajo mum dey no miila waɗididde he surbaajo oo ko semtini, nde nii joomum waawaa surude hoore mum, nde nii joomum hi'i ko no haani haɓɓana mo, ndenne sey o haɓɓana mo, gaɗol hakke fuu walaa nder majjum.
46007037	Amma nde joomum haɓɓii anniya nder ɓerne mum wi'i kam ɓaŋataa, kam fukkodotaako he surbaajo mum tawa tilsinaaka, tawa duu no waawa hoore mum, too joomum waɗi ko wooɗi.
46007038	Ndenne ɓaŋuɗo surbaajo mum oo waɗi ko wooɗi, amma nde nii o ɓaŋaayno mo non, nden o waɗannoo ko ɓuri wodde.
46007039	Ɓoggol dewngal no haɓɓa debbo e gorum nde nii goriiko no foofa. Amma nde goriiko maayi, omo waawi heɓude giɗɗo mo gom, dewla mo. Amma tilay sey tawee gorko dewloowo mo oo no goonɗinɗo Iisa.
46007040	Amma ngam mi tabbintini ko Ruuhu Alla no wondi he am, ko etumi ndaarumi woni, nde nii debbo oo dewlaaka, nden o ɓurannoo nannde belɗum.
46008001	Har ko daarata ƴamɗe mooɗon dow tewu cakkanaangu tooruuje nguun, goonga non, hano no mbi'irɗon ɗum, en fuu eɗen anndi ko wi'aa dow majjum. Anndal no rima fiyude gabaare wi'a kam no goɗɗum. Amma hidde semmbinɗinta goonɗinol neɗɗo.
46008002	Neɗɗo fuu miili kam no anndi goɗɗum, too, joomum yottaaki dey-dey to miili anndal mum yottini ɗum dow huune ndeen.
46008003	Amma neɗɗo fuu hiɗi Alla, Alla no anndi ɗum.
46008004	Har ko ndaarata tewu cakkanaangu tooruure, eɗen anndi ko reweteeɓe fuu ngalaa nder duuniyaaru. Alla gooto duu tan woodi.
46008005	Baa nii ko himɓe no mbi'a deweteeɓe gom no nder kammu naa dow leydi, goonga non nder miilo wi'ooɓe ir haalaaji ɗii, deweteeɓe no keewi, non duu joomiraaɓe maɓɓe ngalaa keddi.
46008006	Amma to meeɗen, Alla gooto tan woodi, Baabiraawo taguɗo huune fuu, ngam makko duu mbuurɗen. Joomiraawo gooto duu woodi, Iisa Almasiihu, mo har mum huune fuu tagaa, mo har mum duu ngonɗen eɗen mbuura.
46008007	Amma hanaa goonɗinɗo fuu woodi iri anndal ngaal. Woɓɓe mboowi nyaamɗe tewu nguu hano nii ngu tewu cakkanaangu tooruure, goonɗinol maɓɓe ngol ɓenndaay no fela ɓe, ɓe miila ko ɓe ngaɗi hakke.
46008008	Ndenne nyaamdu ɓadintaa en Alla. Nde en nyaami, ɗum ɓeydataa en. Nde en nyaamaay duu, ɗum ɓuytataa en.
46008009	On kokkaama laawol nyaamude iri nyaamdu fuu. Amma kakkilee to laawol nyaamude iri nyaamdu fuu laatanoo ɓe ɓenndaay nder goonɗinol mum'en fergere.
46008010	Aan annduɗo ko wi'aa dow iri nii he banndum, nde nii mo ɓenndaay nder goonɗinol mum gom hi'ii ma nder suudu tooruure aɗa nyaama iri tewu nguu, he giiɗe maaɗa ɗum hokkataa goonɗinɗo oo semmbe nyaamude kam duu tewu cakkanteengu tooruure nguu naa ?
46008011	Ndenne ngam anndal maaɗa ngaal, a laatake daliila fergere goonɗinɗo oo, mo Almasiihu maayi ngam hakkeeji mum.
46008012	Nde nii a waɗi ɗum a laatake daliila fergere mo ɓenndaay nder goonɗinol mum, a waɗani Almasiihu hakke.
46008013	Ngam majjum waɗi, nde nii nyaamdu ndu nyaaman mi no waawi waɗa banndam goonɗinɗo waɗa hakke, too, mi nyaamataa ir tewu nguu faa abada, ngam to mi fergu mo o waɗa hakke.
46009001	Miin, mi walaa laawol waɗude ko ngiɗumi fuu naa ? Mi hanaa lilaaɗo naa ? Mi hi'aay Iisa, Joomiraawo meeɗen naa ? Hanaa golle Joomiraawo ɗe ngollanmi, waɗi ko ngoonɗinɗon naa ?
46009002	Baa nde nii to woɓɓe mi hanaa lilaaɗo, too, mi lilaaɗo to mooɗon, onon kay. Goonɗinol Iisa mooɗon ngool, no holla tabbat ko mi humnii golle lilaaku am ɗe Joomiraawo halfini kam.
46009003	Ɗum woni ko njaabotoomi.
46009004	Ndenne, min ngalaa laawol ƴamude ko nyaamee he ko yaree daliila golle amin naa ?
46009005	Ndenne, hakkune amin gooduɗo deekiiyo walaa laawol yahdude deekum nder jahaale amin hano no lilaaɓe gom naa hano no Piyer he minyiraaɓe Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen njaadirta he deekiraaɓe mum'en ?
46009006	Naa miin e Barnabas tan ngoni lilaaɓe haanuɓe ngolla ngam keɓa ko mbuurdata ?
46009007	Moy waɗata golle soogeraaku dey ittaa ceede yoɓa hoore mum ? Moy remata cabiije dey heppa nyaamude ɓiɓɓe majje ? Moy durata sewre muɓɓere dey heppa yarude kosam mayre ?
46009008	Ko mbi'umi ɗum no miiloo ɓii-Aadama tan. Tawreeta he hoore mum haalaay dow majjum naa ?
46009009	No winndaa nder Tawreeta wi'aa : Nder kette to wattan ngaari sumre wakkati ndi gollintee nder ngesa. Ga'i gollooji tan Alla wanna he mum'en naa ?
46009010	Goonga fuu ngam meeɗen waɗi, o haali ka naa ? Sikka fuu walaa, enen ka winndanaa. Demoowo fuu remataana ngam gokka keɓol barke demal mum. Cokkoowo duu wattaana gokka mum dow keɓol mbaka mum nder ko sokkata ɗum.
46009011	Nde nii minen aawi barke Ruuhu hakkune mooɗon, ko min keɓata he mooɗon no ɓuri ko min aawi hakkune mooɗon naa ?
46009012	Nde nii woɓɓe no keɓa barke mooɗon, hanaa minen kaani heɓude ɗe naa ? Min munyi nder huune fuu, min naforaaki laamu amin ngam to min kaɗu Habaru lobbo, habaru Almasiihu, yahde yeeso.
46009013	Sikka fuu walaa oɗon anndi ko gollooɓe nder Juulirde mawne mbuurdaana kujje ɗe himɓe ngaddata no cakka nder mayre. Nder sadakaaji kirseteeɗi dow sakkirde ɗiin, cakkanooɓe Alla duu keɓata mbaka mum'en.
46009014	Hano non duu, Joomiraawo hokki laawol waajotooɓe Habaru lobbo ɓeen duu mbuurda barke gollal waaju mum'en.
46009015	Amma miin kay, mi naforaaki baa gootel nder kujje ɗee fuu. Mi winndaay coti ɗi duu ngam ƴamude on ɗum. Mi soofi mi maaya he mi eela goɗɗum ! Mi jaɓataa neɗɗo fuu haɗa kam fiyirde ɗum gabaare.
46009016	To am, waajaade Habaru lobbo, hanaa daliila fiyude gabaare mum. Tilay mi waajoo, ngam bone woodani kam nde nii mi waajaaki Habaru lobbo !
46009017	Nde nii miin he hoore am suɓinoo gollal ngaal, nden miɗo haani yoɓeede. Amma ngam walaa no ngaɗanmi tilay mi golla, ngam golle non ɗe kalfinaami.
46009018	Ndenne, ɗume woni njobdi am ? Njobdi am woni waajaade Habaru lobbo forba, tawee mi naforaaki ɓeydaari fuu ndi Habaru lobbo hokki kam.
46009019	Baa nii ko mi hanaa maccuɗo neɗɗo fuu, mi wartiri hoore am maccuɗo himɓe fuu, ngam fooɗude ko ɓuri ɗuudde nder maɓɓe tokka Almasiihu.
46009020	Hakkune Yahudankooɓe, mi waɗi hoore am Yahudanke ngam mi heɓa ɓe. Hakkune tokkuɓe Tawreeta Muusa duu, mi waɗi hoore am tokkuɗo Tawreeta Muusa, baa ko mi tokkaay tilsinooje ɗeen ngam mi heɓa ɓe.
46009021	Hakkune ɓe tokkaay Tawreeta Muusa, miɗo waɗa hoore am hano mo tokkaay Tawreeta Muusa ngam mi heɓa ɓe. Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay miɗo feŋi he tilsinooje Alla ngam miɗo tokki tilsinooje Almasiihu.
46009022	Hakkune ɓe goonɗinol mum'en ɓenndaay, mi waɗi hoore am hano mo goonɗinol mum ɓenndaay ngam mi heɓa ɓe. Walaa ir neɗɗo fuu mo mi wartiraay hoore am ngam nder laawol fuu mi hisina woɓɓe nder maɓɓe.
46009023	Mi waɗi kujje ɗee fuu ngam yottinde Habaru lobbo oo he himɓe. Mi waɗi ɗe duu ngam heɓude barke gonɗe nder makko.
46009024	Paamee ko nde daɗodirol no waɗee, himɓe heewɓe ngoni doggooɓe, amma gooto, woni keɓoowo tukunci gattaaɗo oon. Ndenne, ndoggon keddi baawɗe mooɗon heɓa keɓon moƴƴere ndee.
46009025	Ciryotooɓe daɗodirol fuu, no eelta ɓalli mum'en eeltol cattungol. Iɓe ngaɗa ɗum ngam ɓe mellee, baa nii ko lefol maɓɓe ngool duumataako. Amma enen kay, eɗen mellee lefol duumotoongol.
46009026	Ngam majjum waɗi miin, mi doggataa doggudu, doggoowo ngam meere. Hano non duu, nde nii miɗo durwa mi durwataa nder henndu.
46009027	Amma miɗo ekkintina ɓanndu am ko naawi, miɗo dawrana ndu, ngam to mi daɗee wakkati fuu mo mbaajiimi woɓɓe dow Habaru lobbo oon.
46010001	Banndiraaɓe am, miɗo hiɗi mi miccintina on ko heewtinoo maamiraaɓe meeɗen nder jamaanu Muusa. Ɓe fuu ley luuldere, ɓe ɗuwi, ɓe ndilli, ɓe pedditi maayo Maaliya.
46010002	Nder luuldere he nder maayo Maaliya ngoo, ɓe fuu ɓe ngaɗana batisma, ɓe ngarti tokkuɓe Muusa.
46010003	Ɓe fuu nyaami nyaamdu worru ƴuwnu to Alla.
46010004	Ɓe fuu njari ndiyam gootam ƴuwɗam to Alla. Ngam ɓe njari ndiyam mburtiiɗam nder tepaare ƴuwne to Alla, wonnde no ɗowtira ɓe. Tepaare ndee woni Almasiihu.
46010005	Amma ɗuuɗal maɓɓe fuu ngaɗaay ko weli Alla, ngam majjum waɗi, ɓe fuu ɓe maayi nder ladde yeeruure.
46010006	Kujje ɗee fuu ngaɗii ngam laatanoo en misaali heɓa to en laatoo hano maamiraaɓe meeɗen ɓe suuno waɗude ko boni nanngi ɓerɗe mum'en.
46010007	To nyemminee woɓɓe maɓɓe, ndewon tooruuje. No winndaa, wi'aa : Jama'aare ndeen jooɗii, nyaami, yari, nden nde ummii nde fiji.
46010008	To en nyemmin woɓɓe nder maɓɓe, naaten jeenu. Ngam tokkitaaki jeenu, ko watta himɓe ujunaaji laso e tato maayani ɓe nder nyalooma gooto.
46010009	To en cii'oo Almasiihu hano no woɓɓe nder maɓɓe cii'irnoo Joomiraawo. Ngam wakkati ɓe cii'inoo mo bolle coppi ɓe, mbari ɗuuɗal maɓɓe.
46010010	To nyemminee woɓɓe nder maɓɓe tokkitiiɓe no nguunitoo faa maleyka maayde adi yonkiiji maɓɓe.
46010011	Kujje ɗee fuu keewtake ɓe ngam ɗum laatanoo en misaali. Ɗe mbinndaama duu ngam ɗe laatanoo en waaju, enen wonɓe nder jamaanu cakitiiɗo oo.
46010012	Ndenne, miiluɗo darake faa wooɗi fuu, hakkiloo to boɓɓoo.
46010013	Walaa etol hakkillo ngol ngaɗanaɗon, ngol ɓiɓɓe aadama ngaɗanaaka. Amma Alla no kolniiɗo, o accataa hakkillo mooɗon etee ko ɓuri semmbe mooɗon. Amma nder etol hakkillo fuu, Alla hokkan on baawɗe munyude etol ngool. O hokkan on duu laawol wurtaade nder maggol.
46010014	Onon banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, mboɗɗee dewol tooruure.
46010015	Miɗo haalana on kujje ɗee ngam miɗo miila ko on jom'en hakkillo. Ndenne etee, onon he ko'e mooɗon, ndaaron ko mbi'umi ɗum.
46010016	Jarol nyeɗerde barke nde ngatten ngam yettude Alla, waɗataa en en fuu go'o nder ƴiiƴam Almasiihu naa ? Buuru mo nyaameten oo, waɗataa en en fuu go'o nder ɓanndu Almasiihu naa ?
46010017	Buuru gooto woodi. En fuu buuru gooto oon nyaamuɗen. Ndenne, en fuu kappa kuula meeɗen, en ngartii ɓanndu worru.
46010018	Ndaaree ɓiɓɓe Isra'el, woowɓe no nyaama sadakaaji cakketeeɗi dow sakkirde Alla ɓeen, ɓe fuu ɓe ngartii go'o nder sadaka gaɗaaɗo dow sakkirde Alla ndee.
46010019	Ɗume ngiɗumi wi'ude ɗo ? Tewu cakkanaangu tooruure nguu no woodi maana mawɗo gom naa ? Naa tooruure no goɗɗum ?
46010020	Aa'a. Amma ko ngiɗumi wi'ude ɗo woni, ko sadakaaji ɗii ginnaaji cakkanaa, hanaa Alla. Miin nee, mi hiɗaa kawton he ginnaaji.
46010021	On mbaawaa njari he nyeɗerde Joomiraawo, dey kaden njaron he nyeɗerde ginnaaji. On mbaawaa nyaami le'al Joomiraawo, dey kaden nyaamon le'al ginnaaji duu.
46010022	Naa, en ngiɗaana njukken kiram Joomiraawo ? Naa, eɗen ɓuri mo semmbe non ?
46010023	Goonga non woɓɓe no mbi'a : « Neɗɗo no waawi waɗa huune fuu. » Amma hanaa huune fuu nafata. « Neɗɗo no waawi waɗa huune fuu. » Amma hanaa huune fuu yaarata hawriine goonɗinɓe yeeso.
46010024	To neɗɗo fuu tefu ko nafata hoore mum tan, amma tefa ko nafata banndum.
46010025	Ko nyaamee ko sonnetee nder luumo fuu coodee nyaamon, to ƴamee ƴamtinoɗon fuy dow majjum ngam to miilooji mooɗon pelu on.
46010026	Se goonga no winndaa, wi'aa : Joomiraawo jeyii duuniyaaru e ko woni nder mayru fuu.
46010027	Alal misaali, nde nii mo goonɗinaay Iisa gom noddi on ngaron nyaamon, nde on njaɓi on njehi, nyaamee huune fuu ko kokkaɗon. To ƴamee ƴamtinoɗon ngam to ɓerɗe mooɗon pelu on.
46010028	Amma nde nii goɗɗo wi'i on : « Tewu nguu, tewu cakkanaangu tooruuje non. » To on nyaamee ngu daliila bi'uɗo on haala kaa, heɓa duu to ɓerɗe mooɗon pelu on.
46010029	Ko mbi'umi ɗum, hanaa ngam mooɗon waɗi mbi'umi ɗum, amma ngam ko kaaluɗo haala kaa waawi miilaade. Amma ɗume waɗata ɓerne goɗɗo hiito kam dow ko etumi ngaɗumi, miin he hoore am ?
46010030	Nde nii mi yettii Alla ngam ko nyaamanmi, ɗume waɗi miɗo felee ngam ko nyaamanmi ɗum ?
46010031	Ndenne, nde nii oɗon nyaama naa nde oɗon njara naa nder ko ngatton fuu, ngaɗee ɗum ngam teddinde Alla.
46010032	To accee ko ngatton fuu laatanoo Yahudanke naa mo hanaa Yahudanke naa ɗum laatanoo hawriine goonɗinɓe Alla laawol fergere.
46010033	Njooɗee ir jonnde nde njooɗiimi. Nder ko ngaɗanmi fuu, mi tefataana ko welata himɓe. Mi tefataa ko nafata kam, miin tan, amma mi tefataana ko nafata ɗuuɗal himɓe ngam ɓe fuu, ɓe kisinee.
46011001	Nyemminee kam hano no miin e hoore am nyemminirmi Almasiihu.
46011002	Miɗo yetta on ngam oɗon miccitoo he am nder ko ngatton fuu. Oɗon njogii duu ekkintinol ngol ekkitinmi on.
46011003	Amma, ko giɗu mi paamon woni Almasiihu woni ardiiɗo gorko fuu. Gorko fuu duu woni ardiiɗo debbo mum. Alla duu kam woni ardiiɗo Almasiihu.
46011004	Gorko fuu du'ii naa waɗi annabaaku, hoore mum no suddi, gorko oo semtinii Almasiihu, ardiiɗo mum.
46011005	Amma debbo kaɓɓanaaɗo fuu du'ii naa waɗi annabaaku ko suddaay hoore mum, semtinii ardiiɗo mum. Debbo oo wartii hano pemmbiiɗo.
46011006	Ndenne, nde nii o suddataa hoore makko, o taƴa gaasa makko. Amma nde nii semteene non o taƴa gaasa makko naa o femmba ka, ndenne o sudda hoore makko.
46011007	Gorko haanaa sudda hoore mum, ngam tagaama nder nanndi Alla, omo holla teddungal Alla. Amma debbo kay teddungal gorum hollata.
46011008	Gorko tagiraaka ɓanndu debbo amma debbo kam tagiraa ɓanndu gorko.
46011009	Kaden duu hanaa gorko tagaa ngam debbo, amma debbo tagaa ngam gorko.
46011010	Ngam daliila oo e ngam sabbu maleykaaɓe no tilsi debbo fuu sudda hoore mum, cuddol hoore ndee no holla ko o ɗowtaniiɗo goriiko.
46011011	Baa nii ko gorko tagaaka ngam debbo yeeso Joomiraawo, debbo no haajaa gorum, gorko duu no haajaa deekum.
46011012	Baa nii ko debbo arano tagaaɗo ƴuwaana he gorko, worɓe duu laawol rewɓe ngoni no naatira duuniyaaru. Debbo e gorko duu fuu ƴuwaana to Alla.
46011013	Ndaaree onon he ko'e mooɗon, ngi'on nde no haani debbo du'oo tawa suddaay hoore mum ?
46011014	Naa he giiɗe himɓe ɗum semtinaaki gorko acca gaasa mum juutaa ?
46011015	Darja non debbo tawree gaasa juuka. O hokkaama ka ngam ka sudda hoore makko.
46011016	Amma nde nii goɗɗo no hiɗi yedda ko mbi'umi ɗum, joomum faama ko ɗum hanaa al'aada amin, ɗum hanaa al'aada kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Alla duu.
46011017	Har ko daarata kawriiɗe mooɗon, walaa fuu to njettiranmi on, ngam on ngalaa oɗon kawra ngam waɗude ko nafata amma on kawrataana ngam ɓeydude bone hakkune mooɗon.
46011018	Arannde nii, mi nani wakkati kawruɗon fuu, luural no nii hakkune mooɗon. Miɗo miila duu ko nanumi ɗum hanaa fewre.
46011019	Nde luural naati hakkune mooɗon no haani ngal waɗa hakkune mooɗon ngam wakkatiiji gom sey to luural waɗi ko faamee moy'en ngoni dartiiɓe e goonga hakkune mooɗon.
46011020	Ndenne, nde on kawri hanaa hiraane Joomiraawo seniine woni no hawra on.
46011021	Ngam wakkati nyaamton, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu harantaakona nyaama hiraane mum tawi goɗɗo hakkune mooɗon no rafaa. Goɗɗo mooɗon duu nanngi no yara faa no yiilto.
46011022	Ɗume waɗi oɗon karanoo nyaamɗe e jarɗe ? Naa, on ngalaa cuuɗi to nyaamton naa to njaron non ? Naa hawriine goonɗinɓe Alla njawiɗon, waɗi oɗon ngiɗi cemtinon ɓe ngalaa fuy ? Ɗume ndoomuɗon mi wi'a on ? Mi wi'a miɗo yetta on naa ? Aa'a ! Mi yettataa on nder gaɗol ir golle bonɗe ɗee.
46011023	Miin ko nanumi to Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen, kanƴum woni ko njottinmi to mooɗon : Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen wakkati ɓe nyaamannoo nder jemma mo o nannganoo oon, o hooƴi buuru,
46011024	o yetti Alla, nden o helti mo, o wi'i : « Ɗum woni ɓanndu am kokkaanu ngam mooɗon. Ngaɗee iri nii he banndum ngam miccitaade he am. »
46011025	Nden gaɗa ɓe kiirtake, o hooƴi nyeɗerde cabiijam, o wi'i ɓe : « Nyeɗerde ndee woni amaana keso tabbintinaaɗo har ƴiiƴam am. Ngaɗee iri nii he banndum wakkati fuu mo njarton cabiijam ngam miccitaade he am. »
46011026	Ndenne, wakkati fuu mo nyaamuɗon buuru oo njaruɗon nyeɗerde cabiijam ɗam, oɗon ngaɗa filla maayde Joomiraawo. Tittinkinee he waɗude iri nii he banndum sey nyannde o warti.
46011027	Neɗɗo fuu nyaami iri buuru naa yari e nyeɗerde cabiijam Joomiraawo no haaniraa, joomum waɗi hakke gartirooje ɓanndu naa ƴiiƴam Joomiraawo meeɗen meere.
46011028	Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu ƴeewa hoore mum, fadde mum nyaamude buuru oon naa yarude he nyeɗerde cabiijam ɗam.
46011029	Neɗɗo fuu nyaami buuru oon, yari e cabiijam ɗam, dey miilaaki ko woni maana kawtal mum he ɓanndu Joomiraawo, joomum fooɗani hoore mum kiite.
46011030	Ngam majjum waɗi nyawɓe he ɓe ɓalli mum'en mbaati no keewi nder mooɗon. Ko ɗuuɗi hakkune mooɗon duu maayi.
46011031	Nde nii en ƴeewi ko'e meeɗen, en kiitataake.
46011032	Amma ngam to en kiitodee he himɓe duuniyaaru, Joomiraawo no jukka en ngam eltude en.
46011033	Ndenne banndiraaɓe am, nde nii on kawri ngam nyaamude hiraane seniine, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu dooma banndum.
46011034	Nde nii goɗɗo mooɗon no nana rafo, joomum nyaama wuro mum ginan, ngam to fooɗan hawriine mooɗon kiite. Har ko daarata ƴamɗe mooɗon koddiiɗe, mi faamtinan on se mi warii.
46012001	Banndiraaɓe, har ko daarata kokke ɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hokkata goonɗinɗo, mi hiɗaa taweɗon nder rafi anndal majje.
46012002	Wakkati on ngoonɗinaayno Alla, tooruuje ngoni no pooɗa hakkillo mooɗon, no majjina on.
46012003	Paamee ko neɗɗo fuu mo Ruuhu Alla ɗowi waawaa wi'ude Iisa no kuɗaaɗo. Kaden duu neɗɗo fuu mo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ɗowaay waawaa wi'ude Iisa no Joomiraawo.
46012004	Kokke feere-fereeje ngoodi amma Ruuhu gooto oon nii woni kokkoowo ɗe.
46012005	Golle feere-fereeje ngoodi, amma Joomiraawo gooto oon nii gollantee.
46012006	Laabi gollande Alla feere-fereeji ngoodi, amma Alla gooto hokkata neɗɗo fuu baawɗe gollirde ɗi.
46012007	Neɗɗo fuu he no Ruuhu wanngirta he mum ngam ɓeydaari himɓe fuu.
46012008	Oo hokkaama haala keewka hikmaaku, ooɗo duu hokkaama haala keewka anndal. Ruuhu gooto oo, kanko woni kokkoowo ɓe kokke ɗee fuu.
46012009	Goɗɗo hokkaama goonɗinol manngol, ooto duu hokkaama nyawtol himɓe. Ruuhu gooto oo, kanko woni kokkoowo ɓe kokke ɗee fuu.
46012010	Neɗɗo oo hokkaama gaɗol ko haayɗini, neɗɗo ooto hokkaama gaɗol annabaaku, neɗɗo gom duu hokkaama senndodirde ko ƴuwi to Ruuhu Alla he ko ƴuwaay to makko. Goɗɗo hokkaama kaalol nder ɗemle feere-fereeje, goɗɗo kam duu hokkaama piirtol ɗemle feere-fereeje ɗeen.
46012011	Fii feere-fereeji ɗii fuu, Ruuhu gooto oon tan hokkata ɗi. Omo hokka neɗɗo fuu kokkal feere-feere'al hano no o hiɗiri.
46012012	Alal misaali, ɓanndu no worru amma ndu walaana terɗe ɗuɗɗe. No terɗe mayru ɗuuɗiri fuu ɗe kawrataana ɗe laatoo go'o. Hano non duu tokkuɓe Almasiihu ngorri.
46012013	En fuu, Yahudanke yahde mo hanaa Yahudanke, dimo meeɗen yahde maccuɗo meeɗen nder Ruuhu gooto ngaɗanaɗen batisma ngam laatoɗen ɓanndu worru. En fuu duu Ruuhu gooto oon keɓuɗen.
46012014	Ɓanndu neɗɗo walaa tergal gootal, terɗe ɗuɗɗe ndu woodi.
46012015	Nde koyngal wi'i : « Miin, mi hanaa junngo, ndenne mi jeyaaka he ɓanndu », ɗum waɗataa ngal hakkitee he ɓanndu.
46012016	Naa nde nowru wi'i : « Miin, mi hanaa hitere, ndenne mi jeyaaka he ɓanndu », ɗum waɗataa ndu hakkitee he ɓanndu.
46012017	Too joonin, nde nii ɓanndu fuu laatakenoo hitere, noy nanirten ? Naa nde nii ndu fuu ndu laatakeno nowru, noy nanirten ko uuri e ko luuɓi ?
46012018	Amma Alla hawrodiri kujje ɗee fuu nder ɓanndu worru no weliri mo.
46012019	Nde nii ɓanndu laatakeno terde worre, ndenne toy terɗe ɓanndu ɗeeto tawetenoo ?
46012020	Ɓanndu no worru, baa nii ko terɗe mayru no ɗuɗɗi.
46012021	Hitere waawaa wi'ude junngo : « Mi walaa haaju maa. » Non duu hoore waawaa wi'ude koyngal : « Mi walaa haaju maa. »
46012022	Terde ɓanndu baa worre haana wi'ude ir haala kaa, ngam baa terɗe ɓanndu ɗe ngi'eten hano ɗe ngalaa semmbe fuu, no ngoodi ko nafata.
46012023	Terɗe ɓanndu ɗe teddungal mum'en no pamɗi, kanƴe ɓurɗen teddinde. Terɗe ɓanndu ɗe gi'ol mum'en no semteene non to meeɗen, kanƴe ɓurɗen hilnaade.
46012024	Terɗe ɓanndu meeɗen ɗe gi'ol mum'en semtinaaki to meeɗen kaajaaka hilneede. Alla hawrodiri ɗe, ɗe fuu, hokki ɗe ngalaa semmbe ɗeen teddungal ɓurde ɗeeto.
46012025	Alla waɗi ɗum ngam ɗe kilnodira heɓa to luural waɗu hakkune majje.
46012026	Nde nii terde ɓanndu gom no naawa, terɗe ɓanndu ɗeeto fuu kam'en duu nanan naawɗum ɗum. Nde nii terde ɓanndu gom teddinaama, terɗe ɓanndu ɗeeto fuu kam'en duu nanan belɗum teddinol ngool.
46012027	Onon ngoni ɓanndu Almasiihu, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu duu no terde ɓanndu makko.
46012028	Nii woni no Alla sinngiri hawriine goonɗinɓe : Arannde nii o waɗi lilaaɓe, ɗiɗaɓel o waɗi annabiiɓe, tataɓel o waɗi jannginooɓe. Nden o hokki woɓɓe kokke waɗude ko haayɗini, o hokki woɓɓe kokke nyawtol nyawɓe. O hokki woɓɓe duu kokke ballal, woɓɓe kaden o hokki ɓe kokke aardangal. Woɓɓe keɓi kokke haalude nder ɗemle feere-fereeje ɗe ɓe anndaa.
46012029	Nder heɓuɓe kokke feere-fereeje ɗee, hanaa ɓe fuu ngoni lilaaɓe, hanaa ɓe fuu ngoni annabiiɓe, hanaa ɓe fuu ngoni jannginooɓe, hanaa ɓe fuu kokkaa kokke waɗude ko haayɗini.
46012030	Ɓe fuu duu, ɓe keɓaay kokke nyawtol nyawɓe naa kokke haalude nder ɗemle feere-fereeje ɗe ɓe anndaa naa fiirtude ko haala nder ɗemle ɗeen.
46012031	Ndenne, ngattee semmbe mooɗon tefon kokke ɓurɗe kokke ɗeen fuu manngu. Amma jooni, ko kollanmi on woni laawol ɓurngol laabi fuu.
46013001	Alal misaali miɗo haala nder ɗemle himɓe naa miɗo haala nder ɗemle maleykaaɓe, nde nii hidde walaa nder ɓerne am, miin he lenguru cenƴooru naa baggu olkooru meere meere, fuu no go'o.
46013002	Nde mi heɓi kokkal waɗude annabaaku naa kokkal faamude maana siri cuuɗiiɗo e hikmaaku fuu, naa nde miɗo woodi goonɗinol manngol faa miɗo sottina baamle, nde nii hidde walaa nder ɓerne am, mi hanaa fuy.
46013003	Baa mi yeddanii talkaaɓe njawdi am fuu naa mi hokki ɓanndu am, nde nii hidde walaa nder ɓerne am, ko ɗum nafirta kam ?
46013004	Jom hidde no woodi munyal e neɗɗaaku. O walaa haasidaaku, o ronndataako hoore, o fiitaa gabaare, o wi'a kam no goɗɗum.
46013005	Jom hidde waɗataa ko semtini, tefataa ko nafata ɗum kam tan. O ɓernilawtaa, o jogitittaako ko boni fuu ko o waɗaa.
46013006	Jom hidde nanataa belɗum rafi dartinaaku, amma omo nana belɗum goonga.
46013007	Wakkati fuu omo yaafo gacce ɗe o waɗana, omo hooli huune fuu. Omo deki gokka dow Alla nder huune fuu. Omo munya huune fuu.
46013008	Hidde hantataa faa abada. Amma annabaaku kay hantan, kokkal haalude ɗemle feere-fereeje darnoytee, anndal duu hantan.
46013009	Anndal meeɗen huuɓaay, kokke waɗude annabaaku duu no ngoodi keerol.
46013010	Amma wakkati ko huuɓi wari, ko huuɓaay duu majjan.
46013011	Wakkati ngonnoomi suka, haalaaji am, miilooji am e taykaaki am, kanƴi he ɗi mo anndaa goɗɗum fuu no go'o. Amma joonin ko mawnumi, mi acci golleeji cukaaku fuu.
46013012	Joonin en ngalaa eɗen ngi'a kujje fuu he ko'e majje, ɗe nga'aana hano ko woni no tiimee nder danndorgal. Amma warowan nyannde gom ko en ngi'iran huune fuu he gite meeɗen faa laaɓa tar. Joonin anndal am huuɓaay, amma wakkati warowan mo hano no Alla anndiri kam non anndiranmi huune fuu faa laaɓa tar.
46013013	Ndenne jooni, kujje tati tan duumotoo : Goonɗinol, gokka e hidde. Amma ɓurngel manngu nder majje woni hidde.
46014001	Har ko daarta hidde, ko mbi'anmi on nii woni tefee nde, nden tefon kokke ƴuwooje to Ruuhu Ceniiɗo. Ko ɓuri woni tefon kokkal waɗude annabaaku.
46014002	Ngam kaaloowo nder ɗemngal feere'al ngal anndaaka, joomum Alla woni no haalda hanaa ɓii-aadama. Walaa baawɗo faami ko joomum woni no wi'a, ngam nder baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo joomum woni no haala ko suuɗii ɗum.
46014003	Amma gaɗoowo annabaaku, himɓe haaldata, ngam ɓenndina goonɗinol maɓɓe, semmbinɗina ɓe, nyawta ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
46014004	Kaaloowo nder ɗemngal feere'al ngal anndaaka, hoore mum woni no nafa, amma gaɗoowo annabaaku, hawriine goonɗinɓe fuu nafata.
46014005	Miɗo hiɗi tawee on fuu oɗon kaala nder ɗemle feere-fereeje ɗe anndaaka, amma ko ɓurmi hiɗande on woni gaɗol annabaaku. Ngam gaɗoowo annabaaku ɓuri nafude dina kaaloowo nder ɗemngal feere'al ngal anndaaka. Amma nde baawɗo fiirti ko o wi'i ɗum no tawa hakkune goonɗinɓe ngam semmbinɗinde ɓe, iɗum nafa.
46014006	Jooni banndiraaɓe, alal misaali, mi wara to mooɗon mi haala hakkune mooɗon nder ɗemngal feere'al ngal anndaaka gom. Nde nii ko kaalanmi ɗum hanaa ko mbannginanaami non, naa anndal kesal gom, naa annabaaku gom, naa jannginooje gom, too ko kaalumi ɗum walaa ko ɗum nafirta on.
46014007	Alal misaali kaden, seeseeru naa hoddu, kujje fijo ɗe, nde nii piyaaka no wooɗiri, noy mbaawirɗen nanude ko ɗe mbi'ata ?
46014008	Naa nde puufoowo luwal konu, fuufaay luwal mum no wooɗiri, moy siryotoo fa'a konu ?
46014009	Hano ir nii he banndum ɗum wa'ani on. Nde nii on kaali goɗɗum hakkune hawriine goonɗinɓe nder ɗemngal feere'al gom ngal anndaaka, noy himɓe mbaawi faamude ko mbi'uɗon ? Haala mooɗon he meere fuu go'o.
46014010	Ɗemle ɗuɗɗe ngoodi nder duuniyaaru, amma nder majje ɗe fuu walaa ngal walaa maana.
46014011	Nde nii mi waawaa ɗemngal gom, mi koɗo to gonɗo no haalda he am nder maggal, to am miin duu o koɗo.
46014012	Onon duu ngam nii oɗon ngiɗi keɓol kokke ɗe Ruuhu waɗata faa noy walaa, ndenne ndurwee ngatton semmbe mooɗon fuu naforoɗon ir kokke cemmbinɗinooje hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa Almasiihu.
46014013	Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu kaaloowo nder ɗemngal feere'al gom, du'oo, eela Alla hokka ɗum baawɗe fiirtude ko wi'i fuu.
46014014	Nde nii miɗo du'oo nder ɗemngal feere'al gom ngal anndaaka, ɓerne am woni he du'aa'u oo, amma hakkillo am heɓtataa fuu ko ngonmi miɗo wi'a nder makko.
46014015	Ndenne, noy ngaɗanmi ? Mi du'oto he ɓerne am fuu, mi du'oto duu no laaɓiri. Mi yimiran ɓerne am fuu, mi yiman no laaɓiri duu.
46014016	Nde nii a yetti Alla he ɓerne maa fuu nder ɗemngal ngal anndaaka, noy kettiniiɗo ma, mo faamataa ko mbi'uɗaa, waawi wi'ude « Aamiin » ngam a yetti Alla. Joomum anndaa ko ngonɗaa aɗa haala.
46014017	Baa nde nii du'aa'u maaɗa no wooɗi faa noy walaa, goɗɗo kay walaa no heɓa barke makko.
46014018	Miin miɗo yetta Alla, ngam miɗo ɓuri on, on fuu haalude nder ɗemle feere-fereeje ɗe mi anndaa.
46014019	Amma nder hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa, mi haala konngi joy paamtiniiɗi heɓa woɓɓe duu ekkito no ɓurani kam, mi haala konngi ujunaaji sappo (10,000) nder ɗemle feere-fereeje ɗe pamtinaaki.
46014020	Banndiraaɓe, to ngartiree ko'e mooɗon hano sukaaɓe. Nder waɗude ko wooɗaa haani ngaɗon ko'e mooɗon hano entaaɓe. Nder taykaaki duu laatee ɓennduɓe.
46014021	No winndaa nder Tawreeta wi'aa ko Joomiraawo wi'i : Mi haaldan he himɓe am nder ɗemle gom ɗe ɓe anndaa. Mi haaldan he maɓɓe har ɗemle janaane. Amma ɗum fuu waɗataa, ɓe kettinanoo kam.
46014022	Ndenne banndiraaɓe, ngam ir nii he banndum waɗi haalude nder ɗemle feere-fereeje ɗe anndaaka hanaa alaama non ngam goonɗinɓe, amma alaama non ngam ɓe ngoonɗinaay. Annabaaku duu, hanaa alaama non ngam ɓe ngoonɗinaay, amma alaama non ngam goonɗinɓe.
46014023	Alal misaali, onon goonɗinɓe on fuu on kawri, dey neɗɗo mooɗon fuu tinno no haala nder ɗemngal feere'al ngal anndaaka, nde nii warɓe hettini mboowaay hi'ude ir majjum naa ɓe ngoonɗinaay gom ngari ngi'ii ir majjum. Ɓe mbi'an ko onon wonɓe no kaala ɗemle feere-fereeje ɗe anndaaka ɗeen, no haaŋaaɓe.
46014024	Amma nde nii on fuu, oɗon nder waɗude annabaaku faa mo goonɗinaay gom, naa mo anndaa ko ngonɗon oɗon ngaɗa naati, dey annabaaku neɗɗo mooɗon fuu meema ɓerne makko faa o tefa tuubude.
46014025	Ko suuɗinoo nder ɓerne makko fuu no wanngintee. Nden o hofo, o turna hoore makko faa e leydi, o sujidana Alla, o wi'a : « Alla no hakkune mooɗon goonga e goonga. »
46014026	Wakkati kawruɗon ngam teddinde Alla, nder mooɗon goɗɗo no woodi jimol, goɗɗo no janngina, ooɗo wanngina ko suuɗi, ooto no haala nder ɗemngal feere'al ngal anndaaka gom, goɗɗo duu fiirta ko wi'aa nder maggal. Too ! Banndiraaɓe am, ɗume haani waɗeede ? Ko haani waɗee woni ɗum fuu ɗum waɗee ngam nafude hawriine goonɗinɓe mooɗon.
46014027	Nde nii no woodi hiɗuɓe kaala nder ɗemle feere-fereeje, to ɓuru ɗiɗo naa tato gooto gooto ɓe kaani waɗirde ɗum, nden gaɗa mum goɗɗo fiirta ko ɓe mbi'i.
46014028	Amma nde tawi piirtoowo ko ɓe mbi'i ɗum walaa, ndenne sey ɓe ndeƴƴita, neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu haalda Alla nder ɓerne mum.
46014029	Waɗooɓe annabaaku duu to ɓuru ɗiɗo naa tato, ɓe ngaɗa gooto gooto, ɓeeto eta ndaara nder hakkillo mum'en ko wi'aa.
46014030	Amma nde Alla wannginani gooto nder etooɓe daara ɓeen goɗɗum ko joomum ɓanti daane mum ngam wi'a ɗum, arano puɗɗuɗo haalude oon no haani deƴƴita.
46014031	Goonga non neɗɗo mooɗon fuu no waawi waɗa annabaaku, amma sey ngaɗiron gooto gooto ngam neɗɗo mooɗon fuu ekkito, heɓa ko semmbinɗinta ɗum.
46014032	Gaɗoowo annabaaku no dawrana hoore mum.
46014033	Ngam Alla hanaa Alla fikitaare, amma o Alla jam. Nde goonɗinɓe kawri, no haani rewɓe ndeƴƴita, ɓe kokkaaka laawol haalude goɗɗum, hano no ɗum woni iɗum hi'ee nokku fuu nder kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe. Ɓe kaanaana ɓe njooɗo ɓe kettino ko woni no wi'ee hano no Tawreeta wi'iri ɗum.
46014035	Nde iɓe ngoodi ko ɓe ngiɗi faamtineede, ɓe acca faa nde ɓe kooti, nden ɓe ƴama goriraaɓe maɓɓe. Nder hawriine goonɗinɓe hegaaki baa seɗɗa debbo ɓanta daane wi'a goɗɗum.
46014036	Naa onon ɓiɓɓe Korintu, oɗon miila ko to mooɗon haala Alla fuɗɗi naa to mooɗon ka haaɗi ?
46014037	Nde nii goɗɗo lamni ko kam no annabiijo naa ko kam no keewɗo Ruuhu Alla, too, no tilsi o annda ko mbinndanmi on ɗum no tilsinoore Joomiraawo.
46014038	Neɗɗo fuu mo anndaa Alla, faama ko Alla duu anndaa joomum.
46014039	Ndenne banndiraaɓe am, tefee kokkal waɗude annabaaku, to kaɗee neɗɗo fuu haalude nder ɗemngal feere'al ngal anndaaka.
46014040	Amma ko waɗetee fuu, tilay ɗum waɗee no haaniri he no dartorii.
46015001	Joonin banndiraaɓe, miɗo hiɗi mi miccintina on Habaru lobbo mo mbaajimi hakkune mooɗon faa njaɓuɗon, peŋiɗon he mum.
46015002	Habaru lobbo oo hisinta on, nde nii on tokkitake waaju am no wooɗiri. Nde on tokkitaaki mo duu, goonɗinol mooɗon wartii meere.
46015003	Ko artumi yottinde to mooɗon woni ekkintinol ngol ekkitaami, miin he hoore am. Ekkintinol ngool woni ko Almasiihu maayi ngam hakkeeji meeɗen, o mooɓaama nder annyeere, nyalaane tataɓere gaɗa mum o ummitii, hano no ɗum winndiraa nder dewte ceniiɗe.
46015005	O wanngani Piyer, nden ko o wanngani lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen.
46015006	Gaɗa ko o wanngani lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, gaba go'o o wanngani banndiraaɓe makko gom ɓurɓe keme joyo. Banndiraaɓe ɓe o wanngani ɓe, ɗuuɗal mum'en fuu no mbuuri hannden, amma woɓɓe duu maayi.
46015007	O wanngani Yakuuba, nden o wanngani kappa kuula lilaaɓe ɓeen fuu.
46015008	Gaɗa ko o wanngani ɓe, ɓe fuu, nden o sakitii o wanngani kam, baa ko mi nanndaana he neɗɗo dimaaɗo nder wakkati mo dimol mum yottaaki.
46015009	Hakkune lilaaɓe ɓeen fuu, miin ɓuri famɗude. Mi fotaay noddeede lilaaɗo, ngam mi torriino hawriine goonɗinɓe Alla.
46015010	Amma moƴƴere Alla waɗi laatiimi ko ngonmi hannden. Moƴƴere ndee duu laataaki meere ngam miɗo ɓuri lilaaɓe ɓeeto fuu gollude. Miin he hoore am mi gollaay golle ɗee, amma moƴƴere Alla wonnde he am golli ɗe.
46015011	Nde miin naa lilaaɓe ɓeeto mbaajii on, walaa ko senndi waajuuji amin. Ko ngoonɗinɗon ɗum, kam woni ko min fuu min mbaajooto.
46015012	Nde nii min mbaajake dow ummitaaki Almasiihu hakkune mooɗon, noy waɗata ko nder mooɗon woɓɓe no mbi'a ko neɗɗo fuu maayi ummitittaako ?
46015013	Nde nii maayɗo ummataako, too ndenne, Almasiihu ummitaaki.
46015014	Nde nii Almasiihu ummitaaki, ndenne waajoo amin, he meere fuu go'o, goonɗinol mooɗon duu no meere.
46015015	Nde nii maayɗo fuu ummitataako, ndenne Alla ummintinaay Almasiihu, en ceedanake Alla dow fewre ngam en mbi'i o ummintini Almasiihu he maayde.
46015016	Ngam nde nii maayɓe ummataakono, nden Almasiihu he hoore mum ummitaaki.
46015017	Nden, nde nii Almasiihu ummitaaki, too, goonɗinol mooɗon he meere fuu go'o, oɗon ngondi he hakkeeji mooɗon faa warde hannden.
46015018	Kaden duu goonɗinɓe Almasiihu maaynooɓe fuu mursi.
46015019	Nde nii ngam mbuurnam meeɗen nder duuniyaaru nduu tan waɗi ndekuɗen tammude meeɗen dow Almasiihu, ndenne enen ɓuri himɓe fuu yurminaade.
46015020	Amma nde goonga, Almasiihu ummitake, o laatake arano nder maayɓe ummitii.
46015021	Maayde har neɗɗo gooto naatiri duuniyaaru, hano non duu ummitaaki har neɗɗo gooto wariri.
46015022	Hano no himɓe fuu maayirta daliila kawtal mum'en he Aadamu, hano non duu wooduɓe kawtal he Almasiihu fuu keɓirta mbuurnam kesam.
46015023	Amma ndaaree no ummitaaki wa'ata nii : Arannde nii Almasiihu artee umminee, nden nyannde o wartowi, goonɗinɓe mo fuu umminee.
46015024	Nden timmol duuniyaaru wara, o heɓa jaalorgal dow laamiiɓe duuniyaaru fuu, dow laamu ginni fuu he dow iri baawɗe fuu, o soƴƴoo, o hokkita Alla Baabiraawo aardangal laamu nguun.
46015025	Amma nyannde Almasiihu warti, tilay non o laamoo sey nyannde Alla watti wayɓe makko fuu ley teppe makko.
46015026	Ganyo cakititteeɗo halkee oon woni maayde.
46015027	Ngam no winndaa, wi'aa : Alla watti huune fuu ley teppe makko. Amma nde wi'aama : Huune fuu wattaama ley teppe makko, ndenne laaɓal non ko Alla gattuɗo huune fuu ley teppe makko oon limtataake he wattaaɓe ley teppe makko.
46015028	Gaɗa ko Alla Baabiraawo watti huune fuu nder baawɗe Ɓiyum, ndenne Ɓiyiiko oon he hoore mum leesintoo yeeso makko, ngam Baabiraawo oon dawra dow neɗɗo fuu he dow huune fuu.
46015029	Nde nii maayɓe ummitataako, ndenne ɗume waɗanaaɓe batisma nokku maayɓe mum'en tefata ? Nde nii tawi maayɓe ummitataako, ɗume waɗi himɓe no ngaɗanee batisma ngam ko'e mum'en ?
46015030	Enen e ko'e meeɗen ɗume waɗi, eɗen parritaa wakkati fuu nder mbuurnam meeɗen ?
46015031	Goonga non banndiraaɓe, ko nyannde fuu miɗo daane maayde. Goonga non duu ko oɗon teddi to am daliila kawtal mooɗon he Iisa Almasiihu, Joomiraawo meeɗen.
46015032	Nder Efeesu, mi habdi himɓe laatiiɓe kam'en e ndabba ladde fuu jikku ngootu. Nde nii tawiino ngam giɗaale ɓerne ɓii-aadama non waɗi kabdumi he maɓɓe, ɗume ɗum nafirta kam ? Nde nii maayɓe ummitataako, ndenne : En nyaamu, njaren, ngam jaaŋo en maayan.
46015033	To njaɓee goɗɗo majjina on : « Tokkodirde he bonɗo no bonna jikku neɗɗo lobbu. »
46015034	Pukkinee hakkillooji mooɗon no haaniri, celon waɗude hakke, ngam hakkune mooɗon woɓɓe hanaa no anndu Alla non. Ko kaalumi ɗum, semteene mooɗon non.
46015035	Tawte goɗɗo ƴaman wi'a : « Noy maayɓe ummitortoo ? Nde ɓe ummitake iri ɓalli ɗiye ɓe ummiditoo ? »
46015036	Aan pamɗuɗo hakkillo gaɗoowo ir ƴamɗe ɗee, wabbere nde aawuɗaa fuu hanaa sey nde nyola ko nde fuɗa.
46015037	Aawdiiri fuu ndi aawuɗaa, gawri non naa alkamaari non naa aawdiiri gom non, hanaa wasaaŋo aawuɗaa amma gabbe ɗeen aawuɗaa.
46015038	Gaɗa a aawii aawdiiri ndiin, Alla fuɗinta ndi no hiɗiri, hokka wabbere fuu taddi ndi suɓanii ɗum.
46015039	Ɓalli feere-fereeji Alla tagi, no woodi ko senndi ɓanndu ɓii-aadama he ɓalli dabbaaji, pooli, naa liƴƴi.
46015040	Huune fuu ko o tagi, nde dow wuuri naa ley wuuri o taganii ɗum ɓanndu hoore mum. Wodde ɓalli majji duu no ceedi.
46015041	Ƴelkitol naange hawtaa he ƴelkitol lewru, hano non duu ƴelkitol majje no seedi he ƴelkitol koode. Nder koode duu, hoodere fuu he ƴelkitol mum.
46015042	Ndaa, nii ummitaaki maayɓe wa'i : Nde ɓanndu wattaama nder annyeere, ndu nyolan hano no wabbere awaane nyolirta ko fuɗaa. Amma nde ndu ummitake ndu nyolataa faa abada.
46015043	Nde ɓanndu wattaama nder annyeere, ndu walaa fuu teddungal gom, amma nde ndu ummintinaama, ndu heewan teddungal. Nde nii ndu wattaama nder annyeere ndu walaa semmbe fuu, amma nde ndu ummitake indu heewi semmbe.
46015044	Ɓanndu neɗɗo ufee ɓanndu tagaaɗo, dey ummitoo ɓanndu ƴuwnu to Ruuhu Ceniiɗo. Nde nii ɓanndu no ɗon ndu tagaaɓe njeyii, too ɓanndu no ɗon, ndu Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jeyii.
46015045	No winndaa, wi'aa : Aadamu, artaaɗo tageede oon no buurɗo. Amma Aadamu cakitiiɗo oon, no Ruuhu Alla, kokkoowo mbuurnam.
46015046	Hanaa ko wuuri daliila Ruuhu Alla woni ko arti amma ko woodi yonki. Ko wuuri daliila Ruuhu Alla kam sakitii.
46015047	Arano oon sollaare tagiraa, amma ɗiɗaɓo oon kay dow ƴuwi.
46015048	Ɓalli himɓe duuniyaaru he ɓanndu tagiraaɗo sollaare oon fuu no go'o. Ɓalli wonɓe dow kammu duu, he ɓanndu ƴuwɗo he Ruuhu oon fuu no go'o.
46015049	En nanndii he tagiraaɗo sollaare oon, amma yahde yeeso en nanndowan he ƴuwɗo he Ruuhu oon duu.
46015050	Banndiraaɓe ko mbi'anmi on nii woni ko tabbat tewu e ƴiiƴam ndonataa Laamu Alla. Kaden duu ko nyolata fuu waawaa ronude ko nyolataa.
46015051	Mi haalanan on sirri gom duu : Hanaa en fuu maayidita, amma wakkati fuu mo luwal cakitittoongal ngaal fuufaa, nder wakkatiyel gootel, nder maƴƴande hitere, en fuu, maayɓe he ɓe maayaay ɓalli mum'en fuu mbayletee. Nden maaynooɓe ummidotoo he ɓalli ɗi maayataa. Enen ɓe maayaay duu, ɓalli meeɗen mbaylee.
46015053	Ndenne no tilsi ko nyolata fuu heɓa ɓanndu ndu nyolataa faa abada. Ɓanndu maayooru duu warta ndu maayataa faa abada.
46015054	Nde ɓanndu nyolooru fuu heɓi ɓanndu ndu nyolataa faa abada, nde nii ɓanndu maayooru duu warti ndu maayataa faa abada, ndenne huune fuu no hi'irtee hano no ɗum winndaa, ɗum wi'aa : Jaalorgal moɗi maayde kup.
46015055	Maayde, toy jaalorgal maaɗa woni ? Maayde, toy tooke maaɗa ngoni ?
46015056	Tooke maa ngoni hakke, semmbe hakke woni tilsinooje Tawreeta.
46015057	Yettoore laatanoo Alla, kokkoowo en jaalorgal daliila Iisa Almasiihu, Joomiraawo meeɗen.
46015058	Ndenne banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, tarsinee faa wooɗa, to huune fuu jaaloo on. Wakkati fuu oɗon ɓeydoroo yahde yeeso nder golle Joomiraawo ngam oɗon anndi ko gollal ngal ngollanton Joomiraawo ngaal hanaa golle meere.
46016001	Joonin, har ko daarata kawrol ceede ngam wallude himɓe Alla wonɓe Ursaliima, ngaɗee ko ƴamumi tokkuɓe Iisa wonɓe Galatiya ngaɗa.
46016002	Alal fuu, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu itta nder ko heɓi, resa dey-dey no waawi. To on njooɗee ndoomon nyannde ngarmi, ko tefon hawrude ceede ɗeen.
46016003	Nde nii mi wari, mi lilan ɓe cuɓiɗon, mi hokka ɓe ɗereeji kollooji ko onon cuɓi ɓe, ɓe ngadda balla mooɗon Ursaliima.
46016004	Nde nii foti mi yaha, miin he hoore am, mi yaadan he maɓɓe.
