46016005	Mi waran, mi weerana on, amma sey to mi fanti Makedoniya, ngam mi suɓake tokkirde toon ko mi yottowo to mooɗon.
46016006	Nde nii mi wari, mi weeranan on balɗe seɗɗa naa duu no waɗa mi dabba to mooɗon ngam mballon kam nder jahaangal am, heɓa to pondiimi fuu, miɗo woodi ko waawi yottinde kam toon.
46016007	Mi hiɗaa mi fanta to mooɗon tan mi yawta ngam miɗo hiɗi nde Joomiraawo jaɓi, mi waɗa wakkati hakkune mooɗon.
46016008	Gaɗa Juulɗe kettol alkamaari, mi dillan Efeesu. Amma joonin mi hiɗaa dillude toon,
46016009	ngam laawol manngol udditani kam, laawol waɗude golle am toon, baa nii ko wayɓe am no ɗuuɗi.
46016010	Nde Timote wari to mooɗon, mbernee mo no wooɗiri, ngam walaa ko senndi min, kanko he hoore makko o gollanoowo Joomiraawo.
46016011	Ndenne, to neɗɗo mooɗon fuu daaru mo meere. Mballee mo nder jahaangal makko, ngam o heɓa no o wardi to am jam he seyo. Miin he banndiraaɓe meeɗen gom, miɗen ndoomi mo Efeesu.
46016012	Har ko daarata Apolos banndiraawo meeɗen, mi eelii mo faa noy walaa o wara, o warda he banndiraaɓe meeɗen ɓeeto to mooɗon. Amma o hiɗaa fuu-fu warde to mooɗon jooni. Nyannde fuu o heɓowi laawol o waran.
46016013	Laatee siryiiɓe, ndaree no wooɗiri dow goonɗinol mooɗon, laatoɗon suusuɓe, ɓeydon semmbiɗidde.
46016014	Ko ngatton fuu, ngaɗiron ɗum he hidde.
46016015	Banndiraaɓe am ko eelanmi on kaden woni, oɗon anndi ko Istefanas e koreeji mum ngoni artuɓe goonɗinde Iisa nder Akaya fuu. Ɓe kokki ko'e maɓɓe ngam wallude himɓe Alla.
46016016	Ɗowtanee ir himɓe ɓee. Ɗowtanee duu gollidooɓe he maɓɓe, tampidi he maɓɓe.
46016017	Mi nani belɗum garki Istefanas, Fortunatus e Akaykus ngam ɗum wa'anaa kam hano onon he ko'e mooɗon ngari to am.
46016018	Ɓe pukkini hakkillo am, ɓe pukkini hakkillooji mooɗon, onon duu. Ndenne paamee no teddinirton ir himɓe ɓee.
46016019	Kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa gonɗe nder leydi Asiya fuu no njewta on. Akilas, Piriskilla he hawriine goonɗinɓe warooɓe no kawra nder ɓaade maɓɓe fuu dow innde Joomiraawo, no njewta on sanne.
46016020	Banndiraaɓe tawaaɓe ɗo fuu no njewta on. Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu wunndoo banndum, yewta mo nder hidde mawne.
46016021	Miin Pol, miin he hoore am, winndani on cannooje ɗee he junngo am.
46016022	Neɗɗo fuu mo hiɗaa Joomiraawo, kuddi saama dow mum ! Maranata ! War ! Yaa Joomiraawo amin.
46016023	Moƴƴere Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen wonda he mooɗon !
46016024	Miɗo hiɗi on, on fuu, nder kawtal meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu.
47001001	Miin Pol, mo Alla suɓii waɗi lilaaɗo Iisa Almasiihu e banndii'en Timote, minen mbinndani on ɗerol ngool, onon hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa Almasiihu wonnde huɓeere Korintu. Miɗen njewta on, onon seniiɓe Korintu he leydi Akaya.
47001002	Alla Baaba meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen hokku on jam e moƴƴere.
47001003	Jettooje ngoodani Alla, Baaba Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Alla Baabiraawo jom yurmeene mawne, pewnoowo ɓerne nder torra fuu,
47001004	no fewna ɓerɗe meeɗen nder iri torra fuu, heɓa enen duu ngatten pewnol ɓerne makko ngool, pewnen ɓerɗe wonɓe nder iri torra kaa hennon fuu.
47001005	Hano no njarirɗen ir torraaji Almasiihu faa hanaa seɗɗa, hano non duu Almasiihu fewnirta ɓerɗe meeɗen faa hanaa seɗɗa.
47001006	Miɗen nder njarki torra, miɗen nder makki ngam ki laatoo huune fewnoore ɓerɗe mooɗon. Wooɗi duu, ki laatoo laawol kisinam mooɗon. Ɓerɗe amin no pewnee ngam minen duu, min pewna ɓerɗe mooɗon faa onon duu keɓon munyal, munyon iri torraaji ɗi minen he ko'e amin, min torraa.
47001007	Fakat miɗen anndi ko hano no ngonɗon oɗon njarira torra iri ka min njarunoo, hano non duu ɓerɗe mooɗon pewnirtee no ɓerɗe amin pewniraa.
47001008	Banndiraaɓe nde goonga, min ngiɗaa keppon anndude ir torra ka min njari nder leydi Asiya. Torra keewtiika min kaan no satti sanne faa min ittiino tammude fuu he mbuurnam.
47001009	Min nanii nder ɓerɗe amin, hano kiite maayde min taƴanaa. Min taƴanaaka duu kiite maayde fuu. Ɗum waɗi, ngam hollude to min njowu tammude amin dow tittinkinaaku amin, amma min njowa nde dow Alla ummintinoowo maayɓe.
47001010	Alla hisini min maayde bonde ndee, o tinnotoo duu omo hisina min. Dow makko duu min njowi tammude kisinol amin.
47001011	Onon duu mballiree min du'aa'u. Nde nii himɓe heewɓe du'anake min faa Alla jaabake du'aa'uuji maɓɓe, nii he banndum waɗata himɓe heewɓe njetta Alla daliila amin.
47001012	Ndaa ko watta miɗen piya gabaare woni ɓerɗe amin no ceedanoo min ko min mbuurdi goongaaku he laaɓal hakkune mooɗon, he hakkune himɓe fuu. Miɗo wi'a ko min ngaɗii ɗum nder goonga ƴuwɗo to Alla. Nder jonnde amin, min njooɗoraaki anndal amin, amma moƴƴere Alla, kam walli min.
47001013	Miɗen mbinndana on ko mbaawton njanngude e ko mbaawton faamude. No woodi goɗɗum ko paamuɗon seɗɗa nder mum. Amma miɗo miila ko on paamowan ɗum, ɗum fuu. Huune ndee woni ko on piirowan min gabaare hano no minen duu min piirirta on gabaare nyannde fuu Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen warti.
47001015	Mi tabbintini ko on piirowan min gabaare, waɗi miɗo hiɗi artirde on. Nde mi ummake to mooɗon, mi yaha Makedoniya. Nde nii mi soƴƴowake sey mi fanta on ngam hokkude on laawol heɓude bakaaji ɗiɗɗiɗi, he ngam heɓude ko wallata kam yahde leydi Yahudiya.
47001017	He giiɗe mooɗon, oɗon miila ko mi waɗi siri oo nder rafi anndude ko ngonmi miɗo waɗa naa ? Naa oɗon miila ko siri oo, ɓerɗe ɗiɗi ngaɗirmoomi, mi wi'a : « Ayyo », nden mi sakitoo mi wi'a : « Aa'a » hano no ɓiɓɓe aadama mboowri ?
47001018	Alla no seedi ko haala amin hanaa filla « Ayyo » naa « Aa'a ».
47001019	Ngam Iisa Almasiihu, Ɓii-Alla mo, miin Pol, Silas e Timote mbaajii dow mum oon, hanaa neɗɗo bi'oowo « Ayyo », nden sakito wi'a « Aa'a ». Iisa Almasiihu ko wi'i fuu kam laatii.
47001020	Har makko Alla humni alkawal mo waɗi fuu. Ngam majjum waɗi, eɗen mbi'a : « Aamiin » daliila makko, Alla teddinee.
47001021	Alla tabbintinta ko minen he mooɗon, en fuu eɗen nder kawtal Almasiihu. Kanko duu wartiri en feere ngam Iisa Almasiihu.
47001022	Alla waɗi alaama mum dow meeɗen, alaama kolloowo ko kam jeyii en. O watti Ruuhu makko nder ɓerɗe meeɗen ngam tabbintinande en ko o waɗoyta yeeso.
47001023	Alla woni seede am, nde nii mi feni. Nde goonga, mi hiɗaa fantude Korintu ngam mi hiɗaa bonnude ɓerɗe mooɗon.
47001024	Hanaa miɗen ngiɗi min kolla on laamu non nder goonɗinol mooɗon. Aa'a, miɗen anndi ko oɗon tittinkini nder goonɗinol mooɗon. Min ngiɗaana nii wallude on ngam weltaare mooɗon.
47002001	Ndenne, mi hiisake miin he hoore am ngi'umi ko to mi fantu on no ɓuri ngam to mi mettin ɓerɗe mooɗon kaden.
47002002	Nde nii mi mettinii ɓerɗe mooɗon, ndenne moy welnata ɓerne am ko ƴaari onon ɓe mettinmi ɓerɗe mum'en ?
47002003	Ko waɗi mbinndanmi on ɗerol ngool woni mi hiɗaa mi wara, dey woɓɓe nder mooɗon mettina ɓerne am, baa nii ko kamɓe kaani mbelna ɓerne am. Mi tabbintinii ko nde nii ɓerne am weli, too onon duu ɓerɗe mooɗon mbelan.
47002004	Mi winndaana ɗerol ngool nder ɓillaare, ɓerne mettune, faa he gonɗi. Mi winndanii on hanaa ngam wattude on nder mettal ɓerne, amma ngam paamon no hidde mooɗon foti nder ɓerne am.
47002005	Nde gooto mooɗon waɗi ko mettinii, hanaa miin Pol joomum waɗani ɗum amma on fuu o waɗani ɗum. Mi hiɗaa haalude sanne dow ko waɗi ɗum, ngam mi hiɗaa mawninde haala kaan.
47002006	Jukkol ngol heewɓe hakkune mooɗon njukki neɗɗo oo heƴi.
47002007	Ndenne joonin, ko ɓuri wodde woni njaafonoɗon mo, cemmbinɗinon ɓerne makko heɓa to mettorgal ɓerne heewu mo faa jaaloo mo.
47002008	Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo eela on ngam barke ko woni hakkune am he mooɗon, kollon mo ko oɗon ngiɗi mo.
47002009	Mi winndanii on ngam hi'ude nde nii oɗon njaɓa tokkude ko mbi'anmi on fuu.
47002010	Neɗɗo fuu mo njaafaniɗon, miin duu mi yaafanake joomum. Nde nii no woodi ko kaanumi yaafanaade joomum, too paamee ko Almasiihu no seedi, mi yaafake ngam mooɗon,
47002011	heɓa to Seyɗan heɓu laawol jammbaade en, eɗen anndi anniyaaji makko.
47002012	Wakkati ngarnoomi huɓeere Torowas ngam mi waajoo Habaru lobbo, filla Iisa Almasiihu, Joomiraawo omtani kam laawol gollude toon.
47002013	Amma ko mi tawaay banndam Titus, hakkillo am fukkaaki baa seɗɗa. Nden mbayniimi banndiraaɓe meeɗen goonɗinɓe wonɓe Torowas, ponndiimi Makedoniya.
47002014	Jettooje laatanoo Alla kokkoowo en jaalorgal wakkati fuu daliila kawtal meeɗen he Almasiihu. O waɗi en laawol wannginde moy woni Almasiihu nokku fuu hano no uurdi welni wannginirtaa nokku to wattaa.
47002015	Ngam nde nii en ndaari en nanndaana hano uurdi welni ndi Almasiihu wuli ngam teddinde Alla. Henndu uurdi ndii no sankitoo hakkune ɓe Alla hisini he ɓe o hisinaay.
47002016	To ɓe Alla hisinaay, min lumngol maayde, ittoowol yonki, amma to ɓe o hisini ɓeen kay, min uurngol mbuurnam gattowol yonki. Walaa baawɗo adude teddirka gollal ngaal.
47002017	Enen, eɗen ceedii he himɓe nawtortooɓe haala Alla ngam heɓude riiba. Amma ngam Alla lilii en, eɗen kaala goonga laaɓɗo he ɓerne worre yeeso makko nder kawtal meeɗen he Almasiihu.
47003001	Onon himɓe Korintu, oɗon miila ko ngam manude ko'e amin waɗi min mbinndani on ɗerol ngool ? Naa ngam tefude he mooɗon ɗerol tabbintinoowol ko min keɓi laawol warde to mooɗon waɗi min mbinndani on hano no woɓɓe tefirta ɗerol warde to mooɗon ?
47003002	Ir ɗereeji ɗii, woɓɓe kaajaa ɗi amma hanaa minen. Onon he ko'e mooɗon ngoni ɗerol amin ngool, ɗerol binndaangol nder ɓerɗe amin ngam neɗɗo fuu hi'a ngol, neɗɗo fuu duu jannga ngol.
47003003	Tabbat ɗerol ngol Almasiihu halfini min dow laabi golle amin winndiraaka dawa, amma Ruuhu Alla duumiiɗo ngol winndiraa. Ngol winndaaka dow alluuje kaaƴe, dow ɓerɗe mooɗon ngol winndaa.
47003004	Min kaali ɗum duu ngam miɗen ngoodi hoolaare Alla mawne har Almasiihu.
47003005	Miɗen anndi ko semmbe amin tan heƴataa faa min ngaɗa golle ɗe min kalfinaa. Amma Alla kam woni kokkoowo min semmbe keƴuɗo ngam waɗude ɗe.
47003006	Kanko waɗi min fotuɓe laataade gollanooɓe amaana keso oon. Amaana oo duu sinngaaki dow tilsinooje binndaaɗe, amma dow Ruuhu o sinngi. Tilsinooje binndaaɗe ɗee, kanƴe pooɗi neɗɗo yaari he maayde amma Ruuhu kay hokkataana mbuurnam.
47003007	Tawreeta winndaama dow alluuje kaaƴe. Wakkati Muusa hokketee ɗe, teddungal Alla wanngi, waɗi yeeso makko no ƴelkita faa ɓiɓɓe Isra'el mbaawaay daarude ngo. Baa ko nii waɗi, jeyngol ngool no jawtoowol. Nde nii ir tilsinooje pooɗuɗe neɗɗo yaari he maayde ɗee wardi ir teddungal ngaal,
47003008	too ndenne, noy teddungal gardoowal golle Ruuhu Alla wa'ata ?
47003009	Nde nii golle pooɗuɗe neɗɗo yaari he maayde heɓi teddungal, ndenne tabbat golle gaɗooje neɗɗo dartiiɗo yeeso Alla piidataake baa seɗɗa he majje.
47003010	Nde goonga, teddungal aranal ngaal walaa fuu darja gom nde nii ngal fonnaama he teddungal joonin ngaal.
47003011	Nde nii ko ɓooyataa ɗum heewi darja, too noy ko hoddotoo ɗum nee faa abada wa'ata ?
47003012	Ngam miɗen ngoodi iri gokka kaa waɗi miɗen kaalira cuusal faa noy walaa yeeso himɓe.
47003013	Minen, min kanaa Muusa, gattuɗo suddaare, suddi yeeso mum ngam to ɓiɓɓe Isra'el ngi'u no teddungal Alla gonnoongal dow yeeso mum yawtirta.
47003014	Ko'e maɓɓe ŋaɗi ngam faa warde hannden no woodi ko haɗata ɓe hi'ude goonga oon wakkati fuu mo ɓe njanngata amaana kiɗɗo oo. Suddaare ndee ittaaka dow yeesooji maɓɓe ginan. Almasiihu tan waawi itti nde.
47003015	Faa warde hannden, wakkati fuu mo ɓe njanngata Tawreeta, sey suddaare ndeen wara udda ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
47003016	Amma nde nii neɗɗo tuubii warti he Joomiraawo, Almasiihu ittan suddaare ndeen.
47003017	Wooɗi duu walaa ko senndi Joomiraawo he Ruuhu Alla. To Ruuhu Joomiraawo woni fuu, ɗon ndimaaku duu woni.
47003018	Enen ɓe yeesooji mum'en cuddaaka, darja Joomiraawo no hi'ee nder meeɗen. Omo waylita en faa nannden he makko. Darja makko no ɓeyda en yahde yeeso. Ɗum woni golle Joomiraawo, kanko duu woni Ruuhu oon.
47004001	Alla nder yurmeene mum hokki min golle ɗee, ngam majjum waɗi en kaana soƴƴoraade gaɗa.
47004002	Min calake wattude juuɗe amin nder semteene fuu hano cuccukka e munafikaaku'en. Min kiilataa neɗɗo fuu, min mbattititta haala Alla. Amma yaasin laaɓɗo min mbannginta goonga oon, heɓa neɗɗo fuu itta sikka nder ɓerne mum, anndita ko min goongaaɓe yeeso Alla.
47004003	Nde nii tawaama ko Habaru lobbo mo min mbaajooto oo no suuɗi, too wonɓe dow laawol halkere ngoni ɓe o suuɗanaa.
47004004	Wonɓe dow laawol halkere ɓee ngoni ɓe ngalaa goonɗinol ngam Ibiliisa laamiiɗo bonɗo, laamiiɗo duuniyaaru wumni ɓerɗe maɓɓe heɓa to ɓe ngi'u jeyngol Habaru lobbo kolloowo teddungal Almasiihu, nanndi Alla.
47004005	Ngam nder waaju mo min ngatta oo, hanaa filla ko'e amin min mbaajotoo amma haala Iisa Almasiihu, Joomiraawo meeɗen kam min mbaajotoo. Ko min mbi'ata dow ko'e amin tan, woni min maccuɓe mooɗon daliila makko.
47004006	Ngam Alla, bi'uɗo jeyngol yayna nimre, kanko waɗata jeyngol mum yayna ɓerɗe meeɗen, ngam annden darja makko jaynoowo, gonɗo dow yeeso Almasiihu.
47004007	Minen ɓe darja oo tawa dow mum'en, min potaa fuy, minen he keeɗe loope fuu go'o. Amma Alla watti teddungal ngaal nder ɓerɗe amin heɓa himɓe annda ko baawɗe mawɗe ɗe to mum ƴuwi, hanaa to amin.
47004008	Himɓe torri min ir torra fuu, amma fuu waɗaay min cawta golle ɗeen. Wakkatiiji gom miɗen nder wemmbere, amma min ittaay gokka.
47004009	Min ɓillaama faa noy walaa, amma min mboppaay ka. Miɗen adee, miɗen liɓee faa miilee ko ɗum hanti he amin, amma sey hi'ee min puɗɗiti.
47004010	Wakkati fuu miɗen dow laawol wareede hano no Iisa warira. Amma faa hannden miɗen poofa ngam mbuurnam Iisa hi'ee he amin.
47004011	Balɗe foti fuu ɗe min ngaɗi nder duuniyaaru nduu, dow maayde min ngoni ngam min tokkuɓe Iisa. Tabbat min tampi, semmbe amin ɓuytake, amma miɗen poofa ngam mbuurnam Iisa hi'ee he amin.
47004012	Ngam majjum waɗi miɗen pooɗano yahde har maayde ngam onon duu keɓon mbuurnam.
47004013	No winndaa nder dewtere wi'aa : Mi goonɗini, waɗi mbaajiimi. Minen duu min ngoonɗini, waɗi miɗen mbaajoo.
47004014	Miɗen anndi duu ko Alla ummintinɗo Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen e maayde, umminta en he maayde hano no o ummintirnoo Iisa. Ngam eɗen kawti he Iisa, o wadda en o darna yeeso makko.
47004015	Ko hewtii min fuu daliila mooɗon waɗi ɗum hewtii min. Ɗum heewtake min duu ngam moƴƴere Alla yottoo himɓe heewɓe. Ɓe njetta mo, ɓe ɓeyda teddinde mo.
47004016	Ɓeydude teddinde Alla kam waɗi min ittataa tammude amin he makko. Baa nii nde tampiri amin no ɓeydoto non, min coƴƴortaako gaɗa ngam nyannde fuu Alla no heyɗintinaa semmbe ɓerɗe amin.
47004017	Torra ka min torretee ka ɓooyataa. Ka waɗan duu min keɓa teddungal manngal, ɓurngal huune fuu, teddungal ngaal timmataa abada.
47004018	Ngam majjum waɗi hakkillo amin walaa dow ko hitere hi'ata, sey nii ko nde waawa hi'ude ko hoddoto faa abada.
47005001	Eɗen anndi ko yonki meeɗen ɗo nder duuniyaaru walaana nder ɓanndu ndu mbaawɗen tinndinirde hukumuuru. Hukumuuru nduu duumataako ngam no waɗi fuu nyannde gom ndu sankitittee. Hano non duu nyannde gom ɓanndu meeɗen sankitittee, ndenne ndu duumataako. Amma Alla moƴƴinanii en dow kammu suudu ndu junngo fuu waɗaay, suudu duumotoonu faa abada.
47005002	Joonin eɗen otta dow e ley, en kaaɓi en keɓaay ɓanndu meeɗen heyru, huurooru en hano kaddungal kesal.
47005003	Nde nii en ɓornake ndu, en ngartataana hano yonki ki walaa ɓanndu.
47005004	Eɗen otta dow e ley sabbu tampiri ndi ɓanndu meeɗen yarata nder mbuurnam meeɗen. Eɗen otta hanaa ngam eɗen ngiɗi seedude he mayru amma ngam eɗen ngiɗi ɓorneeɗen ɓanndu heyru, tinndiniraanu suudu wonndu dow, ngam huune woodune yonki non faa abada, gaba go'o ɗum naata nokku ko maayata.
47005005	Alla he hoore mum siryanii en ɗum, ngam majjum waɗi o hokki Ruuhu makko laatanoo en alaama tabbintinoowo moƴƴere waroore fuu.
47005006	Keɓol moƴƴere ndee waɗi miɗen ngoodi wakkati fuu tittinkinaaku nder ɓerɗe amin. Miɗen anndi ko nde nii miɗen nder ɓalli ɗii, miɗen mboɗɗi Joomiraawo.
47005007	Dow hoolaare Alla min ndeki mbuurnam amin hanaa dow ko hitere hollirta.
47005008	Tabbat miɗen ngoodi tittinkinaaku nder ɓerɗe amin, miɗen ngiɗi duu seedude he ɓanndu nduu ngam jooɗowaade to Joomiraawo.
47005009	Amma ko min ɓuri hiɗude fuu, woni waɗude ko welata mo. Nde miɗen nder ɓanndu nduun naa nde min mburtake ndu fuu no go'o.
47005010	No tilsi neɗɗo meeɗen fuu yaha, darowo yeeso Almasiihu, o waɗa kiite joomum. Neɗɗo fuu heɓa baraaje gollal mum ngal waɗunoo wakkati yonki mum wonnoo he ɓanndu mum. Nde joomum waɗi ko wooɗi naa ko wooɗaa.
47005011	Anndude ko Almasiihu no hiitoto en walanaa neɗɗo meeɗen fuu nder nimre, ngam majjum waɗi miɗen teddina Joomiraawo. Miɗen tittinkinoo keddi baawɗe amin ngam fooɗude hakkillo himɓe, ɓe paama ko haala amin kaa no goonga. Alla no anndi min ɓurde neɗɗo fuu. Miɗo miiloo ko onon he ko'e mooɗon duu, nder ɓerɗe mooɗon oɗon anndi kam.
47005012	Min ngalaa miɗen cifo ko'e amin yeeso mooɗon amma min ngiɗaana hollude on laawol ngol mbaawɗon fiyirde min gabaare faa keɓon no njaabortoɗon tefooɓe jancude min, dekuɓe hoolaare mum'en dow ko hitere hi'ata amma hanaa dow ko woni nder ɓerne.
47005013	Nde nii himɓe ndaarii min haaŋaaɓe, too ngam teddinde Alla waɗi iɓe ndaara min non'en. Amma min kanaa haaŋaaɓe, ko ngi'uɗon min ngaɗi fuu, ngam nafude on waɗi min ngaɗi ɗum.
47005014	Ko min ngaɗi fuu min ngaɗaay ɗum ngam riiba amin, amma ngam hidde Almasiihu wonnde no ɗowa min, waɗi min ngaɗi ɗum. Min tabbintini ko gooto maayi ngam himɓe fuu, ndenne goonɗinɓe mo fuu tokki mo maaydi he makko.
47005015	Almasiihu maayi ngam himɓe fuu, heɓa to wuurɓe fuu mbuura mbuurnam ko'e mum'en, amma mbuura mbuurnam mbelanɗam mo kanko maayɗo ngam maɓɓe, ummitii.
47005016	Ndenne, illa joonin, walaa fuu mo min adata hano no ɓii-aadama gom adirta banndum. Baa nde nii min adiino Almasiihu no ɓiɓɓe aadama adiri mo, hannden min acci adude mo hano no min adirnoo mo.
47005017	Ngam majjum waɗi neɗɗo fuu hawti nder mbuurnam mum he Almasiihu, tagitaama tagol kesol. Ko hiiɗɗi fuu ko tawa he mum, filla majjum duu walaa kaden. Joomum laatake tagaaɗo keso.
47005018	Ɗum fuu to Alla ɗum ƴuwi. Kanko lili Almasiihu wara, watta potal hakkune mum he himɓe. O halfini min golle wartirde potal hakkune himɓe he makko.
47005019	Maana lilol amin kam woni ko Alla har daliila Almasiihu no tefa wartirde potal hakkune mum he himɓe. O nanngirtaa ɓe hakkeeji maɓɓe ɗi ɓe ngaɗunoo. O halfini min golle yottinde habaru potal ngaal to himɓe.
47005020	Ngam majjum waɗi minen, min warɓe haalude dow innde Almasiihu non. Har amin Alla woni no nodda himɓe ngara to mum. Min piiri on innde Almasiihu narree he Alla.
47005021	Almasiihu waɗaay hakke abada, amma daliila meeɗen waɗi Alla deki hakke dow makko. Har makko duu keɓirten dartinaaku yeeso Alla.
47006001	Minen, min gollanooɓe Alla non, ngam majjum waɗi miɗen eela on to mboppee moƴƴere Alla nde keɓuɗon ndee laatanoo on meere.
47006002	Kettinee ko Alla wi'i nii : Ko wakkati kaanuɗo oon waɗi, mi nani du'aa'u maaɗa. Ko nyalaane kisinam maaɗa waɗi, mi wari mi hisinii ma. Banndiraaɓe am, joonin woni wakkati kaanuɗo, wakkati moƴƴere Alla. Joonin woni nyalaane kisinam.
47006003	Min ngiɗaa wattude fergere fuu dow laawol goɗɗo heɓa to neɗɗo fuu njancu golle amin.
47006004	Amma nder ko min ngatta fuu, miɗen kolla ko min gollanooɓe Alla goonga e goonga. Miɗen kolla ɗum duu nder tittinkinaaku manngu. Miɗen munya torraaji, saɗɗornam, iri ɓillaare nde hennon fuu.
47006005	Min piyaama, min uddaama. Himɓe kawri, kabdi he amin, min nawnaama, min tampinaama, min ndafaama, min ɗomɗaama faa noy walaa, min kaɗaama ɗoyngol.
47006006	Har dartinaaku amin, har anndal amin har munyal e neɗɗaaku amin, nder moƴƴuki amin miɗen kolla ko min gollanooɓe Alla goonga e goonga non. Nder kawtal amin he Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, miɗen ngoodi hidde nde waldaa fuu munafikaaku gom.
47006007	Miɗen kaala goonga, miɗen ngoodi baawɗe ƴuwanɗe min to Alla. Nano e nyaamo amin fuu no tiigi kaɓirɗe dartinaaku.
47006008	Miɗen teddinee, miɗen njennee, miɗen njettee, miɗen kuɗee. Miɗen ndaaree majjinooɓe himɓe tawi min goongaaɓe.
47006009	Min adaama hano min anndaaka tawi duu min anndaaɓe sanne. Min adaama maaynooɓe tawi duu miɗen poofa. Min piyaama amma min maayaay.
47006010	Iɓe mettina ɓerɗe amin amma nyannde fuu miɗen nder weltaare. Miɗen ndaaree min talkaaɓe amma tawi miɗen ngaɗa himɓe heewɓe ndiikiɗaa. Miɗen ndaaree min ngalaa fuy tawi duu walaa fuu ko ŋakkani min.
47006011	Banndiraaɓe am, ɓiɓɓe Korintu, walaa fuu ko min cuuɗi on, min kolli miɗen korsini on.
47006012	Hanaa minen calii on amma onon he ko'e mooɗon calii min.
47006013	Miɗo haalda he mooɗon hano no baaba haaldata he ɓiɓɓe mum, miɗo wi'a on : Onon duu kollee ko oɗon ngiɗi min.
47006014	To tokkodiree he ɓe ngoonɗinaay, ngatton juuɗe nder golle maɓɓe. Lobbo no waawi jooɗodaade he bonɗo naa ? Naa ɗume hawti jeyngol he nimre ?
47006015	Naa Almasiihu higo Ibiliisa non ? Naa ɗume jomi goonɗinɗo he mo goonɗinaay ?
47006016	Naa mbi'en ɗume hawti hukumuuru Alla he tooruure ? Paamee, ko enen en hukumuuru Alla duumiiɗo, ngam Alla wi'i : Mi joddoto he maɓɓe, mi wuurda he maɓɓe, mi laatoo Alla maɓɓe, kamɓe duu, ɓe laatoo himɓe am.
47006017	Ndenne ƴuwee hakkune maɓɓe ! Ceedee he maɓɓe ! To on meemu ko tunni ! Nii watta ko mi jaɓɓoo on.
47006018	Mi laatoo Baabii'on, onon duu, laatoɗon ɓiɓɓe am. Non Joomiraawo Jom baawɗe wi'i.
47007001	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, podooje ɗee fuu ngaɗaama ngam mooɗon. Accee ndartinoɗen, tottitoɗen ko tutotoo ɓanndu he yonki meeɗen ngaɗa hakke. En tittinkinoo heɓa tabbintinen senaaku meeɗen, kulen Alla, tokken ko o wi'i en.
47007002	Kollee min hidde ! Min ngaɗanaay neɗɗo fuu gacce, min pergaay neɗɗo fuu, min ƴoynaay neɗɗo fuu min nyaami njawdi mum.
47007003	Mi haalanaay on haala kaa ngam dekande on gacce. Mi wi'iino on ko nder mbuurnam amin naa gaɗa maayde amin, walaa ko waawi ittude hidde mooɗon nder ɓerɗe amin baa seɗɗa.
47007004	Miɗo hooli on faa noy walaa. Min njari iri kaata fuu amma ɗum helaay ɓerne am baa seɗɗa. On cemmbinɗini kam faa noy walaa, welwelo mooɗon heewii kam.
47007005	Baa nii wakkati min njottinoo leydi Makedoniya, min powtaay baa seɗɗa. To min mbonƴitori fuu, torra no darii hakkune amin. Rafi potal naati hakkune amin he himɓe toon. Kulkulal kam duu wari heewni ɓerɗe amin.
47007006	Amma Alla cemmbinɗinoowo ɓerne, ittuɗo kulkulal fuu nder ɓerɗe amin, semmbinɗini min nder garki Titus.
47007007	Hanaa garki makko tan semmbinɗini ɓerɗe amin. Ko ngaɗɗon ɗum faa ɓerne makko semmbiɗi, kanƴum semmbinɗini ɓerɗe amin. O haalani kam fuu no kaaɓirɗon hi'ude kam. O haalani kam duu no ko waɗunoo ɗum suuliri on. O fillanake kam no tittinkiniriɗon, oɗon paasanoo kam. Ɗum fuu ɓeydi welwelo am.
47007008	Nde ɗerol am ngool metti ɓerɗe mooɗon, mi nimsitataa ko mbinndumi ɗum. Goonga non mi hi'i ko mbinndumi nder maggol ɗum metti ɓerɗe mooɗon, baa nii mettorgal mooɗon ngaal ɓooyaay sanne. Mettinol ɓerɗe mooɗon ko ngaɗumi ɗum, mi nanaay belɗum majjum baa seɗɗa.
47007009	Amma joonin ɓerne am no nder welwelo. Mettinol ɓerɗe mooɗon ngol waɗi tuubuɗon, mbayluɗon jikku. Mettal ɓerne mooɗon ngaal weli Alla sanne, ndenne walaa ko min mbonnani on.
47007010	Iri mettorgal ɓerne belgal Alla ngaal no watta neɗɗo tuuba, hisinee. Neɗɗo nimsitittaa ko waɗi mettorgal ngaal faa abada. Amma mettorgal ngal waylataa ɓerne neɗɗo tuuba, iri mettorgal ngaal waddataana maayde he neɗɗo.
47007011	Mettorgal ɓerne mooɗon ngaal welii Alla, ndaaree ko ngal rimani on. Ngal waɗii nder welwelo kaargiɗon gollude he hollude ko on mboofii. Ngal waɗi tikkuɗon, kulɗon. Mettorgal ngaal waɗi tittinkiniɗon he ɓerne worre. Ngal waɗi oɗon ciryii, ngi'on nde nii eltol ngool waɗiraama he dartinaaku naa noy ? Nder huune fuu on kolli ko oɗon laaɓi.
47007012	Ndenne, mi winndanaay on ngam toonyiiɗo on oo, suuli kam. Mi winndanaay on duu ngam toonyaaɗo oon. Amma mi winndanii on ngam hollude on dalla-dalla ko Alla no anndi ko oɗon njaakani min sanne.
47007013	Ɗum woni daliila pukkaaki ɓerɗe amin. Wooɗi, gaɗa pukkaaki ɓerɗe amin kii, garki Titus duu welni ɓerɗe amin sanne. Ngam tabbat on fuu on cemmbinɗinii mo.
47007014	Ngam baa nii mi haali yeeso makko ko miɗo fiira on gabaare, mi semtaay. Hano ko min cuusi haalande on fuu no goonga, hano non duu piiɗe gabaare amin dow mooɗon yeeso makko ɗum no goonga.
47007015	Hidde ɓerne nde o woodani on ndee no ɓeydoo sanne wakkati fuu mo o miccitii no tokkirɗon haala makko, teddinɗon mo, njaɓɓoriɗon mo.
47007016	Miɗo nana belɗum sanne joonin ngam mi hoolake on faa hanaa seɗɗa.
47008001	Banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe, miɗen ngiɗi anndon moƴƴere nde Alla waɗi hakkune kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa gonɗe Makedoniya.
47008002	Ɓe ngi'ii iri torra cattuka fuu, amma ɗum fuu ittaay welwelo ɓerne hakkune maɓɓe. Iɓe nder rafi amma ɗum fuu haɗaay ɓe wattude ɗuuɗal njawdi maɓɓe ngam wallude goonɗinɓe.
47008003	Ɓe ngaɗi keddi baawɗe maɓɓe faa ɓe ngaɗi baawɗe goɗɗo, ɗum fuu miɗo seedanoo ɓe dow majjum. Ɓerne worre ɓe ngaɗiri ɗum ngam ɓe ƴamaaka ko ɓe ngaɗi ɗum.
47008004	Ɓe eeli min, ɓe eeliti min, laawol ngam ɓe ngatta junngo nder ballal goonɗinɓe wonɓe Ursaliima.
47008005	Ɓe ngaɗi ko min ndesanaay ɓe, ɓe kokki ko'e maɓɓe Joomiraawo. Ɓe kokkii min ko'e maɓɓe duu hano no Alla hiɗiri.
47008006	Wakkati min ngi'unoo huune ndee, sey min eeli Titus wara to mooɗon ngam onon duu ngatton junngo nder kokkal ngaal hano no puɗɗirnooɗon ɗum.
47008007	On marɓe huune fuu, on goonɗinɓe, on baajotooɓe welɓe ɗemngal, oɗon mari anndal har ko daarata laawol Alla, oɗon njogiri huune fuu juuɗe ɗiɗɗiɗi, oɗon korsini min duu. Ndenne, miɗen pooɗa hakkillo mooɗon ngam tittinkinoɗon faa wooɗa nder wattude juuɗe mooɗon nder filla moƴƴere ndee.
47008008	Ko mbi'u mi on ɗum, hanaa ngam tilsinde on non. Mi fillanake on kokkee mawɗe ɗe kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe gom ngaɗi, ngam onon duu keɓon laawol hollude hidde nde ngoodanɗon woɓɓe ndee no goonga.
47008009	Fotaay kaalaneɗon, oɗon anndi hidde nde Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen waɗi. O diikuɗo amma o waɗi hoore makko talka, ngam wadde on riikuɓe.
47008010	Nder ko kaalumi ɗum fuu mi walaana miɗo yottina he mooɗon ko woni miilo am, wooɗi duu ko nafata on. Rawanin onon ngoni artuɓe mballi goonɗinɓe Iisa wonɓe Ursaliima. Onon duu ngoni artuɓe keɓi miilo ngoo.
47008011	Ndenne to coƴƴoree gaɗa. No puɗɗirnoɗon he ɓerne worre, kumniree baraaje mooɗon he ɓerne worre. Kokkee ko mbaawɗon hokkude.
47008012	Ngam nde nii neɗɗo hokkiri ɓerne worre, kokkal mum ngaal welan Alla ngam Alla ƴamataa neɗɗo ko walaa.
47008013	Mi wi'aay naaton nder ɓillaare fuu ngam mballon woɓɓe. Amma ko ngiɗumi woni himɓe fuu pota to ɓe ɓurdinodiree.
47008014	Joonin ko heewani on faa no rufa ɗum, ko woni no rufa ɗum kanƴum kawroton ngam wallude wonɓe nder ɓillaare. Yahde yeeso tawte kamɓe duu ɓe mballan on nde nii tawi onon duu oɗon nder ɓillaare. Hano nii woni no himɓe potirta neɗɗo fuu ɓurdataa banndum baa horde.
47008015	No winndaa wi'aa : Nokkuɗo faa ƴartini, ko ƴartini ɗum nafaay. Nokkuɗo seɗɗa on duu seɗɗa mum nafi.
47008016	Yettoore tabbitana Alla gaɗɗo Titus adi anniya walloyde on hano no minen he ko'e amin ngiɗirnoo walloyde on.
47008017	O walaa omo wara to mooɗon ngam min eeli mo tan, amma kanko he hoore makko jaɓi he ɓerne worre warde to mooɗon ngam wallude on.
47008018	Min ngatti goɗɗo gaɗa makko. Kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe fuu no njetta mo ngam golle sankitidde Habaru lobbo.
47008019	Kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe cuɓi mo ngatti nder jahaangal amin ngaal ngam wattude junngo nder ballal ngal goonɗinɓe Almasiihu wonɓe Ursaliima haani waddaneede. Ballal ngaal woni golle ɗe ngatten ngam teddinde Joomiraawo he ngam hollude ko miɗen ngiɗi waɗude ɗum.
47008020	Min kalfinaama njawdi ɗuundi, ndenne miɗen kula to himɓe mbi'u ko min nyaami njawdi ndi nder golle amin.
47008021	Muuyo amin woni waɗude ko ɓuri wooɗude yeeso himɓe fuu hanaa yeeso Alla tan.
47008022	Nder warooɓe to mooɗon no tawa banndiraawo meeɗen gom, mo min etii min ndaari wakkatiiji keewɗi e nder kujje keewɗe tittinkinaaku mum nder hidde waddude balla hoore mum. Joonin omo hiɗi waddude balla makko faa hanaa seɗɗa, omo hooli on faa noy walaa.
47008023	Miccitee ko Titus gollidoowo he am non, miɗen ngollida duu ngam sabbu mooɗon. Banndiraaɓe meeɗen wonduɓe he makko ɓeen duu, ngoni lilaaɓe ɓe kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe ngaɗi. Ko ɓe ngaɗi toon fuu ngam teddungal Almasiihu waɗi ɓe ngaɗi ɗum.
47008024	Ndenne joonin, ko ngiɗumi he mooɗon woni kollon ɓe hidde mooɗon faa noy walaa. Nde nii on ngaɗiri nii, kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe ɗeen no tabbintinan ko sikka fuu walaa nde min piiri on gabaare dow goonga amin.
47009001	Wallude goonɗinɓe tawaaɓe Ursaliima fotaay mi winnda mi haalana on,
47009002	ngam miɗo anndi anniya mooɗon. Yeeso himɓe Makedoniya fuu, mbi'umi : « Illa rawanin goonɗinɓe wonɓe Akaya ciryii hokkude balla mum'en. » Tittinkinaaku mooɗon waɗi kamɓe duu ɓe ummii ɓe ndarii.
47009003	Joonin mi lilowan banndiraaɓe ɓee he mooɗon ngam to piyol gabaare amin nde laatoo meere. Miɗo hiɗi taweɗon siryiiɓe hano no mbi'irnoomi ɗum nii,
47009004	heɓa nde nii mi wardi he goonɗinɓe wonɓe Makedoniya to mooɗon tawa on ciryake. Ko min piyirta gabaare dow mooɗon, ɗum duu tawee he mooɗon. Ngam nde hanaa non semteene amin non, semteene mooɗon non onon duu.
47009005	Ngam majjum waɗi mbi'umi no tilsi banndiraaɓe meeɗen ɓee ardo, ngara to mooɗon, ɓe kawra ballal ngal mbi'unooɗon on kokkan ngaal heɓa wakkati ngarmi fuu mi tawa ingal hawri, ngal laatoo balla ngaɗiraaka ɓerne laaɓune, hanaa ɓerne tilsinaade.
47009006	Paamee ko aawɗo seɗɗa, seɗɗa hettata. Aawɗo ko ɗuuɗi, ko ɗuuɗi joomum hettata.
47009007	Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu fiirta ɓerne mum hokka ko anniyii hokkude tawa tilsinaaka, ɓerne mum duu mettaay, ngam Alla no hiɗi kokkiroowo welwelo.
47009008	Alla no waawi hokkude on iri moƴƴere fuu. Wakkati fuu keɓon nder huune fuu ko heƴata on faa hoddoo, ngam waɗirde ko hoddoto ɗum golle lobbe.
47009009	Kokkal ɓuytataa keɓal, hano no ɗum winndiraa dow kokkuɗo wi'a : Omo sankita moƴƴere makko dow talkaaɓe, moƴƴuki makko duumoto faa abada.
47009010	Alla woni kokkoowo demoowo aawdiiri, kanko duu hokkata mo nyaamdu ndu o nyaamata. O hokkan on aawdiiri keƴandi on, onon duu. O funnan aawdiiri ndiin. Ndenne moƴƴuki mooɗon riman faa heewa.
47009011	Alla ɓeydan keɓal mooɗon nder huune fuu, heɓa mbaawon hokkitirde wakkati fuu. Neɗɗo fuu mo min kokki goɗɗum yettan Alla ngam ko mballirɗon ɗum.
47009012	Ko ngatton ɗum hanaa ngam humtude haaju goonɗinɓe ɓeen tan non amma on ngaɗan ɗum ngam waddude himɓe heewɓe njetta Alla.
47009013	Golle ɗe ngatton ɗe kolli ko on hoolniiɓe goonga e goonga. Himɓe heewɓe nde nii ndaarii balla mooɗon kaa, teddinan Alla ngam on ngaɗi ko Habaru lobbo mo Almasiihu wi'i, Habaru mo njaɓuɗon yeeso himɓe fuu. Ɓe njettan Alla duu ngam on njaɓan senndude ko njogiɗon hakkune mooɗon e maɓɓe naa hakkune mooɗon e woɓɓe.
47009014	Ɓe kollan on hidde, ɓe ndu'anto on ngam moƴƴere mawne nde Alla waɗani ɓe har laawol mooɗon.
47009015	Jettooje ngoodani Alla ngam moƴƴere nde o hokki en ndee, hunnduko fuu waawaa tinndini nde !
47010001	Miin Pol he hoore am, miin bi'eteeɗo kuyfuɗo hoore wakkati tawaami hakkune mooɗon e tiɗɗo nyiire wakkati mi tawaaka hakkune mooɗon woni no eela on. Nder peewka ɓerne Almasiihu e moƴƴuki mum,
47010002	mi eelii on to ngaɗee mi tilsina on wakkati fuu ngaroymi to mooɗon. Ngam miɗo waawi tilsinde wi'ooɓe ko min ngoni miɗen ngaɗa ɗum, min ngaɗatanaa ɗum na ngam welnude ɓerɗe himɓe.
47010003	Baa nii ko miɗen nder duuniyaaru, no min ndurwirta nder mayru no seedi he no himɓe ndurwirta nder mayru.
47010004	Kaɓorɗe amin hanaa ir kaɓorɗe ɗe ɓii-aadama haɓirta non. Semmbe majje to Alla ƴuwi, min naforto ɗe ngam sikkitidde kaɓorɗe gonɗe no ndeena wayɓe amin.
47010005	Miɗen cankita miilo fuu kaɗoowo himɓe annda Alla. Miɗen tilsina himɓe nder miilooji mum'en ɗowtanoo Almasiihu.
47010006	Nde nii on njaɓi ko min mbi'i, ndenne paamee ko miɗen ciryii ngam eltude neɗɗo mooɗon fuu banyuɗo waɗude ko Almasiihu wi'i.
47010007	Ndaaree, ngi'ee kujje ɗeen nii no daɗɗi ley gite mooɗon ! Nde goɗɗo mooɗon wi'i kam Almasiihu jeyii ɗum, nde nii joomum soƴƴake daari hoore mum, too joomum faaman ko minen he ko'e amin duu Almasiihu jeyii min.
47010008	Joomiraawo meeɗen hokki min ardaŋal ngam min cemmbinɗina goonɗinol mooɗon amma hanaa ngam min cankita ngol. Ardaŋal ngaal no weli kam sanne faa no ƴartini, ngal semtinaaki kam.
47010009	Mi hiɗaa miiloɗon ko mi winndaana ɗerol ngool ngam tefude hulƴinde on.
47010010	Ngam hakkune mooɗon won wi'ooɓe wakkati fuu mo Pol winndata haalaaji cattuɗi, ɗi koyaa tan o winndata. Amma wakkati fuu o tawa hakkune meeɗen o mojiiɗo, haalaaji makko no yawni sanne.
47010011	Too, bi'oowo iri haala kaa fuu, faama ko min mbinndanta on ɗum wakkati min mboɗɗi on, kanƴum min ngollata wakkati min ngondi he mooɗon.
47010012	Min cuusaa fonnude ko'e amin he mawnitiiɓe. Min nanndaa he maɓɓe duu. To maɓɓe walaa ko foti ɓe, ngam nder maɓɓe lewru ƴeewetee. Ɓe ngalaa hakkillo.
47010013	Minen kay, min ƴartintaa baa seɗɗa, dow diidol ngol Alla darni min dow mum min kaaɗata. Onon duu nder maggol ngonɗon.
47010014	Ndenne nde nii min ngari to mooɗon, min ƴaaraaki diidol ngol Alla darni min dow mum ngool, ngam nde nii min ngaraayno to mooɗon min ngaddi Habaru lobbo nden min ƴaarakeno ngool.
47010015	Min ƴaartintaa nder piyol gabaaje amin, min piyira golle woɓɓe gabaaje. Amma tammude amin woni goonɗinol mooɗon ɓeydoo yahde yeeso, heɓa golle amin ɗuuɗa hakkune mooɗon, tawee min ƴaaraaki to Alla darni min.
47010016	Nde goonɗinol mooɗon ɓeydake yahde yeeso, min keɓan laawol warde waajaade Habaru lobbo oo nder nokkuuje ɓurɗe woɗɗude. Min ngiɗaa min ngara, min ngaɗa golle ɗe Alla hokki goɗɗo waɗa, heɓa min piya gabaare min mbi'a minen ngaɗi ɗe hano no woɓɓe ngaɗirta.
47010017	No winndaa wi'aa : Piyoowo gabaare fuu, fiya gabaare dow Joomiraawo.
47010018	Ngam hanaa piiroowo hoore muuɗum gabaare woni jaabanaaɗo, amma jaabanaaɗo woni mo Joomiraawo nani belɗum mum.
47011001	Joonin sey accanon kam hakke seɗɗa ngam ko ngiɗumi haalude ɗum no kaanɗi, amma sey nii munyon kam.
47011002	Miɗo hira ngam mooɗon hano no Alla hirirta. Mi waɗi alkawal mi wattan gonndal hakkune mooɗon he gorko gom. Gorko oo woni Almasiihu. Miɗo hiɗi mi yaara on to makko. Miɗo hiɗi duu njooɗoɗon hano jonnde surbaajo mo anndaa gorko.
47011003	Amma miɗo hula to on laatoo hano Haawa mo mboddi eytunoo, ƴoyneɗon, accon tokkude laawol Almasiihu he ɓerne worre.
47011004	Miɗo hula ngam min mbaajake on Habaru lobbo, filla dow Iisa Almasiihu, keɓuɗon Ruuhu Alla, njaɓuɗon waaju amin. Amma on acci woɓɓe mbaajake on dow Iisa fereejo gom, keɓuɗon ruuhu fereejo gom. Njaɓuɗon waaju mo he waaju amin hawtaa baa isilam.
47011005	Amma miɗo miila ko wi'ooɓe kam'en no lilaaɓe mawɓe ngalaa fuu ko ɓurdi kam baa seɗɗa.
47011006	No waawi tawee mi hanaa belɗo ɗemngal, amma miɗo anndi ko mbi'anmi. Mi holli on ɗum nder laabi keewɗi.
47011007	Wakkati mbaajimi on dow Habaru lobbo, filla dow Alla, mi leesini hoore am ngam teddinde on. Mi waajake on mi ƴamaay on goɗɗum. Naa mi woofii ngam mi waɗi ɗum ?
47011008	Mi jaɓi ceede e balla kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa gom, mi wari mi walli on.
47011009	Wakkati ngonnoomi to mooɗon, hakiika mi waɗiino haaju ceede amma mi wi'aay neɗɗo mooɗon fuu hokka kam tammal, ngam banndiraaɓe meeɗen goonɗinɓe ƴuwɓe Makedoniya ngaddanii kam huune fuu ko ngiɗumi. Mi tiiɗi sanne he hoore am ngam to mi laatanoo on donngal, no ngaɗan mi fuu, mi durwan to mi laatanoo on ɗum.
47011010	Miɗo itta hoomaare duu ko mi jaɓaay buuɗu gooto mooɗon. Walaa baawɗo haɗi kam ittude hoomaare duu nder Akaya. Daliila barke Almasiihu gonɗo he am, miɗo waawi wi'i, ko mbi'umi ɗum no goonga.
47011011	Oɗon miila ko mbi'umi ɗum, ngam mi hiɗaa on waɗi mbi'umi ɗum naa ? Too, Alla no anndi miɗo hiɗi on !
47011012	Ko ngaɗumi ɗum, mi waɗan ɗum ngam haɗude fiyooɓe gabaaje mum'en no mbi'a ko kam'en no lilaaɓe hano amin keɓu laawol wi'ude ko kam'en ngaɗi gollal potungal, gollal ngal min ngaɗi.
47011013	Iri himɓe ɓee no lilaaɓe fewreeɓe, ɓe gollooɓe jammbotooɓe, ɓe ɓorniiɓe toggoore lilaaɓe Almasiihu tan.
47011014	Ɗum haayɗinaaki baa, ngam Ibiliisa he hoore mum no ɓornoo ir toggoore maleykaajo jom annuura, waɗa hoore mum hano makko.
47011015	Ndenne ɗum haayɗinaaki nde nii gollooɓe Ibiliisa ɓornake toggoore gollanooɓe dartinaaku. Amma kiite maɓɓe fotan he golle maɓɓe.
47011016	Kettinee, to baa gooto mooɗon miiloo ko mi kaaŋaaɗo. Amma nde nii on adi kam mi kaaŋaaɗo sey njaaboɗon kam no njaabirtoɗon kaaŋaaɗo ngam mi heɓa no mi fiirta gabaare seɗɗa, miin duu.
47011017	Ko mbi'anmi ɗum mi wi'irtaa ɗum no Joomiraawo holliri kam ɗum amma mi wi'an ɗum hano no kaanɗi am holliri kam ɗum.
47011018	Mi hi'i himɓe heewɓe no piya gabaaje ngam kujje ɗe ɓe ngaɗi nder duuniyaaru, miin duu, miɗo waawi fiyude gabaare am.
47011019	Onon jom'en hikmaaku, noy watta ko oɗon njaɓa ir kaanɗi ɗii ?
47011020	Oɗon njawee, oɗon peenyee, oɗon ƴoynee, njawdi mooɗon no nyaamee, oɗon ngartiree maccuɓe, amma ɗum fuu oɗon munyi.
47011021	Minen, hanaa ɗum woni ko min ngaɗani on. Minen, min cuusaay hollude on baawɗe. Miɗen nana semteene haalude ɗum. Nde nii goɗɗo suusi fiyude gabaare mum ngam goɗɗum, mi fiyan gabaare am miin duu baa nii ko kaalan mi ɗum no kaanɗi.
47011022	Nde nii ɓe Ibrankooɓe, too miin duu mi Ibranke. Nde nii ɓe ɓiɓɓe leydi Isra'el, too miin duu mi ɓii-leydi Isra'el. Nde nii ɓe jippotooɓe he Ibrahim, too miin duu, mi jippotooɗo he Ibrahim.
47011023	Nde nii ɓe gollanooɓe Almasiihu, too miin ɓuri ɓe, ɓe fuu laataade gollanoowo Almasiihu. Ko kaalumi ɗo he ko kaaŋaaɗo haalata fuu go'o. Miɗo ɓuri ɓe tittinkinaaku, miɗo ɓuri ɓe uddeede, miɗo ɓuri ɓe fiyeede. Mi hosi maayde kile keewɗe.
47011024	Laabi joy, Yahudankooɓe no piya kam. Laawol fuu, dorri woronja e jeenay.
47011025	Kile tati ɓiɓɓe Rooma no piya kam cabbi. Mi faɗɗaama kaaƴe nde worre. Kile tati miɗo naata laana, laana no rufida kam. He dufol gom mi nyalli mi waali, miɗo doya.
47011026	Nder jehaale am wakkati fuu, miɗo farrita, nder gooruuji, hakkune wuyɓe, hakkune lenyol am, hakkune am he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe. Miɗo farrita nder kuɓeeje, nder ladde yeeruure, miɗo farrita nder maayo, miɗo farrita hakkune wi'ooɓe kam'en no banndiraaɓe am.
47011027	Mi waali jemmaaji re'ataa mi ɗaanaaki. Mi golli faa mi tampi. Mi rafaama, mi ɗomɗaama. Kile keewɗe mi walaa ko nyaamee. Mi jaangaama, mi walaa suddu.
47011028	Fini-weeti fuu fii kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa no tawa nder ɓerne am.
47011029	To goɗɗo jacci, jaccere joomum no heewtoo kam. To goɗɗo fergake duu, iɗum naawa yonki am.
47011030	Nde nii no tilsi mi fiira goɗɗum gabaare, too jaccere am piiranmi gabaare.
47011031	Alla Baabiraawo Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen no anndi mi fenaay. Jettooje ngoodani mo faa abada.
47011032	Wakkati ngonnoomi Damas, guferner huɓeere Damas tawaaɗo nder laamu Aretas waɗi dammbule Damas doomee heɓa mi nanngee mi uddee.
47011033	Amma goonɗinɓe wonɓe nder huɓeere ndeen ngatti kam nder hanndeere, jilwini hanndeere ndeen har finetere birniyol huɓeere ndeen, mburtini kam. Nii waɗi ko kisumi sarri guferner oon.
47012001	No tilsi mi fiya gabaare naa ? Walaa ko ɗum nafataa baa seɗɗa. Jooni mi haalan dow ko Joomiraawo wannginani kam.
47012002	Miɗo anndi goonɗinɗo Almasiihu gom. Duuɓi sappo e nay nii hannden ko gorko oo ƴencinaa dow beɗu kammu tataɓu. Mi anndaa nde o ƴencinaa non, naa o wannginana ɗum non. Alla tan anndi.
47012003	Miɗo anndi nii ko gorko oo nannaama aljanna. Amma ko mi anndaay woni kanko he hoore makko ada watta naa yonki makko ada watta nder aljanna ? Ɗum duu mi anndaa, Alla tan anndi. Nder aljanna toon o nani haalaaji ɗi neɗɗo waawaa haaliri konngi ɓii-aadama. Haalaaji ɗi o nani ɗiin, neɗɗo fuu walaa laawol fillitaade ɗi.
47012005	Iri gorko oo piiranmi gabaare hanaa hoore am piiranmi gabaare. Miin kay baa nii no woodi ko piiran gabaare sey mi fiira jaccere am gabaare.
47012006	Baa nde nii miɗo hiɗi mi fiira hoore am gabaare non, mi haaŋaaka, goonga nii kaalanmi. Amma mi fiyataa gabaare heɓa to himɓe miiloo ko miɗo ɓuri ko ɓe ngi'ii he am naa ko ɓe nani miɗo haala.
47012007	Ko Alla holli kam ɗum no daɗɗi hakkillo, amma ngam to mi fiyir ɗum gabaare sey Alla waɗi goɗɗum nannduɗum hano gi'al yuwi kam. O waɗi ɗum duu ngam haɗude kam fiyude gabaare. Naawɗum maggal no nanndi golle lilaaɗo Seyɗan.
47012008	Kile tati miɗo eela Joomiraawo ɗoofana kam ngal,
47012009	amma Joomiraawo wi'i kam : « Moƴƴere am nde kokkumaami heƴii ma. Wakkati njaccuɗaa, nden baawɗe am gollata faa noy walaa. » Ndenne no weli kam mi fiira jaccere am gabaare heɓa baawɗe Almasiihu tawee he am.
47012010	Ngam majjum waɗi jaccere, jennooje, torra, tampiri he mettal ɓerne ngal ngi'umi ngam sabbu Almasiihu, miɗo jaɓɓoro ɗum welwelo. Goonga non wakkati njaccumi, wakkati mum keɓanmi semmbe.
47012011	On ngi'ii naa joonin onon ngatti kam, mi waɗi hoore am kaaŋaaɗo. Onon kannoo waɗude filla am. Ngam nde goonga mi ɓurataa no Alla fonni kam. Amma ɓe mbi'oton lilaaɓe mawɓe ngalaa fuu ko ɓurdi kam.
47012012	Nde goonga ɗum suuɗanaaki on ngam wakkati ngonnoomi hakkune mooɗon, mi golliri munyal manngal. Alla nder baawɗe mum humni har junngo am kaayɗe re'ataa. O waɗi alamaaji keewɗi ngam hollude ko mi lilaaɗo goonga e goonga.
47012013	Ɗume kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa gom keɓi ko on keɓaay ? Huune worre tan woni ko mi waɗani ɓeeto ko mi waɗanaay on, kam woni ko mi ƴamaay on njoɓon kam golle ɗe ngaɗumi hakkune mooɗon. Mi eeli on njaafanee kam ɗum.
47012014	Mi siryake joonin, warde to mooɗon. Garki am kii laatoytoo garki am tataɓi to mooɗon. Mi wartanaayno on donngal, mi wartantaa on duu donngal ngam hanaa njawdi mooɗon tefanmi. Amma onon he ko'e mooɗon kaajaami. Hanaa ɓiɓɓe kaani tefande saarooɓe mum'en njawdi, amma saarooɓe kaani tefande ɓe njawdi.
47012015	Mi nanan belɗum hokkitirde ko njogiimi fuu ngam mooɗon. Mi nanan belɗum hokkitirde duu baa hoore am. Miɗo horsini on sanne, waɗan ɓuyton hiɗude kam naa ?
47012016	Miɗo anndi ko mi laatanaaki on donngal. Amma no woodi wi'uɓe mi hiilu on, mi fenan on non waɗi tokkuɗon kam.
47012017	Nder lilaaɓe ɓe lilumi to mooɗon waɗi mo naforiimi njaɓumi njawdi mooɗon nyaamumi naa ?
47012018	Titus mo eelumi yahdi goɗɗo to mooɗon, O jaɓii njawdi mooɗon o nyaami naa ? Miin e Titus, min fuu min miiloo wooto, min fuu min laawol gootol.
47012019	On ɓooyi, oɗon miiloo ko tawte miɗen ɗon, miɗen tefa laaɓinde ko'e amin yeeso mooɗon non. Ɗum hanaa. Yeeso Alla min tefata lamninde ko'e amin. Min kaalataana ko Almasiihu hiɗi min kaala. Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, ko min ngaɗi fuu min ngaɗanaa ɗum ngam yaarude hawriine mooɗon yeeso.
47012020	Miɗo hula, nde mi wari to mooɗon, to mi tawir on no mi hiɗiraa. Onon duu to on ngi'ir kam no on ngiɗiraa. Miɗo hula to mi tawdu on kiite e kiram mbonɗam. To mi tawru on konu he tikkere, to mi tawru on gacce e nyo'oore. To mi tawru on mawnitaare e fitina.
47012021	Se mi wari to mooɗon, miɗo hula to Alla waɗu mi tawa semteene hakkune mooɗon. Mi tawa murtunooɓe heewɓe tuubaay acci golle mum'en nyidduɗe hano ir fijirde he ko nanndititta he mum. Ndenne ɓerne am mettan sanne ngam maɓɓe.
47013001	Garki am kii laatoytoo laawol am tataɓol to mooɗon. Joonin kettinee no winndaa wi'aa : Tilay sey seedeeɓe ɗiɗo naa tato ko haala tabbintinee.
47013002	Mi wondaa he mooɗon hannden amma miɗo haalana waɗunooɓe hakke, he wonɓe no gaɗa hakke hannden, hano no kaalirannoomi ɗum nder garki am ɗiɗaɓi to mooɗon, ko nde nii mi wari, mi yurmataako neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu.
47013003	Onon, oɗon tefa alaama kolloowo ko Almasiihu woni no haalda hunnduko am. On keɓan alaama oon duu. Almasiihu hanaa jaccuɗo yeeso mooɗon, omo holla baawɗe makko hakkune mooɗon.
47013004	Goonga non wakkati Almasiihu tontanoo, o leesini, o waɗi hoore makko hano mo walaa semmbe. Amma nder baawɗe Alla, omo wuuri. Minen duu nder kawtal amin he makko min leesinto min ngaɗa ko'e amin hano ɓe ngalaa semmbe. Amma nder golle ɗe min ngaɗata hakkune mooɗon miɗen mbuurdida he makko nder baawɗe Alla.
47013005	Taykee ko'e mooɗon, ndaaron nde nii mbuurnam mooɗon no nanndi he mbuurnam goonɗinɓe. Etee ko'e mooɗon on paaman nde Iisa Almasiihu no wondi he mooɗon naa o wondaa he mooɗon. Naa on mbaawaa kolli tabbat ko on goonɗinɓe ?
47013006	Minen, miɗen mbaawi kolli ko tabbat omo wondi he amin. Miɗo waawi wi'ude ko oɗon anndani ɗum.
47013007	Miɗen eela Alla to waɗu ngaɗon ko boni fuu, hanaa ngam hollude ko miɗen ngoodi goonga non, amma ngam miɗen ngiɗi ngollon ko moƴƴi. Gacce walaa baa nii nde tawi min ngalaa goonga.
47013008	Ngam walaa ko min mbaawani goonga oon, ko min mbaawi nii woni gollirde mo.
47013009	Goonga non, miɗen nana belɗum sanne wakkati fuu min njacci, ko oɗon tawaa he semmbe. Ko min eelata Alla ngam mooɗon woni laatoɗon huuɓuɓe.
47013010	Ngam majjum waɗi, miɗo winndana on illa mi waraay. Mi hiɗaa sattinande on wakkati tawoyteemi hakkune mooɗon. Joomiraawo hokki kam baawɗe ngam wallude hawriine mooɗon yaha yeeso amma hanaa ngam mi sankita on.
47013011	Banndiraaɓe, walaa ko hoddi nde hanaa waynaade on. Ndurwee moƴƴinee jonnde mooɗon, ngaɗee ko mbi'umi ngaɗon, laatoɗon jom'en miiloo wooto, mbuurdee he jam. Alla jom hidde, jom jam wonda he mooɗon.
47013012	Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu yewta banndum yewtere hidde. Himɓe Alla wonduɓe he am fuu no njewta on.
47013013	Moƴƴere Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, hidde Alla e kawtal he Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wonda he mooɗon, on fuu !
48001001	Ɗerol ngool ƴuwi to am, miin Pol, mo hanaa himɓe ngaɗi ɗum lilaaɗo. Mi laataaki duu lilaaɗo daliila goɗɗo. Amma Iisa Almasiihu he Alla Baabiraawo ummintinɗo mo he maayde ngaɗi kam lilaaɗo.
48001002	Miin e banndiraaɓe meeɗen wonduɓe he am fuu, miɗen njewta on, onon kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa gonɗe nder leydi Galatiya.
48001003	Alla Baabiraawo he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen kokku on jam e moƴƴere.
48001004	Almasiihu mursi yonki mum, laatii sadaka ngam moytude hakkeeji meeɗen he ngam hisinde en jamaanu bonɗo oo. Nii o humniri muuyɗe Baabiraawo meeɗen gonɗo dow.
48001005	Teddungal laatanoo Alla faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
48001006	Tottitaaki Alla, nodduɗo on forba laatoɗon himɓe mum daliila moƴƴere Iisa Almasiihu, tottitaaki kii, ki njaawɗiɗon waɗude, tokkuɗon waaju gom mo miiliɗon no nafa on. Amma waaju oo walaa fuu ko nafirta on. Tottitaaki mooɗon kii haayɗini kam sanne.
48001007	Paamee ko Habaru lobbo gom fuu walaa mo ƴaari Habaru lobbo oo. Amma woɓɓe no tefa wattodira ko'e mooɗon. Ko ɓe ngiɗi woni ɓe mbattititta Habaru lobbo filla Almasiihu.
48001008	Min mbaajake on dow Habaru lobbo oo. Amma nde neɗɗo gom, naa maleykaajo ƴuwɗo dow gom, naa nde minen he ko'e amin ngari nyannde gom, mbaajii on ko seedi he Habaru lobbo oo, too, Alla huɗu joomum.
48001009	Min kaalaniino on ɗum, joonin duu miɗo haalana on ɗum : Neɗɗo fuu wari waajii on habaru gom, mo hanaa Habaru lobbo mo min mbaajii on oo, too, Alla huɗu joomum.
48001010	Too joonin ɗume tefanmi, hidde himɓe naa hidde Alla ? Naa mi walaana miɗo tefa welnude ɓerɗe himɓe ? Nde nii welnude ɓerɗe himɓe tefanmi, nden mi laatataako maccuɗo Almasiihu.
48001011	Banndiraaɓe, miɗo hiɗi paamon ko Habaru lobbo mo mbaajotoomi oo hanaa to goɗɗo o ƴuwani kam.
48001012	Goɗɗo hokkaay kam mo, goɗɗo duu ekkitaay kam mo. Amma Iisa Almasiihu e hoore mum wannginani kam mo.
48001013	On nanii no njooɗoriimi illa arannde nder diina Yahudankooɓe. On nanii fuu no torrirmi hawriine jeyaaɓe Alla faa noy walaa. Mi sinngii koyngal sey mi sankitii hawriine ndee.
48001014	Miɗo ɓuri heewɓe nder waldeeɓe am naatude diina Yahudankooɓe. Miɗo ɓuri ɓe, ɓe fuu duu tiiɗude faa noy walaa he finaa-tawaa maamiraaɓe am.
48001015	Amma Alla nder moƴƴere mum suɓake kam illa mi rimaaka. O suɓake kam, o noddi kam.
48001016	Ɗum welu mo waɗi o wannginani kam Ɓiyiiko ngam mi waɗana ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe filla makko. Amma wakkati mum mi saawodiraay neɗɗo fuu.
48001017	Mi ummaaki, mi yehi Ursaliima ngam fottude artuɓe kam laataade lilaaɓe ɓeen. Mi yehaana leydi Arabiya, nden ngartumi Damas.
48001018	Duuɓi tati gaɗa tuubol am, nden nyannde gom ummiimi njehumi Ursaliima ngam mi anndodira he Piyer. Njooɗidiimi he makko balɗe sappo e joy.
48001019	Ko ƴaari Yakuuba minyo Joomiraawo meeɗen walaa lilaaɗo gom mo ngi'umi.
48001020	Ummiimi Ursaliima njehumi leydi Siriya e Silisi. Ko mbinndanmi on ɗum no goonga, Alla no seedi, mi fenaay.
48001022	Kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe leydi Yahudiya tokkuɗe Almasiihu ngi'aay kam baa nde worre.
48001023	Amma wakkati ɓe nani no wi'ee torrannooɗo ɓe oon kam woni hannden no waajoo filla Habaru lobbo, habaru mo o tefannoo nyifude,
48001024	ɓe tinni iɓe teddina Alla daliila ko o waɗani kam.
48002001	Duuɓi sappo e nay gaɗa tuubol am, nyannde gom coƴƴiimi Ursaliima, miin e Barnabas, Titus duu no wondi he amin.
48002002	Mi waɗi jahaangal Ursaliima ngaal ngam Alla wannginani kam yaadu toon. Wakkati ngarmi Ursaliima, mi hawridi he ardiiɓe goonɗinɓe huɓeere ndeen. Njooɗiimi, miin he maɓɓe tan, kollumi ɓe Habaru lobbo mo mbaajotoomi ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe. Mi waɗi ɗum ngam mi hiɗaa golle ɗe ngaɗumi he ɗe ngonmi miɗo waɗa hannden ngartaa meere.
48002003	Titus hanaa Yahudanke, o Gerekanke. Amma ɗum fuu waɗaay wakkati min kawrunoo Ursaliima wi'ee tilaay sey to o juulnaama,
48002004	baa nii ko banndiraaɓe meeɗen fewreeɓe gom tefiino ɗum. Ɓe corkake hawriine goonɗinɓe ndeen ngam horude min, ɓe ngi'a faa keddi toy kawtal amin he Iisa Almasiihu rimɗiniri min. Nden ɓe ndaara no ɓe ngartirta min maccuɓe maɓɓe.
48002005	Amma min kokkaay ɓe daama baa seɗɗa, ngam goonga Habaru lobbo oon duumoo faa abada hakkune mooɗon.
48002006	Nder hawriine ndeen, ardiiɓe adaaɓe no goɗɗum ɓeen walaa fuu ko ɓe ekkiti kam. Ko ɓe laatii fuu ɗum wannaay kam ngam Alla walaa hedran-hedran.
48002007	Ɓe paami ko hano no Alla halfiniri Piyer waajaade Habaru lobbo hakkune Yahudankooɓe, non miin duu Alla halfini kam waajaade Habaru lobbo oon hakkune ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe.
48002008	Alla hokki Piyer baawɗe laataade lilaaɗo yahde he Yahudankooɓe. Miin duu, o hokki kam baawɗe laataade lilaaɗo yahde he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe.
48002009	Wakkati Yakuuba, Piyer e Yahaaya daareteeɓe hano bonjariije kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe ngi'unoo no Alla barkinɗiniri golle amin, ɓe ngatti juuɗe maɓɓe nder juuɗe amin, miin e Barnabas, ngam hollude ko ɓe njaɓi min mbaajoo ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, kamɓe duu ɓe mbaajoo hakkune Yahudankooɓe.
48002010	Huune worre ɓe eeli min, kam woni min miccitoo talkaaɓe. Iɗum nder ɓerne am duu sanne.
48002011	Wakkati Piyer weerunoo huɓeere Antiyokiya, o yoofi laawol. Nden nyannde gom noddumoomi yeeso himɓe fuu kaalanmoomi.
48002012	Fadde goonɗinɓe fiiliiɓe Yakuuba gom warde Antiyokiya, Piyer he goonɗinɓe ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe nyaamdannoo. Amma nyannde goonɗinɓe ɓee ngarnoo Antiyokiya, Piyer fooɗi hoore mum itti he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ɓee. O acci nyaamdude he maɓɓe ngam omo hula Yahudankooɓe, tiiɗuɓe he finaa-tawaa mum'en, warɓe Antiyokiya ngi'a omo nyaamda he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe.
48002013	Yahudankooɓe goonɗinɓe gom tawaaɓe nder Antiyokiya, kam'en duu nyemmini munafikaaku Piyer nguu faa ɗum beegini Barnabas kam duu tokki ɓe no waɗa ko ɓe ngaɗata fuu.
48002014	Wakkati ngi'unoomi ɓe ngosake laawol goonga tawaaɗo nder Habaru lobbo oon, nden yeeso goonɗinɓe ɓeen fuu, ittumi hunnduko, mbi'umi Piyer : « Aan ! A Yahudanke, amma a waɗi hoore maa hano mo hanaa Yahudanke. A tokkaay ko tilsinooje Yahudankooɓe mbi'i. Too, noy waɗata mbi'aa a tilsinan ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe njooɗoo jonnde Yahudankooɓe ? »
48002015	Minen, min dimaaɓe Yahudankooɓe, min kanaa ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, ɓe mbi'oton no waɗooɓe hakke.
48002016	Goonga non, miɗen anndi ko neɗɗo daarataake jom dartinaaku ngam tokki Tawreeta. Amma nde joomum goonɗini Iisa Almasiihu, joomum daaretee jom dartinaaku. Minen duu, min ngoonɗini Iisa heɓa min ndaaree jom'en dartinaaku, daliila goonɗinol amin hanaa daliila tokkol Tawreeta. Walaa daareteeɗo dartiiɗo yeeso Alla ngam tokki tan ko tilsinooje Tawreeta mbi'i.
48002017	Minen, nder kawtal amin he Almasiihu miɗen tefa daareede jom'en dartinaaku. Too ! Nde nii tawaama nder kawtal amin ngaal, miɗen he waɗude hakke non, ɗume hiɗaa wi'ee ɗo kaden ? Ko Almasiihu no uppa neɗɗo waɗa hakke naa ? Abada !
48002018	Nde nii mi wartii he Tawreeta mo mboppumi oo, too miin he hoore am watti ɓoggol kiite he daane am.
48002019	Ko Tawreeta wi'ata himɓe ɗum waɗi tottitiimi nde ngartumi har Alla. Nder kawtal am he Almasiihu, mi maaydii he makko dow bardugal.
48002020	Jooni hanaa miin he hoore am woni no wuura nder ɓanndu am, amma Almasiihu he hoore mum woni no wuura nder am. Mbuurnam am fuu nder goonɗinol ɓii-Alla ngaɗanmi ɗum. Kanko hiɗi kam faa mursi yonki mum ngam am.
48002021	Mi yawaaki moƴƴere Alla mi tokka Tawreeta. Ngam nde nii tawi tokkude Tawreeta waɗata neɗɗo jom dartinaaku, ndenne maayde Almasiihu warti meere.
48003001	Hey onon himɓe Galatiya, ko'e mooɗon cottii naa ? Moy korti on ? Mi holli on faa laaɓi tar maana tontol Iisa Almasiihu.
48003002	Miɗo hiɗi mi ƴama on ƴamɗe ɗee : Tokkol Tawreeta naa goonɗinol Habaru lobbo, habaru dow Iisa Almasiihu waɗi keɓuɗon Ruuhu Alla ?
48003003	Ko waɗi oɗon pamɗi hakkillo nii fuu ? On puɗɗirii huune fuu dow innde Ruuhu Alla, amma joonin ko ngatton fuu dow semmbe mooɗon ngatton ɗum naa ?
48003004	Jooni, oɗon miila ko torra ka hewti on kaa fuu warti meere naa ? Abada ! Ka wartaay meere.
48003005	Oɗon anndi ko Alla gaɗɗo kujje kaayɗiniiɗe hakkune mooɗon, kanko duu hokki on Ruuhu makko. Oɗon miila, ko o waɗi kujje ɗee fuu ngam on tokki Tawreeta naa ngam on ngoonɗini Habaru lobbo ?
48003006	Taykee mbuurnam Ibrahim ndaaron, har ko daarata mbuurnam makko, no winndaa wi'aa : O goonɗini Alla, waɗi Alla daari mo dartiiɗo.
48003007	Ndenne, paamee ko himɓe goonɗinɓe Alla, kam'en ngoni jippotooɓe he Ibrahim goonga e goonga.
48003008	Ngam Alla fodakeno ɗum waɗi no winndaa wi'aa, nyannde gom Alla adan ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, wartira ɓe seniiɓe daliila Ibrahim, ngam ɓe ngoonɗinii mo. Wakkati Alla wi'unoo mo : Ngam sabbu maaɗa lenyi duuniyaaru fuu mbarkintee, Ibrahim nani habaru belɗo oo illa o tabbitaay.
48003009	Ibrahim goonɗini waɗi Alla barkinɗini mo, ndenne neɗɗo fuu goonɗini no barkinɗintee, kam duu.
48003010	Neɗɗo fuu miili ko Alla laaɓinan ɗum ngam tokkii ko tilsinooje Tawreeta mbi'i, too neɗɗo oo no kuɗaaɗo. Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Kuddi woodani neɗɗo fuu mo tokkaay tilsinooje Tawreeta ɗeen fuu faa laaɓi.
48003011	Goonga non, neɗɗo fuu waawtaa laatii dartiiɗo yeeso Alla ngam no tokkuɗo ko Tawreeta wi'i tan. Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Dartiiɗo wuuran daliila goonɗinol mum.
48003012	Tokkol Tawreeta haɓɓaay dartinaaku he goonɗinol. Amma Tawreeta wi'aana : Neɗɗo fuu waɗi ko Tawreeta wi'i, heɓan mbuurnam daliila mayre.
48003013	Almasiihu soptinii en he kuddi tawaani nder Tawreeta ngam o wari o adi ndi nokku meeɗen wakkati o hiitana kiite Tawreeta. No winndaa wi'aa : Kuɗaaɗo woni jomaaɗo he leggal waraa.
48003014	Fii oo fuu heewtake Iisa Almasiihu heɓa daliila makko ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe duu keɓa barke ɗe Ibrahim heɓi. Enen duu har goonɗinol meeɗen mbaawen heɓude Ruuhu mo Alla fodanii en.
48003015	Banndiraaɓe, accee mi hokka on misaali dow ko anndanɗon. Nde nii himɓe ɗiɗo ngaddii amaana faa ɓe ngatti junngo ngam tabbintinde amaana maɓɓe oo, too walaa baawɗo sottinde amaana oo naa ɓeydude cotol dow makko.
48003016	Wooɗi, Alla waɗanii Ibrahim e jippotooɓe he mum podooje. Ko wi'aa jippotooɓe he makko ɗum, wi'aaka jippotooɓe wondaaɓe ɓeen no ɗuɓɓe. Amma nder jippotooɓe ɓeen gooto wondaa, kanko woni Almasiihu.
48003017	Ko ngiɗumi wi'ude nii : Tawreeta garɗo duuɓi keme nay e woronja gaɗa amaana mo Alla feŋunoo, waawaa feŋiti mo. Ngam nde nii Tawreeta feŋiti amaana mo Alla feŋunoo, amaana Alla oon wartan meere.
48003018	Nde nii tawinoo ndonngu kisinam nguu har tokkol Tawreeta heɓirtenoo, ndenne hanaa har alkawal Alla ngaal ngu heɓirtee. Amma en ngi'ii ko Alla har alkawal mum holli Ibrahim yerre.
48003019	Ndenne, ɗume Tawreeta waɗanaa ? O waɗaama ngam wannginde hakkeeji himɓe fadde jippotooɗo he Ibrahim, podanaaɗo alkawal Alla oon warde. Tawreeta oo, maleykaaɓe Alla ngaddi mo, ngatti nder junngo Muusa tawaaɗo hakkune Alla he ɓiɓɓe Isra'el.
48003020	Amma filla goɗɗo tawee hakkune neɗɗo he hoore mum walaa. Alla duu no gooto, o wondaa fuu goɗɗo.
48003021	Ndenne, ɗume hiɗaa wi'eede ɗo ? Ko Tawreeta no gaabi alkawaliiji Alla naa ? Hanaa ! Seeda ngi'aa, nde nii no woodunoo tilsinoore waawde hokki neɗɗo mbuurnam, ko nde nii himɓe keɓinoo nde, nden tabbat tokkol Tawreeta no waɗan himɓe jom'en dartinaaku.
48003022	Amma no winndaa wi'aa ko hakke jaalake kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu. Ɗum waɗi duu, ngam alkawal ngal Alla waɗi dow goonɗinde Almasiihu ngaal, neɗɗo fuu goonɗini Iisa Almasiihu heɓa ngal.
48003023	Fadde goonɗinol wanngineede, Tawreeta haɓɓi en, wartiri en maccuɓe. To soptoree fuu walaa, nde hanaa nii neɗɗo goonɗini Iisa Almasiihu non.
48003024	Ndenne, Tawreeta ɗowi en naako Almasiihu wari heɓa nde nii en ngoonɗinii mo, ndaareɗen jom'en dartinaaku.
48003025	Joonin ko wakkati goonɗinol Almasiihu ngool waɗi, en kaajaaka ɗowol Tawreeta.
48003026	Joonin on fuu, on ɓiɓɓe Alla daliila ko ngoonɗinɗon Iisa Almasiihu.
48003027	On fuu daliila gaɗol batisma mooɗon, on peŋake he Iisa Almasiihu. O lamni ɓerɗe mooɗon ngam nyemminon mo.
48003028	Ndenne, walaa ko senndata Yahudanke he mo hanaa Yahudanke, dimo he maccuɗo, gorko he debbo. Ngam on fuu on go'o nder kawtal mooɗon he Iisa Almasiihu.
48003029	Se tawi Almasiihu jeyi on, on lenyol Ibrahim, on ndonan alkawal ngal Alla fodinoo ngal.
48004001	Alal misaali, nde nii donoowo no suka, walaa fuu ko senndata ɗum he maccuɗo. Baa nde kanko ronata njawdi ndiin fuu,
48004002	omo haani ɗowtanaade jogiiɓe mo, e reenooɓe njawdi makko sey wakkati mo baabiiko taƴi oon yottii.
48004003	Non enen duu, fadde Almasiihu rimɗinde en, en tawaakana ley dabareeji ginni marɗi baawɗe duuniyaaru.
48004004	Amma nde wakkati mo Alla resi oon yottii, Alla lili Ɓiyum. Debbo gom rimi mo nder wakkati mo sariya Tawreeta nawtortee.
48004005	O warii o rimɗina en he maccangaaku Tawreeta ngam laatoɗen ɓiɓɓe Alla.
48004006	En ɓiɓɓe makko goonga e goonga, waɗi o watti Ruuhu Ɓiyiiko nder ɓerɗe meeɗen. Ruuhu oo duu waɗata eɗen nodda Alla eɗen mbi'a : « Abba ».
48004007	Ndenne, en kanaa maccuɓe kaden, en ɓiɓɓe makko. Ngam en ɓiɓɓe Alla duu waɗi, Alla waɗi en ronooɓe ɗum.
48004008	Ndenno on anndaano Alla, waɗi oɗon ndewa tooruure.
48004009	Amma joonin ko annduɗon Alla, naa mbi'en ko Alla anndi on, noy watta tottitoɗon Alla, kokkon mo ɓaawo, coƴƴoɗon ley dabareeji ginni marɗi baawɗe duuniyaaru, dabareeji ɗi ngalaa fuu semmbe gom. Naa oɗon ngiɗi laataade maccuɓe majji non ?
48004010	Oɗon kakkilii he balɗe gom, oɗon kakkilii he lebbi gom, oɗon kakkilii he wakkatiiji gom, oɗon kakkilii he kitaale gom.
48004011	Miɗo hula to golle ɗe ngollumi hakkune mooɗon laatoo meere.
48004012	Banndiraaɓe, ko ngiɗumi woni nyemminon kam. Ko mbi'umi nyemminon kam ɗum hanaa gacce gom ngaɗanɗon kam. Miin e hoore am, mi laatakeno hano mooɗon.
48004013	Oɗon anndi ko rafi cellal am hokki kam laawol warde waajaade Habaru lobbo hakkune mooɗon.
48004014	Baa nii ko rafi jam am oo sulnanii on faa noy walaa, ɗum fuu waɗaay mboppon kam naa mboɗɗoɗon kam. On njaɓɓitake kam, njaɓɓitaaki lilaaɗo Alla. On njaɓɓitake kam hano miin he hoore am woni Iisa Almasiihu.
48004015	Mi tabbintini ko wakkati mum, nde nii no waɗo, nden neɗɗo mooɗon fuu ittiino gite mum hokka kam. Amma hannden toy nanol belɗum mooɗon ngool tokki ?
48004016	Mi laatake ganyo mooɗon naa, ngam miɗo haalana on goonga ?
48004017	Oɗon nder ɓerɗe himɓe ɓee faa noy walaa, amma ɓerɗe maɓɓe mbooɗaa. Ko ɓe ngiɗi tan woni senndude on he am ngam tokkiron ɓe ɓerne worre.
48004018	Ko ɓuri woni wattude wakkati fuu hakkillo mum he ko nafata baa nde mi tawaaka hakkune mooɗon.
48004019	Yaa onon ɓiɓɓe am, ɗiɗaɓere am nii ko miɗo yara naawɗum mawɗum daliila mooɗon. Naawɗum, ɗum tooke mum nanndi tooke ŋatawere. Mi yaran ɗum sey nyannde hidde Almasiihu ɓenndi nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
48004020	Kay, daliila mooɗon, hannden hakkillo am fuu ummake sanne faa noy walaa. Da wi'ee miɗo wonnoo hakkune mooɗon non, nden mi anndannoo ko mbi'anmi on.
48004021	Mi ƴaman on, onon hiɗuɓe tokkude Tawreeta : On nanaay ko winndaa wi'aa nder Tawreeta ?
48004022	Nder mayre no winndaa wi'aa ko Ibrahim rimi worɓe ɗiɗo. Isma'el, ɓii-korɗo Saratu he Isiyaaku, mo Saratu he hoore mum rimi.
48004023	Isma'el rimaama no himɓe ndimirtee nder duuniyaaru, amma Isiyaaku kay rimaama daliila alkawal Alla.
48004024	Rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓee, no misaali tinndinoowo amaanaaji ɗiɗi ɗi Alla waɗi. Hajara, no tinndina amaana mo Alla waɗani ɓiɓɓe Isra'el dow waamnde Sinayi. O rimii ɓiɓɓe makko ley maccangaaku amaana oo.
48004025	Hajara no tinndinoore waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Sinayi wonnde nder leydi Arabiya. O tinndinoore huɓeere Ursaliima hannden, ngam kanko he ɓiɓɓe makko ɓe fuu ɓe maccuɓe.
48004026	Saratu no tinndinoore huɓeere Ursaliima wonnde dow, huɓeere nde anndaa maccangaaku, nder mayre duu ƴuwɗen.
48004027	No winndaa wi'aa : Herkita jaleeɗe, aan dimaro. Ilina, aan mo anndaa naawɗum ŋatawere, ngam ɓiɓɓe debbo boppaaɗo no ɓuran ɓiɓɓe kaɓɓanaaɗo ɗudde.
48004028	Onon banndiraaɓe, on ɓiɓɓe alkawal hano no Isiyaaku laatori ɓii-alkawal Alla.
48004029	Nder jamaanu Ibrahim, ɓiɗɗo dimaaɗo hano no himɓe ndimirtee nder duuniyaaru torri dimaaɗo nder baawɗe Ruuhu Alla oon. Baa hannden duu non ɗum worri.
48004030	Amma ɗume winndaa wi'aa ? No winndaa wi'aa : Riiwu korɗo oon e ɓiyum, ngam ɓii-korɗo oo ronidataa e ɓii-dimo oon.
48004031	Ndenne banndiraaɓe, en ƴuwaay he korɗo oon, en ƴuwaana he debbo dimo oon.
48005001	Almasiihu rimɗini en ngam laatoɗen rimɓe goonga e goonga. Ndenne tarsinee faa wooɗa, to accee neɗɗo fuu wartira on nder maccangaaku kaden.
48005002	Korkitee noppi mooɗon, miin Pol, wi'i on, nde nii on njaɓi njuulneɗon, ndenne on kolli ko walaa ko Almasiihu nafiri on.
48005003	Miɗo miccintina on duu ko neɗɗo fuu jaɓi njuulnaa, tilay joomum tokka tilsinooje Tawreeta ɗeen fuu.
48005004	Onon tefooɓe laataade jom'en dartinaaku nder tokkol Tawreeta, on ceedii he Almasiihu, on mboɗɗake moƴƴere Alla.
48005005	Amma minen, min ngattii gokka ko Alla wartiran min jom'en dartinaaku yeeso mum. Ɗum duu woni ko keɗiɗen sanne keɓol mum daliila Ruuhu Alla gonɗo no golla nder ɓerɗe meeɗen ngam en goonɗinɓe.
48005006	Neɗɗo fuu hawti he Iisa Almasiihu, julneede e rafi julneede, fuu no go'o. Ko ɓuri nafude joomum woni goonɗinol tabbintinaagol he hollude himɓe fuu hidde.
48005007	On puɗɗi yahde yeeso nder goonɗinol mooɗon no wooɗiri. Moy haɗi on tokkude goonga ?
48005008	Hanaa Alla nodduɗo on haɗi on tokkude goonga oon.
48005009	Oɗon nana himɓe no mbi'a : « Ƴuufinirɗum seɗɗa tan heƴii ƴuufina conndi budaani no ndi foti fuu. »
48005010	Amma miin, mi wattaana hoolaare am dow Joomiraawo meeɗen, ɗum duu waɗi mi tabbintini ko en fuu en miiloo wooto. Neɗɗo fuu wari watti fitina hakkune mooɗon, joomum hiitetee, mo non fuu.
48005011	Banndiraaɓe, nde mi waajake mi wi'i, accon njuulneɗon, nden Yahudankooɓe torrataano kam. Nde nii mi waajakeno juulnol, nden maayde Iisa Almasiihu dow bardugal mettataano ɓerne neɗɗo fuu.
48005012	Ndenne, wonɓe no kuɓɓa hiite hakkune mooɗon ɓee manta ko'e mum'en !
48005013	Banndiraaɓe, Alla noddi on ngam waɗa on rimɗuɓe. To muree accon dimɗinol mooɗon ngol laatanoo on daliila tokkude muuyɗe ɓanndu. Ndurwee ngol laatanoo on laawol hidde gollonodirde he ɓerne worre.
48005014	Ngam Tawreeta fuu hawraa nder tilsinoore worre ndee wi'ude : Ngiɗaa gondo maa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maa.
48005015	Kakkilee nde nii oɗon kaɓa, oɗon nyaamodira hano liƴƴi, ko'e mooɗon ngonɗon oɗon liɓa.
48005016	Njooɗee no Ruuhu Alla holliri on njooɗoroɗon, ngam to on tokku muuyɗe ɓalli mooɗon.
48005017	Ngam hanaa ko ɓalli mooɗon ngiɗi fuu, Ruuhu Alla hiɗi. Non duu hanaa ko Ruuhu Alla hiɗi fuu, ɓalli mooɗon ngiɗi. Pooɗodirol woni hakkune muuyɗe ɓanndu neɗɗo he Ruuhu Alla. Ko ɗum rimata duu woni neɗɗo waawaa waɗi ko hiɗi fuu.
48005018	Ndenne, nde Ruuhu Alla woni no ɗowa on, on ngalaa ley dabare Tawreeta.
48005019	Jeenu, golle nyiddiniiɗe, ngoni ko muuyɗe ɓanndu ndimanta ɓii-aadama.
48005020	Ɗe ndimana ɓe na dewol tooruuje, korte, banyodirol, habdo, haasidaaku, ɓerne ɓaleeraaku, ɓurnodirol, hedran-hedran.
48005021	Ɗe ndimana ɓe na suuno bonngo, jarɗe, fijirde bonde he ko nanndi he mum. Miɗo miccintina on, hano no kaalirnoomi ɗum, gollooɓe ir golle ɗee naatataa nder Laamu Alla.
48005022	Amma Ruuhu Ceniiɗo kay, ko rimanta en woni : Hidde, welwelo, jam, munyal, yurmeene, moƴƴude, hoolaare,
48005023	ɓerne feewne, he dawranol hoore mum. Hakiika, tilsinoore fuu walaa haɗude kujje ɗee fuu ngaɗee.
48005024	Ɓe Almasiihu jeyii fuu mbari suunooji ɓalli mum'en bonɗi, he ko nanndititta he mum'en dow bardugal.
48005025	Nde nii Ruuhu Alla keɓirten mbuurnam kesam, ndenne no haani tawee Ruuhu Alla oon woni no ɗowa en.
48005026	To neɗɗo meeɗen fuu fii gabaare wi'a kam no goɗɗum. Accen fitina he haasidaaku hakkune meeɗen.
48006001	Banndiraaɓe am, nde nii goɗɗo mooɗon nanngaama nder gaɗol hakke, onon ɓe Ruuhu Alla wondi he mum'en, ngartiree mo dow laawol. Ngattee hakkillo he leesinaaku, ngartiron mo heese heese. Amma onon duu, kakkilee dow tefol wartirde mo, to njehon ngaɗon hakke.
48006002	Mballodiree hakkune mooɗon, ɗum hollata ko on tokkii tilsinoore nde Almasiihu hokki on ndee no wooɗiri.
48006003	Nde nii goɗɗo fiyi gabaare wi'i ko kam no goɗɗum, tawi joomum hanaa fuy, too joomum hoore mum woni no jammboo.
48006004	Amma neɗɗo mooɗon fuu tayko gollal mum daara. Nde nii gollal joomum wooɗii, joomum no waawi fiyude gabaare mum dow maggal, hanaa sey to joomum fiyi hoore mum he goɗɗo.
48006005	Neɗɗo fuu donngal muuɗum ronndotoo.
48006006	Neɗɗo fuu ekkitaa goɗɗum dow haala Alla, no haani fecca njawdi mum, itta mbaka ekkintinɗo mo oon.
48006007	To njammbee ko'e mooɗon, Alla jaltintaake. Ko neɗɗo aawi fuu, hettata.
48006008	Neɗɗo fuu aawi ko welnataa ɓerne mum, hettan maayde. Amma neɗɗo fuu aawi ko weli Ruuhu Alla, hettan mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
48006009	To en comu waɗude ko wooɗi. Ngam nde nii en comaay, en kettan nyannde fuu wakkati oon waɗi.
48006010	Ndenne nder wakkati mo hoddi oo, ndurwen ngaɗanen neɗɗo fuu moƴƴere. Amma ko ɓuri woni, ngaɗanen banndiraaɓe meeɗen goonɗinɓe Almasiihu.
48006011	Ndaaree binndi ɓutti binndaaɗi ɗii, miin he hoore am winndani on ɗi he junngo am.
48006012	Wonɓe no tilsina njuulneɗon ɓee, himɓe non donndiiɓe ko'e, tefooɓe wi'ee kam'en no goɗɗum. Iɓe tilsina on ngam iɓe ndogga ɓe torree daliila waaju dow maayde Iisa Almasiihu dow bardugal.
48006013	Wonɓe no tilsina njuulneɗon ɓee, kamɓe he ko'e maɓɓe ɓe tokkaay ko Tawreeta wi'i. Iɓe ngiɗi njuulneɗon tan, ngam ɓe piya gabaare daliila ɓe keɓii on njuulnaama.
48006014	Miin kay, huune worre piiranmi gabaare, kanƴum woni maayde Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen dow bardugal. Har maayde makko, kujje duuniyaaru fuu ngartii meere to am. Miin he hoore am, miin duu mi wartii meere to majje.
48006015	Juulneede e rafi juulneede fuu no go'o, amma ko ɓuri woni, Alla waɗi en himɓe tagitaaɓe.
48006016	Jam e moƴƴere Alla tabbita he neɗɗo fuu tokkuɗo laawol ngol njannginmi ngool. Jam e moƴƴere tabbita duu dow Isra'ilankooɓe, himɓe Alla goongaaɓe.
48006017	Ɓaawo hannden to neɗɗo fuu torru kam, ngam ɓatatte gonɗe dow ɓanndu am daliila Iisa Almasiihu.
48006018	Banndiraaɓe, moƴƴere Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen wonda e mooɗon. Aamiin !
49001001	Miin Pol mo, Alla suɓii, waɗi lilaaɗo Iisa Almasiihu winndani on ɗerol ngool, onon himɓe Alla tawaaɓe nder Efeesu, wattuɓe hoolaare mum'en he Iisa Almasiihu.
49001002	Alla Baaba meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen kokka on jam he moƴƴere.
49001003	Jettooje ngoodani Alla, Baaba Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Alla mo nder kawtal meeɗen he Almasiihu, jippini dow meeɗen iri barke fuu taweteeɗe hakkune beɗi kammu ɗe Ruuhu makko hokkata.
49001004	Daliila kawtal meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu waɗi fadde duuniyaaru tageede, Alla suɓii en, wartiri en feere ngam hoore mum, waɗi en ɓe ngalaa fuu feloore yeeso mum. Alla no hiɗi en waɗi
49001005	o hoddiri illa arannde, laatoɗen ɓiɓɓe makko daliila Iisa Almasiihu. Ɗum wonnoo muuyɗe makko, ɗum duu woni ko weli mo.
49001006	Ndenne en njetta mo, teddinen mo ngam moƴƴe makko mawɗe ɗe o hokki en daliila Ɓiyiiko korsuɗo.
49001007	Ɓiɗɗo mo har ƴiiƴam mum ndufaaɗam, ɓiɗɗo mo nder kawtal meeɗen he mum, ndimɗinaɗen, hakkeeji meeɗen njaafaa. Alla waɗii ɗum fuu ngam moƴƴere makko no mawni sanne.
49001008	Moƴƴe ɗe Alla hokkata en ngalaa keddi, o hokkiri en ɗe hikmaaku he anndal kuuɓungal.
49001009	O wannginani en sirri makko, siri cuuɗiiɗo, siri belɗo mo, mo o nufi illa arannde humnirde har Almasiihu.
49001010	Ko Alla nufi woni : Nde nii wakkati oon waɗi, o hawran huune fuu ko woni dow he ko tawa ley, o waɗa Almasiihu hooreejo majjum.
49001011	Nder kawtal meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu, Alla hokki en mbaka mo o fodani en, ngam o suɓake en illa arannde nder siri makko. Omo tabbintina huune fuu no o hiɗiri ɗum he no o muuyiri ɗum.
49001012	Ndenne, enen artuɓe ngatti tammude mum'en fuu he Almasiihu, en njetta Alla teddinen mo.
49001013	Onon duu, wakkati kettiniɗon Habaru lobbo, habaru goonga e goonga oo, habaru gaddanɗo on kisinam, on ngartii himɓe Alla. On ngattii hoolaare mooɗon he Almasiihu, Alla duu fiyi haatimiire Ruuhu mum dow mooɗon, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo mo o fodaniino on.
49001014	Ruuhu Ceniiɗo oo woni mbaka meeɗen arano nder ndonu ngu keɓoyten to Alla. Nyannde fuu ndimɗinaɗen he gaɗol ko boni, en njoddoto he makko. Ndenne en njetta Alla, teddinen mo.
49001015	Illa ko keɓumi habaru no ngoonɗinirɗon Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen, he ko nanumi hidde nde ngoodanɗon goonɗinɓe mo,
49001016	illa ndeen, wakkati fuu mo ngaɗanmi du'aa'u, miɗo yetta Alla ngam mooɗon.
49001017	Miɗo eela Alla Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, Baabiraawo Jom teddungal hokka on Ruuhu mum, Ruuhu oon janngina on hikmaaku he laawol taykaaki. O holla on laawol anndude mo no wooɗiri.
49001018	Miɗo eela Alla uddita ɓerɗe mooɗon heɓa paamon tammude nde o hokki on wakkati o noddunoo on. Paamon duu no ɗuuɗirka he wodde ndonu himɓe makko poti.
49001019	Miɗo eela Alla uddita ɓerɗe mooɗon heɓa paamon baawɗe ɗe o itti ngam wallude en, enen dekuɓe tammude mum'en dow makko ngalaa walde. Baawɗe ɗe o itti
49001020	ngam wallude en, kanƴe o wattunoo o ummintini Iisa Almasiihu he maayde. O ƴencini mo, o joƴƴini nyaamo makko hakkune beɗi kammu.
49001021	Ndenne, Almasiihu no heedani huune fuu dow, nde laamu non naa nde semmbe gom non, nde ardiiɗo non no semmbe mum foti fuu. Innde fuu hokketeene, innde makko ɓuri ɗum. Kanko heedani ɗe dow nder duuniyaaru nduu, kanko duu heedanta ɗe dow nder duuniyaaru warooru.
49001022	Alla wattii huune fuu ley baawɗe Almasiihu. Alla wattii mo o dawrana huune fuu, o waɗii mo hoore hawriine goonɗinɓe.
49001023	Hawriine goonɗinɓe woni ɓanndu Almasiihu, inde heewi mbuurnam makko. Omo nder huune fuu, nokku fuu to ɗum tawaa.
49002001	Ko on ngoonɗinaayno, on nanndaana hano maayɓe ngam on ɗowtanaaki Alla, oɗon nii nder waɗude hakke.
49002002	Nder wakkati oo, oɗon tokkitii laabi duuniyaaru bonɗi, ɗowtaniɗon Ibiliisa gonɗo no laamii hakkune dow e ley, gonɗo no uppa ɓerɗe caliiɓe ko Alla wi'i.
49002003	Ndenno en fuu nii ngonnoɗen, eɗen tokkitii giɗaale ɓerɗe meeɗen, eɗen ngaɗa ko ɗe kolliti en. Ndenne har ɓii-aadamaaku meeɗen tikkere Alla warannoo dow meeɗen hano no nde warirnoo dow woɓɓe.
49002004	Amma Alla no keewɗo yurmeene, hidde makko nde o woodani en duu no mawni sanne.
49002005	O hawri en, enen he Almasiihu, o hokki en mbuurnam kesam. O hokkii en ɗam baa nii ko wakkati mum, en nanndaana maayɓe ngam en murtuɓe he Alla. Ngam omo moƴƴi waɗi o hisini on.
49002006	Enen he Almasiihu fuu o hawri o ummintini, o jonni hakkune beɗi kammu.
49002007	Alla waɗii ɗum ngam hollude jamanuuji garooji ko moƴƴe mum, ɗe o waɗani en daliila Iisa Almasiihu ɗuuɗirka mum walaa walde.
49002008	Moƴƴere ndee duu waɗi o hisini on ngam on ngoonɗini Almasiihu. Kisinam ɗaam ƴuwaay to mooɗon, ɗam kokkal Alla.
49002009	Alla hokkaay on ɗam ngam golle mooɗon heɓa to neɗɗo mooɗon fuu fiyu gabaare mum wi'a kam no goɗɗum.
49002010	En gollal Alla lobbal sanne. Enen he ko'e meeɗen kanko waɗi en. Daliila kawtal meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu, o heyɗintinii en ngam ngollen golle lobbe, ɗe illa arannde o siryi ngaɗen.
49002011	Miccitee fa, no ngonnoɗon ndenno. On ndimaaka Yahudankooɓe, Yahudankooɓe no mbi'a kam'en no juulnaaɓe, onon on kanaa juulnaaɓe. Juulnol huune waɗeteene he ɓanndu non.
49002012	Miccitee, ko wakkati mum on ngondaano he Almasiihu. On ngalaa fuu baawɗe gom hakkune Yahudankooɓe. On ngalaano nder amaana mo Alla waɗani himɓe mum, tammude fuu walanaa on, on ngalaano ko ndewoton.
49002013	Onon, ɓe illa ndenno, on woɗɗinooɓe Alla, amma hannden dow ƴiiƴam Iisa Almasiihu ndufaaɗam on ɓattinaama Alla.
49002014	Almasiihu he hoore mum waddi jam hakkune Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, o wartirii ɓe sewre worre. Wakkati o mursunoo yonki makko, o liɓi koogol paliingol hakkune maɓɓe. Kam woni o itti huune fuu ko waddata nganyaandi hakkune maɓɓe.
49002015	Semmbe Tawreeta he tilsinooje Yahudankooɓe fuu o itti ɗum, o wartiri potal hakkune Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe. Nder kawtal makko he maɓɓe, o waɗi ɓe sewre worre.
49002016	Har maayde makko dow bardugal, o itti nganyaandi hakkune Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, o hawri ɓe, o waɗi sewre worre. O wartiri potal hakkune maɓɓe he Alla.
49002017	Almasiihu wari waajaade on habaru mo jam, onon ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, ɓurɓe woɗɗaade Alla. O wari waajaade duu Yahudankooɓe ɓadiiɓe Alla.
49002018	Daliila Almasiihu waɗi Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe fuu keɓi laawol darowaade yeeso Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen nder balla Ruuhu gooto.
49002019	Ndenne, onon ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, on kanaa weerɓe, himɓe ƴuwɓe to gom. Amma hannden on ɓiɓɓe leydi, jeyaaɓe Alla, wonduɓe he suɓaaɓe makko.
49002020	On nyiɓaama dow diidol ngol lilaaɓe he annabiiɓe ndiidi. Iisa Almasiihu he hoore mum woni bonjariyal nyibdi ndiin.
49002021	Kanko duu, o waɗi ndi fuu ndi nanngodiri faa ndi toowi, ndi laatii Juulirde mawne, seniine waɗanaade Joomiraawo.
49002022	Nder kawtal mooɗon he makko, on ngattidaama onon he ɓeeto nder nyibdi ndiin heɓa ndi laatoo Juulirde mawne to Ruuhu Alla jooɗii.
49003001	Ngam majjum waɗi miin Pol, uddaaɗo daliila golle ɗe Iisa Almasiihu halfini kam hakkune mooɗon ngam nafude on, onon ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, miɗo yetta Alla ngam mooɗon.
49003002	Sikka fuu walaa on nani habaru golle ɗe Alla nder moƴƴere mum halfini kam ngam nafude on.
49003003	Alla wannginani kam siri mum cuuɗiiɗo. Mi winndanii on duu seɗɗa dow majjum.
49003004	Nde nii on njanngi ɗum, on paaman ko miɗo anndi siri mo o waɗirta har Almasiihu.
49003005	Nder jamanuuji bittiiɗi, siri oo haalanaaka ɓiɓɓe aadama. Amma joonin kay Alla watti Ruuhu mum wanngini mo yahde he lilaaɓe mum seniiɓe. O wannginaama yahde he annabiiɓe makko seniiɓe.
49003006	Ndaa siri oo nii : Har Habaru lobbo oon, Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe kawta moƴƴere nde Alla resani himɓe mum, ɓe laatii sewre worre, ɓe keɓii fodoore nde Alla waɗi daliila Iisa Almasiihu.
49003007	Habaru lobbo oo waɗi laatiimi gollanoowo Alla. Ɗum duu woni moƴƴere nde Alla hokki kam nder moƴƴuki mum he har baawɗe mum.
49003008	Baa nii ko miin ɓuri famɗude nder himɓe Alla, miin Alla suɓii, hokki teddungal waajaade hakkune ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe barke ɗe limtataako tawaaɗe nder Habaru lobbo, habaru dow Almasiihu.
49003009	Alla hokkii kam duu baawɗe hollude neɗɗo fuu faa laaɓa tar noy o humniri siri oo. Alla, taguɗo huune fuu he hoore mum, suuɗi siri oo illa fil'ajal.
49003010	Ndenne jooni, daliila hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa Almasiihu, laamu fuu naa baawɗe fuu tawaaɗe hakkune beɗi kammu waawan faamude ko Alla no jom hikmaaku. Hikmaaku nguu duu, omo holla ngu nder laabi re'ataa
49003011	hano no o siryori ɗum illa fil'ajal. Siri oo, o humnii ɗum har Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
49003012	Kawtal meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu e goonɗinde mo hokki en laawol ɓadaade Alla nder hoolaare mawne.
49003013	Ndenne, to torraaji ɗi ngonmi miɗo yara daliila mooɗon waɗu coƴƴoroɗon gaɗa ngam yahde yeeso ɗi ɓeydaari mooɗon.
49003014	Torraaji am no ɓeydaari mooɗon, waɗi miɗo hofano Baabiraawo,
49003015	ɗaɗol lenyi gonɗi dow he ley fuu.
49003016	Mi eelii mo kanko jom teddungal manngal, nder baawɗe Ruuhu makko, o semmbinɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon.
49003017	Mi eelii Alla, waɗa Almasiihu wara jooɗoo nder ɓerɗe mooɗon ngam goonɗinol mooɗon. Mi eelii mo duu o sinnga hidde mawne hakkune mooɗon,
49003018	heɓa onon he himɓe Alla fuu paamon noy hidde Almasiihu mawniri, noy nde luggiɗiri he no nde yaajiri faa nde walaa keerol.
49003019	Miɗo hiɗi duu anndon hidde Almasiihu no ɓuri to hakkillo neɗɗo waawi nanngude ngam jikku Alla heewa on kap.
49003020	Teddungal laatanoo Alla, mo baawɗe mum no ɓuri to hakkillo neɗɗo waawi nanngude ɗum. Alla mo har baawɗe mum gonɗe nder meeɗen, no waɗa kujje ɓurɗe ko eeluɗen ɗum.
49003021	Teddungal laatanoo mo daliila Iisa Almasiihu, daliila hawriine goonɗinɓe, nder jamanuuji fuu faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
49004001	Miin Pol, uddaaɗo ngam golle Joomiraawo, mi eeli on mbuuron mbuurnam njaadoojam he noddol ngol Alla noddi on.
49004002	Mi eeli tawdeɗon leesinaaku, ɓerne fewne, munyal he hidde walloore on ngiɗodiron.
49004003	Ndurwee njogoɗon potal ngal Ruuhu Alla hokki on, daliila hakkillo fukkiiŋo wonngo hakkune mooɗon.
49004004	On terɗe ɓanndu worru, Ruuhu gooto duu woni no ɗowa on. Tammude nde Alla noddani on duu no worre.
49004005	Joomiraawo gooto woodi, goonɗinol gootol woodi, gaɗol batisma duu no gootol.
49004006	Alla no gooto, kanko woni Baaba himɓe fuu, laamiiɗo huune fuu, gonɗo nder ɓerne neɗɗo meeɗen fuu, golliroowo neɗɗo fuu.
49004007	Neɗɗo meeɗen fuu heɓii moƴƴere Alla ndee, dey-dey no Almasiihu hokkiri joomum,
49004008	hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Wakkati o ƴenci dow, o jaalii wayɓe makko, o waɗi ɓe maccuɓe, o waɗani himɓe kokke.
49004009	Ndenne, ɗume woni maana « o ƴenci dow » ? Maana majjum woni, Almasiihu jippake, wari nder duuniyaaru.
49004010	Jippinooɗo oon, kam duu ƴeenyi faa hewti beɗi kammu fuu, ngam hebbina huune fuu.
49004011	Jippinooɗo oon duu suɓii woɓɓe, waɗi lilaaɓe, woɓɓe duu o waɗi ɗum'en annabiiɓe. O waɗi woɓɓe baajotooɓe, woɓɓe o waɗi ɗum'en paster'en, woɓɓe duu jannginooɓe.
49004012	O waɗi ɗum ngam siryaade himɓe Alla golla golle makko heɓa tokkuɓe mo cemmbiɗaa.
49004013	Enen duu, laatoɗen daane worre nder goonɗinol meeɗen he nder anndal Ɓii-Alla. Laatoɗen mawɓe ko'e meeɗen, ndaroɗen darne worre hano Almasiihu.
49004014	Ɗum waɗaama heɓa to en ngartu hano sukaaɓe hiileteeɓe, naa hano laana ka benkeƴƴe njaarata to ngiɗi fuu. En accataa jannginooɓe fewre gom ngara mbaylita ɓerɗe meeɗen, ƴoyna en itta en dow laawol goonɗinol meeɗen.
49004015	Nde nii eɗen kaalana himɓe goonga nder kollol hidde, en ɓuran ɓadaade Almasiihu. En ngartan aahiiɓe ɓennduɓe nder goonɗinol mum'en yeeso Almasiihu, hooreejo goonɗinɓe fuu.
49004016	Daliila makko waɗi hawriine goonɗinɓe kappa kuula mum nanngodiri, laatii hano ɓanndu worru. Nde nii terɗe ɓanndu fuu no nanngodiri, no ngolla no haaniri. Too, ɓanndu nduun fuu semmbiɗan, nyiɓo nder hidde.
49004017	Too, ko eelanmi on woni : Ngam barke Joomiraawo, to nyemminee ɓe anndaa Alla. Himɓe sinnguɓe mbuurnam mum'en dow miilooji ko'e mum'en ɗi he meere fuu no go'o.
49004018	Yoora ɓernaaku he rafi anndal maɓɓe waɗi ɓerɗe maɓɓe mbumi, ɓe kakkitaa he mbuurnam ɗam Alla hokkata neɗɗo.
49004019	Ɓe cemtataa, ɓe naatii faa noy walaa nder waɗude ko nyiddinii, ɓe naatii suuno he ko nanndititta he mum.
49004020	Amma onon, hanaa ɗum woni ko njannginaɗon dow Almasiihu.
49004021	On nani habaru Iisa Almasiihu. On ekkintinaama no haaniri ngaɗon mbuurnam mooɗon dey-dey he goonga gonɗo no jannginee dow makko.
49004022	Ndenne, oɗon kaani mboppon jikku mooɗon kinngu, kewngu majjere, jikku ndimoongu mursere.
49004023	Accon Ruuhu Alla heyɗintina hakkillooji mooɗon,
49004024	ɓorna on neɗɗaaku kesu ngu Alla waɗi nder nanndi mum. Neɗɗaaku kesu ngu o mahi nder dartinaaku he senaare ƴuwne he goonga.
49004025	Ndenne, celee fewre, neɗɗo fuu to fenan gondo mum, ngam en fuu en terɗe ɓanndu worru.
49004026	Nde ɓerne mooɗon ummake, to ngaɗee hakke.To naange yanu tawa nde jippaaki.
49004027	To accee Ibiliisa heɓa laawol he mooɗon.
49004028	Gujjo woɗɗoo guyka, gollira semmbe mum ngam wuurda no haaniri, heɓa kam duu ko walliri talkaaɓe.
49004029	To haala mbonka fuu wurto nder kunndule mooɗon. Kaalee ko wooɗi tan, ko nafata, ko semmbinɗinta neɗɗo, ko rimanta wonɓe no ndeki gite dow mooɗon, moƴƴere.
49004030	To mettinee ɓerne Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, haatimiire nde Alla fiyi dow mooɗon. Ruuhu mo Alla watti dow mooɗon ngam hollude ko nyannde darŋal kam jeyii on, o hisina on.
49004031	Accee yaawa ɓernaaku fuu, ittee borondi fuu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, gaabaaki, habdo, jennodirol, he gollal bonngal fuu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
49004032	Moƴƴinodiree hakkune mooɗon, njurmodiron, njaafonodiron hano no Alla yaafori on daliila kawtal mooɗon he Almasiihu.
49005001	Nder ko ngatton fuu nyemminee Alla ngam joonin on ɓiɓɓe makko horsuɓe.
