49005002	Tokkee laawol hidde hano no Almasiihu hiɗiri en faa mursi yonki mum ngam meeɗen. O waɗi hoore makko hadiya he sadaka urɗo belɗo Alla.
49005003	On himɓe Alla, ndenne haanaa jeenu, ko nyiddinii, naa suuno tawee baa seɗɗa he mooɗon, ngam kujje ɗee njaadataa he senaaku.
49005004	Haanaa haalaaji puuyɗi, haalaaji ɗi ngalaa hoore, naa haalaaji nyiddiniiɗi tawee hakkune mooɗon. Amma ko haani woni njetton Alla.
49005005	Sikka fuu walaa, jeenoowo naa gaɗoowo golle nyidduɗe naa cuunaaɗo suuno bonngo, paamee ko tabbat ir neɗɗo oo ronataa Laamu Alla he Almasiihu. Guugaaɗo fuu duu naatataa nder maggu, ngam hiɗande hoore mum tan huune, kam duu hano sujidande tooruure non.
49005006	To accee neɗɗo fuu ƴoyna on, majjinira on haalaaji mum belɗi, ngam ir nii he banndum fooɗata tikkere Alla dow tottitiiɓe mo.
49005007	Ndenne, to tokkodiree he ir maɓɓe.
49005008	Ndenno nder nimre ngonnoɗon, amma hannden daliila kawtal mooɗon he Joomiraawo, oɗon nder jeyngol. Ndenne sey njooɗoɗon jonnde wonɓe nder jeyngol.
49005009	Mi haalani on ɗum ngam jeyngol rimataana waɗude moƴƴere, dartinaaku e goonga.
49005010	Ndurwee paamon ko welata Joomiraawo.
49005011	To ngattee juuɗe mooɗon nder golle jaayɗe, golle gatteeɗe nder nimre, golle ɗe ngalaa fuu nafakka gom. Amma ko haani woni kollon ko ɓe ngaɗata ɗum wooɗaa baa isilam.
49005012	Ko woni no waɗee nder cuccukka, ɗum no semtini baa haaleede.
49005013	Amma wakkati huune fuu waddaa nder jeyngol anniya maɓɓe no foti fuu no anndetee.
49005014	Jeyngol no holla huune fuu, ngam majjum waɗi wi'aa : « Finu ! Aan ɗaaniiɗo. Aan maayɗo, ummita. Jeyngol Almasiihu wannginoyte. »
49005015	Ndenne, paamee no njooɗortoɗon hakkune himɓe, to on ngaɗee ko'e mooɗon ɓe ngalaa hakkillo amma laatee jom'en hikmaaku.
49005016	Wakkati fuu mo mbaawɗon waɗude ko wooɗi, ndurwee ngaɗee ɗum, ngam nder jamaanu bonɗo ngonɗen.
49005017	Ndenne to ngartee loɓi, amma ndurwee paamon muuyɗe Joomiraawo.
49005018	Celee jarɗe cabiijam faa ko'e mooɗon copto, ngam iɗam watta neɗɗo waɗa ko ummanaaki, amma accee Alla heewnira on he Ruuhu mum.
49005019	Cemmbinɗinodiree hakkune mooɗon he jimi Jabuura, jimi teddinooji Alla naa jimol fuu ngol Alla watti nder ɓerɗe mooɗon. Njimanon Joomiraawo, njetton mo he ɓerɗe mooɗon fuu.
49005020	Wakkati fuu njetton Alla Baaba meeɗen ngam huune fuu, dow innde Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
49005021	Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu ɗowtanoo banndum ngam sabbu teddungal Almasiihu gonngal to mooɗon.
49005022	Onon rewɓe, ɗowtanoɗon goriraaɓe mooɗon hano no ɗowtirantoɗon Joomiraawo.
49005023	Ngam gorko woni hooreejo deekum hano no Almasiihu woniri hooreejo hawriine goonɗinɓe ɗum. Hawriine goonɗinɓe mo woni ɓanndu makko, kanko duu woni kisinoowo maɓɓe.
49005024	Rewɓe no kaani ɗowtanaade goriraaɓe mum'en nder huune fuu hano no hawriine goonɗinɓe ɗowtiranto Almasiihu.
49005025	Onon worɓe, ngiɗee deekiraaɓe mooɗon no Almasiihu hiɗiri hawriine goonɗinɓe mum, faa mursi yonki mum ngam maɓɓe.
49005026	O lamnirii ɓe ndiyam he haala makko ngam wartirde ɓe himɓe Alla.
49005027	Almasiihu waɗii ɗum ngam darnude hawriine goonɗinɓe ɗum yeeso mum, hawriine nde no wondi teddungal, nde walaa fuu to jancirtee, naa ko welaa fuu gom hi'ataake he mayre. O waɗii ɗum ngam nde warta seniine, nde walaa fuu feloore gom.
49005028	Nii gorko haani hiɗira deekum. O hiɗaa mo no o hiɗiri ɓanndu makko. Neɗɗo fuu hiɗi deekum, hoore mum hiɗi.
49005029	Walaa banyoowo ɓanndu mum, amma sey hakkiloo he mayru, nyawta ndu. Joomum watta hakkillo mum fuu he mayru hano no Almasiihu hakkiliri hawriine goonɗinɓe ɗum,
49005030	ngam en fuu, en goonɗinɓe mo, en terɗe ɓanndu makko.
49005031	Hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : Gorko accan innum he bammum, nanngondira he deekum, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe laatoo ɓanndu worru.
49005032	Nder ko winndaa wi'aa ɗo, kippol haala mawka waɗa ɗon. Miin, miɗo wi'a ko no Almasiihu he hawriine goonɗinɓe ɗum ngorri hippa ɗon.
49005033	Dey haala kaa, ika daara on, onon duu. Ndenne neɗɗo mooɗon fuu, hiɗa deekum no hiɗiri hoore mum. Debbo fuu duu teddina gorum.
49006001	Onon sukaaɓe, ngam barke Joomiraawo, ɗowtanee saarooɓe mooɗon ngam kanƴum woni ko haani.
49006002	Teddin inna maa he bammaa.Tilsinoore ndee woni tilsinoore arandeere feŋodiraade he fodoore.
49006003	Fodoore ndee woni : Nana belɗum, ngaɗaa sabbuŋo junngo.
49006004	Aan baaba, to uppu ɓiɓɓe maaɗa murta. Eltu ɓe, njannginaa ɓe dow laawol Joomiraawo.
49006005	Onon maccuɓe, ɗowtanee joomiraaɓe mooɗon. Kulee ɓe, teddinee ɓe he ɓerne worre hano no teddinirton Almasiihu.
49006006	Ɗowtanee ɓe, hanaa ngam oɗon ley gite maɓɓe, hanaa duu ngam ɓe njetta on. Amma ɗowtanee ɓe he ɓerne worre hano no Alla hiɗiri maccuɓe Almasiihu ngaɗa.
49006007	Ngolliranee ɓe anniya lobbo hano Joomiraawo ngollanton, hanaa ɓiɓɓe aadama ngollanton.
49006008	Oɗon anndi neɗɗo fuu golli ko wooɗi, nde joomum no dimo naa joomum no maccuɗo, Joomiraawo yoɓan ɗum dey-dey golle mum.
49006009	Onon marɓe maccuɓe, onon duu no tilsi ngaɗanon maccuɓe mooɗon ko ɓe kaani waɗaneede. To mbi'ee on piyan ɓe, ngam oɗon anndi ko mawɗo gooto ngooduɗon gonɗo dow, mo walaa fuu hedran-hedran.
49006010	Banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe, walaa ko hoddi se hanaa wi'ude cemmbiɗon nder kawtal mooɗon he Joomiraawo, tuugoɗon dow baawɗe makko.
49006011	Njogoɗon kaɓorɗe fuu ɗe Alla hokki on, heɓa tittinkinoɗon, njaaloɗon Ibiliisa he dabareeji mum.
49006012	Hanaa tagaaɓe kabdeten, amma ko kabdeten ɗum woni seyɗaniiji bonɗi gonɗi hakkune beɗi kammu, gooduɗi baawɗe e laamu nder duuniyaaru, duuniyaaru ndu jamaanu nimre.
49006013	Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo wi'a on kooƴon kaɓorɗe fuu ɗe Alla hokki on, heɓa tittinkinoɗon, ndurwon ngam nyannde fuu nyalaane sattune ndeen wari, taweɗon oɗon ndarii, oɗon njogii kaɓorɗe mooɗon fuu.
49006014	Ndenne, ummee ndaree, tunndoɗon goonga, ɓornoɗon dartinaaku hano toggoore mooɗon njamndi.
49006015	Ɓornee anniya waajaade Habaru lobbo, habaru dow Iisa Almasiihu gaddoowo jam hano paɗe mooɗon.
49006016	Nder ko tawaɗon fuu njogee goonɗinol mooɗon kam duu hano wawaade. Wawaade nde mbaawirton taɓɓoraade kure hiite ɗe Seyɗan fiɗɗirta on.
49006017	Adee kisinam hano hufuneere njamndi, njogee haala Alla duu hano takubaahi ki Ruuhu Alla hokki on.
49006018	To comee du'aade, ndu'ee, eelon Alla hano no Ruuhu makko holliri on. Tittinkinee nder du'aa'u, to njeggitee du'anaade himɓe Alla.
49006019	Miin duu, ndu'anee kam Alla hokka kam hikmaaku mi heɓa cuusal haalude sirri tawaaɗo nder Habaru lobbo, habaru Iisa Almasiihu.
49006020	Baa nii ko miɗo faddaa nder kasu, miɗo faasano Habaru lobbo oon. Ndu'anee kam ngam mi waajoroo mo cuusal, hano no ɗum tilsiniraa dow am.
49006021	Tikikus, banndii'en korsuɗo, gollanoowo Joomiraawo he holnaare, humpitan on dow no ngontirmi fuu.
49006022	Mi lilii mo he mooɗon o haalana on no min ngorri, o semmbinɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon.
49006023	Banndiraaɓe, Alla Baaba meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen kokka on jam, hidde, he goonɗinol.
49006024	Moƴƴere Alla laatanoo woodanɓe Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen fuu hidde nde timmataa.
50001001	Miin Pol e Timote, minen maccuɓe Iisa Almasiihu, mbinndani on, onon hawriine goonɗinɓe huɓeere Filipi. Miɗen canna on, onon ardiiɓe e wallooɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe. Miɗen canna on, on fuu, seniiɓe jeyaaɓe Iisa Almasiihu.
50001002	Alla Baabiraawo men e Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo men hokka on jam e moƴƴere.
50001003	Miɗo yetta Alla am wakkati fuu nde miccitiimi on.
50001004	Wakkati fuu mo ngaɗananmi on du'aa'u, on fuu, he welwelo ngaɗiranmi ɗum,
50001005	ngam on mballii kam sankitidde Habaru lobbo nder duuniyaaru, illa nyanndere arandere nde nanuɗon mo faa hannden.
50001006	Mi tabbintinii ko Alla puɗɗuɗo golle lobbe nder mooɗon, tinnotoo no waɗa ɗe faa ɗe kuuɓa nder nyalaane nde Iisa Almasiihu wartoyta.
50001007	No haani mi miilanoo on, on fuu, ir miilooji ɗii ngam mi wattii on nder ɓerne am. On fuu on naatii nder moƴƴere nde Alla hokki kam, wakkati uddaami naa wakkati noddaami ngam heedannde Habaru lobbo naa ngam tabbinɗinde mo.
50001008	Alla no seedii ko miɗo hiɗiri on, on fuu, he yurmeene Iisa Almasiihu mawne.
50001009	Wakkati ndu'otoomi fuu, miɗo ƴama Alla ɓeyda hidde mooɗon, nde ɓeydoroo nder anndal e paamal lobbal
50001010	ngam mbaawon senndirde no laaɓiri goonga e fewre cuɓoɗon ko wooɗi sanne. Ndenne, on laatoto laaɓuɓe ɓe ngalaa feloore nder nyalaane nde Almasiihu wartoyta,
50001011	hebbinaa on golleeji dartiiɗi ƴuwɗi to Iisa Almasiihu, ngam Alla teddinee, yettee.
50001012	Banndiraaɓe am, miɗo hiɗi paamon ko torra ka ngonmi nder mum kaa yaarii Habaru lobbo yeeso.
50001013	Ngam hakkiltooɓe kasu ɓeen fuu e himɓe nokkuuje ɗuɗɗe no anndi ko mi uddaama ngam goonɗinol am nder Almasiihu.
50001014	Uddol am ngool waɗi ko ɗuɓɓe nder banndiraaɓe am duu ɓeydi hoolaade Joomiraawo. Ɓe kulataa kaden, amma he cuusal ɓe kaalirta haala Alla.
50001015	Goonga non, ko woɓɓe no mbaajoroo habaru Almasiihu oon he kirodirol e pooɗodirol, amma woɓɓe no ngaɗira ɗum he anniyaaji lobbi.
50001016	Iɓe ngollira hidde ngam iɓe anndi Alla halfini kam hakkilanaade Habaru lobbo oon.
50001017	Amma ɓeeto no mbaajoo habaru Almasiihu he pooɗodirol, anniyaaji maɓɓe duu laaɓaa, ko ɓe miilotoo kaden, kam woni ɓeydude torra am nder uddol am ngool.
50001018	Ɗum kay bonnataa baafuy ! Ko hennon fuu, se nii ɗum laatake fewre naa goonga, nde habaru Almasiihu waajaama, miɗo nana belɗum. Goonga non, mi nanan belɗum kaden,
50001019	ngam miɗo anndi ko nder torraaji ɗii fuu, ko waɗi fuu, ɗi ndimanan kam kisinam daliila du'aa'uuji mooɗon e balla Ruuhu ƴuwɗo to Iisa Almasiihu.
50001020	Ngam majjum, ko ngiɗumi sanne e ko ndekumi gokka dow mum woni mi semtataa dow baafuy. Amma miɗo hoolii sanne mi teddina Almasiihu nder am illa jooni faa abada, mbuurmi naa maaymi.
50001021	Ngam he giiɗe am, Almasiihu woni mbuurnam am, maayde am duu no riiba.
50001022	Amma mbuurnam am nder duuniyaaru no ɓeydanan kam waɗude golle nafooje. Ndenne, mi anndaa ko cuɓotoomi.
50001023	Hakkillo am senndake ɗiɗi, miin kay ko ɓurmi hiɗude woni mi yaha mi jooɗidowoo he Almasiihu, ɗum jaati ɓuri wooɗude.
50001024	Amma ngam naforoɗon kam mi wuura nder duuniyaaru ɓurani on.
50001025	Mi tabbintinii ko mi jooɗoto mi wonda he mooɗon, on fuu, ngam ɓeydon yahde yeeso he welwelo nder goonɗinol mooɗon
50001026	faa gartol am hakkune mooɗon ɓeydana on teddinde Iisa Almasiihu ngam am.
50001027	Onon, ko waɗi fuu, mbuuree nder Habaru lobbo, filla Iisa Almasiihu he ndimaaku ngam se mi warii tuntaade on naa se mi waraay, mi nana habaru mooɗon, mi annda oɗon ngondi he anniya gooto ndaroɗon kabdon he ɓerne worre ngam goonɗinol Habaru lobbo.
50001028	To on accee wayɓe mooɗon kulƴina on dow huune fuu. To maɓɓe ɗum laatoto alaama halkere, amma onon, ɗum laatanto on alaama kisinam mooɗon. Ɗum fuu ƴuwi to Alla.
50001029	Ngam har ko daarata Almasiihu, Alla hokki on moƴƴere, hanaa ngam ngoonɗinon mo tan amma ngam torroɗon sabu makko duu.
50001030	On naatii nder habdo ngo ngi'unoɗon miɗo waɗa e ngo nanuɗon miɗo haɓee dow mum faa jooni.
50002001	Se oɗon ngoodi semmbe ngam Iisa Almasiihu, e cemmbinɗinol nder hidde Alla, se oɗon ngoodi kawtal he Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, se oɗon ngoodi yurmeene e moƴƴere.
50002002	Nden kam, kuumnee welwelo am heɓa kawton nder jonnde mooɗon : Njoddee hidde worre e ɓerne worre e daane worre.
50002003	To on ngaɗee baafuy he pooɗodirol naa mawnitaare, amma nder leesinaaku adee neɗɗo fuu no ɓuri on.
50002004	To gooto mooɗon tefu ko nafata ɗum kam tan, amma tefa ko nafata woɓɓe duu.
50002005	Njogee nder mooɗon miiloo ngo Iisa Almasiihu woodunoo :
50002006	Baa ko omo nder nanndi Alla, o miilaay fonndude hoore makko he Alla hano ko o haani teetude.
50002007	Dey o adi hoore makko hano baafuy, o nanndinii hoore makko maccuɗo, o laatii hano tagaaɓe, o annditaama hano neɗɗo hakkune himɓe.
50002008	O leyni hoore makko, o tokki Alla faa o maayi, maayde dow bardugal.
50002009	Ngam majjum Alla mawnini mo sanne, hokki mo duu innde ɓurne inɗe fuu,
50002010	ngam innde Iisa howru fuu no hofoto yeeso makko nde nder kammu non, nde dow leydi non naa nde hakkune maayɓe non,
50002011	heɓa ɗemngal fuu seedoo ko Iisa Almasiihu woni Joomiraawo, ngam Alla Baabiraawo men teddinee.
50002012	Noon, giɗaaɓe am, nde ngondunoomi he mooɗon, oɗon tokki kam wakkati fuu. Baa jooni ko mboɗɗiimi on duu, tokkee. Tinnee nder golle ngam kisinam mooɗon. Tittinkinee nder waɗude mbuurnam lobbam nder kulal Alla manngal
50002013	ngam Alla no golla nder ɓerɗe mooɗon ngam ngiɗon, ngaɗon ko weli mo.
50002014	Ko ngaɗoton fuu, to ngaɗiree ɗum nguntaaki naa jeddodirol,
50002015	heɓa laatoɗon laaɓuɓe ɓe ngalaa feloore, laatoɗon ɓiɓɓe Alla ɓe ngalaa gacce hakkune himɓe jamaanu oonyiiɗo e bonɗo. On njaynan hakkune maɓɓe hano no koode njaynirta nder kammu nii
50002016	njogoɗon haala mbuurnam no wooɗiri. Nden on laatoto hollooɓe welwelo am nyalaane nde Almasiihu wartoyta ngam golle am e tampiri am to laatoo ko nafataa.
50002017	Baa se ƴiiƴam am rufaama hano cakkol ngol ngaɗanmi on to Alla ngam goonɗinol mooɗon yaha yeeso, mi nandan belɗum he mooɗon, on fuu.
50002018	Onon duu, naniree belɗum hano non, nanidee belɗum he am.
50002019	Se nii Joomiraawo men Iisa jaɓi, mi lildanan on Timote nder wakkati seɗɗa heɓa nde nanumi habaruuji mooɗon, miin e hoore am, ɗum semmbinɗinan ɓerne am.
50002020	Ngam kanko tan wallata kam miilaade dow miilooji am e miilooji mon.
50002021	Hoddiiɓe fuu ko'e mum'en tan miilantoo, hanaa Iisa Almasiihu.
50002022	Amma oɗon anndi ko Timote hollii dartinaaku mum. Ɗum waɗi o walli kam waajaade Habaru lobbo hano no ɓiɗɗo wallirta baaba mum nii.
50002023	Kanko ngiɗumi lilude wakkati paamumi no jonnde am laatoto ɗo.
50002024	Miɗo hoolii ko Joomiraawo hokkan kam laawol, miin e hoore am, mi wara to mooɗon nder wakkati seɗɗa.
50002025	Mi miili no haani mi lildana on banndii'en Epaforoditus, gollidoowo am. O wallii kam nder habdo ngam sankitidde Habaru lobbo nder duuniyaaru. Kanko woni mo lilunoɗon faa waddana kam ko humtataa haajuuji am.
50002026	On fuu, omo beeganoo hi'ude on, o wemmbaama jaati ko o faami oon nanii o yamɗaa.
50002027	Goonga non, o nyawiino faa o hosi maayde. Amma Alla yurmake mo, hanaa kanko tan, miin duu Alla yurmake kam, ngam to mi heɓu mettal ɓerne dow mettal ɓerne.
50002028	Ɗum waɗi miɗo hari faa mi lila mo to mooɗon, ngam nanon belɗum se on ngi'ii mo, miin duu mettal ɓerne am no ɓuytoto.
50002029	Ndenne, njaɓɓoree mo he welwelo hano no wonduɓe he Joomiraawo njaɓɓitortee nii. Teddinee ir himɓe ɓee
50002030	ngam golle Almasiihu ɗee waɗi o hosi maayde. O hokkitiri yonki makko faa o waddana kam balla mo on mbaawtaa waddande kam ngam on ngondaa he am.
50003001	Ndenne, banndiraaɓe am, mbelnee ngam oɗon ngondi he Joomiraawo. Ɗum tampintaa kam baa seɗɗa mi winnditano on kujje ɗee, ngam kanƴe kokkata on hoolaare.
50003002	Kakkilee e dawaaɗi, kam woni gollooɓe ko mboni, iɓe tilsina himɓe njuulnee ngam iɓe miila kanƴum hisinta en.
50003003	Ngam enen ngoni juulnaaɓe goonga e goonga, enen rewuɓe Alla he Ruuhu muuɗum, eɗen teddina Iisa Almasiihu, en ngattaay hoolaare meeɗen dow ko'e men.
50003004	Miin kay, miɗo waawunoo dekude hoolaare dow am. Se woɓɓe miilii ko kam'en no mbaawi dekude hoolaare dow ko'e mum'en, miin, miɗo ɓuri ɓe waawude ɗum.
50003005	Ngam mi juulnaama illa he nyanndere am jeetataɓere, mi Isra'ilanke ƴuwɗo e lenyol Benyamin, mi Ibranke ɓii-Ibranke. Har ko daarta Tawreeta Muusa miɗo jeydaa e Fariisa'en,
50003006	har ko daarta hiraane diina, mi torriino goonɗinɓe Iisa, har ko daarta dartinaaku, baa gooto waawaano yinngude kam ngam miɗo foccitanii Tawreeta.
50003007	Amma ko ndaarannomi riiba fuu, joonin mi adi ɗum hano ɓolum ngam Almasiihu.
50003008	Goonga mi adi ɗum fuu no ɓolum, ngam anndude Joomiraawo am Iisa Almasiihu no ɓurani kam kujje ɗee fuu. Ngam makko waɗi mboppumi ko njoginoomi fuu, miɗo daara huune fuu hano buudi ngam Iisa Almasiihu no laatanoo kam riiba.
50003009	Ko ngiɗumi kam woni mi wonda he makko, hanaa ngam dartinaaku am ƴuwngu he Tawreeta, amma ngam dartinaaku ƴuwngu nder goonɗinde Almasiihu, dartinaaku ngu Alla hokki goonɗinɓe ɗum.
50003010	Ko ngiɗumi woni anndude Almasiihu, e faamude baawɗe ɗe Alla ummintiniri mo, mi hawta e makko torraaji, mi nannda he makko maayde
50003011	ngam miin duu, se Alla jaɓi, mi heɓa ummintineede hakkune maayɓe nyannde darŋal.
50003012	Mi wi'aay ko mi yottake keerol durwo am, mi wi'aay duu ko mi laatake mo walaa feloore, amma miɗo wondi he doggudu hano no himɓe daɗodirta nii faa mi heɓa mi nannga ɗum hano no Iisa Almasiihu nanngirnoo kam nii.
50003013	Aa'a, banndiraaɓe am, mi wi'aay ko mi heewtake ɗum. Amma ko ngaɗanmi nii : Miɗo yeggita ko witti fuu, miɗo fooɗanoo ko warata.
50003014	Miɗo doggira har keerol ngool faa mi heɓa njobdi ndi Alla Toowɗo noddi kam faa mi heɓa nder kawtal e Iisa Almasiihu.
50003015	En fuu laatiiɓe ɓennduɓe nder goonɗinol, ir miilooji ɗii haani ardoo en, dey se woɓɓe njeddodiri dow goɗɗum, Alla no lamnanan ɓe ɗum.
50003016	Amma no wa'i fuu, tinnoɗen eɗen tokka laawol ngool hano no tokkirnoɗen ngol faa jooni.
50003017	Banndiraaɓe am, ngaɗee hano no ngaɗumi nii, ƴeewee ekkitee mbuuron hano no min mbuurdunoo hakkune mon nii.
50003018	Ngam ɗuɓɓe no mbuuri hano wayɓe bardugal Almasiihu. Mi haalanii on ɗum kile ɗuɗɗe, mi haaliranan on ɗum jooni duu e gonɗi.
50003019	Timmorde maɓɓe woni halkere, deeɗi maɓɓe ngoni reweteeɓe maɓɓe, ko haani semtinde ɓe woni ko ɓe nyaaƴirta, kujje duuniyaaru tan ngoni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
50003020	Amma enen, wuro meeɗen woni nder kammu, eɗen ndoomi Kisinoowo meeɗen ƴuwoowo ton oon, kanko woni Joomiraawo meeɗen Iisa Almasiihu.
50003021	Kanko, o waylitowan ɓalli meeɗen tampuɗi ɗii, ɗi laatoo hano ɓanndu makko ndu teddungal nduun, ngam omo woodi baawɗe gaɗooje huune fuu hofo yeeso makko.
50004001	Ngam majjum banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗumi, on njewnii kam sanne. Onon laatiiɓe welwelo am e lefol am, onon ɓe piiranmi gabaare. Hano nii, giɗaaɓe am, tiiɗee no wooɗiri nder tokkol Joomiraawo.
50004002	Mi ŋaarake Ewodi e Sintis laatoo daane worre ngam Joomiraawo.
50004003	Aan Sinsigis, gollidoowo am kolniiɗo oo duu, mi ƴamii maa mballaa rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓee, ngam ɓe mballii kam nder habdo waaju Habaru lobbo, kamɓe, Keleman e gollidooɓe am gom, ɓe inɗe mum'en mbinndaa nder dewtere mbuurnam.
50004004	Wakkati fuu mbelnee ngam Joomiraawo. Miɗo wi'a kaden, mbelnee ngam makko !
50004005	Himɓe fuu annda peewirka ɓerɗe mooɗon. Gartol Joomiraawo no ɓadii.
50004006	To on cuulee dow huune fuu, amma ko hennon fuu anndinee Alla haajuuji mon fuu nder du'aa'u, ngaɗiree ɗum e yettoore duu.
50004007	Nden Alla no hokka on jam ɓurɗo faama tagaaɓe fuu, jam oo no jogoto ɓerɗe mooɗon e miilooji mooɗon ngam on ngondii he Iisa Almasiihu.
50004008	Banndiraaɓe am, joonkay, miilooji mon tiiɗa e ko laatii goonga fuu, ko rimɗi fuu, ko dartii fuu, ko laaɓi fuu, ko haani hiɗeede e ko foti yetteede. Miilee dow ko wooɗi e ko heewi teddungal fuu.
50004009	Ngolliree ko ekkitiɗon to am e ko keɓuɗon to am, ko narruɗon kam e ko ngiiruɗon kam. Se on ngaɗii non, Alla mo jam wondan he mooɗon.
50004010	Ɓerne am no weli sanne ngam Joomiraawo. Jooni on keyɗintinii miilooji mooɗon har am. Baa ko wakkati mum duu, miilooji mooɗon no ngonnoo e am, amma on keɓaayno wakkati hollude kam ɗum.
50004011	Hanaa goɗɗum kaajaa mi waɗi kaalumi ɗum, amma mi arti mi ekkitake heƴude hoore am nder ko ngonmi fuu.
50004012	Miɗo waawi wuurde nder talkaaku naa nder riiku. Wakkati fuu, nokku fuu, mi ekkitake wuurde nder haarande naa nder rafo, nder ɗuuɗal naa nder rafi.
50004013	Miɗo waawi huune fuu ngam Almasiihu cemmbinɗinoowo kam.
50004014	Amma, on ngaɗii ko wooɗi wakkati mballunoɗon kam nder torra am.
50004015	Onon himɓe Filipi, oɗon anndi ko illa wakkati ndiilunoomi leydi Makedoniya, wakkati puɗɗunoɗon nanude Habaru lobbo, walaa hawriine goonɗinɓe wallude kam, hokki kam goɗɗum se hanaa hawriine mooɗon.
50004016	Ngam baa wakkati ngonnoomi wuro Tesalonika duu, on lildii kam ko kaajaami fuu, hanaa nde wootere, hanaa nde ɗiɗi !
50004017	To on miilee ko kokkal ngonmi miɗo tefa e mooɗon. Aa'a. Keɓon riiba ngonmi miɗo tefa.
50004018	Ko lilduɗon Epaforoditus ɗum heƴi, huumtii haajuuji am fuu, ɗum heƴi faa wittake. Kokkal mooɗon ngal laatake uurngol mbelngol hano cakkol lobbol ngol Alla jaɓi nii.
50004019	Alla am huumtiran haajuuji mooɗon fuu he riiku makko manngu ngam Iisa Almasiihu.
50004020	Teddungal laatanoo Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
50004021	Cannee laaɓuɓe jeyaaɓe Iisa Almasiihu fuu. Banndiraaɓe wonduɓe he am ɓeen duu no canna on.
50004022	Laaɓuɓe ɓee fuu no canna on, sako gollooɓe nder hoggo Kaysar, laamiiɗo Rooma.
50004023	Moƴƴere Joomiraawo meeɗen Iisa Almasiihu wonda he mooɗon !
51001001	Miin Pol mo, Alla suɓii waɗi lilaaɗo Iisa Almasiihu he banndii'en Timote mbinndani on ɗerol ngool, onon himɓe Koloosi.
51001002	Miɗen njewta on, onon jeyaaɓe Alla, banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe feŋiiɓe he Almasiihu wonɓe Koloosi. Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen hokka on jam e moƴƴere.
51001003	Miɗen njetta Alla Baaba Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen daliila mooɗon. Miɗen ndu'anoo on wakkati fuu.
51001004	Min keɓii habaru goonɗinol mooɗon dow Iisa Almasiihu. Min keɓii habaru hidde nde ngoodanɗon jeyaaɗo Alla fuu.
51001005	Nde goonga on ngattii tammude he ko o siryanii on dow kammu. Wakkati Habaru lobbo, habaru goonga e goonga warnoo to mooɗon, o anndinii on tammude ndee.
51001006	Habaru lobbo oo no ɗon no waɗa barke. Omo ɗon omo sankitoo nder duuniyaaru fuu, hano no o sankitirnoo hakkune mooɗon wakkati puɗɗuɗon nanude habaru moƴƴere Alla, paamuɗon duu no nde wa'i goonga e goonga.
51001007	Epafaras banndii'en korsuɗo kam waɗani on filla habaru moƴƴere Alla ndee. Minen he makko, min fuu, min gollanooɓe Almasiihu. O kolniiɗo, kanko woni no golla hakkune mooɗon nokku amin.
51001008	O waɗanii min filla hidde himɓe nde Ruuhu Alla watti nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
51001009	Illa wakkati min nanunoo filla kaa, miɗen ndu'anoo on. Miɗen eela Alla, min accataa eelude mo duu ngam mooɗon. Miɗen eela, o holla on dalla-dalla muuyɗe makko ngam keɓon hikmaaku ƴuwngu to Ruuhu Alla, keɓon faamude muuyɗe makko ɗeen duu faa wooɗa.
51001010	Miɗen ndu'anoo on ngam mbuuron no weliri Joomiraawo, ngaɗon ko o hiɗi fuu. Ngaɗon barke nder gollal golle lobbe feere-fereeje, ɓeydon yahde yeeso nder anndol Alla.
51001011	Miɗen eela Alla watta baawɗe mum tedduɗe semmbinɗina on laatoɗon ɓe huune fuu waawaa hepporde ɗum'en, mbaawon munyude huune fuu ko wari he mooɗon.
51001012	Nder welwelo, njetton Alla Baabiraawo gaɗuɗo on fotuɓe heɓude ndonu wonngu nder laamu mum ngu darja, ndonu desanaagu jeyaaɓe mum.
51001013	O soptini en baawɗe gonɗe nder nimre, o nanni en nder laamu Ɓiyiiko korsuɗo
51001014	mo nder sabbu mum ndimɗinaɗen he maccangaaku hakke, hakkeeji meeɗen njaafaa.
51001015	Almasiihu woni nannduɗo Alla mo hi'ataake, afo ɓurɗo huune fuu ko tagaa.
51001016	Ngam har makko huune fuu ko tawaa dow he ley tagaa : Ko hi'etee he ko hi'ataake, maleykaaɓe he ruuhuuji ko woodi baawɗe e laamu. Ko waɗetee fuu, waɗaama har makko he ngam makko.
51001017	Omo ɗon illa huune fuu walaano, har makko duu huune fuu duumoto.
51001018	Kanko woni hoore hawriine goonɗinɓe mo, laatiine ɓanndu makko. Kanko woni wuddu mayre, kanko duu woni arano maayɗo, ummitii, ngam wartude ardiiɗo nder huune fuu.
51001019	Alla muuyi ko woni he mum fuu wona he makko,
51001020	kanko duu waɗi laawol wattude potal hakkune mum he duuniyaaru. Har ƴiiƴam makko ndufaaɗam dow bardugal, Alla waddii potal hakkune mum he ko tawaa dow e ley fuu.
51001021	Ndenno on fuu on woɗɗinooɓe Alla, on wayɓe makko nder ko miilotoɗon he nder golle mooɗon bonɗe.
51001022	Amma joonin har maayde Ɓiyiiko jarɗo torra nder ɓanndu mum, o wartiri potal hakkune mooɗon he makko ngam laatoɗon seniiɓe, ɓe ngalaa fuu laru e ko felirtee yeeso Alla.
51001023	On ngartan jeyaaɓe Alla nde nii on tittinkinake nder goonɗinol mooɗon, ɓerɗe mooɗon cemmbiɗaa. To accee mboɗɗineɗon he tammude mooɗon nde nanuɗon nder Habaru lobbo. Habaru lobbo oo waajaama hakkune duuniyaaru fuu. Habaru lobbo oo miin Pol ngollananmi.
51001024	Jooni miɗo nana belɗum torraaji fuu ɗi njarmi daliila mooɗon. Torraaji am ɗii ngoni torraaji ɗi kawtidinmi Iisa Almasiihu ngam nafude hawriine goonɗinɓe mo fuu, hawriine tinndinoore ɓanndu makko.
51001025	Alla suɓii kam ngam mi laatoo gollanoowo hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa Almasiihu. O suɓake kam ngam mi waajoo Habaru makko lobbo oon fuu hakkune mooɗon.
51001026	Haala kaa, sirri cuuɗanaaɗo jamanuuji re'ataa non illa ko ɓooyi. Amma joonin haala kaa wannginaama ngam jeyaaɓe Alla fuu.
51001027	Ngam ko Alla anniyi woni anndinde ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe moƴƴere wonnde no suuɗi nder sirri oo. Moƴƴere nde sirri oo wondi woni Almasiihu no hakkune mooɗon, kanko hokkata tammude naatude Laamu Alla ngaroowu, ngu teddungal.
51001028	Filla Almasiihu oo min mbaajoo. Miɗen pooɗa hakkillo himɓe, miɗen njanngina ɓe ko Alla anndini min fuu, nder ir hikmaaku fuu ngam waddude neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu yeeso Alla, tawee joomum ɓenndi nder kawtal mum he Almasiihu.
51001029	Golle majjum ndurwananmi keddi semmbe e baawɗe Almasiihu gonɗe no ngolla faa noy walaa nder am.
51002001	Miɗo hiɗi anndon durwo manngo ngo ndurwanmi daliila mooɗon, daliila himɓe Lawdikiya he ɓe ngi'aay kam abada.
51002002	Ko ndurwananmi woni hidde hawra on, ɓerɗe mooɗon cemmbiɗaa, ngam nii watta ko keɓon barke mawɗe keɓeteeɗe har anndal goonga e goonga. Anndon sirri Alla oo, kam woni anndon ko Almasiihu he hoore mum woni sirri oo.
51002003	Kanko Almasiihu oon duu tan woni baawɗo hokkude on hikmaaku e anndal kuuɓungal dow hoore mum.
51002004	Ko waɗi miɗo haalana on ɗum woni to goɗɗo hiilir on haalaaji belɗi.
51002005	Ngam baa nii ko miɗo woɗɗi, hakkillo am no he mooɗon. Miɗo nana belɗum hi'ude narral gonngal hakkune mooɗon, he no peŋoriɗon he goonɗinde Almasiihu.
51002006	Ko nii waɗi on njaɓi Iisa Almasiihu woni Joomiraawo mooɗon, ndenne sey tinnoɗon tokkon mo.
51002007	Tinnee tefee semmbe mooɗon fuu nder kawtal mooɗon he makko, cinngon mbuurnam mooɗon fuu dow makko. Tittinkinoɗon nder goonɗinde mo hano no min ekkintiniri on, njetton Alla wakkati fuu.
51002008	Tinnee to neɗɗo fuu wattu anndal mum feere'al gom hiila on, woɗɗina on laawol goonga. Iri anndal ngaal walaa ko nafirta, nde hanaa majjinde himɓe. Iri anndal ngaal ƴuwaay to Almasiihu, ngal finaa-tawaa himɓe e dabareeji ginni marɗi baawɗe duuniyaaru.
51002009	Ko woni he Alla fuu no hi'ee he Almasiihu.
51002010	Kanko woni hooreejo laamu fuu e baawɗe fuu. Onon duu, nder kawtal mooɗon he makko mbuurnam mooɗon fuu huuɓi.
51002011	Kawtal mooɗon he Almasiihu waɗi njuulneɗon, juulnol ngool hanaa iri ngol neɗɗo waɗataa. Amma juulnol ngool woni ngol Almasiihu waɗani on, juulnol ittoowol giɗaale ɓerne he mooɗon.
51002012	Nder gaɗol batisma mooɗon, hano nii on ufidaama he Almasiihu, on ummitidake he makko ngam on ngoonɗini baawɗe Alla ummintinɗo mo.
51002013	Ndenno on maaynooɓe ngam hakkeeji mooɗon he ngam on kanaa himɓe Alla. Amma joonin Alla wattii mbuurnam mum nder mooɗon har kawtal mooɗon he Almasiihu, o yaafi hakke meeɗen fuu.
51002014	O moyti ko winndaa nder ɗerol kiite tuumooje en ngol, o itti ɗe wakkati Almasiihu tontanoo dow bardugal.
51002015	Dow bardugal ngaal o heɓi jaalorgal dow ginni e baawɗe fuu gonɗe dow e ley. O teeti baawɗe maɓɓe, o semtini ɓe yeeso himɓe fuu.
51002016	Ndenne, to neɗɗo fuu felir on ko nyaamton naa ko njarton. To neɗɗo fuu felu on ngam juulɗe naa daarɗe lewru naa ngam nyalaane fowteteene.
51002017	Kujje ɗee fuu no alamaaji kollooji ko waroyta non, amma Almasiihu woni goonga majje.
51002018	Ndenne, to accee cujjidanoowo maleykaaɓe, gaɗoowo hano kam no leesiniiɗo fuu haɗa on jaalorgal. Iri neɗɗo oo, ko hi'i nder koyɗi fiirirta gabaare, miila ko kam no ɓuri neɗɗo fuu.
51002019	Iri neɗɗo oo wondaa he Almasiihu laatiiɗo hooreejo hawriine goonɗinɓe fuu. Tawi duu he Almasiihu hawriine ndeen fuu woni no jokki, no mawna no Alla hiɗiri daliila potal he nanngodirol goonɗinɓe fuu.
51002020	On maaydii he Almasiihu, on ceedi he ginni bonɗi fuu ngonɗi no laamii nder duuniyaaru. Nde nii goonga fuu on ceedi he majji, ndenne ɗume waɗi oɗon ndeki mbuurnam mooɗon fuu dow duuniyaaru hano kayru jeyii on. Ɗume waɗi oɗon tokka tilsinooje jannginooɓe fewreeɓe bi'ooje :
51002021	« To meemu, to hooƴu, to meeɗu. »
51002022	Iri tilsinooje ɗe kaalataana dow kujje, ɗe ɓooyataa nde ɗe nawtoraama ngam ɗe golle ɓiɓɓe aadama he ekkintinooje mum'en.
51002023	He giiɗe himɓe, iɗe nanndi he ko woodi hikmaaku. Iɗe ekkita neɗɗo wattude semmbe mum fuu dow tilsinooje diina. Iɗe ekkintina leesinaaku fewrehu, iɗe ekkintina ekkitol ɓanndu torra. Amma iri tilsinooje ɗee, tilsinooje non laatiiɗe ngalaa fuu nafakka gom nde hanaa humtude giɗaale ɓerne ɓii-aadama.
51003001	Ko nii waɗi Alla ummintini on, onon he Almasiihu, ndenne tefee kujje gonɗe dow kammu to Almasiihu woni no jooɗii nyaamo Alla.
51003002	Ndekee hakkillo mooɗon dow kujje gonɗe dow, to accee kujje duuniyaaru ada hakkillo mooɗon,
51003003	ngam on maayɓe, mbuurnam mooɗon kesam duu no suuɗii nder juuɗe Almasiihu gonɗo hadde Alla.
51003004	Nyannde fuu Almasiihu, mo mbuurnam mooɗon fuu sinngi dow mum wanngi on mbanngidan he makko nder teddungal makko.
51003005	Mboppee kujje duuniyaaru fuu gonɗe nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, kam woni mboppee jeenu, golle nyidduɗe, suuno, miilooji bonɗi, e hidde seedere ngam hidde seedere kam duu hano ir dewol tooruure non.
51003006	Ngam waɗude ir kujje bonɗe ɗee no jippinan tikkere Alla dow saliiɓe goonɗinde mo.
51003007	Onon duu ndenno nii mbuurduɗon.
51003008	Amma joonin mboppon kujje ɗee fuu kam woni mboppon ir tikkere fuu, ɓerne ɓaleeraaku, to accee ƴettoore naa haala mbonka wurtoo nder kunndule mooɗon.
51003009	To neɗɗo mooɗon fuu fenan banndum, ngam joonin on mboppi jikku mooɗon kinngu he ko ngu gollata,
51003010	aduɗon jikku kesu. Alla taguɗo jikku kesu nguun, tinnotoo no heyɗina ngu faa ngu nannda he mum, ngam anndon ɗum no wooɗiri.
51003011	Ko nii waɗi on keɓi jikku kesu, ndenne joonin walaa fuu ko feerodiri hakkune mooɗon. Yahudanke he mo hanaa Yahudanke fuu no go'o. Juulnaaɗo he mo juulnaaka fuu no go'o. Walaa ko feerodiri hakkune mo janngaay he neɗɗo ladde, naa ko feerodiri maccuɗo he dimo. Walaa ko feerodirta himɓe ɓee fuu ngam Almasiihu woni huune fuu, kanko duu woni nder ɓerne goonɗinɗo fuu.
51003012	Ko nii waɗi Alla suɓake on, waɗi on seniiɓe, ɓe o hiɗi sanne sanne, ndenne njurmodiree, moƴƴonodiron, leesinoɗon, ɓerɗe mooɗon peewaa, munyon.
51003013	Munyodiree, nde nii goɗɗo waɗani banndum gacce, njaafonodiree. Hano no Joomiraawo yaafori on, onon duu njaafodiree hano non.
51003014	Nder kujje ɗee fuu, ko ɓuri woni ngiɗodiree, ngam hidde kam haɓɓodirta himɓe fuu faa wooɗa.
51003015	Accee jam Almasiihu dawrana miilooji mooɗon, daliila jam oo waɗi Alla noddi on ngam nanngodiron, laatoɗon terɗe ɓanndu worru, laatoɗon duu jettooɓe mo wakkati fuu.
51003016	Accee haala Almasiihu jooɗo nder ɓerɗe mooɗon faa noy walaa. Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu janngina banndum, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu naforoo anndal he hakkillo hollita banndum. Njettee Alla he ɓerɗe mooɗon fuu. Njimee jimi Jabuura, jimi teddinooji Joomiraawo he jimi ɗi Ruuhu Alla hokki on fuu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
51003017	Huune fuu ko mbaawton haalude naa waɗude, kaalee ɗum naa ngaɗee ɗum dow innde Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Ngaɗee ɗum daliila makko, oɗon njetta Alla Baaba meeɗen.
51003018	Onon rewɓe, ɗowtanee goriraaɓe mooɗon hano no tokkuɓe Joomiraawo ngaɗata.
51003019	Onon worɓe, onon duu, ngiɗee deekiraaɓe mooɗon, to tinnanee ɓe.
51003020	Onon sukaaɓe, ɗowtanee saarooɓe mooɗon nder huune fuu, ngam kanƴum weli Joomiraawo.
51003021	Onon saarooɓe, onon duu, to tinnanee sukaaɓe mooɗon faa ɓerɗe maɓɓe metta.
51003022	Onon maccuɓe, ɗowtanee joomiraaɓe mooɗon nder huune fuu. Ɗowtanee ɓe hanaa ngam oɗon ley gite maɓɓe, hanaa duu ngam ɓe njetta on. Amma ɗowtanee ɓe he ɓerne worre nder kulal Joomiraawo.
51003023	Huune fuu ko ngatton, ngaɗiree ɗum ɓerne lamnde, ngam Joomiraawo ngollanton hanaa goɗɗo ngollanton.
51003024	Paamee ko Joomiraawo woni joɓoowo on, on keɓan moƴƴereeji ɗi o resani himɓe makko. Almasiihu ngollanton hanaa goɗɗo ngollanton.
51003025	Gaɗɗo ko boni fuu no jukketee daliila bone mo waɗi, hedran-hedran fuu walaa nder majjum.
51004001	Onon rimɓe, njogoree maccuɓe mooɗon jogaaɗe lobbe, to ɓurdinee ɓe. Paamee ko no maccuɗo woodiri joomiiyo non, onon duu ngoodirɗon Joomiraawo gonɗo dow.
51004002	Tinnee he du'aa'u, to comee yettude Alla.
51004003	Ndu'anee min, minen duu, heɓa Alla omtana min laawol min mbaajoo haala mum kaa. Min mbaawa haalande himɓe dow sirri mo Alla wanngini har Iisa Almasiihu, mo ngam mum uddaami hannden ley kasu.
51004004	Eelee Alla heɓa mi waajoo sirri oo faa laaɓa tar.
51004005	Wakkati fuu mo kawruɗon he ɓe ngoonɗinaay, laatee jom'en hikmaaku hakkune maɓɓe. Nawtoree he wakkati mo o hokki on.
51004006	Accee duu haala mooɗon laatoo wakkati fuu haala pewnooka ɓerne, haala lamsuka, ngam keɓon no nootoriɗon gooto maɓɓe fuu.
51004007	Tikikus, banndii'en korsuɗo, kolniiɗo ley golle Joomiraawo, gollidoowo he am waran itta kumpa mooɗon dow am.
51004008	Ko waɗi lilumoomi he mooɗon woni o famtina on no min ngorri, heɓa hakkillooji mooɗon pukko.
51004009	O wardan he Onesimus, ɓii-leydi mooɗon. Banndii'en korsuɗo, mo min kooli sanne. Kamɓe ɗiɗo, ɓe ngaran ɓe kumpita on dow ko woni no waɗa ɗo fuu.
51004010	Markus denɗu Barnabas mo mbi'unoomi nde wari to mooɗon njaɓɓoɗon ɗum, no yewta on. Aristarkus uddidaaɗo he am, kam duu no yewta on.
51004011	Iisa noddirteeɗo Yustus duu no yewta on. Kamɓe tan ngoni Yahudankooɓe gollidooɓe he am dow habaru Laamu Alla. Ɓe cemmbinɗinii kam sanne.
51004012	Epafaras, gollanoowo Iisa Almasiihu, no yewta on. Kanko duu o ɓii-leydi mooɗon. Wakkati fuu omo tinni he du'aa'u ngam ndartoɗon, laatoɗon huuɓuɓe, waɗooɓe ko Alla hiɗi.
51004013	Miin he hoore am mi seedake, mi hi'ii no o woni omo tampana on, no o woni omo tampana himɓe Lawdikiya he himɓe Hiyerapolis.
51004014	Demas he Luka, lokotoroojo mo min korsini, no njewta on.
51004015	Miɗen njewta banndiraaɓe wonɓe Lawdikiya fuu, miɗen njewta Nimfa he hawriine goonɗinɓe hawroore nder suudu makko.
51004016	Nde nii on njanngi ɗerol ngool, lildee ngol hawriine goonɗinɓe Lawdikiya ngam kamɓe duu ɓe njannga ngol. Onon duu, njanngee ɗerol, ngol goonɗinɓe wonɓe Lawdikiya lildoyta on.
51004017	Mbi'ee Arkipus durwa humna golle ɗe Joomiraawo halfini ɗum ɗeen.
51004018	Miin Pol he junngo am mbinndanmi on cannooje ɗee. Nder kasu ngonmi, to njeggitee ndu'anoɗon kam. Moƴƴere Alla wonda he mooɗon !
52001001	Miin Pol, Silas he Timote kawri mbinndani on ɗerol ngool, onon jeyaaɓe Alla Baabiraawo e Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Onon hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa Almasiihu wonnde huɓeere Tesalonika, jam e moƴƴere Alla wonda he mooɗon.
52001002	Miɗen njetta Alla wakkati fuu ngam mooɗon, on fuu. Miɗen miccitoo he mooɗon wakkati fuu nder du'aa'u amin.
52001003	Yeeso Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen, miɗen miccitoo wakkati fuu he golle goonɗinol mooɗon. Miɗen miccitoo he tittinkinaaku mooɗon manngu ngu ngatton nder hidde. Miɗen miccitoo no tiɓinoriɗon sanne sanne tammude mooɗon dow Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
52001004	Banndiraaɓe, miɗen anndi ko Alla no hiɗi on. O suɓake on duu o wartiri on jeyaaɓe makko,
52001005	ngam Habaru lobbo mo min ngaddani on oo, wardaay haala ɓola tan. Amma o wardidaana baawɗe, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo he tammude mawne nde wondaa sikka fuu. Kaden on tabbintini ko habaru oo no goonga. Oɗon anndi no min njooɗori hakkune mooɗon ngam nafude on.
52001006	On nyemmini min, on nyemmini Joomiraawo meeɗen duu ngam on njaɓɓake haala Alla nder torraaji mawɗi, on njaɓɓorake ka duu belɗum ɓerne mo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hokkata.
52001007	Nii ngaɗon ko laataniiɗon goonɗinɓe wonɓe nder leyɗe Makedoniya he Akaya fuu ko ƴeewetee ekkitee.
52001008	Ngam to mooɗon haala Joomiraawo fuɗɗirii faa ka yottowi nder leyɗe Makedoniya e Akaya. Filla goonɗinol mooɗon dow Alla nanaama nokkuuje ɗee fuu, ndenne fotaay min njeccoo.
52001009	Himɓe he ko'e mum'en ngoni no kaala dow no njaɓɓoriɗon min, dow no mboppirɗon tooruuje mooɗon, ngartuɗon he Alla, Alla goongaajo, duumiiɗo, ngaɗuɗon ko'e mooɗon maccuɓe makko,
52001010	oɗon keɗi gartol Ɓiyiiko ƴuwde dow kammu, Iisa Almasiihu ummintinaaɗo he maayde, kisinoowo en he tikkere Alla waroore.
52002001	Banndiraaɓe, onon he ko'e mooɗon, oɗon anndi ko taɓɓitaaki mooɗon ki ngaɗanɗon min laataaki meere.
52002002	Fadde amin warde to mooɗon, min torraama, min njennaama nder huɓeere Filipi. Amma Alla hokki min semmbe waajaade Habaru mum lobbo he cuusal hakkune mooɗon baa nii ko himɓe heewɓe no he haɗude ɗum.
52002003	Ngam waaju amin tiigaaki dow fewre, ko boni naa hiila gom fuu tawaaka nder ɓerɗe amin.
52002004	Amma ngam Alla etii ɓerɗe amin daari, halfini min waaju Habaru mum lobbo, ndenne miɗen mbaajoo mo, hanaa ngam welude himɓe amma ngam welude Alla etoowo ɓerɗe himɓe.
52002005	Oɗon anndi ko waaju amin hanaa filla mbelirka ɗemngal non, non duu Alla no seedi, min cuuɗaay suuno njawdi fuu nder ɓerɗe amin.
52002006	Min ngalaa miɗen tefa himɓe teddina min, min tefaay teddinon min, min tefataa woɓɓe duu teddina min.
52002007	Baa nii ko miɗen mbaawnoo dekude teddirka amin dow mooɗon ngam min lilaaɓe Almasiihu, min ngaɗaay ɗum. Wakkati min ngondunoo he mooɗon, min kakkilake he mooɗon hano no inna hakkilorto ɓiyum.
52002008	Miɗen korsini on sanne, ngam majjum waɗi min ciryinoo waddande on Habaru lobbo, hanaa Habaru lobbo oon tan, min ciryakeno duu mursude yonkiiji amin ngam mooɗon ngam oɗon korsi he amin.
52002009	Banndiraaɓe, wakkati min mbaajotonoo Habaru lobbo ƴuwɗo to Alla hakkune mooɗon, oɗon miccitoo golle ɗe min ngolli he tampiri ndi min ngi'ii. Jemma e nyalooma, miɗen nder golle ngam to min tilsin neɗɗo mooɗon fuu.
52002010	Onon goonɗinɓe, on ngi'irii gite mooɗon, Alla duu no seedi ko min kolli jikku lobbu hakkune mooɗon, on fuu, min kolli on dartinaaku, walaa ko goɗɗo waawi felirde min.
52002011	Oɗon anndi duu ko min ngaɗanii on keddi baawɗe ɗe baaba waawi waɗande ɓiyum.
52002012	Min kolliti on, min cemmbinɗini on, min eeli on mbuurdon no weliri Alla nodduɗo on, ngaron naaton nder laamu he nder teddungal mum.
52002013	Daliila gom nii kaden mo ngam mum miɗen njetta Alla wakkati fuu. Daliila oo woni wakkati ngoonɗinɗon haala Alla, haala ka min mbaajii on, on adaay ka hano huune ƴuwne to ɓii-aadama amma on adi ka hano ko ƴuwi to Alla. Tabbat haala kaa, ka ƴuwka to Alla, kanka duu woni no golla nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, onon goonɗinɓe.
52002014	Banndiraaɓe, on nyemminii kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Alla, tokkuɗe Iisa Almasiihu gonɗe nder Yahudiya. On njari torra nder juuɗe lenyi mooɗon, hano no kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Yahudiya njariri torra ngam Yahudankooɓe.
52002015	Yahudankooɓe mbari Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen he annabiiɓe gom. Kamɓe duu torri min, minen he ko'e amin. Waɗude ko welata Alla adaay hakkillooji maɓɓe, ɓe wayɓe himɓe fuu.
52002016	Iɓe kaɗa min waajaade Habaru lobbo hakkune lenyi ɗi kanaa Yahudankooɓe ngam to ɗi keɓu kisinam. Nii ɓe ngaɗata, iɓe kebbinira eterɗe maɓɓe hakke wakkati fuu. Amma ko sakitii, borondi Alla saami dow maɓɓe.
52002017	Banndiraaɓe, en ngaɗii wakkati ko en ngiidaay. On mboɗɗake gite amin amma on mboɗɗaaki ɓerɗe amin. Miɗen ngiɗi sanne wartude tuntaade on, min ndurwi ngam majjum keddi semmbe amin.
52002018	Miɗen ngiɗi warde to mooɗon. Nde goonga, miin Pol, mi tefiino kile keewɗe warde to mooɗon, amma Seyɗan haɗii min.
52002019	Dow moy'en tammude amin woni ? Moy'en ngoni belɗum ɓerɗe amin ? Moy'en min piyirta gabaare yeeso Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, nyannde fuu o warti, nde hanaa onon ?
52002020	Nde goonga onon ngoni teddungal amin, onon ngoni belɗum ɓerne amin.
52003001	Ko nii waɗi min mbaawaa munyude min ngi'aay on, min mbaawaay warde to mooɗon duu sey min ngi'ii ko ɓuri wooɗude woni min njooɗoo huɓeere Ateena, minen tan.
52003002	Nden min lili Timote banndii'en, gollanoowo Alla, baajotooɗo Habaru lobbo, filla Iisa Almasiihu, ngam o semmbinɗina on nder goonɗinol mooɗon.
52003003	O semmbinɗina on ngam torraaji mooɗon ɗii, heɓa to neɗɗo mooɗon fuu accu torra kaan jaaloo ɗum. Onon he ko'e mooɗon, oɗon anndi ko kujje ɗee fuu podaama ngam meeɗen.
52003004	Oɗon anndi ɗum ngam wakkati min ngonnoo hadde mooɗon, walaa ko min cuuɗi on. Min kaalani on, ko en fuu en torretee. Non duu waɗi, oɗon anndani ɗum.
52003005	Mi waawaa munyi waɗi lilumi Timote tuntowoo on ngam mi faama no ngontirɗon nder goonɗinol mooɗon. Miɗo hula to tawee Cii'otooɗo oon jaalake on, golle amin laatoo meere.
52003006	Amma jooni ko Timote wari ƴuwi to mooɗon, o waddani min habaru belɗo. O yottinii to amin habaru goonɗinol mooɗon he hidde mooɗon. O haalanii min duu ko oɗon miccitoo he amin. On njewni min sanne hano no minen duu min njewniri on.
52003007	Ngam majjum waɗi banndiraaɓe, habaru goonɗinol mooɗon semmbinɗini ɓerɗe amin nder torra he nder ɓillaare amin.
52003008	Jooni no ndaroriɗon nder kawtal mooɗon he Joomiraawo, hokki min semmbe mbuurnam.
52003009	Iri yettoore ndeye min mbaawi waɗande Alla daliila mooɗon, he daliila welwelo ngo min nani yeeso Joomiraawo meeɗen.
52003010	Jemma e nyalooma miɗen eela Alla laawol fottude he mooɗon ngam min kumna ko jacci nder goonɗinol mooɗon.
52003011	Joonin miɗen eela Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen fiirtana min laawol warde tuntowaade on.
52003012	Min eeli Joomiraawo ɓeyda hidde faa noy walaa hakkune mooɗon, ngiɗodiron, ngiɗon himɓe fuu hano no min ngiɗiri on.
52003013	Mi eeli Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen semmbinɗina on, laatoɗon himɓe ɓe ngalaa fuu ko jancirtee, himɓe seniiɓe yeeso Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen nder wakkati mo o wardata he seniiɓe makko. Aamiin !
52004001	Banndiraaɓe, ko min ngiɗi hollitidde he eelude on woni ngam barke Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen mbuuree mbuurnam mbelɗam Alla hano no min njannginiri on ɗum. Baa nii ko oɗon ngaɗa ir mbuurnam ɗaam, tittinkinee ɓeydon yahde yeeso nder majjam.
52004002	Tabbat oɗon anndi kollitooje ƴuwɗe to Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen ɗe min ngaɗani on.
52004003	Ko Alla hiɗi woni senaare mooɗon, faddaade ko'e mooɗon yahde he jeenu.
52004004	Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu waawa hoore mum ngam wuurdude senaare he darja.
52004005	To neɗɗo mooɗon fuu tokku giɗaale ɓerne mum hano mo anndaa Alla tokkiri muuyɗe ɓerne mum.
52004006	To baa gooto mooɗon bonnu ɓerne banndum naa jammboo ɗum, ngam Joomiraawo woni kiitotooɗo waɗooɓe ir kujje ɗee hano no illa arannde min kaalirannoo on ɗum wakkati mo min pooɗannoo hakkillooji mooɗon.
52004007	Alla noddaay en ngam njooɗoɗen nder waɗude ko nyiddinii amma o noddaana en na ngam mbuuren nder senaare.
52004008	Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu salii ko wi'a ɗum, hanaa bi'uɗo ɗum joomum salii, amma Alla kokkuɗo on Ruuhu mum Ceniiɗo joomum salii.
52004009	Har ko daarata giɗodirol hakkune mooɗon on kaajaaka kolliteɗon, ngam onon he ko'e mooɗon, Alla anndini on no ngiɗodirton.
52004010	Miɗen anndi oɗon ngoodani banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe tawaaɓe nder leydi Makedoniya fuu hidde. Banndiraaɓe, miɗen eela on ɓeydon yahde yeeso nder hiɗodirde.
52004011	Ndurwee njooɗoɗon nder jam, kinnoɗon he harakaaji mooɗon. Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu wuurda semmbe mum, hano no min mbi'irnoo on ɗum.
52004012	Nde nii on mbuurdirii nii, on laatoto heƴuɓe ko'e mum'en, teddinteeɓe hakkune ɓe ngoonɗinaay.
52004013	Banndiraaɓe, ngam to hakkillooji mooɗon ummoo hano ɓe ngalaa fuu tammude gom, miɗen ngiɗi paamon goonga e goonga huune fuu ko wi'aa dow maayɓe.
52004014	Nde nii en ngoonɗini maayde e ummitaaki Iisa Almasiihu, ndenne en ngoonɗinan duu ko sikka fuu walaa Alla ummintinan goonɗinɓe Iisa Almasiihu maayɓe, wadda ɓe to makko.
52004015	Miɗen kaalana on haala ƴuwka to Joomiraawo miɗen mbi'a, enen gi'ooɓe gartol Iisa Almasiihu, en artataa ɓoynooɓe maayde ummitaade.
52004016	Daane mawɗo maleykaaɓe nanetee, daane luwal Alla, nden Joomiraawo he hoore mum jippoo, ƴuwa dow kammu. Maayɓe no goonɗinɓe artee umminee,
52004017	nden enen laatiiɓe wuurɓe ɓeen duu adeɗen, enen he maɓɓe sey dow duule ngam potten he Joomiraawo, ngonden he makko faa abada abadin.
52004018	Ndenne, cemmbinɗinodiree he haalaaji ɗii.
52005001	Banndiraaɓe, har ko daarata gartol Joomiraawo meeɗen fotaay mbinndaneɗon dow nyalaane he wakkati mum.
52005002	Onon he ko'e mooɗon oɗon anndi ko nyalaane Joomiraawo no juha neɗɗo hano no gujjo juhirta neɗɗo jemma.
52005003	Wakkati himɓe mbi'ata : « Jam e sago », nden balaa'u juhata saama dow maɓɓe hano no ŋatawere juhirta caawɗo. Ɓe mbaawaa daɗi baa seɗɗa.
52005004	Amma banndiraaɓe, onon on ngalaa nder nimre, ndenne nyalaane ndeen waawaa juhi on hano no gujjo moloto juha neɗɗo.
52005005	On fuu, on ɓiɓɓe jeyngol, jeyngol nyalooma. En ƴuwaay he jemma, en ƴuwaay duu he nimre.
52005006	Ndenne, to en ɗaano hano ɓeeto, amma en peertu gite meeɗen nanngen ko'e meeɗen.
52005007	Ngam ɗaanotooɓe jemma ɗaanoto, yarooɓe faa ko'e mum'en copto duu jemma njarta.
52005008	Amma enen en himɓe nyalooma non. Ndenne mbaawen ko'e meeɗen, ngatten goonɗinol he hidde laatanoo en toggoore njamndi, tammude kisinam duu laatoo hufuneere meeɗen konu.
52005009	Alla fodanaaki en tikkere mum, ko o fodani en woni keɓol kisinam daliila Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
52005010	Iisa Almasiihu mursi yonki mum ngam meeɗen, heɓa baa nde nii tawaama en maayɓe naa en wuurɓe tawee eɗen ngondi he makko.
52005011	Ndenne cemmbinɗinodiree, mballodiree nder yaadu yeeso hakkune mooɗon hano no ngonɗon oɗon ngaɗa.
52005012	Banndiraaɓe, miɗen eela on teddinon tittinkiniiɓe no ngollana Joomiraawo hakkune mooɗon, wonɓe no ardo on, wonɓe no kollita on.
52005013	Teddinon ɓe sanne, kollee ɓe hidde ngam golle maɓɓe. Hakkillo fukkiingo duuma hakkune mooɗon.
52005014	Ngaɗee kaseeta he janɗo, cemmbinɗinon ɓe ɓerɗe mum'en keli, mballee ɓe ngalaa baawɗe. Mbaawee munyal neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu.
52005015	Tinnoɗon to baa gooto mooɗon yoptoro gacce he gacce. Amma wakkati fuu tittinkinee nder gaɗol ko wooɗi hakkune mooɗon he hakkune himɓe fuu.
52005016	Accee welwelo jooɗo wakkati fuu hakkune mooɗon,
52005017	ndu'oɗon wakkati fuu,
52005018	njetton Alla nder ko wari he mooɗon fuu. Ɗum Alla doomiri on nder kawtal mooɗon he Iisa Almasiihu.
52005019	To kaɗee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo waɗa golle mum hakkune mooɗon.
52005020	To njawee haalaaji annabaaku,
52005021	amma taykee huune fuu, adon ko wooɗi nder majjum,
52005022	mboɗɗoɗon bone no wa'i fuu.
52005023	Alla jom jam he hoore mum, wartira on senngo ngam hoore mum, reena neɗɗo mooɗon fuu, o reena ɓerne, yonki, e ɓanndu neɗɗo mooɗon ngam laatoɗon ɓe ngalaa fuu feloore gom nyannde gartol Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
52005024	Alla nodduɗo on no kolniiɗo, sikka fuu walaa duu o tabbintinan ɗum.
52005025	Banndiraaɓe, ndu'anee min.
52005026	Njottinee sannoore amin to banndiraaɓe meeɗen nder hidde.
52005027	Mi eelii on ngam barke Joomiraawo, njanngee ɗerol ngool hakkune banndiraaɓe meeɗen fuu.
52005028	Moƴƴere Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen wonda he mooɗon.
53001001	Ɗerol ngool ƴuwi to am, miin Pol, Silas e Timote. Miɗen njewta hawriine goonɗinɓe wonnde Tesalonika, jeyaaɓe Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen e Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo.
53001002	Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo barkin on, hokka on jam e moƴƴere.
53001003	Banndiraaɓe amin goonɗinɓe, no tilsi min njetta Alla wakkati fuu ngam mooɗon. No haani min njetta mo, ngam goonɗinol mooɗon no he yahde yeeso, kaden hidde wonnde hakkune mooɗon kam duu no he yahde yeeso.
53001004	Daliila kujje ɗee waɗi miɗen mbi'a nder kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe ko min nani belɗum mooɗon faa noy walaa. Miɗen mbi'a ɓe ɗum daliila munyal e goonɗinol mooɗon ngol kolluɗon nder torra e ɓillaare fuu nde tawaɗon nder mum.
53001005	Munyal mooɗon ngaal he goonɗinol mooɗon ngool ngoni seeda ko kiite Alla ngalaa fuu hedran-hedran. Ɗum duu no holla ko Alla waɗi neɗɗo mooɗon fuu potuɗo naatude nder laamu mum, laamu ngu ngonɗon oɗon torree ngam mum.
53001006	Sikka fuu walaa Alla no dartiiɗo, wonɓe no torra on ɓeen, o torran ɓe kamɓe duu ngam yoptanaade on.
53001007	Amma onon wonɓe no torree joonin ɓee, en fuu, minen he mooɗon, o hokkowan en powtiri nyannde Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen wanngata nder ɗemle hiite, wara ƴuwa dow, kanko he maleykaaɓe makko jom'en baawɗe.
53001008	Iisa Almasiihu nde wari, jukkan saliiɓe anndude Alla he saliiɓe tokkude ko waajaa dow Habaru lobbo filla Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
53001009	O torra ɓe torra ka hantataa faa abada, ɓe mboɗɗinee yeeso Joomiraawo e teddungal mum manngal.
53001010	Ɗum waɗowan nder wakkati mo Iisa Almasiihu wartoyta, jeyaaɓe makko fuu teddinan mo, goonɗinɓe mo fuu, o wela ɓe sanne. On tawetee hakkune maɓɓe ngam on ngoonɗini waaju mo min ngaɗani on.
53001011	On tawetee hakkune maɓɓe, ngam majjum waɗi, miɗen ndu'anoo on wakkati fuu. Miɗen eela Alla mo ndewuɗen waɗa on fotuɓe heɓude mbuurnam ɗam o noddini on ɗam. Miɗen eela Alla nder baawɗe mum wallan on kumnon anniya mooɗon lobbo fuu e gollal ngal naatuɗon fuu daliila goonɗinol mooɗon.
53001012	Nii waɗata ko innde Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen teddaa hakkune mooɗon, keɓon teddungal to makko daliila moƴƴere Alla meeɗen he daliila moƴƴere makko, kanko Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
53002001	Banndiraaɓe, har ko daarata gartol Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen he kawrol meeɗen to makko, miɗen mbi'a on
53002002	to accee hakkillooji mooɗon ummilawo ngam goɗɗo wi'i on nyalaane gartol Joomiraawo yottake. To kulee baa se goɗɗo wi'i on kam nani ɗum nder annabaaku gom, naa nde goɗɗo waajake ɗum, naa nde joomum wi'i minen mbinndi ɗum mbi'i.
53002003	To accee neɗɗo fuu hiilira on laawol ngool hen non fuu, ngam nyalaane garki kiin warataa nde hanaa wakkati mo himɓe heewɓe murtata he Alla oon waru non, bonɗo podanaaɗo halkere oon duu wanngaa.
53002004	Bonɗo oo no ganyo Alla, o mawninan hoore makko ɓurde ko rewetee fuu, naa ko sujidantee fuu, faa o jooɗowoo nder suudu Alla, omo wi'a ko kanko e hoore makko o Alla.
53002005	Wakkati mo ngondunoomi he mooɗon, miɗo haalanannoo on ɗum. Oɗon miccitoo naa ?
53002006	Oɗon anndi joonin ko faddii bonɗo oo, ko faddii mo o wannga illa wakkati makko waraay.
53002007	Bonɗo oo baawɗe mum no ɗon no golla nder cuccukka. Amma gonɗo no faddoo ɗe oon tinnotoo no faddoo ɗe sey nyannde o sottinaa to o woni. Nyannde fuu o sottinaa,
53002008	nyannde mum bonɗo oo wanngata. Amma wakkati Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen warti, o wattan foofaango hunnduko makko o wara bonɗo oo, o watta teddungal garki makko o sankita bonɗo oon.
53002009	Wakkati bonɗo oo warta, o wardan baawɗe Ibiliisa. O waɗan kujje fewreeje kaayɗiniiɗe, o waɗan alamaaji ɗi kanaa goonga. O waɗan dobo-dobooji ngam majjinde himɓe.
53002010	O golliran huune fuu ko waawi eytude neɗɗo ngam majjinde kalkuɗo fuu. Himɓe no kalka ngam ɓe calake hiɗude goonga baawɗo hisinde ɓe.
53002011	Ngam majjum waɗi, Alla lildi majjere mawne he maɓɓe, ngam ɓe ngoonɗina pene bonɗo oon.
53002012	Alla lildi majjere ndeen duu he maɓɓe ngam hiitaade nanuɓe belɗum gaɗol golle bonɗe, calii goonɗinde goonga oon.
53002013	Banndiraaɓe horsuɓe he Joomiraawo, daliila mooɗon miɗen kaani yettude Alla wakkati fuu, onon Alla artii suɓii ngam hisinde on. On kisuɓe duu ngam Ruuhu Ceniiɗo waɗii on seniiɓe. On kisuɓe ngam on ngoonɗinii goonga oon.
53002014	Daliila kisinam ɗaam waɗi Alla noddi on har waaju amin mo min mbaajii dow Habaru lobbo. O noddii on ngam keɓon mbaka nder teddungal Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
53002015	Ndenne banndiraaɓe, kakkinkinee ko ngoonɗinton, tiɓinoɗon no wooɗiri ekkintinooje ɗe min ekkintini on he kunndule amin he ɗe min mbinndani on. To accee ekkintinol kesol gom fuu wara ada hakkilo mooɗon.
53002016	Mi eelii Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen he hoore mum, mi eelii Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen, giɗuɗo en, moƴƴani en, fewni ɓerɗe meeɗen faa abada, hokki en tammude lobbere.
53002017	Mi eeli ɓe, ɓe pewna ɓerɗe mooɗon. Ɓe kebbina ɗe semmbe nder ko ngatton fuu he nder ko kaaloton fuu ngam ɗum laatoo ko wooɗi.
53003001	Banndiraaɓe, ndenne ko mbi'anmi on woni ndu'anee min. Ndu'ee ngam Habaru lobbo filla Joomiraawo sankitoo law nder nokkuuje keewɗe. Ndu'ee o teddinee hano no teddinirɗon mo.
53003002	Ndu'anoɗon min duu, min kisa bonɓe gollooɓe ko wooɗaa, ngam hanaa himɓe fuu ngoonɗini.
53003003	Joomiraawo no kolniiɗo, o semmbinɗinan on, o hiina on sarri bonɗo oon.
53003004	Joomiraawo waɗi ko miɗen koolii, ko oɗon tokki hannden he ko jaaŋo duu, on tokkan tilsinooje ɗe min kokki on.
53003005	Mi eelii Joomiraawo huybita ɓerɗe mooɗon har hidde Alla, ɗe keewa tittinkinaaku hano no Almasiihu heewiri tittinkinaaku.
53003006	Banndiraaɓe, miɗen mbi'a on ngam barke Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, mboɗɗee banndiraaɓe meeɗen jaayɓe, saliiɓe waaju mo nanuɗon to amin.
53003007	Onon he ko'e mooɗon, oɗon anndi no nyemnirton min, ngam wakkati min ngondunoo he mooɗon on ngi'aay jaayre fuu he amin.
53003008	Walaa fuu mo min eeli hokka min nyaamdu. Jemma e nyalooma miɗen nder jaggu ngam to min laatanoo neɗɗo mooɗon fuu donngal.
53003009	Miɗen ngoodi laawol tilsinde on, adon donngal amin, amma min ngaɗaay ɗum, ngam min laatanoo on ko ƴeewetee ekkitee.
53003010	Baa nii wakkati min ngondunoo he mooɗon, miɗen kaalana on miɗen mbi'a caliiɗo gollude fuu, to nyamnee.
53003011	Min mbi'iino on ɗum ngam min nani no wi'ee ko yanɓe no tawa hakkune mooɗon, yanɓe ɓee ngalaa fuu ko keedani se hanaa naatude nder ko walanaa ɓe.
53003012	Too, iri himɓe ɓee, miɗen kollita ɓe miɗen mbi'a ngam barke Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen no tilsi ɓe ngiɗa gollal, ɓe ngolla golle kaanuɗe, ɓe mbuurda semmbe maɓɓe.
53003013	Banndiraaɓe, to comee waɗude ko wooɗi.
53003014	Nde nii no woodi caliiɗo tokkude ko min kaali nder ɗerol ngool, kollee mo himɓe, ngatton mo furyer, ngam semteene nannga mo.
53003015	To adee joomum hano ganyo, amma kollitee mo hano o banndii'on.
53003016	Mi eeli Joomiraawo jom jam, hokka on jam wakkati fuu he nder huune fuu. Joomiraawo wonda he mooɗon, on fuu.
53003017	Miin Pol he junngo am, winndi sannoore ndee yahde he mooɗon. Binndol sannoore ndee duu woni seeda am taweteeɗo nder ɗereeji ɗi mbinndumi fuu.
53003018	Moƴƴere Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen wonda he mooɗon, on fuu.
54001001	Ɗerol ngool ƴuwi to Pol, lilaaɗo Iisa Almasiihu dow tilsinoore Alla Kisinoowo he Iisa Almasiihu mo ngattuɗen gokka meeɗen he mum,
54001002	yahde to Timote suka am goongaajo nder goonɗinol. Alla Baabiraawo, he Iisa Almasiihu Kisinoowo meeɗen moƴƴane, yurme, hokke jam.
54001003	Wakkati njahannoomi nder leydi Makedoniya mi ŋaarake ma njooɗoɗaa nder huɓeere Efeesu ngam kaɗaa himɓe gom njanngina laabi oonyiiɗi.
54001004	Ɓe itta hakkillo maɓɓe he taale-taaleeji, he limtol jippotooɓe he annabiiɓe ngol re'ataa. Ngam ir miilooji ɗii pooɗataana haalaaji ir iriiji ɗi nafataa en baa seɗɗa nder siri kisinol ngol Alla fodani en nder goonɗinol.
54001005	Ko kaɗol ngool hiɗi hollude woni tefude hidde ƴuwoore nder ɓerne laaɓune, miilo dartiingo, he goonɗinol goonga e goonga.
54001006	Himɓe gom njoofii laawol meeɗen, ɓe kalki nder haalaaji meereeji.
54001007	Iɓe ada ko'e maɓɓe jannginooɓe Tawreeta, amma ɓe anndaa ko ɓe ngoni iɓe mbi'a he ko ɓe piirata gabaare.
54001008	Eɗen anndi ko Tawreeta no wooɗi amma say se golliraama laabi mum.
54001009	Paamen ko Tawreeta darnaaka ngam gollooɓe ko dartii amma o waɗaama ngam bonɓe, murtuɓe, pamtinooɓe Alla, waɗooɓe hakke, ɓe teddintaa Alla he ko senii fuu, warooɓe inna he baaba, ittooɓe yonki,
54001010	yeenooɓe, luutankooɓe, sonnooɓe maccuɓe, fenooɓe, hunotooɓe dow fewre, kamɓe e waɗooɓe ko jannginoore goongaare wi'aay.
54001011	Jannde ndee no yahda he Habaru lobbo mo kalfinaami, ƴuwɗo to Alla tedduɗo, kanko woni wuddu barke.
54001012	Miɗo yetta Iisa Almasiihu Joomi'en kokkuɗo kam baawɗe humnude golle makko. O hoolake kam ngam o suɓake kam mi ngollana mo.
54001013	Baa ko ndenno mi bonniino innde makko, torrumi himɓe makko, njennumoomi, amma jooni o yurmake kam ngam wakkati mum nder jahillaaku tawanoomi, mi hanaa goonɗinɗo.
54001014	Joomiraawo meeɗen jippini moƴƴere mum nde walaa keerol dow am. O funni nder am goonɗinol e hidde, ɗum fuu tawaama nder kawtal ngam Iisa Almasiihu.
54001015	Haala kaa no hoolnii, sikka fuu walaa ika haani jaɓeede : « Iisa Almasiihu wari nder duuniyaaru ngam hisina waɗooɓe hakke. » Miin e hoore am, miɗo tawaa nder maɓɓe, mi waɗi ko jaasi ɓe.
54001016	Amma Alla yurmake kam, miin jaasuɗo waɗooɓe hakke. Ngam majjum waɗi Iisa Almasiihu hiɗi hollude kam munyal mum manngal heɓa mi laatoo goonɗinɗo ƴeeweteeɗo ekkitee ngam hi'uɓe ekkiti keɓa mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
54001017	Alla Joomiraawo no gooto, oo laamiiɗo duumiiɗo. Buurɗo wakkati fuu mo hi'ataake. Teddungal e darja laatanoo mo faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
54001018	Suka am Timote, mi halfinte hollitoore ndee, inde yahda he annabaaku ngaɗanoongu dow maa : Tiiga dow haalaaji ɗii, durwa durwo manngo.
54001019	Durwira goonɗinol, he miilo dartiingo ngo himɓe gom tokkaay faa goonɗinol maɓɓe yoolii.
54001020	Nder himɓe ɓeen ɗon Himene e Skandaaru ngoni, mi accidii ɓe he Seyɗan ngam to ɓe pilloo soɓude Alla.
54002001	Arannde nii miɗo ŋaarake on ndu'anee himɓe fuu, eelanon ɓe Alla, cawrinon mo ngam maɓɓe, njetton mo duu.
54002002	Ndu'anee laamiiɓe, ndu'anee neɗɗo fuu gonɗo nder nokkuuje dawrirɗe heɓa mbuuren nder jam, hakkillo fukkiingo, ndimaaku, he wondude Alla he ɓerne worre.
54002003	Ɗum woni ko wooɗi ko welata Alla Kisinoowo meeɗen,
54002004	giɗɗo neɗɗo fuu hisa, annda goonga.
54002005	Ngam Alla no gooto, neɗɗo gooto duu woni baawɗo wartirde potal hakkune himɓe he makko, kanko woni Iisa Almasiihu
54002006	mursuɗo yonki mum ngam yoɓude nyamaane hakke men. Kanƴum woni ceedaaku ngu Iisa waɗi nder wakkati mo Alla darni.
54002007	Ngam majjum ngaɗaami baajotooɗo e lilaaɗo heɓa mi faamina ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe ko woni goonɗinol goongaawol. Mi fenataa, goonga kaalanmi.
54002008	Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo hiɗi nokku fuu to worɓe ndu'otoo, ɓe ɓantira juuɗe maɓɓe dow he ɓerɗe laaɓuɗe, tawee tikkere e jeddodirol fuu walaa.
54002009	Miɗo hiɗi rewɓe duu ɓornoo kolte kaanduɗe ɓorneede, no ɗum ɓuri hoyande ɓe. To ɓe peɗoo, ɓe mooro morɗi caadiiɗi, ɓe ngatta kaŋŋe naa jamɗe dime naa kolte caadiiɗe
54002010	amma ɓe ngaɗa golle lobbe hano ir rewɓe teddinooɓe Alla he ɓerne worre.
54002011	Wakkati waaju, debbo fuu nannga hunnduko mum, jogoo mo nder ɓerne mum, he nder leesinaaku.
54002012	Mi hokkaay debbo fuu laawol janngina worɓe naa heɓa baawɗe dow maɓɓe. Amma o tiiɗa he hunnduko makko,
54002013	ngam Aadamu artii Haawa tageede.
54002014	Hanaa Aadamu woni eytaaɗo, amma deekiiko Haawa eytaa, murti he tilsinoore Alla.
54002015	Amma rewɓe no kisintee wakkati ɓe keɓi ɓiɓɓe, nde nii ɓe tittinkinake nder goonɗinol maɓɓe, nder hidde he nder mbuurnam ceniiɗam he leesinaaku.
54003001	Ndaa haala gasuka nii : « Giɗɗo laatoo ardiiɗo nder hawriine goonɗinɓe hiɗa golle lobbe. »
54003002	Ardiiɗo oo no haani laatoo neɗɗo mo walaa fuu feloore, gorko mo debbo gooto, dawranoowo hoore mum, gaɗoowo mbuurnam mum no haandiri, bernoowo weerɓe, tawee omo waawii jannginde duu.
54003003	O haandaa laataade jaroowo naa kaɓeteeɗo. Amma omo haani laataade neɗɗo giɗɗo himɓe, jom jam, mo seedeere adaay hakkillo mum,
54003004	baawɗo hakkilaade he wuro mum no wooɗiri, mo ɓiɓɓe mum duu martantoo nder ndimaaku manngu.
54003005	Ngam noy neɗɗo mo jogaaki wuro mum no wooɗiri waawirta hakkilaade he hawriine goonɗinɓe Alla ?
54003006	Neɗɗo oo duu to laatoo goonɗinɗo keso, se hanaa non omo waawi mawnitaade, ɗum waɗan o hiitee hano no Seyɗan hiitoraa nii.
54003007	Omo haani laataade jom jikku ngasungu heɓa o teddinee hakkune ɓe ngoonɗinaay ngam to o famɗinee. Se hanaa non, o saaman nder tunnirgal Seyɗan.
54003008	Wallooɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe, kamɓe duu ɓe laatoo jom'en ndimaaku, waɗooɓe ko mbi'i fuu, to ɓe ƴaartin nder jarɗe maɓɓe, to ɓe ngiɗu njawdi ndi laaɓaa.
54003009	Nder miilo lamngo ngoo, Alla wanngini sirri goonɗinol, sirri oo ɓe kaani tiɓinaade.
54003010	Iɓe kaani eteede ginan, gaɗa ɗum nde nii hi'aaka fuu ko ɓe pelirtee, iɓe mbaawi fuɗɗude golle maɓɓe.
54003011	Non deekiraaɓe maɓɓe duu no kaani laatoo rewɓe wooduɓe ndiyam ndimaaku, ɓe kaanaa laataade rewɓe nyo'ooɓe himɓe, ɓe laatoo rewɓe waawooɓe ko'e mum'en, hoolniiɓe nder huune fuu.
54003012	Balloowo hawriine goonɗinɓe fuu no haani laataade gorko mo debbo gooto, kakkiltooɗo ɓiɓɓe mum he wuro mum,
54003013	ngam waɗooɓe golle mum'en no wooɗiri ngoni waawɓe heɓude teddinoore he hoolaare mawne ngam ɓe ngoonɗini Iisa Almasiihu.
54003014	Mi winndanii ma ɗerol ngool nder gokka ka mi ɓooyataa mi waraay to maa.
54003015	Amma se mi ɓooyii mi waraay, binndi am ndii wallete faamude no njooɗortoɗaa hakkune lenyol Alla duumiiɗo, kam woni hawriine goonɗinɓe. Kayre woni bonjariyal goonga.
54003016	Sikka fuu walaa, sirri diina meeɗen no mawni : Almasiihu wannginaama hano tagaaɗo, Ruuhu Alla dartinii mo, maleykaaɓe ngi'ii mo. O waajaama hakkune lenyi, o goonɗinaama nder duuniyaaru, nder teddungal o hooƴaama dow.
54004001	Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wanngini no laaɓiri ko nder jamaanu cakitiiɗo oo, himɓe gom accan goonɗinde Alla, tokka seyɗaniiji gonɗi no eyta ɗum'en, he jannginooje ƴuwɗe to ginnaaji.
54004002	Munafikiiɓe e fenooɓe ɓe ɓerɗe baaɗɗe kalkata ɓe.
54004003	Bonɓe ɓee no njanngina ko himɓe kaanaa dewlude naa nyaamude nyaamduuji gom. Amma Alla tagi nyaamduuji ɗii fuu ngam goonɗinɓe annduɓe goonga naforoo ɗum nder jettol Alla.
54004004	Huune fuu ko Alla tagi no wooɗi. Walaa fuu ko harmi, se nii en njaɓirii ɗum yettoore.
54004005	Ngam haala Alla e du'aa'u no lamna huune fuu yeeso makko.
54004006	Yottin ɗum to banndiraaɓe meeɗen, nden a laatoto gollanoowo Iisa Almasiihu lobbo, ɓeydotooɗo wakkati fuu nder goonɗinol meeɗen, he jannde lobbere nde njanngunoɗaa.
54004007	Amma woppu ɓila ɓilaaji meereeji ɗi njaadataa he goonɗinol meeɗen. Eeltu hoore maa nder kulal Alla nyannde fuu.
54004008	Se goonga, connyinol ɓanndu no woodi nafa, amma kulal Alla no nafa nder huune fuu. Ngam no hokka en mbuurnam jooni e nder wakkati garoowo.
54004009	Ɗum woni haala goongaha, sikka fuu walaa ika haani jaɓeede.
54004010	Eɗen torroo eɗen durwa ngam en ngatti gokka meeɗen he Alla duumiiɗo, Kisinoowo neɗɗo fuu, sako goonɗinɗo mo.
54004011	Ɗum woni ko kaanuɗaa jannginde he hollitinde ɓe.
54004012	Neɗɗo fuu to yawe ngam cukaaku maaɗa, amma laatana goonɗinɓe ko ƴeewetee ekkitee nder haalaaji maa, nder jonnde maa, nder hidde maa, nder goonɗinol maa, he nder laaɓal maa.
54004013	Fadde am warde tittinkina he jannde Dewtere Alla, nder waaju e jannginol hakkune himɓe.
54004014	Taa yeeba kokkal tawaangal nder maaɗa, ngal Ruuhu Alla Ceniiɗo hokki ma har annabaaku e wakkati ardiiɓe ndekunoo juuɗe dow maa ngam barkinde ma.
54004015	Wattu kujje ɗee nder ɓerne maa, durwa heɓa neɗɗo fuu hi'a ko a yehi yeeso.
54004016	Hakkila he hoore maa, kakkiloɗaa he ko njanngintaa. Taa soƴƴora gaɗa nder kujje ɗee fuu. Nde nii a waɗiri nii, a hisinan hoore maa, kisinaa hettiniiɓe maa duu.
54005001	Taa haja dottiijo fuu, amma leesin daane maa kaalda he makko hano o baaba maa. Sukaaɓe worɓe duu, ada ɓe hano banndiraaɓe maa worɓe,
54005002	yeyraaɓe hano inniraaɓe maa. Sukaaɓe rewɓe duu, ada ɓe hano sakikiraaɓe maa rewɓe he ɓerne laaɓune.
54005003	Saanu ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi ɓe ngalaa fuu balla.
54005004	Nde nii nder maɓɓe debbo gom no woodi sukaaɓe naa nee taaniraaɓe, iɓe kaani ekkitaade no ɓe kakkilorto he wuro maɓɓe. Nde nii ɓe ngaɗiri nii, ɓe mbarjoto saarooɓe maɓɓe mbarjaari lobbiri. Ngam ɗum woni ko weli Alla.
54005005	Mo gorum maayi mo walaa doondiiɗo ɗum, mo walaa fuu balla gom, halfinii hoore mum he Alla, omo du'oo jemma e nyalooma, omo eela Alla walla mo.
54005006	Mo gorum maayi gattuɗo ɓerne mum he belɗum duuniyaaru no maayɗo baa ko no wuuri da.
54005007	Yottin haalaaji ɗii to maɓɓe heɓa ɓe ngaɗa mbuurnam ɗam walaa fuu feloore.
54005008	Neɗɗo fuu mo saanaay himɓe mum, sako wuro mum, jammbake goonɗinol mum, joomum jaasii mo anndaa Alla !
54005009	Rewɓe kaanduɓe limeede nder ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi, ɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe haani wallude ɓeen ngoni : Rewɓe ɓe duuɓi lasooji tati yahde dow, laataniiɓe goriraaɓe mum'en dartiiɓe.
54005010	Iɓe kaani anndireede golle lobbe, marol sukaaɓe no wooɗiri, weernooɓe weerɓe, lootooɓe koyɗe goonɗinɓe, wallooɓe tawaaɓe nder ɓillaare, hiɗuɓe waɗude gollal lobbal fuu.
54005011	Amma har ko daarata sukaaɓe rewɓe, ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi, taa winndu inɗe maɓɓe ngam cukaaku maɓɓe no waawi uppude ɓe, ɓe itta hakkillo maɓɓe he Almasiihu, ɓe tefa ɓaŋiteede.
54005012	Ndenne, kiite Alla doggi dow maɓɓe ngam ɓe kuumnaay amaana maɓɓe arano mo ɓe kooƴunoo.
54005013	Gaɗa majjum ngam ɓe ngalaa fuu ko ɓe ngaɗata, ɓe tokkan suudu yahde suudu, hanaa ngam ɓe ngaɗa goɗɗum, amma ngam ɓe tinno iɓe olka, ɓe mbaawtaa faddii kunndule maɓɓe, iɓe naata nder ko daarataa ɓe.
54005014	Ngam majjum waɗi, miɗo hiɗi sanne sukaaɓe rewɓe ɓee kaɓɓanee, ɓe ndimaa, ɓe njogoo cuuɗi maɓɓe no wooɗiri heɓa to wayɓe men keɓu laawol jancude en.
54005015	Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay no woodi nder maɓɓe yoofuɓe laawol dartiingol ngool, tokki Seyɗan.
54005016	Nde nii tawaama debbo goonɗinɗo gom no woodi nder lenyi mum ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi, o walla ɓe to o accu hawriine goonɗinɓe walla ɓe heɓa nde walla ɓe ngalaa balloo ɓeen.
54005017	Ardoriiɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe no wooɗiri, no kaani teddineede sanne sako waajotooɓe e jannginooɓe.
54005018	Ngam Dewtere Alla wi'i : A wattataa sumre he ngaari ngondi no sokka. Kaden, « No haani golloowo fuu heɓa njobdi mum. »
54005019	Taa jaɓu tuumol fuu gaɗaangol dow ardiiɗo gom nde hanaa himɓe ɗiɗo naa tato ceedi dow ko o tuumiraa ɗum.
54005020	Nde nii ardiiɗo gom no tittinkini nder gaɗol hakke, felu mo yeeso jama'aare fuu, heɓa ɓeeto duu kula.
54005021	Mi eeli ma yeeso Alla e yeeso Iisa Almasiihu e maleykaaɓe mum suɓaaɓe ngollira tilsinooje ɗee. Taa naatan oo, accaa ooto, ngiɗaa ooto, accaa ooto.
54005022	Taa yaawu dekude juuɗe dow goɗɗo ngam halfinde mo golle nder hawriine goonɗinɓe. Taa haɓɓidin daane he waɗooɓe hakke. Fadda hoore maa he tuuni fuu.
54005023	Hanaa ndiyam ɓolam tan kaanuɗaa yarde amma aɗa waawi yarde cabiijam seɗɗa ngam nawalla bujugu maa e ngam nawallaaji maaɗa jehooji no ngarta.
54005024	Hakke himɓe gom no mbannga fadde kiite waɗeede. Woɓɓe duu sey gaɗa ɓe kiitaama ko ɗe mbanngaa.
54005025	Hano non duu golle lobbe mbanngirtaa. Goɗɗe wakkati mum da ngi'etee amma baa se ɗe mbanngaay no waɗi fuu nyannde gom ɗe mbanngowan.
54006001	Maccuɓe goonɗinɓe no kaani teddina rimɓe mum'en heɓa to neɗɗo fuu famɗin innde Alla he jannginol meeɗen.
54006002	Onon maccuɓe ɓe rimɓe mum'en no goonɗinɓe, to miilee ngam on fuu on goonɗinɓe on teddintaa ɓe, amma ɓuree gollande ɓe no wooɗiri ngam ɓe goonɗinɓe hiɗaaɓe haanuɓe gollaneede. Ɗum woni ko kaanuɗaa hollitinde he waajaade himɓe.
54006003	Nde nii goɗɗo no waajoo waaju mo yaadataa he haalaaji goongaaji ɗi Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, naa se jannginol joomum no yedda laawol kulal Alla,
54006004	nden kay, joomum no keewɗo mawnitaare, o jaahili, giɗɗo haala e geddi dow karfeeje. Ɗume ɗum rimanta en se hanaa kirodirol, habdo, jennodirol, tuumodirol,
54006005	he geddi ndi hantataa hakkune himɓe ɓe hakkillooji mum'en uddaa. Ɓe njoofii goonga kaden, iɓe ada kulal Alla hano laawol heɓude njawdi.
54006006	Se goonga, kulal Alla no keɓal manngal, nde nii neɗɗo fuu no welna dow ko jogii.
54006007	Ngam juuɗe ɓole ngarɗen nder duuniyaaru, juuɗe ɓole duu coƴƴotoɗen.
54006008	Ndenne, nde eɗen ngoodi ko nyaameten he ko kolteten, iɗum haani heƴude en.
54006009	Amma tefooɓe riikude semmbe semmbe ndeki ko'e mum'en dow laawol suuno, ɓe caami nder tunnirgal e nder kujje baahiiɗe ɗuɗɗe ɗe mboɗɗaa majjinde ɓe, tutoo ɓe nder bonnere e nder halkere.
54006010	Ngam hidde seedere woni wuddu bone fuu. Woɓɓe cuunaama ɗe faa ɓe njoofi laawol goonɗinol, ɓe pooɗani ko'e maɓɓe torra mawka.
54006011	Amma aan, neɗɗo Alla, doggu kujje ɗee fuu. Tefu dartinaaku, kulal Alla, goonɗinol, hidde, tittinkinaaku e ɓerne fewne.
54006012	Durwu durwo gasungo ngam goonɗinol. Tiɓinaa mbuurnam nduumiiɗam ɗam Alla noddani ma, wakkati kokkunoɗaa ceedaaku lobbu yeeso himɓe ɗuɓɓe.
54006013	Mi eeli ma yeeso Alla wuddu mbuurnam fuu he yeeso Iisa Almasiihu gaɗuɗo ceedaaku lobbu yeeso Pontiyus Pilaatus kawjinooɗo leydi Yahudiya, mi eeli ma,
54006014	gollir tilsinooje ɗee no wooɗiri nder rafi feloore sey nyannde Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen warti.
54006015	Gartol ngool no waɗan nder wakkati mo Alla darni. Kanko marɗo barke, Jom baawɗe mo walaa walde, Laamiiɗo laamiiɓe fuu, Joomiraawo joomiraaɓe fuu.
54006016	Kanko tan woni Duumotooɗo, jooɗiiɗo nder jeyngol ngol neɗɗo fuu suusaa ɓadaade. Neɗɗo fuu hi'iraay mo gite mum, walaa baawɗo hi'ude mo. Teddungal he baawɗe laatanoo mo faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
54006017	Hollitin riikuɓe duuniyaaru nduu ɓe kakkilo he mawnitaare to ɓe ngattu hoolaare nder njawdi maɓɓe ngam ndi tabbitittaa, amma ɓe kalfina ko'e maɓɓe he Alla mo saɗaa, kokkoowo en huune fuu ngam nanen belɗum hoore men.
54006018	Wi'u ɓe ɓe ngaɗa ko wooɗi, to ɓe cortu juuɗe maɓɓe nder golle lobbe, ɓe laatoo ɓe juuɗe mum'en caɗaa, warooɓe njawdi mum'en ngam wallude ɓe ngalaa.
54006019	Nde nii ɓe ngaɗii ɗum, sikka fuu walaa ɓe kawrani ko'e maɓɓe njawdi lobbiri laatotoondi bonjariyal maɓɓe jaaŋo, ngam ɓe tiɓinoo mbuurnam ngoongaajam.
54006020	Too Timote, joga no wooɗiri ko kalfinaɗaa. Doggu haalaaji jeddooji, he haalaaji ɗi njahdataa he laawol goonɗinol meeɗen bi'eteeɗi no goonga.
54006021	Ngam himɓe gom tokki ɗi, ƴuwi dow laawol goonɗinol meeɗen. Moƴƴere Alla wonda he mooɗon.
55001001	Ɗerol ngool ƴuwi to am min Pol, mo Alla suɓii waɗi lilaaɗo Iisa Almasiihu ngam wannginde mbuurnam nduumiiɗam ɗam Alla wi'unoo no hokka en daliila Iisa Almasiihu,
55001002	yahde to Timote, suka am korsuɗo. Alla Baabiraawo, he Iisa Almasiihu Kisinoowo meeɗen moƴƴane, yurme, hokke jam.
55001003	Miɗo yetta Alla mo ngonmi miɗo ngollana he miilo laaɓungo ngo felataa kam hano no maamiraaɓe am ngollirani mo nii. Jemma e nyalooma, wakkati fuu mo ndu'otoomi, miɗo miccitoo he maa.
55001004	Miɗo miccitoo he gonɗi maa. Miɗo hiɗi tumtaade ma ngam welwelo am huuɓa.
55001005	Miɗo miccitoo he goonɗinol maaɗa ngol walaa fuu munafikaare tawaangol illa hanaa hannden to maama maa debbo Lo'is, he inna maa Ewnike. Joonin duu sikka fuu walaa ingol he maaɗa.
55001006	Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo miccintine, hano no nduncirtaa hiite nii, heyɗintin no wooɗiri kokkal ngal Alla waɗani ma wakkati ndekunoomi juuɗe dow maa mbarkinmaami.
55001007	Ngam hanaa Ruuhu kuloowo o hokki en, amma Ruuhu oon no semmbinɗina en, hokka en hidde he dawrande ko'e men.
55001008	Ndenne, taa semtu seedanaade Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen. Taa semtam ngam miɗo nder kasu ngam makko. Amma torrida he am ngam Habaru lobbo har baawɗe Alla.
55001009	Kanko hisini en, noddi en faa laatoɗen laaɓuɓe, hanaa ngam golle men amma ngam ko o darni e moƴƴere makko. Kayre o hokki en ngam sabbu Iisa Almasiihu illa fil'ajal.
55001010	Joonin moƴƴere ndee wannginaama he garki Iisa Almasiihu Kisinoowo meeɗen, jaaliiɗo maayde, bannginɗo mbuurnam, he ko duumoto nder Habaru lobbo.
55001011	Ngam Habaru lobbo oo waɗi Alla suɓii kam waɗi kam baajotooɗo, lilaaɗo e jannginoowo.
55001012	Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo tampa hannden, amma ɗum semtinaaki kam ngam miɗo anndi mo ngoonɗinmi. Miɗo anndi duu ko sikka fuu walaa, omo woodi baawɗe reenude ko kalfinaami faa nyannde darŋal.
55001013	Gollir haalaaji goongaaji ɗi nanuɗaa to am, ɗi laatane ƴeeweteeɗi ekkitee, njogaa ɗi nder goonɗinol he hidde keɓeteene nder kawtal he Iisa Almasiihu.
55001014	Jogira kaliifa lobbo oo no wooɗiri nder balla Ruuhu Ceniiɗo tawaaɗo nder meeɗen.
55001015	Hano no anndirɗaa ɗum nii, himɓe leydi Asiya ƴuwii gaɗa am, nder maɓɓe no tawaa Fijela e Hermoseena.
55001016	Amma Onesifoor, Joomiraawo yurmoo koreeji makko fuu ngam o semmbinɗini kam kile keewɗe, o semtaay kam baa nde worre ngam miɗo nder kasu.
55001017	Ngam illa o yottinoo nder huɓeere Rooma, o tinni omo tefa kam, faa o hiiti kam.
55001018	Mi eelii Joomiraawo yurmoo mo nyannde darŋal. Aɗa ɓuri neɗɗo fuu anndude kile foti o wallunoo kam nder huɓeere Efeesu.
55002001	Ndenne aan suka am, semmbiɗin nder moƴƴere tawaane nder kawtal meeɗen he Iisa Almasiihu.
55002002	Ko njannginmaami yeeso seedeeɓe ɗuɓɓe ɗum fuu, halfin ɗum himɓe hoolniiɓe, waawɓe jannginde woɓɓe.
55002003	Munyu tampiri hano soogeeru Iisa Almasiihu gasundu.
55002004	Ciryiiɗo konu fuu wattataa kujje duuniyaaru nder ɓerne mum heɓa welna ɓerne mawɗo mum.
55002005	Nde himɓe no tefa daɗodirde, daɗuɗo oon heɓataa gooro mum, se tokkiraay to haani.
55002006	Demoowo torriiɗo sanne nder ngesa mum, kam haani arta heɓude barke kettol.
55002007	Tayka dow ko kaalanmaami, Joomiraawo wallete paamaa ɗum.
55002008	Miccita he Iisa Almasiihu maayɗo, ummitii, kanko woni jippotooɗo he Daawda hano no ɗum haalira nder Habaru lobbo mo ngonmi miɗo waajoo.
55002009	Ngam sabbu Habaru lobbo oon ngonmi miɗo tampa faa nanngaami uddaami hano neɗɗo bonɗo. Amma haala Alla kay uddaaka.
55002010	Ngam majjum waɗi mi munyan torra kaa fuu heɓa suɓaaɓe Alla ɓeen kewta kisinam ngonɗam nder Iisa Almasiihu, ɓe naata nder teddungal makko duumingal.
55002011	Ndaa haala hoolniika nii : Nde nii en maaydii he makko, en mbuurdan he makko duu.
55002012	Nde nii eɗen munya, en laamodoto he makko. Amma nde nii en calake mo, kanko duu o saloto en.
55002013	Baa nde en kanaa hoolniiɓe, kanko kay o kolniiɗo, ngam o waawtaa yeddude hoore makko.
55002014	Ɗum woni ko kaanuɗaa miccintinde wakkati fuu, ŋaara ɓe yeeso Alla ɓe mboɗɗoo jeddodirol dow karfeeje ngam ɗum hantantaa ɓe baafuy se hanaa halkude hettiniiɓe.
55002015	Tarsina durwa keddi baawɗe maa ngam keɓaa no ndaroriɗaa yeeso Alla hano jaɓaaɗo, laatoɗaa hano golloowo mo gollal mum semtintaa ɗum, jottinoowo haala Alla goongaha kaan no wooɗiri.
55002016	Woɗɗa haalaaji meereeji ngam ɗi njaadataa he laawol goonɗinol meeɗen, ngam iɗi ɓeyda woɗɗinde waɗooɓe ɗi he Alla.
55002017	Haalaaji maɓɓe no cankitoo yahde hano ɓuure wonnde no nyaama. Himene e Filitus no tawaa hakkune maɓɓe.
55002018	Ɓe mboppi laawol goonga, iɓe njanngina ko ummitaaki maayɓe ɓooyi wittaade. Nii ɓe ngoni iɓe kalkira goonɗinol woɓɓe.
55002019	Amma bonjariyal semmbenteyal ngal Alla sinngi ngaal sottataa. Dow maggal haalaaji ɗii tawaa : Joomiraawo no anndi ɓe jeyii. No tawee kaden : Noddoowo innde Joomiraawo fuu woɗɗoo bone.
55002020	Nder suudu mawnu hanaa gineeji gaɗiraaɗi kaŋŋe he cardi tan tawetee. Gineeji gaɗiraaɗi leɗɗe, he loopal duu, no tawee nder mayru. Amma gineeji arani ɗiin no ndesanee juulɗe, ɗiito duu ngolliree wakkati fuu.
55002021	Nde nii neɗɗo lamnii hoore mum itti kujje tunnuɗe ɗe kaalunoomi dow mum, joomum no laatoto hano ginewol gollirteengol ko wooɗi, ceniingol, nafoowol jom suudu, ciryeteengol ngam gollal lobbal fuu.
55002022	Doggu belɗum cukaaku, durwu tan ɓeydoɗaa nder goonɗinol, dartinaaku, e hidde. Jooɗira jam he noddirooɓe innde Joomiraawo he ɓerne laaɓune.
55002023	Woɗɗa haalaaji meereeji, ɗi ngalaa fuu hoore. Aɗa anndi ko ɗi ngaddataana habdo.
55002024	Tawi ɗum hegaaki maccuɗo Joomiraawo habda he himɓe. Amma omo haani hollude neɗɗo fuu hidde, o laatoo neɗɗo baawɗo jannginde, jom munyal.
55002025	O laatoo peloowo caliiɓe nder koyirnam ngam moy anndi se Alla waɗata ɓe tuuba ɓe annda goonga,
55002026	ɓe ngarta he hakkillooji maɓɓe, ɓe coptoo tunnirgal Seyɗan gonngal no jogiiɓe nder maccangaaku mum he muuyo mum.
55003001	Paama ko nder jamaanu cakitiiɗo wakkatiiji tiɗɗi no ngaran,
55003002	ngam himɓe ko'e mum'en tan ngiɗata, seedeere adata hakkillooji maɓɓe, iɓe mana ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe ndoondoo ko'e, iɓe pamɗina Alla, ɓe teddintaa saarooɓe maɓɓe, bonnooɓe moƴƴere, ɓe teddintaa ko laaɓi,
55003003	ɓe ngalaa fuu yurmeene, ɓe njaafantaako woɓɓe, ɓe nyo'ooɓe himɓe, ɓe mbaawtaa ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe ɓerɗe ɓaleeje, wanyuɓe ko wooɗi fuu,
55003004	jammbotooɓe, wulɓe, heewɓe mawnitaare, hiɗuɓe mbelirka duuniyaaru dina hidde Alla.
55003005	Iɓe ngoodi ndiyam hulooɓe Alla, amma iɓe njedda baawɗe makko. Woɗɗa ir himɓe ɓee.
55003006	Nder maɓɓe, woɓɓe no molo naata nder cuuɗi ngam pooɗa hakkillo ndewoy koy ko'e kuyfuɗe, koy hakke haɓɓi ko'e mum'en e cuunaakoy huune fuu,
55003007	wakkati fuu ikoy tefa anndal amma abada koy keɓataa anndude goonga oon.
55003008	Hano no Yannes e Yamberes kabdirnoo he Muusa nii, non himɓe ɓee duu ngoni no kabdira he goonga oon. Ɓe ngalaa fuu hakkillo, goonɗinol maɓɓe duu walaa fuu ko nafataa.
55003009	Amma kiite maɓɓe njuutataa sanne ngam rafi hakkillo maɓɓe no wanngan yeeso himɓe fuu hano no ɗum laatori he Yannes e Yamberes nii.
55003010	Amma aan, a hi'i no njannginirmi, a hi'i duu jikku am, anniyaaji am, goonɗinol am, munyal am, hidde am, tittinkinaaku am,
55003011	e torraaji ɗi njarmi fuu. A hi'i ko hewti kam nder gure Antiyokiya, Ikoniyum e Listira. A hi'i duu no munyirmi torraaji kewtiiɗi kam. Amma Joomiraawo soptinii kam he majji ɗii fuu.
55003012	Ndenne kawtuɗo he Iisa Almasiihu fuu nde nii anniyake jogaade kulal Alla he ɓerne worre, joomum no hi'an torra.
55003013	Amma himɓe bonɓe he hiilooɓe himɓe no ɓeydan gaɗol bone, iɓe majjina himɓe, iɓe majjina ko'e maɓɓe duu.
55003014	Amma aan kay, dara tan he ko njannguɗaa he ko ngoonɗinɗaa, ngam aɗa anndi jannginɓe ma.
55003015	Illa cukaaku maa aɗa anndi dewte ceniiɗe. Iɗe mbaawi faaminde ma laawol kisinam tawaaɗam nder goonɗinol Iisa Almasiihu.
55003016	Dewte ceniiɗe fuu ƴuwaana nder hunnduko Alla, iɗe nafa nder jannginol, nder kollol neɗɗo boofi mum, iɗe nafa duu ngam felude himɓe e ngam ekkitinde ɓe wuurude mbuurnam daartiiɗam,
55003017	heɓa tokkuɗo Alla fuu tawee dow siri kuuɓuɗo ngam waɗude iri gollal lobbal fuu.
55004001	Ngam majjum waɗi, miɗo eele yeeso Alla e yeeso Iisa Almasiihu Kiitotooɗo wuurɓe he maayɓe, miɗo eele duu ngam gartol makko e ngam laamu makko :
55004002	Waaja dow Habaru lobbo, tittinkina wakkati fuu weli naa welaa, hollu himɓe boofi mum'en, wartir ɓe dow laawol, semmbinɗinir ɓe jannginol maa nder munyal manngal.
55004003	Ngam wakkati no waran mo himɓe caloto jannginol goongaawol fuu, iɓe ngaɗa muuyo maɓɓe, faa ɓe cuɓanoo ko'e maɓɓe jannginooɓe haalooɓe ko ɓe ngiɗi. Nder giɗaaɗe maɓɓe ɓe cuɓoto jannginooɓe ɗuɓɓe, haalannooɓe ɓe ko weli ɓerɗe maɓɓe tan.
55004004	Ɓe uddan noppi maɓɓe ngam to ɓe nanu goonga oon, ɓe kettinanoo taaleeji meereeji.
55004005	Amma aan kay, nanngu hoore maa wakkati fuu. Munyu torra, waaja Habaru lobbo oo, kumnaa golle maa fuu.
55004006	Joonin miɗo dow laawol hokkude yonki am hano sadaka, wakkati am accude duuniyaaru yottake.
55004007	Mi durwii durwo gasungo. Mi yottake keerol doggudu am. Mi jogake goonɗinol am.
55004008	Illa jooni Joomiraawo Kiitotooɗo dartiiɗo no resani kam mbarjaari ndi o hokkata kam nyannde darŋal. Hanaa miin tan, amma miin he himɓe fuu haaɓuɓe gartol makko.
55004009	Durwu ngaraa to am law law,
55004010	ngam Demas woppii kam tokki belɗum duuniyaaru, o yehi huɓeere Tesalonika. Keresna yehi leydi Galatiya, Titus duu yehi leydi Dalmaatiya.
55004011	Luka tan wondi he am. Waddu Markus to am ngam omo waawi wallude kam nder golle am.
55004012	Tikikus duu, mi lilinoo mo nder huɓeere Efeesu.
55004013	Wakkati ngartaa, fantiranam alkubbaare nde accanmi Karapo nder wuro Torowas, he dewte ɗeen. Ko ɓurmi hiɗude woni ngaddanaa kam dewte guri ɗeen.
55004014	Skandaaru bahillo oon torri kam sanne, Joomiraawo yoɓan mo golle makko.
55004015	Aan duu, hakkila he makko ngam o yeddii waaju meeɗen sanne.
55004016	Nyalaane arannde nde puɗɗumi faasanaade hoore am yeeso hiitotooɓe, walaa balluɗo kam, ɓe fuu ɓe mboppii kam, amma mi eelii Joomiraawo to nanngir ɓe ɗum.
55004017	Joomiraawo faabake kam, o hokki kam semmbe humnude waaju am ngam himɓe ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe duu nana haala makko. O soptinii kam e hunnduko dawaaɗi ladde.
55004018	Joomiraawo no soptinan kam wakkati fuu he ir bone fuu, o nanniran kam jam nder laamu makko tawaangu nder kammu. Kanko jeyii teddungal faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
55004019	Sannu Piriskilla e Akilas, he koreeji Onesiforus.
55004020	Erastus no jooɗii nder huɓeere Korintu, Torofimus duu yamɗaa, mi acci mo nder huɓeere Miletus.
55004021	Durwu war ɗo yahde dabbune waroore. Ebulus, Pudes, Linus, Kalawdiya e banndiraaɓe meeɗen fuu no canne.
55004022	Joomiraawo reene, moƴƴere makko wonda he mooɗon.
56001001	Ɗerol ngool ƴuwi to Pol, golloowo wakkiliiɗo he Alla, lilaaɗo Iisa Almasiihu, binnduɗo ngol ngam maaɗa, aan Titus. Mi halfinaama waddude suɓaaɓe Alla nder goonɗinol, he anndinde ɓe goonga tawaaɗo nder kulal Alla
56001002	faa ɓe ngatta gokka keɓol mbuurnam nduumiiɗam ɗam Alla mo fenataa wi'unoo illa huune fuu tagaaka.
56001003	Nder wakkati darnaaɗo oon, Alla Kisinoowo meeɗen wannginii haala mum nder waaju mo o halfinnoo kam nder tilsinoore makko.
56001004	Miɗo sanne, Titus, suka am goongaajo nder goonɗinol ngol kawtuɗen. Mi eelii Alla Baabiraawo he Iisa Almasiihu Kisinoowo meeɗen hokke jam e moƴƴere.
