56001005	Mi dilli mi accii ma nder duune Kereta ngam kumnaa ponnditaa golle meeɗen koddiiɗe, ndarnaa nder wuro fuu ardiiɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe hano no kaalirannomaami nii.
56001006	Ardiiɗo fuu no haani laatoo gorko mo walaa fuu to felirtee, gorko mo debbo gooto, ɓiɓɓe makko duu laatoo sukaaɓe hoolniiɓe, ɓe tuumirtaake ko boni, naa rafi ɗowtanaade.
56001007	Ndenne, no haani hooreejo hawriine goonɗinɓe laatoo neɗɗo mo walaa fuu to felirtee ngam dow makko Alla deki donngal golle mum. Ngam majjum waɗi o haanaa laataade neɗɗo donndiiɗo hoore, jaawɗo ɓerne, jaroowo, kaɓeteeɗo, naa giɗɗo seedere.
56001008	Omo haani laataade neɗɗo bernoowo weerɓe, giɗɗo ko wooɗi, taykotooɗo, dartiiɗo, laaɓuɗo, baawɗo hoore mum,
56001009	gollidoowo he haalaaji ɗi njannginaɗen goonga e goonga. Nii o waawirta semmbinɗinde ɓeeto dow jannginol goongaawol tikitakawol ngool, o waawa liɓude yeddooɓe mo duu.
56001010	Ngam saliiɓe tokkude goonga oon no ɗuuɗi sako woɓɓe nder goonɗinɓe ƴuwɓe he Yahudankooɓe, nder haalaaji maɓɓe ɗi ngalaa fuu hoore ɗiin, ɓe majjinirta himɓe.
56001011	Iɓe kaani haɗeede haala ngam iɓe ɗon iɓe cankita kowle. Iɓe njanngina ko haandaa janngineede ngam ɓe keɓa njawdi karmundi.
56001012	Keretanke gom jom anndal wi'i : « Illa fil'ajal Keretankooɓe no fenooɓe, dabbaaji bonɗi, yanɓe hiɗuɓe nyaamdu. »
56001013	Sikka fuu walaa, goonga Keretanke oo wi'i. Ngam majjum, felu ɓe no wooɗiri heɓa goonɗinol maɓɓe laatoo goongaawol.
56001014	To ɓe kettinanoo taale-taaleeji Yahudankooɓe, he tilsinooje ƴuwɗe to himɓe murtuɓe he goonga oon.
56001015	Huune fuu no laaɓi to himɓe laaɓuɓe. Amma walaa fuu ko laaɓi to ɓe laaɓaa e to ɓe ngoonɗinaay, ngam miilooji maɓɓe he hakkillooji maɓɓe fuu laaɓaa.
56001016	Iɓe mbi'a iɓe anndi Alla amma golle maɓɓe no njedda mo. Ngam ɓe wanyaaɓe, ɓe murtuɓe, ɓe mbaawtaa waɗude ko wooɗi fuu.
56002001	Aan kay, waaju maa yaada he jannginol goongaawol.
56002002	Wi'u dottiiɓe nayeeɓe etirooɓe huune fuu he hakkillo, ɓe laatoo wooduɓe dottingaaku, waawɓe ko'e mum'en, ɓe goonɗinol goongaawol, wooduɓe hidde he tittinkinaaku.
56002003	Yeyraaɓe nayeeɓe duu laatoo wuurɓe nder laaɓal, to ɓe laatoo rewɓe ɓe mbaawtaa kunndule mum'en naa yarooɓe, amma ɓe ɓeyda hokkude kollitooje gasuɗe
56002004	ngam ɓe pooɗa hakkillooji sukaaɓe rewɓe dow no ɓe ngiɗirta goriraaɓe maɓɓe he ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe.
56002005	Ɓe laatoo rewɓe waawooɓe ko'e mum'en, dartiiɓe, dewleteeɓe, yeɗɗuɓe, nananooɓe goriraaɓe mum'en ngam to neɗɗo fuu yawoo haala Alla.
56002006	Hollitin sukaaɓe worɓe duu, ɓe mbaawa ko'e maɓɓe nder huune fuu.
56002007	Aan he hoore maa laatana ɓe ko wooɗi ko ƴeewetee, ekkitee. Jannginol maaɗa laatoo tikitakawol e dimɗungol.
56002008	Haala maaɗa laatoo goongaha ka walaa fuu geddi ngam wayɓe meeɗen cemtaa, to ɓe keɓu fuu ko ɓe pelirta en.
56002009	Maccuɓe ɓeen duu kaalana ɓe, ɓe martanoo joomiraaɓe maɓɓe nder huune fuu. Ɓe mbelna ɓerɗe maɓɓe, to ɓe njeddodir he maɓɓe.
56002010	To ɓe tefu wujjude ɓe. Ɓe kolla ko iɓe koolnii wakkati fuu, ngam teddinde jannginol Alla Kisinoowo meeɗen nder huune fuu.
56002011	Alla wannginanii ɓiɓɓe aadama fuu moƴƴere mum, kayre woni wuddu kisinam.
56002012	Inde janngina en mboɗɗoɗen ko Alla wanyi, accen hidde duuniyaaru duu heɓa nder mayru mbaawen ko'e men, mbuuren no dartori nder kulal Alla.
56002013	Hano nii mbaawirɗen dekude gokka no wooɗiri dow bannginol teddungal Alla meeɗen mawɗo e Kisinoowo meeɗen Iisa Almasiihu.
56002014	O mursi yonki makko ngam yoɓude nyamaane nde hakke meeɗen rimani en, heɓa kisen bone fuu. O laaɓina en heɓa laatoɗen himɓe makko, kargiiɓe dow gaɗol golle lobbe.
56002015	Ɗum woni ko kaanuɗaa jannginde. Nder majjum aɗa haani eeltude himɓe, cemmbinɗinaa ɓe, kollitaa ɓe nder dabareeji maaɗa fuu. Taa jaɓu neɗɗo fuu yawe.
56003001	Miccintin goonɗinɓe fuu, ko iɓe kaani leesinde ko'e maɓɓe yeeso laamiiɓe, he dawrooɓe fuu. Iɓe kaani waɗude ko ndarna fuu, ɓe ciryoo waɗude ko wooɗi fuu.
56003002	To ɓe mbonnu innde neɗɗo fuu amma ɓe laatoo tefooɓe potal, feewɓe ɓerɗe, ɓe kolla himɓe fuu leesinaaku.
56003003	Ngam enen duu, waɗiino wakkati mo mbuurnoɗen nder murtol, nder bahimaare, e nder boofi. En laatakeno maccuɓe belɗum duuniyaaru, ko weli ɓerɗe men tan ngaɗannoɗen. En mbuuriino nder borondi e kiram, eɗen ngaɗa ko'e men wanyaaɓe, eɗen mbanyodira.
56003004	Amma wakkati Alla Kisinoowo meeɗen wanngini moƴƴere mum e hidde mum,
56003005	o hisinii en. Hanaa ngam en ngaɗi golleeji lobbi, amma ngam o yurmake en. O hisinirii en lootaaki kokkuki en laawol rimteede. O heyɗintinii en har Ruuhu Ceniiɗo
56003006	mo o loowiri en pet har Iisa Almasiihu Kisinoowo meeɗen.
56003007	Ndenne, nder moƴƴere makko o adi en dartiiɓe, o hokki en laawol ronude mbuurnam nduumiiɗam ɗam ngattuɗen gokka he mum.
56003008	Sikka fuu walaa, haala kaa no hoolnii. Miɗo hiɗi tiiɗa sanne he makka, heɓa goonɗinɓe Alla fuu ndurwa waɗude golle lobbe. Kanƴum woni ko wooɗi, ko nafata ɓiɓɓe aadama fuu.
56003009	Amma woɗɗa haalaaji meereeji, woɗɗa geddi jaayni, he pooɗodirol dow karfeeje Tawreeta he dow inɗe maamiraaɓe ngam walaa fuu ko ɗum nafata.
56003010	Nde goɗɗo waɗi ko senndata himɓe, cappanee mo nde worre faa nde ɗiɗi, nde nii o jaɓaay, mboɗɗoɗaa mo.
56003011	Aɗa waawi tabbintinde ko ir neɗɗo oo yoofi laawol, omo tittinkinoo nder gaɗol gacce, ndenne kanko hiitani hoore makko.
56003012	Nde mi lilii Artema naa Tikikus to maaɗa, yaawɗaa war tawaa kam nder Nikopolis, ngam ɗon ngiɗumi dabbude.
56003013	Waɗu keddi baawɗe maa ngam wallude Jenas, pansatooɗo himɓe nder kiite, he Apolos, to ɓe keppu baafuy dow laawol maɓɓe.
56003014	Himɓe meeɗen duu no kaani tefa waɗude golle lobbe ngam fiirtude haajuuji mawɗi. Se ɓe ngaɗii non, mbuurnam maɓɓe laatataako meere.
56003015	Wonduɓe he am fuu no canne, sannu higiraaɓe men goonɗinɓe Iisa. Moƴƴere Alla wonda he mooɗon, on fuu.
57001001	Ɗerol ngool ƴuwi to amin, miin Pol, uddaaɗo ngam waaju Habaru lobbo dow Iisa Almasiihu e banndii'en Timote. Miɗen canne, aan Filemon, giɗaaɗo amin, he gollidoowo amin.
57001002	Miɗen canna banndii'en debbo Apiya e Arkipus ballo men nder durwo. Miɗen canna duu goonɗinɓe fuu warooɓe no kawra nder ɓaade maaɗa.
57001003	Alla Baabiraawo e Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo men kokka on jam e moƴƴere.
57001004	Nder du'aa'u am fuu, miɗo yetta Alla ngam maaɗa.
57001005	Miɗo yetta mo ngam mi nanii no ngiɗirɗaa banndiraaɓe meeɗen goonɗinɓe he no ngoonɗinirɗaa Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
57001006	Du'aa'u am woni kawtal gonngal hakkune meeɗen nder goonɗinol Iisa Almasiihu walle kumna barke ɗe ngooduɗen nder makko.
57001007	Banndam, mi nani belɗum sanne, ɓerne am fukkake ngam aɗa holla goonɗinɓe Iisa hidde, aɗa semmbinɗina ɓe.
57001008	Almasiihu hokki kam laawol haalande ma gaɗa ko haani waɗeede,
57001009	amma ngam hidde wonnde hakkune meeɗen, mi suɓake mi eele, miin Pol nayeejo, uddaaɗo ngam Iisa Almasiihu.
57001010	Mi winndani ma ɗerol ngool ngam Onesimus, mo daliila am tuubii, goonɗini Alla. Hannden o laatake hano ɓiyam.
57001011	Ndenno o nafataano ma, amma hannden, en fuu ɗiɗo o nafata.
57001012	Miɗo hiɗi mo faa noy walaa, amma mi waɗan o warta to maa.
57001013	Nde nii mi heɓiino no ngiɗirmi non, nden mi jogoto mo ɗo to am nder kasu to paddaami ngam sabbu Habaru lobbo, habaru dow Iisa Almasiihu.
57001014	Amma mi hiɗaa waɗude goɗɗum tawa mi saawiraay ma. Nde a jaɓi mballaa kam nde a jaɓaay duu, ɗum tilsaay.
57001015	Moy anndi, tawte ɗum fodoore makko, o dogge wakkati seɗɗa nden o warta ko o seedataa he maaɗa kaden faa abada abadin.
57001016	To miilu joonin ko o maccuɗo maaɗa tan. Hannden omo ɓuri maccuɗo, o bannda goonɗinɗo, mo mbaawɗaa hiɗi. Miɗo horsini mo, aan duu aɗa haani horsinde mo sanne ɓurde kam. Ngiɗaa mo ngam o maccuɗo maaɗa, ngiɗaa mo duu ngam o bannda goonɗinɗo Iisa Almasiihu.
57001017	Ndenne, mi eeli ma ngam sabbu ko hawti en, jaɓɓa mo hano no njaɓɓortoɗaa kam.
57001018	Se o waɗii ma gacce gom, naa se aɗa tokka mo goɗɗum, accu miin yoɓete.
57001019	Miin Pol, miin he hoore am haali wi'i mi yoɓete. Amma to yeggitin ko miɗo tokke nyamaane nde mbuurnam maaɗa fuu a waawaa yoɓi kam ngam daliila am ngoonɗinɗaa Almasiihu.
57001020	Too, banndam, mi eelii ma ngam barke Joomiraawo, njaɓɓoɗaa mo no mbi'irmaami.
57001021	Miɗo hoolii ma, waɗi mbinndanmaami. Miɗo anndi duu ko aɗa ɓuri semmbe ko ƴamumaami ɗum.
57001022	Non miin duu, ciryonoɗaa kam weerirde ngam mi tammi ko Alla njaaboto du'aa'uuji mooɗon, o waɗa mi yoofee.
57001023	Epafaras, uddaama kam duu ɗo ngam no waaju habaru Iisa Almasiihu. Omo sanne,
57001024	kanko he Markus, Aristarkus, Demas e Luka wonɓe ɗo no ngollida he am.
57001025	Moƴƴere Iisa Almasiihu, Joomiraawo meeɗen wonda he mooɗon.
58001001	Illa fil'ajal, kile keewɗe Alla haaldi maamiraaɓe meeɗen har annabiiɓe mum he har laabi iri-iriiji.
58001002	Amma nder wakkati cakitiiɗo oo, o haaldirii en har Ɓiyiiko, mo o suɓii, o waɗi donoowo huune fuu. Kanko duu o tagiri huune fuu.
58001003	Kanko laatii annuura mawɗo kolloowo teddungal Alla. Omo nii no Alla wa'i goonga e goonga. Har haala makko ngooduka baawɗe, omo dawrana huune fuu. Gaɗa ko o laatii laawol laaɓinol himɓe yahde he hakkeeji mum'en, o ƴencinaa, o jooɗowi nyaamo Alla Jom baawɗe e teddungal.
58001004	Nii waɗi ko Iisa ɓuri maleykaaɓe fuu manngu hano no innde nde o hokkaa ndee ɓurdi inɗe maɓɓe.
58001005	Iisa ɓuri maleykaaɓe fuu manngu ngam walaa maleykaajo mo Alla wi'anii : Aan a Ɓiyam. Ɓaawo hannden, miin woni Baaba maa. Naa kaden walaa maleykaajo mo o wi'anii kam laatoto Baabamum, maleykaajo oon duu laatoto Ɓiyiiko.
58001006	Wakkati o lilannoo Afo makko oo nder duuniyaaru, o wi'i : Maleykaaɓe makko fuu cujidana mo.
58001007	Dow maleykaaɓe ɓeen o wi'i : Kam no lila ɓe hano keni. Omo waɗa ɓe ngollana mo hano ɗemle hiite.
58001008	Amma dow Ɓiyiiko, o wi'i : Aan a Alla hano am, laamu maa duuman faa abada abadin ! Sawru potal woni sawru ndu laamortoɗaa.
58001009	Aɗa hiɗi dartinaaku, aɗa wanyi oonyaare. Ngam majjum waɗi, o wi'i : Miin, Alla Joomiraawo suɓii ma, wujii ma nebbam, hokki ma belɗum ɓerne ɓurde wondiraaɓe ma fuu.
58001010	No winndaa duu, wi'aa : Illa fuɗɗorde, aan Joomiraawo, joƴƴini beɗi leydi, e juuɗe maa tagirɗaa beɗi kammu.
58001011	Kanƴi, ɗi timman. Amma aan kay, a heddoto. Ɗi fuu ɗi kiɗɗan hano no koltal hiɗɗirta.
58001012	A sowiran ɗi no alkubbaare sowirtee, ɗi mbattitirtee hano no koltal wattitirtee. Amma aan kay, a wattitittaa, mbuurnam maa duu walaa timmoode.
58001013	Baa nde worre, Alla wi'aay maleyka oo naa ooto : War, njooɗaa nyaamo am, faa mi sorna wayɓe maa ley teppere maa.
58001014	Maleykaaɓe nee kanaa ruuhuuji gollanooji Alla non naa ? Hanaa kamɓe lilaa mballowa ronooɓe kisinam naa ?
58002001	Ko nii Alla waɗi Iisa no ɓuri maleykaaɓe fuu manngu, ndenne eɗen kaani wattude hakkillooji meeɗen sanne he ko nanɗen ɗum ngam to en celu laawol goonga.
58002002	Tawreeta, haala Alla ka maleykaaɓe njottini to maamiraaɓe meeɗen kaan tabbitii. Neɗɗo fuu mo teddinaay ka naa jedduɗo ka, heɓi kiite ɗe haani.
58002003	Noy ndaɗirten se en njeebake iri kisinam mawɗam ɗam ? Kisinam ɗam, Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen arti haali dow majjam, nden hettinaniiɓe mo ɓeen duu njottini ɗam to meeɗen.
58002004	Alla he hoore mum har alamaaji, golle mawɗe e kaayɗe feere-fereeje holli ko tabbat haalaaji maɓɓe ɗii no goonga. O holli ɗum nder yeddande goonɗinɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo no o muuyiri.
58002005	Duuniyaaru heyru warooru, ndu ngonɗen eɗen kaala dow mum nduu, Alla hokkaay maleyka fuu baawɗe laamaade ndu.
58002006	Amma nder dewtere gom winndaama, wi'aa : Noy ɓii-aadama foti faa ndekaa hakkillo maa dow mum ? Ko jaasi tagaaɗo faa kakkiloɗaa he mum ?
58002007	A leynii mo wakkatiyel seɗɗa ley maleykaaɓe. A melliri mo darja he teddungal,
58002008	a watti huune fuu ley mardi makko. Walaa fuu ko ɓii-aadama walaa baawɗe dow mum ngam Alla watti huune fuu nder mardi makko. Amma hannden eɗen ngi'ana ko'e meeɗen kujje kepporɗe ɓii-aadama ngam hanaa dow huune fuu ɓe ngoodi baawɗe.
58002009	Ko ngi'uɗen woni Iisa mo leesinaa ley maleykaaɓe nder wakkatiyel seɗɗa, kam nii joonin mellaa darja e teddungal ngam sabbu torra maayde ka o yari. Ndenne, nder moƴƴere Alla o maayi ngam ɓiɓɓe aadama fuu.
58002010	Alla taguɗo huune fuu ngam huune fuu teddina ɗum, no hiɗi ɗuuɗal ɓiɓɓe mum naata nder teddungal mum. Iisa duu woni wuddu kisinam himɓe, ngam majjum no haani Alla humna mo har torra.
58002011	Lamnoowo e lamnaaɓe fuu baaba gooto. Iisa duu woni lamnoowo himɓe he hakkeeji mum'en, ngam majjum waɗi Iisa semtataa inndirde ɓe banndiraaɓe mum, wakkati
58002012	o wi'unoo Alla : Mi haalanan banndiraaɓe am innde maa, mi manete hakkune hawriine maɓɓe.
58002013	O wi'i mo kaden : Mi dekan hoolaare am dow maa. Ndaa miin nii, miin he sukaaɓe ɓe kokkuɗaa kam, aan Alla.
58002014	Ngam sukaaɓe ɓeen no ɓiɓɓe aadama, jom'en tewu he ƴiiƴam, ko tawa he maɓɓe fuu no tawa he makko. O wa'ii he maɓɓe ngam har maayde makko o jaalo Seyɗan jogiiɗo baawɗe maayde.
58002015	O soptina himɓe, ɓe mbuurnam mum'en fuu kulkulal maayde waɗi ɗum'en maccuɓe.
58002016	O waraay ngam wallude maleykaaɓe, amma ngam meeɗen, enen jippotooɓe he Ibrahim waɗi o wari.
58002017	Ngam majjum waɗi nder huune fuu omo haani wa'ude he meeɗen ngam o laatoo mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla keewɗo yurmeene he hoolaare nder golle Alla ngam tabbintinde jaafol hakkeeji duuniyaaru fuu.
58002018	Joonin omo waawa hisinde cii'aaɗo fuu ngam kanko e hoore makko, o yari iri torra fuu wakkati o sii'anoo.
58003001	Banndiraaɓe seniiɓe, onon heɓuɓe Alla noddi ɗum'en ngam kawton he muuɗum dow kammu, ndekee hakkillooji mooɗon dow Iisa Almasiihu. Alla lili mo ngam o laatoo mawɗo cakkanooɓe mum, mawɗo cakkanooɓe mo mbi'eten himɓe fuu en tokki.
58003002	Alla suɓake mo. Har golle makko, o holli aadilaaku, ir aadilaaku ngu Muusa holli hakkune jama'aare Alla.
58003003	Se goonga, nyiɓuɗo no ɓuri nyibdi mum manngu, nii Iisa ɓurdi Muusa manngu.
58003004	Suudu fuu he nyiɓuɗo ɗum, amma nyiɓuɗo huune fuu oon woni Alla.
58003005	Muusa golli ngam seedanaade dow ko Alla wi'ata yahde yeeso. O laatake golloowo kolniiɗo hakkune jama'aare Alla fuu.
58003006	Amma Almasiihu no ɓiɗɗo kolniiɗo, ardinaaɗo yeeso jama'aare Alla fuu. Enen ngoni jama'aare Alla ndeen, se tawi en tittinkinake he ɓerne worre nder hoolaare, he nder tammude meeɗen, kujje ɗe piyirten gabaare.
58003007	Enen wonɓe jama'aare Alla goonga e goonga en kettinoo ko Ruuhu Ceniiɗo woni no wi'a en : Hannden, se on nani daane Alla,
58003008	to laatee tiiɗa-nyireeɓe hano maamiraaɓe mooɗon wakkati ɓe murtunoo he Alla, nyannde ɓe cikkunoo Alla nder ladde yeeruure.
58003009	Alla wi'i : Toon ɓe ponni ko'e maɓɓe he am, baa ko ɓe ngi'ii golle ɗe ngaɗumi nder duuɓi lasooji ɗiɗi, ɓe tinni, iɓe tefa hunnduko am.
58003010	Tefol hunnduko am ngool waɗi tikkanmi ɓe, mbi'umi : Wakkati fuu iɓe cela laabi am, iɓe mbanyi tokkude kam !
58003011	Faa ɓerne am metti, kuniimi, mbi'umi : Ɓe naatataa faa abada nder powtiri ndi ciryiimi ndiin.
58003012	Ndenne banndiraaɓe, kakkilee to baa gooto mooɗon tawree hakke he rafi goonɗinol nder ɓerne mum, tutoore ɗum tottito he Alla Duumiiɗo.
58003013	Hannden Alla nii no nodda on. Ndenne, nyannde fuu cemmbinɗinodiree ɓerɗe, cemmbinɗinol nafoongol nyalaane hannden ndee, ngam to gooto mooɗon fuu laatoo tiiɗa-nyireejo, hiilee naata nder waɗude hakke.
58003014	Sabu sikka fuu walaa, en kawridooɓe he Almasiihu nde nii en njogake no wooɗiri goonɗinol meeɗen gootol, ngol ngoodunoɗen wakkati puɗɗuɗen goonɗinde faa wara he timmoode meeɗen.
58003015	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Hannden, se on nani daane Alla, to laatee tiiɗa-nyireeɓe hano maamiraaɓe mooɗon wakkati ɓe murtunoo he Alla.
58003016	Moy'en ngoni nanuɓe daane Alla dey murti he makko ɓeen ? Murtuɓe ɓeen ngoni tawaaɓe nder jama'aare nde Muusa ardi wakkati burtaaki mum'en nder leydi Misira.
58003017	Moy'en ngoni himɓe ɓe Alla tikkani duuɓi lasooji ɗiɗi ɓeen ? Murtuɓe caami, maayi nder ladde ɓeen, kam'en ngoni ɓe Alla tikkani ɓeen.
58003018	Moy'en ngoni ɓe o hunii naatataa nder powtiri ndi o siryi ndiin ? Saliiɓe mo ɓeen, kam'en ngoni hunaaɓe naatataa abada nder powtiri ndiin.
58003019	En ngi'ii duu ko rafi goonɗinol maɓɓe waɗi ɓe keɓaay sorude ley powtiri ndiin.
58004001	Alkawal naatol meeɗen nder powtiri Alla ndiin no ɗon faa hannden, ndenne kakkiloɗen to neɗɗo meeɗen fuu tawee wettori heppa naatude.
58004002	Ngam enen duu, en nanii Habaru lobbo oo hano no ɓe nanirnoo mo nder ladde yeeruure. Amma kamɓe kay, wakkati ɓe nanunoo mo, o nafaay ɓe ngam ɓe kettinaaki mo goonga e goonga.
58004003	Amma enen goonɗinɓe, enen ngoni naatooɓe nder powtiri Alla ndiin. En tayko haala Alla mbi'uka : Nder tikkere am kuniimi, mbi'umi : Ɓe naatataa nder powtiri am abada ! Alla wi'i ɗum baa ko tawi o humni golle makko fuu illa wakkati cinngol duuniyaaru.
58004004	Ngam dow nyalaane jeɗɗaɓere ndeen, nder dewtere gom winndaama wi'aa : Gaɗa golle balɗe jeegom Alla fowti nyalaane jeɗɗaɓere ndeen.
58004005	Nden nder cotol gom Alla wi'i kaden : Ɓe naatataa nder powtiri am faa abada.
58004006	Artuɓe nani Habaru lobbo oon nden calii goonɗinde mo, naataay nder powtiri Alla ndiin ngam ɓe murti he makko. Amma woɓɓe keɓan laawol naatude nder mayri.
58004007	Ngam majjum waɗi Alla darni nyalaane gom wi'eteene « hannden ». Alla haali dow nyalaane ndeen har hunnduko Daawda gaɗa ɗum waɗi duuɓi e duuɓi hano no ɗum tawa nder dewtere wi'ude : Hannden, se on nanii daane makko, to tinnee ɓerɗe mooɗon laatoɗon tiiɗa-nyireeɓe.
58004008	Ngam sikka fuu walaa nde nii tawaama Yosu'a waddaniino ɓiɓɓe Isra'el powtiri, Alla haalataano dow nyalaane gom.
58004009	Huune ndee hollata ko faa warde hannden powtiri jama'aare Alla ndeen no ɗon.
58004010	Ngam naatuɗo nder powtiri Alla, kam duu fowtan no Alla fowtiri nder golleeji mum.
58004011	Ndenne, no tilsi tinnoɗen no mbaawirɗen fuu faa naaten nder powtiri Alla ndiin to baa gooto meeɗen heppu naatude ngam sabbu tokkitaare wayɓe Alla ɓeen.
58004012	Hakiika haala Alla no wuuri, ika woodi semmbe. Ika ɓuri takubaahi ki ɗemle ɗiɗi ƴaraaki welude. Ika naata neɗɗo faa nder, ka senndodira ruuhu e yonki, gi'al he mbusam. Ika faama miilooji e anniyaaji gonɗi nder ɓerne.
58004013	Nder ko Alla tagi fuu, walaa ko suuɗanii mo. Huune fuu no daɗɗi yeeso makko no fiirtii. Kanko duu limtanten ko ngaɗuɗen nder mbuurnam meeɗen fuu.
58004014	Ndenne, en tiɓino no wooɗiri goonɗinol meeɗen, ngol mbi'eten himɓe fuu en tokkii. Ngam en keɓii mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla, Iisa Ɓii-Alla, ƴencuɗo dow yottowi faa hadde Alla.
58004015	Mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla meeɗen oon, hanaa baawɗo yurmaade en wakkati njaccuɗen non. Walaa fuu no o sii'iraaka amma walaa fuu hakke gi'aaɗe he makko.
58004016	Ndenne, to en kulu ɓattaade jooɗorgal Alla to moƴƴere makko woni, keɓen yaafa he moƴƴere, mballa en wakkati ɗum nafata en fuu.
58005001	Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla fuu no suɓee hakkune himɓe, nden halfinee golle Alla ngam maɓɓe. O yottina iri sadakaaji gaɗeteeɗi fuu ngam sabbu hakkeeji maɓɓe.
58005002	Omo haani hollude ɓe anndaa he woofooɓe faamo, ngam kanko he hoore makko omo woodi jaccere.
58005003	Ngam jaccere makko ndee waɗi, no tilsi o waɗana hoore makko sadaka, nden ko o waɗa sadakaaji himɓe.
58005004	Neɗɗo fuu waawaa waɗi hoore mum mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla, se hanaa Alla suɓii joomum noddi ɗum hano no o suɓori, o noddi Haaruuna nii.
58005005	Almasiihu duu, hanaa kam waɗi hoore muuɗum mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla. Alla waɗi mo ɗum, wi'i mo : Aan woni Ɓiyam, ɓaawo hannden miin woni Baaba maa.
58005006	Kanko duu wi'i to gom : A cakkanoowo Alla iri Malkisedek faa abada.
58005007	Wakkati Iisa wonnoo nder duuniyaaru, o fiyi wullaanu mawnu, o rufi gonɗi, o waɗi du'aa'uuji. O eeli Alla, o eeliti mo ngam hisina mo maayde. Alla jaɓi du'aa'uuji makko, ngam he ɓerne worre o hokki hoore makko Alla.
58005008	Baa ko o Ɓiyiiko, o ekkitake ɗowtanaade mo ley torraaji ɗi o yari.
58005009	Gaɗa ko Alla waɗi mo jottiiɗo to haani yotteede fuu, o laatani ɗowtaniiɓe mo wuddu kisinam nduumiiɗam.
58005010	Alla suɓii mo waɗi mo mawɗo cakkanooɓe ɗum iri Malkisedek.
58005011	Dow habaru oo miɗen njogii haalaaji keewɗi, amma fiirtande on ɗi no tiiɗi ngam on kanaa paamilawooɓe.
58005012	Oɗon kaannoo laataade jannginooɓe illa ko ɓooyii, amma faa hannden oɗon ngiɗi janngineede kujje ɓurɗe hoyne nder haala Alla. Kosam kaanuɗon hanaa nyaamdu tekkunu,
58005013	ngam nyaamdu tekkunu mawɓe kaani ɗum. Baddo fuu faamanaa habaru dartinaaku, amma mawɗo kay nder mbuurnam hannden e jaaŋo no waawi senndodirde ko wooɗi e ko boni.
58006001	Ndenne, en accu jannde arandere warde dow Almasiihu ndeen, ngaren dow jannde ɗiggune. To en ngartu dow habaru tuubol e goonɗinol Alla,
58006002	ekkitaaki dow gaɗol batisma feere feere, jowol juuɗe, ummitaaki maayɓe, he kiite duumiiɗe, laatiiɗe ɗaɗol jannde arandere ndeen.
58006003	Ɗum woni ko ngaɗeten nde Alla jaɓi.
58006004	Sikka fuu walaa yoofuɓe laawol Alla, heɓuɓe jeyngol Alla, meeɗuɓe moƴƴere makko, hawtuɓe he Ruuhu Ceniiɗo,
58006005	annduɓe belɗum haala Alla moƴƴuka, meeɗuɓe baawɗe gaɗeteeɗe nder wakkati garoowo,
58006006	nde nii ɓe kokki Alla ɓaawo, ɓe mbaawaa tuubii kaden. Ngam iɗum nanndi hano kamɓe he ko'e maɓɓe tonti Ɓii-Alla, ɓe cemtini mo caka himɓe fuu.
58006007	Nde nii ngesa haari ndiyam, se nga funni aawdiiri nafoori remuɓe nga, Alla barkini nga.
58006008	Amma nde nga funni kebbe e tuppe, ɗe ngalaa nafakka fuu, ɗum ɓooyataa ko nga huɗee, nga wulee.
58006009	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, baa se min kaali iri haalaaji ɗii, sikka fuu walaa miɗen anndi ko oɗon dow laawol lobbol, laawol kisinam.
58006010	Ngam Alla no dartiiɗo, o yeggitittaa golle mooɗon lobbe he hidde nde kolluɗon, wakkati mballannoɗon himɓe Alla hano no ngonɗon oɗon ngaɗira nii faa warde hannden.
58006011	Ko min ngiɗi woni neɗɗo mooɗon fuu tarsiino faa wooɗa ngam yaarude goonɗinol mum yeeso faa yotto he nyalaane mum sakitittoone heɓa ko keɗiɗon.
58006012	Ndenne, on kaanaa yoofude amma on kaanaana nyemminde, ɓe nder goonɗinol mum'en he munyal mum'en keɗi faa keɓi tammude nde Alla waɗani ɗum'en.
58006013	Wakkati Alla waɗannoo Ibrahim alkawal, Alla hunorii hoore mum, walaa fuu ɓurɗo mo, mo o hunorto.
58006014	O huni, o wi'i Ibrahim : Tabbintin ko mi barkinte, mi ɗunnan jippotooɓe he maaɗa.
58006015	Gaɗa munyal manngal Ibrahim heɓi ko Alla fodi hokkude ɗum.
58006016	Nde nii himɓe no kunoo, ɓurɗo ɗum'en manngu ɓe kunorto. Hunayeere ndeen no tabbintina ko haala maɓɓe no goonga. Inde sennda geddi fuu.
58006017	Wakkati Alla hiɗunoo hollude himɓe heɓooɓe fodoore mum, ko sikka fuu walaa ko haala mum ummataako, o huni non ngam o tabbintina ka.
58006018	Kujje ɗiɗi gom no ɗon ɗe mbattitittaa abada. Kujje ɗee ngoni fodoore e hunayeere Alla. Kujje ɗiɗi ɗe mbaawtaa laatii fewre, ngam majjum waɗi iɗe cemmbinɗina ɓerɗe meeɗen, enen woppuɓe fuu ndoggiri mo ngam heɓude tammude nde o waɗani en.
58006019	Gokka meeɗen kaa woni bonjariyal semmbenteyal, jogiingal yonkiiji meeɗen hannden. Gokka meeɗen kaa, kam fedditi Riido birnoowo nokkuure ɓurne senaade dow kammu.
58006020	Ɗon Iisa ardi en, o naati faa yeeso ngam fiirtande en laawol. O laatii mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla iri Malkisedek faa abada.
58007001	Malkisedek, cakkanoowo Alla Toowɗo laatakeno laamiiɗo huɓeere Saliima. Wakkati Ibrahim ƴuwannoo to konu naatungu hakkune mum he laamiiɓe gom, ɓe o jaali. Malkisedek taɓɓitowi mo, barkini mo.
58007002	Ibrahim itti jakka nder huune fuu ko o heɓunoo, o hokki Malkisedek. Maana innde Malkisedek woni : « Laamiiɗo dartinaaku ». O laamiiɗo Saliima, naa mbi'en laamiiɗo « jam ».
58007003	Dewtere faaminaay fuy dow inniiko naa baabiiko, naa maamiraaɓe makko. Dewtere haalaay fuy dow dimeeki makko naa dow maayde makko. Amma inde nanndina mo he Ɓii-Alla. Ngam majjum waɗi o cakkanoowo Alla faa abada abadin.
58007004	Ndaaree no teddungal Malkisedek foti manngu, faa maamii'en Ibrahim he hoore mum itti jakka dow ko heɓunoo nder konu, hokki mo.
58007005	Jippotooɓe he Lewi kam'en tan Tawreeta hokki laawol jaɓude jakka he ɓiɓɓe leydi Isra'el e banndiraaɓe maɓɓe baa nii ko ɓe fuu ɓe go'o. Ɓe fuu ɓe taaniraaɓe Ibrahim.
58007006	Amma baa ko Malkisedek jeydaaka he Lewi, o jaɓi jakka dow njawdi Ibrahim, o barkini mo, kanko keɓuɗo podooje Alla.
58007007	Sikka fuu walaa, ɓurɗo manngu kam barkinta ɓurɗo famɗude.
58007008	Jippotooɓe he Lewi ɓee, jaɓooɓe jakka, ɓe fuu ɓe maayooɓe, amma Malkisedek no buurɗo hano no Dewtere seedorii ɗum.
58007009	Har laawol kokkol jakka Ibrahim ngool, eɗen mbaawi wi'ude ko Lewi fadde mum jaɓude jakkaaji, yoɓaana jakka hoore mum.
58007010	No waawi wi'eede non ngam wakkati Ibrahim fottunoo he makko ndeen, Lewi rimaakano amma no tawa nder duhol maamiiɗum Ibrahim.
58007011	Tawreeta kokkaaɗo ɓiɓɓe Isra'el, sinngaakana dow golle cakkanol Alla ɗe Lewinkooɓe ngaɗi. Joonin nde nii tawanooma ko golle cakkanol Alla ɗeen kuuɓiino, garol cakkanoowo Alla feereejo gom hano Malkisedek, mo ƴuwaay he Haaruuna sam sam, haajaakano.
58007012	Ndenne, se ardaŋal diina waylitake, tilay duu tilsinooje ɗeen mbattitee.
58007013	Haalaaji ɗii kaalaama dow Joomiraawo meeɗen, o ƴuwaay he lenyol Lewi, o ƴuwaana he lenyol feerewol gom. Nder maggol duu walaa fuu golluɗo golle cakkanoowo Alla, baa nde worre.
58007014	Ngam neɗɗo fuu no anndi ko Joomiraawo meeɗen he lenyol Yahuuda ƴuwi. Muusa wi'aay fuy dow maggol wakkati o haalannoo dow golle cakkanol Alla.
58007015	Ko ngonɗen eɗen kaala ɗum nii hannden wanngi yaasin wakkati cakkanoowo Alla feereejo gom iri Malkisedek wanngi.
58007016	O laataaki cakkanoowo Alla hano no tilsinooje ɗeen kaalirnoo ɗum ngam o ƴuwi he Lewi. Amma o laatake cakkanoowo Alla nder baawɗe mbuurnam ɗam hantataa.
58007017	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : A cakkanoowo Alla iri Malkisedek faa abada.
58007018	Ndenne, tilsinoore arandere ndeen hennaama senngo ngam nde walaa semmbe, nde nafataa.
58007019	Tawreeta Muusa waɗaay himɓe laatoo huuɓuɓe, ngam majjum waɗi kokkaɗen tammude ɓurde wodde, tammude nde har mum mbaawɗen ɓadaade Alla.
58007020	Hanaa tammude ndee tan Alla hokki en, o ɓeydani en hunayeere makko duu. Ngam wakkati Lewinkooɓe naatannoo nder golle cakkanol Alla, Alla hunaaki,
58007021	amma wakkati Iisa naatannoo o huni non, o watti mo. Nder dewtere no winndaa wi'aa : Joomiraawo hunake, o umminta haala makko. A cakkanoowo Alla faa abada.
58007022	Ngam sabbu hunayeere ndee, Iisa laatii tabbintinoowo amaana keso ɓurɗo amaana arano oon.
58007023	Ko seedi amaana keso oo he arano oon duu woni : Cakkanooɓe Alla aranɓe ɗuuɗinoo sanne ngam maayde haɗi ɓe ɓe nduuma nder golle maɓɓe.
58007024	Amma Iisa wuuran faa abada, buurol makko ngol waɗi golle cakkanol Alla ɗe o waɗi ɗeen duuma faa abada.
58007025	Ngam majjum waɗi, har laawol makko, o baawɗo hisinde neɗɗo fuu ɓadiiɗo Alla faa abada. Sikka fuu walaa Iisa no wuuri, ndenne omo waawi du'anaade himɓe to Alla.
58007026	Iisa woni mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla mo kaajaɗen. O ceniiɗo, o walaa fuu feloore gom, laru fuu walaa he makko. Omo seedi he waɗuɓe hakke, o teddinaaɗo ɓurɗo huune fuu ko tawa dow kammu.
58007027	O nanndaa he mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeeto, waɗanooɓe ko'e mum'en sadaka nyannde fuu ngam hakkeeji mum'en, nden ko ngaɗana himɓe duu sadaka. Iisa kay, gaba go'o mursi yonki mum ngam laatanoo himɓe fuu sadaka moytoowo hakke fuu.
58007028	Tawreeta no watta mawɓe cakkanooɓe Alla jaccuɓe, amma hunayeere Alla gaɗa jippaaki Tawreeta watti Ɓiɗɗo laatiiɗo kuuɓuɗo faa abada.
58008001	Nder ko ngonɗen eɗen kaala ɗum ko ɓuri woni : Eɗen ngoodi mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla gonɗo dow, no jooɗii nyaamo Alla Jom baawɗe e teddungal.
58008002	Omo golla, golle makko nder nokkuure seniine, hukumuuru goongaaru. Hukumuuru nduu, Joomiraawo waɗi ndu, hanaa neɗɗo gom waɗi ndu.
58008003	Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla fuu no suɓee ngam yottinde to Alla hadiyaaji he sadakaaji kirseteeɗi. Ngam majjum waɗi no tilsi Iisa mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla heɓa ko yottinta.
58008004	Nde nii omo wonnoo nder duuniyaaru nduu non, nden o laatataakono cakkanoowo Alla baa seɗɗa, ngam no woodi yottinooɓe sadakaaji ɓe Tawreeta hokki laawol.
58008005	Cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen ngollata nder nokkuure tinndinoore en ko woni dow kammu. Wakkati Muusa siryinoo waɗa hukumuuru nduun, Alla wi'i mo : Tinnaa, waɗir huune fuu no kollirmaami ɗum dow waamnde.
58008006	Amma joonin, Almasiihu halfinaa golle dewal, golle ɓurɗe ɗe maɓɓe wodde, ngam kanko watti amaana keso gonɗo hakkune himɓe he Alla. Amaana oo sinngaama dow podooje lobbe sanne.
58008007	Nde nii tawanooma, ko amaana arano oon walaano fuu laru gom, nden ɗiɗaɓo oon waɗataakeno.
58008008	Alla hi'i boofi keewɗi ɗi himɓe mum ngaɗi, nden feli ɓe wi'i : Miin Joomiraawo, miɗo wi'a on nyalaaɗe no ngaran, ɗe ngaɗidanmi he himɓe leydi Isra'el, he himɓe leydi Yahuuda amaana keso.
58008009	Amaana keso oo, nanndataa he amaana mo ngaɗidinoomi he maamiraaɓe maɓɓe, wakkati ɗowunoomi ɓe faa ɓe mburtii leydi Misira. Ngam ɓe njogaaki amaana am, waɗi miin duu mi saanaay ɓe.
58008010	Ndaa, nde ɓeydake seɗɗa : Amaana mo ngaɗidanmi he ɓiɓɓe Isra'el oon nii : Mi wattan tilsinooje am nder hakkillooji maɓɓe, mi winnda ɗe nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, mi laatoo Alla maɓɓe, ɓe laatoo himɓe am.
58008011	Kaden fotaay neɗɗo fuu tinndina gondo mum, naa wi'a banndum : Aɗa haani annda Joomiraawo, ngam himɓe fuu no anndan kam, pamaro yahde mawɗo maɓɓe.
58008012	Ngam mi yaafoto hakkeeji maɓɓe, mi moytan hakkeeji maɓɓe pat nder hakkillo am. Ɗum woni ko mbi'umi, miin Joomiraawo.
58008013	Wakkati o haali habaru amaana keso oo, o hiɗɗini amaana arano oon. Joonin kay, ko naywi faa hiɗɗi ɗum, ɓadake halkude.
58009001	Amaana arano oon no jogii tilsinooje kawjiiɗe laabi dewal Alla he tilsinooje kawjiiɗe nokkuure ittanaane Alla nder duuniyaaru.
58009002	Hukumuuru peccaanu pecce ɗiɗi gom no tawa nder nokkuure ndeen. Innde feccere arandere ndeen woni nokkuure seniine. Nder mayre no tawa fitilla e teebur gom, mo dow mum buuru ittanaaɗo Alla oon deketee.
58009003	Feccere ɗiɗaɓere ndeen no tawa gaɗa riido palaaɗo nder hukumuuru nduun. Inde inndiree nokkuure ɓurne senaade.
58009004	Ley mayre no tawa urorde waɗiraane kaŋŋe e Keesuwal amaana moytirangal kaŋŋe nder e yaasin fuu. Nder Keesuwal ngaal no woodi tummbugel kaŋŋe gom, nder maggel no tawa nyaamdu gom wi'eteenu « manna ». Sawru Haaruuna wilitindu, alluuje ɗe dow mum amaana arano oon winndaa no tawa nder maggal.
58009005	Dow Keesuwal ngaal no tawa nate gom tinndinooje maleykaaɓe ɗiɗo gom kollooɓe teddungal Alla wi'eteeɓe keruba'en. Ɗowdi bippoole majje no kuura ommbirgal Keesuwal ngaal. Amma joonin en ngalaa wakkati ngam famtinde kujje ɗee fuu gootel gootel.
58009006	Nii kujje ɗee fuu moƴƴiniraa. Nyannde fuu cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen, daliila golle maɓɓe iɓe naata, iɓe mburtoo nder feccere arandere ndeen.
58009007	Amma ley hitaane, mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla oon tan woni naatoowo faa nder feccere ɗiɗaɓere ndeen, kam duu nde worre. No tilsi duu o nadda he ƴiiƴam ndabba kirsaaŋa sakkaa ngam hakkeeji makko he hakkeeji himɓe gaɗaaɗi nder rafi anndal fuu moytee.
58009008	Ko Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hiɗi holla ɗo nii : Nde nii feccere arandere ndeen no darii, too laawol naatude nokkuure ɓurne senaade ndeen walaa.
58009009	Ko Ruuhu holli ɗum no misaali tinndinoowo dow jamaanu hannden. Maana majjum woni : Hadiyaaji e sadakaaji kirseteeɗi ngam Alla mbaawtaa itti wamre hakke wonnde nder ɓerɗe himɓe.
58009010	Ko woni no hiɗee haaleede ɗo woni filla nyaamɗe, jarɗe e lootaaki ngam laaɓal. Tilsinooje non daarooje mbuurnam ɓanndu, gonnooɗe no ngolliree fadde Alla wattitide huune fuu.
58009011	Almasiihu wanngi joonin hano mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla, ngam waddande en moƴƴereeji lobbi. O naati hukumuuru ɓurnu manngu e ɓurnu huuɓude. Hukumuuru ndu junngo ɓii-aadama waɗaay. Hukumuuru ndu tawaaka nder duuniyaaru meeɗen.
58009012	O naati gaba go'o nder nokkuure ɓurne senaade. O naddaay ƴiiƴam ilooji, naa ƴiiƴam ga'i gom. Ƴiiƴam hoore makko o naddi, o rimɗini en faa abada abadin.
58009013	Ƴiiƴam ilooji, ƴiiƴam ga'i e ndooni nyale wulaange, kam'en mbiccetee dow waɗuɓe hakke ngam laaɓinde ɓe hano no finaa-tawaaji tilsiniri ɗum.
58009014	Nde nii goonga fuu, nii haani waɗeede, too no woodi ko ɓuri ƴiiƴam Almasiihu baawɗe naa ? Kanko mo nder ardaŋal Ruuhu duumiiɗo sakkani Alla hoore mum. O laatii sadaka mo walaa fuu feloore. Ƴiiƴam makko ɗam laaɓinta ɓerɗe meeɗen, itta ɗe nder gaɗol golleeji bonɗi ngam ɗowtanoɗen Alla duumiiɗo.
58009015	Ko waɗi Iisa laatii gartiroowo potal hakkune himɓe he Alla, kam woni himɓe ɓe Alla noddi keɓa ndonu nduumiingu, ngu Alla he hoore mum fodanii ɓe nder amaana keso. Maayde Iisa wari rimɗini himɓe, waɗunooɓe hakke nder jamaanu amaana arano.
58009016	Nokku fuu to ɗerol cenndol ndonu tawa, no tilsi lamnee ko binnduɗo ngol oon maayii.
58009017	Ngam tabbat ɗerol ngool gollataa nde hanaa binnduɗo oon maayu non. Ndenne, nde nii binnduɗo ngol oon maayaay, ngol gollataa.
58009018	Ngam majjum waɗi, amaana arano oon tabbitittaa, nde ƴiiƴam rufaaka.
58009019	Ko Muusa janngi tilsinooje tawaaɗe nder Tawreeta ɗeen yeeso himɓe fuu, o hooƴi ƴiiƴam ga'i, ƴiiƴam ilooji, o hawrodiri e ndiyam. O suuwi leeɓi baali boɗeeji he licce isop nder ƴiiƴeele ɗeen, o wicci he dewtere Tawreeta, nden o wicci he himɓe fuu.
58009020	O wi'i : Ɗum woni ƴiiƴam tabbintinoojam amaana mo Alla tilsini tokkon.
58009021	O wicci ɗam kaden dow hukumuuru wonndu nder nokkuure ittaane Alla ndeen. O wicci ɗam he gineeji dewirɗi Alla ɗiin fuu.
58009022	Ndenne hano no Tawreeta holliri ɗum, ƴiiƴam no lamna huune fuu, amma nde ƴiiƴam rufaaka, jaafol hakke walaa.
58009023	Nde nii no tilsi kujje tinndinooje kujje gonɗe dow laaɓiniree sadakaaji, ndenne kujje goongaaje gonɗe dow ɗeen kay kaanaana laaɓiniree sadaka gom ɓurɗo sadakaaji ɗiin.
58009024	Almasiihu naataay nder nokkuure ɓurne senaade nde ɓii-aadama waɗi. Amma, nder nokkuure ɓurne senaade wonnde dow kammu o ƴeenyi, to o woni omo darani en yeeso Alla. Nokkuure ɓurne senaade nde juuɗe ɓiɓɓe aadama ngaɗaay ndeen, nokkuure tinndinoore nokkuure ɓurne senaade goonga e goonga wonnde dow kaamu non.
58009025	Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla hitaane warde hitaane no naata nder nokkuure ɓurne senaade, hanaa ngam sakkude ƴiiƴam hoore mum amma ngam sakkude ƴiiƴam fereejam gom. Amma en ngi'ii ko Almasiihu kay gaba go'o naati ngam sakkude hoore mum.
58009026	Se tawinoo kile keewɗe o naatunoo, nden o torretenoo kile keewɗe illa fuɗɗorde duuniyaaru. Amma nde goonga nder wakkatiiji cakitiiɗi ɗii, nde worre o wanngi. Har banngol makko ngool, o mursi yonki makko gaba go'o ngam moytude hakke himɓe.
58009027	Ɓii-aadama fuu, nde worre tan maayata, gaɗa mum Alla hiito joomum.
58009028	Hano non duu Almasiihu mursiri yonki muuɗum gaba go'o ngam o ronndo hakke himɓe heewɓe. O wanngowan nde ɗiɗaɓere, hanaa ngam ronndaade hakke himɓe, amma ngam hisinde doomuɓe gartol makko.
58010001	Tawreeta Muusa no tinndinoore kujje lobbe garooje tan, amma nde hanaa ɗe goonga e goonga. Baa nii ko nde tilsinii sadakaaji ngaɗee hitaane warde hitaane nde waawaa waɗi, hiɗuɓe ɓadaade Alla har gaɗol sadakaaji ɗii laatoo huuɓuɓe.
58010002	Nde nii sadakaaji ɗii mbaawiino ɓadinde himɓe, nden waɗooɓe ɗi ngayniino golle mum'en. Ngam nde nii rewooɓe ɓeen laaɓinaama ngam hakkeeji mum'en nde worre lok, nden hakkillooji maɓɓe ummataakono kaden.
58010003	Amma nde goonga, hitaane fuu sadakaaji ɗii miccintinta ɓe hakke maɓɓe.
58010004	Ƴiiƴam ga'i e ilooji ɗam waawaa moyti hakke sam,
58010005	waɗi, wakkati Almasiihu naatannoo duuniyaaru, o wi'i Alla : A hiɗaa hadiyaaji e sadakaaji kirseteeɗi, amma a waɗani kam ɓanndu ngam mi ɗowtane.
58010006	Sadakaaji bulaaɗi e sadakaaji gaɗaaɗi ngam moytol hakke duu mbelaa ɓerne maa.
58010007	Yaa Alla ! Ndaa, mi wari ngam waɗude muuyɗe maaɗa. Nii ɗum winndiraa dow am nder dewte.
58010008	Arannde nii ko Almasiihu wi'i Alla nii : A hiɗaa hadiyaaji, a hiɗaa sadakaaji kirseteeɗi naa buleteeɗi. A hiɗaay ɗi, ɗi mbelaa ma.Amma Tawreeta tilsini sadakaaji ɗii fuu ngaɗee.
58010009	Gaɗa mum, o wi'i Alla : Ndaa, mi warii ngam mi waɗa muuyɗe maa.Almasiihu itti sadakaaji arani ɗiin, waddi sadaka keso gom.
58010010	Wakkati Iisa Almasiihu waɗunoo muuyɗe Alla ɗeen, en fuu en laaɓinaama he hakkeeji meeɗen. Ngam, o hokki ɓanndu makko laatanoo en sadaka. O hokkii ndu gaba go'o faa abada abadin.
58010011	Cakkanooɓe Alla no daroo nyannde fuu dow koyɗe mum'en ngam waɗude golle mum'en. Iɓe njottina sadakaaji ɗiin wakkati fuu, amma sadakaaji ɗiin mbaawtaa moyti hakkeeji himɓe.
58010012	Amma Almasiihu kay no seedi he cakkanooɓe Alla ɓee. Gaba go'o o sakki hoore makko ngam hakkeeji himɓe. Sadaka oo duu, heƴi kam tan faa abada. Gaɗa gaɗol sadaka oo o jooɗoowi nyaamo Alla,
58010013	to o doomi Alla sorna wayɓe makko ley teppere makko.
58010014	Ndenne he sadaka gooto oo, o waɗi ɓe o laaɓinnoo he hakke mum'en huuɓuɓe faa abada abadin.
58010015	Ruuhu Ceniiɗo duu no seedanoo en dow majjum, no wi'a :
58010016	Alla Joomiraawo wi'i : Ndaa amaana mo ngaɗidanmi he maɓɓe nder balɗe garooje nii : Mi wattan tilsinooje am nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, mi watta ɗe nder hakkillooji maɓɓe. Ruuhu Ceniiɗo duu no seedanoo en no wi'a kaden : Alla Joomiraawo wi'i :
58010017	Mi moytan sam hakkeeji maɓɓe he bonandaaji maɓɓe nder hakkillo am.
58010018	Ndenne, nde nii hakkeeji fuu njaafaama, sadaka moytoowo hakkeeji fuu haajaaka kaden.
58010019	Banndiraaɓe am, ƴiiƴam Iisa ndufaaɗam ɗam hokki en semmbe naatude nokkuure ɓurne huune fuu senaade.
58010020	O udditani en laawol kesol goodungol yonki, laawol kesol naatirteengol har riido hukumuuru seniinu nduun. Laawol ngool woni maayde makko.
58010021	Eɗen ngoodi mawɗo cakkanoowo Alla, ardinaaɗo suudu Alla.
58010022	Ndenne, en ɓado Alla he ɓerne lamnde he tammude mawne nde goonɗinol meeɗen hokki en. Ɓerne lamnde, nde ko boni fuu walaa nder mum, he ɓanndu lamniraanu ndiyam laaɓɗam.
58010023	En tiɓinoo sanne tammude meeɗen, tammude nde annduɗen fakat no goonga, ngam gaɗanɗo en fodoore ndeen, no kolniiɗo.
58010024	En ngattu hakkillo meeɗen ndaaren no mballodirten hakkune meeɗen, faa hidde he gaɗanodirol golleeji lobbi naata hakkune meeɗen.
58010025	To en paddo koyɗe he kawriiɗe meeɗen hano no woɓɓe paddorto koyɗe mum'en. Amma en cemmbinɗinodir ɓerɗe, ngam en ngi'ii nyalaane Joomiraawo ɓadake.
58010026	Nde nii eɗen keero, eɗen ngaɗa hakke gaɗa ko annduɗen goonga oon faa laaɓi, paamen ko sadaka ittoowo hakkeeji gom fuu walaa gaɗa kaden.
58010027	Amma ko horani en woni keɗoɗen kiite Alla nder kulkulal manngal. Kiite gardooje hiite haaɗunge, halkoowe wayɓe Alla.
58010028	Se neɗɗo murti he Tawreeta Muusa, nde himɓe ɗiɗo naa tato ceedake, joomum no waretee non, yurmeene fuu walanaa joomum.
58010029	Ndenne, ɗume laatoto kiite neɗɗo banyuɗo ɓii-Alla, ndaari meere ƴiiƴam makko ndufaaɗam ngam amaana, ƴiiƴam laaɓinoojam, dey kaden yenni Ruuhu Alla, Ruuhu kokkoowo moƴƴere ? Oɗon mbaawi miilaade iri kiite, ɗe iri neɗɗo oo haani naa ?
58010030	Ngam eɗen anndi Alla bi'uɗo : Miin jeyi yottitaare, miin yoptoto neɗɗo fuu dey-dey ko waɗi. Alla wi'i duu : Miin, Joomiraawo mi hiitoto himɓe am.
58010031	Hey, naatol neɗɗo nder juuɗe Alla duumiiɗo no hulƴinii sanne !
58010032	Miccitee he ko waɗunoo nder mbuurnam mooɗon aranam, wakkati ngoonɗinɗon Iisa Almasiihu. On munyii keddi baawɗe mooɗon.
58010033	Wakkatiiji gom on njennaama, on cemtinaama caka jama'aare. Wakkatiiji gom on torraama, wakkatiiji gom oɗon mballa wonɓe no torree hano mooɗon gom.
58010034	On njurmake wonnooɓe ley kasu. Wooɗi, on njaɓi teetaɗon ko njogiɗon fuu. On njaɓirii ɗum welwelo, ngam oɗon anndi, ko oɗon ngoodi ko ɓuri kujje ɗee fuu wooɗude, kujje ɗe tabbititta faa abada abadin.
58010035	Ndenne, to mboppee hoolaare mooɗon, ngam inde woodi mbarjaari mawni.
58010036	Munyal kaanuɗon, ngam waɗude ko Alla hiɗi, keɓon ko o fodani on.
58010037	No winndaa wi'aa : Seɗɗa hori, seɗɗa tan hori kaanuɗo wara oon, wara, o warilawan.
58010038	Alla wi'i : Goonɗinɗo kam, no dartiiɗo. Goonɗinol mum no wurnan ɗum. Amma nde o hokkii kam ɓaawo, mi nanataa belɗum joomum.
58010039	Enen kay, en njeydaaka he kokkooɓe Alla ɓaawo, kalkooɓe. En goonɗinɓe Alla, en kisintee duu.
58011001	Goonɗinol Alla, tabbintinde keɓol ko neɗɗo tammi non, laawol anndude goongaaji ɗi neɗɗo hi'ataa.
58011002	Ngam maggol Alla yardi he maamiraaɓe meeɗen.
58011003	Ngam en ngoonɗini waɗi paamuɗen ko he haala makko o tagiri dow e ley. Ko hi'etee fuu tagiraama he ko hi'ataake.
58011004	Haabiila, ngam goonɗinii waɗi o ittani Alla sadaka ɓurɗo sadaka Kayinu. Ngam o goonɗinii waɗi Alla jaɓi sadakaaji makko, famtini mo ko o dartiiɗo. Goonɗinol makko ngool waɗi baa nii ko o maayi, omo he waajaade.
58011005	Enok, ngam goonɗinii Alla waɗi ƴencinaa dow ngam to meeɗu maayde sam. Neɗɗo fuu hi'aay mo kaden, ngam Alla ƴencinii mo. Se goonga duu, dewte ceedanake mo, mbi'i illa o ƴencinaaka, omo weli Alla.
58011006	Neɗɗo fuu waawtaa weli Alla, nde nii joomum goonɗinaay. Neɗɗo fuu ɓadii Alla, tilay goonɗina ko Alla no ɗon, omo moƴƴana tefooɓe mo duu.
58011007	Nuhu, ngam goonɗinii waɗi o ɗowtani Alla cappiiɗo mo dow fii, garoowo mo o hi'aay. O waɗi ko Alla wi'i mo. O seki laana ndiyam kaan ngam o danna koreeji makko. O holli ko himɓe ngaɗi hakke. Ngam goonɗinol makko ngool, o laatii dartiiɗo to Alla.
58011008	Ibrahim, ngam goonɗinii Alla waɗi, o jaɓi ko Alla wi'i, o yaha nder leydi ndi kam fodi hokka mo. Ibrahim dilli, tawi anndaa to fa'i.
58011009	Ngam o goonɗinii Alla waɗi o hoɗi ley hukumuuru makko nder leydi ndi o fodanaa ndiin. Isiyaaku he Yakuuba duu njooɗii ley hukumuuji mum'en hano no Ibrahim jooɗori nder mayri. Nii waɗi ko Isiyaaku e Yakuuba ndoni kam'en duu fodoore ndeen.
58011010	Ibrahim waɗi ɗum ngam o haaɓi o hi'aay huɓeere duumiine nde Alla diidi, nyiɓani mo ndeen.
58011011	Ibrahim, ngam goonɗinii waɗi heɓi ɓeyngu baa nii ko naywi. Saratu, deekiiko duu no dimaro. O tabbintinii ko Alla no yottinan haala mum.
58011012	Ngam majjum waɗi he nayeejo gooto oo, naywuɗo faa no heɗi maayde, jippotooɓe ɗuɓɓe ƴuwi. Dimma maɓɓe no fota dimma koode kammu, naa taasiiri daane maayo ndi limataako.
58011013	Himɓe ɓee fuu maaydi goonɗinol Alla, ɓe keɓaay podooje ɗe Alla waɗi ɗeen. Amma ɓe kolliri ɗe to woɗɗi, ɓe nani belɗum. Ɓe njaɓi ko ɓe weerɓe nder duuniyaaru.
58011014	Haaluɓe iri haalaaji ɗii kolli ko kam'en no tefa leydi halal mum'en.
58011015	Nde nii ɓe miccitakeno leydi ndi ɓe ndillunoo nder mum, nden ɓe keɓiino laawol soƴƴaade.
58011016	Amma ɓe ndekii hakkillo maɓɓe dow nokkuure ɓurne wodde, nokkuure wonnde dow. Ngam majjum waɗi, ɗum semtinaaki to Alla, Alla noddiree Alla maɓɓe, ngam o siryanake ɓe huɓeere gom.
58011017	Ibrahim, ngam goonɗinii waɗi, o sakkani Alla ɓiyiiko wakkati Alla sii'iino goonɗinol makko. Baa nii ko Alla waɗani mo fodoore nde nder mum o wi'i : Har Isiyaaku jippotooɓe maaɗa ɓee ƴuwata. Ibrahim hosi sakkude ɓiyum bajjo.
58011019	Ibrahim tabbintinii ko Alla no waawi ummintinde maayɗo, ngam majjum waɗi eɗen mbaawi wi'ude ko Alla hokkiti Ibrahim ɓiyum, hano maayɗo ummitii.
58011020	Isiyaaku, ngam goonɗinii waɗi, o eeli Alla barkinɗina Yakuuba e Isuwa dow ko warata yahde yeeso.
58011021	Yakuuba, ngam goonɗinii Alla waɗi, wakkati o ɓadinoo maayde, o barkinɗini ɓiɓɓe Yusufu ɗiɗo ɓeen gooto gooto. O tuugi dow sawru makko, omo teddina Alla.
58011022	Yusufu, ngam goonɗinii Alla waɗi, wakkati ɓadinoo maayde, haali dow burtaaki ɓiɓɓe Isra'el nder leydi Misira. O tinndini ɓe, no ɓe ngaɗirta ɓanndu makko.
58011023	Saarooɓe Muusa, ngam ngoonɗinii Alla waɗi ɓe cuuɗi Muusa lebbi tati gaɗa dimeeki mum. Ngam ɓe ngi'ii Muusa no cukalel lobbel, ɓe kulaay tilsinoore laamiiɗo oon.
58011024	Muusa, ngam goonɗinii Alla waɗi, wakkati mawnunoo, salii wi'ee ko ɓii-Firawna debbo rimi mo.
58011025	Muusa ngam goonɗinii Alla waɗi suɓii wondude he himɓe Alla nder torraaji mum'en, baa nii ko omo waawi wuurude mbuurnam mbelɗam nder wakkatiyel seɗɗa.
58011026	O hi'i ko o yennee no Almasiihu yenniroytee, no ɓurani mo heɓude njawdi Misira fuu. Ngam gite makko ngalaana no ndeki dow mbarjaari ndi o heɓoyta.
58011027	Muusa, ngam goonɗinii Alla waɗi o hulaay tikkere laamiiɗo Misira, o dilli Misira. O darii nokkuure worre, hakkillo makko no fukkii hano neɗɗo gi'uɗo Alla mo neɗɗo fuu hi'aay.
58011028	Ngam o goonɗinii Alla waɗi o waɗi himɓe Isra'el puɗɗi waɗude Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe. O wi'i ɓe, ɓe mbicca ƴiiƴam he dammbule cuuɗi maɓɓe to maleykaajo ittoowo yonki oon waru afo dimaaɗo maɓɓe fuu.
58011029	Ɓiɓɓe leydi Isra'el, ngam ngoonɗinii waɗi, he koyɗe maɓɓe, ɓe njaaɓi dow leydi njoorni ɓe pedditi maayo Maaliya. Amma wakkati ɓiɓɓe Misira tefunoo peddita, ɓe njoolii nder maggo.
58011030	Ɓiɓɓe leydi Isra'el, ngam ngoonɗinii waɗi, wakkati ɓe ngaɗunoo balɗe jeɗɗi iɓe piiloo huɓeere Yeriko, birniyol huɓeere ndeen saami.
58011031	Rahab, debbo pijoowo oon, ngam goonɗinii Alla waɗi wardaaka he tottitiiɓe Alla. Seyo e jam, o jaɓɓori ɓiɓɓe Isra'el horuɓe leydi makko.
58011032	Ɗume mbi'anmi kaden ? Wakkati oo heƴataa kam mi haala, mi senndodira haalaaji dow Gideyon, Barak, Samson, Yefta, Daawda, Samuwiila, naa dow annabiiɓe gom.
58011033	Ɓe fuu, ngam ɓe ngoonɗinii Alla waɗi, ko ɓe koni leyɗe ɗuɗɗe, ɓe nyaami ɗe. Ɓe laamorii dartinaaku, ɓe keɓi podooje ɗe Alla waɗani ɓe, ɓe maɓɓi kunndule muusuuji ladde.
58011034	Ɓe keli baawɗe hiite haaɗunge, ɓe kisi coppol takubaaje belɗe. Ɓe tampuɓe amma ɓe ngartii semmbenteeɓe. Ɓe laatii suusuɓe nder koni, ɓe ndiiwii konuuji garɗi he maɓɓe.
58011035	Rewɓe gom, ngam ngoonɗinii waɗi maayɓe maɓɓe gom ummintinaa. Himɓe gom torraama faa ɓe kosi maayde, amma ɓe calii tettineede ngam ɓe maaya, ɓe ummintinee nyannde darŋal no ɓurani ɓe.
58011036	Woɓɓe duu njennaama, ɓoccaama. Ɓe nanngaama, ɓe kaɓɓiraama callali, ɓe uddaama.
58011037	Nder maɓɓe, woɓɓe paɗɗaama kaaƴe faa maayi. Woɓɓe taƴaa, cenndaa ɗiɗi, woɓɓe mbardiraama takubaaje. Woɓɓe no wakkati fuu nder perol, iɓe ɓorno guri be'i naa baali. Ɓe teetaama huune fuu ko ɓe njogii. Ɓe torraama, ɓe ngaɗaama ko metti fuu.
58011038	Iɓe piilo nder laddeeji e ley baamle, iɓe njooɗoo nder lowi, nder gayɗe. Duuniyaaru nduu fotaay baa to ɓe ngarta ɓe njooɗoo nder mum.
58011039	Himɓe ɓee fuu, manaama ngam ɓe ngoonɗinii Alla, amma nder maɓɓe walaa keɓuɗo fodoore Alla.
58011040	Ngam Alla siryanake en goɗɗum nafoojum sanne, waɗi ɓe mbaawaa heewtude huune ndee, nde hanaa min keewti nde non.
58012001	Enen wonɓe no tummbi caka goonɗinɓe re'ataa, holluɓe noy goonɗinol mum'en foti eɗen kaani woppude donngal fuu goongal no haɗa en yahde yeeso. Accen waɗude hakke fuu gonɗe no jiiɓa en, tittinkinoɗen illa fuɗɗorde nder ko ƴameɗen, faa njottoɗen he timmoode majjum.
58012002	En ndeku gite meeɗen dow Iisa, omtanɗo en laawol goonɗinde Alla, balloowo en goonɗinol meeɗen huuɓa cap. Ngam belɗum ɓerne nde o heɓata, waɗi o suusi maayde dow leggal bardugal. O wannaaka semteene nde o yarata ngam maayde makko dow maggal. Joonin, omo jooɗii nyaamo jooɗorgal Laamu Alla.
58012003	Miccitee no Iisa munyiri nganyaandi ndi waɗooɓe hakke kolli mo, heɓa to tampiri helu ɓerɗe mooɗon.
58012004	Habdo mooɗon he hakke, heewtaaki to ndufoton ƴiiƴam ginan.
58012005	On njeggitii haala cemmbinɗinooka, iri haala ka baaba haalanta ɓiyum, no wi'a : Ɓiyam, taa yawa eeltol Joomiraawo, taa nanu naawɗum, se o felii ma.
58012006	Ngam mo Joomiraawo hiɗi eltata, o fela mo o daari hano ɓiyum.
58012007	Munyee eltol ngool, ingol moƴƴina mbuurnam mooɗon, ingol holla ko Alla no ada on hano ɓiɓɓe mum. Ɓiɗɗo oye woni mo baaba mum eltataa ?
58012008	Ɓiɗɗo fuu no eltee. Nde nii Alla eltaay on, ndenne hanaa kanko jeyii on, on kanaa ɓiɓɓe Alla.
58012009	Wooɗi duu, eɗen ngoodi baabiraaɓe nder duuniyaaru, eltooɓe en, en teddinii ɓe, sako Baaba meeɗen gonɗo dow eltoowo en ngam keɓen mbuurnam faa abada.
58012010	Baabiraaɓe meeɗen no elta en, ngarten no ɓe ngiɗi ngam wakkati seɗɗa. Amma Alla no elta en ngam ɓeydaari meeɗen, ngarten seniiɓe hano makko.
58012011	Wakkati eltol, belɗum walaa, sey nii naawɗum. Amma gaɗa mum, ingol rimana jaɓuɓe eltee ɓeen jam e dartinaaku.
58012012	Ngam majjum cemmbinɗinee juuɗe mooɗon tampuɗe, cemmbinɗinee koppi mooɗon comuɗi.
58012013	Moƴƴinanee koyɗe mooɗon laabi dartiiɗi, ngam to koyɗe mooɗon laƴooje larɗu amma ɗe nyawta.
58012014	Tittinkinee, ngaɗee keddi baawɗe mooɗon, njooɗodoɗon himɓe he jam. Ngarton seniiɓe, ngam nde hanaa jonnde seniine walaa gi'oowo Joomiraawo.
58012015	Kakkilee, to neɗɗo mooɗon fuu saloo moƴƴere nde Alla waɗani ɗum. To neɗɗo mooɗon fuu laatoo wabbere bonde, raaɓa heewɓe hakkune mooɗon.
58012016	Kinnee to baa gooto mooɗon laatoo jaahili, mo wannaaka he ko Alla wi'i ɗum hano Isuwa, connuɗo mawniraaku mum ngam le'al.
58012017	Oɗon anndi gaɗa mum, o yehii to baabiiko ngam barkina mo, amma baabiiko salii. O tefi fuu no o waɗata ngam baabiiko heɓa moƴƴere gom hokka mo, amma meere. Baa nii ko o woyi walaa ko ɗum nafi.
58012018	Onon, wakkati ɓadiɗon Alla, on ngaraay fuu to waamnde gom nde mbaawɗon meemude, ir waamnde Sinayi, to hiite huɓɓaa, to niɓɓi, to ɓalinde waɗi.
58012019	On nanaay daane luwal, on nanaay haala fuu. Ɓiɓɓe Isra'el nanunooɓe ɗum duu ndaraaki kettinani haala fuu kaden.
58012020	Ɓe mbaawaay hettinaade tilsinoore Alla wi'ude : Yonki fuu meemi waamnde ndee, baa se laatii ndabba non, no faɗɗetee kaaƴe, waree.
58012021	Ko ɓe ngi'ata ɗum no hulƴini, ngam Muusa e hoore mum wi'i ko kam huli sannefaa kam no diwna.
58012022	Amma onon, on ngari waamnde Siyon, huɓeere Alla duumiiɗo, kayre woni Ursaliima keso, huɓeere wonnde dow, to maleykaaɓe ujunaaji ujunaaji kawriti nder welwelo.
58012023	On ngari nder hawriine goonɗinɓe Alla aranɓe, ɓe inɗe mum'en mbinndaa toon dow. On ngari to Alla kiitotooɗo himɓe fuu. On ngari to himɓe dartiiɓe, ɓe Alla waɗi huuɓuɓe.
58012024	On ngari to Iisa gartirɗo potal hakkune himɓe he Alla ley amaana keso. Iisa mo ƴiiƴam mum rufaa, ƴiiƴam makko no waajoo en sanne ɓurde ƴiiƴam Haabiila dufaaɗam.
58012025	Ndenne, tinnee to caloɗon hettinaade Alla gonɗo no haala. Ngam nder duuniyaaru, Muusa haalani ɓiɓɓe Isra'el amma ɓe calake hettinaade mo. Kamɓe duu ɓe kisaay tikkere Alla. Enen, illa dow Alla haaldi he meeɗen nde nii en tottitake mo, sikka fuu walaa en kisataa.
58012026	Ndenno daane Alla yinngii leydi, amma hannden o waɗani en fodoore gom, o wi'i : Mi yinngan leydi ndii, kaden hanaa kayri tan, mi yinngan kammu nguu duu.
58012027	Konngol kaden ngool no holla ko tagaa fuu no yinngetee, moytee heɓa kujje ɗe njinngataako ɗeen nduumo.
58012028	Ngam majjum nde nii en keɓi laamu ngu yinngataako, kulen Alla, njetten mo, teddinen mo nder leesinaaku ngu o hiɗi.
58012029	Ngam nde goonga, Alla meeɗen no hiite nyaamoowe.
58013001	Tintinkinee nder hiɗodirde ngam on banndiraaɓe.
58013002	To njeebee jippinol weerɓe, ngam woɓɓe nder rafi anndal mbernii maleykaaɓe.
58013003	Miccitee he uddaaɓe hano on fuu uddidaa. Miccitee he torraaɓe hano on fuu torridaa.
58013004	Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu teddina dewngal. Worɓe he rewɓe wonɓe nder dewngal, tilay neɗɗo mooɗon fuu daroo he banndum. Ngam Alla no hiitoto piijooɓe nder dewngal he ɓe ngalaa nder dewngal fuu.
58013005	Kakkitee ko'e mooɗon he hidde seedere. Ceyoroɗon ko ngooduɗon, ngam Alla wi'ii : Abada mi woppataa ma. Abada mi yeebataako ma !
58013006	Ngam majjum waɗi eɗen mbaawi mbi'i he ɓerne worre : Joomiraawo woni ballo am, mi hulataa. Ɗume neɗɗo waawani kam ?
58013007	Miccitee ardiiɓe aranɓe, waajiiɓe dow haala Alla. Miccitee noy ɓe njooɗori nder mbuurnam maɓɓe, ndaaree no ɓe timminiri mbuurnam maɓɓe, nyemminon goonɗinol maɓɓe.
58013008	Iisa Almasiihu, no wontirnoo keeŋa, non o woniri hannden, non duu o jooɗorto faa abada abadin.
58013009	To njaɓee waaju fereejo gom, waaju mo tokkaay laawol goonɗinol meeɗen hooƴa hakkillooji mooɗon. Ko ɓuri wodde, woni moƴƴere Alla semmbinɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon. Amma tokkol tilsinooje dow nyaamdu, tilsinooje non ɗe nafataa tokkuɓe ɗum'en.
58013010	Enen, eɗen ngoodi sakkirde, amma cakkanooɓe Alla gollooɓe nder hukumuuru ceniinu ngalaa laawol nyaamude huune fuu ko sakkaa dow mayre.
58013011	Mawɗo cakkanooɓe Alla no nadda ƴiiƴam ko hirsaa sakkanaa Alla ley nokkuure ɓurne nokku fuu senaade ngam moytol hakkeeji, amma tewu ko hirsaa sakkaa yaasin hoɗorde ndeen wuletee.
58013012	Ngam majjum waɗi Iisa duu maayi gaɗa wuro, ƴiiƴam mum rufi ngam har majjam o laaɓina himɓe he hakkeeji mum'en.
58013013	Ndenne enen duu, en mburto, tawowen mo gaɗa wuro, njaɓen cemtineɗen no o semtiniraa.
58013014	En ngalaa huɓeere duumotoone nder duuniyaaru nduu, amma eɗen tefa huɓeere duumotoone waroore gom.
58013015	Sadaka meeɗen mo ngaɗanten Alla woni tinnoɗen eɗen teddinan mo nder haalude he nder jardaaki ko Iisa Almasiihu woni kisinoowo meeɗen.
58013016	To njeebee waɗude ko wooɗi. Cenndee ko njogiɗon, kokkaron ɓeeto. Ɗum woni sadaka belɗo Alla.
58013017	Ɗowtanoɗon ardiiɓe mooɗon. Leesinee ko'e mooɗon, ngaɗon ko ɓe mbi'i on, ngam kamɓe ndoomi on. Alla duu ƴamtan ɓe noy ɓe anndiri on. Tokkee ko ɓe mbi'i, accon ɓe ngolla, golle maɓɓe nder belɗum ɓerne, hanaa nder mettal ɓerne. Ngam nde ɓe ngaɗirii ngal mettal ɓerne, ɗum nafataa on.
58013018	Miɗen eela on du'aa'u. Min tabbintinii ko ɓerɗe amin no laaɓi. Miɗen ngiɗi waɗude ko haani nder huune fuu.
58013019	Miɗo eela on faa noy walaa ndu'anoɗon kam, Alla hokka kam laawol wartoyde to mooɗon law.
58013020	Alla jom jam, ummintini Iisa he maayde, Joomiraawo meeɗen laatiiɗo duroowo baali mawɗo, dufuɗo ƴiiƴam mum, watti amaana keso duumotooɗo hakkune himɓe he Alla.
58013021	Alla hokka on baawɗe waɗude ko wooɗi no ɗum wa'i fuu, ngam ngaɗon muuyɗe makko. O wartira on ko welnanta mo ɓerne ngam Iisa Almasiihu. Teddungal laatanoo Iisa Almasiihu faa abada. Aamiin !
58013022	Banndiraaɓe, ko mbinndanmi on ɗum juutaa sanne, mi eeli on kettinee waajuuji cemmbinɗinooji ɗii.
58013023	Miɗo haalana on ko banndii'en Timote yoofaama. Nde o warilawi to am, mi wardan he makko to mooɗon.
58013024	Miɗen njewta ardiiɓe mooɗon he hiɗuɓe Alla wonduɓe he mooɗon fuu. Banndiraaɓe meeɗen ƴuwɓe leydi Italiya duu no njewta on.
58013025	Moƴƴere Alla wonda he mooɗon, on fuu !
59001001	Miin Yakuuba, golloowo wakkiliiɗo he Alla he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, winndani on ɗerol ngool, onon cuuɗi baaba sappo e ɗiɗi cankitiiɗi nokku fuu. Miɗo sanna on.
59001002	Banndiraaɓe am, nde nii torraaji feere-fereeji keewtake on, njaɓiree ɗi welwelo manngo.
59001003	Ngam oɗon anndi, nde nii goonɗinol mooɗon daartake nder torraaji ɗiin, ɗi ngaɗan on tittinkiniiɓe.
59001004	Amma, sey nde tittinkinaaku mooɗon ɓenndi, ko laatoɗon huuɓuɓe kap, ɓe huune fuu ŋakkanaay.
59001005	Ndenne, nde nii goɗɗo nder mooɗon ŋakki hikmaaku, joomum eela Alla, hokka ɗum ngu. Ngam Alla woni geɗo kokkoowo, mo ƴamtataa.
59001006	Amma sey nii joomum eeliraa goonɗinol, tawee sikkaay. Ngam cikkuɗo fuu no nanndi he benkeƴƴe, ɗe henndu soggata no hiɗiri.
59001007	Neɗɗo fuu ga'uɗo nii, to miilo kam no heɓan goɗɗum he Joomiraawo.
59001008	Ngam neɗɗo oo, ɓerne mum senndake. O anndaa fuu ko o hiɗi. O walaa hoolaare hoore makko nder ko o watta fuu.
59001009	Banndiraawo goonɗinɗo fuu, no haani nde nii no talka, nana belɗum, ngam yeeso Alla joomum no tedduɗo.
59001010	Goonɗinɗo diikuɗo duu, no haani nana belɗum, ngam Alla ɓurdinaay mo ɓeeto. Diikuɗo, pinndi nder ngesa non, balɗe seɗɗa sooto.
59001011	Nde nyawli, naange ɗaylina aawitirdi ndiin, pinndi mayri sooto saama, wodde mayri fuu majjaa. Nii diikuɗo saamirta, maaya, golleeji mum ɗi tokkitii fuu mbona.
59001012	Belɗo hoore woni munyuɗo wakkati naati nder cii'aaki. Ngam nde o tittinkinake, Alla melliran mo mbuurnam nduumiiɗam, ɗam o fodani hiɗuɓe mo.
59001013	Nde neɗɗo no woodi anniya waɗude ko boni, to joomum wi'u Alla uppi ɗum, waɗa bone oo. Ngam Alla uppataa neɗɗo waɗa bone. Neɗɗo fuu duu waawaa uppi Alla waɗa bone.
59001014	Amma neɗɗo fuu suuno mum bonngo uppata ɗum, fooɗa ɗum waɗa ko wooɗaa.
59001015	Gaɗa majjum, aawdiiri suuno bonngo, nde fuɗi rimataana hakke. Wakkati hakke mawni faa ɓenndi, kam duu rimataana maayde.
59001016	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, to majjinee ko'e mooɗon.
59001017	Moƴƴere e kujje lobbe fuu ɗe kokketeɗen, dow ƴuwanta en. Ɗum fuu, ɗum ƴuwataana to Alla Baabiraawo, taguɗo ko woni no yayna nder kammu fuu. Alla waylataako, o sottataa, o niɓɓataa.
59001018	Kanko muuyi, waɗi en ɓiɓɓe makko. Har haala makko goongaha, o waɗi en rimitaaɓe, ngam laatoɗen artuɓe nder ko o tagi fuu.
59001019	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, paamee ko no haani neɗɗo mooɗon fuu horkita nowru mum hettinoo, amma to ɗuuɗu hunnduko. To yaawu ɓernude,
59001020	ngam ɓernuɗo wattaa ko dartii yeeso Alla.
59001021	Ndenne mboppee huune fuu ko tunninta on he ko wattata borondi nder ɓerɗe mooɗon. Leynee ko'e mon njaɓɓoɗon haala ka Alla aawi nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, ngam ika waawi hisinde yonkiiji mooɗon.
59001022	To ndaree he kettinaaki tan, amma ngaɗee ko haala Alla wi'i on. Nde hanaa non on njammbake ko'e mon.
59001023	Kettintooɗo ka tan, dey waɗaay ko ka wi'i, wa'aana ƴeewuɗo yeeso mum nder danndorgal,
59001024	ngam hi'a no wa'i. Amma wakkati seɗɗa gaɗa mum o yeggita no ngo wa'i.
59001025	Amma neɗɗo fuu watti hakkillo janngi tilsinooje kuuɓɗe, dimɗinooje, feŋi he majje, hettinanii ɗe, yeggitaay ɗe, waɗi ko ɗum wi'i nder majje, Alla no welnan neɗɗo oo nder ko waɗata fuu.
59001026	Neɗɗo fuu adi hoore mum no wakkiliiɗo he Alla goonga e goonga, ko waawaa dawrani ɗemngal mum, majji. Wakkilaaku mum duu no meere.
59001027	To Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen, wakkilaaku goonga e goonga woni : Wallude rewɓe ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi, alatuumi'en nder mettal ɓerɗe mum'en he faddaade hoore mum he tuuni duuniyaaru fuu.
59002001	Banndiraaɓe, onon goonɗinɓe Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo men jom teddungal, to ɓurdinee ɓiɓɓe aadama.
59002002	Nde jom njawdi, ɓorniiɗo kolte lobbe ɗe hano mum fuu ngalaa, no watti hootannde kaŋŋe, warii nder hawriine mooɗon, nde nii talka gom, ɓorniiɗo tekke kam duu warii.
59002003	Nde nii on kuybiti hakkillo mooɗon fuu har jom njawdi oo, teddinɗon mo, mbi'uɗon : « Jooɗorgal lobbal nii, jooɗa. » Dey mbi'on talka oon duu : « To jooɗa, dara. » Naa mbi'on mo : « Jooɗa ley. »
59002004	Nde nii on ngaɗii nii, hakkune mooɗon on ɓurdinaay ko'e himɓe naa ? On kiitoraaki miilooji bonɗi naa ?
59002005	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe ! Hanaa Alla suɓii talkaaɓe yeeso duuniyaaru fuu ngam riikinde ɓe nder goonɗinol, ɓe naata Laamu Alla, Laamu ngu o fodani hiɗuɓe mo naa ?
59002006	Amma onon, oɗon kaɗa talka ndimaaku mum. Hanaa riikuɓe ngoni no kaɗa on foofude naa ? Hanaa kamɓe duu ngoni no njaara on yeeso hiitotooɓe naa ?
59002007	Hanaa kamɓe duu ngoni bonnooɓe innde Iisa, innde lobbere nde Alla waddi hakkune mooɗon naa ?
59002008	Nder Tawreeta no winndaa wi'aa : Ngiɗaa gondo maa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maa. Goonga non, nde on tokki tilsinoore mawne ndee, tilsinoore Laamu Alla, nde nii on tokkiri no nde wi'iri, on ngaɗii ko wooɗi.
59002009	Amma nde on ɓurdini ko'e ɓiɓɓe aadama, on ngaɗii hakke, on njukketee ngam on tokkaay ko Tawreeta wi'i.
59002010	Ngam nde neɗɗo woofii worre tan nder tilsinooje Tawreeta ɗeen, baa nde neɗɗo tokkii koddiiɗe ɗeen fuu, too joomum woofii tilsinooje ɗeen fuu.
59002011	Ngam Alla wi'i : To yeenu, o wi'i duu : To ittu yonki goɗɗo. Ndenne, baa nde neɗɗo yeenaay, nde nii joomum itti yonki goɗɗo, too joomum tokkaay ko tilsinooje ɗeen mbi'i.
59002012	Ndenne, accee haala mooɗon e mbuurnam mooɗon laatoo hano haala e mbuurnam himɓe hiiteteeɓe dow tilsinooje rimɗinooje.
59002013	Tabbat ! Nyannde kiite ɗeen, yurmeene walanaa ɓe njurmaakino banndiraaɓe mum'en. Amma yurmeene ɓurata kiite ɗeen semmbe.
59002014	Banndiraaɓe, toy nafakka wi'ude mi goonɗinii dey alamaaji goonɗinde goonga e goonga ngi'ataake nder golle am ? Ir goonɗinol ngool no hisina neɗɗo naa ?
59002015	Alal-misaali, banndiraawo debbo naa gorko goonɗinɗo gom walaa ko holtoo, o nyaama hannden, o nyaamataa jaaŋo.
59002016	Dey goɗɗo nder mooɗon wi'a mo : « Jam wara to maa, Alla hokke ko ɓornotoɗaa e ko nyaamata », dey hokkaay mo ko holtee e ko nyaamee. Ɗume haalaaji ɗii nafi ?
59002017	Non duu goonɗinol fuu darii kam tan ko seŋodiraay he golle lobbe, he ko waati fuu no go'o.
59002018	Nde goɗɗo wi'ii kam, aan a goonɗinɗo, miin mi gaɗoowo golle lobbe. Mi jaaboto joomum, mi wi'a holla kam goonɗinol ngol walaa golle lobbe nder mum. Miin duu, mi hollete har golle am lobbe ko mi goonɗinɗo.
59002019	A goonɗini ko Alla no gooto naa ? Gasi ! Baa ginnaaji bonɗi ngoonɗini ɗum, iɗi ndiwna yeeso makko.
59002020	Aan bahiima ! Aɗa hiɗi tabbintinaa ko goonɗinol ngol walaa golle lobbe, walaa fuu nafakka gom naa ?
59002021	Hanaa ngam maamii'en Ibrahim tefi sakkude Isiyaaku mum dow sakkirde, waɗi Alla daari mo dartiiɗo naa ?
59002022	A hi'i ko goonɗinol makko e golle makko lobbe no ceŋodiri. Ko o golli ɗum duu humni goonɗinol makko.
59002023	Ndenne ko Dewtere Alla wi'i ɗum tabbiti : Ibrahim goonɗinii Alla, ngam majjum waɗi Alla daari mo dartiiɗo. Ɗum duu waɗi o noddiraa higo Alla.
59002024	Ndenne, on ngi'ii ko neɗɗo no noddiree dartiiɗo yeeso Alla, ngam golle muuɗum lobbe, hanaa ngam goonɗinol muuɗum tan.
59002025	Non duu, Rahab, debbo jeenoowo gom, laatake dartiiɗo, ngam golleeji mum lobbi ɗi ngollunoo, wakkati o jaɓɓinoo horooɓe ɓeen. O walli ɓe, ɓe kootiri laawol feerewol gom.
59002026	Neɗɗo nde foofaango walaa he mum, no maayɗo. Non duu goonɗinol fuu ngol seŋodiraay he golle lobbe, he ko waati fuu no go'o.
59003001	Banndiraaɓe, heewɓe nder mooɗon to tefu laataade jannginooɓe. Ngam oɗon anndi ko minen jannginooɓe, min kiitetee kiite caɗɗe ɓurde woɓɓe.
59003002	En fuu, eɗen mboofa laabi keewɗi. Nde nii neɗɗo woofataa nder haala, joomum no kuɓɗo, joomum no jaalii hoore mum.
59003003	Eɗen ngatta labangal nder hunnduko puccu ngam ndawranen ngu.
59003004	Ƴeewee laana ndiyam no ka foti manngu, keni mawɗi ngatta ka dogga dow ndiyam. Amma fuu nii haɗataa loocel pamarel ka awƴirtee, awƴoowo oon yaara ka to hiɗi fuu.
59003005	Non ɗemngal duu worri. Ɗemngal neɗɗo no ɓuri ɗum famɗude, amma ɗum fuu haɗataa ingal mana hoore maggal ngam ingal waɗa kujje mawɗe. Ndaaree da ! No ladde foti manngu fuu, pettel no waawi wulude nde.
59003006	Ɗemngal hiite non, wuddu bononda, doccal jahannama. Ingal he ɓanndu meeɗen amma ingal bonna en. Ingal sankita mbuurnam meeɗen, illa dimeeki meeɗen faa maayde meeɗen.
59003007	Ɓiɓɓe aadama no elta ir dabbaaji fuu : Dabbaaji ladde, dabbaaji ɓodooji e ladooji, pooli, he liƴƴi.
59003008	Amma ɗemngal kay, neɗɗo fuu waawaa dawrande ɗum. Ɗemngal balaa'u non, ngal jooɗotaako heese, ingal heewi tooke barooje.
59003009	Ɗemngal njettirten Baabii'en, Alla Joomiraawo. Kanngal duu kuɗirten ɓiɓɓe aadama, ɓe Alla tagi nder nanndi mum.
59003010	Jettooje e kuddi fuu nder hunnduko wooto mburtotoo. Banndiraaɓe, ɗum haanaa worrude nii.
59003011	Ndiyam mbelɗam e kaɗɗam no ɓula nder ɓulirde worre naa ?
59003012	Banndiraaɓe, ibbi no rima jaytuuje naa ? Cabiihi duu no rima ibbe naa ? Non duu, ɓunndu lamɗam ɓulnataa ndiyam mbelɗam.
59003013	Hakkune mooɗon, moy woni jom hikmaaku e anndal ? Nde joomum no ɗon, holla ɗum nder mbuurnam mum lobbam, nder golleeji mum gaɗaaɗi nder leesinaaku e hikmaaku. Ɗum woni woodude hikmaaku e anndal goonga e goonga.
59003014	Amma, nde nii haasidaaku mbonngu e muuyo ɓurde woɓɓe no tawa nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, to piyee gabaare mbi'on on jom'en hikmaaku, on mbattiti fewre ngaɗon goonga.
59003015	Ir hikmaaku nguu ƴuwataa to Alla, amma nder duuniyaaru ngu ƴuwata. Ngu ƴuwaana he miilooji himɓe, to Ibiliisa ngu ƴuwi.
59003016	Ngam to haasidaaku mbonngu e muuyo ɓurodirol tawaa, toon duu piyodirol ko'e e golle bonɗe tawtee.
59003017	Amma hikmaaku ƴuwngu to Alla, arannde nii hokkataana ɓerne lamnde, nden jam e hakkillo fukkiiŋo. Ingu seŋa enɗam, ingu heewi yurmeene, ingu rima golle lobbe. Ngu walaa hedran-hedran, munafikaare fuu walaa nder maggu.
59003018	Waddooɓe jam, aawataana jam, ketta ko dartii.
59004001	Toy pooɗodirol e kaɓe gonɗe hakkune mooɗon ƴuwata ? Hanaa nder suuno mooɗon bonngo, wonngo no durwa nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, ɗe ƴuwi naa ?
59004002	Oɗon cuuna huune, on keɓataa nde. Oɗon ciryii ittude yonki, oɗon keewi haasidaaku, on mbaawaa heɓude ko ngiɗɗon. Oɗon kaɓa, oɗon ndukodira, on keɓaay ko ngiɗɗon ngam on eelaay ɗum Alla.
59004003	On eelii, on keɓaay ko eeluɗon, ngam anniyaaji mooɗon mbooɗaa. On eelataana tan ngam humnude muuyɗe mooɗon bonɗe.
59004004	Nyaamoohoy amaana ! On anndaa ko hidde duuniyaaru no wanyude Alla naa ? Giɗɗo duuniyaaru, waɗii hoore mum ganyo Alla.
59004005	Hanaa meere waɗi ko nder Dewtere Alla no winndaa wi'aa : Ruuhu mo Alla watti nder meeɗen oon no hiɗi en, omo hira faa noy walaa ngam laatoɗen jogotooɓe amaana.
59004006	Alla waɗanii en moƴƴere ɓurne huune fuu manngu. Ngam no winndaa nder mayre wi'aa : Alla no wanyi piyooɓe gabaare, amma omo moƴƴana leesinooɓe ko'e mum'en.
59004007	Ɗowtanee Alla, dey kollon Seyɗan tiiɗa-nyiiraaku. O doggan o woɗɗoo on.
59004008	Ɓadee Alla, o ɓadoto on. Onon waɗooɓe hakke, tuubee laaɓinee ko'e mooɗon. Lamnee ɓerɗe mooɗon, onon munafikiiɓe !
59004009	Ɓalinee, cimee, mbanjee gonɗi, accee ko njaltintoo on laatoo ko woynata on. Belɗum mooɗon laatoo ɓalinaaku.
59004010	Leynee ko'e mooɗon yeeso Joomiraawo, o ƴettan on.
59004011	Banndiraaɓe, to njancodiree. Nde nii neɗɗo janci banndum naa hiitake mo, neɗɗo janci tilsinooje Alla, hiitake ɗe duu. Nde nii a hiitake tilsinooje ɗeen duu, a tokkaay ko ɗe mbi'i, a waɗi hoore maa kiitotooɗo majje.
59004012	Alla tan woni kokkoowo tilsinoore, kanko tan woni Kiitotooɗo duu. Kanko tan woni baawɗo hisinde naa halkude yonki neɗɗo. Amma aan woni moy, faa kiitoɗaa bannda ?
59004013	Kettinanee kam, onon wi'ooɓe : « Hannden naa jaaŋo, min njahan huɓeere maaneere he huɓeere maaneere. Min ngaɗan hitaane miɗen luumoo toon, min keɓa ceede. »
59004014	Onon ɓe anndaa noy mbuurnam mum'en laatotoo jaaŋo. On saawawre wanngoore wakkati seɗɗa, nden majjaa.
59004015	Nii kaanuɗon, mbi'on : « Nde Joomiraawo muuyi, min mbuuran, min ngolla ɗum naa ɗumtoo. »
59004016	Amma joonin, oɗon ndonndi ko'e oɗon piya gabaaje dow on goɗɗum. Fiyude gabaare hano nii wooɗaa.
59004017	Jooni, neɗɗo fuu anndi ko no waawi wadde golle lobbe, ko waɗaay ɗe, joomum waɗii hakke.
59005001	Onon jom'en njawdi, kakkilee, kettinee ko mbi'anmi on. Townee daaɗe mooɗon, cimee ngam torraaji cattuɗi kewtoytooɗi on.
59005002	Njawdi mon boni, kolte mon duu mooƴii.
59005003	Kaŋŋe e cardi mooɗon tuttidii. Tuttol majje felata on, nyaama on hano no hiite nyaamirta gommbal. Duuniyaaru no taggan nder wakkati seɗɗa, amma ɗum fuu haɗaay oɗon mooɓi njawdi.
59005004	Baa njobdi hettooɓe gese mooɗon, oɗon njogii ɗum. Iɗum nyiddinii yeeso Alla dawranoowo dow e ley, omo nana bojji maɓɓe.
59005005	Nder duuniyaaru nduu, on mbuuri nder njawdi, on nyaamii, on njari ko ngiɗɗon. Oɗon payni ɓalli hano ga'i turkaaɗi ngam hirseede.
59005006	On torrii, on kiitake, on mbarii mo waɗaay baafuy. O daraaki fuu o durwida he mooɗon.
59005007	No demoowo munyirta illa ndiyam aawre faa wara ƴaawol, nden hetta. Hano non, onon duu banndiraaɓe, tiiɗee he munyal faa nyannde Joomiraawo warti.
59005008	Munyee, cemmbinɗinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, ngam gartol Joomiraawo ɓadake.
59005009	To mboytodiree ngam to Alla hiitoo on. Ndaa, Kiitotooɗo oon nii no darii dammbugal !
59005010	Banndiraaɓe, nyemminee annabiiɓe haalunooɓe dow Joomiraawo. Ndaaree ngi'ee no ɓe torriraa ko ɓe munyi.
59005011	Ngam eɗen mbi'a welɓe ko'e ngoni munyuɓe nder torraaji mum'en. On nanii no Ayuuba munyiri faa noy walaa, kaden oɗon anndi duu moƴƴere nde Joomiraawo hokki mo. Ngam Joomiraawo no heewi yurmeene e moƴƴere.
59005012	Ko ɓuri woni banndiraaɓe, to kunoree kammu naa leydi, naa goɗɗum feere gom. Nde nii on njaɓi, mbi'ee tan on njaɓi, nde nii on njaɓaay duu, mbi'ee tan on njaɓaay, ngam to Alla hiito on.
59005013	No woodi hakkune mooɗon gonɗo nder torra naa ? Too, joomum du'oo ! No woodi hakkune mooɗon gonɗo nder welwelo naa ? Too, joomum yima yetta Alla.
59005014	No woodi hakkune mooɗon nyawɗo naa ? Too, joomum nodda mawɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe, ɓe mbuja mo nebbam, ɓe ndu'anoo mo dow innde Joomiraawo.
59005015	Nde nii ɓe ndu'ake he goonɗinol, du'aa'u oon waɗan joomum nyawta. Joomiraawo nyawtan mo. Nde nii o waɗi hakke duu, hakke makko yaafetee.
59005016	Ngam majjum, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu anndita, haalana banndum hakkeeji mum, ngaɗonodiron du'aa'u ngam nyawteɗon. Du'aa'u neɗɗo dartiiɗo no woodi baawɗe mawɗe.
59005017	Eliya, tagaaɗo non hano meeɗen. O du'ii sanne, o eeli Alla to ndiyam toɓu. Duuɓi tati e lebbi jeegom, ndiyam toɓaay dow leydi.
59005018	O du'itii gaɗa majjum, ndiyam toɓi, barke leydi heɓaa.
59005019	Banndiraaɓe, nde nii gooto nder mooɗon waɗi hakke, woɗɗi laawol goonga, ko goɗɗo mooɗon wartiri mo dow maggol.
59005020	Too, paamee ko gartirɗo mo oo hisini yonki makko he maayde, hakkeeji makko duu moytetee no ɗi ɗuuɗiri fuu.
60001001	Miin Piyer lilaaɗo Iisa Almasiihu winndi ɗerol ngool yahde he mooɗon, onon suɓaaɓe Alla, weerɓe duuniyaaru, sankitiiɓe nder leyɗe Pontus, Galatiya, Kapadokiya, Asiya e Bitiniya.
60001002	Onon ɓe Alla Baaba meeɗen artii, suɓii dow siri mum, wartiri feere har laaɓinol ngol Ruuhu Ceniiɗo laaɓinta neɗɗo, ngam ɗowtanoɗon Iisa Almasiihu, ngaɗon ko o wi'i on, laaɓon nder barke ƴiiƴam makko ndufaaɗam. Alla ɓeydan on jam e moƴƴere !
60001003	Jettooje tabbita dow Alla, Baaba Iisa Almasiihu, Joomiraawo meeɗen. Har ummitaaki Iisa Almasiihu, o funnii mbuurnam kesam nder meeɗen ngam keɓen gokka mawka. Nder yurmeene makko mawne,
60001004	o siryanake en dow kammu, ndonngu ngu bonataa, ngu ɓuytataako, ngu majjataa.
60001005	Ɗum woni ndonngu mooɗon, onon ɓe Alla nder baawɗe mum reeni faa keɓon kisinam ngam sabbu goonɗinol mooɗon. Kisinam ɗam o haɓɓi anniya wannginde nder wakkati cakitiiɗo.
60001006	Keewee welwelo ngam sabbu ndonngu nguu, baa nii ko ngam tabbintinde goonɗinol mooɗon, joonin no waawi laatoo torraaji feere-fereeji mettina ɓerɗe mooɗon nder wakkati seɗɗa.
60001007	Torraaji ɗii kollata no darja goonɗinol mooɗon foti. No kaŋŋe wattirtee nder hiite ngam ƴeewude ndimaaku majje, hano non onon duu torrirteɗon ngam etude goonɗinol mooɗon. Ingol ɓuri kaŋŋe duu ngam kaŋŋe duumataako. Etol maggol watta njetteɗon, keɓon darja e teddungal nyannde fuu Iisa Almasiihu wanngi nder teddungal mum.
60001008	On ngi'aay Iisa amma oɗon ngiɗi mo. Baa nii ko on ngi'aay mo, on ngoonɗini mo. Oɗon keewi welwelo manngo daɗungo hakkillo.
60001009	On keɓan kisinam ngam goonɗinol mooɗon.
60001010	Kisinam ɗam keɓoyton ɗaam, annabiiɓe taykake, taykaaki luggiɗinki dow majjam ngam faamude maana majjam. Ɓe ngaɗi annabaaku dow moƴƴere nde Alla fodani on ndee.
60001011	Ruuhu Alla gonɗo nder maɓɓe holli ɓe no Almasiihu torrirtee, nden gaɗa mum o teddinee. Ngam kujje ɗe ɓe kollaa ɗee, waɗi ɓe tittinkini nder taykaaki maɓɓe ngam faamude wakkati oye kujje ɗee fuu ngaɗoyta he noy ɗum warrata.
60001012	Wakkati mo ɓe kaali dow fii mo nanuɗon oo joonin, Ruuhu Alla wi'ii ɓe, onon ɓe ngaɗani annabaaku nguu, hanaa ko'e maɓɓe ɓe ngaɗani ngu. On nanii fii oo he hunnduko waajotooɓe Habaru lobbo nder barke Ruuhu Alla ƴuwɗo dow. Baa maleykaaɓe no ngiɗi paama faa hanaa seɗɗa dow makko.
60001013	Miɗo wi'a on ciryoɗon faa wooɗa, to accee huune fuu ada hakkillo mooɗon. Ndenne ngattee gokka mooɗon fuu dow moƴƴere nde kokketeɗon nyannde gartol Iisa Almasiihu.
60001014	Njooɗee jonnde ɗowtaniiɓe Alla. Wakkati on anndanoo Almasiihu, oɗon ngondi suuno-sunooji gom. To njaɓee hannden ɗi ada hakkillooji mooɗon.
60001015	Amma kollee senaaku nder ko ngatton fuu ngam Alla bi'uɗo ngoonɗinon ɗum no ceniiɗo.
60001016	Ngam no winndaa nder Dewtere Alla wi'aa : Laatee seniiɓe, ngam miin, mi ceniiɗo.
60001017	Nder du'aa'uuji mooɗon, oɗon noddira Alla « Baaba ». Alla woni kiitotooɗo neɗɗo fuu dow gollal mum. O hollataa hedran-hedran fuu, ndenne mbeeree nder duuniyaaru nduu nder kulal makko.
60001018	Oɗon anndi no tonngitiraaɗon e tonngoode mbuurnam nyidduɗam, ɗam ndonuɗon he baabiraaɓe mooɗon. Oɗon anndi no coptinol mooɗon waɗiraa. Ingol seedi he cardi naa kaŋŋe bonooje.
60001019	Amma ƴiiƴam Almasiihu ɗam darja coptiniraɗon. Almasiihu duu woni njawdiri ndi walaa fuu laru naa feloore gom.
60001020	Alla suɓake mo illa duuniyaaru tagaakano, nden wanngini mo ngam mooɗon nder balɗe cakitiiɗe.
60001021	Har makko ngoonɗinirton Alla, ummintinɗo mo he maayde, hokki mo teddungal. Ngam majjum waɗi goonɗinol mooɗon, he tammude mooɗon no haani tawee dow Alla.
60001022	Goonɗinol mooɗon goonga e goonga, lamni ɓerɗe mooɗon. Ndenne he ɓerne laaɓune ndee, ngiɗodiree hidde mawne.
60001023	Ngiɗodiree hidde mawne ngam Alla hokki on mbuurnam kesam nder barke haala makko mbuurka tabbitooka faa abada abadin.
60001024	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Ɓii-Aadama no nanndi huɗo hecco, teddungal muuɗum duu no nanndi pinndi. Huɗo koon yooran, pinndi makko duu sooto,
60001025	amma haala Joomiraawo kay, duuman faa abada abadin. Haala kaa duu woni Habaru lobbo, mo mbaajaɗon.
60002001	Onon seniiɓe Alla, accee borondi fuu, mboɗɗee fewre. Accee munafikaare, mboɗɗee haasidaaku e nyo'oore.
60002002	No cukaloy keccoy ngiɗiri kosam enndu inniraaɓe mum'en, laɓɗam tar, hano non onon duu kaanuɗon hiɗirde haala Alla, ngam sabbu makka, mawnon, kewton kisinam.
60002003	Ngam Dewtere Alla wi'ii : On meeɗi moƴƴere Joomiraawo.
60002004	Ɓadee Joomiraawo, ngam kanko woni hayre wuurne nde himɓe mboppi, Alla suɓii mo, horsini.
60002005	Onon duu, on kaaƴe buurɗe naforteeɗe nder nyiɓanol Ruuhu Alla suudu semmbenteeru. On cakkanooɓe Alla seniiɓe, waɗanooɓe Alla sadakaaji, ɗi Ruuhu holliti, ɗi Alla jaaboto ngam sabbu Iisa Almasiihu.
60002006	Ngam no winndaa nder Dewtere Alla wi'aa : Mi suɓake hayre nde darja, kayre woni bonjariyal suudu. Mi sinngii nde nder Siyon. Neɗɗo fuu wakkili he mayre, semtataa baa seɗɗa.
60002007	Goonga non, onon goonɗinɓe Iisa, to mooɗon nde teddune, amma dow ɓe ngoonɗinaay ɓeen no winndaa nder dewte ɗeen, wi'aa : Hayre nde nyiɓooɓe mboppi, kayre laatii hoore nyibdi ndiin.
60002008	No winndaa kaden : Hayre fergoore non, hayre non, liɓoore neɗɗo. Saliiɓe tokkude haala kaa, no pergoo he mayre hano no ɗum fodora he maɓɓe.
60002009	Amma onon, on suɓaaɓe Alla, on cakkanooɓe Alla, gollanooɓe Laamiiɗo mawɗo. On lenyol ceniingol ngol Alla jeyii. Alla suɓake on ngam mbaajoɗon moƴƴere makko mawne. O wurtini on nimre, heɓa naaton nder jeyngol makko, jeyngol ngol walaa keddi.
60002010	Arannde on kanaano himɓe makko, amma joonin on himɓe makko. Ndenno on keɓaayno yurmeene makko, amma joonin on keɓi nde.
60002011	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, on hoɓɓe, on feruɓe warɓe njooɗii nder duuniyaaru. Paddee ko'e mooɗon he muuyɗe ɓerɗe, gonɗe no ndurwida he mooɗon wakkati fuu.
60002012	Ngaɗee ko wooɗi hakkune ɓe ngoonɗinaay, heɓa nder ko ɓe pelata on fuu, ɓe ngi'a golleeji mooɗon lobbi, ɓe teddina Alla nyannde o wanngani ɓe.
60002013	Mi ŋaarake on ngam hidde Joomiraawo, leesinee ko'e mooɗon yeeso ardiiɗo fuu gooduɗo baawɗe dow mooɗon. Leesinee ko'e mooɗon yeeso laamiiɗo ngam omo woodi baawɗe dow neɗɗo fuu.
60002014	Leesinee ko'e mooɗon yeeso lilaaɓe laamiiɗo, lilaaɓe njukkowa waɗuɓe gacce, naa njettowa waɗuɓe ko wooɗi.
60002015	Ngam ko Alla hiɗi woni : Ngaɗon ko wooɗi yeeso bahimaaɓe ngam ɓe moɗa haalaaji maɓɓe ɗi ngalaa hoore fuu.
60002016	On kanaa maccuɓe, on rimɓe. Ndenne, to accee ndimaaku mooɗon warta laawol gaɗol golle nyidduɗe. Njooɗee no maccuɓe Alla njooɗorto.
60002017	Teddinee neɗɗo fuu, ngiɗee banndiraaɓe mooɗon goonɗinɓe. Kulee Alla, teddinee laamiiɗo mooɗon.
60002018	Onon maccuɓe, leesinee ko'e mooɗon yeeso joomiraaɓe mooɗon, teddinon ɓe sanne. Hanaa joomiraaɓe mooɗon lobbuɓe, hiɗuɓe on tan teddinton. Amma teddinee baa ɓe ndartaaki ɓeen duu, leynon ko'e mooɗon yeeso maɓɓe.
60002019	Nde neɗɗo munyii torra ka haandaa ngam sabbu kulal Alla, too joomum waɗii ko wooɗi.
60002020	Nde nii onon he ko'e mooɗon ngaɗi gacce, nde on ɓoccaama, baa se on munyi, on ngalaa fuu teddungal gom. Amma nde nii nder golle mooɗon lobbe, on torraama ngam on ngaɗii ko wooɗi, ko munyuɗon torra keewtiika on kaan, too on ngaɗii ko weli Alla.
60002021	Iri torra kaa, waɗi Alla noddi on, ngam Almasiihu he hoore mum torraama sabbu mooɗon. Almasiihu holli on duu laawol ngool, heɓa tokkitoɗon gaɗa koyɗe makko.
60002022	O waɗaay hakke abada, abada hunnduko makko duu wurtinaay fewre.
60002023	Wakkati ɓe njennunoo mo, o yottitaaki. Wakkati ɓe kollunoo mo bone, o wi'aay neɗɗo fuu o yoptoto. Amma Alla, kiitirtooɗo dartinaaku he mum o halfini hoore makko.
60002024	Wakkati ɓe tontannoo mo dow bardugal, kanko ronndi hakkeeji meeɗen. O mursii yonki makko har maayde makko ngam ceeden he hakke, njooɗoɗen jonnde dartiiɓe hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa : On kisinaama sabbu barme makko.
60002025	Ndenno on baali majjuɗi, amma hannden on ngartii to Duroowo kakkiltooɗo he yonkiiji mooɗon.
60003001	Onon rewɓe goonɗinɓe, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu ɗowtanoo gorum, ngam baa nde nii no woodi hakkune mooɗon ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en ngoonɗinaay haala Alla, goriraaɓe ɓeen ngi'an no mbuurnam mooɗon ndartori he no teddinirton goriraaɓe mooɗon. Jikku mooɗon waɗa ɓe ngoonɗina, baa nii ɓe njeccanaaka.
60003003	To peɗaaki mooɗon kii ngatton hano ir morɗi'en naa ɓornaaki kaŋŋe naa kolte caadiiɗe, laatoo peɗe ɓanndu.
60003004	Amma ki laatoo peɗaaki nafooki ɓerne nder waɗude ko wooɗi, peɗaaki leesiniiɓe ko'e, curooki hoore. Iri peɗaaki kii woodi darja mawɗo to Alla.
60003005	Ngam illa fil'ajal, ir peɗaaki kii woni peɗaaki rewɓe seniiɓe, wattuɓe tammude mum'en he Alla, ɗowtaniiɓe goriraaɓe mum'en.
60003006	Alal-misaali Saratu ɗowtanake gorum Ibrahim faa omo noddira mo joomiiko. Nde nii on ngaɗii golle lobbe, nde nii on kulaay, onon duu sikka fuu walaa on ɓiɓɓe Saratu.
60003007	Non onon duu worɓe, ngondee he deekiraaɓe mooɗon no haaniri. Mawninee ɓe ngam ɓe potaa on semmbe. Teddinon ɓe heɓa on fuu ndonon mbuurnam ngoongaajam, moƴƴere Alla. Teddinee ɓe, heɓa to huune fuu haɗu on, on fuu ɗiɗo du'aade.
60003008	Joonin ko ngiɗumi haalande on woni, on fuu laatee daane worre. Ngiɗodiron, laatoɗon inna gooto baaba gooto. Leesinon ko'e mooɗon, njurmodiron.
60003009	To njoptoree gaɗanɗo on gacce ko boni, naa njennitoɗon jennuɗo on. Amma mbarkinee joomum, ngam majjum waɗi Alla noddi on faa keɓon barke.
60003010	Ngam no winndaa nder Dewtere Alla wi'aa : Neɗɗo fuu giɗɗo nana belɗum mbuurnam lobbam, sabbuŋo mum juuta, faddoo ɗemngal mum he ko boni. Joomum faddoo hunnduko mum he fewre,
60003011	Joomum woɗɗoo ko boni, dey waɗa ko wooɗi, filoo jam he ɓerne worre.
60003012	Alla no deki hitere dow dartiiɓe, noppi makko duu no kettini du'aa'uuji maɓɓe, amma omo tottitii waɗooɓe ko boni.
60003013	Nde nii on tittinkinake nder waɗude ko wooɗi, moy waawi waɗande on bone gom ?
60003014	Amma baa nde nii on torraama ngam sabbu dartinaaku mooɗon, to kulee, to hakkillooji mooɗon ummoo ngam barke ɗum woodani on.
60003015	Teddinee Almasiihu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, njaɓee o laatoo Joomiraawo mooɗon. Wakkati fuu, tawee on siryiiɓe ngam jaabaade neɗɗo fuu ƴamuɗo on ko waɗi oɗon ndeki gokka mooɗon dow makko.
60003016	Nde nii on ƴamaama, njaaboroɗon ƴamuɓe on ɓeen heese-heese, nder teddungal he miilo lamngo heɓa tuumirɓe on goɗɗum dow golleeji mooɗon lobbi, naa ngam on ngoonɗini Almasiihu cemtaa.
60003017	Alla fodoo, neɗɗo torree sabbu golle mum lobbe, no ɓuri neɗɗo torree ngam golle mum bonɗe.
60003018	Sabu Iisa Almasiihu e hoore mum yari torra daliila hakkeeji meeɗen. Kanko dartiiɗo oon, maayi ngam sabbu meeɗen, enen jom'en hakke. O maayi gaba go'o ngam o ɓanna en he Alla. Ɓe mbari mo, amma Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ummintini mo, omo wuuri.
60003019	Wooɗi duu, nder baawɗe Ruuhu oon Iisa haali dow jaalorgal mum hakkune uddaaɓe nder kasu laahara.
60003020	Uddaaɓe ɓee ngoni murtunooɓe he Alla nder jamaanu Nuhu. Wakkati Nuhu nyiɓannoo laana kaan, maayɓe ɓee ɗowtanaaki Alla baa nii ko o munyi ɓe. Himɓe seɗɗaaɓe tan, ɓe jeetato naatuɓe laana kaan, kisi ndiyam tuufaana.
60003021	Ndiyam ɗaam, misaali non kolloowo alaama gaɗol batisma mo ngatten. Gaɗol batisma hanaa ittude tuuni he ɓanndu, amma adude anniya nder miilo lamngo yeeso Alla. Onon duu, on kisan har batisma oo nder barke ummitaaki Iisa Almasiihu.
60003022	Iisa Almasiihu ƴencinaama, omo jooɗii nyaamo Alla. Omo laami maleykaaɓe, laamiiɓe e wooduɓe baawɗe fuu.
60004001	Almasiihu yari torra ɓanndu, ndenne onon duu, oɗon kaani adande mo, kaɓɓon anniya ngam munyude torra mooɗon. Neɗɗo fuu yari torra nder ɓanndu muuɗum, seedi he gaɗol hakke.
60004002	Ndenne illa joonin nder balɗe koddaniiɗe on nder mbuurnam mooɗon, celee giɗaale himɓe heɓa tokkon muuyɗe Alla.
60004003	Nder mbuurnam mooɗon aranam, on mbonniino wakkati mooɗon sanne nder iri jonnde welude ɓe anndaay Alla. Nannguɗon waɗude golle nyidduɗe, suuno, fijooji nyidduɗi he jarɗe. Oɗon ndewa tooruuje, laabi karmuɗi ɓoli.
60004004	Joonin ko waɗi on ngalaa oɗon ndogga gaɗa maɓɓe, haayne mum nanngi ɓe. Iɓe njenna on ngam on ngalaa oɗon kawtida he maɓɓe nder gaɗol golleeji maɓɓe nyidduɗi.
60004005	Amma ɓe nootoyto dow ko ɓe ngaɗi fuu yeeso Alla, ciryiiɗo hiitaade wuurɓe e maayɓe.
60004006	Ngam sabbu kiite ɗee, waɗi Habaru lobbo, habaru Iisa Almasiihu waajaa hakkune maaynooɓe illa no mbuuri heɓa ɓe mbaawa wuurde har Ruuhu yeeso Alla, baa nii ko no tawa maayde woni fodoore maɓɓe.
60004007	Taggol duuniyaaru ɓadake, kakkilee he ko'e mooɗon. Paddee ko'e mooɗon, ngam nde hanaa non on mbaawaa du'aade.
