60004008	Ko ɓuri fuu, woni ngiɗodiron sanne, sabu hidde no wadda yaafa hakkeeji keewɗi.
60004009	Mbeernodiree, tawee on nguunitaaki baa seɗɗa.
60004010	Alla hokki goonɗinɗo Iisa fuu baawɗe wallude goɗɗo. Ndenne, ngolliree no wooɗiri baawɗe ɗee, hakkune mooɗon har nafude banndiraaɓe meeɗen hano paamanɗo moƴƴe feere-fereeje ɗe Alla hokki ɗum waɗirta.
60004011	Neɗɗo fuu adi haala, no haani haala Alla wurto nder hunnduko mum. Balloowo fuu, no haani wallira semmbe mo Alla hokki ɗum fuu, ngam nder ko waɗaa fuu, innde Alla teddinee ngam sabbu Iisa Almasiihu. Baawɗe e teddungal tabbita he makko faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
60004012	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, to kaata torra haayɗin on ngam nder wakkati mum ngonɗon, kaata kaa etata goonɗinol mooɗon. To miilee mbi'i on ko heyɗi gom heɓi on.
60004013	Se on torraama iri torraaji Iisa Almasiihu, nanee belɗum majjum, ngam wakkati fuu Iisa warti nder teddungal mum, nanon belɗum.
60004014	Ko'e mooɗon mbeli nde on njennaama ngam sabbu Almasiihu, ngam Ruuhu Alla gooduɗo teddungal no wondi he mooɗon.
60004015	Amma to baa gooto mooɗon torree ngam ittol yonki, nguyka, ko wooɗaa naa ngam naatude ko walanaa ɗum.
60004016	Nde neɗɗo mooɗon torraama ngam no tokkuɗo Almasiihu, to semteene majjum nanngu ɗum, joomum yetta Alla ngam tokki Almasiihu.
60004017	Joonin wakkati mo Alla fuɗata hiitaade himɓe oon yottake. Rewooɓe mo ɓeen, o fuɗɗirta. Nde nii kiite ɗeen fuɗɗirii en, enen goonɗinɓe, too, noy ɗe kantirta dow ɓe ngoonɗinaay Habaru Alla lobbo ɓeen ?
60004018	Ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Nde nii kisinol dartiiɓe tiiɗi, yedduɓe Alla e waɗooɓe hakke ɓeen nee, ɗume hewtotoo ɓe ?
60004019	Ngam majjum wonɓe no torree ngam hidde Alla, tinno ngaɗa ko wooɗi. Ɓe kalfina ko'e maɓɓe he Alla taguɗo huune fuu, mo taƴataa alkawal mum.
60005001	Mi seedorake hitere am torraaji ɗi Iisa Almasiihu yari. Miɗo woodi duu mbaka nder teddungal makko nyannde o wartowi. Mawɓe ardiiɓe kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe wonɓe hakkune mooɗon, miɗo fooɗa hakkillooji maɓɓe ngam miin duu mi ardiiɗo hano maɓɓe.
60005002	Ɓe kakkiloo he coggal ngal Alla halfini ɓe. To ɓe nduru ngal ngam no tilsi, amma ngam iɓe ngoodi hidde ardaaki maggal nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe hano no Alla hiɗiri. To ɓe nduru ngal ngam ceede, amma ngam hidde.
60005003	To ɓe tilsin ngal, amma ɓe laatanoo ngal ko ƴeewetee, ekkitee faa ngal woowta tokkol.
60005004	Ngam nde Almasiihu, mawɗo durooɓe wari, ɓe keɓan lefol teddungal ngol tuttataa faa abada abadin.
60005005	Jokolɓe onon duu, leesinee ko'e mooɗon, tokkon tilsinooje mawɓe mooɗon. On fuu, leesinodiron hakkune mooɗon, ngam no winndaa wi'aa : Leesiniiɗo fuu Alla no hoynana ɗum. Mawnitiiɗo fuu omo satti he mum.
60005006	Ndenne, sey leesinon ko'e mooɗon yeeso Alla Jom semmbe, ngam o ƴetta on nder wakkati mo o fodi.
60005007	Kalfinee mo, ko haɓɓi ko'e mooɗon fuu, ngam kanko hakkilii he mooɗon.
60005008	Ndoomee ko'e mooɗon, laatoɗon siryiiɓe, ngam Seyɗan, ganyo mooɗon no yaha no warta, no hunnga hano no muusuuru ladde rafaanu, wonndu no fiiloo mo nyaamata.
60005009	To kokkee mo daama fuu. Tittinkinee nder goonɗinol mooɗon. Miccitee ko banndiraaɓe mooɗon wonɓe nder seraaji duuniyaaru fuu, kam'en duu no ngondi he iri torraaji ɗii.
60005010	On njaran torraaji wakkati seɗɗa, amma Alla marɗo moƴƴere fuu, noddi on har Almasiihu, njooɗoɗon nder teddungal mum faa abada abadin. Kanko he hoore makko waɗata on huuɓuɓe. O tabbintina on, o hokka on semmbe. O sinnga on faa ngaɗon ɗaɗi.
60005011	Baawɗe tabbita he makko faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
60005012	Mi winndani on ɗerol ngool nder balla Silas, mo nder giiɗe am foti noddiree goonɗinɗo kolniiɗo. Mi winndani on seɗɗa ngam semmbinɗinde ɓerɗe mooɗon, he ngam wi'ude on no laaɓiri no moƴƴere Alla wontiri goonga e goonga. Ndenne tiiɗee ŋyet he mayre.
60005013	Hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa wonnde Baabiila, nde Alla suɓii no suɓori on nii, no yewta on. Markus, suka am duu no yewta on.
60005014	Cannodiree nder hidde. Jam wonda he mooɗon on fuu, onon goonɗinɓe Almasiihu !
61001001	Miin Simon Piyer, lilaaɗo Iisa Almasiihu, miin maccuɗo makko winndi ɗerol ngool. Mi winndanii ngol heɓuɓe goonɗinol ngol darja, iri goonɗinol amin daliila dartinaaku Iisa Almasiihu Alla meeɗen, kisinoowo meeɗen.
61001002	Jam he moƴƴere heewa on daliila ko annduɗon Alla he Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
61001003	Alla nder baawɗe mum, hokki en huune fuu ko kaajaɗen ngam mbuurden he kulol mum. O hokki en ɗum, heɓa annditen Iisa Almasiihu nodduɗo en ngaren kawren nder teddungal he yerre.
61001004	Nder kujje ɗee fuu, o hokki en moƴƴe mawɗe sanne gooduɗe darja ɗe o fodani en. O hokki en ɗe heɓa nde nii on keɓii ɗe, kison muuyɗe bonɗe gonɗe no laamii nder duuniyaaru, kawton he makko, kanko Alla he hoore makko.
61001005	Ndenne, tinnee, ngaɗee ko mbaawuɗon waɗuɗe ngam dow goonɗinol mooɗon ɓeydon moƴƴuki, dow moƴƴuki duu ɓeydon anndol Alla.
61001006	Dow anndol Alla ɓeydon waawude hoore mum. Dow baawol hoore mum ɓeydon tittinkinaaku. Dow tittinkinaaku kam duu ɓeydon kulol Alla.
61001007	Dow kulol Alla ɓeydon hidde banndiraaɓe mooɗon. Dow hidde banndiraaɓe mooɗon, ɓeydon hiɗirde neɗɗo fuu he hidde huuɓune.
61001008	Nde nii kujje lobbe ɗee fuu no tawee he mooɗon, nde nii iɗe ɓeydoo yahde yeeso to mooɗon, ɗe kaɗan on jonnde meere, gollal mooɗon waɗan barke walla on anndon Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
61001009	Ngam neɗɗo fuu mo walaa ir jikku nguu, no bumɗo, o yeggiti Alla laaɓinɗo mo itti he hakkeeji makko arani.
61001010	Ndenne banndiraaɓe, tiɓinee sanne faa wooɗa noddaango he cuɓaaki ki Alla suɓani on. Nde nii on tiɓinake kujje ɗee faa wooɗi, on pergataako abada !
61001011	Hano non duu, Alla jaɓɓorto on he teddungal manngal nder laamu ngu hantataa, laamu Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, kisinoowo meeɗen.
61001012	Ngam majjum waɗi, miɗo miccintina on wakkati fuu kujje ɗee. Baa nde nii tawi oɗon anndi ɗum, heɓa cemmbiɗon nder goonga mo keɓuɗon.
61001013	Nde nii miɗo foofa, no tilsi mi findina hakkillooji mooɗon, mi miccintina on kujje ɗee.
61001014	Hano no Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen holliri kam ɗum, miɗo anndi ko hoddi nder sabbungo am ɗuuɗaa.
61001015	Amma mi waɗan keddi baawɗe am, heɓa tawee wakkati fuu oɗon mbaawi jogaade kujje ɗee fuu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, baa nde tawi mi maayi.
61001016	Wakkati min ngaɗannoo on filla gartol Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen nder baawɗe mum fuu, min tokkiraay taale-taale naa ƴoƴe gom. Min ngi'u mo non he gite amin nder teddungal makko.
61001017	O heɓaana teddungal he manngu, wakkati daane Alla Baabiraawo jom darja ƴuwi dow, wi'i : « Oo woni Ɓiyam mo korsinmi, mo mbelniranmi. »
61001018	Min nani daane ƴuwne dow ndee, wakkati min ngondunoo he makko dow waamnde seniine.
61001019	Iri kujje ɗee fuu he banndum ɓeydi tabbintinde ko annabiiɓe kaalunoo ɗum no goonga. Ndenne, no haani ngatton hakkillo dow annabaaku, ngam haalaaji annabiiɓe nga'aana fitilla njaynooka nder nimre faa weeta. Hoodere fajiri yayna ɓerɗe mooɗon.
61001020	Arannde nii, no haani paamon ko walaa annabiijo baawɗo nder hikmaaku mum kam tan, hokka maana annabaaku ngaɗaangu nder dewte.
61001021	Ngam walaa annabaaku warngu nder hikmaaku ɓii-aadama. Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, kam hokkata annabiiɓe baawɗe haalude ko Alla wi'i, ɓe mbi'a.
61002001	No annabiiɓe fewreeɓe naatirnoo nder lenyol Isra'el ndenno, non jannginooɓe fewreeɓe duu naatiroyta hakkune mooɗon. Ɓe nawtorto ƴoƴe ɓe njannginan iri jannde halkoore neɗɗo fuu, ɓe njannginan himɓe pene hano no ɓe mboowirnoo jannginirde ɗe. Ɓe mbi'an duu ɓe anndaa Joomiraawo rimɗinɗo ɓe, iɓe pooɗana ko'e maɓɓe halkere nde ɓooyataa heewtaaki ɓe.
61002002	Himɓe ɗuɓɓe tokkan laawol maɓɓe bonngol ngool, ɓe laatoo daliila bonnol innde laawol goonga ngool.
61002003	Nder hidde seedere maɓɓe ndee, ɓe nawtorto pene ngam nyaamude barke mooɗon. Amma illa ko ɓooyii kiite maɓɓe taƴaama, bone duu doomi ɓe.
61002004	Baa maleykaaɓe gom wakkati ngaɗunoo hakke, Alla accaay ɓe. Callali o watti o haɓɓiri ɓe, o faɗɗi nder nimre jahannama, ɓe njooɗoo ɓe ndooma darŋal.
61002005	Waɗunooɓe hakke ndenno, Alla accaay ɓe, ndiyam tuufaana o waɗi halki ɓe. Nuhu baajotooɗo dartinaaku he himɓe jeɗɗo gom, tan o hisini.
61002006	Alla waɗi norɗe hiite nyaami kuɓeeje Sodooma e Gomoora faa ɗe laatii ndooni heɓa ɗum laatanoo, mo hulataa mo fuu misaali.
61002007	O hisini Luutu, neɗɗo dartiiɗo, mo golle bonɓe nyawni ɓerne mum.
61002008	Luutu no jom dartinaaku, amma no jooɗii hakkune bonɓe. Fini fuu omo nana, omo hi'a golle jaayɗe gonɗe no ngaɗee, golle jaayɗe gonɗe no mettina ɓerne makko.
61002009	Ndenne, Joomiraawo no waawi hisini hulooɓe ɗum, torra waɗooɓe hakke duu, henna ɓe senngo ngam hiitaade ɓe nyannde darŋal.
61002010	O ɓoccan doggooɓe gaɗa muuyɗe ɓalli mum'en, huyfinɓe ardaŋal fuu. Jannginooɓe fewreeɓe, ɓe cemtataa baa isilam. Iɓe mawniti, ɓe cemtataa duu haalude haalaaji mettuɗi dow jom'en baawɗe wonɓe dow kammu.
61002011	Baa maleykaaɓe ɓurɓe jannginooɓe fewreeɓe ɓe semmbe e baawɗe, kaalataa haalaaji mettuɗi yeeso Joomiraawo dow jom'en baawɗe wonɓe dow kammu.
61002012	Amma jannginooɓe fewreeɓe ɓee no kaala haalaaji mettuɗi dow huune nde ɓe anndaa. Ɓe ngalaa hakkillo, iɓe nanndi marle ladde, dimaaɗe ngam nanngee, waree. Alla waran ɓe no marle ladde ɗee mbarirtee.
61002013	No ɓe torriri himɓe gom, non kamɓe duu ɓe torrirtee. Ko weli ɓerɗe maɓɓe woni ɓe ngaɗa ko nyiddinii yeeso himɓe. Nde ɓe njooddake iɓe nyaamda he mooɗon, ko ɓe ngiɗi fuu, ɓe ngaɗata, iɓe cemtina on.
61002014	Daarude rewɓe yeenooɓe tan woni miilo maɓɓe, ɓe celataa waɗude hakke. Iɓe majjina ɓe cemmbiɗaa nder goonɗinol Iisa Almasiihu. Ɓerɗe maɓɓe no cuuna seedere. Sikka fuu walaa iɓe nder kiite Alla.
61002015	Ɓe celi laawol goonga. Ɓe majji ngam ɓe tokki laawol Balaama ɓii-Bosora, jaɓoowo ceede, waɗa bone.
61002016	O felaama ngam boofi makko. Ara makko he hoore mum he daane tagaaɗo yeccani mo ngam haɗude mo waɗude bahimaare ndeen.
61002017	Waajotooɓe fewreeɓe no nanndi ɓulli jooruɗi. Iɓe nanndi duule ɗe henndu mawnu soggi. Alla resani ɓe nokku ɓurɗo nimre niɓɓude.
61002018	Iɓe ndonndo ko'e dow haalaaji meereeji. Iɓe nawtoroo muuyɗe bonɗe, iɓe eyta ɓe ɓooyaay hisineede, wonnooɓe no ngaɗa hakke.
61002019	Iɓe mbi'a eytaaɓe ɓeen fakat ɓe ngartirtee rimɓe, tawi duu kamɓe he ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe maccuɓe hakke. Ngam huune fuu ko jaali neɗɗo, neɗɗo no maccuɗo mum.
61002020	Nde nii neɗɗo anndi ko Iisa Almasiihu no Joomiraawo e kisinoowo, ko joomum hisinaa laawol golle bonɗe, dey joomum warti dow maggol faa ɗum adi hakkillo mum, too mbuurnam mum cakitiiɗam, jaasan aranam ɗam bonde.
61002021	Nde nii neɗɗo oo anndaayno laawol dartinaaku ngool baa nde worre non, nden no ɓurannoo ɗum. Amma jannginooɓe fewreeɓe, gaɗa ko ɓe anndunoo laawol dartinaaku ngool, ɓe coƴƴiti gaɗa, ɓe tottiti tilsinooje Alla ɗe ɓe kokkanoo.
61002022	Ndenne, ko ɓe ngaɗi ɗum yahdi dey-dey he kippol haala mbi'ungol : Rawaanu tuuti, soƴƴii nyaami turre mum. Wi'aama kaden : « Ngiroowa lootaanga, soƴƴii tallitii nder loɓokke. »
61003001	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, ɗerol ngool woni ɗerol ɗiɗaɓol ngol mbinndanmi on. Nder ɗereeji am ɗiɗi ɗii fuu, miɗo tefa findinde hakkillooji mooɗon ngam wallude on miiloɗon no wooɗiri.
61003002	Miɗo hiɗi miccintinde on ko annabiiɓe seniiɓe kaalunoo illa arannde. Mi miccintina on duu tilsinooje Joomiraawo meeɗen, kisinoowo meeɗen. Tilsinooje ɗe lilaaɓe makko ekkintini.
61003003	Arannde nii, miɗo hiɗi anndon ko wi'aa ɗum : Nder balɗe cakitittooɗe, tokkooɓe muuyɗe ɓalli mum'en gom ngarowan, njaltinoo on,
61003004	mbi'a : « Hanaa Iisa Almasiihu waɗani on alkawal wartoyde ? Too, toy o woni ? Maamiraɓe meeɗen gom maayii illa ko ɓooyi. Amma faa warde hannden walaa ko wattiti. Huune fuu no anndiranoo illa puɗɗol duuniyaaru non worri. »
61003005	Wi'ooɓe iri haalaaji ɗii no keeri, calii wi'ude ko kammu he leydi fuu Alla tagiraana ɗum na he haala mum. Nder haala makko duu o wi'i leydi wurto nder ndiyam, he ndiyam duu o tagiri ndi.
61003006	Kaden, ndenno ndiyam o waɗi halki duuniyaaru.
61003007	He haala makko goota kaan, o jogii kammu e leydi. Kammu e leydi no njogetee ngam hiite halka ɗe nyannde darŋal. Nyalaane ndee waɗooɓe hakke kiitetee, kiite kalkooje ɓe.
61003008	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, huune worre nde mi hiɗaa njeggiton, woni njogoɗon ko to Joomiraawo, nyalooma gooto wa'aana hano duuɓi ujunere. Duuɓi ujunere duu no nga'ani mo hano nyalooma gooto.
61003009	Woɓɓe duu no miila ko Joomiraawo ɓooyi tabbintinaay alkawal mum. Hanaa o waawaa tabbintinde ngal non, o walaana omo watti munyal ngam o hiɗaa neɗɗo mooɗon fuu halka amma neɗɗo mooɗon fuu tuuba acca waɗude hakke.
61003010	Amma nyalaane garki Joomiraawo no juha neɗɗo hano no gujjo juhirta neɗɗo. Nder wakkati oo, majjol kammu waɗiran he daane mawne. Kujje buurɗe dow fuu kalkirtee hiite. Leydi he ko woni dow mum fuu no halketee.
61003011	Nde huune fuu nii halkirtee, ndenne iri himɓe ɓeye kaanuɗon wartude ? No haani njooɗoɗon jonnde seniine, mbuurdon kulol Alla.
61003012	No haani laatoɗon doomuɓe nyalaane Alla ndeen, ngaɗon ko mbaawɗon waɗude fuu heɓa nyalaane ndeen warilawa. Nder nyalaade ndeen, kammu halkirtee hiite, kujje gonɗe dow fuu taayan nder hiite.
61003013	Amma enen, ko keɗiɗen woni kammu kesu he leydi heyri to dartinaaku tawetee hano no Alla haalirannoo en ɗum nder alkawal mum.
61003014	Ngam majjum banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, nde nii oɗon keɗii nyalaane ndeen, ngaɗee no mbaawɗon waɗude fuu, njooɗoɗon jonnde laaɓune he jonnde dartinaaku yeeso Joomiraawo nder ɓerne fukkiine.
61003015	Paamon duu ko munyal Joomiraawo meeɗen ngal no hokkan on laawol heɓude kisinam. Pol, banndii'en korsuɗo, nder hikmaaku ngu Alla hokki ɗum winndi wi'i on haala kaa.
61003016	Wakkati fuu omo haala dow ir kujje ɗee nder ɗereeji makko ɗi o winndata. Ɗereeji makko no coomi haalaaji ɗi maana mum'en no tiiɗi faameede. Haalaaji ɗi ɓe ngalaa anndal he ɓe ɓenndaay nder goonɗinol mum'en ɓoylata maana mum'en hano no ɓe mboowri waɗirde ɗum he haalaaji Alla gom, ɓe ngaddana ko'e maɓɓe halkere.
61003017	Amma onon banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, ko annduɗon ɓe halkuɓe, to njaɓee ekkintinol maɓɓe ada hakkillo mooɗon. Ɓe cottina on dow ko tarsiniɗon he semmbe mooɗon fuu.
61003018	Ɓeydee yahde yeeso nder moƴƴere e anndol Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen Kisinoowo meeɗen. Teddungal tabbita he makko illa joonin faa abada ! Aamiin.
62001001	Mi winndani on ngam haalande on dow gonnooɗo ɗon illa fuɗɗorde. Min nanii haala makko, min ngi'irii mo gite amin, min ƴeewi mo, min meemirii mo juuɗe amin. Kanko woni haala kokkooha mbuurnam.
62001002	Mbuurnam ɗam wannginaama, min ngi'ii ɗam : Miɗen ceedanoo ɗam. Mbuurnam nduumiiɗam ngonnooɗam to Baabiraawo, ɗam min mbannginanaa.
62001003	Ndenne, ko min ngi'ii he ko min nani, min kaalanta on, onon duu, faa kawton he amin nder kawtal Baabiraawo he Ɓiyum Iisa Almasiihu.
62001004	Miɗen mbinndana on ɗum, heɓa belɗum amin huuɓa.
62001005	Habaru mo min narrii Almasiihu, mo min kaalanta on nii : Alla no jeyngol non, nimre fuu takkaaki mo.
62001006	Nde nii en mbi'ii eɗen nder kawtal makko, dey eɗen ndilla nder nimre, en penii, goonga tawaaka nder golle meeɗen.
62001007	Amma nde nii eɗen ndilla nder jeyngol hano no Alla he hoore mum wontiri nder maggol nii, ndenne enɗam naatii hakkune meeɗen. Ƴiiƴam Ɓiyiiko, Iisa Almasiihu duu no lamnan en he hakke fuu.
62001008	Nde nii en mbi'ii en ngalaa hakke fuu, en kiilii ko'e meeɗen, goonga fuu tawdaaka he meeɗen.
62001009	Amma se en njardake, en mbanngini yeeso Alla dow hakkeeji meeɗen, ngam o kolniiɗo, dartiiɗo, o yaafoto en, o lamna en he hakke fuu.
62001010	Nde nii en mbi'ii en ngaɗaay hakke, en ngaɗii mo penoowo, haala makko naataay ɓerɗe meeɗen.
62002001	Sukaaɓe am, mi winndanii on ɗum, ngam to on ngaɗu hakke. Amma nde nii gooto nder mooɗon waɗii hakke, eɗen ngoodi paasantooɗo en to Baabiraawo, kanko woni Iisa Almasiihu dartiiɗo.
62002002	Kanko mursi yonki mum, ƴiiƴam makko rufaa ngam hakkeeji meeɗen njaafee, hanaa hakkeeji meeɗen, enen tan, amma hakkeeji duuniyaaru fuu.
62002003	Nde nii en njogake tilsinooje Alla, sikka fuu walaa ko eɗen anndi mo.
62002004	Bi'uɗo no anndi mo dey tokkaay tilsinooje makko no penoowo, goonga fuu tawdaaka he joomum.
62002005	Amma tokkuɗo haala Alla, tabbat hidde Alla goonga he goonga no huuɓi dow joomum. Nii annditirten ko eɗen ngondi he makko.
62002006	Bi'uɗo no wondi he makko, no haani wuurda no Iisa Almasiihu wuurdunoo nii.
62002007	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, ko ngonmi miɗo winndana on ɗum hanaa tilsinoore heyre, amma ɗum tilsinoore ɓooynde, nde keɓunooɗon illa arannde. Tilsinoore ndee woni hiɗodirde, haala kaa duu on naniino ka.
62002008	Amma baa ko nii waɗi, tilsinoore ndee, nde heyre duu, ngam goonga mayre no wannga he Almasiihu, no wannga duu he mooɗon. Ngam nimre no timma, jeyngol goongaawol ngool duu fuɗɗii yeynude.
62002009	Bi'uɗo nder jeyngol ngool woni, tawi no wanyi banndum, joomum kay nder nimre tawa faa hannden.
62002010	Giɗuɗo banndum nder jeyngol wuuri, walaa fuu ko fergata ɗum.
62002011	Banyuɗo banndum nder nimre woni, joomum no yaha nder mayre, anndaa fuu to fa'i ngam nde wumnii ɗum.
62002012	Sukaaɓe am, miɗo winndana on ngam wi'ude on hakkeeji mooɗon njaafaama ngam sabbu Almasiihu.
62002013	Onon baabiraaɓe, miɗo winndana on ngam oɗon anndi Gonnooɗo ɗon illa fuɗɗorde. Onon jokolɓe, miɗo winndana on ngam on njaalake Seyɗan bonɗo oon.
62002014	Sukaaɓe am, mi winndanii on ɗum, ngam oɗon anndi Baabiraawo. Onon baabiraaɓe, mi winndanii on ɗum, ngam oɗon anndi Gonnooɗo ɗon illa fuɗɗorde. Onon jokolɓe, mi winndanii on ɗum, ngam oɗon njogii semmbe, haala Alla no nder ɓerɗe mon, kaden duu on jaaliiɓe bonɗo oon.
62002015	To ngiɗee duuniyaaru nduu e ko woni nder mayru fuu. Ngam giɗɗo duuniyaaru fuu, hidde Baabiraawo tawaaka to joomum.
62002016	Ngam huune fuu ko woni nder duuniyaaru nduu : Muuyɗe ɓerɗe, suuno heɓude ko hi'i fuu, e fiyude gabaare dow njawdi. Ɗum fuu ƴuwaay to Baabiraawo, amma ɗum ƴuwaana nder duuniyaaru.
62002017	Duuniyaaru he muuyooji muuɗum fuu tabbitataa, amma gaɗoowo muuyɗe Alla duuman faa abada.
62002018	Sukaaɓe am, nder wakkati cakitiiɗo ngonɗen. On nani wi'aama ganyo-Almasiihu no warowan. Haya, illa joonin wayɓe-Almasiihu heewɓe ngari. Kujje ɗe anndirten timmoode ndeen.
62002019	Hakkune meeɗen ɓe mburtii, amma ɓe njeydaaka he meeɗen. Ngam nde nii iɓe njeydanoo he meeɗen, ɓe njooɗoto hakkune meeɗen. Amma ɓe mburtake ngam hollude ko ɓe njeydaakano he meeɗen.
62002020	Onon kay, Ceniiɗo wuji ko'e mon, on fuu on paamii goonga oon.
62002021	Mi winndanaay on ngam on anndaa goonga oon, amma ngam oɗon anndi mo waɗi mbinndanmi on. Oɗon anndi duu ko fewre fuu tawdaaka e goonga.
62002022	Ndenne, moy woni penoowo oon ? Jedduɗo ko Iisa woni Almasiihu, kam woni penoowo. Jedduɗo Baabiraawo e Ɓiyum bajjo oon, too joomum no ganyo-Almasiihu.
62002023	Sabu jedduɗo Ɓiɗɗo bajjo oon walaana Baabiraawo, amma ceedaniiɗo mo kay, no wondi he makko.
62002024	Ngam majjum, tinnee he ko nanuɗon illa arannde. Nde oɗon tokki Habaru lobbo mo nanuɗon illa arannde oon, too onon duu on ngondan he Ɓiɗɗo bajjo oon, he Baabiraawo oon duu.
62002025	Fodoore nde Almasiihu waɗani en ndeen woni mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
62002026	Ɗum woni ko ngiɗumi winndande on dow himɓe tefooɓe majjina on.
62002027	Amma onon kay Iisa Almasiihu wujirii on Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, Ruuhu oo duu wondan he mooɗon. Ndenne, fotaay njanngineɗon, ngam Ruuhu oo jannginan on huune fuu. Ko o jannginta ɗum duu no goonga ngam o fenataa. Ndenne, ngondee he Almasiihu hano no o jannginiri on.
62002028	Joonin sukaaɓe am, ngondee he Almasiihu, heɓa keɓen gokka wakkati o wartoyta, to semteene fuu hi'ee dow yeeso meeɗen nyannde gartol makko.
62002029	Oɗon anndi ko Almasiihu no dartiiɗo, ndenne oɗon kaani anndude ko golluɗo golleeji dartiiɗi fuu, joomum no ɓiyiiko.
62003001	Ƴeewee, ngi'ee no Baabiraawo hiɗiri en, faa noddiraɗen ɓiɓɓe Alla. En ɓiɓɓe makko jaati. Amma ngam duuniyaaru anndaa Baabiraawo waɗi ko ndu anndaa en.
62003002	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, joonin en ɓiɓɓe Alla. Ko laatoytoɗen ɗum, wannginaaka ginan. Amma eɗen anndi ko wakkati Iisa Almasiihu wanngowi fuu, en nanndan he makko, ngam en ngi'an jaati no kanko he hoore makko worri.
62003003	Neɗɗo fuu watti gokka mum dow makko, laaɓini hoore muuɗum hano no o laaɓiri nii.
62003004	Golluɗo ko wooɗaa fuu, murti he tilsinoore Alla, ngam hakke fuu no murtol he tilsinoore Alla.
62003005	Oɗon anndi ko Iisa Almasiihu wanngi ngam ronndaade hakkeeji meeɗen. Oɗon anndi ko kanko duu, o waɗaay hakke fuu.
62003006	Gonduɗo he makko fuu, duumataako no waɗa hakke. Amma duumiiɗo no waɗa hakke, hi'aay mo, anndaa mo duu.
62003007	Sukaaɓe am, to accee neɗɗo fuu majjina on ! Golloowo ko dartii no dartiiɗo, hano no Iisa Almasiihu woniri dartiiɗo nii.
62003008	Amma gaɗoowo hakke fuu no ley mardi Seyɗan, ngam Seyɗan no gaɗɗo hakke illa fuɗɗorde. Ngam majjum waɗi Ɓii-Alla wari faa sankita golleeji makko.
62003009	Laatiiɗo ɓii-Alla fuu duumataako no waɗa hakke ngam baawɗe Alla no fuɗa nder ɓerne joomum. Joomum waawtaa waɗi hakke kaden ngam no ɓii-Alla.
62003010	Ndaa, ɗum woni ko senndi ɓiɓɓe Alla he ɓiɓɓe Ibiliisa : Gollude ko dartii he hiɗude banndum.
62003011	Ngiɗodiren, ɗum woni habaru mo nanuɗon illa arannde.
62003012	En kaanaa nanndude he Kayinu tokkitiiɗo bonɗo oon, faa wari minyum. Ɗume waɗi ko o wari mo ? O warii mo ngam golleeji makko no bonɗi, golleeji minyiiko duu no lobbiɗi.
62003013	Ndenne banndiraaɓe, to ɗum haayɗin on nde nii duuniyaaru nduu wanyi on.
62003014	Amma enen, eɗen anndi ko en mburtake nder ɗowdi maayde naatuɗen nder mbuurnam, ngam eɗen ngiɗi banndiraaɓe meeɗen. Banyuɗo banndum fuu no nder ɗowdi maayde.
62003015	Neɗɗo fuu banyuɗo banndum no ittoowo yonki. Oɗon anndi ko mbuurnam nduumiiɗam walaana ittoowo yonki.
62003016	Ndaa, no anndirten ko woni hidde nii : Iisa Almasiihu mursii yonki muuɗum ngam meeɗen. Ndenne enen duu, eɗen kaani mursude yonkiiji men ngam banndiraaɓe meeɗen.
62003017	Neɗɗo fuu keƴuɗo hoore mum se hi'i banndum no ɓillii ko maɓɓi gite mum, yurmaaki mo, noy joomum waawi wi'ude hidde Alla no nder ɓerne mum ?
62003018	Sukaaɓe am, to hidde meeɗen jooɗoo dow ɗemle meeɗen tan, amma nde hi'ee goonga e goonga nder ko ngolluɗen.
62003019	Ndaa, nii anndirten nde eɗen tawa nder goonga. Nii duu, hakkillo meeɗen waawiri fukkaade yeeso Alla.
62003020	Ngam baa nde nii tawaama ɓerɗe meeɗen peli en, eɗen anndi ko Alla no ɓuri ɗe manngu. Omo anndi duu huune fuu.
62003021	Ndenne banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, se nii ɓerɗe meeɗen pelaay en, en tawdetee hoolaare yeeso Alla.
62003022	O hokkan en huune fuu ko eeluɗen mo, ngam en tokki tilsinooje makko, eɗen ngaɗa ko weli mo.
62003023	Ndaa, ko Alla tilsini ɗum nii : Goonɗinde Iisa Almasiihu Ɓiyiiko, he ngiɗodiren hano no o tilsiniri en ɗum.
62003024	Tokkoowo tilsinooje Alla fuu, no wondi he makko, kanko duu omo wondi he joomum. Ndaa, ngam o hokki en Ruuhu makko, kam watta annditen ko omo wondi he meeɗen.
62004001	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, kakkilee to ngoonɗinee warooɓe wi'a kam'en no ngondi he Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, koree ɓe ngi'on ginan heɓa paamon se goonga fuu Alla hokki ɓe Ruuhu oon. Ngam annabiiɓe fewreeɓe ɗuɓɓe cankitake nder duuniyaaru nduu.
62004002	Ndaa no annditirten Ruuhu Alla nii : Hunnduko fuu jaɓi ko Iisa Almasiihu laatake neɗɗo, too Ruuhu Alla no wondi he makko.
62004003	Hunnduko fuu ko jaɓaay ko o laatake neɗɗo, hanaa Ruuhu Alla wondi he makko, amma ganyo-Almasiihu kam wondi he makko. On naninoo habaru garol ganyo-Almasiihu, too joonin o yottake.
62004004	Sukaaɓe am, onon, on himɓe Alla, on njaalake annabiiɓe fewreeɓe ɓeen. Ngam Ruuhu Alla gonduɗo he mooɗon oon no ɓuri gonɗo nder duuniyaaru nduu semmbe.
62004005	Annabiiɓe fewreeɓe, himɓe ƴuwɓe nder duuniyaaru non, ngam majjum waɗi dow kujje duuniyaaru tan ɓe kaalata, duuniyaaru duu no hettinanoo ɓe.
62004006	Amma enen, en jeyaaɓe Alla, annduɗo Alla fuu hettinanto en. Ɓe kanaa jeyaaɓe Alla kettinantaako en. Nii cenndirten Ruuhu goongaajo e ruuhu majjere.
62004007	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, ngiɗodiren ngam Alla no wuddu hidde. Neɗɗo fuu mo hidde tawaa nder ɓerne mum no ɓii-Alla, joomum no anndi Alla duu.
62004008	Mo hidde tawaaka nder ɓerne mum, joomum anndaa Alla, ngam Alla no hidde.
62004009	Ndaa no Alla wanngirani en hidde mum nii : O lili Ɓiyiiko bajjo nder duuniyaaru nduu ngam keɓen mbuurnam sabbu mum.
62004010	Ɗume woni hidde ndee ? Kayre woni hidde nde Alla woodani en faa o lili Almasiihu mursuɗo yonki mum, ƴiiƴam mum rufaa ngam hakkeeji meeɗen fuu njaafee. Ndenne hanaa enen ngiɗi Alla, amma kanko hiɗi en.
62004011	Banndiraaɓe am horsuɓe, ko Alla hiɗiri en nii, enen duu, eɗen kaani hiɗodirde.
62004012	Neɗɗo fuu hi'aay Alla abada. Se nii eɗen ngiɗodiri, Alla no wondan he meeɗen, hidde makko duu ɓenndan nder men.
62004013	Ndaa, no paamirten ko eɗen ngondi he makko, kanko duu omo wondi he meeɗen nii : He Ruuhu makko mo o hokki en oon paamirten ɗum.
62004014	Minen e ko'e amin, min ngi'ii, miɗen ceedo ko Baabiraawo lili Ɓiyum ngam hisina duuniyaaru nduu.
62004015	Neɗɗo fuu jaɓuɗo ko Iisa no Ɓii-Alla, too joomum no wondi he Alla, Alla duu no wondi he joomum.
62004016	Enen duu, eɗen anndi, en ngoonɗini duu ko Alla no hiɗi en. Alla no hidde. Buurɗo nder hidde fuu no wondi he Alla, Alla duu no wondi he joomum.
62004017	Nde nii hidde ɓenndi nder ɓerɗe meeɗen, ndenne hoolaare mawne wonani en nyannde darŋal. Ngam mbuurnam meeɗen nder duuniyaaru nduu nanndii he ɗam Iisa Almasiihu.
62004018	Kulol walaa nde nii hidde no woodi, ngam hidde ɓenndunde riiwata ngol. Ngam jukkol gacce neɗɗo hulanta, kuloowo fuu, hidde Alla ɓenndaay nder ɓerne joomum.
62004019	Enen duu, hidde no nder ɓerɗe meeɗen ngam kanko arti hiɗude en.
62004020	Bi'uɗo kam no hiɗi Alla, dey tawi no wanyi banndum, joomum no penoowo. Ngam mo hiɗaay banndum tawaaɗo ley gite mum, waawaa hiɗude Alla mo joomum hi'aay abada.
62004021	Tilsinoore ndee Almasiihu waddani en : Giɗɗo Alla fuu, hiɗa banndum.
62005001	Neɗɗo fuu goonɗinii ko Iisa woni Almasiihu, joomum laatake ɓii-Alla. Giɗɗo saaro fuu no hiɗan ɓiɓɓe makko duu.
62005002	Ndaa ko ngaɗeten heɓa annditen ko eɗen ngiɗi ɓiɓɓe Alla nii : Kollen Alla hidde, tokken tilsinooje makko duu.
62005003	Ngam tokkude tilsinooje makko, ɗum woni hidde Alla, tilsinooje makko duu kanaa donngal.
62005004	Ɓii-Alla fuu no jaali duuniyaaru nduu, goonɗinol meeɗen woni laawol ngol njaalortoɗen ndu.
62005005	Moy woni jaalotooɗo duuniyaaru nduu ? Nde hanaa goonɗinɗo ko Iisa woni Ɓii-Alla.
62005006	Iisa Almasiihu woni garduɗo he alaama ndiyam he ƴiiƴam. Hanaa ndiyam batisma tan o wardi, amma faa he ƴiiƴam makko dufaaɗam o wardi. Ruuhu Ceniiɗo holli ko ɗum goonga, sabu Ruuhu oon duu no goonga.
62005007	Ngam kujje tati no kolla ko Iisa woni Almasiihu,
62005008	kanƴe ngoni : Ruuhu, ndiyam e ƴiiƴam, ceedaaku majji fuu no go'o.
62005009	Eɗen njaɓa ceedaaku himɓe, amma ceedaaku Alla ɓuri semmbe. Ngam kanngu woni ngu o waɗi dow Ɓiyiiko.
62005010	Neɗɗo fuu goonɗini Ɓii-Alla, no woodi ceedaaku nguun nder ɓerne mum. Mo goonɗinaay Alla waɗi mo penoowo, ngam jaɓaay ceedaaku ngu o waɗi dow Ɓiyiiko nguun.
62005011	Ndaa ceedaaku nguun nii : Alla hokki en mbuurnam nduumiiɗam, har Ɓiyiiko duu keɓirten ɗam.
62005012	Neɗɗo fuu wondi he Ɓii-Alla, heɓi mbuurnam ɗam. Mo wondaay he makko duu heɓataa ɗam.
62005013	Onon goonɗinɓe Ɓii-Alla ɓeen, mi winndani on ɗum fuu ngam anndon ko on keɓi mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
62005014	Eɗen ngoodi hoolaare to makko : ngam se en ndu'ake, eeluɗen mo huune yaadoore he muuyɗe makko, o jaabanto en.
62005015	Eɗen anndi ko omo hettinanii en, ndenne sikka fuu walaa ko eeluɗen mo, en keɓan ɗum.
62005016	Ndenne, nde goɗɗo hi'ii banndum no waɗa hakke nde yottinta ɗum he maayde, joomum du'oo eelana mo, nden Alla duu no hokkan mo mbuurnam. Ngam no woodi hakke yottinoore neɗɗo he maayde, mi wi'aay ndu'anoɗon gaɗoowo iri hakke oon.
62005017	Oonyaare fuu no hakke, amma hanaa hakke fuu yottinta neɗɗo he maayde.
62005018	Eɗen anndi ko ɓii-Alla fuu duumataako no waɗa hakke, ngam Iisa Almasiihu Ɓii-Alla faddoto mo, bonɗo oon duu heewtataako joomum.
62005019	Eɗen anndi ko en himɓe Alla, eɗen anndi duu ko duuniyaaru nduu fuu ley maral bonɗo oon woni.
62005020	Eɗen anndi Ɓii-Alla wari, hokki en hakkillo ngam anndude Deweteeɗo goonga e goonga oon. Joonin eɗen ngondi he Deweteeɗo goonga e goonga oon, ngam eɗen ngondi he Iisa Almasiihu Ɓiyiiko. Kanko woni Alla goonga e goonga, kanko duu woni mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
62005021	Sukaaɓe am, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon e reweteeɓe fereeɓe gom.
63001001	Miin, ardiiɗo hawriine goonɗinɓe winndi ɗerol ngool fa'ude to mooɗon, onon hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa Almasiihu nde Alla suɓii, onon tedduɓe hano debbo dimo he ɓiɓɓe mum. Miɗo sanna on, onon giɗaaɓe am goonga e goonga. Hanaa miin tan hiɗi on, annduɓe goonga ɓeen fuu no ngiɗi on,
63001002	ngam goonga oon no wondan he meeɗen, o duumoto duu hakkune meeɗen faa abada.
63001003	Moƴƴere, yurmeene he jam Alla Baabiraawo meeɗen he Ɓiyum Iisa Almasiihu no ngonda he meeɗen faa abada nder goonga he hidde.
63001004	Mi nani belɗum sanne wakkati nanunoomi ko nder mooɗon woɓɓe tokkiri goonga e goonga hano no Baabiraawo tilsiniri en ɗum nii.
63001005	Joonin, onon hawriine goonɗinɓe, miɗo ŋaaro on, ngiɗodiree. Ko mbinndananmi on ɗum hanaa tilsinoore heyre, amma ɗum tilsinoore ɓooynde, nde keɓunooɗon illa arannde.
63001006	Ndaa ko woni hidde nii : tokkude tilsinooje Alla. Wuurude nder hidde, ɗum woni tilsinoore nde nanuɗon illa fuɗɗorde.
63001007	Ngam majjinooɓe heewɓe cankitake nder duuniyaaru. Ɓe njaɓaay wi'ude ko Iisa Almasiihu laatake neɗɗo. Laatiiɗo hano maɓɓe fuu, kam duu no majjinoowo, joomum no ganyo-Almasiihu.
63001008	Paddee ko'e mooɗon to golle ɗe min ngaɗani on ɗeen mbonu, keɓon baraaje ɗuɗɗe.
63001009	Sabu neɗɗo fuu boɗɗiiɗo laawol Almasiihu faa ɓeydi ko tawaaka dow maggol, joomum heedanaa Alla. Jooɗiiɗo dow maggol fuu, joomum heedani Baabiraawo he Ɓiyum.
63001010	Neɗɗo fuu garɗo to mooɗon, se nii no waajoo ko walaa dow laawol ngool, to mbernee mo nder ɓaadeeji mooɗon, to baa njaɓɓitee mo.
63001011	Ngam jaɓɓitiiɗo mo fuu, hawtidi he makko nder golleeji makko bonɗi.
63001012	Ko kaanumi haalande on ɗum no ɗuuɗi, mi hiɗaa winndande on ɗum dow ɗerol. Amma miɗo habbiti ngam warde to mooɗon kaalden hunnduko e hunnduko, ngam welwelo meeɗen huuɓa.
63001013	Goonɗinɓe hawriine nde Alla suɓii gom, giɗuɓe on wonɓe ɗo no njewta on.
64001001	Miin, ardiiɗo hawriine goonɗinɓe winndi ɗerol ngool fa'ude to maa, aan Gayus, banndam korsuɗo goonga e goonga.
64001002	Banndam korsuɗo, miɗo du'oo heɓa tawee aɗa yamɗi, ko kawjiɗaa fuu no wooɗi hano no goonɗinol maaɗa wooɗiri.
64001003	Mi nani belɗum sanne wakkati banndiraaɓe meeɗen gom ngari kaalani kam dow no tiɓinoriɗaa goonga mo keɓuɗen oon, he no tokkirɗaa mo.
64001004	Walaa ko ɓuri welude kam, se hanaa mi nana sukaaɓe am no tokki laabi goonga ɗiin.
64001005	Banndam korsuɗo, golle lobbe ɗe ngaɗantaa banndiraaɓe meeɗen ɓe annduɗaa he baa ɓe a anndaa, no kollaa ko a kolniiɗo.
64001006	Ɓe ngaddi haala hidde maaɗa yeeso hawriine amin. Mi eeli ma walluɓe no welirta Alla heɓa ɓe ngaɗa jahaangal maɓɓe no haandiri.
64001007	Ngam kamɓe duu, dow innde Almasiihu ɓe ngaɗata jahaangal maɓɓe. Ɓe tefataa fuu balla gom he mo goonɗinaay Iisa.
64001008	Ndenne, enen goonɗinɓe Iisa, eɗen kaani wallude ir himɓe ɓee, ngam laatoɗen wallooɓe goonga oon sankitoo nokku fuu.
64001009	No woodi ko mbinndumi fa'ude he hawriine goonɗinɓe mooɗon, amma Diyoterefes, giɗuɗo ardaade huune fuu, wannaaka he ko mbinndumi ɗum sam.
64001010	Ngam majjum waɗi nde nii mi warowi, mi hollan golle nyidduɗe ɗe o waɗi, kanko tefoowo semteene amin, omo tokka, omo fena dow amin, amma ɗum fuu heƴaay mo, omo saloo weernude banndiraaɓe meeɗen, omo haɗa goonɗinɓe tawdaaɓe he makko ɓeen werna ɓe. Omo riiwa ɓe nder hawriine goonɗinɓe maɓɓe.
64001011	Banndam korsuɗo, too nyemmin ko boni, nyemmin ko wooɗi. Gaɗoowo ko wooɗi fuu no neɗɗo Alla. Gaɗoowo ko boni anndaa Alla abada.
64001012	Demetirus no neɗɗo lobbo, himɓe fuu no pilloo habaru makko, sabu nde nii goonga e hoore mum no woodunoo hunnduko wi'annoo o neɗɗo lobbo. Minen duu, miɗen kooli mo, aɗa anndi duu ceedaaku amin no goonga.
64001013	Ko ngiɗumi haalande ma ɗum no ɗuuɗi, mi hiɗaa winndude ɗum, ɗum fuu ɗo.
64001014	Mi haaɓi en ngiidaay, kaalden hunnduko e hunnduko.
64001015	Higiraaɓe maa wonɓe ɗo no njewte. Miɗo yewta higiraaɓe meeɗen fuu, gooto gooto. Jam wonda he maa.
65001001	Miin Yahuuda, minyo Yakuuba, maccuɗo Iisa Almasiihu, winndani on, onon ɓe Alla Baabiraawo hiɗi noddi, onon ɓe Iisa Almasiihu reeni.
65001002	Jam, yurmeene e hidde Alla ɓeydoo hakkune mooɗon faa noy walaa.
65001003	Giɗaaɓe am, nde goonga, mi hiɗiino winndande on dow habaru kisinam, ɗam kawtuɗen en fuu. Amma ko sakitii, mi hi'ii ko no tilsi mi winndana on ngam fooɗude hakkillooji mooɗon, mi wi'a on, ndurwon keddi baawɗe mooɗon ngam reenude ekkintinooje ɗe Alla watti gaba go'o nder juuɗe jeyaaɓe mum.
65001004	Mi winndanii on ngam himɓe ɓe kulataa Alla gom molake naati hakkune mooɗon, himɓe ɓe illa ko ɓooyi kiite mum'en mbinndaa. Iɓe oonya moƴƴere Alla ngam ɓe ngaɗa no weliri ɓe. Iɓe mbi'a ɓe anndaa Iisa Almasiihu, Joomiraawo meeɗen gooto jeyɗo en.
65001005	Onon annduɓe fuu, miɗo miccintina on, ko gaɗa ko Joomiraawo soptini Isra'ilankooɓe he juuɗe ɓiɓɓe Misira, o wari hakkune maɓɓe, saliiɓe goonɗinde mo.
65001006	Miccitee duu, ko maleykaaɓe ɓe kaaɗaayno he baawɗe ɗe Alla hokkunoo ɓe, cotti nokkuuje mum'en, Alla haɓɓiri ɓe callali, watti nder nimre to ɓe njottoo ɓe ndooma darŋal.
65001007	Miccitee Sodooma e Gomoora. Miccitee he ci'e piiliiɗe ɗe. Himɓe majje duu ngaɗiino kujje nyiddiniiɗe, misaali luuɗu e yeenude ɓe kanaa tagaaɓe. Ɓe kalkiraama norɗe hiite duumiinge, ngam hollude gaɗɗo iri nii he banndum fuu, no halkirtee no himɓe ɓee kalkiraa.
65001008	Baa ko ɗum waɗaama ngam daliila oo, moliiɓe naati hakkune mooɗon duu non ngoni no ngaɗa. Miilooji maɓɓe no uppa ɓe, ɓe ngaɗa ko nyiddinii, ɓe pekita ɓalli maɓɓe, ɓe murta he ardaŋal fuu, ɓe mbonna inɗe maleykaaɓe tedduɓe.
65001009	Tawi duu baa Mika'el, mawɗo maleykaaɓe he hoore mum, suusaay haalude ko boni fuu dow Ibiliisa baa nii ko geddi naatiino hakkune maɓɓe dow kooƴol ɓanndu Muusa. Ko o jaabii Ibiliisa o wi'i tan woni Joomiraawo hiitoto mo.
65001010	Amma himɓe ɓee no mbonna innde ko ɓe anndaa. Anndal maɓɓe nanndungal anndal ndabba, anndal ngaal fotaay taykaaki fuu, kanngal halkataa ɓalli maɓɓe.
65001011	Kaari, bone saaman dow maɓɓe, ɓe tokki laawol Kayinu. Ngam suuno seedere, ɓe naati oonyaare Balaama. Ɓe kalketee no Kora halkira wakkati murtunoo ko Alla wi'i.
65001012	Nde goonga kamɓe tunninta nyaamduuji ɗi kawroton nyaamon hakkune mooɗon. Wakkati nyaamduuji mbelɗi ngaddaa, ɓe kulataa hitere fuu, ɓe nyaaman faa ɓe ƴartina, ɓe ndarataako fuu ɓe keɗo goɗɗo. Iɓe nanndi duule ɗe henndu ruyni, duule ɗe ngalaa ndiyam. Iɓe nanndi leɗɗe kaanuɗe teɓeede nder wakkati mum amma ɗe ngalaa ɓiɓɓe. Iɓe nii leɗɗe ɗoofaaɗe, njoori karaw.
65001013	Iɓe cankita golle maɓɓe nyidduɗe hano no maayo sankitirta benkeƴƴe mum. Himɓe ɓee no nanndi koode jiilotooɗe. Alla resani ɓe nokku ɓurɗo nimre niɓɓude.
65001014	Enok, maamii'en jeɗɗaɓo nde nanngaama illa Aadamu, waɗinoo annabaaku dow maɓɓe wi'i : « Ndaa Joomiraawo no warda maleykaaɓe mum ujunaaji re'ataa, maleykaaɓe seniiɓe
65001015	ngam hiito himɓe fuu. O taƴana ɓe kiite ngam golle nyidduɗe ɗe ɓe ngaɗata nder rafi kulol Alla e haalaaji bonɗi ɗi ɓe kaali dow makko. »
65001016	Himɓe ɓee wakkati fuu no nguuntoo, no mboytitoo, no tokki suuno ɓerɗe mum'en bonɗe. Iɓe mana ko'e maɓɓe, iɓe mana woɓɓe duu ngam iɓe keɓa ko ɓe ngiɗi he maɓɓe.
65001017	Onon giɗaaɓe am, miccitee haalaaji ɗi lilaaɓe Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen kaalannoo on illa arannde.
65001018	Nder haalaaji maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'ii on : « Nder wakkati cakitiiɗo, tokkooɓe muuyɗe ɓalli mum'en, haalooɓe ko ngiɗi gom ngarowan, njawoo on. »
65001019	Kamɓe nii ngoni fiyodirooɓe ko'e himɓe, miilooji himɓe tan ɓe ngondi, Ruuhu Alla wondaa he maɓɓe.
65001020	Amma onon giɗaaɓe am, cemmbiɗee nder goonɗinol mooɗon ceniingol, ndu'ee nder balla Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
65001021	Njooɗee nder hidde Alla, ngattee hoolaare mon fuu dow Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Nder yurmeene makko, o hokkan on mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
65001022	Njurmee ɓe ɓerɗe mum'en pukkaaki he goonɗinde Iisa Almasiihu.
65001023	Woɓɓe, kisinee ɗum'en, mboɗɗinon ɓe hiite jahannama. Amma kakkilee to ɓe ndaaɓir on hakke maɓɓe, mboɗɗee ɓe, baa kolte maɓɓe mboɗɗee ɗum.
65001024	Yettoore tabbita he Alla gooto, kisinoowo en har Iisa Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Alla waawi reeni on heɓa to on pergo. Alla waawi wannginde on nder teddungal mum, wartira on heewɓe welwelo, ɓe ngalaa fuu feloore gom. Kanko jeyii yettoore, teddungal, laamu, e baawɗe faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
66001001	Dewtere ndee hawri kujje cuuɗaaɗe ɗe Iisa Almasiihu wanngini. Alla holli mo ɗe ngam o wannginana maccuɓe mum, ko waroyta fuu nder ko ɓooyataa. Nden Iisa lili maleykaajo mum hollowa ɗe Yahaaya. Yahaaya, maccuɗo Iisa oo duu, seedake ko huune fuu ko o hi'i no haala Alla non ka Iisa Almasiihu wanngini.
66001003	Belɗo hoore woni jannguɗo dewtere annabaaku ndee. Welɓe ko'e ngoni hettiniiɓe haalaaji annabaaku nguu dey njogiti ko winndaa nder maggu. Hakiika, wakkati kaalaaɗo dow kujje ɗeen ɓadake.
66001004	Miin Yahaaya, winndani kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe jeɗɗi tawaaɗe nder leydi Asiya. Jam e moƴƴere ƴuwɗo to Alla gonɗo, gonnooɗo, e gonoowo, jam e moƴƴere ƴuwne to ruuhuuji jeɗɗi gonɗi yeeso jooɗorgal laamu makko, jam e moƴƴere ƴuwɗo to
66001005	Iisa Almasiihu, seedeejo kolniiɗo, arano ummintinaaɗo, laamiiɗo laamiiɓe duuniyaaru fuu ngonda he mooɗon. Almasiihu hiɗi en, soptini en he baawɗe hakke meeɗen har ƴiiƴam makko ndufaaɗam.
66001006	O waɗi en laamiiɓe e cakkanooɓe Alla ngam ngollanen Alla Baabiiko ! Teddungal e baawɗe tabbita he Iisa Almasiihu faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
66001007	— Ndaaree, omo warda he duule. Himɓe fuu no ngi'an mo, baa tontunooɓe mo. Lenyi duuniyaaru fuu no mboytoto ngam makko. Hakiika non. Aamiin !
66001008	Alla Joomiraawo Jom baawɗe, gonɗo, gonnooɗo e gonoowo, wi'i : « Miin woni fuɗɗorde, miin woni timmoode. »
66001009	Miin Yahaaya banndiraawo mooɗon goonɗinɗo Iisa. Mi hawti he mooɗon nder torra, nder laamu makko e nder tittinkinaaku ngu o ƴami en. Mi yaaraama semmbe semmbe dow duune Patamos ngam mi waajake haala Alla, mi haali ko ceediimi dow Iisa.
66001010	Alal, nyalaane Joomiraawo, keewumi Ruuhu Alla, sey nanumi gaɗa am daane toowne gom hano daane luwal.
66001011	Daane ndeen no wi'a : —Winndu ko ngi'ataa ɗum nder dewtere, lilda nde kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe jeɗɗi ɗee : Hawriine wonnde Efeesu, Simirna, Pergamu, Tiyatira, Sardes, Filadelfiya he Lawdikiya.
66001012	Njeeƴitiimi ngam hi'ude gonɗo no haalda he am, sey ngi'umi fitillaaji kaŋŋe jeɗɗi.
66001013	Caka fitillaaji ɗiin no tawa goɗɗum nannduɗo he Ɓii-Neɗɗo, omo ɓornii jabbaare, omo haɓɓi wakkaare kaŋŋe dow gabaare makko.
66001014	Gaasa hoore makko no rawni tar hano haabu. Gite makko no njayna hano ɗemle hiite.
66001015	Koyɗe makko no njalɓita hano no njamndi mboɗeeri jalɓitirta, wojja coy nde ndi wattaama nder hiite. Daane makko no wa'i iido ilol diyeele ɗuɗɗe.
66001016	Omo jogii nder nyaamo makko koode jeɗɗi. Takubaahi mbelki, ki kunndule ɗiɗi no wurtoo nder hunnduko makko. Yeeso makko no yayna hano no naange yaynirta caka nyalooma.
66001017	Wakkati ngi'umoomi, sey caamumi yeeso makko hano maayɗo. O yowi junngo makko nyaamo dow am, o wi'i kam : —Taa hulu ! Miin woni artuɗo, miin woni cakitittooɗo.
66001018	Mi duumiiɗo. Mi maayiino, amma joonin miɗo wuuri faa abada abadin. Miɗo woodi baawɗe dow maayde he laahara.
66001019	Ndenne, winndu ko ngi'uɗaa, he ko woni no waɗa joonin he ko waɗoyta yeeso.
66001020	Ndaa, maana koode jeɗɗi cuuɗiiɗum ɗe ngi'uɗaa nder nyaamo am nii : Koode jeɗɗi ɗeen ngoni maleykaaɓe kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe jeɗɗi. Maana fitillaaji kaŋŋe jeɗɗi ɗiin duu woni kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe jeɗɗi.
66002001	—Winndan maleykaajo hawriine Efeesu, mbi'aa : Lildal nii ƴuwngal to jogiiɗo nder junngo mum nyaamo koode jeɗɗi, jehoowo hakkune fitillaaji kaŋŋe jeɗɗi :
66002002	Miɗo anndi golleeji maa lobbi, jaggu e tittinkinaaku maa. Miɗo anndi ko a waawaa munyude bonɓe. A fonni wi'ooɓe kam'en no lilaaɓe, a tawi ko ɓe fenooɓe.
66002003	Miɗo anndi ko a munyi, ngam barke innde am. A yari bone, a soƴƴoraaki gaɗa.
66002004	Amma ndaraa, ngi'aa gacce ɗe peliranmaami : A woppi hidde maa nde ngoodannoɗaa kam illa arannde.
66002005	Miccitaa no ngorrunoɗaa. A fuɗɗirii no wooɗiri, dey yeeƴitiɗaa caamuɗaa. Tuubaa, mbattitaa golleeji maa, ngollaa no ngollirannoɗaa ! Nde nii a tuubaay, mi waran to maa, mi itta fitilla maa nder nokku mum.
66002006	Amma no woodi goɗɗum ko ngaɗunoɗaa no wooɗiri. Kanƴum woni a wanyi golleeji sewre Nikola'en hano no mbanyirmi ɗi.
66002007	Jom nowru fuu horkita nowru mum nana ko Ruuhu Alla wi'ata kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa ! Jaaliiɗo fuu mi hokkan ɗum nyaama ɓiɓɓe lekki kokkoohi mbuurnam ngonki nder koogol Alla.
66002008	—Winndan maleykaajo hawriine goonɗinɓe Simirna, mbi'aa : Lildal nii ƴuwngal to laatiiɗo kam woni arano, kam woni cakitiiɗo, maaynooɗo ummitii.
66002009	Miɗo anndi torra ka njarɗaa, miɗo anndi talkaaku ngu ngonduɗaa he mum, amma aɗa woodi riiku. Miɗo anndi mbonka ka hooƴooɓe ko'e mum'en no Yahudankooɓe mbi'ata dow maa. Amma himɓe ɓee, ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe, ɓe hawriine rewooɓe Ibiliisa.
66002010	Taa hulu torra ka njaroytaa yahde yeeso. Ibiliisa waɗan heewɓe nder mooɗon uddee ngam sii'aade on. On torretee balɗe sappo ka-kap. Amma durwa, to a woppu goonɗinol maa baa nii himɓe maa fuu no mbaretee non ngam mi hokkete lefol mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
66002011	Jom nowru fuu horkita nowru mum nana ko Ruuhu Alla wi'ata kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa ! Jaaliiɗo fuu, maayde ɗiɗaɓere meemataa ɗum.
66002012	—Winndan maleykaajo hawriine goonɗinɓe Pergamu, mbi'aa mo : Lildal nii ƴuwngal to jom takubaahi ki kunndule ɗiɗi belnaaɗe.
66002013	Miɗo anndi aɗa jooɗii to Ibiliisa laami, amma ɗum fuu haɗaay a tokkii kam. A yankiraay kam baa nde worre. A tittinkinake nder goonɗinde kam to Seyɗan sinngi laamu mum faa yottii he wakkati mo Antipas seedeejo am kolniiɗo waraa nder wuro mooɗon.
66002014	Amma ndaa, gacce seɗɗaaje gom nii ɗe peliranmaami : Aɗa woodi tokkuɓe jannde Balaama, ekkintinɗo Balak fergina ɓiɓɓe Isra'el, nyaama tewuuji cakkanaaɗi tooruuje, omo waɗa ɓe njeena.
66002015	Non duu aɗa wondi he tokkuɓe ekkintinooje sewre Nikola'en.
66002016	Ndenne, tuubu joonin ! Se hanaa non duu, mi waran ko ɓooyataa, mi habdira ɓe takubaahi ngonki no wurtoo nder hunnduko am.
66002017	Jom nowru fuu horkita nowru mum nana ko Ruuhu Alla wi'ata kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa ! Jaaliiɗo fuu, mi hokkan ɗum nyaama nyaamdu cuuɗiinu, nyaamdu wi'eteenu « manna ». Mi hokkan joomum duu kaaƴel danel tar, ngel dow mum winndaa innde heyre, nde neɗɗo fuu anndaa sey jaɓoowo ngel.
66002018	—Winndan maleykaajo hawriine goonɗinɓe Tiyatira, mbi'aa mo : Lildal nii ƴuwngal to Ɓii-Alla, jom gite jalɓooje hano ɗemngal hiite, mo koyɗe mum no ƴelkita hano njamndi mboɗeeri ciiwaani.
66002019	Miɗo anndi golleeji maa lobbi. Miɗo anndi hidde maa, miɗo anndi goonɗinol maa. Miɗo anndi ballal ngal ngaɗanɗaa woɓɓe. Miɗo anndi tittinkinaaku maa. Jooni golleeji maa cakitiiɗi no ɓuri araneeji ɗiin ɗuudde.
66002020	Amma gacce ɗe peliranmaami nii. A acci Yesabel, debbo bi'oowo kam no annabiijo, nder jannginooje mum no majjina gollooɓe am, ɓe tinnoo nder jeenu he nyaamɗe tewuuji cakkanaaɗi tooruuje.
66002021	Mi hokki mo wakkati ngam o tuuba, amma walaa ko nanngi ɓerne makko nde hanaa jeenu.
66002022	Mi waɗan o nyawa nyaw manngu, o fukkoo. Mi waɗa fijidooɓe he makko njara torra faa noy walaa. Mi waɗan ɗum joonin joonin nde ɓe tottitaaki golleeji debbo bonɗo oo.
66002023	Mi waran tokkuɓe jannde makko. Kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe fuu no anndan ko miin woni annduɗo miilooji ɓerɗe ɓiɓɓe aadama. Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu mi yoɓan ɗum dey-dey gollal mum.
66002024	Amma onon goonɗinɓe hoddiiɓe nder Tiyatira, onon ɓe tokkaay mo, onon ɓe tefaay faamude maana ko tokkuɓe mo mbi'ata sirriiji Ibiliisa lugguɗi. Sikka fuu walaa mi yowataa donngal gom fuu dow mooɗon.
66002025	Ndenne, tiiɗee he goonɗinol mooɗon faa nyannde ngartoymi.
66002026	Jaaliiɗo fuu, tinniiɗo no waɗa ko weli kam sey nyannde timmi, mi waɗan joomum laamoo dow leyɗe fuu.
66002027	O laamorto lenyi ɗiin he sawru njamndi. O mornya ɗi hano no looɗe loopal mornyirtee, cankitoo. Mi waɗan joomum laamoo dow lenyi duuniyaaru,
66002028	hano no keɓirmi baawɗe he Baabiraawo. Mi hokkan joomum duu hoodere fajiri.
66002029	Jom nowru fuu horkita nowru mum nana ko Ruuhu Alla wi'ata kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa !
66003001	—Winndan maleykaajo hawriine goonɗinɓe wonnde Sardes, mbi'aa : Lildal nii ƴuwngal to jogiiɗo koode jeɗɗi, jogiiɗo ruuhuuji Alla jeɗɗi : Miɗo anndi golleeji maa. Aɗa hi'ee hano a buurɗo, amma a maayɗo.
66003002	Umma, dara, connyinaa seɗɗa ko njogiɗaa nder jikku terɗe to ɗe maayu gaba go'o. Ngam mi tawi golleeji maa ɗiggaay yeeso Alla.
66003003	Miccita Habaru lobbo mo njannginaɗaa he mo nanuɗaa. Tuubu, ngolliraa mo. Nde nii a ummaaki ndariɗaa, mi waran a siryaaki. Mi waran, no gujjo warirta. A anndititaa wakkati mo ngaranmi.
66003004	Nder Sardes, aɗa woodi himɓe seɗɗaaɓe, ɓe tawaaka nder gaɗol bone fuu. Himɓe seɗɗaaɓe ɓee, no njahdan he am, iɓe ɓornii kolte daneeje ngam ɓe poti yahdude he am.
66003005	Jaaliiɗo no ɓornetee kolte daneeje. Mi moytataa innde joomum nder dewtere mbuurnam faa abada abadin. Wakkati ndartoomi yeeso Baaba am he maleykaaɓe mum mi wi'an neɗɗo oo, miin jeyii mo.
66003006	Jom nowru fuu horkita nowru mum nana ko Ruuhu Alla wi'ata kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa !
66003007	—Winndan maleykaajo hawriine goonɗinɓe Filadelfiya, mbi'aa mo : Lildal nii ƴuwngal to Ceniiɗo, Goongaajo, jogiiɗo omtirngel dammbugal laamu Daawda. Nde o omtii ngal walaa ommboowo ngal. Nde o ommbii ngal duu walaa omtoowo ngal.
66003008	Miɗo anndi golleeji maa. Ndaa mi accanii ma dammbugal no omtii, walaa baawɗo ommbii ngal. Miɗo anndi a walaa semmbe sanne, amma ɗum fuu haɗaay aɗa feŋi he haala am. A yankiraay kam.
66003009	Hawriine rewooɓe Ibiliisa no wi'a ko kam'en no Yahudankooɓe, amma ɓe penan, ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe. Mi tilsinan ɓe, ɓe ngara ɓe kofo faa yeeso maa, nden ɓe paaman ko miɗo hiɗi ma.
66003010	Ngam a tittinkinake, a jogake haala am faa noy walaa. Miin duu mi reenete nder wakkati cattuɗo, wakkati garoowo dow kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu, ngam etude goonɗinol himɓe mayru.
66003011	Garol am ɓadake. Tiiɗu faa noy walaa he ko njogiɗaa. To neɗɗo fuu teetu lefol jaalorgal maa.
66003012	Jaaliiɗo fuu, kam ngaɗanmi bonjariyal Juulirde Alla am mawne wonnde dow. Joomum wurtataako nder mayre kaden faa abada abadin. Mi winndan dow joomum innde Alla am, he innde huɓeere Alla inndirteene « Ursaliima keso », huɓeere ƴuwne dow to Alla am jippii. Dow joomum duu mbinndanmi innde am heyre nde keɓumi.
66003013	Jom nowru fuu horkita nowru mum nana ko Ruuhu Alla wi'ata kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa !
66003014	—Winndan maleykaajo hawriine goonɗinɓe Lawdikiya, mbi'aa mo : Lildal nii ƴuwngal to Kumnoowo amaana, Seedeejo kolniiɗo, Kaaloowo goonga, bi'eteeɗo duu Wuddu huune fuu ko Alla tagi.
66003015	Miɗo anndi golleeji maa, a feewaa a wulaa. Ndeen no haani ngaɗaa gootel : Peewaa naa mbulaa !
66003016	Amma ko nii caka dey-dey taweɗaa, a wulaa a feewaa, mi tuute.
66003017	Aɗa wi'a aan kay a diikuɗo a hawri njawdi, a haajaaka baafuy. Amma a anndaa ko a miskiini, ko a jurminiiɗo, a talka, a bumɗo, gonɗo terru. Amma ɗum fuu a anndanaa ɗum.
66003018	Ngam majjum hettina tinndinooje am, cooda to am kaŋŋe laaɓiniraaɗe hiite heɓa laatoɗaa diikuɗo. Coodaa kolte daneeje, ɓornoɗaa, cudda ɓanndu maa wonndu terru, kisa semteene. Cooda safaare gite, cawraa gite maa ngam ngi'aa yeeso maa.
66003019	Neɗɗo fuu mo ngiɗumi, mi fooɗan nowru mum mi elta ɗum. Ndenne, tarsinaa, tuubaa !
66003020	Hettina, miɗo darii dammbugal, miɗo salmina. Neɗɗo fuu nanɗo daane am omti, mi weerana ɗum. Mi nyaamda he mum, kam duu nyaamda he am.
66003021	Non no keɓirmi jaalorgal njooɗiimi hadde Baaba am, jaaliiɗo fuu joddoto he am dow jooɗorgal laamu hadde Baaba am nder laamu mum.
66003022	Jom nowru fuu horkita nowru mum nana ko Ruuhu Alla wi'ata kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa !
66004001	Gaɗa ko mbinndumi ɗereeji yahde he kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Iisa, sey ngi'umi nder kammu dammbugal gom no omtii, nanumi daane wonnde no haalda he am, hano luwal woni no fuufee nii, daane ndeen no wi'a kam : —Ƴeenyu, war ɗo, faa mi holle ko waɗoyta yahde yeeso.
66004002	Wakkati mum da keewumi Ruuhu Alla, sey ngi'umi jooɗorgal laamu dow kammu, neɗɗo gom no jooɗii dow maggal.
66004003	Omo ƴelkita hano kaaƴe peɗe bi'eteeɗe yaspa naa sardis. Ciiɓo-ciiɓowal no fiilii jooɗorgal makko. Ingal ƴelkita hano hayre wi'eteene emerooda.
66004004	Jooɗorɗe laamu laso e nay no piili jooɗorgal makko. Dottiiɓe mawɓe laso e nayo no njooɗii dow majje, iɓe ɓornii kolte daneeje, iɓe ngatti kufuneeje kaŋŋe.
66004005	Maƴƴe, olko daaɗe mawɗe, he diggaali no ƴuwa nder jooɗorgal ngaal. Yeeso maggal no tawa fitillaaji jeɗɗi gonɗi no njalɓa. Fitillaaji ɗiin ngoni ruuhuuji Alla jeɗɗi.
66004006	Huune gom nannduɗum maayo, no rawni tar hano danndorgal, no weɗɗiti yeeso maggal. Kujje buurɗe nay gom, ɗe gite re'ataa no tawa yeeso e gaɗa mum'en fuu, ngatti jooɗorgal ngaal caka.
66004007	Nder kujje nay ɗeen, arandeere ndeen no nanndi muusuuru ladde. Ɗiɗaɓere ndeen no nanndi ga'el. Tataɓere ndeen yeeso mum no nanndi he yeeso ɓii-aadama. Nayaɓere ndeen no nanndi he ciilal gonngal no fiira.
66004008	Kujje nay ɗee, gootel majje fuu no tawra bippoole jeegom. Ɓalli e bippoole majje fuu no keewi gite dow e ley. Jemma e nyalooma iɗe he ko townude daaɗe, iɗe mbi'a : — Ceniiɗo, Ceniiɗo, Ceniiɗo, Joomiraawo, Alla Jom Baawɗe, gonnooɗo keeŋa, gonɗo hannden, gonoowo jaaŋo.
66004009	Kujje nay ɗee no teddina, no mana, no njetta Duumiiɗo, jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu oon.
66004010	Wakkati fuu mo kujje nay ɗee kaalata, dottiiɓe laso e nayo ɓeen no kofo, no cujida yeeso gonɗo dow jooɗorgal oon. Iɓe cujidana Duumiiɗo faa abada abadin. Iɓe itta kufuneeje maɓɓe iɓe ndesa yeeso jooɗorgal makko, iɓe mbi'a :
66004011	—Alla Joomiraawo amin, a foti keɓa teddungal, manngu he baawɗe, ngam a tagi huune fuu. Muuyɗe maaɗa ngaɗi, ɗe mbanngi. Muuyɗe maaɗa ngaɗi, ɗum fuu ɗum tagaa.
66005001	Nder nyaamo gonɗo no jooɗii dow jooɗorgal laamu oon, mi hi'i dewtere taggaane gom. Dewtere ndee, gaɗa e yeeso mayre fuu no winndaa. Inde haatimira kaatimiije jeɗɗi.
66005002	Mi hi'i maleykaajo jamo gom, mo nder daane toowne no goyna no wi'a : —Moy foti feŋita kaatimiije ɗee, taggita dewtere ndee ?
66005003	Walaa dow kammu dow duuniyaaru naa hakkune maayɓe baawɗo taggita dewtere ndee naa njannga nder mayre.
66005004	Mboyumi bojji naawɗi, ngam neɗɗo fuu heɓaaka potuɗo taggiti dewtere ndeen naa daarude ko woni nder mayre.
66005005	Nden nder dottiiɓe ɓeen, dottiijo gom wi'i kam : —Taa wullu ! Ndaa jippotooɗo he Daawda nii, muusuuru ladde ƴuwnu he lenyol Yahuuda, muusuuru ladde heɓudu jaalorgal nduun nii. Kayru waawi feŋitidde kaatimiije jeɗɗi ɗeen, ndu taggita dewtere ndeen.
66005006	Sey ngi'umi Njawdiri gom no ndarii hadde jooɗorgal laamu ngaal. Kujje nay buurɗe ɗeen e dottiiɓe mawɓe laso e nayo ɓeen no piilini. Indi darii hano ko hirsanoo. Indi woodi gite jeɗɗi he luwe jeɗɗi. Gite jeɗɗi ɗee ngoni ruuhuuji Alla jeɗɗi, lileteeɗi nder duuniyaaru fuu.
66005007	Njawdiri ndiin yehi, jaɓi dewtere taggaane ndeen nder nyaamo gonɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu oon.
66005008	Wakkati ndi jaɓi dewtere ndeen, kujje nay buurɗe ɗeen he dottiiɓe laso e nayo ɓeen fuu kofi yeeso mayri. Neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu no jogii hoddu he urorde kaŋŋe heewne uurdi welni. Du'aa'uuji seniiɓe, himɓe Alla non nii ya.
66005009	Iɓe njima jimol kesol, iɓe mbi'a : « Aan foti njaɓaa dewtere ndee, feŋitaa kaatimiije mayre, ngam a waranooma. Nder barke ƴiiƴam maaɗa, a wartiri potal hakkune Alla e himɓe mum, himɓe cuuɗi baaba feere-fereeji, haalooɓe ɗemle feere-fereeje, tawaaɓe nder lenyi feere-fereeji e leyɗe feere-fereeje.
66005010	Nder barke ƴiiƴam maa a waɗii ɓe himɓe Laamu Alla, ngaɗɗaa ɓe cakkanooɓe Alla ngam ɓe ngollana Alla, ɓe laamoo dow duuniyaaru fuu. »
66005011	Ko ƴeewmi, sey nanumi daaɗe maleykaaɓe ujunaaji ujunaaji, wonɓe no piili jooɗorgal laamu ngaal, kujje buurɗe ɗeen, he dottiiɓe laso e nayo ɓeen.
66005012	Iɓe njima nder daaɗe toowɗe, iɓe mbi'a : « Njawdiri mbaraani ndiin, ndi foti baawɗe, njawdi, hikmaaku, semmbe, teddungal, darja, kam e yettoore ! »
66005013	Nanumi kaden, tagaadi fuu tagaani, tawaani dow e ley, tawaani nder maayo, wonndi ley beɗi leydi no yima no wi'a : « Yettoore, teddungal, darja e baawɗe laatanoo gonɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu oon. Ɗum laatanoo duu Njawdiri ndiin, faa abada abadin ! »
66005014	Kujje buurɗe ɗeen duu no njaaboo no mbi'a : —Aamiin ! Dottiiɓe ɓeen duu no kofo, no cujidana Joomiraawo.
66006001	Wakkati ngonnoomi miɗo daara ndeen, sey ngi'umi Njawdiri ndiin feŋiti haatimiire arandeere ndeen, nder kaatimiije jeɗɗi ɗeen. Wakkati haatimiire ndeen feŋitaa, sey nanumi hakkune kujje nay buurɗe ɗeen, wonnde no wi'a nder daane nanndune riggaaŋo : —War !
66006002	Miɗo daara nii, sey ngi'umi puccu ndaneewu gom, baɗɗiiɗo ngu no jogii birowal, o hokkaa lefol laamu. Nden o wurtii hano keɓuɗo jaalorgal. O wurtake duu ngam heɓoyde jaalorgal kaden.
66006003	Wakkati Njawdiri ndiin feŋitinno haatimiire ɗiɗaɓere ndeen, sey nanumi nder kujje nay buurɗe ɗeen, daane ɗiɗaɓere gom wi'i kaden : —War !
66006004	Nden puccu mboɗeewu coy gom wanngi. Baɗɗiiɗo ngu oon, kam duu hokkaa takubaahi mawki. O hokkaa duu baawɗe ittude jam nder duuniyaaru, ngam himɓe mbarodira.
66006005	Wakkati Njawdiri ndiin feŋitinno haatimiire tataɓere ndeen, sey nanumi nder kujje buurɗe ɗeen, daane tataɓere gom no wi'a : —War ! Nden ngi'umi puccu ɓaleewu gom wanngi, baɗɗiiɗo ngu oon no jogii etirgal.
66006006	Nden nanumi hakkune kujje buurɗe nay ɗeen, daane gom no wi'a : Eterde alkama worre, njobdi ceede gollal nyalooma muɓɓo. Eterɗe gawri tati duu, njobdi gollal nyalooma muɓɓo. Amma to meemu nebbam naa cabiijam.
66006007	Wakkati Njawdiri ndiin feŋitinno haatimiire nayaɓere ndeen, sey nanumi nder kujje buurɗe ɗeen, daane nayaɓere gom no wi'a : —War !
66006008	Sey ngi'umi puccu puru gom, baɗɗiiɗo ngu oon woni maayde, laahara no tokkitii gaɗa. Duuniyaaru feccaa pecce nay. Ɓe kokkaa baawɗe dow fecco wooto, ɓe mbarira himɓe feccere ndeen takubaahi, rafo, balaa'u he kujje ladde.
66006009	Wakkati Njawdiri ndiin feŋitinno haatimiire joyaɓere ndeen, sey ngi'umi ley hirsirde waranooɓe ngam ɗowtanake haala Alla he ngam ɓe mbaajake ka.
66006010	Nder daaɗe toowɗe, iɓe mbi'a : —Yaa Joomiraawo ! Ceniiɗo, Goongaajo, a hiitoto himɓe duuniyaaru, njoptonoɗaa min, ngam ɓe ndufi ƴiiƴam amin. Amma nde ɗum fuu, ɗum waɗoyta ?
66006011	Nden neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu hokkaa jabbaare raneere, ɓe mbi'aa ɓe keɗo wakkati seɗɗa faa nyannde banndiraaɓe maɓɓe hoddiiɓe, he gollidiɓɓe he mum'en nder gollal Alla mbaree ginan hano no ɓe mbariraa.
66006012	Wakkati Njawdiri ndiin feŋitinno haatimiire jeegaɓere ndeen, sey nanumi leydi dimmbi, dimmbande mawne. Naange niɓɓi hano suddamaare ɓaleere, lewru duu wojji coy hano ƴiiƴam.
66006013	Koode caami hano no ɓiɓɓe ibbi kecce caamirta nde henndu mawnu wifi.
66006014	Kammu duu taggaa hano no daago taggirtee, majji. Baamle e duuɗe fuu ɗoofaa nder nokkuuje mum'en.
66006015	Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru, mawɓe haalooɓe nanee, hooreeɓe soogeeji, riikuɓe, wooduɓe baawɗe, jom'en semmbe gawri, rimɓe he maccuɓe fuu cuuɗowi nder lowi, ley baamle he hakkune tepaaje.
66006016	Iɓe mbi'a baamle he tepaaje ɗeen : —Caamee dow amin. Cuuɗon min heɓa min mboɗɗoo yeeso gonɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu oon. Cuuɗon min, min mboɗɗoo tikkere Njawdiri ndiin.
66006017	Moy waawi daɗude ? Ngam nyalaane tikkere maɓɓe mawne ndeen yottake.
66007001	Gaɗa feŋitol haatimiire jeegaɓere ndeen, sey ngi'umi dow keeri duuniyaaru nay ɗiin fuu, maleykaaɓe nayo no ndarii dow majji. Iɓe paddi keni nay bifooji dow duuniyaaru ɗiin wifude dow leydi, dow diyeele he dow leɗɗe fuu.
66007002	Ngi'umi kaden maleykaajo gom wurtii har lettugal no jogii haatimiire Alla Duumiiɗo. O ƴewni maleykaaɓe nayo kokkaaɓe baawɗe halkude leydi e diyeele.
66007003	O wi'i ɓe : —To kalkee leydi, to kalkee ndiyam naa lekki fuu ginan. Ndoomee faa min ngaɗana maccuɓe Alla seede dow tiiɗe maɓɓe.
66007004	Nden nanumi wi'a ujunaaji hemre e lasooji ɗiɗi e nayo (144,000) woni dimma waɗanaaɓe seede oon dow tiiɗe mum'en ɓeen. Ɓe fuu duu ɓe ƴuwaanaa he lenyi Isra'el sappo e ɗiɗi ɗiin.
66007005	Lenyol Yahuuda, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000), lenyol Ruuben, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000), lenyol Gada, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000),
66007006	lenyol Asiira, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000), lenyol Naftali, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000), lenyol Manasa, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000),
66007007	lenyol Simeyon, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000), lenyol Lewi, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000), lenyol Isakar, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000),
66007008	lenyol Jabulon, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000), lenyol Yusufu, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000), lenyol Benyamin, ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗo (12,000).
66007009	Gaɗa limtol inɗe ɗee, miɗo ƴeewa, sey ngi'umi jama'aare mawne gom, nde limtataako. Nder mayre no tawa himɓe leyɗe fuu, himɓe lenyi fuu haalooɓe ɗemle fuu no tawa nder mayre. Jama'aare ndeen no ndarii yeeso jooɗorgal laamu ngaal he Njawdiri ndiin. Iɓe ɓornii jabbaaje daneeje. Licce dabinaaje no nder juuɗe maɓɓe.
66007010	Iɓe kuuɓa daaɗe toowɗe, iɓe mbi'a : —Kisinam ƴuwataana to Alla meeɗen, Alla gonɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu, he Njawdiri ndiin.
66007011	Maleykaaɓe ɓeen fuu piili jooɗorgal ngal, dottiiɓe ɓeen he kujje nay buurɗe ɗeen. Ɓe fuu, ɓe turii, yeesooji maɓɓe faa he leydi, yeeso jooɗorgal laamu ngaal. Ɓe cujidanii Alla,
66007012	iɓe mbi'a : —Aamiin ! Teddungal, darja, ndimaaku, hikmaaku, baawɗe, semmbe e yettoore, laatanoo Alla meeɗen, faa abada abadin ! Aamiin !
66007013	Nden gooto nder dottiiɓe ɓeen ƴami kam, wi'i : —Moy'en ngoni himɓe, ɓorniiɓe jabbaaje daneeje ɓee ? Toy ɓe ƴuwi ?
66007014	Sey njaabimi, mo mbi'umi : —Dottiijo, aan woni annduɗo. Nden o wi'i kam : —Ɓe ngoni yarɓe torra nawka. Ɓe cocci jabbaaje maɓɓe nder ƴiiƴam Njawdiri ndiin. Ƴiiƴam ɗam rawnini jabbaaje maɓɓe.
66007015	Ngam majjum waɗi iɓe yeeso jooɗorgal Laamu Alla. Jemma e nyalooma iɓe nder Juulirde mawne ngam rewude Alla. Gonɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu oon reenata ɓe.
66007016	Ɓe ɗomɗataake, ɓe ndafataake kaden, naange e wulowulo tappataa ɓe kaden.
66007017	Ngam Njawdiri wonndi dow jooɗorgal laamu mum durata ɓe, ndi oora ɓe faa dow to ndiyam, kokkoojam mbuurnam ɓulata. Alla moytata gonɗi maɓɓe fuu.
66008001	Wakkati Njawdiri ndiin feŋitinno haatimiire jeɗɗaɓere ndeen, sey ɗum waɗi siw. Feccere yamnde, ko olko gom fuu nanaaka nder kammu.
66008002	Gaɗa majjum sey ngi'umi maleykaaɓe jeɗɗo gom no ndarii yeeso Alla, ɓe kokkaa luwe jeɗɗi.
66008003	Nden maleykaajo gom wari darii hadde sakkirde ndeen. Omo jogii urorngel gaɗiraangel kaŋŋe. O hokkaa uurdi ɗuundi gom o sakkida he du'aa'uuji seniiɓe, himɓe Alla, dow sakkirde waɗiraane kaŋŋe wonnde yeeso jooɗorgal laamu ndeen.
66008004	Nder junngo maleykaajo oon, cuurki uurdi ndiin ummodi he du'aa'uuji seniiɓe, himɓe Alla ɓeen, fa'i yeeso Alla.
66008005	Maleykaajo oon hooƴi urorngel ngeel, o itti hiite dow sakkirde ndeen o hebbini ngel. Nden o faɗɗi ngel nder duuniyaaru. Sey pelmaali he olko nanaa, maƴƴe ngaɗi, leydi dimmbii.
66008006	Gaɗa maƴƴe he dimmbaaki leydi gaɗuki ɗum, maleykaaɓe jeɗɗo jogiiɓe luwe jeɗɗi ciryii puufa luwe mum'en.
66008007	Maleykaajo arano oon fuufi luwal mum, sey malmalluuje, hiite e ƴiiƴam hawrodira faɗɗaa dow leydi. Hiite nyaami feccere worre dow pecce tati duuniyaaru e leɗɗe nde nii ɗum fuu ɗum senndaama. Nge nyaami huɗo hecco fuu tawaako dow leydi.
66008008	Maleykaajo ɗiɗaɓo oon fuufi luwal mum, sey huune mawne gom wa'une waamnde jalɓoore faɗɗaa nder maayo. Sey feccere worre dow pecce tati nde nii maayo feccanooma laatii ƴiiƴam.
66008009	Feccere worre dow pecce tati ko wuuri nder maayo ngoon mbaati. Laanaaji ndiyam ɗiin duu, feccere worre dow pecce tati dimma majji cankiti.
66008010	Maleykaajo tataɓo oon fuufi luwal mum, sey hoodere mawne gom ƴuwi dow kammu, saami dow feccere worre dow pecce tati nde nii diyeele e to njogoto ndiyam fuu cenndaama. Hoodere ndeen no jaawa faa noy walaa.
66008011	Innde hoodere ndeen woni : « Tooke kaaɗɗe ». Wakkati nde saamunoo nder diyeele ɗeen, sey feccere ndeen haaɗi rok. Kaaɗirka mayre, waɗi ko heewɓe nder yarɓe he diyeele ɗeen maayi.
66008012	Maleykaajo nayaɓo oon fuufi luwal mum. Sey feccere naange worre dow pecce mum tati, feccere lewru worre dow pecce mum tati, he feccere worre dimma koode dow pecce mum tati piyaa. Pecce piyaaɗe ɗeen fuu niɓɓi. Jemma e nyalooma pecce ɗeen fuu keppi yeynude.
66008013	Wakkati mum da ƴeewumi, ngi'umi ciilal gom no fiira dow faa to woɗɗi. Sey nanumi nder daane toowne, ingal wi'a : —Kaari ! Kaari ! Kaari ! Bone woodanii himɓe duuniyaaru, nde nii maleykaaɓe tato ɓeeto puufi luwe mum'en.
66009001	Wakkati maleykaajo joyaɓo oon fuufi luwal mum, sey ngi'umi hoodere ƴuwi dow saami ley. Hoodere ndeen hokkaa omtirngel ngaykaa nga walaa fuu keerol.
66009002	Wakkati hoodere ndeen omti ngaykaa ngaan, sey cuurki ƴuwi nder magga ƴeenyi dow. Ki nanndaana he cuurki duɗal manngal. Ki suuɗi naange, nokku fuu niɓɓi tik.
66009003	Sey ɓaɓɓatti no mburtoo nder makki, no cankito dow leydi nokku fuu. Ɗi kokkaa tooke kaaɗɗe iri tooke jahe.
66009004	Ɗi kokkaaka laawol torrude ko fuɗata fuu dow leydi hano ir huɗo'en naa leɗɗe. Amma himɓe, ɓe alaama Alla oon tawaaka dow tiiɗe mum'en, kamɓe tan mbi'aa ɗi torra.
66009005	Ɗi ngalaa laawol warude ɓe amma iɗi mbaawi torrude ɓe faa noy walaa, faa ɗum waɗa lebbi joy. Naawɗum, torran ɓe ɗam, nanndaana he fettande yaare.
66009006	Nder lebbi joy ɗii, himɓe tefan maayde nannga ɓe amma nde nanngataa ɓe. Ɓe coofan maayde, amma nde woɗɗoto ɓe.
66009007	Ɓaɓɓatti ɗii no nanndi he pucci ciryaaɗi ngam konu. Kufuneeje kaŋŋe ngoni dow ko'e majji. Geese majji no nanndi geese ɓiɓɓe aadama.
66009008	Gaaci majji no nanndi gaasa debbo. Nyiiƴe majji no nanndi nyiiƴe muusuuru ladde.
66009009	Gabaaje majji no ɓorna goɗɗum nannduɗum toggel njamndi. Sonnyo bippoole majji no nanndi sonnyo pucci kaɓɓanaaɗi torko konu.
66009010	Laacol ngootu majji fuu no nanndi he laacol yaare. Laaci ɗii, ɗi torrirta himɓe faa lebbi joy.
66009011	Maleykaajo kawjiiɗo ngaykaa ngaan woni laamiiɗo majji. Omo inndiree Abadon nder ibrankoore naa Apolliyon nder gerekankoore.
66009012	Balaa'u arano oon wittake, jooni ɗiɗi gom no gaɗa warde.
66009013	Maleykaajo jeegaɓo oon fuufi luwal mum, sey nanumi daane gom no ƴuwa nder seraaji nay sakkirde waɗiraade kaŋŋe wonnde yeeso Alla.
66009014	Daane ndeen wi'i maleykaajo jeegaɓo oon haɓɓita maleykaaɓe nayo, haɓɓaaɓe hadde maayo wi'eteeŋo Efratis ɓeen.
66009015	Maleykaaɓe ɓeen kaɓɓitaa. Kamɓe ngoni siryaaɓe mbarowa feccere worre nder pecce tati nde nii himɓe duuniyaaru peccaama pecce tati. Barol maɓɓe ngool waɗoytaana nder hitaane, lewru, nyalaane, e wakkati mo darna ngam majjum.
66009016	Mi nani wi'a ko honooɓe baɗɗiiɓe pucci ɓeen no ngaɗa miliyooji keme ɗiɗi.
66009017	Ndaarumi sey ngi'umi waɗɗiiɓe pucci ɗiin no ɓornii toggohoy ngaɗiraakoy njamndi mboɗeeri coy hano hiite, ikoy oolɗi hano sinaadar, ikoy bulɗi hano kammu. Ko'e pucci ɗiin no nga'i hano ko'e muusuuji ladde. Hiite, cuurki he sinaadar no mburtoo nder kunndule majji.
66009018	Hiite ngeen, cuurki kiin he sinaadar oon ngoni bala'uuji tati bonɗi, barooji feccere worre dow pecce tati nde nii himɓe peccaama pecce tati.
66009019	Baawɗe pucci ɗiin ngalaana nder kunndule he laaci majji. Laacol ngootu majji fuu no woodi hoore nanndude hoore mboddi. Laaci ɗii, pucci ɗiin nawtorto ngam waɗande himɓe bone.
66009020	Heɓuɓe kisi bala'uuji ɗii tuubaay mbattiti mbuurnam mum'en nder ko mbownoo waɗude. Ɓe mboppaay rewude ginnaaji, tooruuje gaɗiraaɗe kaŋŋe naa cardi naa njamndi mboɗeeri naa kaaƴe naa leɗɗe. Tooruuje ɗe mbaawaa hi'i naa nani naa dillude.
66009021	Heɓuɓe hisi ɓee tinni he waɗude ittol yonki, jiimangaaku, nguyka, jeenu e ko nanndi he mum.
66010001	Gaɗa balaa'u oo sey ngi'umi maleykaajo jom semmbe gom ƴuwi dow jippii. Omo suddi nder luuldere gom. Ciiɓo-ciiɓowal no fiilii dow hoore makko. Yeeso makko no wa'i hano naange, koyɗe makko duu no nga'i curŋol hiite.
66010002	Dewtel pamarel gom no omtii nder junngo makko. Omo jogii ngel, koyngal makko nyaamowal no dow maayo, nanowal ngal no dow leydi.
66010003	O ƴewni, daane makko no nii hano daane muusuuru ladde. Wakkati mum da, pelmaali jeɗɗi ngaɗi,
66010004	gaɗa majji, ciryiimi winndude ko ɗi mbi'i, sey nanumi daane gom ƴuwi dow, wi'i kam : —To winndu ko ɗi mbi'i, to nowru fuu nanu ko ɗi mbi'i.
66010005	Maleykaajo mo ngi'umi oon ɓanti nyaamo mum dow,
66010006	hunori innde Alla Duumiiɗo faa abada, taguɗo kammu e ko woni nder mum, taguɗo leydi e ko woni nder mum, taguɗo maayo e ko woni nder mum, wi'i : —Wakkati fuu heddaaki joonkay.
66010007	Nder balɗe ɗe maleykaajo jeegaɓo oon fuufata luwal mum, Alla tabbintinan anniya mum cuuɗiiɗo hano no o haalirannoo ɗum annabiiɓe makko laatiiɓe maccuɓe makko.
66010008	Nden daane nde nanumi ndeen, wi'i kaden : —Jaɓoy dewtel ngel nder junngo maleykaajo mo ngi'uɗaa oo.
66010009	Nden njehumi to maleykaajo oon, mbi'umi mo : —Linnyam dewtel ngel. Sey o jaabii kam o wi'i : —Jaɓu, nyaamu ngel. Nder hunnduko maaɗa ingel nii njuumri amma ngel haaɗante nder reedu.
66010010	Njaɓumi dewtel ngel he junngo maleykaajo oon, nyaamumi ngel. Nanumi ingel weli nder hunnduko am hano njuumri nii, amma wakkati moɗunoomi ngel faa ngel naatowi nder reedu am, sey nanumi, ingel haaɗi rok nder mayru.
66010011	Nden daaɗe gom no mbi'a kam : —No tilsi ngaɗanaa himɓe leyɗe feere-fereeje, himɓe haalooɓe ɗemle feere-fereeje, he laamiiɓe heewɓe annabaaku dow anniya Alla oo.
66011001	Kokkaami ƴommbal gom, mbi'aami : —Umma, etu Juulirde Alla mawne he sakkirde mum, limaa himɓe foto ngoni no ndewa Alla nder mayre.
66011002	To etu batamaare yaasin wonnde no filkitii, accir nde non ngam ɓe kanaa Yahudankooɓe accanaa nde. Ɓe ngaɗan lebbi lasooji ɗiɗi e ɗiɗi, iɓe laamii huɓeere seniine ndeen.
66011003	Mi hokkan seedeeɓe am ɗiɗo ɓee, baawɗe gaɗol annabaaku. Ɓe ngaɗan balɗe ujunere e keme ɗiɗi e lasooji tati (1,260), iɓe ɓorno saakuuji, iɓe ngaɗa annabaaku.
66011004	Seedantooɓe Alla ɗiɗo ɓee ngoni jaytuuje ɗiɗi ɗeen e fitillaaji ɗiɗi ɗiin gonɗi no ndarii yeeso Joomiraawo, Jom duuniyaaru.
66011005	Neɗɗo fuu tefi torra ɓe, hiite wurtotoo nder kunndule maɓɓe wara joomum. Neɗɗo fuu tefi torra ɓe, too sikka fuu walaa, maayde woni mbaka joomum.
66011006	Seedeeɓe ɓee no ngoodi baawɗe haɗude ndiyam toɓa nder balɗe ɗe ɓe ngoni iɓe ngaɗa annabaaku. Iɓe ngoodi baawɗe waylitidde diyeele laatoo ƴiiƴam. Wakkati fuu mo ɓe ngiɗi, iɓe mbaawi njippini bala'uuji iri ɗiye hen non fuu dow duuniyaaru.
66011007	Wakkati ɓe timmini seedaaku maɓɓe, ndabba njippotoonga nder ngaykaa nga walaa fuu keerol, waran hona ɓe, jaaloo ɓe, nden wara ɓe.
66011008	Ɓalli maɓɓe no mboppi nder laabi huɓeere mawne ndeen, sowirteene Sodooma naa Misira, huɓeere nde Joomiraawo maɓɓe tontanoo nder mum.
66011009	Ɓalli maɓɓe ngaɗan balɗe tati e feccere, iɗi mboppi. Lenyi feere-fereeji, haalooɓe ɗemle feere-fereeje, himɓe ƴuwan nder leyɗe feere-fereeje ngara tiima ɓalli maɓɓe, ɓe caloo seedeeɓe ɓeen mooɓee.
66011010	Maayde annabiiɓe ɗiɗo ɓee welan duuniyaaru fuu. Nder welwelo majjum, ɓe ngaɗonodiran kokke hakkune maɓɓe, ngam ɓe njari kaata nder juuɗe annabiiɓe ɗiɗo ɓee.
66011011	Amma gaɗa balɗe tati ɗee e feccere, foofaango gom ƴuwi to Alla naati nder ɓalli maɓɓe. Nden wakkati mum da ɓe ummii, ɓe ndarii he ko'e maɓɓe. Kulkulal manngal nanngi wonnooɓe no ndaari ɗon ɓeen.
66011012	Sey daane mawne gom ƴuwi dow huuɓi wi'i seedeeɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen : —Ummee, ƴeencee ɗo ! Nden yeeso wayɓe maɓɓe fuu, ɓe ummii, ɓe ƴeenyi luuldere gom.
66011013	Wakkati mum da, leydi dimmbiri semmbe. Feccere sappoɓere dow pecce sappo nde nii huɓeere ndeen feccaama saami. Nder dimmbol leydi ngool, himɓe ujunaaji jeɗɗo ngoni maayɓe. Kulkulal nanngi hoddiiɓe ɓeen, nden ɓe teddini Alla jeyɗo dow.
66011014	Balaa'u ɗiɗaɓo oon witti, joonin tataɓo oon nii no wara nder ko ɓooyataa.
66011015	Maleykaajo jeɗɗaɓo oon fuufi luwal mum, sey daaɗe gom nanaa nder kammu. Iɗe kuuɓa, iɗe mbi'a : —Laamu duuniyaaru fuu warti nder juuɗe Alla Joomiraawo meeɗen e Almasiihu mum. Laamu makko duuman faa abada abadin !
66011016	Dottiiɓe laso e nayo wonɓe dow jooɗorɗe mum'en yeeso Alla ɓeen turii geese maɓɓe faa he leydi, cujidanii Alla.
66011017	Ɓe tinni iɓe mbi'a : —Yaa Alla Joomiraawo, Jom Baawɗe, gonɗo, gonnooɗo. Min njettii ma ngam a golliri baawɗe maa, a tabbintini laamu maaɗa.
66011018	Ɓe anndanoo ma ɓernanii ma, amma wakkati yottake joonin, wakkati mo nder mum tikkere maaɗa ƴaafata, wakkati mo kiitotoɗaa maayɓe, wakkati duu mo njoɓataa gollooɓe maaɗa, annabiiɓe haalooɓe dow innde maaɗa. Wakkati mo njoɓataa seniiɓe, himɓe maa, mawɗo yahde pamaro maɓɓe. Teddinoowo ma fuu, gooduɗo kulal maaɗa fuu, a yoɓan ɗum. Amma garɗo bonna duuniyaaru fuu, a halkan ɗum.
66011019	Nden Juulirde Alla mawne wonne ton dow omtii, Keesuwal amaana ngaal wanngi nder mayru. Maƴƴe e pelmaali ngaɗi, olkooji nanaa, leydi dimmbii, malmalluuje ɓutte toɓi.
66012001	Alaama mawɗo, kaayɗiniiɗo gom wanngi dow. Alaama oo, debbo non ɓorniiɗo naange, omo deki koyɗe makko dow lewru. Omo melli koode sappo e ɗiɗi.
66012002	Debbo oo no wondi ŋatawere, omo uuma dow e ley ngam naawɗum ŋatawere ndee.
66012003	Nden alaama gom duu wanngi kaden dow. Alaama oo duu, kuuŋa mboɗaa gom non, nannduŋa he mbolla gom, nga ko'e jeɗɗi e luwe sappo. Hoore fuu no mellaa lefol laamu.
66012004	Laacol magga wuuwi feccere worre dow pecce tati, nde nii koode kammu peccaama pecce tati, nga faɗɗi dow leydi. Nga wari, nga darii yeeso debbo oon heɓa no o rimiri, nga nyaama ɓiɗɗo dimaaɗo oon.
66012005	Debbo oon rimi ɓiɗɗo gorko. No suka oon rimiraa, sey o adaa sabat o yaaraa to Alla, o darnaa yeeso jooɗorgal laamu makko. Suka oo woni laatoytooɗo ardiiɗo, o ada sawru njamndi makko o laamoo duuniyaaru.
66012006	Debbo oon duu doggiri nder ladde yeeruure, to Alla siryanii mo ɗuworde to o nyamnetee, o yarnee balɗe ujunere e keme ɗiɗi e lasooji tati (1,260).
66012007	Gaɗa mum sey konu ummii dow kammu. Maleykaajo bi'eteeɗo Mika'el e maleykaaɓe gom koni kuuŋa ngaan, kannga he maleykaaɓe wonduɓe he magga.
66012008	Nga njaalaa kannga he maleykaaɓe wondunooɓe he magga. Ɓe mursi nokkuuje maɓɓe gonɗe dow kammu,
66012009	ɓe mburtinaa, ɓe paɗɗaa dow leydi. Kuuŋa ngaan wonnoo mboddi fil-ajaari, inndirteeni Ibiliisa naa Seyɗan naa nee jammbotooɗo duuniyaaru fuu.
66012010	Gaɗa paɗɗol maɓɓe dow leydi ngool, sey nanumi daane mawne gom ƴuwi dow, wi'i kam : —Joonin ! Wakkati kisinam warii. Alla holli no baawɗe mum foti. Kanko woni laamiiɗo. Almasiihu makko holli kam duu no semmbe mum foti. Ngam peloowo banndiraaɓe meeɗen goonɗinɓe, peloowo ɓe jemma e nyalooma yeeso Alla ittaama dow kammu, faɗɗaa dow leydi.
66012011	Daliila ƴiiƴam Njawdiri ndiin, banndiraaɓe meeɗen goonɗinɓe ɓeen njaali Ibiliisa. Seedaaku maɓɓe ngu ɓe ngaɗi dow makko waɗi ɓe njaalii Ibiliisa. Ɓe ngiɗaay yonkiiji maɓɓe faa to ɓe kulataa maayde.
66012012	Joonin ko Ibiliisa riiwa dow, welwelo laatanoo on, onon wonɓe dow kammu. Ko'e mon kaaɗi onon wonɓe dow leydi e wonɓe nder maayo, ngam on njaran kaata ! Ibiliisa wari to mooɗon. Ɓerne makko tikki sanne ngam joonin omo anndi ko wakkati makko heddaaki sanne.
66012013	Wakkati kuuŋa ngaan faamunoo ko nga faɗɗaama dow leydi, nga orbi debbo dimɗo oon.
66012014	Sey debbo oon waɗanaa bippoole ciile mawɗe, ngam o fiira, o fa'a nokkuure nde o resanaa nder ladde yeeruure. Nder nokkuure ndeen o nyamintee, o yarnetee duuɓi tati e feccere . Kuuŋa ngaan duu waawaa warde toon sako nannga mo.
66012015	Wakkati debbo oon waɗana bippoole ɗeen, sey kuuŋa ngaan tuuti ndiyam ɗuuɗam ngam ɗam ila ɗam hewtowo debbo oon, ɗam nannga mo. Ɗam ili, ɗam laatii maayo, ɗam tokkitii gaɗa debbo oon.
66012016	Amma, leydi wari walli debbo oon, ndi yari ndiyam ɗam fuu.
66012017	Mone heewi kuuŋa ngaan hano nga fecco. Nga ƴuwi gaɗa debbo oon, nga soƴƴii ngam honoyde horiiɓe nder jippotooɓe he debbo oon. Horiiɓe ɓee, kam'en ngoni tokkuɓe tilsinooje Alla, tarsiniiɓe tiigi dow seedaaku Iisa.
66012018	Nga yehi, nga fandowi dow taasiri daane maayo.
66013001	Ndarumi kaden sey ngi'umi ndabba gom no wurtoo nder maayo, ko'e magga jeɗɗi. Dow hoore fuu no diida konngol gom ngam bonude innde Alla. Luwe magga sappo, luwal fuu no mella lefol ardaaki.
66013002	Ndabba nga nanndaana colu. Koyɗe magga no ngoodi leeɓo e peɗeeli juɗɗi. Iɗe nii koyɗe ndabba ladde gom mbi'eteeŋa ursu. Hunnduko magga no wa'i hunnduko muusuuru ladde. Kuuŋa tokkunooŋa debbo oon hokki nga baawɗe mum, laamu mum he jooɗorgal mum.
66013003	Nder ko'e magga, hoore gom no nanndi hano ko fiyaa ɓolde faa hosi maayde, dey nawnannde mum feewi. Ɗum haayɗini duuniyaaru fuu, himɓe tinnii no tokka nga.
66013004	Ɓe ndewi kuuŋa diwuŋa debbo oon ngaan, ngam nga hokki ndabba ngaa baawɗe laamaade. Ɓe ndewi ndabba ngaan duu, ɓe mbi'i : —Moy foti ndabba nga ? Moy waawi durwidi he magga ?
66013005	Ndabba ngaa heɓi laawol no haala haalaaji nyidduɗi, no yenna Alla nder majji. Lebbi lasooji ɗiɗi e ɗiɗi nga watta inga fiya gabaare inga wi'a ko nga goɗɗum.
66013006	Nden nga fuɗɗi haalaaji magga nyidduɗi, inga yankira Alla. Walaa fuu ko nyiddinii ko nga haalataa dow Alla e dow hukumuuru mum. Inga bonna inɗe wuurɓe dow kammu.
66013007	Nga hokkaa laawol habdude he seniiɓe, himɓe Alla, nga heɓa jaalorgal dow maɓɓe. Nga heɓi baawɗe laamaade dow lenyi fuu, dow himɓe fuu, dow ɗemle fuu he dow leyɗe fuu.
66013008	Himɓe duuniyaaru fuu ndewan nga, sey nii ɓe illa fuɗɗorde duuniyaaru, inɗe mum'en mbinndaa nder dewtere mbuurnam, dewtere Njawdiri kirsanoondi ndiin, kam'en tan ngoni ɓe ndewataa nga.
66013009	Jom nowru fuu horkita nowru mum, nana !
66013010	Neɗɗo fuu mo fodaa no nanngetee uddowee non, too joomum no nanngetee uddowee. Neɗɗo fuu mo fodaa no warirtee takubaahi, too joomum no warirtee takubaahi nii non. Ngam majjum waɗi seniiɓe, himɓe Alla fuu no kaani ɓeyda munyal mum'en, ngonda he Alla.
66013011	Gaɗa ndabba mburtiiŋa nder maayo ngaan, sey ngi'umi ndabba gom kam duu wurtii nder leydi. Luwe magga ɗiɗi, iɗe nanndi luwe njawdiri. Inga haala hano no kuuŋa mboɗaa nannduŋa he mbolla ngaan haalirta.
66013012	Nga heɓi baawɗe kuuŋa ngaan fuu. Inga waɗa kujje kaayɗiniiɗe yeeso ndabba maayo ngaan. Inga tilsina himɓe e kujje fuu tawaaɗe nder duuniyaaru. Inga wi'a ɓe, ɓe ndewa ndabba maayo ngaan, nga nawnannde mum feewi ngaan.
66013013	Ndabba mburtiiŋa leydi nga, waɗi kaayɗe mawɗe yeeso himɓe fuu. Nga waɗi hiite jippii illa dow faa he leydi.
66013014	Baawɗe ɗe nga heɓi he ndabba maayo ngaan, fiirtini nga laawol eytude himɓe. Inga wi'a ɓe, ɓe ngaɗa tooruure nanndune he ndabba maayo ngaan.
66013015	Ndabba mburtiiŋa leydi nga hokkaa baawɗe wurnude tooruure ndeen. Tooruure ndeen tinni no haala, nde tinni inde wara saliiɓe rewude nde.
66013016	Nga tilsini himɓe fuu, mawɗo yahde suka, diikuɗo yahde talka, dimo yahde maccuɗo, waɗanee alaama he junngo mum nyaamo naa he tiine mum.
66013017	Neɗɗo fuu hiɗi sooda naa sonna sey tawree alaama oo. Alaama gatteeɗo oon kam woni : Innde ndabba maayo ngaan naa lammba kolloowo innde magga.
66013018	Ɗo woni nokkuure hikmaaku. Gooduɗo hakkillo fuu hiita maana lammba oon. Lammba oon innde neɗɗo non. Lammba oo woni keme jeegom e lasooji tati e jeegom (666).
66014001	Ndaarumi kaden sey ngi'umi Njawdiri ndiin no darii dow waamnde Siyon. Indi wondi he himɓe ujunaaji hemre e lasooji ɗiɗi e nayo (144,000). Innde mayri he innde Alla Baabiraawo mayri no winndaa dow tiiɗe maɓɓe.
66014002	Nanumi daane gom ƴuwne dow no wa'i iido ilam. Inde nanndi hano felmaaŋo manngo naa mbi'en hano kollii ngoni no piyee.
66014003	Himɓe ujunaaji hemre e lasooji ɗiɗi e nayo (144,000) ɓeen fuu no njima, jimol kesol gom yeeso jooɗorgal Alla, yeeso kujje nay buurɗe ɗeen he yeeso dottiiɓe ɓeen. Jimol ngol walaa baawɗo ekkitiingol ko ƴaari himɓe ujunaaji hemre e lasooji ɗiɗi e nayo (144,000) hisinaaɓe ɓee.
66014004	Himɓe ɓee ngoni laaɓuɓe ngam ɓe pukkidaaki he debbo baa nde worre. Iɓe tokki Njawdiri ndiin nokku fuu to ndi fa'i. Kamɓe ngoni ɓe nder duuniyaaru, Alla arti suɓani hoore mum, o suɓii ɓe duu ngam Njawdiri ndiin, o hisini.
66014005	Fewre wurtaaki abada nder kunndule maɓɓe. Feloore fuu walaa he maɓɓe.
66014006	Miɗo ɗon nii, sey ngi'umi maleykaajo gom no fiira to woɗɗi, faa dow toon. Omo wara ngam waajaade Habaru lobbo, habaru duumotooɗo nder leyɗe duuniyaaru fuu, duumotooɗo hakkune himɓe lenyi fuu, he nder ɗemle fuu.
66014007	Nder daane toowne omo wi'a himɓe : —Kulee Alla ! Teddinon mo ! Ngam wakkati mo o hiitotoo himɓe yottake. Cujidanee taguɗo kammu e leydi, maayo e buɗɗe ndiyam !
66014008	Maleykaajo ɗiɗaɓo gom tokki mo kam duu, no wi'a : —Nde sankitake ! Nde sankitake ! Baabiila huɓeere mawne ndeen sankitake ! Kayre uppunoo faa noy walaa leyɗe fuu nder iri golle bonɗe hano jeenu he jarɗe cabiijam gaɗaaɗe nder mayre.
66014009	Sey maleykaajo tataɓo gom, tokki ɗiɗo ɓeeto, toowni daane mum, no wi'a : —Neɗɗo fuu sujidani ndabba ƴuwnga nder maayo ngaan, he tooruure nanndune he magga, nde nii joomum waɗanaama alaama magga dow tiine naa dow junngo mum,
66014010	neɗɗo oo yaran cabiijam tikkere Alla ciiwaɗam, kaɗɗam. O torretee faa noy walaa nder hiite e sinaadar yeeso maleykaaɓe seniiɓe he yeeso Njawdiri ndiin.
66014011	Cuurki hiite tiimunge no wula ɓe ngeen no ƴeenya wakkati fuu dow. Powtiri walaana cujidaniiɓe ndabba ƴuwnga nder maayo ngaan, e tooruure nanndune he magga. Jemma e nyalooma powtiri walaana waɗanaaɓe alaama innde magga dow tiiɗe mum'en naa dow juuɗe mum'en.
66014012	Ngam majjum waɗi, wakkati mo seniiɓe, himɓe Alla, tittinkiniiɓe nder tilsinooje Alla, ngoonɗini Iisa, kaani munyude, wakkati oo yottake.
66014013	Daane gom kam duu, ƴuwi dow wi'i kam : —Winndu ! Welɓe ko'e illa jooni ngoni maayooɓe no tittinkini nder goonɗinol mum'en. Ruuhu Alla wi'i : —Goonga non, tampiri maɓɓe timmi. Ɓe powtan ngam golle maɓɓe kolli ko ɓe ngaɗiri no wooɗiri.
66014014	Miɗo ƴeewannoo nii kaden sey ngi'umi luuldere raneere tar, nannduɗo Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jooɗii dow mayre. Omo melli meetalol kaŋŋe. Omo jogii nder junngo makko waarudu welnu sanne.
66014015	Maleykaajo gom wurtii nder Juulirde Alla mawne, toowni daane mum wi'i jooɗiiɗo dow luuldere oon : —Kettol barke duuniyaaru yoni, adu waarudu maa, fuɗɗu hettude.
66014016	Nden jooɗiiɗo dow luuldere oon adi waarudu mum faɗɗi ndu nder duuniyaaru, nden barke mayru hettaa.
66014017	Maleykaajo gom wurtii kaden nder Juulirde Alla mawne wonnde dow, no jogii waarudu welnu sanne gom.
66014018	Maleykaajo gom, kawjiiɗo hiite sakkirde Alla ndeen kam duu wari, nder daane toowne wi'i maleykaajo jogiiɗo waarudu welnu oon : —Cabiije duuniyaaru, ɓiɓɓe mum ɓenndi, adu waarudu maa taƴowa ɗe.
66014019	Maleykaajo oon adi waarudu mum faɗɗi nder duuniyaaru. Ndu taƴi ɓiɓɓe cabiije ɗeen, ndu hawri ɗe nder ɓoosirde mawne. Ɗum fuu woni alaama tikkere Alla.
66014020	Toon gaɗa huɓeere ndeen, ɓiɓɓe cabiije ɗeen ɓoosaa. Ƴiiƴam ɗuɗɗam wurtii nder ɓoosirde ndeen. Ɗam ili ko waɗata kilooji keme tati. Ɗam ƴeenyi dow faa to nde nii puccu darake nder majjam, hoore maggu tan hollirtee.
66015001	Ndaarumi kaden sey ngi'umi nder kammu alaama mawɗo kaayɗinɗo kam gom. Maleykaaɓe jeɗɗo jogiiɓe bala'uuji jeɗɗi. Bala'uuji jeɗɗi ɗii, kanƴi ngoni bala'uuji cakitittooɗi ngam nder majji kumnol tikkere Alla wanngata.
66015002	Ngi'umi kaden, goɗɗum nannduɗum maayo no ƴelkita hano danndorgal no ngirɓordira he hiite. Dow daane maggo, jaaliiɓe ndabba maayo ngaan, heɓuɓe jaalorgal ngam ɓe calake tokkude tooruure tinndinoore magga, ɓe calake duu waɗaneede alaama tinndinoore innde magga dow mum'en. Neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu no jogii hoddu ndu Alla hokki ɗum.
66015003	Iɓe njima jimol ngol Muusa, maccuɗo Alla, yimunoo he jimol gaɗanangol Njawdiri ndiin, iɓe mbi'a : —Yaa Alla Joomiraawo, Jom baawɗe, golleeji maaɗa no mawni, iɗi kaayɗini ! Yaa Laamiiɗo laamorɗe fuu, laabi maa no dartiiɗi, ɗi goongaaji !
66015004	Yaa Joomiraawo ! Moy woni hulataa ma ? Moy saloto teddinde ma ? Aan tan woni Ceniiɗo. Lenyi fuu ngaran cujida yeeso maa, ngam ɗi fuu ɗi ngi'ii ko golleeji maaɗa no dartiiɗi.
66015005	Gaɗa jimol ngool, sey ngi'umi Juulirde Alla mawne ndeen no omtii, hukumuuru seedaaku nduun no tawaa nder mayre.
66015006	Maleykaaɓe jeɗɗo, jogiiɓe bala'uuji jeɗɗi ɗiin mburtii nder mayru, iɓe ɓornii kolte lobbe, daneeje tar. Iɓe kaɓɓi tunndorɗi gaɗiraaɗi kaŋŋe dow gabaaje maɓɓe.
66015007	Nder kujje nay buurɗe ɗeen wonnde hokki maleykaaɓe jeɗɗo ɓeen nyeɗerɗe jeɗɗi gaɗiraaɗe kaŋŋe. Nyeɗerde fuu no heewi tikkere Alla Duumotooɗo faa abada abadin.
