66015008	Sey nder baawɗe Alla he teddungal mum, cuurki gom wurtii, hewni Juulirde mawne ndeen. Nde nii maleykaaɓe jeɗɗo ɓeen timminaay bala'uuji jeɗɗi ɗi ɓe njogii ɗiin, too walaa baawɗo naati nder mayre.
66016001	Miɗo ɗon nii sey nanumi daane toowne gom ƴuwi nder Juulirde mawne, wi'i maleykaaɓe jogiiɓe bala'uuji jeɗɗi ɓeen : —Njehee, ndufowee tikkere Alla wonnde nder nyeɗerɗe jeɗɗi ɗeen fuu nder duuniyaaru !
66016002	Nder maleykaaɓe jeɗɗo ɓeen, sey gooto maɓɓe arti, yehi, rufowi nyeɗerde mum. Sey ɓuuye bonɗe, naawooje faa noy walaa, mburtii he tawraaɓe alaama ndabba maayo ngaan kam fuu he cujidanɓe tooruure tinndinoore magga.
66016003	Maleykaajo ɗiɗaɓo oon rufi kam duu nder diyeele ko woni nder nyeɗerde mum. Ndiyam ɗam laatii hano ƴiiƴam mbaɗɗam, kujje buurɗe tawaaɗe nder majjam fuu mbaati.
66016004	Maleykaajo tataɓo oon rufi ko tawanoo nder nyeɗerde mum nder maayooji he dow gite leydi ilnooje ndiyam fuu. Ndiyam ɗam fuu wayli, laatii ƴiiƴam, kanƴam duu.
66016005	Sey nanumi maleykaajo dawranoowo diyeele, no wi'a : —Aan woni dartiiɗo, Ceniiɗo, gonɗo, gonnooɗo, a hiitake he dartinaaku.
66016006	Bonɓe ndufi ƴiiƴam seniiɓe, himɓe maaɗa, ɓe ndufi ƴiiƴam annabiiɓe maaɗa. Aan duu, a hokki ɓe ƴiiƴam ɓe njara. Nii hegii he maɓɓe !
66016007	Daane gom duu wurtii nder sakkirde ndeen, no wi'a : —Goonga ! Joomiraawo Alla Jom baawɗe, sariyaaji maaɗa no goongaaji, ɗi dartiiɗi !
66016008	Maleykaajo nayaɓo oon kam duu rufi ko tawanoo nder nyeɗerde mum dow naange. Naange ngeen heɓi laawol haaɗude rok ngam wula himɓe.
66016009	Wulowulo magge satti sanne, tinni no wula himɓe. Amma ɓe calii tuubude, ɓe teddina Alla. Ɓe tinni iɓe mbonna innde Alla, gooduɗo baawɗe darnude bala'uuji ɗiin.
66016010	Maleykaajo joyaɓo oon rufi ko tawanoo nder nyeɗerde mum dow jooɗorgal ndabba maayo ngaan. Sey nimre huuri kappa kuula to baawɗe magga tawa. Himɓe keddii no hanngodira nyiiƴe ngam naawɗum ko ɓe nanta ɗum.
66016011	Naawɗum putte burtiiɗe he maɓɓe ɗum waɗi ɓe tinni iɓe mbonna innde Alla jeyɗo dow. Ɓe calii tuubude, ɓe tinni iɓe ngaɗa golle bonɗe.
66016012	Maleykaajo jeegaɓo oon rufi ko tawanoo nder nyeɗerde mum nder maayo manngo wi'eteengo Efarata. Sey ngo yoorii, ngam laamiiɓe ƴuwooɓe lettugal keɓa to mbittori.
66016013	Miɗo ɗon nii sey ngi'umi kaden, ginnaaji bonɗi tati gom nannduɗi he paaɓi, gonngol wurtii nder hunnduko mbolla ngaan, gonngol wurtii nder hunnduko ndabba ngaan, gonngol duu wurtii nder hunnduko annabiijo penoowo oon.
66016014	Ginnaaji ɗii ngoni ginnaaji bonɗi gaɗooji kujje kaayɗiniiɗe. Ɗi tefowan laamiiɓe duuniyaaru fuu, ɗi nodda ɓe ngam ɓe kawra ɓe ngadda daane worre, ɓe ngaɗa konu nyannde darŋal, nyalaane Alla Jom baawɗe.
66016015	Nden Iisa wi'i kam : —Ndaa, mi warowan hano no gujjo warirta ! Belɗo hoore woni balɗo no darii mo ɗaanaaki, no ɓornii koltal mum ngam to dilludu wari he mum fuu to ndillu terru, gite no kollira ɗum.
66016016	Ginnaaji ɗiin kawri laamiiɓe ɓeen nder nokkuure wi'eteene Armagedon nder ibrankoore.
66016017	Maleykaajo jeɗɗaɓo oon kam duu wicci ko tawanoo nder nyeɗerde mum nder henndu. Daane toowne gom wurtii nder Juulirde mawne wari, nde ƴuwaana illa jooɗorgal laamu ngaal, inde wi'a : —Huune fuu gasi joonkay.
66016018	Sey maƴƴe, olko, e diggaali gom ngaɗi. Leydi dimmbi dimmbande mawne. Dimmbande ndee, illa himɓe no nder duuniyaaru ir mum waɗaay baa nde worre !
66016019	Huɓeere mawne ndeen fecci pecce tati. Kuɓeeje tawaaɗe nder leyɗe duuniyaaru fuu cankiti. Alla yeggitaay huɓeere Baabiila. O waɗi nde yari nyeɗerde cabiijam tikkere makko.
66016020	Duuɗe fuu moyti, baamle duu majji.
66016021	Malmalluuje ɓutte ƴuwi dow no caama dow himɓe. Teddirka worre majje fuu no waɗa kilooji lasooji ɗiɗi. Himɓe kuɗi Alla ngam malmalluuje bonɗe, gonɗe no caama, laataniiɓe balaa'u bonɗo.
66017001	Maleykaajo gom tawaaɗo nder maleykaaɓe jeɗɗo jogiinooɓe nyeɗerɗe jeɗɗi ɗeen, wari, wi'i kam : —War, faa mi holle no Alla hiitortoo debbo jeenoowo sanne oo. Debbo oo woni huɓeere nyiɓaande takkol diyeele ɗuɗɗe.
66017002	Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru pijidi he makko. Himɓe duuniyaaru njari cabiijam makko faa ko'e maɓɓe copti, ɓe ngaɗi ko fijude.
66017003	Sey Ruuhu Ceniiɗo heewi kam, maleykaajo oon ɗowi kam nder ladde yeeruure. Nden ngi'umi debbo gom no jooɗii no waɗɗii ndabba mboɗaa gom. Ndabba nga ko'e magga jeɗɗi, luwe magga sappo. Ɓanndu magga fuu no winndaa konngi gom ngam bonude innde Alla.
66017004	Debbo oo no ɓornii kolte boɗeeje, lobbe sanne. Omo feɗi kaŋŋe, kaaƴe dime he luuluuje. Nder junngo makko no tawa nyeɗerde kaŋŋe heewne ko nyiddinii he tuuni fijirde makko.
66017005	Dow tiine makko no winndaa, innde nde maana cuuɗiiɗo gom. Ɗum winndi ɗum wi'i : Baabiila Teddinaaŋa Inna fijooɓe Inna waɗooɓe ko nyiddinii fuu.
66017006	Ngi'umi kaden ko debbo oo no suuli. Ƴiiƴam seniiɓe, himɓe Alla haalooɓe dow ko Iisa waɗi, ɗam o yari ɗam, kanƴam suuli mo. Ɗum haayɗini kam sanne, wakkati ngi'unoomi mo.
66017007	Nden maleykaajo oon wi'i kam : —Ko waɗi ɗum haayɗini ma ? Mi fiirtante maana majjum. Mi haalante maana debbo oo he ndabba nga ko'e jeɗɗi he luwe sappo, nga o waɗɗii ngaa.
66017008	Ndabba nga ngi'ataa ngaa, wuuriino, amma hannden nga heddaaki. Nder ko ɓooyataa nga wuuritan, nden nga wurtowo nder ngaykaa nga walaa fuu keerol gom. Nde nii nga wurtake, Alla wara nga. Himɓe, ɓe illa fuɗɗorde inɗe mum'en mbinndaaka nder dewtere mbuurnam, wonɓe nder duuniyaaru ngi'an nga. Gi'ol magga haayɗinan ɓe ngam ndenno nga wuurinoo, hannden nga wuuraa amma nga wartowan.
66017009	Ɗo neɗɗo fuu haani tawree hikmaaku e faamo ngam anndude kujje ɗee. Maana ko'e jeɗɗi ɗeen woni baamle jeɗɗi, ɗe debbo oon njooɗii dow mum.
66017010	Iɗe tinndina duu laamiiɓe jeɗɗo. Nder laamiiɓe jeɗɗo ɓee, joyo ngaɗi jamaanu mum'en mbitti. Gooto maɓɓe no caka balɗe mum. Laamu jeɗɗaɓo maɓɓe oon waraay ginan. Amma nyannde fuu ngu wari, wakkati seɗɗa tan ngu watta.
66017011	Ndabba ngoota mbuurunoonga ndenno nga heddaaki hannden ngaan, kannga he hoore magga, inga hawtidi laamiiɓe jeɗɗo ɓeen goɗɗum. Nde nii nga wartowi, kannga laatoytoo laamiiɗo jeetataɓo oon. Amma nga yahan to nga halketee.
66017012	Maana luwe sappo ɗe ngi'uɗaa ɗe, woni laamiiɓe sappo ɓe jamaanu mum'en ngaraay ginan. Ɓe keɓowan baawɗe laamidaade he ndabba ngaan nder wakkatiyel seɗɗa.
66017013	Laamiiɓe ɓeen fuu, kawri ngaɗi hunnduko wooto, ngam gollande ndabba ngaan he semmbe mum'en fuu e baawɗe mum'en fuu.
66017014	Ɓe ndurwidan Njawdiri ndiin, amma kayri heɓoyta jaalorgal dow maɓɓe ngam kayri woni Joomiraawo joomiraaɓe fuu, Laamiiɗo laamiiɓe fuu. Wonduɓe he mayri ɓeen duu kawtida he mayri nder jaalorgal ngaal. Ndi suɓake ɓe, ndi noddi. Ɓe tokkiran ndi ɓerne worre.
66017015	Maleykaajo oon wi'i kam kaden : —Diyeele ɗee ɗe ngi'uɗaa debbo jeenoowo oon no jooɗii hadde mum'en ɗeen, maana majje woni himɓe lenyi fuu wonɓe nder duuniyaaru, haalooɓe ɗemle feere-fereeje.
66017016	Luwe sappo ɗee, ɗe ngi'uɗaa ɗe kanƴe he ndabba ngaan fuu, mbanyan debbo jeenoowo oo, piɗɗaa mo pat, teeta ko o woodi fuu, acca mo ɓanndu ɓoldu, nyaama tewu makko, nden ndufa ko hoddi ɗum nder hiite.
66017017	Alla waɗi laamiiɓe sappo ɓee ngaɗi daane worre, ngam gollande ndabba ngaan heɓa nga laamo. O waɗi ɗum duu ngam ɓe ngaɗa fodoore makko. Ndabba ngaan laamoto sey nyannde ko o wi'i ɗum huuɓi.
66017018	Debbo jeenoowo mo ngi'uɗaa oo, kam woni tinndinoore huɓeere mawne laamiinde laamiiɓe duuniyaaru.
66018001	Gaɗa tinndinooje dow ndabba ngaan e luwe sappo ɗeen, sey ngi'umi maleykaajo gom keewɗo baawɗe ƴuwii dow kaamu jippii. Darja makko yayni duuniyaaru fuu.
66018002	O ƴewni nder daane toowne, o wi'i : —Kas ! Nde saami. Baabiila huɓeere mawne saami ! Nde laatake jonnde ginnaaji. Nde laatake wuro ruuhuuji bonɗi, he iri tuuni fuu. Nde laatake to ir foonu wanyaanu e nyiddiniinu fuu tawa !
66018003	Nde saami, ngam nde hokki hoore mayre yahde he ko nyiddinii. Leyɗe fuu njari cabiijam fijirde mayre. Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru fuu pijirii nde. Ɓiɓɓe luumo duuniyaaru fuu ndiikiɗi daliila njawdi mayre.
66018004	Nanumi daane gom ƴuwi dow kaden, no wi'a : —Mburtee nder mayre, onon himɓe am, heɓa to hakke mayre raaɓu on, heɓa to bala'uuji mayre hewto on !
66018005	Ngam hakke mayre ɗuuɗi sanne, faa yottii he kammu. Alla duu miccitake golleeji mayre bonɗi.
66018006	Culnanee nde hano no nde sulninari woɓɓe ! Huune fuu ko nde waɗi on, njoɓitee faa nde ɗiɗi ! Nder nyeɗerde nde o wattani on cabiijam, nyeɗiree nde cabiijam kaɗɗam faa kile ɗiɗi, kokkon mo.
66018007	No nde hiɗirnoo njawdi e teddungal faa noy walaa, onon duu, torriree nde hano non, kebbinon nde mettorgal ɓerne. Nder ɓerne mayre inde wi'a : Miin, mi laamiiɗo. Mi hanaa debbo mo gorum maayi. Abada duu mettorgal maayde heewtaaki kam.
66018008	Ngam majjum waɗi nder nyalooma gooto, bala'uuji bonɗi, nyaw, mettorgal he rafo, caamata dow mayre. Nde wulirtee hiite, ngam Alla Joomiraawo kiitiiɗo nde no Jom semmbe.
66018009	Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru fijidiɓɓe he mayre, e beegan ɓe nde, nyannde ɓe ngi'ata ƴeenyol cuurki hiite wonnge no nyaama nde, nyannde mum ɓerɗe maɓɓe mettan.
66018010	Ɓe toowtande sanne, ngam doggude to kiite mayre saamu dow maɓɓe. Nyannde mum ɓe mbi'an : —Yoo yoo ! Yo ! Baabiila saami ! Baabiila huɓeere mawne, Baabiila huɓeere semmbenteere ! Nder yamnde worre tan, kiite Alla saami dow maa !
66018011	Ɓiɓɓe luumo duuniyaaru mboyan nde, ɓerɗe maɓɓe mettan, ngam walaa coodoowo goɗɗum he maɓɓe.
66018012	Walaa garoowo sooda he maɓɓe kaŋŋe, cardi e kaaƴe dime, naa colle gom. Walaa garoowo sooda he maɓɓe gude canyaaɗe faa wooɗi, gude boɗeeje, lobbe sanne gom, naa boɗeeje coy gom. Naa garoowo sooda he maɓɓe leɗɗe uurɗe ir iriije, gineeji gaɗiraaɗi nyiiƴe nyiiwa, gineeji gaɗiraaɗi leɗɗe cehaaɗe caadiiɗe sanne naa jamɗe boɗeeje e jamɗe ɓaleeje, naa gineeji gaɗiraaɗi hayre gom wi'eteene marba.
66018013	Walaa coodoowo li'orɗum gom bi'eteeɗum Kanel e li'orɗi gom, naa coodoowo cabiijam, nebbam uurɗam, nebbam jaytun, conndi, aawdiiri alkama, gowe, ɗakke uurɗe gom, naa iri uurdi mbelni cuurtinteeni gom. Walaa coodoowo nagge, mbaalu, puccu, torko, naa neɗɗo.
66018014	Luumotooɓe ɓeen fuu mbi'i huɓeere ndeen : —Njawdi maa he ŋari maa fuu majji. Kujje ɗe kosuɗaa heɓude ɗeen fuu kalki. A heɓitittaa ɗe kaden faa abada abadin.
66018015	Ɓiɓɓe luumo waɗuɓe njawdi nder luumo mayre ndaroyto to woɗɗi, ngam iɓe kula to ɓe limtee nder hawtidooɓe he mayre balaa'u. Ɓe mboyan, iɓe mboyto, ɓerɗe maɓɓe metta faa noy walaa.
66018016	Ɓe mbi'a : —Yoo yoo ! Yo ! Baabiila huɓeere mawne. Baabiila debbo nyaaƴirannooɗo kolte haabu, kolte canyaaɗe faa wooɗi. Debbo ɓornotooɗo kolte boɗeeje, caadiiɗe, kolte peɗiraaɗe kaŋŋe, coddi e kaaƴe dime !
66018017	Amma kas ! Nder yamnde worre tan, njawdi mayre fuu halkaa ! Sey jom'en laanaaji ndiyam mawɗi, naatooɓe laanaaji ɗiin, awƴooɓe ɗi he keɓoowo barke yaha-warta dow maayo fuu mboɗɗoo huɓeere ndeen, ndarowoo faa to woɗɗi.
66018018	Wakkati mo ɓe ngi'ata cuurki hiite ngonnge no wula huɓeere ndeen, ɓe mboyan, ɓe mbi'a : —Huɓeere fuu huɓeere ummaaki fotune huɓeere mawne ndee !
66018019	Sey ɓe mbicci leydi dow ko'e maɓɓe, iɓe mboya, iɓe mboytoo, ɓerɗe maɓɓe no metta, iɓe mbi'a : —Yoo yoo ! Yo ! Nde halki ! Huɓeere mawne ndee halki ! Huɓeere nde jom'en laanaaji mawɗi diikiɗi nder njawdi mum. Amma nder yamnde worre tan, huune fuu halkaa !
66018020	Mbeltinee onon wonɓe nder kammu. Onon seniiɓe, himɓe Alla, mbeltinee. Onon lilaaɓe he onon annabiiɓe, mbeltinee ! Alla hiitake Baabiila dow kujje ɗe nde waɗani on !
66018021	Sey maleykaajo semmbenteejo gom hooƴi kaaƴa gom potuŋa niisirde gabbe, faɗɗi nder maayo, wi'i : —Nii Baabiila, huɓeere mawne faɗɗirtee he semmbe nde halka, nde hi'ataake kaden faa abada abadin !
66018022	Daane hoddu, daane seeseeru, daane luwal, naa daane jimoowo fuu nanataake kaden nder mayre. Bahillo naa cehoowo heɓataake kaden nder mayre. Wabbere fuu niisataake nder mayre.
66018023	Ndenno ɓiɓɓe luumo maaɗa ngoni jom'en baawɗe nder duuniyaaru fuu. Amma joonin ngam a eytiri himɓe heewɓe he dobo-dobooji maaɗa, jeyngol fitilla fuu hi'ataake nder maaɗa. Daane ɓaŋuɗo e ɓaŋaaɗo nanataake nder maaɗa kaden.
66018024	Nii kiite Baabiila taƴiraa ngam junngo mayre no nder dufol ƴiiƴam seniiɓe, himɓe Alla, ƴiiƴam annabiiɓe he ƴiiƴam waranooɓe nder duuniyaaru fuu.
66019001	Toon nder kammu, sey nanumi daaɗe toowɗe gom, daaɗe nannduɗe he daaɗe jama'aare mawne no mbi'a : —Aleluuya. Kisinam, teddungal e baawɗe ngonani Alla meeɗen !
66019002	Kiite makko no goonga, no dartii ! O hiitake debbo jenoowo sanne oo, debbo pijuɗo sanne faa bonni duuniyaaru fuu oo. Alla hiitake mo ngam o rufi ƴiiƴam maccuɓe mum.
66019003	Daaɗe ɗeen towna kaden, nden ɗe mbi'i : —Aleluuya, hiite wulunge huɓeere ndeen cuurki mum no ɗon no ƴeenya dow, faa abada abadin !
66019004	Dottiiɓe laso e nayo ɓeen he kujje nay buurɗe ɗeen, kofi, cujidani Alla gonɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu. Dottiiɓe ɓeen e kujje ɗeen no mbi'a : —Aleluuya ! Aamiin !
66019005	Daane gom ƴuwi dow jooɗorgal laamu ngaal, wi'i : —Mawɗo e pamaro mooɗon, on fuu njettee Alla meeɗen, onon maccuɓe makko, onon wooduɓe kulal makko !
66019006	Nanumi daaɗe jama'aare gom nannduɗe iido benkeƴƴe naa diggaali mawɗi. Daaɗe ɗee, no mbi'a : —Aleluuya ! Alla Jom baawɗe tabbintini laamu muuɗum.
66019007	En ceyo, nanen belɗum, teddinen mo, ngam wakkati ɓanngal Njawdiri ndiin yottake, ɓaŋaaɗo oon duu siryake.
66019008	O hokkaama koltal lamngal, canyaangal faa moddi, naatowal hitere, o ɓorno. Koltal ngal woni golle moƴƴuɗe, golle seniiɓe, himɓe Alla.
66019009	Sey maleykaajo gom, wi'i kam : —Winndu : Welɓe ko'e ngoni noddaaɓe-ngara nyaama nyaamdu batu ɓanngal Njawdiri ndiin ! O wi'i kaden : —Tabbat haalaaji ɗii no goonga. To Alla ɗi ƴuwi.
66019010	Nden kofiimi faa hadde koyɗe maleykaajo oon, ngam sujidande mo. Amma o wi'i kam : —To sujidanam ! Sujidan Alla ! Miin he hoore am, mi maccuɗo Alla non hano maaɗa, hano banndiraaɓe maaɗa, ceediiɓe yeeso jama'aare dow ko Iisa Almasiihu waɗi. Teddin Alla ! Ceedaaku dow Iisa Almasiihu nguu, kam woni ko annabaaku nguu tefata.
66019011	Yeeso am ngi'umi kammu no omtii, puccu ndaneewu tar gom wanngi. Baɗɗiiɗo ngu oon no inndiree jom holnaare e goonga. Nder dartinaaku, o watta kiite makko e konu makko.
66019012	Gite makko no njalɓa hano ɗemle hiite, omo melli meetali laamu keewɗi. Innde gom, nde neɗɗo fuu anndaa se hanaa kanko, no winndaa he makko.
66019013	Omo ɓornii jabbaare heewnee ƴiiƴam. Omo inndiree : « Haala Alla ».
66019014	Cefe soogeeji kammu, gonɗi dow pucci mum'en daneeji no tokki mo. Neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu no ɓornii kolte haabu canyaaɗe faa moddi, iɗe ndawni tar.
66019015	Takubaahi mbelki no wurtoo nder hunnduko makko. Kanki ngooti kiin o heɓirta jaalorgal dow leyɗe duuniyaaru fuu. O laamorto ɗe sawru njamndi. O niisan ɓiɓɓe cabiije nder ɓoosirde tikkere Alla mawne, Jom baawɗe.
66019016	Innde gom no winndaa dow jabbaare makko he dow busal makko, no wi'a : « Laamiiɗo laamiiɓe fuu, Joomiraawo joomiraaɓe fuu. »
66019017	Ngi'umi maleykaajo gom no darii dow naange. O ƴewni pooli piirooji dow o wi'i ɗi : —Ngaree, kawree ngam hiraane mawne nde Alla siryi.
66019018	Nyaamon tewu ɓalli : Laamiiɓe, hooreeɓe soogeeji, worɓe suusuɓe, nyaamon tewu pucci ɗiin e waɗɗiiɓe ɗi. Nyaamon tewu ɓalli himɓe fuu rimɓe yahde maccuɓe, pamaro yahde mawɗo !
66019019	Ngi'umi kaden ndabba mannga ngaan, laamiiɓe duuniyaaru, e soogeeji mum'en, ɓe kawri faa ɓe kabda baɗɗiiɗo puccu ndaneewu oon e soogeeji mum.
66019020	Amma ndabba ngaan nanngaa kannga he annabiijo penoowo oon, gaɗannooɗo dobo-dobooji yeeso magga oon. Nder dobo-dobooji makko ɗiin o fergi waɗanaaɓe dow mum'en alaama ndabba ngaan, e sujidanɓe tooruure tinndinoore magga. Ndabba ngaan e annabiijo oon nanngaa, paɗɗaa he yonkiiji mum'en nder peta hiite sinaadar wulnge jaraw.
66019021	Takubaahi ngonki no wurtoo nder hunnduko baɗɗiiɗo puccu ndaneewu oon wari soogeeji ɗiin fuu. Pooli ɗiin ngari nyaami tewu ɓalli maɓɓe faa kaari.
66020001	Maleykaajo gom ƴuwi dow kammu jippii, ngi'umi omo jogii nder junngo makko, callalol manngol gom e omtirɗum ngaykaa nga walaa fuu keerol ngaan.
66020002	O wari, o nanngi mbolla ngaan, kannga wonnoo mboddi arandeeri, inndirteeni Ibiliisa naa mbi'en Seyɗan. O haɓɓi ndi ngam ndi waɗa duuɓi ujunere indi haɓɓi.
66020003	O faɗɗi ndi nder ngaykaa ngaan, o ommbii hunnduko magga, o soki ko faa wooɗi. Nden o fiyi kaatimiije dow magga heɓa ndi waɗa duuɓi ujunere kuɓɗi, ndi jammbaaki lenyol fuu kaden nder duuniyaaru. Gaɗa duuɓi ujunere ɗiin, no haani ngaykaa ngaan sokitee, ndi haɓɓitee ndi yoofee wakkati seɗɗa.
66020004	Nden ngi'umi jooɗorɗe laamu gom, warɓe jooɗaade dow majje fuu kokkaa baawɗe hiitaade. Ngi'umi kaden himɓe, ɓe yonkiiji mum'en ittaa ngam seedaaku maɓɓe ngu ɓe ngaɗi dow Iisa, e waaju haala Alla mo ɓe ngaɗi. Ɓe cujidanaay ndabba maayo ngaan naa duu tooruure tinndinoore magga, ɓe accaay duu alaama magga waɗee dow tiiɗe maɓɓe naa dow juuɗe maɓɓe. Himɓe ɓee no ummintintee, ɓe laamodoto he Almasiihu duuɓi ujunere.
66020005	Himɓe ɓee kamɓe ngoni ɓe Alla arti ummintini he maayde. Amma ɓeeto kay ummitittaako sey duuɓi ujunere ɗiin fuu kuuɓi.
66020006	Welɓe ko'e ngoni wooduɓe mbaka nder ummintinaaki kiin ngam ɓe ceniiɓe. Maayde ɗiɗaɓere gom fuu walaa baawɗe gom dow maɓɓe. Ɓe laatoto cakkanooɓe Alla he Almasiihu, ɓe laamodoo he Almasiihu duuɓi ujunere.
66020007	Nyannde fuu duuɓi ujunere ɗiin kuuɓata, nyannde mum, Ibiliisa yoofetee wurto nder kasu,
66020008	yaha nder kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu jammboowo lenyi Juuju e Maajuuju. O hawra ɗum'en ngam konu. Lenyi ɗii ɗuuɗal mum'en limtataako, ɗuuɗal majji no fota gabbe taasiri daane maayo ɗuudde.
66020009	Ɗi cankito nokku fuu nder duuniyaaru, ɗi piilo hoɗorde seniiɓe Alla, huɓeere horsune he makko. Amma hiite gom ƴuwta dow, wara nyaama lenyi ɗii fuu.
66020010	Ibiliisa eytannooɗo ɓe oon kam duu faɗɗaa nder peta hiite sinaadar wulnge jaraw, to ndabba ngaan he annabiijo penoowo oon paɗɗanoo. Ɓe njukkaa. Jemma e nyalooma iɓe nder torra faa abada abadin.
66020011	Dow jooɗorgal laamu manngal danal tar gom, mi hi'i neɗɗo gom no jooɗii dow maggal. Kammu he leydi fuu majji yeeso makko, ko ɗum hi'ataake kaden.
66020012	Ngi'umi kaden maaynooɓe fuu, mawɗo maɓɓe yahde pamaro maɓɓe no ndarii yeeso jooɗorgal laamu ngaal. Dewte gom piirtaa, nden dewtere mbuurnam, kam duu fiirtaa, maayɓe ɓeen kiitaa. Neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu hiitaa dow golle mum hano no ɗum winndiraa nder dewte ɗeen.
66020013	Maayo tuuti wurtini maayɓe wonnooɓe nder mum. Maayde he laahara kam'en duu kokkiti maayɓe wonnooɓe nder mum'en. Maayɓe ɓeen ɗon duu kiitaa, neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu hiitaa dey-dey golle mum.
66020014	Nden maayde he laahara paɗɗaa nder peta hiite ngaan laatiinga maayde ɗiɗaɓere.
66020015	Nyannde mum neɗɗo fuu mo innde mum winndaaka nder dewtere mbuurnam ndeen, no faɗɗetee nder peta hiite ngaan.
66021001	Ngi'umi kammu kesu e leydi heyri gom. Kammu arandeewu nguun e leydi arandeeri fuu kalki, maayo fuu walaa.
66021002	Ngi'umi Ursaliima keso oon, huɓeere seniine ndeen no ƴuwa to Alla no jippoo. Inde feɗa hano no ɓaŋoyteeɗo feɗirtee ngam nana belɗum yahde to gorum.
66021003	Nanumi daane toowne gom ƴuwi dow jooɗorgal laamu ngaal inde wi'a : « Ndaa, hukumuuru Alla nii hakkune himɓe. O joddoto he maɓɓe, ɓe laatoo himɓe makko. Alla he hoore mum wondan he maɓɓe, o laatoo Alla maɓɓe.
66021004	O moytan gonɗi maɓɓe fuu. Maayde, mettorgal ɓerne, simayeeŋo he torra gom fuu keddataako, ngam kujje kiɗɗe ɗeen fuu ndilli. »
66021005	Jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal oon wi'i : —Ndaa, mi heyɗintinan huune fuu ! Winndu haalaaji ɗii, ngam ɗi kolniiɗi, ɗi goongaaji.
66021006	Huune fuu timmi ! Miin woni fuɗɗorde miin woni timmoode. Miin woni arano, miin woni cakitiiɗo. Neɗɗo fuu ɗomɗuɗo, mi hokkan ɗum forba ndiyam mbuurnam.
66021007	Neɗɗo fuu keɓuɗo jaalorgal heɓan kujje ɗee fuu. Mi laatoto Alla joomum, kam duu laatoo ɓiyam.
66021008	Amma wattuɓe kulal nder ɓerɗe mum'en, ɓe ngoonɗinaay, gollooɓe ko nyiddinii, ittooɓe yonki, fijooɓe, jom'en dobo-dobooji, rewooɓe tooruuje, fenooɓe, himɓe ɓee fuu nder peta hiite sinaadar wulnge jaraw mbaka maɓɓe woni. Hiite ngee woni maayde ɗiɗaɓere.
66021009	Maleykaajo gom tawaaɗo nder maleykaaɓe jeɗɗo jogiiɓe nyeɗerɗe jeɗɗi, keewɗe bala'uuji jeɗɗi cakitotooɗi ɗiin wari, haaldi he am, wi'i kam : —War faa mi holle ɓaŋaaɗo, mo Njawdiri ndiin suɓii.
66021010	Ruuhu Ceniiɗo heewi kam, maleykaajo oon ɗowi kam faa dow waamnde toowne gom. O holli kam Ursaliima keso oon, huɓeere seniine ndeen no ƴuwa to Alla no jippoo.
66021011	Inde wondi he teddungal Alla, inde ƴelkita hano hayre rimnde, inde laaɓi hano yaspa, ƴelkitol mayre hano danndorgal.
66021012	Birniyol gom no fiilii nde. Ingol toowi ingol tekkiɗi, dammbule maggol sappo e ɗiɗi. Dammbugal fuu maleykaajo gom no darii. Lenyi Isra'el sappo e ɗiɗi ɗiin, lenyol fuu e dammbugal mum, innde mum duu no winndaa dow maggal.
66021013	Dammbule maggol, keɗɗe lettugal ɗeen no tati. Gorgal maggol duu tati, soɓɓirde maggol no woodi tati, hoore huɗo maggol kam duu no woodi tati.
66021014	Birniyol huɓeere ndeen maha dow kaaƴe sappo e ɗiɗi. Dow majje no winndaa inɗe lilaaɓe Njawdiri ndiin sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen.
66021015	Maleykaajo kaaldoowo he am oon no jogii loocol etirngol gaɗiraangol kaŋŋe. Omo eta huɓeere ndeen, dammbule mayre he birniyol mayre.
66021016	Seraaji nay mayre fuu njuutirka mum'en no potu. O watti loocol etirngol ngol o eti, o heɓi ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗi (12,000) dow njuutirka maggol. O eti o heɓi ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗi (12,000) dow njaajirka maggol. Dow toowirka maggol duu o eti, o heɓi ujunaaji sappo e ɗiɗi (12,000).
66021017	O eti ɗeppiɗeeka birniyol ngool, o heɓi kuule hemre e lasooji ɗiɗi e nay (144), kuule maleykaajo oon he kuule himɓe fuu no potu.
66021018	Birniyol ngool nyiɓiraa hayre yaspa, siire ndeen duu nyiɓiraa kaŋŋe dime, inde laaɓi hano danndorgal.
66021019	Kaaƴe birniyol ngool peɗira ir kaaƴe dime fuu. Peɗe sappo e ɗiɗi ngoni ko waɗa, iɗe tokkodiri yahde. Hayre inndirteene yaspa artira, safir tokki, hayre tataɓere wattaane ndeen woni hayre inndirteene agat, nden hayre inndirteene emerooda tokki.
66021020	Hayre joyaɓere wattaane ndeen woni hayre inndirteene onikis, nden hayre inndirteene sardis ndeen duu watta. Hayre jeɗɗaɓere wattaane ndeen woni hayre inndirteene kirisoliita, nden hayre inndirteene beril kam duu watta. Hayre jeenayaɓere wattaane ndeen woni hayre inndirteene topas, nden kirisoparas hayre sappoɓere ndeen watta. Hayre sappo he go'aɓere wattaane ndeen woni hayre inndirteene yasente, nden hayre inndirteene ameetis watta, wari laatii hayre sappo e ɗiɗaɓere.
66021021	Luuluuje sappo e ɗiɗi ngattaa he dammbule sappo e ɗiɗi ɗeen. Dammbugal fuu he luuluure mum. Beddol huɓeere ndeen waɗira kaŋŋe dime, ƴelkitittooɗe hano danndorgal.
66021022	Huɓeere ndeen walaa Juulirde mawne fuu ngam Alla Joomiraawo, Jom baawɗe e Njawdiri ndiin, kam'en ngoni Juulirde mawne ndeen.
66021023	Naange naa lewru haajaaka nder mayre, ngam darjaaji Alla yaynata nde. Njawdiri ndiin woni fitilla mayre.
66021024	Lenyi duuniyaaru fuu tokkan nder annuura mayre. Laamiiɓe nder duuniyaaru adan njawdi mum'en ngaddana nde.
66021025	Dammbule mayre ommbataake faa abada abadin ngam jemma walaa nder mayre.
66021026	Darja e teddungal lenyi duuniyaaru waddetee nder mayre.
66021027	Gollooɓe ko nyiddinii, fenooɓe naa ko tunninta fuu, naatataa nder mayre. Naatooɓe nder mayre ngoni ɓe inɗe mum'en mbinndaa nder dewtere mbuurnam, dewtere nde Njawdiri ndeen.
66022001	Maleykaajo tawaaɗo hakkune maleykaaɓe jeɗɗo jogiiɓe nyeɗerɗe jeɗɗi holli kam maayo kokkoowo ndiyam mbuurnam. Ingo ƴelkita hano danndorgal. Ndiyam maggo no ƴuwa to jooɗorɗe Laamu Alla e Njawdiri ndiin.
66022002	Iɗam ila caka beddol huɓeere ndeen. Ngo fecci pecce ɗiɗi, caka pecce ɗiɗi ɗeen no tawa lekki mbuurnam, lekki ndimoohi lebbi sappo e ɗiɗi dow lebbi sappo e ɗiɗi. Lewru fuu iki rima nde worre. Lekki kii, kaakooli mum woni safaare nyawtoore lenyi duuniyaaru.
66022003	Ko Alla huɗi fuu tawataake nder huɓeere ndeen kaden. Jooɗorgal Laamu Alla he Njawdiri ndiin ngoni nder mayre. Maccuɓe Alla ndewan Alla.
66022004	Ɓe ngi'an yeeso makko e innde makko duu dow tiiɗe maɓɓe.
66022005	Jemma walaa kaden. Ɓe ngalaa haaju jeyngol fitilla naa jeyngol naange ngam Alla Joomiraawo yeyniran ɓe annuura mum. Ɓe laamoto faa abada abadin.
66022006	Maleykaajo oon wi'i kam : —Haalaaji ɗiin no kolniiɗi, ɗi goongaaji. Alla Joomiraawo, gattuɗo haala mum nder hunnduko annabiiɓe oon, lili maleykaajo mum ngam holla maccuɓe mum huune fuu nde garki mum ɓadii.
66022007	Iisa wi'i : —Ndaaree, mi waran ko ɓooyataa ! Belɗo hoore woni gaɗuɗo ko dewtere annabaaku ndee wi'i.
66022008	Amma miin, Yahaaya, woni nanuɗo, gi'uɗo kujje ɗee fuu. Gaɗa ko nanumi he ko ngi'umi ɗum, kippiimi he leydi hadde koyɗe maleykaajo gonɗo no haalda he am oon faa mi sujidana mo.
66022009	Sey o wi'i kam : —To sujidanam ! Mi maccuɗo Alla hano maaɗa. Mi maccuɗo Alla hano banndiraaɓe maa annabiiɓe, kam fuu he ɗowtaniiɓe haalaaji dewtere ndee. Sujidan Alla !
66022010	Nden o wi'i kam : —To suuɗu haalaaji annabaaku gonɗi nder dewtere ndee, ngam wakkati mo ɗum waroyta oon ɓadake.
66022011	Gaɗoowo ko boni heddo nder bononda mum. Jom golle tunnuɗe heddo nder golle mum tunnuɗe. Dartiiɗo heddo nder dartinaaku mum. Ceniiɗo heddo nder senaare mum !
66022012	Iisa wi'i : —Ndaaree, mi waran ko ɓooyataa. Mi waddan njobdi neɗɗo fuu. Mi yoɓa neɗɗo fuu dey-dey golle muuɗum.
66022013	Miin woni fuɗɗorde, miin woni timmoode. Miin woni arano, miin woni cakitiiɗo.
66022014	Belɗo hoore woni lonnoowo kolte mum ngam heɓa laawol nyaamude ɓiɓɓe lekki mbuurnam kiin, fa'a dammbule ɗeen, naata huɓeere ndeen.
66022015	Amma dawaaɗi he jom'en dobo-dobooji he fijooɓe he ittooɓe yonki he rewooɓe tooruuje he hiɗuɓe fewre he waɗooɓe hiila ngoni wonɓe gaɗa mayre.
66022016	Miin Iisa, mi lili maleykaajo am ngam seedoo kujje ɗee nder kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe ɗeen fuu. Miin mi wuddu Daawda, mi jippotooɗo he makko duu. Miin woni hoodere fajiri ƴelkitittoore !
66022017	Nden nanumi Ruuhu he ɓaŋeteeɗo oon no mbi'a : —War ! Neɗɗo fuu nanɗo ɗum duu no wi'a : —War ! Neɗɗo fuu ɗomɗuɗo wara, giɗuɗo yarude ndiyam kokkoojam mbuurnam fuu jaɓa yara ɗam forba.
66022018	Miin Yahaaya, miɗo sappana neɗɗo fuu nanɗo haalaaji annabaaku gonɗi nder dewtere ndee, nde nii joomum ɓeydi dow majji goɗɗum, Alla ɓeydanan joomum bala'uuji cifaaɗi nder dewtere ndee.
66022019	Neɗɗo fuu ittuɗo goɗɗum nder haalaaji dewtere annabaaku ndee, Alla ittan mbaka joomum he lekki mbuurnam kii filla mum waɗaa nder dewtere ndee. Alla ittan mbaka joomum duu nder huɓeere seniine ndee, nde filla mum waɗa nder dewtere ndee.
66022020	Ceedantooɗo kujje ɗeen oon duu wi'i : —Hakiika, mi waran ko ɓooyataa ! Sey mbi'en : —Goonga non. War Iisa Joomiraawo !
66022021	Moƴƴere Joomiraawo meeɗen Iisa wonda he mooɗon, on fuu. Aamiin !
